40001001	Caicunami Jesucristopac ñaupacuna; pai Davidmanta Abraanmantapash mirai carca.
40001002	Abran Isaacpac yaya carca, Isaacca Jacobpac yaya, Jacobca Judapac paipac huauquicunapacpash yaya carca.
40001003	Judaca Faresta Zaratapas Tamarmanta charirca. Faresca Esronpac yaya carca, Esronca Aranpac yaya carca.
40001004	Aranca Aminadadpac yaya, Aminadadca Naansonpac yaya carca, Naasonca Salmonpac yaya carca.
40001005	Salmonca paipac huarmi Rahabmanta Boozta charirca; Boozca Obedta charirca Rutmanta. Obedca Isaipac yaya carca.
40001006	Isaica Apu Davidpac yaya carca; Apu David Uriaspac huarmimanta Salomonta charirca.
40001007	Salomonca Roboanpac yaya carca, Roboanca Abiaspac yaya carca, Josafatca Joranpac yayacarca.
40001008	Azaca Josafatpac yaya carca, Josafatca Joranpac yaya, Joranca Uciaspac yaya carca.
40001009	Uciasca Jotanpac yaya carca, Jotanca Acazpac yaya, Acazca Ecequiaspac yaya carca.
40001010	Ecequiasca Manasespac yaya carca, Manasesca Amonpac yaya, Amonca Josiaspac yaya carca.
40001011	Josiasca Jeconiaspac paipac huauquicunapacpash yaya carca Israel runacuna, japi tucushpa, Babilonia lactaman pushai tucushcapi.
40001012	Chai huasha Jeconias Salatielpac yaya carca, Salatielca Zorobabelpac yaya carca.
40001013	Zorobabelca Abiudpac yaya carca, Abiudca Eliaquinpac yaya, Eliaquinca Azorpac yaya carca.
40001014	Azorca Sadocpac yaya carca, Sadocca Aquinpac yaya, Aquinca Eludpac yaya carca.
40001015	Eliudca Eleazarpac yaya carca, Eleazarca Matanpac yaya, Matanca Jacobpac yaya.
40001016	Jacobca Josepac yaya carca; Joseca Mariapac cari carca: Mariami Jesus "Cristo" nishcapac mama.
40001017	Chashna cacpi, Abraanmanta Davidcama chunca chuscu miraicuna canurca; chashnallata, Davidmanta pacha israelitacuna Babiloniaman pushai tucushcacama chunca chuscu miraicuna canurca; chaimanta Cristo pacarishcacama chunca chuscu miraicuna.
40001018	Jesucristo pacarina cashnami carca: Paipac mama Maria, Josehuan maqui japichishca cashpa, paihuan mana llutarishcapi, santo Samaipac ushaihuan huicsayuc tucurca.
40001019	Paipac cari Jose alli runami carca. Mariapi tucushcata apucunaman mana huillasha nishpa, pacalla paita saquinata yuyarca.
40001020	Chashna yuyacucpi, shuc angel paiman ricurimurca, cashna nishpa: —Jose, Davidpac churi, Mariata canpac huarmi japincapac ama manchaichu: paipac huicsapi tiyac huahua Santo Samaimantami.
40001021	Shuc cari huahuata charinca, paita "Jesus" shutichinqui, runacunata juchacunamanta quishpichinca mari.
40001022	Chai tucui chasna tucurca Dios rimashca pactarincapac, profeta cashna mari quillcashca carca:
40001023	Shuc malta huarmi huicsayuc tucunca, cari huahuata pacarichinca; chai huahuata Emanuel shutichinunca. (Emanuel nishpa "Dios ñucanchihuanmi" nin).
40001024	Jose riccharishpa, angel rimashcata uyashpa, Mariata paipac huarmita japirca.
40001025	llutarishcapica, Maria shuc huahuata aparca; Joseca paita Jesus shutichirca.
40002001	Jesus Belen llactapi, Juda allpapi pacarirca, Herodes apu cashcapi. Shuc puncha, shuc yachac runacuna inti llucshishcamanta Jerusalen llactaman shamunurca,
40002002	tapushpa nishpa: —¿Maipi tiyan cunanlla pacarishca Judiocunapac jatun apu? Paipac estrellata ricurcanchic inti lluchishcapi; paita chacchancapac shamunchic.
40002003	Herodes, chaita uyashpa, yapa mancharirca; Jerusalenpi causaccunapash mancharinurca.
40002004	Herodes, pacricunata quillcata yachaccunatapash shamuchishpa, paicunata tapurca nishpa: —¿Maipi pacarina can Mesias nishca Apu?
40002005	Cutipanurca nishpa: —Judamanta Belenpi; cashna mari profeta quillarca:
40002006	Canca, Belen llacta, Juda allpapi, mana tucui llactacunamanta yialli uchillachu canqui, canmanta mari ñuca runacunata pushac apu llucshinca.
40002007	Caita uyashpa, Herodes chai yachaccunata pacalla cayashpa, imura chai estrella ricurishcata paicunata huillachirca.
40002008	Chai huasha, Belen llactaman paicunata cacharca nishpa: —Huahuata mascacrichic; paita tupashpaca, ñucata huillahuanquichic, ñucapash paita chacchacrincapac.
40002009	Rimacpi uyashpa, yachaccuna rinurca. Paicuna ricushca estrella cutillata ricurirca; paicunata ñaupashpa, huahua tiyashca huasicama rirca: chaipi shayarirca.
40002010	Paicuna, estrellata ricushpa, yapa cushiyanurca.
40002011	Huasiman yaicushpa, huahuata mamantin tupanurca; cuncurishpaca, paita chacchanurca; huasha, malacunata pascashpa, curita, sumiriuta, mirrata paiman cuyanurca.
40002012	Chai huasha, paicuna nuspaipi uyashcapi "Herodespacman ama ticraichichu" nishcata, shuc ñanpita paicunapac llactaman ticranurca.
40002013	Yachaccuna rishca huasha, Diospac angei Joseman nuspaipi ricurimurca nishpa: —Jatari, huahuata mamantin pushashpa, Egipto allpaman miticui. Chaillapita saquirinqui ñuca canta rimanacama, Herodes huahuata mashcanca mari huañuchincapac.
40002014	Jose jatarishpa, huahuata mamantin pushashpa, tuta ucupi Egipto allpaman rirca.
40002015	Chaipi saquirinurca Herodes huañushcacama. Chashnami Dios profetapac shimihuan rimashca pactarirca: Egiptomanta ñuca churita cayarcani.
40002016	Yachaccuna mana ticramunucpi, Herodes sinchi piñarirca, "umachi tucushcani" nishpa; yachaccuna huahuamanta rimashcata yuyarishpa, tucui cari huahuacunata ishcai huatayuccama huañuchincapac cacharca, Belen llactapi, mayanlla huasicunapipash tiyaccuna.
40002017	Chashnami Jeremias profeta quillcashca pactarirca; cashna mari quillcashca carca:
40002018	Rama llactapi sinchi caparina uyarirca; jatun huacai, jatun ñacarina uyarirca: Raquelmi carca paipac huahuacunamanta huacashpa; paicuna ña huañushcata yachashpa, mana munarca cushiyachi tucuncapac.
40002019	Herodes huañushca huasha, Egiptopi Diospac angel Joseman nuspaipi ricurimurca, paita nishpa:
40002020	—Jatari, huahuata mamantin pushashpa, Israel allpaman ticrai, huahuata huañuchishun nishcacuna ña huañunurca.
40002021	Chaita uyashpa, Jose jatarishpa, huahuata mamantin pushashpa, Israel allpaman shamurca.
40002022	Judea allpaman rinata mancharcami, chaipi Arquelao paipac yaya Herodes rantimanta apu tucushcata uyashpa; chairaicu, Dios nuspaipi paita rimacpi, Galileaman rirca, Nazaret llactaman, chaipi causancapac. Chashnami Profetacuna rimashca pactarirca; cashna rimanushca carca: Paita nazareno runa ninunca.
40003001	Shuc puncha, bautisac Juan Judeapi tiyac chunlla allpaman shamurca, cashna camachishpa:
40003002	—Diosman ticraichic, Diospac pacha mayanyaran.
40003003	Juanmanta rimashca carca profeta Isaias cashna nishcapi: Chunlla allpapi shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: "Diospac ñanpita allichichic, Diospac ñanpita cuscachichic".
40003004	Juan camello nishca huilmahuan ahuashca churanata churarishca carca, huacra carahuan chunpillishpa.
40003005	Judea allpamanta, Jordan yacu patamanta achca runa paipacman shamuccuna carca;
40003006	paicuna juchacunata huillanucpi, Juan Jordan yacupi paicunata bautisac carca.
40003007	Achca fariseocuna saduceocunantin paipacman shamunucpi bautisanata mañancapa, paicunata nirca: —Machacui miraicuna; ¿pitac cancunata rimarca "Diospac ñacachinata quishpinquichic" nishpa?
40003008	Cancuna Diosman yuyaita ticrachishcata rashcacunahuan ricuchichic.
40003009	Ama pantaichichu, shuncupi yuyarishpa nishpa: "Abraan ñucanchic yayami". Cancunata nini: Dios cai rumicunamanta huahuacunata Abraanman surcunata ushan.
40003010	Yura siquipi tumi churashcami can; alli muyuta mana aparic yura cuchushcami canca yantancapac.
40003011	Ñuca yacullahuan cancunata bautisani, cancuna Diosman ticrancapac juchacunata saquishpa; ñuca huashata shamuc runa santo Samaipac ninahuan cancunata bautisanca, pai ñucata yallin mari; paipac ushutata apancapacpash mana allichu cani.
40003012	Paipac maquipi huairachinata charin, trigo muyuta quihuamanta anchuchincapac; trigo muyuta huacaichincami, quihuata mana tucuric ninapi rupachinca.
40003013	Shuc puncha, Jesus Galileamanta Jordan yacuman shamurca, Juanpacman, bautisai tucuncapac.
40003014	Juan mana mutiarcachu paita bautisancapac, nishpa: —Canmi ñucata bautisana canqui; ¿imaraicu "bautisahuai" nihuanqui?
40003015	Jesus cutipashpa ñirca: —Ñuca rimashcata railla; ñucanchic Dios munashcata pactachina alli canca. Chaita uyashpa, Juan Jesusta bautisarca.
40003016	Yacumanta llucshicucpi, jahua pacha pascarirca; Diospac Samai ricurimurca, urpi shina uraicucushpa, Jesuspac jahuapi shayarishpa.
40003017	Chaillapita, shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: —Caimi ñuca llaquishca churi; paipi cushiyani.
40004001	Jesus bautisai tucucpi, Santo Samai chunlla allpaman paita purichirca, supai paita camancapac.
40004002	Chuscu chunca puncha tutantin mana micushpa causashcapi, Jesus yarcachirca.
40004003	Supai paipacman shamushpa nirca: —Can Diospa churi cashpa, cai rumicunata tantata rurai.
40004004	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Diospac shimi cashna nin: "Runa mana tantallahuanchu causan; Dios rimashcatapash mutsunmi"
40004005	Chashna rimacpi, supai Jerusalen llactaman paita pusharca. Diospac huasijahuapi shayachirca.
40004006	Huasha nirca: —Can Diospac churi cashpa, caimanta allpaman shitari, quillcara mari tiyan: "Dios paipac angelcunata cachanca canta ricuncapac; paicuna maquihuan japishpa canta pushanunca, can ama rumicunapi chucrincapac".
40004007	Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Diospac shimi caitapash nin: "Canpac apu Diosta ama camaichu".
40004008	Cutillata supai Jesusta shuc jahua urcuman pusharca; chaimanta tucui cai pacha llactacunata chaicunapi tiyac sumaccunatapash ricuchishpa,
40004009	nirca: —Cai tucuita cushcanqui, cuncurishpa ñucata chacchahuacpi.
40004010	Jesus uyashpa paita nirca: —Ñucamanta anchuri, supai; quillcarapash tiyan: "Cancapac Apu Diosta chacchanqui, paillatata sirbinqui".
40004011	Supai chaita uyashpa, Jesusta saquishpa rirca; angelcuna shamushpa, Jesusta caranuica.
40004012	Shuc puncha, bautisac Juanta chunta curralpi huichcanurca. Jesus chaita yachashpa, Galileaman rirca.
40004013	Nazaret llactata jichushpa, Cafarnaun llactaman rirca chaipi causancapac. Cafarnaunca jatun cucha patapi tiyarca, Zabulon-Neftali allpacunapi.
40004014	Chashnami profeta Isaias rimashca pactarirca pai nishcapi:
40004015	Zabulon-Neftali panpa, jatun cucha ñanpipi Jordan yacu chinpaman Diosta mana ricsiccunapac allpa.
40004016	Tutapi puricushca runacuna shuc jatun achicta ricunurca.
40004017	Chaimanta pacha, Jesus yachachincapac callarirca nishpa: —Diosman ticraichic, Dios apu cana pacha ña pactamuran.
40004018	Shuc puncha, Galilea cucha patata puricushpa, Jesus ishcai runata tuparca, huauquipura; shuc Simon Pedro carca, shuc paipac huauqui Andres; llicata cuchapi shitaranurca, yacu aichata japiccama canurca mari.
40004019	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñucahuan shamuichic; runacunata japiccamanta cancunata rasha
40004020	Paicuna, chai shimita uyashpa, llicata saquishpa, Jesusta catinurca.
40004021	Astanipi, shuc ishcai runata tuparca, huauquipura; shuc Santiago carca, shuc Juan shutiyuc, Cebedeopac churicuna; yaya canuapi llicata allichiranurca. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñucahuan shamuichic.
40004022	Paicunaca, yayata canuatapash saquishpa, Jesusta catinurca.
40004023	Jesus Galilea llactacunapi puricurca, tantarina huasicunapi yachachishpa, Diospac alli shimita camachishpa, tucui laya uncushcacunata alliyachishpa.
40004024	Paipac shuti tucui Siria nishca allpapi uyarirca. Tucui laya uncuihuan, nanaihuan llaquirishcacunata paipacman pushanuxca: supai japishcacuna, epilepticocuna, suchu runacuna. Tucuicunata alliyachirca.
40004025	Achca runacuna paita catinurca Galileamanta, Decapolis nishca llactacunamanta, Jerusalenmanta, Judeamanta, Jordan yacu chinpamanta.
40005001	Jesus, achca runacuna paita caticpi ricushpa, shuc urcuman sicarca; tiyaricpi, pai yachachishcacuna mayanyanurca.
40005002	Mayanyanucpi Jesus yachachincapac callarirca nishpa:
40005003	—Cushiyaichic Diosta mutsunchic niccuna, jahua pacha cancunapacmi.
40005004	Cushiyaichic cai causaipi huacaccuna, cushiyachishca canquichic.
40005005	Cushiyaichic casi shuncuyuccuna, cai pachata cui tucunquichic.
40005006	Cushiyaichic Dios munashcata rurasha niccuna, chaita rurancapac Dios cancunata yanapancami.
40005007	Cushiyaichic shuccunata llaquirishpa yanapaccuna, Dios cancunata llaquirishpa yanapancami.
40005008	Cushiyaichic chuya shuncuyuccuna, Diosta ricunquichicmi.
40005009	Cushiyaichic piñanacunata jarcaccuna, Diospac churicuna canquichicmi,
40005010	Cushiyaichic allita rashcamanta ñacachi tucuccuna, jahua pacha cancunapacmi canca,
40005011	Cushicuna canquichc ñucaraicu cancunata chicninucpi, piñanucpi, manallita cancunamanta llullashpa rimanucpi.
40005012	Chashna tucucpi, cushiyanquichic; jahua pachapi cancuna cui tucuna yapa jatunmi canca. Ñaupa causashca profetacunata chai layallata llaquichinurca.
40005013	Cancuna cai pachapi cachi shina canquichic. Cachi paipac mishquita chincachicpi, ¿imahuan cutillata cachiyanca? Mana imapac balin; jichununlla, runacunaca jaitanun.
40005014	Cancuna inti shina canquichic runacunapac. Shuc urcu jahuapi tiyac llacta mana pacaipacchu.
40005015	Shuc chinpusuta mana japichinchic mala ucupi churancapac; jahuapi churancapac japichinchic, huasipi tiyaccunata ricuchincapac.
40005016	Cancunapac achic runacuna ñaupacpi punchaclla ricurichun, shuccuna cancuna alli rashcata ricushpa, jahua pachapi tiyac Yayata sumacyachincapac.
40005017	Ñuca mana shamurcanichu camachic quillca rimashcata, profetacuna rimashcatapash anchuchincapac; chaicunata pactachincapac shamurcani.
40005018	Shuti cancunata nini: Jahua pachahuan cai pachahuan tucuricpipash, camachic quillcapi tiyac illacta pactarinca.
40005019	Chashna cacpi, maicanpash camachic quillcapi tiyashcata mana pactachicpi uchillapipash, chashna rancapac shuccunata yachachicpi, jahua pachapi puchucai canca; ranti, maicanpash chaicunata pactachicpi, chaicunata pactachincapac yachachicpi, jahua pachapi cui tucuna yapa jatunmi canca.
40005020	Cancunata nini: Cancuna camachic quillcata yachaccunamanta, fariseocunamanta yaili allicuna mana cashpa, jahua pachaman mana yaicunquichic.
40005021	Ñaupacunaman cashna rimanurca —cancuna chaita yachanquichic—: "Ama huañuchinquichu; huanuchic runa cautsayachi tucunca".
40005022	Ranti, ñuca cancunata nini: Shuccunata yanca piñac runa, cautsayachi tucunca. Maicanpash shucta asishpa paita "Upa" nicpi, tucui taripac bula paita taripanunca. Maicanpash shucta piñashpa paita "millai" nicpi, ucupachapi urmanalla tucunca.
40005023	Can, canpac camarita Diosman apashpa rishpa, shuc runahuan imatapash charishcata yuyarishpa,
40005024	camarita chaillapita saquishpa, paihuan allichinqui; chai huasha camarita Diosman ricuchina ushanqui.
40005025	Can shuc runahuan ima llaquitapash charishpa, utcalla paihuan allichinqui, chaira apupacman mana pactashpallata. Mana chashna ruracpica, apu canta polisia nishcaman cunca, polisiaca chunta curralpi canta huichcanca.
40005026	Chaimanta mana llucshinqui can dibishcata illacta paganacama.
40005027	"Ama juchallinquichu" ñaupacunaman rimanurca —chaita alli yachanquichic.
40005028	Ñuca cancunata nini: Maicanpash shuc huarmita mana alli yuyaihuan ricushpa, paipac shuncupi ña juchallirca chai huarmihuan.
40005029	Chairaicu, canpac ñahui canta juchallichicpi, chaita surcushpa jichunqui. Canpac aichamanta shuc aichashitu chincaricpi yalli alli canca ama tucui aicha ucupachaman shitai tucuncapac.
40005030	Canpac maqui canta juchallichicpi, pitishpa jichunqui. Canpac aichamanta shuc aichashitu chincaricpi yalli alli canca ama tucui aicha ucupachapi shitai tucuncapac.
40005031	Ñaupacunaman caitapash rimanuica: "Shuc runa paipac huarmita jichusha nishpa, maqui llushpichina quillcata paiman cuna can".
40005032	Ranti, ñuca cancunata nini: Maicanpash paipac huarmita jichushpa, —mana yanca llutarishca cacpi—, paita juchallichin, chai runaca jatun juchata ran; chai huarmihuan casarac runapash jatun juchata aparin,
40005033	Chashnallata, ñaupacunaman rimanurca nishpa: "Ama llullashpa Diospac shutita rimanquichu; Diospac shutita rimashpai paiman cusha nishcata pactachina can".
40005034	Ñucaca cancunata nini: Ama imura jurashpa rimanquichichu; mana jahua pacha shutipi, jahua pacha Diospac tiyarina mari can
40005035	Mana cai pacha shutipi, cai pacha Diospac chaqui samanami can; mana Jerusalen shutipi, Jerusalen jatun Apupac llacta mari can.
40005036	Ama canpac uma shutipi juraichu; canpac acchata yanayachincapac, yuracyachincapac mana ushanqui.
40005037	Cancuna rimacushpa, "ari" ninquichic "ari" nmana cacpi; "mana" ninquichic "mana" rimana cacpi. Cancuna yapashca manallimanta shamun.
40005038	Caitapash quillcara tiyan —ña yachanquichic—: "Maicanpash canpac ñahuita huacllichicpi, canpash paipac ñahuita huacllichinqui; pipash canpac quiruta paquicpi, canpash paipac quiruta paquinqui".
40005039	Ranti, ñuca cancunata nini: Manallicunata ama jarcaichichu. Shuc ñahuipi canta macanucpi, shuctapash ricuchinqui.
40005040	Canta apupacman pushanucpi canpac camisata quichuncapac, calsuntapash cunqui.
40005041	Maicanpash canta nicpi: "Caita apashpa ri chaicama", astalla caruman apashpa rinqui.
40005042	Maicanpash canta imatapash mañacpi, paiman cunqui, "mañachihuai" nishpa nicpi, ama mitsaichu.
40005043	Caitapash quillcara tiyan: "Canpac llactamanta caccunata llaquinqui, canta chicniccunata chicninqui".
40005044	Ranti, ñuca cancunata nini: Cancunata chicniccunata llaquinquichic, cancunata ñacachiccunamanta Diosta mañanquichic.
40005045	Chashna rashpa, cancunapacjahua pachapi tiyac Yayapac churicuna canquichic. Pai allicuna jahuapi, manallicuna jahuapipash intita llucshichin; allicuna jahuapi manallicuna jahuapipash tamiachin.
40005046	Cancunata llaquiccunallata llaquishpa, ¿imata cuyai tucunquichic? ¿Manachu chaillata manallicuna ranacun?
40005047	Cancunapac aillucunallata salurashpa, ¿ima allita ranquichic? Diosta mana ricsiccunapash chaita ranacun.
40005048	Allicuna caichic, cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya alli cashca shina.
40006001	Dios rimashcata ama ruranquichichu runacuna ricuncapaclla. Chashna racpi, cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya mana imata cuyanca.
40006002	Can imatapash cushpa shucta yanapancapac, ama caparichu nishpa: "Ñuca rashcata ricuichic"; chashna ranacun llullacamacuna tantarina huasicunapi, callecunapipash, runacunapacpi yupachai tucuncapac. Shuti cancunata nini: Cuyanata ña chasquinurca.
40006003	Can, ranti, imatapash shucta yanapancapac cucpi, manapi can rashcata yachachun;
40006004	can alli rashca pacalla saquirichun; canpac pacallapi ricuc Yaya canta cuyanca.
40006005	Cancuna Dios—huan rimarishpa, ama llullacamacuna shina raichichu. Paicuna shayarishpa, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi, tantarina huasicunapi, callecunapi Dios-huan rimac canacun, runacuna paicunata ricuncapac. Shuti cancunata nini: Cuyanata ña chasquinurca.
40006006	Can Dios-huan rimarishpa, huasi ucuman yaicunqui: puncuta huichcashpa, pacallapi tiyac canpac Yaya Dios—huan rimanqui. Pacallapi ricuc canpac Yaya Dios canta cuyancami.
40006007	Can Dios—huan rimarishpa, ama achca shimicunata rimanquichu; Diosta mana ricsiccuna achca yanca shimicunata rimanun "Dios uyahuancami" nishpa yuyarishpa.
40006008	Ama paicuna shina ruraichichu; Dios cancuna mutsushcata yachanmi, cancuna chaira mana mañacpi.
40006009	-
40006013	Chairaicu cashna rimanquichic: Ñucanchic jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya, tucuicuna canta ricsinuchun. Can Apu tucuncapac shamui. Canpac munai rurarichun cai allpapi jahua pachapi rurarishca shina. Ñucanchic mutsushca tantata cunan puncha ñucanchicman cui. Ñucanchic manalli rashcata perdonapai, ñucanchicpash shuccuna ñucanchicman manalli rashcata perdonanchic. Juchanayaipi urmancapac ñucanchicta ama saquichu; manallimanta ñucanchicta quishpichi.
40006014	Cancuna perdonacpi shuccuna cancunaman manalli rashcata, jahua pachapi tiyac Yayapash cancunata perdonanca;
40006015	ranti, cancuna shuccunata mana perdonacpi, cancunapac Yaya mana perdonancachu cancunapac juchacunata.
40006016	Cancuna sasina puncha, ama llullacamacuna shina raichichu; paicuna llaquirishcalla purinun, runacunaman paicuna sasirashcata ricuchincapac. Shuti cancunata nini: Cuyanata ña chasquinurca.
40006017	Can sasicushpa, canpac ñahuita maillanqui, asnac yacuhuan canpac acchata armarinqui,
40006018	can sasirashcata shuccuna ama yachancapac; pacalli tiyac canpac Yaya Dios yachancami, canta cuyancami.
40006019	Ama cai pacha imacunata tantachichichu; cai pachapi susu micun, tucui huacllirin; shuhuacuna huasipi yaicunun shuhuancapac.
40006020	Ashtahuan alli canca jahua pacha imacunata tantachina; chaipi susu mana micunchu: manaima huacllirin; mana shuhuanun.
40006021	Canpac imacuna tiyashcapi, chaillapita canpac yuyai tiyanca.
40006022	Canpac ñahuicuna achic shinami canpac aichapac; canpac ñahuicuna alli cacpi, tucui aicha punchayanca;
40006023	canpac ñahuicuna manalli cacpi, tucui aicha tutapi tiyanca. Can charishca achic tuta capi, ¿ima sami yana chai tuta canca?
40006024	Shuc runa ishcai patronta sirbina mana ushanchu; shucta llaquishpa, shucta chicninca; shucta uyashpa, shucta mana uyancachu. Diosta cullquitapash sirbinata mana ushanquichichu.
40006025	Chairaicu cancunata nini: Ama llaquirichichu "causancapac imata micushun, imata churarishun" nishpa. ¿Manachu causana micunamanta yalli balin? ¿Manachu aicha churanamanta yalli balin?
40006026	Pishcucunata ricuichic. Mana tarpunun, mana pallanun huasipi huacaichincapac; chashnapash, jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya paicunata caran. ¿Manachu cancuna pishcucunamanta yalli balinquichic?
40006027	¿Cancunamanta maican, imatapash rashpa, causaita unayachinca?
40006028	¿Churanamanta imaraicu llaquirinquichic? Sacha sisacunata ricuichic; mana llancanucpipash, mana ahuanucpipash, sumac huiñanun.
40006029	Shuti cancunata nini: Salomonpash, tucui laya churanacunata charishpa, mana sisacuna shina churaricchu carca.
40006030	Dios, mana unaichu causac sacha sisacunata chashna churachicpi, ¿manachu ashtahuan allita cancunahuan ruranca, ansalla inic runacuna?
40006031	Chairaicu, ama llaquirichicu: Imata micushun, imata upiashun, imata churarishun nishpa.
40006032	Diosta mana ricsiccuna chaicunamanta llaquirinun; cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya Dios cancuna chai tucui mutsushcata yachanmi.
40006033	Chashna cacpi, ñaupacta Diosta mascaichic, pai rimashcata raichic; causancapac mutsushca mana pishiyancachu.
40006034	Caya punchatapash ama yuyaranquichichu; caya punchapash quiquin llaquicunata apamunca. Caran punchapac llaquicunahuan pacta can.
40007001	Shuccunata ama taripanquichichu: Diosca cancunata mana taripancachu.
40007002	Cancuna shuccunata taripashca shinallata, Dios cancunata taripanca.
40007003	¿Imaraicu canpac huauquipac ñahui ucupi tiya mapashituta ricunqui, canpac quiquin ñahui ucupi tiyac caspita mana ricushpa?
40007004	Shuc caspita charishpa canpac ñahui ucupi, ¿imaraicu canpac huauquita ninqui: "Huauqui, canpac ñahuipi tiyac mapashituta anchuchihuapai"?
40007005	Llullacama runa: ñaupacta canpac ñahuimanta caspita surcunqui; chai huasha canpac huauquipac ñahuimanta mapashituta surcuncapac allimi ricunqui.
40007006	Sumac cashcacunata ama allcucunaman cunquichichu; allcucuna piñarishpa shitarishpa, cancunata chucrichinunman. Perla nishca muyucunata ama cuchicunaman shitanquichichu; cuchicuna chaicunata jaitanunman.
40007007	Cancuna mañacpi, Dios cuncami; cancuna mascashpa tupanquichic; huasi puncuta tacacpi, pascanuncami.
40007008	Tucui mañac chasquin; mascac tupan; puncuta tacac runaman pascanunca.
40007009	¿Cancunamanta maican runa paipac churi "tantata carahuai" nishpa nicpi, rumita cunca?
40007010	¿"Yacu aichata carahuai" nishpa mañacpi, machacuita cuncachu?
40007011	Cancuna, manalli cashpallata, cancunapac churicunaman allicunata cuyanata yachanquichic; ¿manachu cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya allicunata cunca paita mañaccunaman?
40007012	Chashna cacpi, tucui cancuna munashcata shuccuna cancunahuan rancapac, chaillatata ranquichic paicunahuan. Chaitami rurai nin Moisespac camachic quillca, profetacuna nishca quillcapash.
40007013	Quichqui puncuta yaicuichic. Jatun puncuta yaicushpa, jatun ñanpita rishpa, chincarinaman rinqui; chaita achca runa purinun;
40007014	ranti, causanaman rincapac, quichqui puncuta yaicunami; uchilla ñanpita rinami; chai puncuta, chai ñanpita ansa runacuna tarinun.
40007015	"Diospacmanta rimani" nishpa rimac llullacamacunata yuyanquichic. Paicuna jahuata ricurishpa, allicuna shina ricurinun; ranti paicunapac shuncu manalli can.
40007016	Paicuna rashcamanta paicunata ricsinquichic. Chinimanta ubillasta mana pallanchichu, capironamanta naranjata mana pallanchichu.
40007017	Alli yura alli muyucunata aparin; mana balic yura mana balic muyucunata aparin.
40007018	Alli yura mana balic muyucunata mana aparinchu; chashnallata, mana balic yura alli muyucunata mana aparinchu.
40007019	Mana balic muyucunata aparic yura cuchui tucunca rupachincapac.
40007020	Chashna cacpi, shuc runa alli cashcata yachancapac, pai rashcacunata ricunquichic.
40007021	Manapi "Apunchic, Apunchic" nishcamanta jahua pachaman yaicuncachu: ñuca Yaya Dios munashcata pactachic runa, paimi jahua pachaman yaicuna.
40007022	Chai punchapi achca runa ñucata rimanunca nishpa: "Apunchic, Apunchic, ¿manachu canpac shutipi yachachircanchic, canpac shutipi supaicunata jichurcanchic, canpac shutipi achca mana raipaccunata rarcanchic?".
40007023	Ñuca paicunata rimasha: "Mana imurapi cancunata ricsircanichu; ñucamanta anchurichic, manallita ruraccuna".
40007024	Ñuca cunan rimashca shimicunata pactachic shuc yuyayuc runa shinami, rumi jahuapi huasita shayachic.
40007025	Sinchi tamia shamurca, yacucuna juntarinurca, sinchita huairarca huasita cuyuchishpa; chashnapash, huasi mana tularishcachu, rumi jahuapi shayachishca cacpi.
40007026	Ranti, ñuca cunan rimashca shimicunata uyashpa mana pactachic, shuc yuyai illac runa shinami, tiyu jahuapi shayachic.
40007027	Tamia shamurca, yacucuna juntarinurca, sinchi huaira huasita cuyuchishpa urmachirca; chai huasi chincarirca.
40007028	Jesus rimanata tucuchishcapi, runacuna pai yacha chishcamanta mancharinurca;
40007029	pai yachachina shuc laya mari carca, ushaihuan yachachicurca, mana judio yachaccuna shina.
40008001	Jesus urcumanta uraicushcapi, achca runacuna paita catinurca.
40008002	Shuc sisu runa shamushpa, Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurirca, cashna nishpa: —Apulla, can munashpa, ñucata alliyachinata ushanqui
40008003	Rimacpi, Jesus maquihuan paita llancarca nishpa: —Munanimi, alliyashca saquiri. Chai ucu, sisu runa alliyashca saquirirca.
40008004	Jesus paita nirca: —Uyai, ama pitapash rimaichu; pacricunapacman rishpa, Moises rimashca camarita cunqui, tucuicuna yachancapac can ña alliyachi tucushcata.
40008005	Jesus Cafarnaun llactaman yaicucpi, shuc suldaru apu shamushpa, Jesusta mañarca nishpa:
40008006	—Apulla, ñucata sirbic runa huasipi sirin, mana puric ushan; yapa ñacarin nanaihuan.
40008007	Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Paita janpicrisha.
40008008	Suldaru apu chaita uyashpa nirca: —Apulla, ñuca mana balicchu cani can ñuca huasipi yaicuncapac. Rimailla, ñucata sirbic runa alliyancami.
40008009	Ñucaca, shuccunata sirbic runa cashpa, suldarucunapac apu cani. Shucta "ri" nicpi, pai rinmi. Shucta "shamui" nicpi, pai shamunmi. Ñucata sirbic runata "caita rurai" nicpi, pai ruranmi.
40008010	Chaita uyashpa, Jesus mancharirca; paita caticcunata nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Israel llactacunapi cai runa shina inishcata mana tuparcanichu.
40008011	Achca runacuna shamununca Abraanhuan, Isaac—huan, Jacobhuan pacta mesaman tiyarishpa jahua pachapi micuncapac.
40008012	Ranti, jahua pachapi yaicuna caccuna canchaman, tuta ucuman shitashcami canunca; chaipi huacanunca, ñacarinunca.
40008013	Huasha, Jesus suldaru aputa nirca: —Canpac huasiman ri, can inishca shina tucuchun. Chai ucu chai sirbic runa alliyashcami.
40008014	Chaimanta, Jesus Pedropac huasiman rirca; Pedropac huarmi mama uncushpa siricurca.
40008015	Jesus paipac maquita llancacpi, uncui samarirca; huarmi shayarishpa, paicunata sirbincapac callarirca.
40008016	Tutayacucpi, achca jirus supai japishca runacunata Jesuspacman pushamunurca; shuc shimillahuan supaicunata callpachirca, tucui uncuccunata alliyachirca.
40008017	Chashna tucurca Isaias profeta ñaupa uras rimashca pactarincapac; cashna mari quillcara tiyarca: Pai ñucanchic uncuicunata japirca, ñucanchic nanaicunata aparca.
40008018	Jesus achca runa pai muyucta tantaricpi ricushpa nirca: —Chinpaman jacuichic.
40008019	Rimacpi, shuc camachic quillcata yachac shamushpa, Jesusta nirca: —Yachachic, maimanpash can ricpi, canta catina munani.
40008020	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Chajacuna puñuna jutcuta charinun, pishcucunapash huasita charinun; ranti, cai RUNA maipi puñunata mana charinchu.
40008021	Shuc Jesus yachachishca runapash paita nirca: —Apulla, ñaupacta ñuca yayata panpachihuapai.
40008022	Jesu cutipashpa nirca: —Catihuai. Ñucata mana quiriccuna huañushcacunata panpanuchun.
40008023	Chai huasha, Jesus canuapi yaicurca; yachachishcacunapash paihuan yaicunurca.
40008024	Cuncaimanta cuchapi sinchi huaira jatarirca; yacu piñaricpi, bacucuna canuata ñalla panpanurca. Jesus puñucurca.
40008025	Yachachishcacuna Jesusta licchachishpa ninurca: —Apulla, ñucanchicta quishpichipai. Panpariranchicmi.
40008026	Jesus liccharishpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu mancharinquichic? Ansashitulla ininquichic. Jatarishpaca, yacuta huairatapash piñashpa rimarca; rimacpi tucui casilla saquirirca.
40008027	Runacuna mancharishpa ninurca: —¡Mana pacha! ¿Ima laya runa can cai? uairapash yacupash paita uyanun.
40008028	Jesus chinpaman pactashcapi, Gadara nishca llactamanta ishcai runa aya jutcucunamanta llucshishpa, Jesuspacman shamunuica. Chai runacunata millai supai japishca carca; chaita purincapac manapi usharca.
40008029	Jesusta ricushpa, caparinurca ñishpa: —¿Imapac ñucanchihuan satirinqui, Diospac Churi Jesus? ¿Ñucanchicta ñacachincapacchu shamunqui, pacha manara pactarishcapi?
40008030	Chainiman achca cuchi micucunurca;
40008031	supaicuna Jesusta mañanurca nishpa: —Runacunamanta ñucanchicta llucshichishpa, ñucanchicta chai cuchicunapi yaicuchipai.
40008032	Chashna rimanucpi, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Allimi, yaicuichiclla. Chashna nicpi uyashpa, chai millai supaicuna runacunamanta llucshishpa, cuchicunapi yaicunurca; yaicunucpi, cuchicuna shuc huaicuta cuchaman urmanurca; yacupi chucallishpa huañunurca.
40008033	Cuchi ricuccuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharishpa, callpashpa rinurca; llactaman pactashpa, chai tucuita huillanurca; supai japishca runacunaman tucushcatapash rimanurca.
40008034	Llacta runacuna, chaita uyashpa, Jesus tiyashcaman rinurca; paita ricushpa, mañanurca nishpa: —Sucanchic allpamanta llucshipai.
40009001	Rimanucpi uyashpa, Jesus canuapi yaicushpa, cuchata chinpashpa, paipac quiquin llactaman pactarca.
40009002	Pactacpi, shuc suchu runata cahuitupi sirishcata Jesuspacman pushanurca. Jesus, uncushcata huantuccuna inishcata ricushpa, suchu runata nirca: —Churi, cariyanqui; canpac juchacuna pichashca canun.
40009003	Rimacpi, huaquin camachic quillcata yachaccuna uyashpa, shuncupi yuyanurcanishpa: —Cai runa Diosta camicun pai rimashcahuan.
40009004	Jesus, paicuna shuncupi yuyashcata yachashpa nirca:
40009005	—¿Imaraicu manallita yuyacunquichic shuncu ucupi? ¿Imata ashtahuan rimanalla can: "Canpac juchacuna pichai tucunun" nishpa rimanachu? ¿''Jatari, canpac huasiman ri" nishpa rimanachu?
40009006	¿Manachu cutipahuanquichic? Ñuca cai pachapi juchacunata pichana ushashcata ricuchinca rani. Huasha suchu runata nirca: —Jatari, canpac cahuituta apashpa huasiman ri.
40009007	Rimacpi, suchu runa jatarishpa, huasiman rirca.
40009008	Runacuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharinurca; mancharishpa, Diosta chacchanurca, chashna ushanata runaman cushcaraicu.
40009009	Jesus chaimanta rishpa, Mateo shutiyuc runata ricurca; chai runa gubirnu cullquita pallac cashpa, gubimu huasipi tiyarca. Jesus paita ricushpa nirca: —Ñucahuan shamui. Mateo, jatarishpa, Jesusta catirca.
40009010	Chai huasha, shuc puncha, Jesus Mateo huasipi micucucpi, achca gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna juchayuccunapash Jesus-huan pai yachachishcacunantin micuncapac shamunurca.
40009011	Fariseocuna, chaita ricushpa, Jesus yachachishcacunata ninurca: —Imaraicu cancunata yachachic gubirnu cullquita pallacu nahuan, juchayuccunahuanpash micuc can?
40009012	Jesus chaita uyashpa nirca: —Alli causaccuna janpicamata mana mutsunun; uncushcacuna janpicamata mutsunun.
40009013	Quillcapi quillcarata atipaichic: Huañuchishca huacracunamanta yalli llaquic shuncuta munani. Allicunata mascancapac mana shamurcanichu; manallicu nata mascancapac shamurcani.
40009014	Shuc puncha, Bautisac Juanta caticcuna, Jesus-huan tuparishpa, tapunurca cashna nishpa: —¿Imaraicu ñucanchihuan fariseocunahuan achca cuti sasinchic, canpaccunaca mana sasicchu canacun?
40009015	Tapunucpi, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Buraman cayashcacuna sasicchu canun, cari paicunahuan tiyacucpi? Mana. Shuc puncha cari pushai tucunca; chai huasha sasinunca.
40009016	Manapi rucu churanata mushu churana pitihuan llachapanchu; chashna ranucpi, mushu churana curuyacpi, rucu churanata aisashpa, ashtahuan lliquichinca.
40009017	Chashnallata, manapi mushu binota rucu cara purupi churan; chashna ranucpi, cara puru tucyacpi, bino tallirinca, cara puru huacllirinca. Chairaicu, mushu bino mushu cara purupi huacaichina can, ama huacllirincapac.
40009018	Jesus chashna rimacucpi, shuc judiocunapac apu shamushpa, Jesuspac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, nirca: —Ñuca ushushi cunanshitu huañurca; can rishpa maquita paipacjahuapichuracpi, causarincami.
40009019	Rimacpi, Jesus shayarishpa, chai runahuan rirca; Jesus yachachishcacunapash rinurca.
40009020	Riranucpi, shuc uncushca huarmi shamurca: chunca ishcai huatata yahuar tallirishpa causarca; chai huarmi Jesusman huashamanta mayanyashpa, paipac churanata llancarca,
40009021	shuncu ucupi yuyarishpa: —Paipac churanata llancashpallahuan alliyashami.
40009022	Llancacpi, Jesus ticrarishpa, huarmita ricushpa nirca: —Ama manchaichu; can inishcamanta alliyachi tucushcanqui. Chai ucu huarmi alliyarca.
40009023	Jesus, apu huasiman pactashpa, pinculluccunata ricushpa, runacuna caparishcahuan huacacunucpi uyashpa, paicunata nirca:
40009024	—Llucshichic caimanta; huahua mana huañushcachu, puñuranlla. Chaita uyashpa, runacuna Jesusta asinurca.
40009025	Jesus, runacunata llucshichishpa, huahua tiyashcaman yaicurca; maquimanta paita japicpi, huahua jatarirca,
40009026	Tucui chai suyuta Jesus rashcata rimanurca.
40009027	Jesus chaimanta llucshicpi, ishcai ñausa runa paita catinurca, cashna nishpa: —Davidpac churi, ñucanchicmanta llaquiripai.
40009028	Jesus, huasiman yaicushpa, ñausacunapash catishpa yaicunucpi, paicunata tapushpa nirca: —¿Ñuca cancunata janpina ushashcata ininquichichu? —Ari, Apulla-ninurca.
40009029	Rimanucpi uyashpa, Jesus paicunapac ñahuicunata llancashpa, nirca: —Cancuna inishca shina tucuchun.
40009030	Chai ucullapi, paicunapac ñahuicuna alliyachi tucunurca. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Yuyanquchic; manapi ñuca rashcata yachachun.
40009031	Paicuna rishpaca, Jesus rashcata tucui chai llactacunapi rimanurca.
40009032	Ñausacuna rishca huashalla, shuc runacuna shuc upa shimi runata Jesuspacman pushanurca; chai upa shimi runata supai japishca carca.
40009033	Jesus supaita chai runamanta jichucpi, runa rimancapac callarirca. Chaita ricuccuna mancharishpa ninurca: —¡Mana pacha! Chashna rashcata Israel llactacunapi mana imura ricurcanchic.
40009034	Ranti, fariseocuna ninurca: —Cai runa supaimanta japishca ushaihuan supaicunata jichun.
40009035	Jesus tucui llactacunata puric carca, tantarina huasicunapi yachachishpa. Diospac cushi shimita camachicurca, tucui laya uncuicunata nanaicunatapash alliyachishpa.
40009036	Achca runacunata ricushpa, paicunamanta llaquirirca, sanpayashca canurca mari, jichushca shina, michic illac obejacuna shina.
40009037	Jesus pai yachachishcacunata nirca: —Pallana chacra achcami, pallaccuna ansallami.
40009038	Chacra amuta mañaichic pallaccunata paipac pallana chacraman cachachun nishpa.
40010001	Shuc puncha, Jesus yachachishcacunata cayashpa, supaicunata jichuna ushanata paicunaman curca; chashnallata, tucui laya uncuita, tucui laya nanaita janpina ushanata paicunaman curca.
40010002	Caicunami chunca ishcai apostolcunapac shuticuna: Ñaupac Simon (huasha "Pedro" shutichishca) paipac huauqui Andres; Cebedeopac churi Santiago paipac huauqui Juanpash;
40010003	Felipe, Bartolome, Tomas, Mateo (gubirnu cullquita pallac), Alfeopac churi Santiago, Tadeo, cananeo nishca Simon,
40010004	Judas Iscariote, Jesusta japichic runa.
40010005	Jesus chai chunca ishcaita cacharca cashna nishpa: —Aucacunapacman ama rinquichichu; Samaria llactacunaman ama yaicunquichichu.
40010006	Israelmanta chincarishca obeja cunapacman rinquichic.
40010007	Paicunapacman pactashpa, cashna rimanquichic: "Diospac pacha mayanllami".
40010008	Uncushcacunata janpinquichic, huañushcacunata causarichinquichic, sisu runacunata alliyachinquichic, supaicunata jichunquichic; chashna rana ushanata yanca chasquircanquichic, yancapash cunquichic.
40010009	Curita, cullquita, malata ama apaichichu.
40010010	Shuc camisallata apanquichic, ushutata tahunatapash ama apanquichichu. Llancac runaman pai llancashcamanta cunata cuna can.
40010011	Shuc llactaman pactashpa, shuc alli shuncu runata mascanquichic, paipac huasipi saquirincapac llactamanta llucshinacama.
40010012	Huasiman yaicushpa, saluranquichic "ganaslla causaichic" nishpa.
40010013	Huasipi tiyaccuna baliccuna canucpi, cancuna mañashca ganas causai chaillapi saquirichun; mana baliccuna canucpi, cancunamanllata ticrachun.
40010014	Cancunata mana chasquinucpi, mana uyanucpi, chai huasimanta chai llactamantapash llucshishpa, chaquimanta allpata chausinquichic.
40010015	Shuti cancunata nini: Chashna runacuna Sodomapi Gomorrapi causashcacunamanta yalli sinchi ñacachi tucununca.
40010016	Uyahuaichic: Cancunata obejacuna shina pumacuna ucupi cachani. Machacui shina yuyayuc caichic, urpicuna shina alli shuncuyuc caichic.
40010017	Yuyanquichic: Runacuna cancunata japishpa, apucunapacman pushanunca; tantarina huasicunapi cancunata llipachinunca.
40010018	Jatun apucuna ñau pacman ñucaraicu pushai tucunquichic; chaipi paicunaman mana judio caccunamanpash ñucamanta rimanquichic.
40010019	Cancuna apucunaman cui tucushpa, ama llaquirinquichichu imata rimashun nishpa, imashnata rimashun nishpa; chai pacha pactamucpi, Dios cancunata yanapanca rimana ushancapac.
40010020	Mana cancunachu rimanquichic, Dios Yayapac samai cancunapac shimihuan rimanca.
40010021	Shuc runa paipac quiquin huauquicunata japichinca huañuchinuchun nishpa; yayacuna paicunapac churicunata japichinunca; churicuna yayacunata chicnishpa jatarinunca, paicunata huañuchinuchun nishpa.
40010022	Tucui runacuna cancunata chicninunca ñucaraicu; mana sanpayashpa ñucata catic runa quishpichi tucunca.
40010023	Shuc llactapi cancunata chicnishpa ñacachinucpi shuc llactaman miticunquichic; shuti pacha cancunata nini: Cancuna tucui Israel llactacunata chaira mana purishcapi, cai RUNA shamunca.
40010024	Shuc yachachishca runa paita yachachicmanta yalli balic mana tiyanchu; shuc sirbic runa paipac amumanta yalli balic mana tiyanchu.
40010025	Shuc yachachishca runa paita yachachie shina tucucpi, alli can; shuc sirbic runa paipac amu shina tucucpi, alli can. Huasi amuta "Belcebu" nishpa ninucpi, ¿paipac aillucunamanta imata ninunca?.
40010026	Chashna cacpi, runacunata ama manchanquichichu. Imapash pacashca cashpa, pacllaman llucshichishca canca; pacalla rimashca yachai tucunca.
40010027	Ñuca cancunaman tutapi rimashcata punchapi huillanquichic; ñuca pacalla cancunaman rimashcata huasi jahuamanta caparinquichic.
40010028	Aichata huañuchiccunata ama manchanquichichu; almata huañuchincapac mana ushanun. Almata aichantin ucupachapi tucuchina ushacta manchana canquichic.
40010029	¿Manachu ishcai pishcucunata ansa cullquipi catunun? Chashna cacpipash, chaicunamanta shucllapash allpaman mana urman, cancunapac Yaya mana munacpi.
40010030	Cancunapac uma acchacunapash yupashca canun.
40010031	Chashna cacpi, ama mancharinquichichu; cancuna achca pishcucunamanta yalli balinquichic.
40010032	Maicanpash allita rimacpi ñucamañta runacuna ñaupacpi, ñucapash paimanta allita rimasha ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya ñaupacpi.
40010033	Ranti maicanpash ñucamanta rimashpa "paita mana ricsinichu" nishpa rimacpi runacuna ñaupacpi, ñucapash "paita mana ricsinichu" ñishpa rimasha ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya ñaupacpi.
40010034	Ama yuyaichichu ñuca cai pachaman ganas causanata apamuncapac shamushcata; mana shamurcanichu ganas causanata apamuncapac; piñanacunata apamurcani.
40010035	Ñuca shamurcani piñanacuna tiyanuchun nishpa churi paipac yayahuan, ushushi paipac mamahuan, cachun paipac cari mamahuan.
40010036	Caran runa quiquin aillucunapi chicni tucunca.
40010037	Maicanpash yayata mamata ñucamanta yalli llaquishpa, ñucata cati cancapac mana balicchu can. Maicanpash churi ta ushushita ñucamanta yalli llaquishpa, ñucata catic cancapac mana balinchu.
40010038	Maicanpash quiquinpac crusta mana aparishpa, ñucataca mana catishpa, ñucata catic cancapac mana balin chu.
40010039	Causaita taric runa chaita chincachincami; ranti, quinquipac causaita chincachic ñucaraicu, causaita tarinca.
40010040	Cancunata chasquic runa ñucata chasquin; ñucata chasquicca ñucata cachashcata chasquin.
40010041	Profetata chasquic runa profeta cashcaraicu, profeta shina cuyai tucunca; alli runata chasquic alli cashcaraicu, alli runa shina cuyai tucunca.
40010042	Maicanpash shuc cai huahuacunaman chiri yacuta upiachicpi, pai ñucata catic cashcaraicu, shuti pacha nini: Chai runa allita cuyai tucunca.
40011001	Jesus, paipac chunca ishcai runacunata yachachishca huasha, chaimanta rirca shuc liactacunapi yachachincapac, camachincapac.
40011002	Juan, chunta curraipi huichcara cashpa, Jesucristo rashcacunata uyashpa, ishcai yachachishcacunata Jesuspacman cacharca tapuncapac, cashna nishpa:
40011003	—¿Can shamuna cacchu canqui, shuctachu chapana canchi?
40011004	Jesus paicunata cutipashpa nirca: —Juanpacman ticraichic; cancuna ricushcata uyashcatapash huillanquichic:
40011005	Ñahui illaccuna ricunun, jancacuna purinun, sisu runacuna pichashcami canun, upa rinricuna uyanun, huañushcacuna causarinun, cushi shimi imapash illac runacunaman rimashcami can.
40011006	Cushiyucmi ñucahuan tuparic runa ñucamanta mana piñarishpa anchuricpi.
40011007	Juan yachachishcacuna rishca huasha, Jesus paimanta rimancapac callarirca nishpa: —¿Imata ricuncapac chunlla allpaman rircanquichic? ¿Huairahuan cuyurishca pintutachu ricuncapac?
40011008	¿Sumac churanata churarishca runatachu ricuncapac? Sumac churanata churarishcacuna cullquiyuccunapac huasicunapi tiyanun.
40011009	¿Imata ricuncapac rircanquichic? ¿Shuc profetachu? Ari, Juan tucui profetacunata yallinmi.
40011010	Paimanta mari quillcapi quillcashca tiyan: Riqui, ñuca shimita apac runata cachacuni, canta ñaupashpa ñanpita ailichincapac.
40011011	Shuti cancunata nini: Bautisac Juan tucui cunan punchacama causashca runacunamanta yallimi can. Chashna cacpipash, Diospac pachapi mai uchilla cac runa paimanta yalli jatunmi.
40011012	Bautisac Juan shamushca punchamanta cai pachacama, Diospac pacha cariyashpa ñaupacman rin; chaipi yaicunata munaccuna sinchi maquita rashpa yaicunun."
40011013	Tucui profetacuna camachic quillcapash chai pachamanta huillanurca Juan shamushca punchacama;
40011014	Juanmi shamuna cac profeta Elias; munashpa inichic.
40011015	Yuyayuc runa yuyachun.
40011016	Huasha Jesus nirca: —¿Imata rimasha curian causaccunamanta? ¿Ima shina canun? Huahuacuna shina canun pulasacunapi pucllancapac tiyarishpa, ñahuipura tiyaecuriamari capannun, cashna nishpa:
40011017	"Piricullurcanchic, cancunaca mana tushurcariquichic; llaquilla taquircanchic, cancunaca mana huacarcahquichic". Chaita cairaicu rimani:
40011018	Bautisac Juan mana micushpa, mana upiashpa causarca; cancunaca "jirus supaita charin" nishpa ninquichic:
40011019	Paipac huasha cai RUNA shamurca; pai micuc can, upiac can; cancunaca paimanta rimashpa ninquichic: "Cai runa micuisiqui, upiasiqui can; manallita ruraccunahuan gubirnu cullquita pallacunahuan llaquicpura can. Ranti, Dios "chashna tucuchun" nishpa, yachac shina rarca.
40011020	Chashna rimashca huasha, Jesus huaquin llactacunata piñarca, paicuna Diosman mana ticrashcaraicu, achca mana raipaccunata ricushpallata.
40011021	Cashna nirca: —Corozain llacta, Betsaida llacta, cancunapac manchaipae canca. Ñuca, cancunapacpi rashcacunata Sidon llactapi, Tiro llactapi ranushcapi, unaimanta pacha chai llactacunapi tiyaccuna Diosman ticranunman carca; chaita ricuchincapac, tsuntsu churanata churarinunman carca, ushpatapash umapi churanunman carca.
40011022	Chairaicu cancunata nini: Taripana puncha cancuna Tiro llactamanta, Sidon llactamanta yalli sinchi ñacachi tucunquichic.
40011023	¿Canca, Cafarnaun llacta, puyucunacama jatachi tucusha yuyanquichu? Ucupachacama urayachi tucunqui. Ñuca canpacpi rashcacunata Sodoma llactapi ranushcapi, cunancama chai llacta tiyanman carca.
40011024	Chairaicu nini: Taripana puncha cancuna Sodoma llactapi causaccuna manta yalli sinchi ñacachi tucunquichic.
40011025	Shuc puncha, Jesus Dios—huan rimarishpa nirca: —Canta pacrachuni, Yaya, cai pachapac jahua pachapacpash amu; yachaccunaman cai tucuita pacarcanqui, mana yachac ranacunaman ricsichircanqui.
40011026	Ari, Yayallap chashnami munarcanqui.
40011027	Ñuca Yaya tucuita ñuca maquipi churarca; manapi Diospac Churita ricsin, Yayalla paita ricsin; chashnallata, manapi Yayata ricsin, Churilla paita ricsin. Churi munashcapash Dios Yayata ricsin.
40011028	Ñucaman shamuichic, sanpayashcacuna, llaquirishcacuna: ñuca cancunata samachishami.
40011029	Ñuca yachachishcata aparichic, ñucata catichic, ñuca casi shuncuyuc, llaqui shuncuyuc cani; cancunaca ganas causanata ñucapi tupanquichic.
40011030	Ñuca yachachishca aparipac cañ, pancalla can.
40012001	Shuc samana puncha, Jesus shuc tarpushca ucuta puricurca; paihuan puriccuna, yarcashpa, trigo huancucunata aisashpa, muyucunata micucunurca.
40012002	Fariseocuna, chaita ricushpa, Jesusta ninurca: —Riqui, can yachachishcacuna samana punchapi mana ranatarañacun.
40012003	Rimanucpi uyashpa Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Manachu David rashcata liircanquichic, pai paihuan tiyaccunantin yarcashcapi?
40012004	Diospac huasiman yaicushpa, camari tantacunata micunurca; chai laya tantata manapi micunata ushan, pacricunalla mieunun.
40012005	Moisespac camachic quillcapi ¿manachu liircanquichic pacricuna Diospac huasipi samana punchapipash llancashcata?; chashna rashpa, juchata mana ranacun.
40012006	Ñuca Diospac huasimanta yalli balicmi cani.
40012007	Cancuna mana atiparcanquichic quilica ricuchishcata, cashna nicpi: Shuccunamanta llaquirichic; chaitami munani. Huacra camaricunata mana munanichu. Cancuna chaita atipashpa, jucha illaccunata mana cautsayachinquichicman.
40012008	Cai RUNA samana punchapac amumi can.
40012009	Chaimanta rishpa, Jesus tantarina huasipi yaicurca.
40012010	Chaipi shuc huacllishca maquiyuc runa tiyarca; fariseocuna "imata rashpa Jesusta cautsayachishun" nishpa paita tapunuxca: —¿Samana punchapi shuc uncuc runata alliyachina balinchu?
40012011	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna shuc huihuata charishpa, chai huihua samana puncha shuc jutcupi urmacpi, ¿manachu surcunquichic?
40012012	Runa huihuamanta yalli balicmi. Chashna cacpi, samana puncha allita rurana usharin.
40012013	Chai huasha, huacllishca maquiyucta nirca: —Canpac maquita chutachi. Chutachicpi, huacllishca maqui chai shuc maqui shina alliyashca saquirirca.
40012014	Fariseocuna, chaimanta llucshishpa, paicunapura rimarinurca imashnata Jesusta huañuchishun nishpa.
40012015	Chaita yachashpa, Jesus chaimanta rirca; achca runa paita catinurca. Jesus tucui laya uncushcacunata alliyachirca;
40012016	paicunata alliyachishpa nirca: —Ama imatapash ñucamanta huillanquichichu.
40012017	Chashna tucurca profeta Isaias ñaupa quillcashca pactarincapac; cashna mari quillcashca carca:
40012018	Caimi ñucata sirbic runa, ñuca acllashca. Paita llaquini, paipi cushiyani. Ñuca samaita paipac jahuapi churasha. Pai tucui runacunata allita rashpa causancapac yachachinca.
40012019	Shuccunahuan piñashpa mana rimancachu; paipac shimita callecunapi mana uyachincachu.
40012020	Paquirinalla pintuta mana paquincachu; huañucuc chinpusuta mana huañuchiccachu, tucui pachapi paipac shimita uyachinacama.
40012021	Tucui llactacuna paita chapashpa causanunca.
40012022	Shuc puncha, shuc supai japishca runata Jesuspacman pushanurca; chai runa mana ricuc, mana rimac carca. Jesus paita alliyachicpi, chai runa ricuncapac, rimancapac callarirca.
40012023	Chaita ricushpa, tucui runacuna mancharinurca nishpa: —Davidpac churichu cai runa?
40012024	Ranti, fariseocuna chaita uyashpa ninurca: —Cai runa Belcebu nishca supaicuna apupac shutihuan supaicunatajichun.
40012025	Jesus, paicuna yuyacushcata yachashpa, nirca: —Shuc llactapi causaccuna chican chican chaupiricpi, chai llacta tucurincami. Shuc huasipi causac aillucuna, paicunapura piñanacushpa, tucurinuncami.
40012026	Chashanallata, supai apu, supaicunata jichushpa, pai quiquinllata chicnin; quiquinllata chicnicpi, paipac ushai tucurincami.
40012027	Cancuna ninquichic: "Can supai apupac ushaihuan supaicunatajiehunqui". Chashna cacpi, ¿cancunata caticcuna pipac ushaihuan supaicunata jichunun? Paicuna rurashcahuan cancuna pantashcata ricuchinun.
40012028	Ñucaca Dios Samaipac ushaihuan supaicunata jichuni; chashna rashcahuan Diospac pacha cancunaman ña pactamushcata ricuchini.
40012029	¿Maican shuc sinchi runapac huasiman yaicunca shuhuancapac, ñaupacta paita mana huatashpa? Paita huatashca huasha, shuhuanata ushanca.
40012030	Maicanpash ñucahuan mana tiyashpa, ñucata chicnin; ñucahuan mana pallac runa chausichin.
40012031	Chashna cacpi, cancunata nini: Tucui laya juchacunata, tucui jirus shimicunata runacunaman pichana usharin; ranti maicanpash Santo Samaita piñashpa rimacpi, mana usharin perdonai tucuncapac.
40012032	Chashnallata, maicanpash cai RUNATA piñashpa rimacpi, perdonai tucunca; ranti, Santo Samaita piñashpa rimac runa mana perdonai tucunca cai pachapi shamuna pachapipash.
40012033	Caitapash nirca Jesus: —Alli yura alli muyucunata aparin; mana balic yura mana balic muyucunata aparin; shuc yura paipac muyumanta ricsirin.
40012034	Machacui miraicuna, ¿cancuna manallicuna cashpa, imashna allita rimana ushanquichic? Runa shuncupi charishcata riman mari.
40012035	Alli runa allita riman paipac shuncu alli cashcaraicu; manalli runa manallita riman, paipac shuncu manalli cashcaraicu.
40012036	Taripana punchapica, runa yanca rimash camanta taripai tucunca.
40012037	Can rimashcacunamanta jucha illacmi tucunqui; can rimashcacunamanta cautsayachi tucunqui.
40012038	Shuc puncha, huaquin fariseocunahuan quillcata yachaccunahuan Jesusta ninurca: —Yachachiccama, shuc mana raipacta rurapai ñucanchic ricuncapac.
40012039	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cai manalli runacuna, Diosta mana uyac runacuna shuc mana raipacta ricuna munanun; shuc mana raipacta mana ricununcachu; profeta Jonas—huan tucuscata yuyarichisha.
40012040	Jonas quimsa puncha tutantin chai jatun yacu aicha ucupi tiyashca shina, chashnallata cai RUNA quimsa puncha tutantin allpa ucupi tiyancami.
40012041	Ninive llactapi tiyashcacuna cunan causaccunata cautsayachinunca taripana puncha; paicuna Diosman ticranurca mari, Jonas huillashcata uyashpa: cancunapacpica shuc Jonasmanta yalli balic tiyanmi.
40012042	Sur nishcamanta jatun apu huarmi cunan causaccunata cautsayachinca; pai carumanta shamurca mari Salomon yachashcata uyancapac; cancunapacpica shuc Salomonmanta yalli balic tiyanmi.
40012043	Shuc millai supai shuc runa ucumanta llucshishpa, chunlla allpapi puricachan, samasha nishpa; maipi samanata mana tupashpa, paipac shuncupi nin: "Ñuca llucshishca runa ucuman ticrasha".
40012044	Chaiman ticrashpa, chai runata tarin chushac huasi shinata, allichishcata, pichashcata.
40012045	Chaita ricushpa, chaimanta rishpa, shuc canchis supaicunata pushamun, paimanta yalli millaicuna; tucuicunaca chai runapi causancapac yaicunun. Yaicunucpi, chai runa ashtahuan manalli saquirin. Chai layallata tucunca cai manalli runacunahuan.
40012046	Jesus chaira rimacucpi, paipac mamahuan, paipac huauquicunahuan shamunurca; huasi canchapi saquirinurca, "paihuan rimarinata munanchic" nishpa.
40012047	Shuc runa Jesusta nirca: —Uyai, canpac mama ailiucunantin canchapi tiyanun, canhuan rimarinata munanun.
40012048	Chaita rimashca runata nirca Jesus: —¿Pitac can ñuca mama?, ¿picuna canun ñuca huauquicuna?
40012049	Huasha, pai yachachishcacunata ricuchishpa nirca: —Caicunami ñuca mama, ñuca huauquicuna. Ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya munashcata pactachic runa paimi ñuca huauqui, ñuca pani, ñuca mama.
40013001	Jesus huasimanta llucshishpa, cucha pataman rishpa tiyarirca.
40013002	Achca runa tantaricpi, shuc canua ucuman yaicushpa, tiyarirca; runacunaca yacu patapi saquirinurca.
40013003	Unaita Jesus paicunata yachachirca cashna rimashpa: —Shuc runa chacraman tarpuncapac rirca.
40013004	Tarpucpi, hua quin muyucuna ñanpipi urmanurca. Pishcucuna shamushpa micunurca.
40013005	Huaquin muyucuna rumi panpapi urmanurca; mana achca allpa tiyashcapi; utcalla huiñarirca, allpa mana yapa ucuta cacpi.
40013006	Inti llucshicpi, huiñashca muyu ruparirca; sapi illac cashcaraicu chaquirirca.
40013007	Huaquin muyucuna huita ucupi urmanurca; huitaca alli. muyuta mana huiñachirca.
40013008	uaquin muyucuna alli allpapi urmanurca; sumac huiñarinurca, achcata aparinurca: huaquin muyumanta shuc patsac muyu llucshirca, huaquinmanta sucta chunca muyu, huaquinmanta quimsa chunca muyu.
40013009	Rinriyuc runa alli uyachun.
40013010	Rimacpi, yachachishcacuna Jesusm tapunurca nishpa: —¿Imaraicu runacunata chashna shimicunahuan yacha chinqui?
40013011	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Dios paipac pacashca shimita cancunaman ricuchin; ranti, shuccuna mana atipana ushanun.
40013012	Charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca, ashtahuan charincapac; ranti, mana charicmanta pai charishcashituta quichununca.
40013013	Chairaicu, paicuhaman chai iaya shimicunahuan rimani; paicuna ricushpapash, mana ricushca shina saquirinun; uyancapac, uyanun; ranti, mana atipanun, mana uyashca shina saquirinun.
40013014	Chashna cacpi, profeta Isaias rimashca paicunapi pactarin; cashna rimashca carca: Cancuna shuti pacha uyanquichic; ranti, mana atipanquichic. Shuti pacha ricunquichic, ranti mana ricushca shina.
40013015	Cai runacunapac uma yapa sinchi tucurca; mana alli uyanun; ñahuicunata quillpashcata charinun, ama ñahuicunahuan ricuncapac, ama rinricunahuan uyancapac, ama yuyaihuan atipancapac, ama ñucaman ticrancapac "ñucanchicta janpipai" nishpa.
40013016	Ranti, cancuna cushiyucmi canquichic, cancuna uyanquichic mari, ricunquichic mari.
40013017	Shuti cancunata nini, achca profetacuna, achca alli runacuna cancuna ricurashcata ricunata munashpallata, mana ricunushcachu; cancuna uyarashcata uyanata munashpallata, mana uyanurcachu.
40013018	Huasha, Jesus nirca: —Uyahuaichic imata yachachin tarpucmanta rimashca:
40013019	Ñanpipi urmashca muyucuna Diospac shimita yanca uyacta ricuchinun; supai shamushpa, quichun chai runa shuncupi Dios tarpushcata.
40013020	Rumi allpapi tarpushca, shimita uyac runata, chaita cushihuan chasquic runata ricuchin:
40013021	mana sapiyuc tucushpa mana sinchicun; llaquicuna shamucpi Diospac shimiraicu, chai runa ininata saquin.
40013022	Huita ucupi urmashca muyu, shimita chasquic runami; chai runa cai pacha imacunapi, cai pacha cushicunapi shuncuta churan; chaicuna alli shimita huañuchinun; chai muyu alli huiñacpipash, mana aparinchu.
40013023	Alli allpapi tarpushca, shimita uyac, shimita chasquic runata ricuchin; chai shimi paipac shuncupi alli huiñan, sumac aparin; caran muyu shuc patsata aparin, huaquin muyu sucta chunca muyuta aparin; huaquin muyu quimsa chunca muyuta aparin.
40013024	Jesus shuctapash rimarca cashna nishpa: —Diospac pachapi shuc cullquiyuc runahuan tucushca shina tucun: Shuc runa alli trigo muyuta paipac chacrapi tarpuchirca.
40013025	Paipac runacuna puñucunucpi, shuc paita chicnic runa shamushpa, mana balic muyuta chaillapi shitashpa, rirca.
40013026	Trigo ña tuctucucpi, chai shuc mana balic quihuapash ricurirca.
40013027	Chaita ricushpa, sirbiccuna amuta huillacrinurca nishpa: —Amu, ¿manachu alli muyuta canpac chacrapi tarpuchircanqui? ¿Maimanta chai mana balic quihua huiñarca?
40013028	Amu nirca: —Ñucata chicnic runa chaita rarca. Sirbiccuna ninurca: —Can munacpi, chai quihuata surcucrishun.
40013029	Amu nirca: —Mana; quihuata pilashpa, trigotapash pilanquichicman.
40013030	Pucunacama saquichic; pallana pacha, yanca quihuata ñaupacta pallanquichic rupachincapac; huasha alli trigota pallanquichic, huasipi huacaichincapac.
40013031	Jesus shuctapash rimarca nishpa: —Diospac pacha shuc mostaza nishca muyu shinami.
40013032	Tarpushcapi, tucui muyumanta yalli uchilla can; huasha huiñan, tucui quihuamanta yalli jatun tucun, shuc yura shina tucun; huairapi huanpuric pishcucuna shamushpa, paipac pallcacunapi huasinun.
40013033	Cai shuctapash rimarca: —Diospac pacha levadura nishca shinami; shuc huarmi ansashituta japishpa, quimsa tupu harinahuan masan, tucui punquirinacama.
40013034	Chashna shimicunahuan Jesus runacunata yachachicurca; shuc laya shimicunahuan, mana.
40013035	Chashna tucurca profeta rimashca pactarincapac, cashna mari quillcashca carca: Yachachina shimicunahuan rimasha; Dios cai pachata rurashcamanta pacalla tiyashcata huillasha.
40013036	Chai shimicunta rimashca huasha, Jesus runacunata cachashpa, huasiman yaicurca; yachachishcacuna shamushpa, paita ninurca: —Mana balic quihuamanta rimashcata ñucanchicta yachachipai.
40013037	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Alli muyuta tarpuc runa cai RUNAMI.
40013038	Chacra cai pachami; alli muyu jahuapacha churicunata ricuchin; mana balic muyu supaita caticcunata ricuchin;
40013039	mana balic muyuta tarpuc supaimi; paliana, cai pacha tucurinami; pallaccuna angelcunami canun.
40013040	"Mana balic quihuata pallanushca shina rupachincapac, chashnallata tucunca cai pacha tucuricpi.
40013041	Cai RUNA paipac angelcunata cachanca paipac pachamanta tucui manallita ruraccunata anchuchincapac;
40013042	paicunata jatun nina ucupi shitanunca; chaipi huacai, tucui sami nanaicuna tiyanca,
40013043	Ranti, allicuna inti shina tucushpa, puchaclla ricurinunca Yaya huasipi.
40013044	"Diospac pacha allpa ucupi pacashca jatun curimuyu shinami; chai curimuyuta tupac runa, cutillata chai allpallapi pacan; cushiyashpa, pai charishcacunata catun chai allpata rantincapac.
40013045	"Diospac pacha shuc rantic catuc runa shinami, yapa balic perla nishca rumicunata mashcac.
40013046	Shuc yapa balicta tarishpa, tucui pai charishcata catun chai rumita rantincapac.
40013047	"Diospa pacha shuc llica shinami. Yacu aichacunata japiccamacuna llicata cuchapi shitanun, tucui laya aichacunata japinpapac.
40013048	Llica ña juntaricpi, allpaman aisanun; tiyarishpaca, alli aichacunata ashancapi churanun, mana baliccunata jichunun.
40013049	Chashnami tucunca, cai pacha tucuricpi. Angelcuna shamununca; manallicunata, allicunamanta chicanyachishpa,
40013050	nina ucupi shitanunca. Chaipi jatun huacai, tucui sami nanai tiyanca.
40013051	Jesus rimashca huasha tapurca: —Chai tucuita atiparcanquichichu? Cutipashpa ninurca: —Ari.
40013052	Jesus yapashpa nirca: —Tucui camahic quillcata yachac, Diospac shimipi yachachishca cashpa, shuc huasi amu shinami; paipac malacunamanta mushuta maucatapash llucshichin.
40013053	Jesus chaicunata rimashca huasca, chaimanta rishpa,
40013054	paipac quiquin llactaman pactarca. Chai llactapi tiyac tantarina huasipi yachachincapac callarirca; uyaccuna mancharishpa ninurca: —Pai yachashcata maimanta yachan? Mana raipaccunata ranata maimanta charin?
40013055	Cai runa carpintero churimi, paipac mama Mariami. Santiago, Jose, Simon, Judas paipac huauquicuna canun;
40013056	paipac panicunapash ñucanchihuan causanun. Cahshna cacpi, maimanta chai tucuita charin?
40013057	Chashna nishpa, Jesusta mana uyanurcachu. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Maipipash profetata llaquinun; paipac llactamanta caccuna, quiquin aillucuna paita mana llaquinunchu.
40013058	Chai llactapica ansa mana raipaccunata rurarea, paicuna Jesusta mana ininucpi.
40014001	Herodes Galipeapi jatun apu cashpa,; Jesusmanta rimarishcata uyarca;
40014002	paihuan tiyaccunata nirca: —Chai runa bautisac Juanmi, huañushcacunamanta causarishca. Chairaicu mana raipaccunata rurana ushan.
40014003	Shuc puncha Herodes Juanta japichishpa huatashpa, chunta curralpi huichcashca carca. Chaita rurarca Herodias shutiyuc huarmiraicu; chai huarmi Herodespac huauqui Felipepac huarmi carca; Herodes paita japishca carca.
40014004	Juan paita camachic carca nishpa: —Shucpac huarmita japircanqui; mana allichu.
40014005	Herodes Juanta huañuchinata munarca; ranti, runacunata mancharca, tucuicuna Juan Diospacmanta rimac cashcata yuyarinurca mari.
40014006	Herodes pacarishca punchata raiminucpi, Herodiaspac ushushi micuraccuna ñaupacpi tushurca; Herodes munaihuan ricurca,
40014007	chairaicu paita nirca: —Imatapash mañahuacpi cushcanqui.
40014008	Chai malta huarmi, chaita uyashpa, paipac mamata tapushca huasha, Herodesta nirca: —Bautisac Juanpac umata shuc callanapi cuhuanqui,
40014009	Rimacpi uyashpa Jerodes yapa llaquirirca; chashnapash, chaipi tiyaccuna ñaupacpi cusha nishcamanta "can mañahuanata cushcanqui" nishpa, umata cunuchun rimarca.
40014010	Chai ucu, Juanta chunta curralpi huañuchincapac shuc suldaruta cacharca;
40014011	huañuchishpa, paipac umata shuc callanapi Herodiaspac ushushiman apamurca; paica mamaman curca.
40014012	Juanta caticcuna chaita uyashpa, paipac ayata apashpa rishpa panpanurca; chai huasha Jesusta huillacrinurca.
40014013	Bautisac Juanta huañuchinushcata uyashpa, Jesus canuapi chaimanta rirca runa illashcaman. Runacuna chaita yachashpa, ñanpita paita catinurca.
40014014	Jesus canuamanta llucshishpa, achca runacunata ricushpa, paicunamanta llaquirirca, paicuna pushamushca uncuccunata janpirca.
40014015	Ña tutayacucpi, yachachishcacuna Jesusta ninurca: —Cai panpapi runa huasi ilian, puncha ña tucuriran; runacunata cachari mayan llactacunapi micunata rantinuchun.
40014016	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Mana mutsun paicuna rincapac, cancunallata paicunata caraichic.
40014017	Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —Pichca tantallata ishcai challuantin charinchic.
40014018	Rimanucpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Caiman apamuichic.
40014019	Huasha, runacunata allpapi quihuajahuapi tiyarichirca; pichca tantata, ishcai chaliuata japirca; jahuaman ricushpa, Diosta pacrachurca; huasha, tantata paquishpa, yachachishcacunaman curca, paicuna runacunata carancapac.
40014020	Tucuicuna sacsacta micunurca; puchushcacunata pallashpa, chunca ishcai ashancata juntachinurca. Micuc caricunalla pichca huarancashi canurca, huarmicunata huahuacunatapash mana yupashca.
40014022	Runacunata carashca huasha, Jesus yachachiscacunata canuapi yaicuhirca nishpa: —Ñucata ñaupashpa, cuchata chinpaichic ñuca runacunata cacharinacama.
40014023	Runacunata cacharishpa, Jesus urcuman sapalla sicarca Dios-huan rimarincapac. Tutayashcapi, chaillapi tiyarca.
40014024	Canuapi riccuna cucha chaupiman tiyanurca; bacu japi tucunurca, huaira ñahuipuramanta shamucpi.
40014025	Ña punchayacpi, Jesus paicunapacman shamurca, yacu jahuata purishpa.
40014026	Canuapi tiyac runacuna, Jesus yacu jahuata puricucpi ricushpa, yapa mancharinurea, Caparinurca nishpa: —Ayami can.
40014027	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cariyaichic, ama mancharichichu, ñucami cani.
40014028	Pedro chaita uyashpa nirca: —Apunchic, can cashpa, ñucata canpacman shamuchipai yacujahuata.
40014029	Jesus "shamui" nicpi, Pedro canuamanta llucshishpa, yacu jahuata puricurca Jesus tiyashcaman.
40014030	Yapa sinchi huairacuepi mancharca; manchashpa, panparincapac callarirca. Panparicucpi, caparirca nishpa: —¡Apunchic, quishpichihuapai!
40014031	Jesus maquihuan paita japishpa nirca: —Ansalla inic runa, ¿imaraicu mancharircanqui?
40014032	Paicuna canuapi yaicushcallahuan huaira aisarirca.
40014033	Canuapi tiyaccuna, Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, ninurca: —¡Shuti pacha, can Diospac churi canqui!
40014034	Cuchata chinpashpa, Genesaretman pactashpa, llutarinurca.
40014035	Chaipi causac runacuna, Jesusta ricsishpa, tucui llactacunaman shimita cachanurca "Jesus shamushcami" nishpa; chaita uyashpa, uncuccunata pai tiyashcaman pushanurca.
40014036	Uncuccunaca Jesusta mañanurca nishpa: —Canpac churanallata llancachipai. Llancaccunaca alliyanurca.
40015001	Huaquin fariseocuna Jerusalenmanta shamushca ya chaccunantin Jesuspacman shamushpa tapunurca:
40015002	—¿Imaraicu canpac runacuna ñucanchic ñaupacuna yachachishcata mana pactachinun? Maquicunata mana maillanun micuncapac.
40015003	Chaita uyashpa, Jesus tapurca nishpa: —Cacunaca ¿imaraicu Dios camachishcata mana uyan quichic, cancunapac yachaita catincapac?
40015004	Dios cashna mari rimarca: "Canpac yayata canpac mamatapash uyana canqui. Quiquin yayata, quiquin mamata maldisiac runa huañuchun".
40015005	Ranti, cancuna ninquichic: "Shuc runa paipac yayata, paipac mamata rimashpa nicpi: Ñuca tucui charishcata Diosman chasquichircani, mana ima tiyahuan cancunata yanapancapac";
40015006	chashna nishpa, yayata, mamata mana yanapanachu. Chashna rurashpa, Dios rimashcata mana pactachinquichic, cancunapac yachaita catincapac.
40015007	¡Llullacamacuna! Allimi Isaias cancunamanta rimashpa, cashna quillcarca:
40015008	Cai runacuna shimillahuan ñucata llaquinun; paicunapac yuyai ñucamanta carumi can.
40015009	Yancamanta ñucata chacchanun; paicuna yachachishca runapac shimillami.
40015010	Chai huasha, runacunata cayashpa, rimarca nishpa: —¡Uyahuaichic, atipaichic:
40015011	Imapash runa ucuman yaicushpa mana mapayachin; runapac yuyaimanta llucshic, chaimi runata mapayachin.
40015012	Rimacpi Jesus, yachachishcacuna paita ninurca: —Can rimashcata uyashpa, fariseocuna yapa piñarinurca.
40015013	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya mana tarpushca yura sapintin surcushca canca.
40015014	Ama paicunata uyaichichu; ñausacuna cashpa, ñausacunata pushanun. Shuc ñausa shuc ñausa runata pushacpi, ishcaintin jutcupi urmanunca.
40015015	Rimacpi, Pedro paita nirca: —¿Imata yachachin can rimashca?
40015016	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancunapash manachu atipanquichic?
40015017	Shimi ucupi yaicuc huicsaman rin, huasha canchaman llucshin; ¿chaita manachu atipanquichic?
40015018	Ranti, shimimanta llucshic shuncumanta shamun; chaimi runata mapayachin.
40015019	Runa shuncumanta llucshinun manalli yuyaicuna, runata huañuchinacuna, shucpac huarmita japinacuna, yumashpa juchallinacuna, shuhuanacuna, llullanacuna, caminacuna;
40015020	chaicunami runata juchayucta ruranun; ranti, maquita mana maillashpa micuna mana runata mapayachin.
40015021	Jesus runacunata yachachishca huasha, Sidon llacta, Tiro llacta tiyac suyuman rirca.
40015022	Shuc cananea huarmi, Jesusta caticcunahuan tuparishpa, caparishpa nirca: —Apunchic, Davidpac churi, ñucamanta llaquiripai; shuc millai supai ñuca ushushita yapa llaquichin.
40015023	Jesus mana imata cutiparca. Yachachishcacuna paita ninurca: —Chai huarmita uyapai, caparishpalla ñucanchicta caticun.
40015024	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca Israelmanta chincarishca huihuacunamanlla cachashca cani.
40015025	Huarmi, Jesuspacman shamushpa, tuhuaman urmashpa nirca: —¡Apunchic, yanapahuai!
40015026	Jesus paita nirca: —Churicunapac micunata allcucunaman shitana mana allichu.
40015027	Huarmi nirca: —Ari, Apunchic, chashnami can; chashna cacpipash, allcucuna mesamanta urmac puchucunata micuc canun.
40015028	Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —uarmi, yapa sinchita ininqui; can munashca shina tucuchun. Chaita rimashca shina, paipac ushushi alliyashca saquirirca.
40015029	Jesus chaimanta rishpa, Galilea cucha pataman pactarca; huasha, shuc urcuman sicashpa, tiyarirca.
40015030	Achca runa pai tiyashcaman shamunurca, tucui sami uncuccunata pushamushpa: jancacuna, ñausacuna, shimi illaccuna, pullu maquicuna. Jesuspac ñaupacpi paicunata saquinucpi, pai tucuicunata alliyachirca.
40015031	Jesus rashcacunata ricushpa runacuna mancharinurca, shimi illaccuna rimai callarinurca mari; pullu maquicuna allichi tucunurca; jancacuna purinurca; ñausacuna ricunurca. Tucuicunaca Diosta chacchancapac callarinurca.
40015032	Chai huasha, Jesus yachachishcacunata cayashpa nirca: —Cai runacunamanta llaquirini; ña quimsa punchata ñucahuan tiyanun; micunata mana charinun. Mana carashpa paicunata caphana mana alli yachihuan; ñanpipi sanpayashpa purincapac mana ushanunman.
40015033	Yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Cai runa illac panpapi maimanta paicunata cararinca, chashna achcacuna canucpi?
40015034	Rimanucpi, Jesus paicunata tapurca: —¿Mashna tantata charinquichic? Cutipanurca: —Canchis tantata charinchic; ansa yacu aichapash tiyan.
40015035	Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Runacunata allpapi tiyarichichic.
40015036	Tiyarinucpi, Jesus tantacunata yacu aichacunapash maquipi charishpa, Diosta pacrachurca. Huasha, tantacunata paquishpa, yachachishcacunaman curca; yachachishcacuna runacunata caranurca.
40015037	Tucuicuna sacsacta micunurca; puchushcata pallashpa, canchis ashancata juntachinurca.
40015038	Micuccuna caricunalla chuscu huaranca canurca, huarmicunata huahuacunatapash mana yupashca.
40016001	Fariseocuna saduceocunantin Jesuspacman rinurca paita camancapac; paita tupashpa ninurca: —Jahua pachapi shuc mana raipata rurai ñucanchic ricuneapac.
40016002	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Chishiyacucpi ninquichic: "Caya puncha alli puncha canca, puyucuna pucaclla ricurinun mari".
40016003	Tutamanta ninquichic: "Cunan tamiancami, yapa yana ricurin mari". Llullacamacuna: Tamia punchata, rupai punchata ricsinquichic jahua pachata ricushpa; ranti, cai punchacunapi tucushcata mana atipanquichic.
40016004	Cai manalli runacuna, Diosta mana uyac runacuna, shuc mana raipacta mañanun; shuc mana raipacta mana ricununcachu, profeta Jonas-huan tucushcata yuyarichisha. Chaita rimashpa, paicunata saquishpa, rirca.
40016005	Yachachishcacuna cucha chinpaman rinushcapi, tantata apana cuncarinushca carca.
40016006	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Uyahuaichic: fariseocunapac saduceocunapacpash levadurata yuyanquichic.
40016007	Yachachishcacuna chaita uyashpa, paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —Chaita nin ñucanchic tantata mana apamushcaraicu.
40016008	Jesus chaita yachashpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu "tantata mana charinchic "nishpa rimaricunquichic? Ansalla ininquichic.
40016009	Chaira manachu atipanquichic? ¿Manachu yuyarinquichic ñuca pichca huaranca runacunata pichca tantallahuan carashcapi mashna ashanca puchushcata?
40016010	¿Manachu yuyarinquichic puchushcahuan mashna ashanca juntarishcata, ñuca chuscu huaranca runacunata canchis tanta huan carashcapi?
40016011	Chashna cacpi, ¿manachu atipanquichic mana tantamanta rimashcata ñuca cancunata rimashcapi "Fariseocunapac, saduceocunapac levadurata yuyanquichic" nishpa?
40016012	Chaita uyashpa, allita yachanurca "paicunapac levadura ta yuyanquichic" nishpa rimashcapi, mana tanta rurana levaduramanta rimashcata, ranti fariseocuna saduceocuna yachachishcamanta rimashcata.
40016013	Jesus Filipo Cesarea nishca suyuman pactashpa, yachaehishcacunata tapurca: —Imata ninun runacuna cai RUNamanta?
40016014	Cutipashpa ninurca: —Huaquincuna "Bautisac Juanmi" ninun; shuccuna "Eliasmi" ninun; shuccuna "Jeremiasmi" ninun, "jatun profeta chari" ninun.
40016015	Jesus cutillata tapurca: —¿Cancúnaca pimi nishpata yuyanquichic ñucata?
40016016	Simon Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Can Mesiasmi canqui, causac Diospac Churimi canqui.
40016017	Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Cushiyucmi canqui, Jonaspac churi Simon. Can rimashca shimita manapí runa canta yachachirca; ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yayalla chaita rimachirca.
40016018	Ñúcaca canta nini: "Can Pedromi canqui (Pedro nishpa "rumi" nin). Cai rumi jahuapi ñuca iglesiata shayachisha. Ucupacha supaicuna paita mana atununcachu.
40016019	Jahua pacha llavicunata cushcanqui; cai pachapi imatapash can huatacpi, jahua pachapi huatashcami canca. Cai pachapi imatapash can pascacpi, jahua pachapi pascara saquirinca.
40016020	Chaipac huasha Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca Mesias cashcata ama pitapash rimaichichu.
40016021	Huasha yachachishcacunata nirca: —Ñuca Jerusalenman rina cani; chaipi rucucuna, pacriyaya apucuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna ñucata llaquichinunca, ñucata huañuchinunca; chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causarisha.
40016022	Chaita uyashpa, Pedro Jesusta chicanman pushashpa, paita camachincapac callarirca nishpa: —Apunchic, chaita Dios ama munachun; canhuan ama chashna tucuchun.
40016023	Jesus ticrashpa paita nirca: —Ñuca ñahuimanta anchuri, supai. Ñuca rina ñanpimanta anchuchinata munahuanqui. Can runa shina yuyanqui, Dios munashcata mana atipanquichu.
40016024	Huasha yachachishcacunata nirca: —Maicanpash ñucata catinayashpa, quiquin munaita saquichun; crusta aparishpa, ñucahuan shamuchun.
40016025	Maicanpash causaita tarishpa, chaita chincachincami; ranti quiquin causaita chincachic ñucamanta, causaita tarincami.
40016026	¿Imata yapachin shuc runa cai pachata yapachishpa, causaita chincachicpi? ¿Imata cunca shuc runa paipac causai rantimanta?
40016027	Shuc puncha, cai RUNA paipac Yayapi apu tucushpa, shamunca an gelcunahuan pacta; caran runa chashquinca amu rurashca tuputa.
40016028	Shuti cancunata nini: Caipi tiyaccuna-manta huaquincuna chaira mana huañushpa, cai RUNA apu tucushpa shamushcata ricununca.
40017001	Sucta puncha huasha, Jesus Pedrota, Jacobota, paipac huauqui Juanta chicanman cayashpa, shuc jahua urcuman paicunata pusharca.
40017002	Paicuna ricuranucpi, Jesus shuc laya tucurca; paipac ñahui punchaclla inti shina ricurirca; paipac churana chiuclla ricurirca.
40017003	Chaipi, Moises-huan Elias-huan ricurimunurca Jesus-huan rimarishpa.
40017004	Pedro chaita ricushpa nirca: —Apunchic, allimi caipi saquirincapac. Can munacpi, quimsa tanputa rurashun: canpac shuc, Moisespac shuc, Eliaspac shuc.
40017005	Chaira rimacucpi, shuc puyu paicunata quillparca; puyumanta shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: —Caimi ñuca llaquishca Churi, paita uyana canquichic.
40017006	Yachachishcacuna, chaita uyashpa, yapa mancharishpa, tuhuaman urmanurca.
40017007	Jesus mayanyashpa, paicunata llancarcanishpa: —Shayarichic, ama manchaichichu.
40017008	Ricushpaca, Jesusllata ricunurca; shuccuna illanurca.
40017009	Urcumanta uraicucunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama pitapash cancuna ricushcata rimaichichu cai RUNA huañushcacunamanta causarinacama.
40017010	Chaita uyashpa yachachishcacuna Jesusta tapushpa ninurca: —¿Imaraicu quillcata yachaccuna "Elias ñaupacta shamuna can" nishpa ninun?
40017011	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Shuti, Elias ñaupacta shamunca tucuita allichincapac.
40017012	Cuti, ñuca cancunata nini: Elias ña shamurca, paitaca mana ricsinurcachu, paicuna munashcata paihuan ruranurca. Cai RUNApash paicunapi llaquichi tucunca.
40017013	Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus Bautisac Juanmanta rimashcata yachachishcacuna atipanurca.
40017014	Runacuna tiyashcaman pactanucpi, shuc runa Jesuspacman shamushpa, tuhuaman urmashpa, nirca: —
40017015	Apunchic, ñuca churimanta llaquiripai; achca cuti millai uncui paita japin; ninapi, yacupi urman; yapa ñacarin.
40017016	Can yachachishcacunapacman pushamurcani; paita allichincapac mana ushanurca.
40017017	Jesus nirca: —¡Mana inic runacuna, manallita ruraccuna! ¿Imuracama cancunahuan tiyasha? ¿Imuracama cancunata aparisha? Huanprata pushamuichic.
40017018	Pushamunucpi, Jesus supaita piñarca, chai huanpramanta llucshichirca; chai ucu alliyarca.
40017019	Huasha, yachachishcacuna Jesus-huan pacalla rimarishpa, tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu supaita llucshichinata mana usharcanchic?
40017020	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancuna ansalla inishcaraicu. Cancuna inishca shuc ichilla tarpuna muyu tupu cacpi, chai urcuta ninquichic: "Chaimanta anchuri, shucman ri", urcuca anchurincami. Cancuna sinchita inishpa tucuita ushanquichic.
40017021	Chashnapash, chai sami supaicuna Diosta mañashcallahuan, sasishcallahuan jichurin.
40017022	Galilea suyuta puricunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cai RUNA japishcami canca, runacuna paita huañuchinunca; chashnapash quimsa punchapi causarinca.
40017024	Cafarnaun llactaman pactanucpi, tenplo inpuesto cullquita mañaccuna Pedropacman rishpa tapunurca: —¿Cancunata yachachic tenplo inpuesto cullquita manachu cun?
40017025	Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Ari, cunmi. Huasiman pactanucpi, Jesus Pedrota nirca: —Simon, ¿cai pacha apucuna picunamanta inpuesto nishca cullquita japinun: paipaccunamantachu? ¿chicancunamantachu? ¿Imata yuyanqui?
40017026	Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Chicancunamantami. Jesus nirca: —Chashna cacpi, paipaccuna mana cuna canun.
40017027	Chashnapash, paicuna ama piñarincapac, cuchaman rishpa, ansiluta shitanqui; ñaupac micuc aichata japishpa, paipac shimi ucupi shuc cullquita tarinqui; chai cullqui pactancami canmanta ñucamantapash pagancapac; chai cullquita paicuna man cunqui.
40018001	Chai punchallapi, yachachishcacuna Jesusta tapunurca: —¿Diospac pachapi maican runa ashtahuan jatun canca?
40018002	Tapunucpi, Jesus shuc huahuata cayashpa, paicuna ucupi shayachirca, nishpa: —
40018003	Shuti nini, cancuna mana turcarishpa huahua shina tucuncapac, Diospac pachapi mana yaicunquichic.
40018004	Chashna cacpi, quiquinllata uchillayashpa cai huahua shina tucuc, paimi Diospac pachapi mai jatun canca.
40018005	Maicanpash ñuca shutipi cashna huahuata chasquishpa, ñucallatata chasquin.
40018006	"Maicanpash cai ñucata inic mana imayuc runacunata juchaman aisacpi, alli canman chai runapac cuncapi shuc jatun rumita huatashpa, nucñu yacuman shitanucpi.
40018007	Mana allichu cai pachapi shuccunata juchaman aisac runacuna tiyanuchun; chai laya runacuna huiñai tiyanuncai ailla paicunamanta.
40018008	"Chairaicu, canpac maqui, canpac chaqui canta juchapi urmachicpi, chaicunata pitishpa caruman shitanqui; jahua pachapi pullu maqui, pullu chaqui yaicuna ashtahuan alli canca ishcai maquiyuc, ishcai chaquiyuc ucupachaman rinamanta.
40018009	Canpac ñahui canta juchaman aisacpi, chaita surcushpa caruman shitanqui. Jahua pachaman shuclla ñahuiyuc rina ashtahuan alli canca ishcai ñahuiyuc ucu pachaman rinamanta.
40018010	"Cai yanca runacunata ama millanquichichu; paicunapac angelcuna ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya ñaupacpi huiñai tiyanun.
40018011	Cai RUNA huacllishcata allichincapac shamurca.
40018012	Uyahuaichic: Shuc patsac objetata charic runa, shuc chincaricpi, manachu shuccunata potreropi saquishpa, chincarishcata mashcacrin?
40018013	Taricpica, shuti pacha nini: Chai tarishca obeja mana chicarishcacunamanta yalli amuta cushichinca.
40018014	Chashnallata, cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya mana munanchu cai uchillacunamanta shucllapash chincarichun.
40018015	"Canpac huauqui canta manallita ruracpi, paita chicanman pushashpa camachinqui. Canta uyacpi, paita Diospac yapachishcanqui.
40018016	Mana uyácpica, canhuan pacta shuc runata, ishcai runata pushanqui; ishcaipura, quimsapura allichinquichic imapash tucushcata.
40018017	Pai cancunata mana uyacpi, tantarishca iniccunaman huillanquichic; iniccunata mana uyacpi, paiman Diosta mana ricsic shina ricunquichic.
40018018	Shuti nini; Cancuna cai pachapi imatapash pascacpi, jahua pachapi pascara saquirinca; cancuna cai pachapi imatapash huatacpi, jahua pachapi huatara saquirinca.
40018019	"Caitapash nini: Cancunamanta ishcai runa shuc yuyaillahuan imatapash Diosman mañacpi, ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya cancuna mañashcata uyancami.
40018020	Maipipash ishcai runapura cashpa, quimsa runapura cashpa, ñuca shutipi tantaricpi, paicuna chaupi shuncupi tiyashami.
40018021	Rimacpi, Pedro paita tapurca: —¿Ñuca huauqui ñucata llaquichihuacpi, mashna cuti quishpichina cani? Canchis cuti camachu?
40018022	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Canchis cuticamalla ninquichu? Canchis chunca cuti canchis cuti quishpichina canqui,
40018023	Uyahuaichic: "Diosta caticcunaman shuc patronman tucushca shina tucun; chai patron paipac peoncuna dibishcata allichisha nirca.
40018024	Allichincapac callaricpi, shuc peon shamurca achca huaranca cullquita dibiyuc.
40018025	Imahuan paganata mana charicpi, patron quiquin peonta huarmintin huahuacunantin tucui chariscacunantin catuncapac rimarca, chai cullquita japincapac dibimanta;
40018026	Chai peon uyashpa, patron ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, mañacurca nishpa: —Patron, ama chashna rurahuaichu; ansalla chapanqui, ansa ansa illacta pagashcanqui.
40018027	Chashna rimacpi, patron chai peonmanta llaquirishpa, dibishcata illacta quishpichirca, paita cacharirca.
