40018028	Peonca chaimanta llucshishpa, paiman shuc patsallata dibic runahuan tuparirca; paita cuncamanta japishpa sipicurca caparishpa: —Can dibihuashcata pagahuai.
40018029	Chai runa tuhuaman urmashpa, mañacurca nishpa: —Ansalla chapanqui, tucuita pagashcanqui.
40018030	Paica mana uyarcachu; dibiyucta japishpa, chunta curralpi huichcachirca dibishcata paganacama.
40018031	Shuc peoncuna, tucushcata ricushpa, yapa llaquirishpa patronpacman rimacrinurca.
40018032	Patron, chai runata cayashpa, nirca: —Shuncu illac runa, can dibihuashcata illacta quishpichircani can mañahuashcaraicu.
40018033	¿Canpash manachu canta dibicmanta llaquirina carcanqui, ñuca canmanta llaquirishca shina?
40018034	Shinchi piñarishpaca, chai peonta ñacachirca dibishcata illacta paganacama.
40018035	Chasnallata ruranca cancunahuan ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya, shuccuna cancunaman manalli rashcata cancuna tucui shuncuhuan mana quishpichicpi.
40019001	Jesus, chaicunata rimashca huasha, Galileamanta rishpa, Judeaman pactarca, Jordan yacu chinpaman.
40019002	Achca runa paita catinurca; chaipi uncushcacunata alliyachirca.
40019003	Huaquin fariseocuna Jesuspacman shamunurca; paita camancapac tapunurca: —Shuc runa paipac huarmita yancamanta jichucpi, ¿allichu?
40019004	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Manachu yachanquichic tucuita rurashca Dios, ñaupa runata rashcapi, "Cari huarmi rashcata".
40019005	Caitapash nirca: "Chairaicu, runa yayata mamatapash saquishpa, paipac huarmihuan llutarinca, ishcaintin shuc aichalla tucuncapac".
40019006	Chashna cacpi, cari huarmi mana ishcaichu, shuc aichallami; Dios huatashcataca runa ama pascachun.
40019007	Chashna rimacpi uyashpa, cutillata tapunurca: —Chashna cacpi, ¿imaraicu Moises rimarca "maqui llushpirina quillcata huarmiman cushpa, paita jichuna usharin" nishpa?
40019008	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna manalli runa cashcamanta Moises chaita rimarca; ranti, cai pacha callarishcapi, mana chashnachu carca.
40019009	Ñúcaca caita nini: Maicanpash quiquin huarmita jichushpa (mana yanca llutarishca cacpi), shuc-huan sahuaricpi; jatun juchata ran; jichushca huarmihuan sahuaric runa jatun juchata ran.
40019010	Chaita uyashpa, yachachishcacuna Jesusta ninurca: —Chashna huatashca cacpi cari huarmihuan, sahuarina mana allichu.
40019011	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Chaita ranata mana tucuicuna ushanun; Dios yanapashcahuan usharin.
40019012	Huaquin runacuna mana ushanun sahuarincapac, runtu illac pacarishcaraicu; huaqumcuna mana ushanun runtu illac tucushcaraicu, chaicunata surcunucpi; huaquincuna mana sahuarinun Diosllatata catincapacraicu. Chashna rurana ushac chashna rurachun.
40019013	Shuc puncha, shuc huahuacunata Jesuspacman pushanurca, "cahpac maquita paicunapac jahuapi churapai paicunamanta mañashpa" nishpa; ranti, yachachishcacuna paicunata piñanurca.
40019014	Chaita ricushpa Jesus nirca: —Casilla saquichic huahuacunata, ñucapacman shamuncapac ama jarcaichichu; Diospac pacha paicuna shina caccunapac mari can.
40019015	Chashna nishpa, huahuacunapac jahuapi maquicunata churarca; chaipac huasha, shucman rirca.
40019016	Riracpi, shuc malta runa Jesus-huan tuparishpa nirca: —Alli yachachic, ¿imata rurana cani mana tucuric causaiman pactancapac?
40019017	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu ñucata "alli'' nishpa nihuanqui? Shucllami alli, Dios. Canca mana tucuric causaiman yaicusha nishpa, Dios rurai nishcacunata pactachinqui.
40019018	Huanpra tapurca: —¿Ima rurai nishcacuna? Jesus nirca: —Ama huañuchinquichu. Shucpac huarmihuan ama llutarinquiehu. Ama shuhuanquichu; ama shucmanta llullashpa rimanquichu,
40019019	Canpac yayata, canpac mamata llaquina canqui; shuccunata can quiquinliata shina llaquina canqui.
40019020	Chaita uyashpa, chai huanpra nirca: —Chai tucuita huahua cashcamanta pactaehircani; ¿ima pishihuañ?
40019021	Jesus paita nirca: —Can ashtahuan alli tucusha nishpa, can charishcacunata catushpa, tsuntsu runacunaman curiqui; chashna rurashpa, jahua pachapi cullquiyuc tueunqui; chaihuasha, ñucahuan shamunqui.
40019022	Rimacpi uyashpa, chai malta runa llaquirishpa rirca, achca cullquiyuc mari carca.
40019023	Pai riracpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata nkca: —Cuilquiyuc runa mana yaicunallachu can Diospac paehapi,
40019024	Shuc camello nishca huibua tupulli jutcuta ashtahuan yaicunalla cahca cullquiyuc runa Diospac pachaman yaicunamanta,
40019025	Chaita uyashpa, yachachishcacuna yapa mancharishpa, paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —Chashna cacpi, ¿pitac quishpina ushanca?
40019026	Jesus paicunaman ricushpa nirca: —Runacunapac mana ushaipac can; ranti, Dios tutuita ushan.
40019027	Chaita uyashpa, Pedro nirca: —Ñucanchic tucuita canta catincapac saquircanchic: ¿imata cui tucushun?
40019028	Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti cancunata nini, tucui mushuyana punchapi, cai RUNA apu tucushpa paipac tiyarinapi tiyaricpi, cancunapash ñucata catishcaraicu, chunca ishcai tiyarinacunapi tiyarinquichic chunca ishcai Israel runa bulata taripancapac.
40019029	Maicanpash huasita cacpi, huauquicunata cacpi, panicunata cacpi, yayata mamata cacpi, churicunata cacpi, allpacunata cacpi ñucaraicu saquishpa, shuc patsac yalli cui tucunca, mana tucuric causaitapash chasquinca.
40019030	Achca runa cunan ñaupacuna cashpa, puchucaicuna tucununca; cunan puchucaicuna cashpa, ñaupacuna tucununca.
40020001	Shuc puncha Jesus cashna rimarca: —Diosta caticcunaman shuc cullquiyuc runaman tucushca shina tucun. Chai runa tutamantashitu llancaccunata japincapac rirca, paipac chacrapi Hancachincapac.
40020002	Shuc runacunata tupashpa, paicunahuan rimarirca ishai chunca cullquita yapachincapac caran puncha; paicuna "ari" ninucpi, chacraman paicunata cacharca.
40020003	Jahuanaya intipi, shuccunata tuparca, pulasapi rimaricunurca mana imata rurashpa; paicunata nirca: —Ñuca chacraman richic; paganata pagashcanquichic.
40020004	Chaita uyashpa, chacraman rinurca.
40020005	Chaupi punchapi chishi intipipash cutillata llucshirca llancaccunata mashcancapac; tupashcacunata paipac chacraman cancharca.
40020006	Chishita, chaira inti mana yaicushcaillapita, shuc runacunata quillashcata tuparca; paicunata nirca: —¿Imaraicu llanpu puncha mana imata rashpa caipi tiyacunquichic?
40020007	Cutipanurca: —Manapí ñucanchicta llancachirca. Pai nirca: —Ñuca chacraman richic llancancapac.
40020008	Puncha tucurishcapi amu llancaccamata nirca: —Runacunata paganqui, huasha shamushcacunamanta callarishpa.
40020009	Chishita llancancapac yaicuccunata cayashpa, ishcai chunca chullquita paicunaman curca.
40020010	Inti pacarishcamanta llancaccuna, chaita ricushpa, "ñucarichicman ashtahuan cunca" yuyarinurca; ranti, paicunapash ishcai chuncata japinurca.
40020011	Cullquita japishpa, piñarishpa amu huashapi rimancapac callarinurca nishpa: —
40020012	Chishita shamuccuna shuc pacha tuputa llancanurca; ñucanchic llanpu puncha llancarcanchic rupaihuan, junpihuan ñacarishpa; chashnapash, paicuna japishca tupullata japircanchic.
40020013	Amu, chaita uyashpa, paicunamanta shucta nirca: —Mashi, ima manallita canta mana ruracunichu. ¿Manachu ishcai chunca cullquita yapachiriqui nircani?
40020014	Canpacta japishpa ri; cai huasha shamushcacuriaman canman cushca tuputa cuyana munani.
40020015	¿Manachu ñucapac-huan ñuca munashcata ruranata ushani? ¿Ñucata mana alli ñahuihuan ricuhuanqui ñuca alli cashcamanta?
40020016	Chashna, ñaupacuna puchucaicuna tucununca; puchucaicuna ñaupacuna cacunca.
40020017	Shuc puncha, Jesus Jerusalen llactaman riracpi, paipac chunca ishcai runata chicanman cayashpa, nirca: —
40020018	Ña yachanquichic, Jerusalenman riranchic. Chaipi cai RUNA japi tucunca, pacriyaya apucunaman, camachic quillcata yachaccunaman chasquichi tucunca;
40020019	paicuna paita taripa nunca, paita asinunca, llipachinunca, cruspi chacatanunca; chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causarinca.
40020020	Cebedeo churicunapac mama, Jesuspacman paicunantin rishpa, paipac ñaupapi cuncurirca mañancapac.
40020021	Jesus paita tapurca: —¿Imatata munanqui? Pai nirca: —Cai ishcai ñuca churicunata canpac pachapi tiyarichipanqui shucta canpac alli maquiman, shucta canpac lluqui maquiman.
40020022	Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna mañahuashcata mana yachanquichic. ¿Ñuca apana llaquicunata apana ushanquichichu? ¿Ñuca huañuna huañuihuan huañunata munanquichichu? Cutipashpa ninurca: —Ushanchicmi, munanchicmi.
40020023	Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Shuti can; ñuca llaquicunata apanquichic, ñuca huañuna huañuihuan huañunquichic; ranti, ñuca alli maquipi, lluqui maquipi tiyarinata mana cuipachu cani; ñuca Yaya acllashcacunaman chaita cunca.
40020024	Shuc yachachishcacuna chaita uyashpa, chai ishcai runahuan piñarinurca.
40020025	Jesus paicunata cayashpa nirca: —Cai pacha apucuna runacunata llaquichinun; piñashcahuan paicunata rimanun.
40020026	Cancunapura mana chashnachu canca; ranti, maicanpash shuccunamanta yalli canata munac paicunata sirbichun;
40020027	ñaupac canata munac tucui shuccunata sirbichun.
40020028	Cai RUNApash mana "sirbihuaichic" nishpa shamurcachu; shuccunata sirbincapac shamurca; tucuicunapac dibita pagancapac shamushpa, huañushcahuan pagarca.
40020029	Jerico llactamanta llucshinucpi, achca runa Jesusta catishpa rinurca.
40020030	Ishcai ñausa runa ñanpi mayanpi tiyacunurca; Jesus chaita rirashcata uyashpa, caparinurca: —¡Apunchic, Davidpac Churi, ñucanchicmanta llaquiripai!
40020031	Runacuna paicunata piñanurca nishpa: —Upallaichic. Paicunaca ashtahuan caparinurca nishpa: —¡Apunchic, Davidpac churi, ñucanchicmnta ilaquiripai!
40020032	Jesus caparishcata uyashpa shayarirca; ñausacunata cayashpa, paicunata tapurca nishpa: —¿Imata munanquichic ñuca cancunaman rancapac?
40020033	Cutipanurca: —Apunchic, ricuna ushanata munanchic.
40020034	Jesus, llaquirishpa, paicunapac ñahuicunata llancarca. Llancacpi, ricuncapac cailarinurca; Jesusta catishpa rinurca.
40021001	Jerusalen mayanman pactanushcapi, Betfage nishca uchilla llactaman Olivos nishca urcu mayanpi, Jesus ishcai yachachishcacunata cacharca nishpa: —
40021002	Cancuna ñahuipura tiyac uchilla llactaman richic. Chaiman pactashpa, shuc burra nishca huihuata huatashcata tupanquichic; pascashpa caiman apamunquichic.
40021003	Maicanpash cancunata rimacpi, ninquichic: "Apu chaita mutsunmi, utcalla cutichinca".
40021004	Chashna tucurca, profeta rimashcata pactarincapac, cashna mari rimashca carca:
40021005	Sion llactapi causaccunaman rimaichic: Ricuichic, cancunapac jatun apu shamuran, manso shuncuyuc, llashacta aparic burro jahuapi tiyarishpa shamun.
40021006	Yachachishcacuna rinurca, Jesus nishcata ranurca:
40021007	burrata huahuantin pushamunurca; chai jahuapi churanata mantashpa, Jesusta tiyarichinurca.
40021008	Achca runa churanacunata allpapi mantanurca; huaquincuna yura pallcacunata cuchushpa, Jesus rina ñanpipi mantanurca.
40021009	Ñaupac riraceuna huasha shamuccunapash caparinurca nishpa: —¡Yupaichashca cachun Davidpac churi! ¡Diospac shutipi shamuc bendisiashca cachun!
40021010	Jesus Jerusalenman yaicucpi, llactapi causaccuna cushihuan tulupunurca tapushpa: —¿Pitac can cai?
40021011	Runacuna capariranurca nishpa: —Caimi profeta Jesus, Galileapi tiyac Nazaretmanta.
40021012	Chaipac huasha, Jesus Diospac huasiman yaicurca; chaipi catucuccunata, ranticuccunata canchaman llucshichirca. Cullquita turcaccunapac mesacunata ticraehirca; urpita catuccunapac mesacunatapash ticrachirca nishpa: —
40021013	Cashna quillcara tiyan: "Ñuca huasi Dios-huan rimarina huasimi"; cancunaca shuhua huasita rarcanquichic.
40021014	Diospac huasipi tiyacpi, huaquin ñausa runacuna jancacunapash Jesuspacman rinucpi, paicunata alliyachirca.
40021015	Pacriyaya apucunahuan quillcata yachaccunahuan Jesus mana raipaccunata ruracpi ricushpa, huahuacuna "Caimi Curaca Davidpac churi" nishpa caparishcata uyashpa, piñarinurca.
40021016	Jesusta ninurca: —¿Caicuna caparicushcata uyacunquichu? Jesus cutiparca: —Ari, uyacunimi. ¿Cancunaca manachu yachanquichic quillcacuna nishcata? Cashna ninun: Llullu huahuacuna chaira chuchuccunapash sumac taquishcahuan ñucata chacchanunca.
40021017	Chashnapi paicunata saquishpa, Betania llactaman rirca puñuncapac.
40021018	Cayantin puncha tutamanta, Jerusalenman ticracucpi, Jesus yarcachirca.
40021019	Ñanpi mayanpi shuc higuera nishca yurata ricushpa, chaiman rirca; mana imata tuparca chai yurapi, pancacunalla tiyarca, Jesus chai yurata nirca: —Mana imura muyuta aparichu. Rimacpi chai yura chaquirirca.
40021020	Chaita ricushpa, yachachishcacuna mancharishpa, Jesusta ninurca: —¿Imaraicu chashna urastalla chai yura chaquirirca?
40021021	Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cancuna sinchi inishcahuan inishpa, ñuca higuera yurahuan rashcata ranquichic; mana chaillatachu, ashtahuan ushanquichic: Cancuna cai urcuman "anchuri caimanta, ñucñu yacuman shitari" nicpi, urcu cancunata uyancami.
40021022	Cancuna imatapash Diosman mañacpi sinchi inishcahuan, cui tucunquichic.
40021023	Chai huasha, Jesus Diospac huasipi yaicurca; chaipi yachachicucpi, pacriyaya apucuna judio apucunapash paipacman mayanyarishpa tapunurca nishpa: —¿Ima ushaihuan chaicunata ruranqui? ¿Pimi chaita rancapac canta rimarca?
40021024	Tapunucpi, Jesus cutiparca: —Ñucapash cancunata shuc shimita tapunca rani. Cancuna cutipahuacpi, ñucapash ima, ushaihuan chaicunata rashcata rimasha.
40021025	Caita tapuni: ¿Pimi Juanta cacharca bautisancapac? ¿Dioschu paita cacharca? ¿runacunachu paita cachanurca? Cutipahuaichic. Rimacpi, paicunapura rimarincapac callarinurca. Ñucanchic "Dios paita cacharca" nicpi, pai ninca: Chashna cacpi, ¿imaraicu paita mana uyarcanquichic?
40021026	Ñucanchic "runacuna paita cachanurca" nicpi, ¿imata runacuna ñucanchicta ranunca?; tucuicuna mari Juan Diospacmanta shamushcata ininun.
40021027	Chairaicu Jesusta ninurca: —Mana yachanchichu. Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Ñucapash ima ushaihuan chaicunata reshcata mana rimashachu.
40021028	Chai huasha, chaillapita yachachishpa, cashna rimarca Jesus: —Shuc runa ishcai churita charirca. Ñaupac churita nirca: "Churi, cunan puncha chacraman llancancapac rina canqui".
40021029	Churi nirca: "Mana munanichu". Ranti, unailla "mana munanichu" nishcamanta llaquirishpa, rircami.
40021030	Yaya, quipa churipacman rishpa, chashnallata rimarca. Churi nirca: "Ariu, yaya, cunanshitu rinca rani". Ranti mana rishcachu.
40021031	Chai ishcai chuximanta maican paipac yaya munashcata pactachirca? —Ñaupac churi— cutipanuica. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Shuti pacha cancunata nini: Gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna, mana alli causac huarmicunapash cancunata ñaupashpa Diospac pachaman yaicununca.
40021032	Cancunapacman shamurca mari Bautisac Juan, Dios munashca shina causanata yachachishpa; paitaca mana inircanquichic; ranti, gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna juchallic huarmicunapash paita ininurca. Cancuna, chaita ricushpapash, Diosman mana ticrarcanquichic paita inishpa.
40021033	Huasha Jesus nirca: —Cai shuctapash uyaichic: Shuc runami carca, yapa allpayuc; uva nishca chacrata rurarca. Chai chacrata jarcahuan jarcashca. Uva muyucunata chahuancapac allpata allashpa, shuc jutcuta rurarca. Shuc tanputa shayachirca. Chai huasha, shuc runacunaman chacrata saquirca, pallana pachapi pallashcahuan pagancapac. Huasha caruman rirca.
40021034	"Muyuta pallana pacha pactaricpi, peoncunata cacharca chacrata mañachishca runacunapacman paipacta japincapac.
40021035	Chai runacuna, peoncunata japishpa, shucta macanurca, shucta huañuchinurca, shucta rumihuan shitanurca.
40021036	Cutillata shuc peoncunata cacharca, ñaupa cachashcacunamanta yalli achca; paicunahuan chashnailata ranurca.
40021037	"Puchucaipi, paipac churita cacharca, "ñuca churita manchanunca chari" yuyarishpa.
40021038	Chai runacunaca, churita rucushpa, rimanacunurca: "Caimi chacra amupac churi, amu charishcata japina cac. Paita huañuchishunchic, pai japinca rashcata amuyashun".
40021039	Paita japishpaca huañuchinurca.
40021040	Chacra amu shamushpa, ¿imata ruranca chai runacunahuan?
40021041	Cutipanurca: —Chai millai runacunata achcata llaquichishpa tucuchinca; paipac chacrata shuc runacunaman saquinca, pagana cashcata pagaccunaman.
40021042	Huasha Jesus nirca: —¿Manachu cashna quillcara tiyan?: Huasita shayachiccuna jichushca rumi huasi siqui rumi tucurca, Chaitaca apu Dios rarca; ñucanchic ñahuipi munanayacta ricurin.
40021043	Chairaicu cancunata nini: Diospac pachata quichui tucunquichic; chaita shuc runacunaman cununca, Diospac pacha aparishcata pallashpa pagaccunaman.
40021044	Chai rumi jahuapi urmac runa paqui paqui tucunca; chai rumi runa jahuapi urmashpa paita ñitinca.
40021045	Pacriyaya apucucunahuan, fariseocunahuan Jesus rimashcacunata uyashpa, paicunamarita rimashcata atipanurca.
40021046	Chairaicu, "paita japishun" nishpa yuyarinurca; ranti, runacunata, manchashpa mana ushanurcachu, Jesus Diospacmarita rimashcata ininurca mari.
40022001	Jesus shuc rimanatapash yachachincapac rimarca, cashna nishpa: —
40022002	Diospa pachapi shuc jatun apuman tucushca shina tucun. Shuc jatun apu paipac churipac sahuarinata allichirca.
40022003	Tucuita allichishca huasha, peoncunata cacharca shamuna caccunata cayancapac; paicuna "mana shamushun" ninurca.
40022004	Cutillata shuc peoncunata cacharca nishpa: "Shamuna caccunata ninquichic: Ña micuna allichirami; huira huacrata huañuchircani, tucuita allichircani; sahuarinaman shamuichic".
40022005	Cayasticacuna paicunata mana uyanurcachu; huaquincuna chacraman rinurca, huaquincuna imatapash rancapac rinurca.
40022006	Huaquincuna, peoncunata japishpa, yuyaita huactashpa huañuchinurca.
40022007	Jatun apri, chaita uyashpa, sinchi piñarirca; paipac suldarucunata cachashpa, chai millai; runacunata huañuchirca, paicunapac llactata rupachirca.
40022008	Chai huasha, paipac peoncunata nirca: "Sahuarina allichishcami can, cayashcacuna mana munanurca.
40022009	Ñanpicunata rishpa, tupaccunata pushamuichic".
40022010	Paicuna rishpa, tucui tupashcacunata japinurca; micuna huasi juntarirca.
40022011	Jatun apu micucuccunata ricuncapac yaicushpa, shuc sahuarina churana illac runata ricushpa,
40022012	paita nirca: "Mashi, ¿imashnata sahuarina churana iliac caiman yaicurcanqui?". Pai chunlla saquirirca.
40022013	Jatun apu peoncunata nirca: "Paipac iriaqui chaqui huatashpa, canchaman shitaichic, tuta ucuman, huacai, tucui sami nanai tiyashcaman".
40022014	Acha runa cayashcami can, ansa runa acllashcami can.
40022015	Chai shimicunata uyashpa, fariseocuna rinurca paicunapura rimarincapac Jesusta ima shimipipash japincapac nishpa.
40022016	Chashna cacpi, paicuna yachachishcacunata herodianos nishcacunantin Jesusta tapuncapac cachanurc, cashna nishpa: —Yachachic, can mana llulla cashcata yachanchic; Diosman ric ñanpita yachachinqui pitapash mana manchashpa, runacuna canmanta rimashcata mana uyashpa,
40022017	Canta tapunchic: ¿Inpuesto nishca cullquita jatun apuman pagana allichu? ¿manachu alli? ¿Imata ninqui?
40022018	Tapunucpi, Jesus paicunapac manalli yuyaita ricsishpa nirca: —Llullacamacuna, ¿imaraicu ñuca nishcapi japinayahuanquichic?
40022019	Inpuesto pagana cullquita ricuchihuaichic. Paicunaca shuc denario nishca cullquita ricuchinurca.
40022020	Chaita ricushpa, Jesus tapurca: —¿Pipacta can cai ñahui, caipi quillcashca shutipash?
40022021	Tapucpi, cutipashpa ninurca: —Jaturi apupacta. Jesus nirca: —Jatun apupacta. jatun apuman cuichic, Diospacta Diosmari cuichic.
40022022	Chaita uyashpa, mancharinurea; Jesusta saquishpa rinurca.
40022023	Chai punchallapi, rimarincapac rinurca. Saduseocuna "huañushcacuna mana causarinuncachu" ninun; chashna cacpi, Jesusta cashna rimariurca: —
40022024	Yachachic, Moises nirca: "Shuc huarmiyuc runa huahua illac huañucpi, paipac huauqui chai huarmihuan sahuarichun paicuna tupashca huahua huañushcapac shutita apanca". Chashna nin Moises.
40022025	Cunan allita uyanqui: Ñucanchicpacpi carichis huauquipura tiyanurca. Rucu huauqui shuc huarmita japirca; shuc punchacuna huasha, huahua illac huañurca. Huahua illac huañucpi, paipac huauqui chai huarmihuan sahuarirca;
40022026	paipash huahua illac huañurca. Tucui canchis huauquipura chai huarmillahuan huasha huasha sahuarishpa, huahua illac huañunurca.
40022027	Tucuicuna huañushca huasha huarmipash huañurca.
40022028	Causarina punchapi ¿chai huarmi pipac huarmi canca, canchis huauquipura paihuan sahuarishca cacpi?
40022029	Jesus chaita uyashpa cutiparca nishpa: —Cancuna pantacunquichic quillcashcacunata mana yachashpa, Diospac ushaita mana ricsishpa.
40022030	Huañushcacuna causarishca huasha, caricunapash huarmicunapash sahuarinuncachu, jahua pachapi tiyac angelcuna shina canunca.
40022031	Huañushcacuna causarinamantaca, ¿manachu yachanquichic quiquin Dios rimashcata?Cashna nirca:
40022032	Ñuca Abraanpac, Jacobpac, Isaacpac Diosmi cani. Dios mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu, causaccunapac Diosmi.
40022033	Chaita uyashpa, runacuna: mancharinurca pai yachachisheamanta.
40022034	Fariseocuna, Jesus saduseocunata pincachiscata uyashpa, tantarinurca.
40022035	Paicunamanta shuc, Jesusta pantachisha nishpa, paita tapuica: —
40022036	Yachachic, ¿camachic quillcapi Dios rurai nishcacunamanta maican yalli jatunmi?
40022037	Jesus cutiparca: —"Canpac apu Diosta tucui shuncuhuan, tucui almahuan, tucui yuyaihuan llaquina canqui''.
40022038	Chaimi ñaupac Dios rurai nishca.
40022039	Chaita catic chai shinallata can. Caimi: "Shuccunata can quiquinta shina llaquina eanqui".
40022040	Tucui camachic quillca nishca profetacuna nishca quillcapash chai ishcai Dios rurai nishcapi yaicun.
40022041	Fariseocuna chaira taritarishca canucpi, Jesus paicunata tapurca: —
40022042	¿Imata yuyanquichic Mesiasmanta? ¿Pipac churi can? Cutipanurca: —Davidpac churi can.
40022043	Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Davidpac churi cacpi, imaraicu Davidllata, Diospac samai rimachicpi, paita "Apu" nishpa riman. Cashna mari David quillcashpk saquirca:
40022044	Apu ñuca aputa rimarca nishpa: Ñuca alli maquiman tiyari ñuca canta chicniccunata atinacama.
40022045	Davidllata Mesiasta "Apu" nishpa rimacpi, imashna Mesias Davidpac churi canca?
40022046	Manapi paita cutipana usharca; chai punchamanta pacha, Jesusta imatapash tapunata manchanurca.
40023001	Jesus runacunata pai yachachishcacunatapash yachachishpa, cashna nirca: —
40023002	Cannachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunantin Moi sespac camachic quillcata yachachinun. Tucui paicuna yachachishcata pactachichic; ranti, paicuna rashcata ama raichichu; paicuna rimaisiqui canun; cuti paicuna rimashcata mana pactachinun.
40023004	Mana marcaipaccunata runacunata apachinun, ranti, paicuna uchilla rucahuanpash mana yanapanun apancapac.
40023005	"Tucui paicuna rurashcata runacuna ricuncapaella ruranun; chairaicu, camachic quillcata uma ñaupacpi maqui mucupipash quillcashcata ricuchinun; churana manñacunata anchuyachinun.
40023006	"Paicunata micuncapac cayanucpi, ñaupac tiyarinacunata munanun.
40023007	Pulasacunapi salurai tucunata munanun; "Yachachic" nii tucunata munanun.
40023008	Cancuna ama "yachachic" nii tucuichichu; shuclla mari cancunata yachachic, tucui cancunaca huauquipura canquichic.
40023009	Ama pitapash "Yaya" nishpa ninquichichu, shuclla mari cancunapac yaya, jahua pachapi tiyac.
40023010	Chashnallata, ama "apu" nii ticuichichu, shucllami cancunapac apu, paica Cristomi.
40023011	Shuccunata sirbic runa paimi cancunapura mai jatun can.
40023012	Maicanpash quiquinllata jatunyachishpa, pincachishcami canca; maicanpash quiquinllata uchillayachicpi, tucuicuna paita jahuayachinunca.
40023013	¡"Ayailla, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! ¡LIullacunacuna! Diospac pacha puncuta huichcanquichic shuccuna ama yaicunuchun nishpa. Cancunallata mana yaicunquichic; yaicushun niccunata mana yaicuchinquichic.
40023014	-
40023015	¡"AyailIa, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! ¡Llullacamacuna! Maitapash purinquichic runacunata "ñucanchihuan tucuichic" nishpa; shuc runa cancuna inishcata japicpi, paita huacllichinquichic, cancunamanta yalli manalli paita ranquichic.
40023016	¡"Ayailla, cancuna, ñausa pushaccamacuna! Cancuna ninquichic: 'Shuc runa Diospac huasi shutipi shimita cucpi, pai cushca shimita mana pactachicpi, mana imananchu; ranti, Diospac huasipi tiyac curi shutipi rimashpa, pai rimashcata pactachina can!
40023017	¡Upacuna, ñausacuna! Ima yalli halin: ¿Curichu? ¿curita balichic Diospac huasichu?
40023018	"Caitapash ninquichic: 'Shuc runa altar shutipi shimita cucpi, pai cushca shimita mana pactachicpipash, mana imananchu; ranti, altar jahuapi tiyac camari shutipi shimita cucpi, cushca shimita pactachina can.
40023019	¡Upacuna, ñausacuna! ¿Ima yalli balin: Camarichu? ¿camarita balichic altarchu?
40023020	Altar shutipi rimac runa, altarmanta altar jahuapi tiyacmantapash riman.
40023021	Diospac huasi shutipi rimac runa, huasimanta huasi ucupi tiyacmantapash riman.
40023022	"Chashnallata, jahua pacha shutipi rimac runa Diospac tiyarinamanta quiquin Diosmantapash riman, Dios chai tiyarinapi tiyarishca mari can.
40023023	¡Ayailla, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! Llullacamacuna! Cancuna tucui charishcacunamanta chunca raquita Diosman cunquichic, menta nishca, anis nishca, comino nishca muyucunamanta; ranti, camachic quillcapi mai jatuncunata mana ruranquichic: alli cana, cusca shuncuyuc cana, Diosta inina; chaicunami pactachina carca, chai shuccunata mana saquishpa.
40023024	¡Ñausa pushaccamacuna, chuspita shushunquichic, ranti camello nishca huihuata millpunquichic!
40023025	¡"Ayailla, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! ¡Llullaeumacuna! Canchamanta mucahua cunata pilchicunatapash maillanquichic, ranti, ucuta shuhuashcacunahuan tucuita japinayashcacunahuan juntashca canquichic.
40023026	Ñausa fariseo runa, ñaupacta mucahuacuriata pilchicunatapsh ucuta maillanqui, canchatapash pichashca saquirinca.
40023027	¡"Ayailla, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseo cunapash! ¡Llullacamacuna! Cancuna yuracyachishca pantioricuna shina canquichic: canchata sumac ricurinun; ranti, ucuta tullucunata; tucui laya a ismushcata charinun.
40023028	Pantioncuria shina canquichic: canchata alli runacuna yachinquichic; ranti, ucuta manalli yuyaihuan manalli rurashcacunahuan juntashca canquichic.
40023029	¡"Ayailla, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! ¡Llullacamacuna! Profetacunapac pantioncunata shayachiriquichic, santo runacunapac pantioncunapi; sisacunata churanquichic, cashna nishpa:
40023030	'Ñucanchic ñaupacunapac punchacunapi causashca cacpi, mana yanapanchicman carca
40023031	Chashna nishpa, cancuna profetacunata huañuchiscacunamanta miraicuna cashcata ricuchinquichic.
40023032	Cancunapac ñaupacuna callarishcata tucuchichic cuti.
40023033	¡Machacuicuna, millai machacuimanta mirashcacuna!. ¿Imata rashpa ucupachapi urmanata quishpinquichic?
40023034	Cancunapacman profetacunata, yachaccunata, camachiccamacunata cachanca rani. Cancunaca huaquincunata huañuchinquichic, chacatanquichic; huaquincunata tantarina huasicunapi llipachinquichic, shuc llactamanta shuc llactaman ñacachishpa cachanquichic.
40023035	Chashna, tucui huañuchi tucushca alli runacunamanta ñacachi tucunquichic, jucha illac Abelmarita pacha Baraquiaspac churi Zacariascama; paita Diospac huasipi tiyac altar jahuapi huañuchircanquichic.
40023036	Shuti cancunata nini: chai tucuimanta cunan causaccuna ñacachi tucununca.
40023037	¡"Jerusalen, Jerusalen!. Diospac profetacunata huañuchinqui, Dios cachascacunata rumihuan shitanqui. Achca cuti canpac churicunata tantachisha nircani, shuc atallpa mama paipac huahuacunata ricra ucupi ucllashca shina, canca mana munarcanquichu.
40023038	Ricuichic cuti, cancunapac huasi jichushca saquirinca; ña mana ricuhuanquichic cancuna cashna rimanacama: "Diospac shutipi shamuc bendisiashca cachun".
40024001	Jesus Diospac huasimanta lluscshishpa riracpi, pai yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Diospac huasita ricuilla.
40024002	Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Chai tucuita ricunquichichu?. Shuti cancunata nini, cai huasimanta shuc rumi shuc rumi jahuapi mana saquirincachu. Illacta tulachishcami canca.
40024003	Rimacpi, Olivos nishca urcuman rinurca; Jesus tiyaricpi, yachachishcacuna pacalla paita tapunurca: —Imura chai tucunca ñucanchicta huillapai. ¿Ima laya ricurina ricurinca can shamuna puncha cai pacha tucurina punchapash?
40024004	Tapunucpi, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Yuyanquichic ama umachi tucuncapac.
40024005	Achca runacuna ñuca shutipi shamununca mari, "ñuca Cristomi cani" nishpa; achcacunata umachinunca.
40024006	Macanacui tiyan uyaricpi, ama mancharinquichichu; ñaupacta chai tucuna can, ranti, chaira mana tucurina pachachu.
40024007	Llacta shuc llactahuan macanacununca; shuc runacuna shuc runacunahuan huañuchinacununca; achca suyucunapi uncuicuna, yaricaicuna, allpa cuyurinacuna tiyanca.
40024008	Chai tucui callarincapacllami can, huasha shamuna llaquicunata ricuchic.
40024009	"Ñacachi tucuncapac japishcami canquichic; cancunata huañuchinunca; tucuicunapacpi chicni tucunquichic ñucaraicu.
40024010	Chai punchacunapi, achca runa inishcata saquinunca; runapura chicninacununca, shuccuna shuccunata umachinunca,
40024011	Achca llulla profetacuna ricurinunca, achcacunata umachinunca.
40024012	Manallita rana miraricpi, llaquinacushpa causana pishiyancami.
40024013	Mana sanpayashpa Diosta inishpa causac runa quishpichi tucunca.
40024014	Diospac cushi shimita tucui suyucunapi uyachina can tucui runacuna chaita ricsincapac; chaipac huasha, cai pacha tucurina pactamunca.
40024015	"Profeta Daniel mapayachicmanta huacllichicmantapash quillcashpa saquirca; chai mapayachic Diospac huasipi tiyacpi (caita liisshpa yuyanquichic),
40024016	Judeapi causaccuna urcucunaman miticunuchun.
40024017	Huasi jahua patapi tiyaccuna ama uraicunuchun ucumanta imatapash apancapac.
40024018	Chacrapi tiyaccuna ama huasiman ticranuchun churanata apancapacllapash.
40024019	Huicsayuc huarmicuna chuchuchic huarmicunapash, cancunapac yapa manchaipac canca.
40024020	Chai miticuna pacha ama tamia punchapi, ama samana punchapi tucuchun Diosta mañaichic.
40024021	Chai punchacunaca llaqui punchacuna canunca mari; chashna llaqui cai pacha callarishcamanta mana tiyaicachu, mana imuraspi tiyancachu.
40024022	Dios chai punchacunata mana ucta tucuchicpi, mana pipash quishpirinman; ranti, Dios acllashcacunata llaquishcaraicu, chai punchacunata curuyachinca.
40024023	"Chashnapi, maicanpash shamushpa nicpi "ricuichic, caipimi Cristo", "chaipimi Cristo", paicunata ama uyanquichichu.
40024024	Llulla cristocuna ricurinunca mari; llulla profetacuna jatarinunca, mana raipaccunata rurashpa runacunata umachinunca; usharicpi aellashcacunatapash umachinunman.
40024025	Yuyanquichic, ñaupacta cancunaman huillani.
40024026	Chairaicu, cancunata ninucpi "ricuichic, chaipimi chunlla allpapi" ama chaiman rinquichichu; "caipimi, huasi ucupi" ninucpi, ama uyanquichichu,
40024027	Shuc rayo llinpiyashca ricurin inti llucshishcamanta inti yaicushcaman; chai layallata canca cai RUNA shamuna.
40024028	Ismushca aicha tiyashcapi ullahuancacuna tantarinunca.
40024029	"Chai llaqui punchacuna huasha, inti yana tucunca; quilla Hahtuyanca, estrellacuna urmahunca, tucui jahua pacha tularinca.
40024030	Chaipac huasha cai RUNAta ricuchic ricurinca; chaita ricushpa, tucui runacuna huacancapac callarinunca; huasha cai RUNA sinchi ushaihuan puyucuna jahuapi shamurashcata ricununca.
40024031	Pai angelcunata cachanca "sinchita caparishpa tucui suyucunamanta ñuca acllashcacunata tantarichichic" nishpa.
40024032	Higuera nishca yurapi tucushcata yuyarichic; paipac pallcacuna llulluyacpi "rupai pacha pactamuran" ninquichic.
40024033	Chashnallata, ñuca cunan huillashca pactaricpi ricushpa, tucurina pactamurashcata yachanquichic.
40024034	Shuti cancunata nini: Cunan causaccuna chaira mana huañunucpi, ñuca rimashca pactarincami.
40024035	Jahua pachahuan cai pachahuan tucurinunca, ñuca rimashca shimi mana chmcarincachu.
40024036	"Ima puncha, ima pacha chai tucunea manapi yachanchu; angelcunapash Diospac Churipash mana yachanunchu; Dios Yayalla yachan.
40024037	Cai RUNA shamuha punchapi Noe causashca punchacunapi tucushca shina tucurica.
40024038	Chai jatun tamia unnashca punchacunapi runacuna micucunurca, upiacunurca, sahuaricunurca, Noe jatun canuapi yaicushca punchacama.
40024039	Cuncaimanta jatun yacu shamushpa, tucuicuna japi tucunurca; chashnallata canca cai RUNA shamuna punchapi.
40024040	"Chai punchapi ishcai runa chacrapi tiyanunca; shuc apai tucunca, shuc saquishca canca.
40024041	Ishcai huarmi cutana rumihuan trigota cutacununca; shuc apai tucunca, shucta saquinunca.
40024042	Chairaicu, ricuralla causaichic, mana mari yachanquichic apu shamuna punchata.
40024043	Huasi amu shuhua runa shamunata ricsishpa, chapanman shuhua ama husiman yaicuncapa.
40024044	Chashna cacpi, cancunapash allichishpa chaparanquichic, cancuna mana ricsishca pacha apu shamunca mari.
40024045	"Maican alli yuyayuc runa canca, paipac patron luncucunata micuna pachapi carancapac churashca?
40024046	Patron shamushcapi chashna ruracuc cushiyucmi can.
40024047	Shuti cancunata nini; patron charishcacunata chai runaman cunca ricuncapac. Ranti, chai runa manalli runa cashpa, "ñuca patron unayancami" yuyashpa,
40024049	shuc luncucunata quillachincapac callaricpi; micushpalla, machashpalla causacpi,
40024050	pai mana yachashca punchapi, mana yuyashca pachapi patron shamunca;
40024051	paitaca sinchi ñacachinca, llullacamacunahuan shina paihuan ruranunca; ñacachi tucushpa, piñarincami quirupash uyaricta.
40025001	"Diosta caticcunaman shuc sahuarinapi tucushca shina tucunca. Chunca malta huarmicuna chinpusucunata apashpa, cusa-canata tupancapac rinurca.
40025002	Chai chunca huarmicuna, pichca yuyayue canurca, pichca yuyai illaccuna.
40025003	Yuyai illaccuna chipusullata apanurca, sindina yacu butita cuncarishpa.
40025004	Yuyayuccuna, ranti, chinpusuta sindina yacu butintin apashpa rinurca.
40025005	Cusa-cana unayacpi, puñunayashpa puñunurca.
40025006	Chaupi tutapi shuc caparirca: —Cusa-cana shamuran, paita tupancapac llucshichic.
40025007	Chai shimita uyashpa, tucui malta huarmicuna riccharishpa, chinpusucunata japichinurca.
40025008	Yuyai illaccuna yuyayuccunata ninurca: —Ansa sindina yacuta ñucanchicman cuyaichic, ñucanchic chinpusucuna huañurinun mari.
40025009	Yuyayuccuna cutipanurca; —Ñucanchic apamushca sindina yacu mana pactancachu; tiendaman ranticrichic.
40025010	Tiendaman riranucpi, cusa-cana shamurca. Pai shamucpi, paihuan pacta yuyayuc maltacuna sahuarinata rancapac huasiman yaicunurca. Yaicushpa, puncuta huichcanurca.
40025011	Yuyai illaccuna shamushpa cayanurca nishpa: —Puncuta pascapai.
40025012	Cusa-cana cutiparca: —Cancunata mana ricsinichu.
40025013	Chairaicu "ricuralla causaichic" nirca Jesus; "pai shamuna punchata, pai shamuna pachata mana yachanquichic".
40025014	"Diosta caticcunaman shuc runaman tucushca shina tucunca. Chai runa, caruman rinca rashpa, llancaccunata cayashpa, charishcacunata paicunaman mincashpa saquirca.
40025015	Shucman pichca huaranca cullquita curca, shucman ishcai huaranca, shucman shuc huaranca, caran amu ushashca tuputa curca. Chaipac huasha, caruman rirca.
40025016	Pichca huarancata japishcaruna, chai cullquihuan rantishpa catushpa, shuc pichca huarancata yapachirca.
40025017	Ishcai huarancata japishca runa, shuc ishcai huarancata yapachirca.
40025018	Shuc huarancata japishca runa, allpapi jutcuta rashpa, patron cushca cullquita pacarca.
40025019	Unai huasha, chai runacunapac patron ticramurca paicunahuan allichincapac.
40025020	Pichca huarancata japishca runa shuc pichca huarancata apamurca cashna nishpa: —Patron, pichca huaranca cuhuarcanqui, chaicunahuan shuc pichca huarancata yapachircani.
40025021	Patron paita nirca: —Allimi, can umayuc canqui. Ansallahuan allita rarcanqui, achcata canta mincasha. Caipi saquiri ñucahuan cushiyancapac.
40025022	Huasha ishcai huarancata japishca runa shamushpa nirca: —Patron, ishcai huarancata cuhuarcanqui, chaicunahuan ishcai huarancata yapachircani.
40025023	Patron paita nirca: —Allimi, canpash umayuc canqui. Ansallahuan allita rarcanqui; achcata canta mincasha. Caipi saquiri ñucahuan cushiyancapac.
40025024	Puchucaipi, shuc huarancata japishca runa shamushpa nirca: —Patron, canta ricsini; can millai shuncuyuc canqui; can mana tarpushcamanta pallanayanqui, can mana tarpushca yuramanta pallasha ninqui;
40025025	chairaicu manchashpa, can cuhuashca cullquita allpa ucupi pacarcani, Caica canpac cullqui.
40025026	Rimacpi, patron uyashpa nirca: —Manalli runa, quilla runa. Ñuca mana tarpushcamanta pallashcata yacharcanqui, mana tarpushca yuramanta muyucunata pallashcata yacharcanqui.
40025027	Chairaiculla ñuca cullquita bancopi churana carcanqui; ñuca ticramucpi, ñucapacta cuhuanunman carca chai cullqui yapashcantin.
40025028	Cullquita quichuichic paimanta; chunca huarancata charicman cuichic.
40025029	Charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca, yallicta charincapac; ranti, mana charic pai charishcatapash quichui tucunca.
40025030	Chai quilla runata canchaman shitaichic tuta ucuman, tucui lava llaaui tiyashcaman.
40025031	"Cai RUNA, jatun apu tucushpa, angelcunahuan pacta shamushpa, paipac tiyarinapi tiyarinca.
40025032	Paipac ñaupacpi tucui runacuna tantarinunca. Shuc michic runa obejacunata chitacunamanta chicanyachishca shina, paipash chaillatata ruranca.
40025033	Shuccunata shuccunamanta chicanyachinca; allicunata paipac allimaquiman churanca, manallicunata lluqui maquiman.
40025034	Huasha, jatun apu alli maquipi tiyaccunata ninca: —Shamuichic, ñuca Yaya llaquishcacuna, callarimanta cancunapac allichishca cushi causaita chasquincapac.
40025035	Ñuea yarcashcapi, carahuarcanquichic; upianayashcapi, upiachihuarcanquichic; ñuca huasi illac cashcapi, cancunapac huasipi puñuchihuarcanquichic.
40025036	Ñuca llatan cashcapi, churanata cuhuarcanquichic. Ñuca uncushca cashcapi, ñucapacman shamurcanquichic. Chunta curralpi tiyashcapi, ñucata ricuncapac shamurcanquichic;
40025037	Chaita uyashpa, allicuna ninunca: —Apunchic, ¿imura canta yaricashcata ricushpa cararcanchic, canta upianayashcata ricushpa upiachircanchic?
40025038	¿Imura canta huasi illacta ricushpa ñucanchic huasipi puñuchircanchic; canta llatanta ricushpa, churanata cuyarcanchic?
40025039	¿Imura canta uncushcata ricushpa, chunta curralpi ricushpa, canpaman ricanchie canta yanapancapac?
40025040	Jatun apu cutipanca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cancuna cai ñuca runacunahuan chashna rurashpa, ñucahuan rarcanquichic.
40025041	Chai huasha, lluqui maquipi tiyaccunata ninca: —Maldisiashcacuna, ñucamanta anchurichic mana tucuric ninaman, supaipac paita caticcunantin allichishca ninaman.
40025042	Ñuca yaricashcapi, mana carahuarcanquichic; upianayashcapi, mana upiachihuarcanquichic.
40025043	Huasi illac cashcapi, cancunapac huasipi mana puñuchihuarcanquichic; uncushca cashcapi, chunta curralpi tiyashcapi, mana shamurcanquichic ñucata ricuncapac. Llatan cashcapi, churanata mana cuyahuarcanquichic.
40025044	Chaita uyashpa, paicunapash tapununca: —¿Imura canta yarcashcata, upianayashcata, llatan cashcata ricushpa; uncushcata, chunta curralpi tiyashcata ricushpa, mana yanaparcanchic?
40025045	Jatun Apu cutipanca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cancuna cai ñuca runacunaman mana yanapashpa, ucata mana yanaparcanquichic.
40025046	Chaicuna mana tucuric ninaman rinunca, allicunaca mana tucuric causanaman.
40026001	Jesus tucui chaicunata rimashca huasha, yachachishcacunata nirca: —
40026002	Ishcai punchalla pishin pascua nishca punchapac, ña yachanquichic; cai RUNAta japinuncami paita chacatancapac.
40026003	Chai pachallapi, pacriyaya apucunahuan, camachic quillcata yachaccunahuan, judio apucunahuan Caifaspac huasipi tantarinurca; Caifas pacriyayacuna jatun apu carca.
40026004	Tantariccuna Jesusta umachishpa japincapac yuyanurca.
40026005	Raimi punchapi chaita rana mana allichu —ninurca—, ama runacuna jatarinuchun nishpa.
40026006	Shuc puncha, Jesus Betania llactapi tiyarca, Simon shutiyuc sisu runapac huasipi;
40026007	shuc huarmi shamurca yapa balic asnac yacu butita apamushpa. Jesus micucucpi, chai huarmi asnac. yacuta Jesuspac uma jahuapi tallirca.
40026008	Yachachishcacuna, chaita ricushpa, yapa piñarishpa, ninurca: Imaraicu chashna jichunun chai yapa balic asnac yacuta?
40026009	Chaita rantichishpa, achca cullqui Hucshinmari, tsuntsu runacunaman cuncapac.
40026010	Rimanucpi uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —¿Imaraicu cai huarmita piñanquichic? Chashna ñucahuan rurashpa, allita rurarca,
40026011	Tsuntsu runacuna cancunahuan huiñai tiyanunca; ranti, ñuca mana huiñai cancunahuan tiyashaehu.
40026012	Cai huarmi ñuca aichata asnac yacuhuan armachishpa, ñucata panpancapac allichishpa rurarca.
40026013	Shuti cancunata nini: Maitapash cushi shimita huillanucpi, cai huarmi rashcatapash huillanunca, paimanta yuyarinuchun nishpa.
40026014	Rimacpi, "chunca ishcaicuriamanta shuc, Judas shutiyuc, pacriyaya apucunapacman rishpa, nirca:
40026015	Mashnata cuhuanquichic ñuca Jesusta j apichishpa carcunaman cucpi? Chaita uyashpa, quimsa chunca cullquita paiman cunurca.
40026016	Chaimanta pacha Jesusta japincapacima puncha alli carica Judas yuyaricurca.
40026017	Mana punquichishca tantata micuna ñaupac punchapi, yachachishcacuna Jesuspacman rishpa, tapunurca: —¿Maipi pascua micunata allichincapac munanqui? —Llactaman richic shuc runapac huasiman; chaiman yaicushpa ninquichic: "Yachactic caita nin: Ñuca pacha ña pactamuran; canpac huasipi pascua micunata micunca rani ñuca runacunantin".
40026019	Yachachiscacuna Jesus rimashcata ranurca; pascua micunata allichinurca.
40026020	Tutayashcapi, Jesus paipac chunca ishcai runacunahuan shamurca micuncapac.
40026021	Micucunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Shuti nini, cancunamanta shuc ñucata japichinca ran huañuchincapac.
40026022	Chaita uyashpa yapa Haquirinurca; huasha huasha paita tapunurca: —¿Ñucachu cani?
40026023	Jesus cutiparca: —Ñuca callanamantallata micucuc runa ñucata japichinca ran.
40026024	Cai RUNA huañunca ran, quillcacuna rimashca shina; paita japichic runa mana pacarishcapi alli canman.
40026025	Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesusta japichinca rac runa, Judas shutiyuc, tapushpa nirca: —¿Yachachic, ñucachu cani? Jesus paita nirca: —Ari.
40026026	Micucunucpi, Jesus shuc tantata japirca; Diosta pacrachushpa, tantata paquishpa, yachachishcacunaman curca nishpa: —Micuichic,cai ñuca aichami can.
40026027	Huasha, stiuc basota japirca; Diosta pacrachushpa, chaita yachachishcacunaman curca nishpa: —
40026028	Cai basomanta tucuicuna upiaichic, cai ñuca yahuar mari can, Dios runacunahuan mushu cushca shimita ricuchic yahuar; cai yahuar tucui runacunamanta tallishca canca juchacunata pichancapac.
40026029	Cunanmanta binota mana upiashachu, ñuca Yaya huasipi mushu binota upianacama.
40026030	Taquishca huasha Olivos nishca urcuman rinuxca.
40026031	Riranucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Tucui cancuna "yancamanta paita catinchic" nishpa rimanquichic cunan tuta, quillcara mari tiyan: Michicta huañuchishami, obejacunaca chausirinunca.
40026032	Chashna cacpipash, ñuca causarishami, cancunata ñaupashpa Galileaman risha.
40026033	Pedro chaita uyashpa nirca: —Tucuicuna canta jichunucpipash, ñuca canta catishami.
40026034	Jesus paita nirca: —Shuti pacha canta nini: Cunan tuta cari atallpa chaira mana caparicpi, can quimsa cuti ñucamanta "paita mana ricsinichu" ninqui.
40026035	Pedro cutiparca: —Canhua pacta huañuna cacpipash, chaita mana rimashachu. Shuccunapash chaillatata rimanurca.
40026036	Chashna rimarishpa, Jesus paipaccunantin Getsemani nishca panpaman pactarca; chaiman pactac, yachachishcacunata nirca: —Caipi tiyarichic ñuca chainiman Dios-huan rimarinca rani.
40026037	Pedrota, ishcai Cebedeo churicunata pushashpa, yapa llaquirincapac callarirca.
40026038	Ñacarishpa nirca: —Llaquirishpalla huañunayahuan; caipi saquirichic, ñucahuan Diosman mañaichic.
40026039	Chainiman purishpa, tuhuaman urmarca nishpa: —Ñuca Yayalla, usharicpi cai jatun llaquita ñucamanta anchuchipai; ranti, maña ñuca munashca shina tucuchun, canpac munai rurarichun.
40026040	Yachachishcacuna tiyashcaman ticrashpa, puñurashcata tuparca; Pedrota nirca: —¿Shuc pachallapash ñucahuan Diosta mañana manachu usharcanquichic?
40026041	Mañaraichic juchanayaipi ama urmañcapac; cancunapac yuyai allimi can, ranti aicha sanpa can.
40026042	Chaita rimashpa, cutillata Dios-huan rimacrirca. —Yayalla, —nirca—, ñuca cai jatun llaquita apana cacpi, can munashca shina rurarichun.
40026043	Yachachiscacuna tiyashcaman ticrashpa, puñurashcata tuparca, yapa puñunayanucpi.
40026044	Paicunata saquishpa, cutillata Dios-huan rimacrirca, ñaupa shinata nishpa mañarca.
40026045	Chai huasha, yachachishcacuna tiyashcaman ticrashpa nirca: —Chairachu puñuranquichic? Ñuca pacha ña pactamurca. Juchayuccuna cai RUNAta japinca ranun.
40026046	Shayarichic, jacuichic, ñucata chasquichinca rac runa shamuran.
40026047	Rimacucpi, chunca ishcaicunamanta shuc, Judas shutiyuc, shamurca; paihuan pacta achca runacuna shamunurca mircanucunata, caspicunahuan; pacriyaya apucuna llacta apucunapash paicunata cachashca canurca.
40026048	Judas paicunata rimashca carca: —Ñuca muchashca runata japinquichic, paimi Jesus.
40026049	Chashnapi, Jesuspacman mayanyashpa, paita mucharcanishpa: —Allillachu canqui, Yachachic?
40026050	Jesus paita nirca: —Mashi, can ruranca rashcata rurailla. Chai ucu, Judas-huan shamuccuna Jesusman shitarishpa japinurca.
40026051	Chaita ricushpa, shuc Jesus yachachishca runa, mircanuta japishpa, apupac luncuta huactarca, paipac rinrita pitirca,
40026052	Jesus nirca: —Mircanuta cara ucupi cutillata ehurai; mircanuhuan huañuchic runa mircanullahuan huañuchi tucunca.
40026053	Ñuca munashpa, ¿manachu ñuca Yayata mañaiman, pai chunca huaranca angelta cachahuanman, ñucata quishpichincapac?
40026054	Ranti, ¿imashna quillcacuna rimashca pactarinca "chashna tucuna can" nishca?
40026055	Huasha runacunata nirca: —Shuhua runata japincapac shina ñucata japincapac shamurcanquichic mircanucunahuan, caspicunahuan. Caran puncha Diospac huasipi yachachic carcani; mana japihuarcanquichic.
40026056	Chashna tucun quillcacuna rimashca pactarincapac. Chaita uyashpa, yachachishcacuna Jesusta jichushpa miticunurca.
40026057	Jesusta japiccuna apu Caifaspacman pushanurca; chaipi camachic quillcata yachaccuna apucunantin tantarinushca carca.
40026058	Pedro carunayamanta apupac huasiman Jesusta catirca; huasi ucumari yaicushpa, luncucunahuan tiyarirca imata Jesusta ranunca ricuncapac.
40026059	Pacriyaya apucuna tucui taripaccunantin llulla shimita mashcacunurca Jesusta cautsayachishpa huañuchincapac.
40026060	Achca llullashpa rimaccuna shamucpipash, imapash mana tuparishcachu Jesusta cautsayachincapac. Taripanata tucuchincapac, ishcai runa shamushpa, rimanurca nishpa: —Cai runa nirca:
40026061	Ñuca Diospac huasita tulachina ushani, quimsa punchapi chaita jatachina ushani.
40026062	Chaita uyashpa, pacriyaya jatun apu shayarishpa nirca: —¿Manachu imatapash rimanqui? ¿Imata nishpa caicuna rimashcata rimarcanqui?
40026063	Jesus upallarca. Pacriyaya jatun apu cutillata rimarca: —Causac Diospac shutipi canta tapuni: ¿Mesiaschu canqui? ¿Diospac churichu canqui?
40026064	Jesus cutiparca nishpa: —Ari, chashnami can; caitapash nini: Shuc puncha tucuita ushac Diospac alli maquiman tiyarishcata ricuhuanquichic; puyu jahuapi shamucucta ricuhuanquichic.
40026065	Chaita uyashpa, jatun apu churanata lliquishpa nirca: —Diosta piñashpa rimarca. ¿Imapac ricuyaccunata mutsunchic? Pai rimashcata uyarcanquichic.
40026066	¿Imata paita rurashun? Tucuilla caparinurca: —Paita huañuchina can.
40026067	Chai huasha, Jesusta ñahuipi tiucanurca, maqui palahuan huactanurca nishpa: —
40026068	Mesias, rimai, ¿pimi canta macan?
40026069	Chaicama Pedro patiopi tiyarca, allpapi tiyacushpa. Shuc yanapac huarmi paiman mayanyashpa nirca: —Canpash Galileo Jesus-huan puric carcanqui.
40026070	Pedro, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi, nirca: —Mana, can rimacushcata mana yachanichu.
40026071	Puncuman ricpi chaimanta llucshincapac, shuc yanapac huarmi paita ricushpa, chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Caipash Jesus-huan tiyarca.
40026072	Pedro rimarca nishpa: —Mana, chai runata mana ricsinichu.
40026073	Astanipi, chaipi tiyaccuna Pedrota ninurca: —Shuti, paicunamanta canqui, paicuna shinallata mari rimanqui.
40026074	Pedro mana alli shimicunata rimancapac cailarirca nishpa: —Chai runata mana ricsinichu. Chai ucu cari atallpa caparirca.
40026075	Pedro Jesus rimashcata yuyarirca pai nishcapi: "Chaira cari atallpa mana caparicpi, paita mana ricsinichu quimsa cuti ninqui". Chaita yuyarishpa, chaimanta llucshispa, yapa huacacurca.
40027001	Cayantin puncha inti pacaricpi, pacriyaya apucunahuan llacta apucunahuan imata rana canca nishpa yuyanurca Jesusta huañuchincapac;
40027002	maqui huatashpa, apu Pilatopacman pushanurca.
40027003	Jesusta japichic Judas, Jesusta huañuchinca ranushcata yachashpa, manallita rarcani nishpa, quimsa chunca cullquita apucunaman cutichirca nishpa: —
40027004	Jatun juchata rarcani, alli runata japichircani cancunaman cuncapac. Paicuna ninurca: —Ñucanchicta mana imananchu. ¡Amu yachan! Rimanucpi uyashpa, Diospac huasiman cullquita shitashpa, rirca, huatarishpa huañurca.
40027006	Apucuna, cullquita japishpa, ninurca: —Cai cullqui Diosman camari cullqui shina huacaichincapac mana allichu, yahuar cullqui mari can.
40027007	Paicunapura rimarishpa, chai cullquihuan mancata ahuac runapac allpata rantinurca, mana judio caccunata chincachincapac.
40027008	Chairaicu chai panpa "yahuar panpa" ninun cunancama.
40027009	Chashnami Jeremias nishca pactarirca: Quimsa chunca cullquita japircani; chai tupu cullquipi judiocuna ñucata balichinurca;
40027010	mancata ahuacpac allpata rantircani Dios rimahuashca shina.
40027011	Jesus jatun apu pilato ñaupacpi tiyarca; chai apu Jesusta tapurca: —¿Judiocunapac jatun curacachu canqui? Jesus cutiparca: —Ari, can nishca shina can.
40027012	Pacriyaya apucuna rucucunapash juchachinucpi uyashpa, Jesus mana rimarcachu.
40027013	Mana rimacpi, Pilato paita nirca: —¿Manachu uyanqui caicuna rimacushcata?
40027014	Jesus shuc shimillatapash mana rimarcachu; chairaicu Pilato yapa mancharirca.
40027015	Judiocunapac yachai, jatun raimi puncha gubirnu apu shuc chunta curralpi huichcara runata cacharic carca, runacuna acllashcata.
40027016	Chai pacha shuc millai runa chunta curralpi huichcara tiyarca; paipac shuti Barrabas. Pilato chaipi tiyac runacunata tapuica: —¿Maicanta ñuca cacharincapac munanquichic? ¿Barrabastachu cacharisha? ¿Jesustachu cacharisha?
40027018	Pilato allimi yacharca Jesusta chicnishcamanta japichinushcata.
40027019	Pilato taripana tiyarinapi tiyarishca cacpi, paipac huarmi shimita cacharca nishpa: "Ama imata raichu chai alli runata; pairaicu nuspashpa yapa mancharircani".
40027020	Pacriyaya apucuna rucunapash "Barrabasta cachari, Jesusta huañuchi" nishpa caparina canquichic runacunaman rimanurca.
40027021	Pilato tapushcapi: —¿Maicanta cacharisha?—nishpa, runacuna caparinurca: —Barrabasta cachari,
40027022	Pilato cutillata tapurca: —Imata rasha cai Mesias nishca runata? Paicuna cutipanurca nishpa: —Chacatashca cachun.
40027023	Pilato tapurca: —¿Ima manallita rurarca? Paicuna ashtahuan caparinurca nishpa: —¡Chacatashca cachun!
40027024	Pilato manaimata rana ushani yuyarishpa, judiocuna ashtahuan caparishcata uyashpa, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi maquicunata maillarca nishpa: —Mana imata charinichu cai alli runahuan; cancunallata ricunquichic.
40027025	Paicuna caparinurca nishpa: —¡Paipac yahuar ñucanchic jahuapi, ñucanchic churicunapac jahuapi tallirichun!
40027026	Chaita uyashpa, Pilato Barrabasta cacharirca; Jesusta llipachishpa, paicunaman curca chacatashca cancapac.
40027027	Suldarucuna, Jesusta japishpa, patio ucuman pushanurca; pai muyucta tucui suldarucunata tantachinurca.
40027028	Jesuspac churanata surcushpa, shuc puca churanata churachinurca;
40027029	chai huasha, paipac umapi shuc cashahuan ahuashca llaututa, Jatun Curacacunapac llautu shina churanurca; paipac maquipi shuc pintuta apu bara shina churanurca. Paipac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, paita asinurca nishpa: —¡Ricuichic judiocunapac jatun apu!
40027030	Paipac ñahuipi tiucashpa, pintuhuan umata huactacunurca.
40027031	Paita asishca huasha, puca churanata surcushpa, paipac churanata churachishpa, chacatashca cancapac pushanurca.
40027032	Llactamanta llucshishpa, shuc Cirenemanta runata tarinurca, Simon shutiyuc; paita crusta marcachinurca.
40027033	Gólgota nishca urcuman pactashpa,
40027034	jayac-huan masashca binota upiachinurca; Jesus, chaita camashpa, mana upiarcachu.
40027035	Paita chacatashca huasha, paipac churanacunata lichayuccuna japinurca;
40027036	huasha, tiyarishpa, chaparanurca.
40027037	Crus umapi shuc quillcata churanurca; "imaraicu paita huañuchinun" nishpa quillca nin. Cashna quillcara carca: "Cai judiocunapac Jatun Curaca Jesusmi".
40027038	Paihuan pacta ishcai shuhua runata chacatanurca, shuc Jesuspac alli maquipi, shuc lluqui maquipi.
40027039	Chaita puriccuna Jesusta asinurca; umata cuyuchishpa,
40027040	ninurca: —Can "Diospac huasita tulachina ushani, quimsa punchapi chaita jatachina ushani" nishpa nircanqui; can quiquinta quishpichi; Diospac churi cashpa, crusmanta uraicui.
40027041	Pacriyaya apucunapash rucucunantin fariseocunantin paita asinurca nishpa: —
40027042	Shuccunata quishpichirca, pai quiquinta mana quishpichina ushan. Judiocunapac apu cashpa, crusmanta uraicuchun, ñucanchic paita inincapac.
40027043	Diospi inirca, Dios-pacchuri cani nishpa nirca; Dios paita llaquishpa, cunan paita quishpichichun.
40027044	Jesus-huan pacta chacatashca shuhuacunapash paita asinuica.
40027045	Chaupi punchamanta chaupi chishicama puncha yana tucurca.
40027046	Chaira jahuanaya intipi, Jesus sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Eli, Eli, lacma sabactani (runa shimipi: Ñuca Dioslla, ñuca Dioslla, imaraicu ñucata jichushcanqui).
40027047	Huauquin chaipi tiyaccuna, chaita uyashpa, ninurca: —Eliasta cayaran.
40027048	Shuc suldaru, esponjata japishpa, jayac binopi jucuchishpa, pintupi huatashpa, Jesusta upiachirca.
40027049	Shuccuna ninurca: —Saqui, Elias shamunca chari paita quishpichincapac.
40027050	Jesus sinchita caparishpa huañurca.
40027051	Chai ucu, Diospac huasipi huarcurashca cortina lliquirirca jahuamanta uracama; allpa cuyurirca, rumicuna raquirinurca.
40027052	Aya jutcucuna pascarinurca, achca alli runacuna causarinurca,
40027053	Jerusalen llactapi ricurinurca Jesus causarishca huasha.
40027054	Suldaru apu suldarucunapash, tucui tucushcata ricushpa, yapa mancharishpa, ninurca: -¡Shuti pacha, cai runa Diospac Churimi carca!
40027055	Achca huarmicuna carumanta tucuita ricuranurca; paicuna Jesusta Galileamanta catimushca carca, paita yanapashpa.
40027056	Shuc Maria Magdalena carca, shuc Jacobopac Josepac mama Maria, shuc Cebedeo churicunapac mama.
40027057	Tutayacucpi, shuc cullquiyuc runa shamurca, Jose shutiyuc, Arimateamanta runa; paipash. Jesusta catic runa carca.
40027058	Pilatopacman rishpa, Jesuspac ayata mañarca. Mañacpi, Pilato ayata paiman cuncapac rimarca.
40027059	Jose, ayata japishpa, mushu churanahuan pillushpa,
40027060	pai quiquinpac aya panpana jutcupi churarca; chai aya panpana jutcu mushu carca, rumipi allashca. Shuc jatun rumihuan chai jutcuta huichcashca huasha, rirca.
40027061	Chaipi tiyacunurca Maria Magdalena, shuc Mariapash, panpana jutcu ñahuipura;
40027062	Gayantin puncha, parasceve nishca puncha huasha, pacriyaya apucunahuanfariseocunahuan Pilatopacman rinurca. Chaiman pactashpa, cashna ninurca: —Apu, cunan yuyarinchic chai umachic runa, chaira causacushpaj nishcata: "Quimsa puncha huasha causarishami".
40027064	Chairaicu panpashcata ricunuchun quimsa punchacama, ama: pai yachachiscacuna tutapi shamushpa, ayata shuhuanuchun; shuhuashpa, runacunata rimanunca nishpa: "Causarishcami". Chashna tucucpi, chai umachishca tucui pai umachishcacunamanta yalli canca.
40027065	Chashna ninucpi, Pilato nirca: —Suldarucunata charinquichic; aya jutcuta allita ricunuchun.
40027066	Chaitauyashpa, ayata panpanushcaman rinurca; jutcuta huichcac rumita selloyachishpa, suldarucunata chaipi saquinurca ricuncapac.
40028001	Samana puncha huasha, semana ñaupac puncha ña pacaricucpi, ishcai huarmi: Maria Magdalena shuc, Maria shuc, panparata ricuncapac rinurca.
40028002	Cuncaimanta, allpa sinchi cuyurirca. Shuc angel uraicushpa, rumita anchuchishpa, rumi jahuapi tiyarirca.
40028003	Paipac ñahui chiuclla ricurirca, paipac churana rasu shina yurac carca.
40028004	Ayata ricuc suldarucuna, manchaimanta chucchushpa, huañushca shina saquirinurca.
40028005	Angel huarmicunata nirca: —Ama manchaichichu. Chacatashca Jesusta mashcaranquichic;
40028006	mana capichu; causarircami pai nishca shina. Pai sirirashcata ricuichic.
40028007	Huasha, utcalla rinquichic pai yachachishcacunaman huillancapac. "Causarishcami" ninquichic. Cancunata ñaupashpa Galileaman rinca; chaipi paita ricunquichic. Chaita huillancapac shamurcani.
40028008	Huarmicuna, chaita uyashpa, yapa cushiyashpa, yachachishcacunaman huillacrinurca.
40028009	Riranucpi, Jesus paicunahuan tuparishpa nirca: —¡Cushiyaichic! Paicuna mayanyarishpa, tuhuaman urmashpa, Jesuspac chaquita ucllarishpa paita chacchanurca.
40028010	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama manchaichichu; ñuca huauquicunaman huillacrichic: Galileaman rinuchun, chaipi ricuhuanquichic.
40028011	Huarmicuna riranucpi, ayata ricuc suldarucuna llactaman rishpa, pacriyaya apucunaman tucui tucushcata huillanurca.
40028012	Pacriyaya apucuna, chaita uyashpa, rucucunahuan rimarincapac rinurca; chai huasha, suldarucunaman achca cullquita cuyanurca nishpa: —
40028013	Cancuna caita ninquichic: "Tutapi, ñucanchic puñurashcapi, pai yachachishcacuna shamushpa, ayata shuhuanurca".
40028014	Apu chaita uyacpi, ñucanchic paihuan rimashun cancunata quishpichincapac.
40028015	Chaita uyashpa, suldarucuna cullquita japishpa, paicunaman rimanushcata rimanurca. Chai llullashcata cunan punchacama judiocuna ininun.
40028016	Chunca shuc yachachishcacuna Galileaman rinurca, Jesus nishca urcuman. Chaipi Jesus paicunaman ricurirca;
40028017	paita ricushpa chacchanurca; huaquincuna shuncullapi ninurca: "Paichu mana paichu imata".
40028018	Jesus paicunaman mayanyashpa nirca: —Ñuca tucuita ushani cai pachapi jahua pachapipash.
40028019	Richic, tucui runacunata yachachichic; paicunata Yayapac Churipac Santo Samaipac shutipi bautisanquichic; ñuca rimashcata rancapac paicunata yachachinquichic.
40028020	Uyaichic: Ñuca huiñai cancunahuan tiyasha cai pacha tucurinacama.
41001001	Diospac Churi Jesucristomanta alli shimi cashnami callarirca.
41001002	Profeta Isaias quillcashca carca nishpa: "Ñuca shimita apac runata ñanpita allichincapac cachani:
41001003	Chunlla allpapi shuc shimi uyarin cashna nishpa: Ñanpita Diospac allichichic, cuscachichic".
41001004	Chashna cacpi, Juan chunlla allpapi runacunata bautisac carca, cashna camachishpa: —Juchamanta llushpirincapac, shuncupi llaquirishpa, manalli causanata saquishpa, Diosman ticrana canquichic, bautisai tucuna canquichic.
41001005	Judeamanta Jerusalenmantapash tucui runa Juanpacman shamuccuna carca. Juchacunata rimanucpi, Juan Jordan yacupi paicunata bautisac carca.
41001006	Juan camello nishca huihua huillmahuan ahuashca churanata churarishca carca, huacra carahuan chunpillishca; sacha mishquita jijitapash micushpa causacurca.
41001007	Cashna rimashpa camachic carca: —Ñuca huashalla ñucamanta yalli ushac shamuncami; ñuca paipac ushutapac huascata pascancapac mana allichu cani.
41001008	Ñuca cancunata yacuhuan bautisani, ranti pai Santo Samaihuan cancunata bautisanca.
41001009	Chai punchacuna, Jesus Galileapi tiyac Nazaret llactamanta shamushcapi. Juan paita Jordan yacupi bautisarca.
41001010	Yacumanta llucshishca shina, Jesus jahua pachata pascarishcata ricurca, santo Samai paipac jahuapi urpi shina uraicucucta ricurca.
41001011	Jahua pachamanta shuc shimi uyarirca, cashna nishpa: —Can ñuca llaquishca Churimi canqui. Canhuan cushiyani.
41001012	Chai huasha, Santo Samai Jesusta chunlla allpaman purichirca.
41001013	Chuscu chunca puncha chaipi sacha aichacunahuan tiyarca; supai paita camarca. Huasha angelcuna paita caranurca.
41001014	Juanta japishpa chunta curralpi huichcanushcapi, Jesus Galilea suyuman rirca; chaipi Diospac shimita uyachic carca,
41001015	cashna nishpa: —Pactana pacha pactamurcami; Diospac pacha mayanlla can. Manalli causanata saquishpa, Diosman ticraichic, cushi shimita uyaichic.
41001016	Galilea cucha patata puricushpa, Jesus Simonta ricurca; paipac huauqui Andres-huan tiyarca. Paicuna yacu aichata japiccuna cashpa, llicata cuchapi shitaranurca.
41001017	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñucahuan shamuichic, runacunata japiccamata cancunata rasha.
41001018	Chai ucullapi, llicata saquishpa, Jesusta catinurca.
41001019	Astanipi, Jesus Galileapi puricushpa, Cebedeopac churi Santiagota ricurca paipac huauqui Juantin; canuapi llicata allichiranurca.
41001020	Jesus paicunata cayarca; paicunaca, yayata llancaccunantin canuapi saquishpa, Jesus-huan rinurca.
41001021	Chashna rishpa, Cafarnaun nishca llactaman pactanurca. Samana punchapi Jesus tantarina huasiman rirca runacunata yachachincapac.
41001022	Pai rimashcata uyaccuna mancharinurca, paipac yachachina shuc laya mari carca, ushaihuan yachachic carca, mana camachic quillcata yachaccuna shina.
41001023	Chai tantarina huasipi, shuc supai japishca runa tiyarca; caparincapac callarirca nishpa: —
41001024	Nazaretmanta Jesus, ¿imatata ñucanchicmanta munanqui? ¿Ñucanchicta tucuchincapacchu shamunqui? Canta ricsinimi, Dios acllashca runa canqui.
41001025	Jesus paita rimarca: —¡Upallai, cai runamanta llucshi!
41001026	Supaica, chai runata cushpachishpa, shinchita caparishpa, paimanta llucshirca.
41001027	Tucui chaita ricuccuna yapa mancharishpa, rimanacunurca nishpa: —¿Imami cai? ¡Shuc laya yachachin; supaicunata rimacpi, supaicuna paita uyanun!
41001028	Tucui Galilea llactacunapi Jesusmanta rimarirca.
41001029	Chai tantarina huasimanta llucshishpa, Jesus Santiagontin Juantin Simonpac Andrespac huasiman rirca.
41001030	Simonpac huarmi mama uncushpa siricurca; Jesusta paimanta rimanurca.
41001031	Jesus pai tiyashcaman yaicushpa, paita maquinanta japishpa jatarichirca. Chai ucullapi uncui samarirca. Ña alliyashpa paicunata sirbicurca.
41001032	Chishita, inti ña yaicucucpi, tucui uncushcacunata supai japishcacunatapash Jesuspacman pushanurca.
41001033	Tucui runacuna huasi puncupi munturinurca.
41001034	Jesus tucui laya uncushcacunata alliyachirca, supai japishcacunamanta supaita callpachirca. Supaicuna paita ricsinucpica, Jesus paicunata mana rimachircachu.
41001035	Cayantiman, tuta ucuta jatarishpa, huasimanta llucshirca, chunlla allpaman rirca Dios-huan rimarincapac.
41001036	Simon paihuan tiyaccunantin Jesusta mashcancapac rinurca.
41001037	Paita tupashpaca ninurca: —Tucuilla canta mashcaranun.
41001038	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Jacuichic shucman, mayan llactacunapi cushi shimita uyachincapac; chaipacmi shamurcani mari.
41001039	Chaimanta tucui Galilea suyuta purirarca, tantarina huasicunapi camachishpa, supaita supai japishcacunamanta jichushpa.
41001040	Shuc puncha, shuc sisu runa Jesuspacman shamurca. Cuncurishpa, paita mañarca nishpa: —Can munashpa, ñucata janpinata ushanqui.
41001041	Jesus paimanta llaquirishpa, maquihuan paita llancarca nishpa: —¡Munanimi, alliyashca saquiri!
41001042	Chai ucullapi chai runa pichara saquirirca.
41001043	Huasha paita cacharca nishpa: —
41001044	Ama pitapash rimaichu; ranti, pacriyayapacman rishpa, picharishcamanta Moises rimashcata cunqui, tucuicuna yachancapac can ña janpi tucushcata. ¿
41001045	Pai rishpa, tucuicunaman huillancapac callarirca. Chairaicu, Jesus llactacunaman runacuna ucupi mana yaicunata munarcachu. Runa illashcapi saquiric carca; chashnapash, achca runa tucui llactacunamanta paipacman shamuccuna carca.
41002001	Ansa punchacuna huasha, Jesus Cafarnaun llactaman ticrarca; huasipi tiyashcata uyarirca.
41002002	Achca runacuna paipacman shamunurca, huasi puncuta huichcacta. Pai Diospac shimita uyachicurca.
41002003	Rimacucpi, chuscu runapura shuc suchu runata huantushpa shamunurca.
41002004	Jesus tiyashcaman mana pactana ushashpa, huasi jahuamanta shuc jutcuta rashpa, Jesuspac ñaupacman uncushcata uraicuchinurca.
41002005	Jesus paicuna inishcata ricushpa, uncushca runata nirca: —Churi, canpac juchacuna maillai tucunun.
41002006	Huaquin yachaccuna chaipi tiyanurca. Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, paicunapac shuncupi yuyanurca nishpa:
41002007	¿"Imaraicu chashna riman? Diosta camicun. ¿Pitac juchacunata maillana ushan mana Dios cashpa?"
41002008	Jesus paicuna yuyacushcata yachashpa, nirca: —¿Imaraicu chashna yuyanquichic?
41002009	¿Imata ashtahuan rimanalla can: Cai uncushca runaman "canpac juchacuna maillai tucunun" nishpa rimanachu? "Jatari, cahuituta apashpa ri" nishpa rimanachu? ¿Manachu cutipahuanquichic?
41002010	Ñuca cai pachapi juchacunata maillana ushashcata ricuchinca rani. Huasha suchu runata nirca: —Uyai, jatari, canpac cahuituta japishpa huasiman ri.
41002012	Chai ucullapi jatarirca, cahuituta japishpa, tucuicuna ricuranucpi llucshirca. Chaita ricuccuna mancharinurca; Diosta chacchanurca nishpa: —¡Manapacha! ¡Mana imura chashna ricushcanchic!
41002013	Jesus chaimanta llucshishpa, yacu pataman cutillata rirca. Achca runacuna paipacman shamunurca; Jesus paicunata yachachicurca.
41002014	Purirashpa, Alfeopae churi Levi shutiyuc runata ricurca, gubirnu cullquita pallana huasipi tiyacurca. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñucahuan shamui. Chai runa uyashpa, jatarishpa, Jesusta catishpa rirca.
41002015	Huasha, Jesus Levi huasipi micucucpi, achca gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna achca juchayuccunapash Jesus-huan pacta, pai yachachishcacunahuan pacta micuncapac shamunurca, achca runacuna mari Jesusta catishpa puriccuna carca.
41002016	Camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunantin, Jesus gubirnu cullquita pallaccunahuan juchayuccunahuanpash micurashcata ricushpa, pai yachachishcacunata tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu cancunata yachachic gubirnu cullquita pallaccunahuan juchayuccunahuanpash micushpa upiashpa purin?
41002017	Jesus paicunata uyashpa nirca: —Alli causaccuna janpiccamata mana mutsunun; uncushcacuna janpiccamata mutsunun. Ñucaca mana shamurcanichu allicunata cayancapac; manallicunata mashcancapac shamurcani.
41002018	Bautisac Juan yachachishcacunahuan fariseocunahuan sasicushca punchapi, huaquin runacuna Jesuspacman shamunurca paita tapushpa: —Juan yachachishcacunahuan fariseocunahuan sasiccuna can; ¿imaraicu canpaccuna mana sasinun?
41002019	Tapunucpi, Jesus cutiparca: —Sahuarinaman cayashcacuna sasicchu canun, cari paicunahuan tiyacpi? Mana, cari paicunahuan tiyacpi mana sasinunchu.
41002020	Cari pushai tucuna puncha pactamucpi, sasinunca.
41002021	Manapí runa rucu churanata mushu churana pitihuan llachapanchu; chashna racpi, mushu churana curuyacpi, rucu churanata aisashpa, ashtahuan lliquichinca.
41002022	Chashnallata, manapí mushu binota rucu cara purupi churan; chashna racpi, mushu bino rucu cara puruta tucyachicpi, bino tallirinca, ishcaintin huacllirin. Mushu bino mushu cara purupi churana can.
41002023	Shuc samana puncha Jesus shuc tarpushca ucuta purirarca. Pai yachachishcacuna chaita purishpa, trigo huancuta aisashpa japinurca.
41002024	Fariseocuna, chaita ricushpa, Jesusta ninurca: —Riqui, samana puncha chashna rana mana allichu.
41002025	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Manachu yachanquichic David rurashcata micuna illac yaricashcapi paihuan tiyaccunantin?
41002026	Abiatar pacriyaya apu cashcapi, David Diospac huasiman yaicushpa, camari tantacunata micurca. (Chai laya tantata pacriyayacunalla micunun). Paihuan tiyaccunatapash cararca.
41002027	Huasha nirca: —Samana puncha runaraicu rurashca can, mana runa samana puncharaicu.
41002028	Chairaicu, cai RUNA samana punchapacpash amumi can.
41003001	Cutillata Jesus tantarina huasiman yaicurca. Chaipi shuc huacllishca maquiyuc runa tiyarca.
41003002	Fariseocuna Jesusta chapacunurca, chai runata samana punchapi allichincachu ima chari, paita cautsayachincapac.
41003003	Jesus chai huacllishca maquiyuc runata nirca: —Jatarishpa, chaupi shuncupi shayari.
41003004	Jesus chaipi tiyaccunata tapurca: —¿Samana puncha imata ruraipac can? ¿Allita rurana usharinchu? ¿Manallita rurana usharinchu? ¿Shuc runata huañunamanta quishpichina allichu? ¿Huañuncapac saquinachu? ¿Imata ninquichic? Paicuna chunlla saquirinurca.
41003005	Jesus piñarishpa, muyucta ricushpa, paicuna manalli shuncuyuc cashcamanta llaquirishpa, runata nirca: —Canpac maquita chutachi. Chutachicpi alliyarca.
41003006	Fariseocuna, chaimanta llucshishpa, Herodesta caticcunahuan rimarinurca imashnata Jesusta huañuchishun nishpa.
41003007	Jesus pai yachachishcacunantin Galilea cucha pataman rirca. Galileamanta, Judeamanta,
41003008	Jerusalenmanta, Idumeamanta, Jordan chinpamanta, Tiro Sidon llactacunamantapash achca runacuna paipacman shamunurca, paimanta rimarishcata uyashpa.
41003009	Chashna cacpi, Jesus pai yachachishcacunata nirca: —Shuc canuata allichichic runacunata ama jaitahuancapac.
41003010	Achca uncushcacunata alliyachicpi, tucui laya uncuccuna paipacman shitarinurca, paita llancancapac.
41003011	Supaicuna, paita ricushpa, cuncurishpa, capariranurca nishpa: —Can Diospac Churimi canqui.
41003012	Ranti, Jesus sinchita paicunata rimarca nishpa: —Ñuca pi cashcata ama huillaichichu.
41003013	Jesus shuc urcuman sicashpa, pai munashcacunata "ñucaman shamuichic" nirca.
41003014	Shamunucpi, paicunamanta chunca ishcaita acllarca paihuan tiyancapac, paicunata camachincapac cachancapacpash,
41003015	supaicunata jichuna ushaita paicunaman cushpa.
41003016	Caimi paicunapac shuticuna: Simon (paita "Pedro" shutichirca),
41003017	Cebedeopac churicuna Santiago, paipac huauqui Juan (paicunata "Boanarges" shutichirca; runa shimipi "Tulun churicuna"),
41003018	Andres, Felipe, Bartolome, Mateo, Tomas, Alfeopac churi Santiago, Tadeo, Simon "cananeo" nishca,
41003019	Judas Iscariote (pai Jesusta japichirca).
41003020	Chai huasha, Jesus paipac huasiman ticrarca. Achca runa cuti tantaricpi, micuncapapash mana ushanurcachu.
41003021	Paipac aillucuna Jesus huasipi tiyashcata yachashpa, paita pushancapac shamunurca runacuna rimacpi nishpa "Yuyai illac tucurca".
41003022	Jerusalenmanta shamushca yachaccuna ninurca: —Cai runa Belcebú supai aputa ucupi charin, paipac ushaihuan supaicunata jichun.
41003023	Chashna rimanucpi, Jesus paicunata cayashpa, cashna nishpa yachachirca: —¿Imashna supai apu, Satanás nishca, Satanasllata jichunca?
41003024	Shuc llactapi causaecuna, chican chican chaupiricpi, chai llacta tucurincami.
41003025	Chashnallata, shuc huasipi causac aillucuna, paicunapura macanacushpa, tucurinuncami.
41003026	Satanashpash pai quiquinllata piñashpa, tucurincami.
41003027	Manapí shuc sinchi runapac huasiman yaicuna ushan shuhuancapac, ñaupacta mana paita huatashpa. Paita huatashca huasha, shuhuana ushancami.
41003028	Huasha, Jesus yapashpa nirca: —Runa tucui laya juchallishcata, tucui rimashca manalli shimita quishpichina usharin.
41003029	Ranti, Santo Samaita piñashpa manallita rimac runa mana imura quishpichi tucunca, chicapac juchata aparinca.
41003030	Chashna nirca Jesus, paicuna "millai supaita ucupi charin" nishpa rimashcamanta.
41003031	Jesus rimacucpi, paipac mama paipac huauquicunantin shamushpa, canchamanta paita cayachinurca.
41003032	Jesus muyucta tiyarishcacuna paita ninurca: —Uyai, canpac mama canpac huauquicunantin canchapi tiyanun, canta mashcanun.
41003033	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Pitac can ñuca mama, maican ñuca huauqui?
41003034	Huasha, pai muyucta tiyaccunaman ricushpa nirca: —Caicunami ñuca mama, ñuca aillucuna,
41003035	Dios rimashcata pactachic runa paimi ñuca huauqui, ñuca pani, ñuca mama.
41004001	Cutillata Jesus cucha patapi yachachincapac callarirca. Achca runa tantarinucpi, Jesus shuc canua ucuman yaicushpa, tiyarirca; runacuna yacu patapi saquirinurca.
41004002	Jesus unaita paicunata yachachirca; cashna rimacurca: —Uyaichic: Shuc runa chacraman tarpuncapac rirca.
41004004	Tarpucpica, huaquin muyucuna ñanpipi urmanurca; pishcucuna shamushpa micunurca,
41004005	Huaquin muyucuna rumi panpapi urmanurca, mana achca allpa tiyashcapi; utcalla huiñarirca, allpa mana yapa ucuta cacpi;
41004006	inti llucshicpi, huiñashca muyu sapi illac cashpa, chaquirishpa huañurca;
41004007	shuc muyucuna huita ucupi urmanurca; huitaca chai muyuta mana huiñachirca; chai muyuca mana aparirca.
41004008	Shuc muyucuna alli allpapi urmanurca. Sumac huiñanurca, achcata aparinurca: huaquin muyumanta quimsa chunca muyu llucshirca, huaquinmanta sucta chunca muyu, huaquinmanta shuc patsac.
41004009	Huasha Jesus nirca: —Yuyayuc runa yuyachun.
41004010	Jesus sapalla saquiricpi, paita caticcuna pai yachachishcacunahuan pacta paita tapunurca: —¿Can rimashca imata ricuchin?
41004011	Jesus nirca: —Dios paipac manapí yachashca shimita cancunaman ricuchirca, paipac pachata ricsichincapac. Ranti, shuccunaman, canchapi tiyaccunaman mana atipaipac tucun,
41004012	Diospac quillca nin: "Paicuna ricurashpapash, mana ricununcachu; allita uyashpapash, mana atipanuncachu, ama Diosman ticrashpa quispichi tucuncapac".
41004013	Huasha nirca: —¿Tarpucmanta rimashcata manachu atiparcanquichic? ¿Imashnata shuc rimanacunata atipanquichic?
41004014	Tarpuc runa Diospac shimita tarpun.
41004015	Huaquin runacuna ñanpipi urmashca muyucuna shinami: Diospac shimita uyanun; uyashca shinalla supai apu shamushpa, chai shimita paicunapac shuncumanta apan.
41004016	Huaquin runacuna rumi panpapi urmashca muyucuna shinami: Diospac shimita cushiyashcahuan uyanun;
41004017	ranti, paicunapac shuncupi mana ucuman yaicun, mana sinchicunun; chai shimita inishcamanta llaqui shamucpi, ñacachi tucunucpi, chaita jichunun.
41004018	Huaquin runacuna huita ucupi urmashca muyucuna shinami: Diospac shimita uyanun;
41004019	ranti, cai causaipaccunata yapa yuyanun, cullquiyuc tucunata yapa munanun, cai pacha cushicunapi shuncuta churanun; chai tucui alli shimita huañuchinun, chai shimica mana aparinchu.
41004020	Huaquin runacuna alli allpapi tarpushca muyucuna shina canun. Diospac shimita uyanun, uyashcata huacaichinun; sumac aparinun; huaquincuna quimsa chunca tupu, huaquincuna sucta chunca tupu, huaquincuna shuc patsac tupu aparinun.
41004021	Shuctapash rimarca cashna nishpa: —Cancuna chinpusuta japichishpa, ¿chaita mala ucupi churanquichichu? ¿Cahuitu ucupi churanquichichu? Mana, jahuapi churanquichic ricuchincapac.
41004022	Imapash pacashca cashpa, pacllaman llucshichishca canca, pacalla rimashcátaca tucuicuna yachanunca.
41004023	Yuyayuc runa yurarichun.
41004024	Shuctapash rimarca nishpa: —Cancuna tupushca tupullahuan tupui tucunquichic, yapashpa cushcanquichic.
41004025	Charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca. Mana charic runa pai charishcashituta quichui tucunca.
41004026	Shuctapash nirca: —Diospac pacha shuc tarpuc runahuan tucushca shina tucun. Chai runa allpapi tarpun.
41004027	Pai tutapi puñun, punchapi jatarin. Chai muyu llucshin, huiñan, runa mana yuraricpipash.
41004028	Allpa pai quiquinmanta aparichin. Ñaupacta panca llucshin, huasha tuctun, huasha muyuyan;
41004029	muyu pucucpi, pallanun.
41004030	Shuctapash nirca: —¿Diospac pacha imashnata ricurin? ¿Imahuan chinpapurachishun?
41004031	Shuc mostaza nishca muyu shinami. Tarpushcapi, tucui muyucunamanta yalli uchilla can.
41004032	Huasha huiñan, tucui quihuacunamanta yalli jatun tucun. Huairapi huanpuric pishcucuna paipac llantupi samanun.
41004033	Chai laya shimicunahuan Jesus paicunata yachachicurca, paicuna japina ushancapac.
41004034	Chai laya rimanacunahuan tucuita nic carca. Pai yachachishcacunata tucuita chicanpi sumacta atipachirca. Chai punchallapita, ña tutayacpi, Jesus pai yachachishcacunata nirca: —Jacuichic cucha chinpaman.
41004036	Paicuna runacunata saquishpa, Jesusta pushanurca pai tiyashca canuallapi. Paihuan pacta shuc canuacuna rinurca.
41004037	Sinchi huaira jataricpi, bacucuna canuaman yaicuracpi, ñalla panparirarca.
41004038	Jesus canua siquipi, shuc saunapi puñurarca. Paita ricchachishpa ninurca: —¡Panparicunchicmi! ¿Canta manachu Uaquinayan?
41004039	Pai riccharishpa, huairata piñashpa, yacuta nirca: —¡Upallai, samari! Rimacpi, huaira samarirca, tucui chunlla tucurca.
41004040	Huasha paicunata nirca: —¿Imaraicuta manchanquichic? ¿Chaira manachu ininquichic?
41004041	Paicuna, yapa mancharishpa, rimanacunurca nishpa: —¡Manapacha! ¿Pitac can cai runa? ¡Huairapash yacupash paita uyanun!
41005001	Cucha chinpaman pactanurca, Gadara nishca panpa– man.
41005002	Jesus canuamanta llucshishca shina, shuc supai japishca runa paipacman shamurca.
41005003	Chai runa aya jutcucunapi causac carca. Manapí paita japinata usharca jillai huascacunahuanpash.
41005004	Achca cuti paita jillai huascacunahuan huatanushca carca. Pai tucuita paquic carca; manapí paihuan usharca.
41005005	Tutantin punchantin aya jutcu panpapi urcucuna— pipash caparishpa puricachac carca, rumicunahuan huacta– rishpa.
41005006	Jesusta ricushpa, paipacman callparca. Cuncurishpa,
41005007	sinchita caparirca nishpa: —¿Imaraicu ñucahuan satirinqui, Jesus jatun Diospac Churi? Diosmanta mañani ama ñucata ñacachichu.
41005008	(Jesus paita nishcarca: "Mapa supai, cai runamanta llucshi" nishpa)
41005009	Jesus paita tapurca: —¿Ima shuti canqui? Pai cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca shuti "jatun bulami", achcapura mari canchic.
41005010	Jesusta achcata mañacurca nishpa: —Cai allpamanta ama shitahuaichu.
41005011	Urcu chaquipi achca cuchicuna micuranurca.
41005012	Supaicuna Jesusta nicurca: —Ñucanchicta cuchicunapi yaicuchipai.
41005013	Jesus "allimi" nicpi, supaicuna runamanta llucshishpa, cuchicunapi yaicunurca. Cuchicunaca, ishcai huaranca tupu, yacuman urmashpa, chucallishpa huañunurca.
41005014	Cuchi ricuccamacuna miticunurca. Tucushcata tucuicunaman huillanurca. Uyaccuna ricuncapac shamunurca.
41005015	Jesuspacman pactashpa, supai japishca runata tupanurca. Tiyarishcata, churanata churarishcata, yuyayucta ricushpa, mancharinurca.
41005016	Ricuccuna chai runaman tucushcata cuchicunaman tucushcatapash huillanurca.
41005017	Uyaccuna Jesusta mañanurca nishpa: —Caimanta llucshipai.
41005018	Rimanucpi uyashpa, Jesus canuaman ticrarca. Yaicuracpi, chai supai japishca cashca runa "canhuan pushahuai" nishpa mañarca. Ranti,
41005019	Jesus mana munarcachu; paita nirca: —Canpac huasiman ri, canpac aillucunapacman. Dios llaquirishpa canhuan rashcata tucuicunaman huillanqui.
41005020	Chashna nicpi Jesus, chai runa rishpa, Decapoli nishca llactacunapi Jesus paihuan rashcata rimarca. Rimacpi uyashpa, tucuicuna mancharinurca.
41005021	Jesus chinpaman cutillata rirca. Achca runacuna pai muyucta tantarinucpi, cucha patapi saquirirca.
41005022	Chaipi, shuc tantarina huasi apu Jairo shutiyuc shamurca. Jesusta ricushpa, paipac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, mañarca nishpa: —
41005023	Ñuca ushushi huañuran, shamupai. Canpac maqui paipac jahuapi churacpi alliyashpa causancami.
41005024	Rimacpi, Jesus paihuan rirca. Achca runacuna paita catishpa, tancashpa, tancashpa puricunurca.
41005025	Chai runacuna ucupi shuc uncushca huarmi tiyarca; chunca ishcai huatata yahuar tallirishpa causarca.
41005026	Achca janpiccama janpisha nishpa, paita nanachishca canurca, paipac cullquita tucuchishpa. Ranti, paita alliyachina mana ushanurcachu.
41005027	Chai huarmi Jesusmanta rimarishcata uyashpa, runacuna ucupi Jesusman mayanyashpa, huashata paipac churanata llancarca,
41005028	stuncupi yuyarishpa nishpa: "Paipac churanata llancashpallahuan alliyashami".
41005029	Llancacpi, paipac yahuar saquirirca, paipac aicha alliyashcata yacharca.
41005030	Chai ucullapi Jesus, paimanta shuc ushai llucshishcata yachashpa, huashaman ricushpa nirca: —Pitac ñuca churanata llancarca?
41005031	Yachachishcacuna cutipanurca: —Manachu carita quichquiyachishcata ricunqui? Canca: "Pitac llancahuarca" ninqui?
41005032	Ranti, Jesus muyucta ricurashpa saquirirca, paita llancashcata ricuncapac.
41005033	Chashna ricuracpi, chai huarmi, manchashpa, Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, tucuita huillarca.
41005034	Jesus paita nirca: —Ushushi, ama manchaichu. Can inishca canta quishpichirca. Ganaslla ri, alliyashca saquiri.
41005035	Jesus chaira rimacucpi, apupac huasimanta shamunurca nishpa: —Canpac ushushi ña huañurca. ¿Imapacta Jesusta quillachinqui?
41005036	Jesus chaita uyashpa, chai apu runata nirca: —Ama manchaichu, inilla.
41005037	Manapita munarca paihuan rincapac. Pedro, Santiago paipac huauqui Juan paicunalla Jesus—huan rinurca.
41005038	Apu huasiman pactashcapi, jatun tulupuna uyarirca, huacashpa, caparishpa.
41005039	Jesus nirca: —¿Imami cai tulupuna? Huahua mana huañushcachu, puñuranlla.
