41005040	Chashna rimacpi, runacuna paita asinurca. Ranti, Jesus tucuicunata llucshichishpa, huahua tiyashcaman yaicurca paihuan shamushcacunantin. Huahuapac yayata mamatapash pusharca.
41005041	Huahuata maquimanta japishpa nirca: —Talita cumi (runa shimipi: "Ushushi, jatari nini")
41005042	Chai ucullapi huahua shayarishpa, purincapac callarir— ca (chunca ishcai huatayuc mari carca). Tucuicuna cushiyashpa yapa mancharinurca.
41005043	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama pitapash rimaichichu. Huahuata caraichic.
41006001	Jesus pai yachachishcacunantin paipac llactaman shamurca.
41006002	Samana puncha tantarina huasipi yachachicurca. Paita uyaccuna, mancharishpa, rimanacunurca nishpa: —¿Chai tucuita maipi yacharca? ¿Pai yachashcata maimanta yachan? ¿Mana raipacta rana ushanata maimanta chasquirca?
41006003	Shuti pacha, pai tucuicuna ricsishca carpintero runami, Mariapac churi. Santiago, Jose, Judas, Simon paipac huauquicuna canun. Paipac panicuna ñucanchihuan tiyanun. Chashna nishpa, paita mana uyanurcachu.
41006004	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Tucui pachapi profetata llaquinun. Paipac llactamanta caccuna, paipac quiquin aillucuna paita mana yupaichanunchu.
41006005	Chai llactapica ima mana raipacta mana rarcachu. Huaquin uncuccunata janpirca, maquita umapi churashpa.
41006006	Jesus paicuna mana inishcamanta mancharirca. Chaimanta rishpa, mayan llactacunata yachachishpa purirarca.
41006007	Chai huasha, chunca ishcai acllashcacunata cayashpa, ishcai ishcaita paicunata cacharca. Supaicunata jichuna ushanata paicunaman curca.
41006008	Paicunata nirca: —Ama imatapash apanquichichu. Shicrata, tantata, cullquita ama apanquichichu. Purina caspillata,
41006009	ushutatapash apanquichic. Ishcai churanata ama apanquichichu.
41006010	Huasha, yapashpa nirca: —Shuc llataman yaicushpa, puñuncapac shuc huasita mashcanquiehic, Chaillapita saquirinquichic llactamantarinacama.
41006011	Maipipash cancunata mana chasquinucpi, mana uyanucpi, chaimanta llucshishpa, chaquimanta allpata chausinquichic, paicuna manalli rashcata ricuchincapac.
41006012	Chashna rimacpi Jesus, yachachishcacuna camachincapac rinurca, "Diosman ticraichic" nishpa.
41006013	Achca uncushcacunata supai japishcacunatapash alliyachinurca, huirahuan uncuccunata cacushpa.
41006014	Tucui llactacunapi Jesusmanta rimaricpi, Herodespash paimanta uyarca. Herodes nirca: —Cai runa Bautisac Juanmi, huañushcacunamanta causarishca. Chairaicu mana raipaccunata rana ushan.
41006015	Huaquincuna ninurca: —Cai runa Profeta Eliasmi. Shuccuna ninurca: —Shuc profetami, ñaupa profetacuna shina.
41006016	Herodes, runacuna rimashcata uyashpa, nirca: —Cai runa Juanmi, ñuca huañuchishca. Pai causarishcami.
41006017	Herodesllata Juanta japichishca carca. Paita jillai huascahuan huatashpa, chunta curralpi huichcashca carca, Herodias chashna munashcaraicu. Chai huarmi Herodespac huauqui Felipepac huarmi cacpi, Herodes paita japishca carca.
41006018	Juanca paita camachishcarca nishpa: —Canpac huauquipac huarmita japircanqui, mana allichu.
41006019	Chairaicu Herodias Juanta yapa chicnirca, paita huañuchisha nishpa. Ranti, mana usharcachu,
41006020	Herodes Juanta mancharca mari, "pai alli runa, Diosta uyac runa" can nishpa. Paita quishpichic carca. Pai camachishcata uyashpa yapa mancharishpallata, munaihuan paita uyac carca.
41006021	Herodes, pai pacarishca puncha pactaricpi, shuc jatun raimita rarca. Gubirnu apucunata, suldaru apucunata, Galileamarita jatun runacunata cayarca micuncapac.
41006022	Micucunucpi, Herodiaspac ushushi tushurca. Pai tushushcata Herodes paihuan tiyaccunantin munaihuan ricunurca. Herodes paita nirca: —Can imatapash mañahuacpi cushcanqui.
41006023	Jurashpa paita nirca: —Ñuca charishcacunamanta chaupita mañahuacpipash cushcanqui.
41006024	Rimacpi uyashpa Herodiaspac ushushi llucshishpa, mamapacman rishpa tapurca: —¿Imata mañasha? Paipac mama nirca: —Bautisac Juanpac umata mañanqui.
41006025	Pai urastalla Herodespacman rishpa nirca: —Cunanllata Bautisac Juanpac umata shuc callanapi cuhuanqui; chaita munani.
41006026	Herodes, chaita uyashpa, yapa llaquirirca. Ranti, chaipi tiyaccuna ñaupacpi jurashpa rimashcamanta, mitsancapac mana usharcachu.
41006027	Chashnapi shuc suldaruta cacharca, "Juanpac umata apacri" nishpa. Pai chunta curralman rishpa, Juanpac umata pitishpa,
41006028	shuc callanapi Herodias ushushipacman apamurca. Paica paipac mamaman curca.
41006029	Juan yachachishcacuna, chaita yachashpa, paipac ayata apashpa rishpa panpanurca.
41006030	Jesus camachincapac cachashcacuna ticramushpa paihuan tantarinurca. Paicuna rashcata yachachishcatapash rimanurca.
41006031	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Runa illashcaman shamuichic samancapac. Achca runa chaita puricucpi, micuncapacpash mana ushanurcachu.
41006032	Chairaicu shuc canuapi yaicushpa, runa illashcaman rinurca.
41006033	Runacuna paicuna rishcata ricushpa, picuna cashcata ricsinurca. Tucui llactacunamanta ñanpita callpashpa rishpa, Jesusta ñaupashpa pactanurca.
41006034	Jesus canuamanta llucshish— pa, achca runacunata ricushpa, paicunamanta llaquirirca, michic illac obejacuna shina canucpi. Paicunata unaita yachachicurca.
41006035	Ña tutayaracpi, yachachishcacuna paita ninurca: —Cai panpa huasi illac can.
41006036	Runacunata cacharinqui mayan huasicunapi micunata rantincapac.
41006037	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancunallata paicunata caranquichic. Paicuna cutipanurca: —Can munacpi, tantata ranticrishun ishcai patsac cullqui tupu tucuicunata carancapac,
41006038	Jesus tapurca: —¿Mashna tantata charinquichic? Rucucrichic. Ricunucpi, ninurca: —Pichca tanta ishcai challuapash tiyan.
41006039	Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Runacunata allpapi tìyarichichic.
41006040	Rimacpi, runacuna quihua jahuapi tiyarinurca, shuc patsac bula tucushpa, pichca chunca bula tucushpa.
41006041	Huasha, Jesus tantacunata challuacunatapash japishpa, jahuaman ricushpa, Diosta pacrachurca. Tantacunata paquishpa, yachachiscacunaman curca, paicuna runacunata carancapac. Chashnallata ishcai challuata tucuicunata caranurca.
41006042	Sacsacta micunurca.
41006043	Puchushcata pallashpa, chunca ishcai ashancata juntachinurca.
41006044	Micuccuna caricunalla pichca huaranca canurca.
41006045	Chaipac huasha, Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Ñucata ñaupashpa, canuapi chinpaman, Betsaida nishcaman richic, ñuca runacunata cacharinacama.
41006046	Paicunata cacharishpa, Jesus urcuman rirca Dios-huan rimarincapac.
41006047	Tutayashcapi, canua chaupi cuchapi tiyarca. Jesus allpapi sapalla shayarca.
41006048	Ñahuipuramanta huairacpi, sinchita cahuinurca. Chaira mana punchayacpi, Jesus yacu jahuapi paicunapacman rirca. Pactashpa, ric tucushpa, ashtahuan caruman ric shina tucurca.
41006049	Canuapi riccuna, paita yacu jahuata purirashcata ricushpa, "ayami" nishpa caparinurca.
41006050	Tucuilla paita ricunurca. Ricushpa mancharinurca. Pai utcalla paicunata nirca: —Ñucami cani. ¡Cariyaichic, ama manchaichichu!
41006051	Jesus canua ucuman yaicucpi, huaira aisarirca. Chaita ricushpa, ashtahuan mancharinurca. Paicunapac yuyai quillpara cacpi, mirachishca tanta ricuchishcata mana atipanurcachu.
41006053	Cuchata chinpashpa, Genesaretman pactashpa llutarinurca.
41006054	Allpaman llucshishca shina, runacuna Jesusta ricsinurca. Tucui suyuta rimacrinurca.
41006055	Uncushcacunata huantushpa pai tiyashcaman pushamunurca.
41006056	Jesus yaicushca llactacunapi, uncuccunata pai rina ñanpipi saquinurca. Paicunaca "canpac churanallata llancachipai" nishpa mañanurca. Tucui paita llancaccuna alliyanurca.
41007001	Fariseocuna huaquin Jerusalenmanta shamushca yachaccunantin Jesus-huan tiyanurca.
41007002	Paicunaca Jesus yachachishcacuna maquita mana maillashpa micucushcata ricunurca.
41007003	Fariseocuna judiocunapash, chaira maquicunata mana maillashpa, mana micuc canun, rucucuna yachachishcata catishpa.
41007004	Chashnallata, maimanpash rishpa, huasiman ticrashpa, mana maillarishpa mana micuc canun. Shucpash achca tiyan paicuna rashca paicunapac yachai: mucahuacunata, mancacunata, pilchicunata maillac canun.
41007005	Chashna cacpi, fariseocuna yachaccunantin Jesusta tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu can yachachishcacuna ñaupacuna yachachishcata mana ruranun, maquicunata mana maillashpa micuccuna can?
41007006	Jesus cutiparca: —¡Llullacamacuna! Allimi cancunamanta Isaias rimarca, cashna quillcashpa: "Cai runacuna shimillahuan ñucata llaquinun, paicunapac shuncu ñucamanta carumi can.
41007007	Yancamanta ñucata chacchanun; paicuna yachachishca runapac shimillami".
41007008	Dios camachishcata jichushpa, runa camachishcata catinquichic.
41007009	Huasha Jesus nirca: —Cancunapae yachaita catincapac, Dios camachishcata ñahuilla ricunquichic.
41007010	Moises rimarca mari: "Canpac yayata, eanpac mamata uyana canqui. Yayata mamata piñashpa rimac runa shuc rai huañunca".
41007011	Ranti, cancuna ninquichic: "Shuc runa paipac yayata paipac mamatapash nicpi: 'Ñuca tucui charishcata Diosman chasquichircani, cancunata yanapancapac mana ima tiyahuan',
41007012	chashna nishpa, paicunata ña mana yanapanachu".
41007013	Chashna rurashpa, cancunapac yachaita pactachincapac Diospac shimita ñahuilla ricunquichic. Shuc achcacuna chai layallata charinquichic.
41007014	Chai huasha, runacunata cayashpa, nirca: —Uyahuaichic tucuicuna, atipaichic:
41007015	imapash canchamanta runa ucuman yaicushpa, mana mapayachin; runapac yuyaimanta llucshic, chaimi runata mapayachin.
41007016	Yuyayuc runa yuyarichun.
41007017	Chashna nishpa Jesus, runacunata saquishpa, huasi– man yaicurca. Yachachishcacuna paita tapunurca: —¿Imata yachachishpa chai shimicunata rimarcanqui?
41007018	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Cancunapash yuyai illacchu canquichic? ¿Canchamanta runa ucupi yaicuc paita mana mapayachishcata manachu atipanquichic?
41007019	Canchamanta shamuc mana shuncupi yaicun; huicsapi yaicun, ismashpa llucshin. Chashna nishpa, tucui laya micuna alli cashcata ricuchirca.
41007020	Huasha nirca: —Runa shuncumanta llucshic chaimi runata mapayachin.
41007021	Runa shuncumanta manalliyuyaicuna llucshinun. Chashnallata yumashpa juchallinacuna, shuhuanacuna, runata huañuchinacuna,
41007022	shucpac huarmita japinacuna, shucpac imacunata japinayana, manallita rashcacuna,shuccunata umachiña, mana pincarishpa causana, caminacuna,
41007023	chiqui-cuicuna, yapa yalli canayana, nuspa shina causana. Chai tucuicuna shuncu ucumanta llucshinun, runata juchayucta ruranun.
41007024	Chaimanta llucshishpa, Jesus Tiro nishca suyuman nrcá. Shuc huasiman "manapí ñuca caipi tiyashcata yachachun" nishpa. Ranti, paillatata pacana mana usharcachu.
41007025	-
41007026	Shuc huarmi, Jesus shamushcata yachashpa, paipacman rishpa," cuncurishpa, Jesusta mañarca paipac ushushimanta. Chai huarmi mana judiochu carca, sirofenisiamanta huarmi carca. Shuc supai paipac ushushita japishca carca. "Supaita ñuca ushushimanta jichupai" nishpa mañarca.
41007027	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñaupacta churicunata carana cani. Paicunapac tantata allcushitucunaman shitana mana allichu.
41007028	Huarmi cutipashpa nirca: —Shuti, chashnami can, Apunchic. Chashnapash, allcushitucuna mesa ucupi mesamanta urmac puchuchishcata mcuccuna can.
41007029	Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus ñirca: —Rilla, can chashna rimashcamarita, canpac ushushimanta supai ña llucshircami.
41007030	Huarmi rishpa, huasiman pactashpa, ushushi cahuitupi sirirashcata tuparca; supai paimanta llucshishca carca.
41007031	Tiro llactamanta llucshishpa, Jesus Galilea cuchaman rirca, Sidon llactata Decapolis nishca llactacuriata purishpa.
41007032	Shuc upa rinri, upa shimi runa pushamunurca. "Canpac maquita paipac jahuapi churapai" nishpa mananurca.
41007033	Jesus paita chicanman pushashpa, maqui rucata rinri ucupi satirca, tiucahuan paipac, calluta cacurca.
41007034	Chai huasha, jahuaman ricushpa, "ai" nishpa, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Effata (runa shimipi: "Pascari").
41007035	Chai ucullapi, paipac rinri pascarirca, paipac callu alliyarca, alli rimai callarirca.
41007036	Jesus paita nirca: —Ama pitapash rimaichu. Paica tucuicunaman huillarca, Jesus "ama pitapash rimaichu" nishpa nicpipash.
41007037	Yapa maneharishpa runacuna ninurca: —Tucuita ailita rurarca. Upa rinricunata uyachin, upa shimicunata rimachin.
41008001	Shuc puncha, achca runacuna Jesusta catishpa tantarinucpi, micuna illacpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata cayashpa nirca:
41008002	Cai runacunamanta llaquirinimi. Ña quimsa punchata ñucahuan tiyanun; micunata mana charinun.
41008003	Mana carashpa paicunata cachacpi, ñanpipi sanpayashpa, mana puri ushanunca. Huaquincuna carumanta shamunurca mari.
41008004	Yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Cai runa illac panpapi, ¿maimanta paicunata cararinca?
41008005	Jesus paicunata tapurca: —¿Mashna tantata charinquichic? —Canchislla— ninurca,
41008006	Chashna ninucpi uyashpa, Jesus runacunata allpapi tiyarichirca. Huasha, tantacunata japishpa, Diosta pacrachurca. Chai huasha, tantacunata paquishpa, yachachishcacunaman curca, paicuna runacunata carancapac.
41008007	Ansa yacu aichatapash charinurca. Diosta pacrachushpa, yachachishcacunaman curca "runacunata caraichic" nishpa.
41008008	-
41008009	Sacsacta micunurca. Puchushcata pallashpa, canchis ashancata juntachinurca. Micuccuna chuscu huarancashi canurca. Jesus paicunata huasiman cacharca.
41008010	Huasha, yachachishcacunantin canuapi Dalmanuta nishca llactaman rirca.
41008011	Fariseocuna Jesus-huan piñarishpa rimarincapac shamunurca. Paita camashpa ninurca: —Jahua pachapi mana raipacta rurai ñucanchic ricuncapac.
41008012	Rimanucpi, Jesus jahuaman ricushpa, "ai" nishpa, paicunata nirca: —Imaraicu cai runacuna shuc mana raipacta mañanun? Shuc mana raipacta mana cui tucununca.
41008013	Paicunata saquishpa, canuapi cutillata yaicushpa, chinpaman rirca.
41008014	Yachachishcacuna tantata apanata cuncarinushca carca. Shucllata canuapi charinurca.
41008015	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Fariseocunapac levadurata yuyanquichic; Herodespac levadurata yuyanquichic.
41008016	Jesus chashna nicpi, yachachishcacuna paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —Chaita nin ñucanchic tantata mana apamushcaraicu.
41008017	Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¿Imaraicu "tantata mana charinchic" nishpa rimaranquichic? ¿Chaira manachu atipanquichic, manachu yachanquichic?
41008018	¿Rinriyuc cashpallata manachu uyanquichic? ¿Ñahuiyuc cashpallata manachu ricunquichic? ¿Yuyai illacchu canquichic!
41008019	Ñuca pichca tantallahuan pichca huaranca runacunata carashcapi, mashna ashancata puchuscacunahuan juntachircanquichic? —Chunca ishcai— ninurca. —
41008020	Canchis tantahuan chuscu huaranca runacunata carashcapi, mashna ashancata puchushcahuan juntachircanquichic? —Canchis— ninurca.
41008021	Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —¿Chaira manachu atipanquichic?
41008022	Betsaida nishca llactaman pactanushcapi, shuc ñausa runata Jesupacman pushamunurca, "paita llancapai" nishpa.
41008023	Jesus paita maquimanta aisashpa, llacta canchaman pusharca. Paipac ñahuicunata tiucahuari jucuchishpa, paipac jahuapi maquita churashpa, paita tapurca: —
41008024	¿Imatapash ricunquichu? Ñausa runa ansata ricuncapac callarishpa, nirca: —Runacunata puricuc yuracuna shina ricucuni.
41008025	Chashna nicpi, Jesus cutillata maquita paipac ñahuipi churarca. Ñausa runaca alli ricurca, alliyachishca saquirirca, carumanta tucuita allita ricucurca.
41008026	Jesus paita huasiman cacharca nishpa: —Amallapash llactaman yaicuichu.
41008027	Chaimanta llucshishpa, Jesus yachachishcacunantin Cesarea Filipo llactacunaman rirca. Ñanpita paicunata tapurca: —¿Imata runacuna ñacàmanta rimanun?
41008028	Cutipanurca: —Huaquincuna "Bautisac Juanmi" ninun; huaquincuna "Eliasmi" ninun; shuccuna "shuc profetami" ninun.
41008029	Chashria ninucpi, Jesus cutillata tapurca: —Cancunaca pimi nishpata yuyanquichic ñucata? Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Can Mesiasmi canqui.
41008030	Jesus paicunata sinchita rimarca nishpa: —Chaita pitapash ama rimaichichu.
41008031	Chai huasha nirca: —Ñuca llaquichi tucuna cani. Rucucuna, pacriyaya apucuna yachaccunantin ñucata chicninunca, ñucata huañuchinunca. Chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causarishami.
41008032	Chai tucunamanta pasacta rimarca. Chashnapi, Pedro chicanman Jesusta pushashpa, paita piñashpa rimai callarirca.
41008033	Jesus ticrashpa, yachachishcacunaman ricushpa, Pedrota piñarca nishpa: —Ñucamanta anchuri, supai, Canpac yuyaicuna mana Diospacchu, runapacmi.
41008034	Tucui chaipi tiyaccunata cayashpa, Jesus rimarca nishpa: —Maicanpash ñucata catinata munacpi, quiquinpac munaita saquichun; crusta aparishpa, ñucata catichun.
41008035	Maicanpash causaita tarinayashpa, chaita chincachincami. Ranti, quiquinpac causaita ñucamanta nuca rimashcamantapash chincachishpa, causaita tarincami.
41008036	¿Imata yapachin shuc runa cai pachata yapachishpa, causaita chincachicpi?
41008037	¿Imatata cunca shuc runa paipac causai rantimanta?
41008038	Maicanpash ñucamanta ñuca rimashcamantapash pincaricpi cai mana inic juchasapa runacuna ñaupacpi, cai RUNApash paimanta piricarinca, paipac Yayapacpi sumacyachi tucushpa angelcunahuan shamuna puncha.
41009001	"Caipi tiyaccunamanta huaquincuna chaira mana huañushpa, Diospac pachata jatun ushaihua shamushcata ricununca.
41009002	Sucta puncha huasha, Jesus Pedrota, Juanta, Jacobota pushashpa, paicunahuanlla shuc jahua urcuman sicarca. Paicuna ricuranucpi, Jesus shuc laya tucurca.
41009003	Paipac churana chiuclla ricurirca, yuraclla tucurca. Manapí cai pachapi chashna yuracyachina ushan.
41009004	Chaipi Moises-huan Elias-huan ricurimunurca Jesus-huan rimarishpa.
41009005	Pedro chaita ricushpa nirca: —Yachachic, allimi caipi saquirincapac. Quimsa tanputa rurashun: canpac shuc, Moisespac shuc, Eliaspac shuc.
41009006	Yapa mancharishpa, ima rimacushcata mana yacharcachu.
41009007	Cuncaimanta shuc puyu paicunata quillparca. Puyumanta shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: —Caimi ñuca llaquishca churi, paita uyana canquichic.
41009008	Huasha, muyuilla ricunucpi, Jesus sapalla shayararca; shuccuna illanurca.
41009009	Urcumanta uraicucunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama pitapash cunan ricushcata rimaichichu cai RUNA huañushcacunamanta causarinacama. Chai shimita allita yuyaipi huacaichinurca. Paicunapura tapurinurca: —¿Ima chari canca "Huañushcacunamanta causarina" nishca?
41009011	Chashnapi Jesusta tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu quillcata yachaccuna "Elias ñaupacta shamuna can" nishpa ninun?
41009012	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Shuti, Elias ñaupacta shamunca tucuita allichincapac. ¿Quillcashcacuna imata cai RUNAmanta ninun? "Cai RUNA yapa llaquirínca, millashcami canca" nishpa ninun.
41009013	Ñucaca cancunata nini: Elias ña shamurca, runacunaca paicuna munashcata paihuan ruranurca. Chashnami quillcashcacunapi quillcara tìyarca.
41009014	Yachachishcacuna tiyashcamah ticranucpi, achca runa paicuna muyucta tiyanurca. Huaquin quillcata yachaccunapash paicunahuan piñarishpa rimariranurca.
41009015	Jesusta ricushpa runacuna mancharishpa, paita tupancapac callpanurca.
41009016	Jesus paicunata tapurca: —¿Imatata rimarishcanquichic?
41009017	Chaicunamanta shuc runa hirca: —Yachachic, ñuca churita pushamurcani; shuc millai supai paita japishca; mana rimana ushan.
41009018	Chai supai paita allpapi urmachin, shimimanta putscuta llucshichin, quiruta mucuri– chin, huañushca shina saquichin. Can yachachishcacunaman mañarcani supaita llucshichincapac, rantimana ushanurcachu.
41009019	Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: –¡Mana inic runacuna! ¿Imuracama cancunahuan tiyasha? ¿Imuracama cancunata apmsha? Huanprata pushamuichic.
41009020	Nicpi, pushamunurca. Jesusta ricushcallapita supai huanprata japishpa, sinchita cushpachishpa, paita allpapi ñahuihuan rumachirca. Huanpraca putscuta shitashpa, allpapi cushparishpa siricurca.
41009021	Jesus yayata tapurca: —¿Imuramanta chashna tucurca? Painirca: —Huahua cashcamanta.
41009022	Huaquin cuti ninapi yacupipash paita shitan huañuchincapac. Can imatapash rurana ushashpa, ñucamanta llaquiripai, ñucanchicta yanapai.
41009023	Rimaepi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¿Imaraicu "can imatapash rurana ushacpi" nishpa ninqui? Inic runa tucuita ushan,
41009024	Chaita uyashpa, chai runa caparishpa nirca: —Ininimi, ñuca inishcata sinchicuchipai.
41009025	Jesus runacuna tantaricushcata ricushpa, supaita nirca: —Shimi illac, upa rinri supai, canta nini: Cai huanpramanta llucshi, ama cuti paipi yaicunquichu.
41009026	Supaica, runata sinchita cushpachishpa, caparishpa llucshirca. Huanpra huañushca shina saquirirca. Huañushca shina ricuricpi, "huañushcami" huaquincuna ninurca.
41009027	Jesus paita maquimanta japishpa jatarichicpi, shayarirca.
41009028	Huasiman pactanucpi, yachachishcacuna Jesusta pacalla tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu paita shitana mana usharcanchic?
41009029	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cai sami supaicuria Diosta mañashcallahuan jichurin.
41009030	Chaimanta llucshishpa, Galilea llactacunapi mana llutarishpa rinurca. Jesus "pipash ama yachachun" nishpa rirca,
41009031	paihuan tiyaccunata yachachirarca mari cashna nishpa: —Cai RUNA paita chicniccunapi japi tucunca. Paita huañuchinunca. Quimsa punchapi causarinca.
41009032	Paicuna chai shimicunata mana atipanushcachu. Mana atipashpapash, tapunata manchanurca.
41009033	Cafarnaun llactaman pactanushcapi, huasipi tiyacushpa Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Imata ñanpipi rimaricurcanquichic?
41009034	Paicuna chunlla tucunurca, Ñanpipi maican ñaupac canca rimarinushcarca mari.
41009035	Chashna cacpi, Jesus tiyarishpa, chunca ishcaicunata rimarca nishpa: —Ñaupac tucunata munac runa tucuicunamanta ura tucuchun, tucuicunata yanapac cachun.
41009036	Shuc huahuata cayashpa, paicunapac ñaupacpi shayachirca. Huasha, huahuata ucllashpa, paicunata rimarca: —Ñuca shutipi cashna huahuata chasquic runa ñucallatata chasquin. Ñucata chásquicca ñucata cachamushca Yaya Diosta chasquin.
41009038	Juan Jesusta nirca: —Yachachic, shuc runata tuparcanchic, canpac shutipi supaicunata jichurarca. Paita "ama chashna raichu" nircanchic, pai mana mari ñucanchic bulamanta earca,
41009039	Jesus paita nirca: —Ama jarcaichichu. Ñuca shutipi mana raipacta rurac runa, ñucata mana chicnincachu.
41009040	Ñucanchicta mana chicnicca ñucanchihuan can.
41009041	Maicanpash ñuca shutipi shuc yacu basota cancunata upiachicpi, cancuna Cristota catic cashcamanta, cuyana illac mana saquirincachu. ¡Shuti nini!
41009042	Huasha nirca: —Maicanpash cai ñucata huahua shina inic runacunata juchaman aisacpi, alli canman paipac cuncapi shuc jatun rumita huatashpa ñucñu yacuman shitai tucuchun.
41009043	-
41009047	Canpac maqui canta juchapi urmachicpi, chai maquita piti. Jahua pachaman pullu maqui yaicuna ashtahuan alli canca, ishcai maquiyuc ucupachaman rinamanta. Chaipi nina mana tucurinchu. Canpac chaqui canta juchaman aisacpi, chaita piti. Jahua pachaman pullu chaqui yaicuna ashtahuan alli canca ishcai chaquihuan ucupachaman rinamanta. Canpac ñahui canta juchaman aisacpi, chaita surcui. Jahuá pachaman shuclla ñahuiyuc rina ashtahuan alli canca ishcai ñahuiyuc ucupachaman rinamanta.
41009048	Chaipi runapac aichata micuc curu mana huañun, ninapash mana tucurinchu.
41009049	Tucuicuña ninahuan pichai tucununca.
41009050	Cachi alli can. Cachi upayacpi, ¿imahuan chaita mishquiyachinunca? Cachita cancunapi charichic, cancunapura ganaslla causaichic.
41010001	Chaimanta rishpa, Jesus Judea suyuman pactarca, Jordan chinpaman. Achca runa cutillata ñanpipi tantarinucpi, paicunata yachachicurcar paipac yachai.
41010002	Fariseocuna Jesusta camashpa tapunurca: —Shuc runa paipac huarmita jichucpi allichu?
41010003	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Moises imata cancunata rimarca?
41010004	Cutipanurca: —Moises nirca: "Apucuna ñaupacpi maqui llushpirina quillcata quillcashpa, huarmita jichuna usharin".
41010005	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna manalli runa cashcaraicu Moises chaita rimarca.
41010006	Ranti, cai pacha callarishcapi, Dios mnata cari-huarmi rurarca.
41010007	Chairaicu, cari paipac yaya-mamata saquishpa, paipac huarmihuan llutarinami.
41010008	Ishcaintin shuclla tucununca. Ña mana ishcaichu, shuclla tucunun.
41010009	Chashna cacpi, Dios huatashcata runa ama pascachun.
41010010	Ña huasiman rishpa, yachachishcacuna pai rimashcamanta cutittata tapunurca.
41010011	Jesus paicunata nirca; —Maicanpash quiquin huarmita jichushpa shuc-huan llutaricpi, juchata ran.
41010012	Chashnallata, huarmipash quiquin carita jichushpa shuc-huan llutaricpi, juchata aparin.
41010013	Chai huasha, shuc huahuacunata Jesuspacman pushanurca, "canpac maquita paicunapac jahuapi churapai" nishpa. Ranti, yachachishcacuna paicunata piñanurca.
41010014	Chaita ricushpa, Jesus piñarishpa nirca: —Huahuacunata ñueapacman shamunata ama jatcaichichu. Jahua pacha paicuna shina caccunapac mari can.
41010015	Shuti cancunata nini: Diospac alli shimita huahua shina mana chasquic runa Diospac pachaman mana imura yaicuncachu.
41010016	Huasha, Jesus huahuacunata cayashpa, paicuna jahuapi maquita churashpa, paicunata bendisiarca.
41010017	Huasimanta llucshishcapi, shuc runa callpashpa shamurca. Jesus ñaupacpi cunacurishpa, paita tapurca: —Alli yachachic, ¿imata rana cani mana tucuric causaita charincapac?
41010018	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Imaraicu ñucata "alli" nishpa nihuanqui? Shucllami alli, Dios.
41010019	Canca Dios rurai nishcacunata yachanqui: "Runata ama huañuchinquichu. Ama juchallinquichu. Ama shuhuanquichu. Ama shucmanta llullashpa rimanquichu. Ama shuccunata umachinquichu. Canpac yayata mamatapash yupaichanqui".
41010020	Rimacpi uyashpa chai runa nirca: —Yachachic, chai tucuita huanpra cashcamanta pactachircani.
41010021	Jesus, chaita uyashpa, llaquishcahuan paiman ricurca. Huasha nirca: —Chaira shuc canta pishin: Tucui can charishcacunata catucri tsuntsu runacunaman cuyancapac. Chashna rashpa, jahua pachapi cullquiyuc tucunqui. Chai huasha, ñucahuan shamunqui.
41010022	Chai shimita uyashpa, chai runa llaquirirca. Llaquirishpa rircami, yapa cullquiyuc mari carca.
41010023	Pai riracpi, Jesus muyucta ricushpa, yachachishcacunata rimarca nishpa: —Cullquiyuccuna mana yaicunallachu canun Diospac pachapi.
41010024	Chai shimicunata uyashpa, yachachishcacuna yapa mancharinurca. Jesus cutillata nirca: —Churicuna, cullquita yuyaccuna yapa mana yaicunallachu canun Diospac pachapi.
41010025	Shuc camello nishca huihua tupulli jutcuta ashtahuan pasanalla canca, cullquiyuc runa Diospac pachaman yaicunamanta.
41010026	Paicuna, chaita uyashpa, ashtahuan mancharishpa, tapunurca nishpa: —¿Pitac quishpina ushanca?
41010027	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Runacunapac mana ushaipac can: ranti Dios tucuita ushan.
41010028	Chaita uyashpa Pedro nirca: —Ñucanchic tucui charishcata canta catincapac saquircanchic.
41010029	Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Maicanpash ñucaraicu, Dios rimashca cushi shimiraicupash quiquin huasita, huauquicunata, panicunata, mamata, yayata, churicunata, allpacunata saquishpa,
41010030	cai pachallapita shuc patsac pai saquishcamanta ashtahuan cui tucunca: huasicuna, panicuna, yayacuna, mamacuna, churicuna, allpacuna. Chai tucuita cunan punchacunapi llaquicunahuan pacta japinca, huasha punchacunapi mana tucuric causaita chasquinca.
41010031	Chashnapash, achcacuna cunan ñaupaccuna cashpa, puchucaicuna tucununca; cunan puchucaicuna cashpa, ñaupaccuna tucununca.
41010032	Jerusalenman sicashpa puricunucpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata ñaupashpa rirarca. Paicuna yapa mancharishpa catinurca; paicunahuan shamuccunapash mancharinurca. Jesus chunca ishcaicunata chicanman cayashpa, paiman tucunca rashcata huillarca,
41010033	nishpa: —Uyahuaichic: Jerusalenman riranchic. Cai RUNA pacriyaya apucunaman, camachic quillcata yachaccunaman cui tueunca. Paita huañuchina can nishpa ninunca; mana judio caccunaman paita chasquichinunca.
41010034	Paita asinunca, tiucanunca, llipachinunca, huañuchinunca. Chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causarinca.
41010035	Cebedeopac ishcai churicuria Santiagohuan Juanhuan Jesusta ninurca: —Yachachic, ñucanchic mañanca rashcata rurapai.
41010036	Jesus tapurca: —¿Imatata munanquichic?
41010037	Ninurca: —Ñucanchicta canhuan jahua pachapi shucta alli maquiman, shucta lluqui maquiman tiyarichipanqui.
41010038	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna mañahuashcata mana yachanquichic. ¿Ñuca apana llaquicunata apanata ushanquichichu? ¿Ñuca huañuna huañuihuan huañunata munanquichichu?
41010039	Cutipashpa ninurca: —Ushanchicmi, munanchicmi. Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Shuti pacha, ñuca apana llaquicunata apanquichic; ñuca huañuna, huañuillahuan huañunquichic.
41010040	Ranti, ñuca alli maquiman tiyarinata, ñuca lluqui maquiman tiyarinata mana cuipacchu cani, ñuca Yaya acllashcacunaman chaita cunca.
41010041	Shuc yachachishcacuna, chaita uyashpa, Santiagota Juanta piñanurca.
41010042	Jesus paicunata cayashpa nirca; —Cai pacha apucuna runacunata llaquichinun, piñashcahuan paicunata rimaccuna can,
41010043	Cancunagura mana chashnachu canca. Ranti, maicanpash shuccunamantayalli canata munac paicunata sirichun.
41010044	Chashnallata, ñaupac canata munac tucuicunata sirbichun.
41010045	Cai RUNApash mana "sirbihuaichic" nishpa shamurca; shuccunata sirbincapac shamurca; tucuicunapac dibita pagancapac shamurca.
41010046	Chaimanta rishpa, Jerico llactaman pactanurca. Jesus chai llactamanta llucshicucpi yachachisheacunantìn yanca shamushcacunantin, shuc ñausa runa Bartimeo shutiyuc, Timeopac churi: —Imatapash cuyahuaichic" nishpa tiyacurca.
41010047	Chai ñausa runa, Jesus shamucucta uyashpa, caparirca: —Davidpac churi, ñucamanta llaquiripai.
41010049	Jesus, caparishcata uyashpa, shayarishpa, nirca: —Ñausa runata pus hamuichic. Paita cayashpa ninurca: —Cariyanqui, shayari, Jesus canta cayarani
41010050	Ñausa runa, chaita uyashpa, jahua churanata shitashpa, Jesuspacman shamurca.
41010051	Jesus paita tapurca: —¿Imatata munanqui? Ñausa runa cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca ñahuita allichipai, ñuca ricunata munani
41010052	Jesus paita nin: —Rilla, can inishcamanta alliyashca canqui. Chai ucullapi ricuncapac callarirca; Jesusta catishpa rirca.
41011001	Jerusalen llacta mayanman rirashcapi, Betfage Betania llactacuna mayanpi, Olivos urcu chaquipi, Jesus ishcai yachachishcacunata cacharca nishpa: —
41011002	Cancuna ñahuipura tiyac uchilla llactaman richic. Chaiman pactashpa, shuc burro nishca huihuata huatashcata tarinquichic. Pai jahuapi chaira manapí sicarcachu. Pascashpa apamunquichic.
41011003	Maicanpash cancunata nicpi: "Imaraicu chashna ruranquichic" nishpa, cutipanquichic: "Apu paita mutsunmi, huasha cutichinca".
41011004	Paicuna rishpa, burrota shuc puncupi huatashcata tarinurca callepi.
41011005	Pascaranucpi, chaipi tiyaccuna ninurca: —¿Imaraicu burrota pascanquichic?
41011006	Yachachishcacuna Jesus rimashca shina cutipanurca. Chaita uyashpa: —Apaichiclla-ninurca.
41011007	Jesuspacman burrota pushanurca. Paicunaca churanacunata burro jahuapi mantashpa, Jesusta sicachinurca.
41011008	Huaquincuna pai rina ñanpipi churanacunata mantanurca; huaquincuna, yura pallcata cuchushpa, ñanpipi mantanurca.
41011009	Ñaupac riccuna huashapi shamuccunapash Jesusta catishpa caparinurca nishpa: —Apu Dios shutipi shamuc bendisiashca cachun.
41011010	Ñucanchic yaya David apu tucuna pacha pactamuran; bendisiashca cachun. Apu Dios yapaichashca cachun.
41011011	Jesus Jerusalenman yaicushpa, Diospac huasiman rirca. Tucuita ricushca huasha, ña chishiyacpi, yachachishcacunantin Betania llactaman rirca.
41011012	Cayantiman, Betaniamanta llucshishpa, yarcachirca.
41011013	Carupi shuc pancayuc higuera nishca yurata ricushpa, chaicama rirca muyuyucchu chari canca yuyashpa. Ricúcpica, pancalla tiyarca, mana muyu aparina pachachu carca.
41011014	Jesus yurata nirca: —Manapí canmanta muyuta micuchun. Yachachishcacuna chai rimashcata uyanurca.
41011015	Jerusalenman pactanurca; Jesus Diospac huasiman rirca. Chaipi catucuccunata ranticuccunata chaimanta callpachirca. Culquita turcaccunapac mesacunata urmachirca. Urpita catuccunatapash jichurca.
41011016	Chai huasi ucuta imatapash apashpa rincapac mana saquircachu.
41011017	Paicunata camachishpa nirca: —¿Manachu quillacara tiyan: "Ñuca huasi Diospac huasi canca tucui runacunapac? Ranti, cancuna shuhua huasita chaita rarcanquichic.
41011018	Pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash, chaita uyashpa, imata rashpa paita huañuchishun nishpa rimarinurca. Ranti, paita manchanurca, tucui runacuna pai yachachishcata cushiyashcahuan uyanurca mari.
41011019	Tutayacpi, Jesus yachachishcacunantin llactamanta rirca.
41011020	Cayantiman, tutamanta, ñanpita rishpa, higuera yurata chaquirishcata ricunurca.
41011021	Pedro yuyarishpa nirca: —Yachachic, riqui, can piñashpa rimashca yura chaquirishcami.
41011022	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Diosta inichic.
41011023	Maicanpash cai urcuta nicpi: "Chaimanta anchuri, ñucñu yacuman shitari" nishpa, paipac shuncupi chashna tucunca rashcata shinchita inicpi, pai inishca shina tucunca.
41011024	Shuti pacha cancunata nini: Tucui cancuna Dios-man mañashcata "ña chasquircanchie" yuyashpa, chasquinquichic.
41011025	Cancuna Dios-huan rimarishpa, shuccunahuan imatapash charishpa, ñaupacta quishpichichic. Chashna racpi, cancunapac Yaya Dios cancuna juchallishcata quishpichinca.
41011026	Ranti, cancuna shuccunata mana quishpichicpi, cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya mana quishpichincachu caricunapac juchacunata.
41011027	Jerusalenman ticranurca. Jesus Diospac huasipi puricucpi, pacriyaya apucuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna judio apucunapash paipacman shamushpa, tapunurca nishpa: –
41011028	¿Ima ushaihuan can rashcata ranqui? ¿Pimi canta chaita rancapac rimarca?
41011029	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñucapash cancunata shuc shimita tapunca rani. Cancuna cutipahuacpi, ñucapash ima ushaihuan chaita rashcata cancunata rimasha.
41011030	Rimahuaichic: ¿Pimi Juanta cacharca bautisancàpac? ¿Dioschu paita cácharca? ¿Runacunachu paita cachanurca? Cutipahuaichic.
41011031	Chashna tàpucpi Jesus, paicunapura rimanacunurca nishpa: —Ñucanchic "Dios paita cacharca" nicpi, pai ninca: "Imaràicu paita mana inircanquichic".
41011032	"Runacuna paita cachaniurca" nishpa rimashün ima chari. Chashna cutipancapac manchanurca, Juan Diospacmanta shamushcata tucui runacuna yachanurca mari.
41011033	Chashna cacpi, Jesusta ninurca: —Mana yachanchichu. Jesus nirca: —Ñucapash ima ushaihuan chaicunata rurashcata mana rimashachu.
41012001	Chai huasha, Jesus yachachina shimicunata rimai callarirca cashna nishpa: —Shuc runa uva nishca chacrata rurarca. Chaita quinchahuan jarcashca. Uva muyucunata chahuancapac, allpata allashpa, shuc jutcuta rurarca. Chapana huasita shayachirca. Shuc runacunaman chacrata saquirca pallana pacha pallashcahuan pagancapac. Chaipac huasha caruman rirca.
41012002	Pallana pacha pactaricpi, chacra amu shuc luncuta cacharca mañachishcacunapacman, paipacta niañancapac.
41012003	Paicuna, chai luncuta japishpa, llipachishpa, maquillahuan cachanurca.
41012004	Shuc luncutapash cacharca. Paita umapi huactashpa, piñashpa rimanurca.
41012005	Shuctapash cacharca; paita huañuchinurca. Chaipac huasha, shuc achcacunata cacharca; paicunamanta huaquincunata huactanurca; huaquincunata huañuchinurca.
41012006	Chaira shuc tiyarca, paipac churi. Paitapash cacharca, "ñuca llaquishca churita uyanuncami: nishpa yuyarishpa.
41012007	Chai runacuna paicunapura rimanacunurca nishpa: —Chaimi chacra amupac churi, amu charishcacunata japina cac. Paita huañuchishunchic, pai japinca rashcacunata amuyancapac.
41012008	Paita japishpa, huañuchishpa, paipac ayata canchaman shitanurca. Rimahuaichic:
41012009	¿Imata ruranca chacra amu? Pai shamucpi, chai llancaccunata huañuchinca, chacrataca shuccunaman saquinca.
41012010	¿Manachu quillcacuna nishcata uyarcanquichic? Cashna ninun: "Huasita shayachiccuna jichushca rumi huasi pata chaqui tucurca.
41012011	Chaita apu Dios rurarca; sumac ricurin".
41012012	Apucuna, Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, "ñucanchiraicu chashna rimarca" nishpa, paita huañuchinata munanurca; ranti, runacunata manchashpa mana ushanurca. Jesusta saquishpa rinurca.
41012013	Chai huasha, huaquin fariseocunata Herodesta caticcunantin Jesuspacman cachanurca, paita ima panta shimipipash rimachishpa cautsayachincapac. Jesuspacman shamushpa ninurca: —Yachachic, can shutita rimac cashcata yachanchic. Manapita manchanqui. Jahuata ricuricllahuan runata mana taripanquichu. Diospac ñanpita yachachinqui. Rimai: ¿Gubirnu cullquita Roma llactapi causac incaman pagana allichu? ¿Manachu alli? ¿Paganachu? ¿Manachu pagana? ¿Imata ninqui?
41012015	Jesus paicunapac manalli yuyaita ricsishpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu ñuca nishcapi japinayahuanquichic? Shuc cullquita ricuchihuaichic ñuca ricuncapac.
41012016	Cullquita ricuchinurca. Jesus chaita ricushpa tapurca: —¿Pipacta can cai ñahui? ¿Caipi tiyac shuti pipacta can? Tapucpi uyashpa cutipanurca: —Roma llactapi causac incapac.
41012017	Jesus nirca: —Incapacta incaman cuichic; Diospacta Diosman cuichic. Mancharishpa pai cutipashcata uyanurca.
41012018	Chai huasha, huaquin saduceos nishcacuna (paicuna "huañushcacuna mana causarinuncachu" ninun) Jesusta tapunurca:
41012019	Yachachic, Moises quillcashcacunapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Shuc huarmiyuc runa huahua illac, huañucpi, paipac huauqui chai huarmihuan sahuarichun. Paicunapac huahua huañushcapac shutita apanca",
41012020	Cunan allita uyanqui: Canchis huauquipura tiyanurca. Rucu huauqui shuc huarmita japirca: huahua illac huañurca.
41012021	Huasha paipac quipa chai huarmillahuan sahuarirca, huahua illac huañushpa.
41012022	Tucui canchis huauquipura chai huarmillahuan huasha huasha sahuarinurca, huahua illac huañushpa. Puchucaipi huarmipash huañurca.
41012023	Causarina punchapi chai huarmi pipac huarmi canca tucui canchis paihuan sahuarishca cacpi?
41012024	Chashna ninucpi, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Pantäcunquichic quillcashcacunata mana yachashpa, Diospac ushaita maña ricsishpa.
41012025	Huañushcacuna causarishca huasha, caricuna huarmicunapash mana sahuarinuncachu." Jahua pachapi tiyac angelcuna shina canuñca.
41012026	¿Huañushcacuna causarinamantaca: manachu ricurcanquichic Moises quillcashcacunapi? Ruparashcai yuramanta Dios Moisesta rimashpa nkca: "Ñuca Abranpac Dios; Isaacpac Dios, Jacobpac Diosmi cani".
41012027	Mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu; causaccunapac Diosmi. Cancunaca pantacunquichic.
41012028	Shuc camachic quillcata yachac, Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, alli cutipashcata, uyashpa, paita tapurca nishpa: —Tucui rurai nishcacunamanta maican ñaupac can?
41012029	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñaupac rurai nishca caimi: "Uyaichic, Israel runacuna: Apunchic Dios shuclla Diosmi.
41012030	Canpac Apu Diosta tucui shuncuhuan, tucui almahuan, tucui yuyaihuan, tucui ushaihuan llaquina canqui". Chaimi ñaupac rurai nishca.
41012031	Chaita catic chai shinallata can, caimi: "Shuccunata can quiquinta shina llaquina canqui". Chaicunamanta yalli jatun rurai nishca mana tiyanchu.
41012032	Chai runa Jesus rimashcata uyashpa nirca: —Allimi, yachachic, shutita rimarcanqui: Shuclla Dios tiyan.
41012033	Diosta tucui shuncuhuan, tucui yuyaihuan, tucui almahuan, tucui ushaihuan llaquinami; shuccunataca quiquinta shina llaquinami. Chaimi huañuchishca huacramanta yalli alli, tucui camaricunamanta yalli alli.
41012034	Jesus, chai quillcata yachac alli yuyaihuan rimashcata uyashpa, paita nirca: —Diospac pachamanta mana caruchu canqui. Chai huasha mancharishpa manapí imatapash Jesusta tapunata yuyarca.
41012035	Jesus Diospac huasipi yachachishpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu camachic quillcata yachaccuna Mesias Davidpac churi cashcata ninun?
41012036	Davidllata, santo Samai paita rimachicpi, nirca: "Apu ñuca aputa rimarca nishpa: Ñuca alli maquiman tiyari, ñuca canta chicniccunata atinacama".
41012037	Davidllata Mesiasta apu nicpi, imashna Davidpac churi canca? Runacunaca munaihuan paita uyaranurca.
41012038	Huasha, Jesus yachachishpa nirca: —Camachic quillcata yachaccunata yuyanquichic. Paicuna suñi churanata churarina munanun. Callecunapi salurai tucunatamunanun.
41012039	Tantarina huasicunapi ñaupac tiyarinata mashcanun. Chashnallata raimi micunapi ñaupac tiyarinata mesapi mashcanun.
41012040	Huaccha huarmicunapac imacunata shuhuanun, paicunata umachishpa "cancunamanta Diosta mañashun" nishpa. Paicuna sinchi ñacachi tucununca.
41012041	Shuc puncha, Jesus Diospac huasipi tiyarca, Diosman cushca cullquita huacaichina mala mayanpi. Chaipi tiyarishpa, runacuna chai malapi cullquita churacushcata ricurarca.
41012042	Cullquiyuccuna achcata churaccuna carca. Shuc huaccha huarmi shamushpa, mana imayuc cashpa, ishcai cullquishituta churarca.
41012043	Chaita ricushpa, Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cai huaccha huarmi tucuicunamanta yalli churarca.
41012044	Paicuna puchushcamanta mari cunurca; ranti, cai huaccha huarmi pai charishcata illacta curca.
41013001	Jesus Diospac huasimanta llueshicucpi, shuc pai yachachishca runa nirca: —¡Yachachic, riqui, ima jatun rumicuna, ima sumac ricuric huasicuna!
41013002	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Cai jatun sumac ricuric huasita ricunquichic? Shuc rumi shuc rumi jahuapi mana saquirincachu, illacta tulachishcami canca.
41013003	Puricushpa, Diospac huasi ñahuipura tiyac Olivos urcuman pactanurca. Jesus chaipi shayarirca. Pedro, Jacobo, Juan, Andres paipacman mayanyarishpa, pacalla tapunurca nishpa: —
41013004	¿Imura chai tucunca? ¿Ima laya ricurina ricurinca chai tucunca racucpi?
41013005	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Yuyanquichic ama umachi tucuncapac.
41013006	Achca runacuna ñuca shutipi shamununca mari, "ñuca Cristomi cani" nishpa. Achcacunata umachinunca.
41013007	Macanacui tiyan uyaric– pi, ama mancharinquichichu. Ñaupacta chai tucunami can, ranti chaira mana tucurina pachachu.
41013008	Llacta shuc llactahuan macanacununca. Shuc laya runacuna shuc laya runacunahuan huañuchinacununca. Huaquin suyucunapi allpa cuyurinacuna tiyanca; jatun yaricaipash tiyanca. Chaicunahuan llaquicuna callarinuncami.
41013009	"Allichirishca caichic. Taripai tucuncapac japishca canquichic. Ñucaraicu jatun apucunapacman pushai tucunqui— chic paicuna ñaupacpi ñucamanta rimancapac.
41013010	Chaira tucurina mana pactaricpi, Diospac cushi shimita tucui llactacunapi uyachina can.
41013011	Cancunata apucunapacman pushanucpi, cancuna rimanca rashcata ama yuyanquichichu. Chai ucullapi Dios cancunaman rimachishcata rimanquichic. Mana cancunallata rimanquichic, santo Samai rimanca.
41013012	"Shuc runa paipac huauquita huañuchincapac japichinca. Shuc yaya paipac churita japichinca huañuchinuchun nishpa. Chashnallata churicuna yayacunata chicnishpa jatarinunca, paicunata huañuchincapac.
41013013	Cancunaca tucuicunapi chicni tucunquichic ñucaraicu. Maicanpash ñucata catishpa mana sanpayacpi quishpincami.
41013014	"Mapayachic ricurinca mana tiyana cashcapi. (Cai quillcata catishpa yuyanquichic). Chai tucucpi, Judeapi tiyaccuna urcucunaman miticunuchun.
41013015	Huasi jahua patapi tiyaccuna ama uraicunuchun imatapash apancapac.
41013016	Chacrapi tiyaccuna ama huasiman ticranuchun churanacunata apancapac.
41013017	¡Ailla huicsayuc huarmicuna, chuchuchic huarmicunapash!
41013018	Chai miticuna ama tamia pachapi tucuchun Diosta mañaichic.
41013019	Chai punchacuna llaqui punchacuna canunca mari. Chashna llaqui cai pacha callarishcamanta mana tiyarcachu, manapash tiyancachu.
41013020	Dios chai punchacunata mana curullachicpi, mana pipash quishpirinman. Chashnapash, Dios, pai acllashcacunata llaquishcaraicu, chai punchacunata curullachinca.
41013021	"Chashnapi, maicanpash shamushpa nicpi: "Riqui, caipimi Cristo, chaipimi Cristo", ama paita uyanquichichu.
41013022	Llulla cristocuna ricurimununca, Diospacmanta shamuni nishpa llullashpa rimaccuna jatarinunca; mana raipaccunata rurashpa, runacunata umachinunca. Usharicpi, acliashcacunatapash umaphinunman.
41013023	¡Yuyanqüietíic!. Ñaupacta chai tucuita huillashcani.
41013024	"Chai llaqui punchacuna huasha, inti yana tucunca, Quilla llantuyanca.
41013025	Estrellacuna jahua pachamañta urmanunca. Jahua pachapash chucchurinca.
41013026	Chaipi, Jesucristo sinchi ushaihuan puyucunapi shamurac ricurinca.
41013027	Pai angelcunata cachanca tucui acllashcacunata tantachincapac.
41013028	Higuera yurapi tucushcamanta yachaichic. Paipac pallca llulluyacpi, mushu panca tucyacpi, "rupai pacha pactamuran" ninquichic.
41013029	Chashnallata, cancuna cunan ñuca rimashca tucushcata ricushpa, pai pactamurashcata yachanquichic.
41013030	Shuti cancunata nini: Cunan causaccuna chaira mana huañunucpi, ñuca rimashca pactarincami.
41013031	Jahuapacha cai pachapash tucurinuncami; ranti, ñupa rimashca shimi mana chincarincachu.
41013032	"Chashnapash ima puncha, ima pacha chai tucunca, manapí yachan. Angelcunapash, Dios Churipash mana yachanchu, Dios Yayallami yachan.
41013034	"Shuc caruman ric runahuan shina tucunca. Chai runa huasita ricuncapac luncucunata mincan. Caranman quiquin ruranata cun. Puncuta ricuccamata nin: "Chaparanqui".
41013035	Chashnallata cancunapash chaparaichic, huasi amu pactana pachata mana yachashpa. Chishita pactamunca chari; chaupi tuta chari; cari atallpa caparicpi chari; tutamanta chari.
41013036	Pai cuncaimanta shamushpa puñurashcata cancunata tupanman.
41013037	Cancunaman rimacushcata tucuicunaman huillani: Ricuralla causaichic.
41014001	Pascua raimipac, mana punquichishca tanta micuna punchapac ishcai puncha pishirca. Pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunahuan rimaricunurca imashnata Jesusta umachishpa japincapac; japishpa huañuchincapac.
41014002	Huaquin-cuna ninurca: —Raimi Puncha japincapac mana allichu, ama runacuna piñarishpa jatarincapac.
41014003	Shuc puncha, Jesus Simon shutiyuc sisu runapac huasipi micurarca. Micuracpi, shuc huarmi shamurca yapa balic asnac yacu butita apamushpa. Jesus tiyashcaman yaicushpa, butita paquishpa, asnac yacuta Jesuspac jahuapi tallirca.
41014004	Huaquincuna, chaita ricushpa, yapa piñarishpa, paicunapura ninurca: —¿Imaraicu chashna jichunun yapa balic asnac yacuta?
41014005	Rantichinucpi, quimsa patsacmanta yalli surcununman, tsunsu runacunaman cuncapac. Huarmitaca piñanurca.
41014006	Jesus nirca: —Ama quillachichichu cai huarmita. Casilla saquichic, allita rurarca mari.
41014007	Tsuntsucuna huiñai cancunahuan tiyanunca; cancuna munashcapi, paicunata yanapana ushanquichic; ranti, ñuca mana huiñai cancunahuan tiyashachu.
41014008	Cai huarmi pai ushashca tuputa rurarca. Ñuca aichata asnac yacuhuan armachirca panpancapac shina ñauparishpa.
41014009	Shuti cancunata nini: Maipipash cushi shimita huillanucpi, pai rashcatapash huillanunca paimanta yuyarishpa.
41014010	Chunca ishcaicunamantä shuc, Judas shutiyuc, pacriyaya apucunapacman rishpa, paicunahuan rimarishpa Jesusta japichincapac, "paita japichisha" nirca."
41014011	Paipac shimita uyashpa, pacriyaya apucuna cushiyanurca. "Cullquita cushcanqui" ninurca. Chai pachamanta, ima puncha alli canca Jesusta japichincapac Judas yuyaricurca.
41014012	Mana punquichishca tantata micuna raimi ñaupac punchapi, cordero huañuchina pacha, Jesus yachachishcacuna paita tapunurca: —¿Maiprpascua micunata allichincapac munanqui?
41014013	Tapunucpi uyashpa, Jesus ishcai yachachishcacunata cacharca cashna nishpa: —Llactaman richic. Shuc yacu mancata apac runata tarinquichic; paita catishpa richic.
41014014	Pai yaicushca huasi amuta ninquichic: "Yachachic nin: ¿Maipitac can micuna huasi ñuca yachachishcacunahuan pascuata micuncapae?".
41014015	Pai jahua patapi shuc jatun ucuta ricuchinca tucui ñucanchic mutsushcahuan. Chaipi micunata allichinquichic.
41014016	Rimacpi, yachachishcacuna rinurca. Llactaman pactashpa, Jesus rimashca shina tarinurca. Pascua micunata allichinurca.
41014017	Tutayacpi, Jesus paipac chunca ishcai runacunahuan shamurca.
41014018	Micucushpa nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Shuc ñucahuan micuc, ñucata japichinca ran huañuchincapac.
41014019	Chaita uyashpa, yapa llaquirinurca. Huasha huasha tapunurca: —¿Ñucachu cani?
41014020	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancunamanta shucmi can, ñuca callanamantallata micurac.
41014021	Cai RUNA rinca ran, quillcashcacuna paimanta rimashca pactarincapac. ¡Chai ñucata japichic runa mana pacarishca cashcapi alli canman!
41014022	Micucunucpi, Jesus tantata japirca; Diosta pacrachushpa, chaita paquirca, paicunaman curca nishpa: —Japichic, cai ñuca aichami can.
41014023	Huasha, shuc basota japishpa Diosta pacrachushpa, paicunaman curca, tucuicuna upianurca.
41014024	Paicunata nirca: —Cai ñuca yahuarmi, Dios-huan runacunahuan mushu cunacushca shimita ricuchic yahuar. Cai yahuar runacunamanta tallishcami canca.
41014025	Shuti cancunata nini: Binota ña mana upiashachu, ñuca Yaya huasipi mushu binota upianacama.
41014026	Taquishca huasha, Olivos urcuman rinurca.
41014027	Riranucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Tucui cancuna "yancamanta paita catinchic" nishpa rimanquichic cunan tuta. Quillcara mari tiyan: "Michicta huañuchishami, obejacuna chausiriñunca"
41014028	Chashnapash, ñuca causarishami; causarishpa, cancunata ñaupashpa, Galileaman risha.
41014029	Pedro chaita uyashpa nirca: —Tucuicuna canta jichunucpipash, ñuca canta catishami.
41014030	Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Shuti pacha canta nini: Cunan tuta cari atallpa chaira mana ishcai cuti caparicpi, can quimsa cuti ñucamanta "paita mana ricsinichu" nishpa ninqui.
41014031	Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Canhuan pacta huañuna cacpipash canta mana jichushachu. Tucui shuccunaca chaillatata rimanurca.
41014032	Chashna rimarishpa, Getsemani nishca panpaman pactanurca. Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Caipi tiyacuichic, ñuca Dios-huan rimarincapac racuni.
41014033	Chashna nishpa, Pedrota, Santiagota, Juanta pushashpa, yapa llaquirishcalla, mancharishcalla tucurca.
41014034	Chashna tucushpa, nirca: —Llaquirishpa huañunayahuan. Caipi saquirichic, ama puñuichichu.
41014035	Jesus chainiman purishpa, tuhuaman urmashpa, Diosta mañarca chai tuta tucunca rashcata paimanta anchuchincapac usharicpi.
41014036	Cashnami rimarca: —Yaya, can tucuita ushanqui, cai sinchi ñacarinata ñucamanta anchuchipai; ranti, ama ñuca munashca shina rurarichun, can munashca shina tucuchun.
41014037	Yachachishcacunapacman ticrashpa, puñurashcata paicunata tuparca, Pedrota nirca: —Simon, ¿puñuranquichu? ¿Shuc pachallapash manachu chapana usharcanqui?
41014038	Ama puñuichichu; chaparaichic, Diosta mañaichic juchanayai shamucpi ama juchallincapac. Shuti pacha, cancunapac yuyai sinchimi, ranti cancunapac aicha sanpami.
41014039	Chashna nishpa, cutillata Dios-huan rimarincapac rirca; ñaupa rimashca shimicunata rimarca.
41014040	Quimsa yachachishcacuna tiyashcaman ticrashpa, paicunata puñurashcata tuparca. Yapa puñunasyashpa, imata rimana mana yachanurcachu.
41014041	Quimsaniqui cuti rishpa, yachachishcacunata nirca: —¿Chaira puñuranquichic?
41014042	Shayarichic, jacuichic; ñucata japinca rac runa caipimi can.
41014043	Jesusí rimacucpi, Judas shamurca (pai chunca ishcaicu— namanta carca). Paihuan pacta shuc—runacuna shamunurca caspicunahuan, mircanucunahuan. Pacriyaya apucuha, camachic quilcata yachaccuna judio apucunapash chai runacunata cachamushca carca.
41014044	Judas paicuhata rimashcarca nishpa: —Ñuca muchashca runa paimi. Japishpa, sinchita huatashpa pushanquichic.
41014045	Chashna cacpi, Judas Jésüsman mayahyáshpa, paita mücharca nishpa: —¡Yachachiccama!
41014046	Paicuna Jesusta japishpa huatanurca.
41014047	Jesus-huan tiyaccunamanta shuc, mircanuta japishpa, jatun pacriyaya apupac luncuta huactashpa, paipac rinrita pitirca.
41014048	Jesus runcunata nirca: —¿Shuhua runachu cani, cancuna caspicunahuan mircanucunahuan ñucata japincapac shamunquichic?
41014049	Caran puncha Diospa (huasipi cancunahuan tiyarcani yachachishpa; mana japihuarcanquichic. Chashna tucun quillcara pactarincapac.
41014050	Chashna rimacpi, yachachishcacuna Jesusta saquishpa miticuhurca.
41014051	Shuc huanpra catanahuan pillurishpa, Jesusta catishpa rirarca. Paitapash japinurca.
41014052	Paica, catanata saquishpa, llushti llushpirirca.
41014053	Jesusta jatun pacriyaya apupacman pushanurca. Chaipi pacriyaya apucuna, judio apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash tantarishpa chapanurca.
41014054	Pedro carumanta catishpa rirca huasi patio ucuman. Chaipi suldarucunahuan nina mayanpi tiyarirca rupayancapac.
41014055	Pacriyaya apucuna tucui taripaccunantin, Jesusta huañuchinata munashpa, shuc paita juchachishpa rimacta mashcanurca; ranti mana tupanurcachu,
41014056	achca runa llullashpa Jesusmanta rimanucpipash. Paicuna rimashca caran laya carca.
41014057	Puchucaipi, huaquin runacuna llullashpa paimanta cashna rimanurca: —Ñucanchic paita uyarcanchic cashna nishcapi:
41014058	"Ñucacai runa rashca Diospac huasita tulashami, quimsa punchapi shuc mana runa rashcata shayachishami".
41014059	Paicuna rimashcapipash mana shuc yuyaillahuan canurca.
41014060	Chashna cacpi, pacriyaya jatun apu, tucuicuna ñaupacpi shayarishpa, Jesusta nirca: —¿Mana imata rimanquichu? ¿Imata nishpa chai shimicunata rimarcanqui?
41014061	Jesus upallarca. Pacriyaya apu cutillata paita tapurca: —¿Can Mesiaschu canqui? ¿Diospac Churichu canqui?
41014062	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ari, Mesiasmi cani. Shuc puncha cai RUNAta ushac Diospac alli maquiman tiyacucta ricunquichic, puyucuna jahuapi shamucucta ricunquichic.
41014063	Chaita uyashpa, pacriyaya. apu piñarishpa, paipac churanata lliquishpa, nirca: —¿Imapac shuc ricuyaccunata mutsunchic?
41014064	Cancunallatacpai rimashcata uyarcanquichic. ¿Imata ninquichic? Tucuicuna shuclla shina ninurca: —Paita huañuchina can.
41014065	Huaquin runacuna paita tiucancapac callarinurca. Paipac ñahuita quillpashpa paita macancapac ninurca: —¿Rimai, maican canta macan? Suldarucunapash paita macaranurca.
41014066	Pedro patiopi tiyarca. Shuc pacriyaya aputa yanapac huarmi shamushpa,
41014067	Pedroman nina mayanpi ricushpa saquirirca. Huasha paita nirca: —Canpash Nazaretmanta Jesus-huan puric carcanqui.
41014068	Pedro nirca: —Chai runata mana ricsinichu; can rimashcata mana atipanichu. Chashna nishpa, canchaman llucshirca. Llucshicucpi, cari atallpa caparirca.
41014069	Chai huarmi, Pedroman ricushpa, chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Cai runa paipaccunamantami.
41014070	Pedro nirca: —Mana paipaccunamantachu cani. Manapash unaipi, chaipi tiyaccuna Pedrota ninurca: —Shuti pacha, can Jesuspac bulamanta canqui, Galilea— manta runa mari canqui.
41014071	Pedro manalli shimicunata piñashpa rimai callarirca, nishpa: —Mana ricsinichu cancuna rimacushca runata.
41014072	Chai ucullapi, cari atallpa cutillata caparirca. Pedro uyashpa, Jesus rimashcata yuyarirca: "Cari atallpa chaira mana ishcai cuti caparicpi, can quimsa cuti 'paita mana ricsinichu' nishpa rimanqui. Chaita yuyarishpa, yapa huacancapac callarirca.
41015001	Punchayaracpi, pacriyaya apucuna rucucunantin yachaccunantin tucui gubirnu apucunantin paicuna ranata rimarinurca. Chai huasha, Jesusta huatashpa, Pilatoman pushanurca.
41015002	Pilato Jesusta tapurca nishpa: —¿Can judiocunapac Jatum Curacachu canqui? Jesus nirca: —Ari, Jatun Curacami cani.
41015003	Pacriyaya apucuna achcacunata juchachinuccpi,
41015004	Pilato cutillata Jesusta nirca: —¿Imatapash manachu cutipanqui? Uyai, achcacunata canta juchachinun,
41015005	Jesus shuc shimillatapash mana rimarcachu. Chairaicu Pilato yapa mancharirca.
41015006	Raimi punchacunapi, Pilato shuc chunta curralpi huichcara runata cacharic carca, paicuna mañashca runata.
41015007	Chai pacha shuc Barrabas shutiyuc runa tiyarca, shuccuna— huan pacia huichcai tucushcarca, runata huañuchishcamanta piñanacushpa.
41015008	Runacuna Pilatopacman rinurea, paicunapac yachai mañancapac, "shuc runata cachari" rishpa.
41015009	Pilato paicunata tapurca: —¿Ñuca judiocunapac Jatun Curacata cacharincapac munanquichichu?
41015010	Pacriyaya apucuna Jesusta chicnishcamanta paipacman pushanushcata Pilato yacharca.
41015011	Pacriyaya apucuna "Barrabasta cachari" nishpa runacunata rimachinurca.
41015012	Pilato tapucpi nishpa: —¿Imata rasha judiocunapac Jatun Curaca nishcata?
41015013	caparishpa ninurca: —¡Paita chacatai!
41015014	¡Pilato tapurca: —¿Ima manallita rurarca? Paicuna ashtahuan sinchita caparishpa ninurca: —¡Paita chacatai!
41015015	Pilato runacunata cushiyachisha nishpa, Barrabasta cacharirca. Jesusta llipachishca huasha, suldarucunaman curca "paita chacataichic" nishpa.
41015016	Suldarucuna, Jesusta japishpa, huasi patioman pusha– nurca. Tucui suldarucuna tantarishpa,
41015017	shuc puca churanata Jesusta churachinurca. Cashahuan ahuashca llaututa paipac umapi churanurca.
41015018	Huasha, caparishpa ninurca: —¡Caimi judiocunapac Jatun Curaca!
41015019	Chashna nishpa, paipac umapi caspihuan huactaranurca, paita tiucaranurca. Paipac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, paita apu shina saluranurca.
41015020	Paita asishca huasha, puca churanata surcushpa, quiquin churanata churachinurca. Chai huasha, paita chacatancapac pushanurca.
41015021	Pushanucpi, shuc Cirene llactamanta Simon shutiyuc runata tupanurca. Chai runa (Alejandropac, Rufopac yaya carca) chacramanta shamurarca Paita Jesuspac crusta apachinurca.
41015022	Jesusta Gólgota nishcaman pushanurca (Gólgota runa shimipi "aya uma tullu urcu" nin).
41015023	Mirra nishcahuan masashca binota Jesusta upiachinurca; Jesus mana upiarcachu.
41015024	Chashnapi Jesusta chacatanurca. Huasha paipac churanacunata japihurca caran lichayucpac shuc churana.
41015025	Jesusta chacatanushcapi, tutamanta carca,— iscun pacha tujpu.
41015026	Shuc quillcata churanurca imaraicu huañuchinun nishpa. Cashna quillcara tiyarca: "Judiocunapac Jatun Curaca".
41015027	Paihuan pacta ishcai shuhuacunata chacatanurca, shucta paipac alli maquiman, shucta lluqui maquiman.
41015028	Chashna ranucpi, quillca ñaupa nishca pactarirca; cashna quillcara tiyarca: "Paita juchayuc shinak ranurca".
41015029	Chaita puriccuna Jesusta asinurca. Umata cuyuchishpa ninurca: —¡Can Diospac huasita urmachic, chaita quimsa punchapi shayachic,
41015030	can quiquinta quishpichi, crusmanta uraicui!
41015031	Pacriyaya apucuna yachaccunantin Jesusta asishpa, paicunapura rimanurca: —Shuccunata quishpichirca; paillatata maria quistipichina ushah,
41015032	Pai quiquinta quishpichichun ñucanchic ricuncapac, ricushpa inincapac. Jesus-huan pacta chacatashcacuhapash paita piñanurca.
41015033	Chaupi pun chamanta chaupi chishicama tucui allpapi yanayarca.
41015034	Chaupi chishipi Jesus sinchita caparirca nishpa: —Eli, Eli, lama sabactaní (runa shimi: "Ñuca Dioslla, ñuca Dioslla, imaracu ñucata jichushcanqui").
41015035	Huaquin chaipi tiyaccuna ninurca: —Eliasta cayaran.
41015036	Shuc callpashpa rishpa, shuc esponjata jayac binopi jucuchishpa, pintupi churashpa, Jesusta upiachirca nishpa: —Elias shamunca ima chari paita quishpichincapac.
41015037	Jesus sinchita caparishpa huañurca.
41015038	Chai ucullapi, Diospac huasipi huarcushca cortina jahuamanta uracama lliquirirca.
41015039	Chaipi shayarac suldaru apu; imashna huañushcata ricushpa, nircà: –Shuti pacha, cai runa Diospac Churimi carca.
41015040	Huaquin huarmicuna caramahta tucuita ricurañurca. Shuc Maria Magdalena carca; shuc quipa Jacobopac Josepac— pash mama Maria; shuc Salomé.
41015041	Paicuna Jesusta Galileamanta catinurca paita siñbincapac, Chai huarmicunahuan shuccunapash tiyanurca, Jesus-huan pacta Jerusalenman shamushcacuna.
41015042	Chishiyacpi, cayantin puncha samana puncha cacpi,
41015043	shuc runa Pilatopacman rishpa, mana manchashpa Jesuspac ayata mañarca. Chai runa Jose shutiyuc carca, Arimatea nishca llactamanta, judio apu bulamanta. Paipash Diospac pachata chapacurca.
41015044	Pilato Jesus ña huañushcata mana inishpa uyarca.
41015045	Suldaru aputa cayashpa, paita tapurca nishpa: —¿Jesus huañushcachu? Pai "ari" nicpi, Pilato Joseta nirca: —Jesuspac ayata apaila,
41015046	Jose rishpa, shuc alli churanata rantirca; huasha, ayata crusmanta uraicuchishpa, chai churanahuan pillushpa, panipana jutcupi churarca. Chai jutcu rumi quinraipi allashca carca. Puncuta jatun rumihuan quillparca.
41015047	Maria Magdalenahuan Josepac mama Mariahuan maipi churanushcata ricunurca.
41016001	Samana puncha huasha, Maria Magdalenahuan, Santiagopac mama Mariahuan Salomehuan asnaccunata rantinurca Jesuspac ayata armachincapac,
41016002	Semana ñaupac punchapi, tutamantashitu, inti llucshicucpi, aya jutcuman rinurca.
41016003	Puricushpa rimanacunurca nishpa: —¿Aya jutcumanta pimi rumita anchuchinca?
41016004	Chaiman pactashpa ricunucpi, rumi jatun cashpallata, anchuchishcami carca.
41016005	Aya jutcuman yaicushpa, alli maquiman shuc huanprata ricunurca, yurac churanata churarishca. Paita ricushpa mancharinurca.
41016006	Chai huanpra nirca: —Ama manchaichichu. Nazaretmanta Jesusta mashcanquichic, cruspi huañuscata. Mana caipichu; causarircami. Paita churanushcata ricuichic.
41016007	Pedrota shuc yachachishcacunatapash huillacrichic: "Jesus Galileaman rinca ran cancunata ñaupashpa, pai nishca shina. Chaipi paita ricunquichic".
41016008	Chaita uyashpa, huarmicuna callpashpa aya jutcumanta llucshinurca; Manchaimanta chucchushpa, pitapash mana imata huillanurcachu.
41016009	Jesus semana ñaupac puncha pacaricushcapi causarirca. Causarishpa, ñaupacta Maria Magdalenaman ricurirca; paimanta canchis supaicunata jichushca carca.
41016010	Pai Jesus-huan purishcacunaman huillacrirca; paicuna llaquirishpa Jesusta huacaranurca.
41016011	Paicuna, chai huarmi rimashcata uyashpa, "Jesus causan, ñuca paita ricurcani" nishpa, mana ininurcachu.
41016012	Chai huasha; Jesus shuc laya tucushpa, ishcai yachachishcacunaman ricurirca, paicuna Jerusalenmanta huasiman riranucpi.
41016013	Shuccunaman huillancäpac ticranurca; shuccunaca mana ininurcachu.
41016014	Puchucaipi, Jesus chunca shuc runacunaman ricurirca, paicuna micuranucpi. Jesus paicunata piñashpa rimarca paita mana inishcamanta, pai causarishcata ricuccunatapash mana uyashcamanta.
41016015	Huasha paicunata nirca: —Tucui pachata richic; alli shimita tucui runacunaman huillanquichic,
41016016	Inic ruria, bautisai tucuc runa quishpichishcami canca. Mana inishachu nic runa cautsayachishcami canca.
41016017	Iniccuna mana raipaccunata rurana ushanunca. Ñuca shutipi supaicunata jichununca. Mana yachashca shimipi rimanunca.
41016018	Machacuicunata maquihuan japinunca; huañunalla janpita upiashpallata, mana ima tucununca. Uncuccuna jahuapi maquita churanucpi, uncuccuna alliyanunca.
41016019	Chaita rimashca huasha, Apunchic Jesus jahua pachaman pushai tucurca, Diospac alli maquiman tiyarirca.
41016020	Paicuna rishpa, maipipash Diospac alli shimita camachinurca. Dios paicunata yanaparca. Paicuna rimashca shuti cashcata mana raipaccunata rurashpa ricuchinurca.
42001001	Acha runa ñucanchipacpi callarimanta tucushcata quillcanurca,
42001002	quiquin ñahuihuan ricushcacuna alli shimita uyachincapac yanapashcacunapash rimashcata catishpa.
42001003	Tapushpa, tapushpa tucuita yachashca huasha, ñuca uyashcata canman quillcanata munani, alli Teófilo.
42001004	Caita catishpa, canta yachachishcacuna rimashcata shuti cashcata yachanqui.
42001005	Herodes shutiyuc runa Judea allpapi apu cashcapi, shuc pacriyaya tiyarca, Zacarias shutiyuc, Abias bulamanta. Paipac huarmi Elisabet carca, Aaron miraicunamanta.
42001006	Ishcaintin Diospac ñaupacpi alli causaccuna carca, Dios rurai nishcacunata pactachishpa; runacunapac ñahuipi jucha illac puriccuna carca.
42001007	Elisabet huahuata mana tupac cashcaraicu, huahua illac canurca; ishcaintin rucu canurca.
42001008	Shuc puncha, Diospac huasipi Zacariaspac bula tiyana punchacunacacpi,
42001009	pacriyayacuna yachaita catishpa, maican lichayuc canca altar jahuapi sumiriuta rupachincapac acllanucpi, Zacarias lichayuc tucurca.
42001010	Sumiriuta rupachincapac acllatucui runacuna canchapi tantarishpa Diosman mañaranurca.
42001011	Cuncaimanta shuc Diospac angel Zacariaspacpi ricurimurca, altarpac alli maquipi shayarishpa.
42001012	Paita ricushpa, Zacarias yapa mancharirca.
42001013	Angel paita nirca: —Ama manchaichu. Dios can mañashcata uyarca; canpac huarmi Elisabet shuc cari huahuata charinca; paita Juan shutichinqui.
42001014	Can yapa cushiyanqui; achca runacuna cushiyarinunca, chai huahua pacarishcaraicu.
42001015	Canpac churi Diospac ñaupacpi jatunmi canca. Binota machachic yacutapash mana upiancachu; chaira mana pacarishpa, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca canca.
42001016	Pai camachishcahuan Israelmanta achca runa Diospacman ticranunca.
42001017	Pai Jesucristota ñaupashpa rinca, profeta Eliaspac samaita ushaitapash charinca, churicunata yayacunahuan allichincapac, mana iniccunapac yuyaita turcachincapac. Pai rimashcahuan runacunata allichinca paicuna Diosta chasquincapac.
42001018	Rimacpi uyashpa, Zacarias angelta tapurca: —¿Can rimashca tucunca rashcata maimanta yachasha? Ñuca ña yapa rucu cani, ñuca huarmipash yapa rucu can.
42001019	Angel cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca Gabriel cani, Diosta yanapashpa causac; pai canpacman cachamuhuarca canhuan rimarincapac, chai cushi shimita huillancapac.
42001020	Can mana inishcaraicu; upa shimi tucunqui; canpac churi pacarinacama mana rimana ushanquichu. Ñuca rimashcaca pactarina puncha pactarinca.
42001021	Diospac huasi ucupi chai tucui tucunacama, runacuna canchapi Zacariasta chaparanurca, shincapac unayan" nishpa mancharishpa.
42001022	Zacarias llucshishpaca mana rimana usharcachu; chaimanta atipanurca Diospac huasipi ricurinata ricushcata. Shimi illac tucushpa, maquihuan ricuchishpaila rimarca.
42001023	Zacarias, Diospac huasipi yanapana punchacuna tucurishcapi, huasiman ticrarca.
42001024	Shuc punchacuna huasha, paipac huarmi Elisabet huicsayuc tucurca; huicsayuc cashpa, pichca quilia tupu: huasipi saquirirca, mana maimanpash rishpa, shuncupi yuyarishpa:
42001025	"Dios ñucapi yapa allita rahuarca; ñuca llaquirishcata ricushpa, huahuata tupachihuarca, runacuna ama pincachihuanuchun" nishpa.
42001026	Sucta quilla huasha, Dios Gabriel nishca angelta Galileapi tiyac Nazaret llactaman cacharca,
42001027	Maria shutiyuc maltapacman.Maria shuc runahuan maqui japichishca carca; paipac shuti Jose, Davidpac aillumanta runa.
42001028	Angel chai maltapacman pactashpa, nirca: —Allillachu canqui, Maria? Cushiyai, Dios canta yapa llaquishpa, canhuan tiyan.
42001029	Chai shimicunata uyashpa Maria mancharirca; "imaraicu chashna rimahuan" yuyarishpa saquirirca.
42001030	Angel paita nirca: —Ama mancharichu, Maria; Dios llaquishcahuan canta ricun.
42001031	Huicsayuc tucunqui; shuc cari huahuata charinqui, paita Jesus shutichinqui.
42001032	Paica yuyaita jatunmi canca, Diospac churi canca, Diosca yaya Davidpac pachata paiman cunca,
42001033	Israel runa bulata pushancapac; paipac apu-cana pacha mana tucurincachu.
42001034	Rimacpi uyashpa Maria tapurca: —¿Imashna chai tucunca ñuca carihuan mana llutarishcapi?
42001035	Angel cutiparca: —Diospac Samai canpacman uraicunca, Diospac ushai canta llantunca puyu shina; chairaicu canmanta pacarina huahua Diosman chicanyachishca canca, Diospac Churi paita ninunca.
42001036	Caitapash yachana canqui: Canpac aillu Elisabet, rucu cashpa huicsayuc can; paica cunancama huahua illac cashpa, sucta quillamanta, huicsapi shuc huahuata charin,
42001037	Dios tucuita ushan mari.
42001038	Chai shimicunata uyashpa Maria nirca: —Ñuca Apunchicta uyac huarmi cani; can rimashca shina ñucapi Dios rurachun. Rimacpi, angel chaimanta anchurirca.
42001039	Shuc puncha, Maria paipac aillucunapacman rirca shuc Judea llactaman.
42001040	Zacariaspac huasiman pactashpa, paipac huarmi Elisabeta salurarca.
42001041	Elisabetca, Mariapac shimita uyacpi, paipac huahua huicsapi cuyurirca.
42001042	Elisabet, Diospac samaihuan juntashca, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Tucui huarmicunamanta yalli bendisiashca canqui; can huicsapi charishca huahua achca benidisiashca can.
42001043	Ñuca mana imapash cani can ñucapacman shamuncapac.
42001044	Canpac shimita uyashca ucullapi, huahua ñuca huicsapi cushihuan cuyurirca,
42001045	Cushiyucmi canqui inishcamanta, Apunchic canta rimashca pactarinca mari.
42001046	Chai shimicunata yashpa, Maria cashna nirca: —Ñuca Apunchicta yupaichani,
42001047	ñucata quishpichic Diospi cushiyani;
42001048	pai ñucata alli ñahuihuan ricuhuarca, ñuca yanca huarmi cacpipash; cunanmanta tucui runacuna "cushiyucmi canqui" nishpa rimahuanunca;
42001049	tucuita ushac Dios sumaccunata ñucahuan rurarca. Pai yapa alli can.
42001050	"Paita uyaccunamanta huiñai llaquirincami.
42001051	Pai tucuita ushashcata ricuchirca. "Yapa cani" nishpa niccunata pincachirca.
42001052	Ushayuccunata urayachirca; yanca runacunata jahuayachirca.
42001053	"Yaricac runacunaman tucui laya imacunata cuyarca; cullquiyuccunata imapash illac cacharca.
42001054	Llaqui shuncu cashpa, paita uyac Israel runacunata yanaparca; paicunamanta llaquirirca,
42001055	ñucanchic ñaupacuna Abraanman paimanta mirashcacunamanpash rimashcata huiñai pactachisha nishpa".
42001056	Maria Elisabetpacpi quimsa quilla saquirirca; chai huasha, huasiman ticrarca.
42001057	Elisabet huahuata pacarichina puncha pactashcapi, shuc cari huahuata charirca.
42001058	Paita ricsiccuna, paipac aillucunapash yapa cushiyanurca, Dios paita chashna rurashcaraicu.
42001059	Pusac puncha huasha, huahuapac pincaishitu carata pitincapac rinurca, paita shutichincapac; paita "Zacarias shutichishun" ninurca, paipac yaya shina.
42001060	Ranti paipac mama nirca: —Mana. Paipac shuti Juan cana can.
42001061	Cutipanurca: —¿Imaraicu? Canpac aillucunapi mana tiyan chai laya shutiyuc.
42001062	Yayatami tapushun. Maquihuan ricuchishpa tapunucpi,
42001063	pai shuc quillcata mañashpa, "Juanmi paipac shuti" quillcarca. Chaita ricuccuna mancharinurca.
42001064	Chai ucullapi, Zacarias rimai callarirca Diosta yupaichashpa.
42001065	Tucui uyaccuna yapa mancharinurca; chai tucushcata tucui Judea suyupi huillanurca.
42001066	Chaita uyaccuna paicunapura rimarishpa ninurca: —¿Imatac canca cai huahua? Dios paipac ushaita chai huahuapi ricuchirca mari.
42001067	Paipac yaya Zacarias, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca cashpa, Dios paita rimachicpi, nirca:
42001068	—Israel runacunapac Apunchic Dios yupaichashca cachun, pai ñucanchicpacman shamurca, nucanchicta paipac runa bulata quishpichincapac.
42001069	Paita uyac runa Davidpac churicunamanta shuc ushayuc quishpichicta ñucanchicman curca,
42001070	pai cusha nishcata pactachishpa. Cashna mari naupa punchacuna causashca profetacuna rimanushcarca nishpa:
42001071	Shuc puncha, chicniccunamanta cancunata quishpichisha.
42001072	"Chashna rashpa, ñucanchic ñaupacunamanta llaquirirca, paicunaman cushca shimita mana cuncarishcachu.
42001073	"Dios ñucanchic yaya Abraanman shimita curca, cashna nishpa:
42001074	-
42001075	Cancunata chicniccunamanta quishpichisha, cancuna mana manchashpa, Diosta uyashpa causancapac; paipac ñaupacpi alli yuyaihun, cusca shuncuhuan tiyancapac causaicama.
42001076	Canca, ñuca churi, Jatun Diospac profeta rimai tucunqui; Apunchicta ñaupashpa, pai rina ñanpita allichinqui.
42001077	''Diospac runa bulata camachniqui juchacunata pichai tucunquichic nishpa, quishpichinata chasquinquichic nishpa.
42001078	"Ñucanchic Dios, alli cashpa, ñucanchicmanta llaquirishpa, shuc mushu, intita pacarichin.
42001079	Chai inti huañui tutapi causaccunata achicyachin, ñucanchicta ganas causana ñanpita pushan".
42001080	Chai huahua aichapi yuyaipipash huiñararca; chunlla allpacunapi causarca Israel runacunata camachincapac callari nacama.
42002001	Chai punchacunapi, Cesar Augusto shutiyuc Inca tucui llactacunapi tiyashca runacunata; yupanata munarca.
42002002	Cirino shutiyuc, runa Siriapi apu cashcapi, chai ñaupac yupanata —censo nishca— ruranurca.
42002003	Tucui runacuna shutita quillcarincapac rinurca quiquin llactaman.
42002004	-
42002005	Jose huarmintin, Davidpac aillu cashpa, Galileapi tiyac Nazaret llactamanta Judeaman sicanurca, Belen llactaman; chai llactapi mari David pacarishca carca. Josepac huarmi Maria huicsayuc carca.
42002006	Llactaman pactanucpi, Maria pacarichina puncha pactarirca; chaipi, shuc cari huahuata pacarichirca, paipac ñaupac pacaric huahua.
42002007	Paita churanahuan pillushpa, huacra carana batiapi sirichirca huacra huasipi, chushac huasi mana tiyashcaraicu.
42002008	Chai mayanpi, shuc michic runacuna obejacunata ricuranurca.
42002009	Cuncaimanta shuc angel paicunapacpi ricurimurca; tuta punchaclla tucurca; chaita ricushpa michiccuna yapa mancharinurca.
42002010	Angel paicunata nirca: —Ama manchaichichu; cushi shimita huillancapac shamuni; tucui runacuna cushiyarinunca.
42002011	Cunanshitu Belen llactapi cancunata quishpichina huahua pacarirca; paimi Mesias, Apunchic.
42002012	Paita ricucrichic; shuc huahuata, churanahuan pillushcata, huacra carana batiapi sirishcata tarinquichic.
42002013	Rimacpi, shuc achca angelcuna jahua pachapi ricurimunurca, Diosta chacchashpa, cashna: taquishpa: —
42002014	¡Jahua pachapi Dios chacchashca cachun! ¡cai allpapi Dios llaquishca runacuna ganas causanata charinuchun!
42002015	Angelcuna jahua pachaman ticrashca huasha, michiccuna rimanacunurca nishpa: —Jacuichic Belen llactaman; angel huillashcata ricucrishun.
42002016	Callpashpa rishpa, Mariata Josentin tarinurca, huahuata batiapi sirishcata tupanurca,
42002017	Huahuata ricushpa, angelcuna chai huahuamanta huillashcata tucuicunaman uyachinurca;
42002018	michiccuna huillashcata uyaccuna mancharinurca.
42002019	Mariaca shuncu ucupi chai tucuita huacaichirca, huiñai chaita yuyarashpa.
42002020	Michiccuna ticranurca Diosta yupaichashpa, chacchashpa tucui paicuna uyashcamanta ricushcamantapash; angel rimashca shina tucushca carca.
42002021	Pusac puncha huasha, huahuapac pincaishitu carata pitina puncha pactashcapi, paita "Jesus" nishpa shutichinurca; chai shutita angel rimashca carca Maria chaira huicsayashcapi,
42002022	Jesuspac mama Maria maillarina puncha pactashcapi, Moisespac quillcata pactachincapac, Jesusta Jerusalenman pushanurca Apunchicman cuncapac.
42002023	Chashna ruranurca camachic quillcapi cashna quillcara tiyashcaraicu: "Ñaupac cari huahua Diosman chicanyachishcami canca"
42002024	Chashna cacpi, camachic quillcai nicpi, "camarita cunquichic ishcai urpita, mana tiyacpi, ishcai paloma huahuata cunquichic" nishpa, chaita pactachinurca.
42002025	Chai pacha Jerusalenpi shuc Simeon shutiyuc runa causarca; chai runa alli carca, Diosta llaquic runa; Diospac Samai paihuan tiyarca.
42002026	Israel runa bula quishpichi tucuna punchata chaparashpa causarca. Diospac Samai paita nishcarca: "Can chaira mana huañushpa, Dios acllashcata ricunqui".
42002027	Diospac Samai paita pushaccpi, Diospac huasiman rirca. Chaipi tiyacpi, Jesuspac yayacuna yaicunurca, huahuata pushashpa camachic quillcata pactachincapac.
42002028	Simeon, huahuata marcashpa, Diosta yupaicharca cashna nishpa: —
42002029	Apunchic Dios, cunan ganaslla huañushami: can rimahuashca pactarishca mari.
42002030	Can cachashca quishpichicta ñuca quiquin ñahuihuan ricushcani.
42002031	Paita tucui runacuna ñaupacpi churarcanqui,
42002032	tucui allpapi causac runacunata achicyachincapac, Israel runacunata sumacyachincapac.
42002033	José Jesuspac mamantin, Simeon, huahuamanta rimashcata uyashpa, mancharinurca.
42002034	Simeon huahuata bendisiarca; huasha, paipac mama Mariata nirca: —Uyai, cai huahuaraicu huaquin judiocuna chincarinunca, huaquincuna quishpinunca. Unancha shina churashca cacpi, achca runa paita chicninunca.
42002035	Chashna rashpa, caran amu shuncupi yuyashca ricurinca. Chai tucuiraicu, shuc huachihuan canpac shuncupi tucsishca shina tucunqui.
42002036	Chai Diospac huasillapi shuc yapa rucu huarmi causac carca, Ana shutiyuc Fanuelpac ushushi, Aser aillucunamanta; pai Diospacmanta rimac huarmi carca. Chai huarmi, malta cashpa, paipac carihuan canchis huata causashca huasha,
42002037	huaccha saquirirca; pusac chunca chuscu huatayuc cashpallata, tutantin punchantin Diospac huasipi tiyac carca, sasishpa, Dios-huan rimarishpa.
42002038	Chai huarmi chai ucullapi shamushpa, Diosta yupaicharca; Jerusalenta, quishpichicta; chaparac runacunamanta huahua Jesusmanta rimai callarirca.
42002039	Camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishca, huasha, Galileaman ticranurca, paicunapac quiquin llacta Nazaretman.
42002040	Huahuaca huiñararca, jatunyararca, yachararca; Dios paihuan tiyarca.
42002041	Jesuspac yayacuna tucui huata Jerusalenman puriccuna carca Pascua raimita rancapac.
42002042	Jesus chunca ishcai huatayuc tucucpi, yayacunantin Jerusalenman sicarca, judiocunapac yachaita catishpa.
42002043	Raimi tucuricpi, ticrana puncha, Jesus chaillapi saquirirca, paipac yayacuna mana yachacpi.
42002044	Paicuna, "shuc aillucunahuan shamuranca" yuyashpa, shuc puncha tupu purinurca; aillucunapura huahuata mashcashpa,
42002045	mana tupashpa, Jerusalenman ticranurca chaipi paita mashcancapac.
42002046	Quinsa puncha huashta, Diospac huasipi paita tupanurca, yachaccuna ucupi tiyacushcata, paicunahuan rimarishpa.
42002047	Tucui paita uyaccuna pai rimashcamanta tapushcamanta mancharinurca, yapa umayuc can nishpa.
42002048	Yayacuna, Jesusta ricushpa, yapa cushiyanurca; mámaca paita nirca: —Churi, ¿imaraicu ñucanchihuan chashna rurarcanqui? Yapa llaquirishpa canta mashcacurcanchic.
42002049	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Imaraicuta mashcahuarcanquichic? ¿Nuca Yayapaccunata rana cashcata manachu yachanquichic?
42002050	Chashna nicpi, rimashcata mana atipanurcachu.
42002051	Chaipac huasha, Jesus Nazareti llactaman paicunahuan ticrarca; chaipi paicunata uyashpa causarca. Paipac mama chai tucushcata shuncupi huacaichirca.
42002052	Jesusca yuyaipi aichapipash huiñararca; Diospac ñaupacpi runacuna ñaupacpipash sumacta causac carca.
42003001	Ña chunca pichca huata Tiberio Inca carca. Poncio Pilato Judeapi apu carca; Herodes Galileapi apu carca; paipac huauqui Felipe Itureapi Traconitidepipash apu carca; Lisanias Abilenepi apu carca.
42003002	Anas-huan Caifas-huan pacriyayacunapac jatun apu canurca. Chai huatapi Dios Zacariaspac churi Juanta rimarca, pai chunlla allpapi tiyashcapi.
42003003	Juan Jordan nishca yacu patapi tiyac llactacunata puric carca, runacunata cashna camachishpa: —Diosman ticrashpa, bautisai tucuichic cancunapac juchacuna pichai tucuncapac.
42003004	Chashna tucurca Isaias quillcashca pactarincapac; cashna mari quillcashcarca: Chunlla allpapi shuc shimi uyarin cashna nishpa: "Apunchic rina ñanpita allichchic, cuscachichic"
42003005	Urcucunata panpayachina can; pucrucunata parijana can; Huishtu ñanpicunata cushcactona can; pucru ñanpita allichina can
42003006	Chashna tucui runacuna Dios cachashca quishpichinata ricununca.
42003007	Achca runacuna Juanpacman bautisai tucuncapac shamunucpi, paicunata nirca: —Machacui miraicuna, pitac cancunata rimarca "jatun shamuna ñacachinata quishpinquichic" nishpa?
42003008	Cancuna Diosman yuyaita ticrachishcata cancuna rurashcacunahuan ricuchichic. Ama pantaichichu "Abraan ñucanchic yayami" nishpa. Cancunata nini: Dios cai rumicunamanta huahuacunata Abraanman surcuna ushan.
42003009	Tumi ña allichishca can yuracunata cuchuncapac; alli muyucunata mana aparic yura cuchushcami canca ninapi shitai tucuncapac.
42003010	Rimacpi, runacuna uyashpa paita tapunurca: —¿Imata rana canchic cuti?
42003011	Juan cutiparca: —Maicanpash ishcai churanata charishpa, mana charicman shucta cuyachun; micunata charic runa mana charicta carachun.
42003012	Gubirnu cullquita pallaccunapash Juanpacman shamunurca bautisai tucuncapac; paita tapunurca: —Yachachic, ¿ñucánchica imata rana canchic?
42003013	Juan cutiparca: —Caran amu paganallata mañanquichic.
42003014	Suldarucunapash paita tapunurca: —¿Nucánchica imata rana canchic? Juan nirca: —Ama imatapash runacunamanta quichunquichichu; ama llulla shimita rimanquichic; cancuna yapachishcahuan cushiyanquichic.
42003015	Tucui runacuna Mesias shamunata chaparanucpi, Juanta ricushpa tapurinurca: —¿Cai runa Mesiaschu canca? ¿manachu Mesias canca?
42003016	Chashna cacpi, Juan nirca: —Ñuca cancunata yacuhuan bautisani; ranti, shuc ñucamanta yalli cac shamunca; paipac ushutapac huascata pascancapac mara allichu cani; pai Diospac Samaihuan ninahuanpash cancunata bautisanca?
42003017	Palata maquipi charin pallashca trigota huairachincapac: trigo muyuta huasipi huacaichinca, trigo quihuata ninapi rupachinca.
42003018	Chai sami shimicunahuan Juan runacunata camachic carca, cushi shimita paicunaman uyachic carca
42003019	Apu Herodestapash Juan piñashpa rimarca, paipac huauqui Felipiepac huarmita japishcaraicu, shuc manalli rashcacunatapash rurashcaraicu.
42003020	Herodes Juanta uyana rantimanta, shuc jatun juchata rarca paita chunta curralpi huichcachishpa.
42003021	Juanta chunta curralpi chaira mana huichcanucpi, pai runacunata bautisacucpi, Jesustapash bautisarca; pai Dios-huan rimaricucpi, jahua pacha pascarirca;
42003022	Diospac Samai, urpi shina ricurishpa, Jesuspac jahuapi uraicurca; shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: —Can ñuca llaquishca Churimi canqui; canhuan achca cushiyani.
42003023	-
