42003038	Jesus runacunata yachachincapac callarishcapi, quimsa chuncashi huatayuc carca. Runacuna yuyanucpi, Josepac churi carca. Joseca Elipac churi, cai Matatpac churi, cai Levipac churi, cai Melquipac churi, cai Janapac churi, cai Josepac churi, cai Matatiaspac churi, cai;Ampspac churi, cai Naumpac churi, cai Eslipac churi, cai Nagaipac, churi, cai Maatpac churi, cai Matatiaspac churi, cai Semeipac churi, cai Josepac churi, cai Judapac churi, cai Jonapac churi, cai Resapac churi, cai Zorobabelpac churi, cai Salatielpac churi, cai Neripac churi, cai Melquipac churi, cai Adipac churi, cai Cosampac churi, cai Elmodampac churi, cai Erpac churi, cai Josuepac churi, cai Eliecerpac churi, cai Jorimpac churi, cai Matatpac churi, cai Levipac churi, cai Simeonpac churi, cai Judapac churi, cai Josepac. churi, cai Jonampac churi, cai Eliaquinpac churi, cai Meleapac churi, cai Mainampac churi, cai Matatapac churi, cai Natanpac churi, cai Davidpac churi, cai Isaipac churi, cai Obedpac churi, cai Boozpac churi, cai Salmonpac churi, cai Naasompac churi, cai Aminadatpac churi, cai Aranpac churi, cai Esrompac churi, cai Farespac churi, cai Judapac churi, cai Jacobpac churi, cai Isaacpac churi, cai Abraanpac churi, cai Tarepac churi, cai Nacorpac churi, cai Serugpac churi, cai Ragaupac churi, cai Felegpac churi; cai Heberpac churi, cai Salapac churi, cai Cainampac churi, cai Arfaxadpac churi, cai Sempac churi, cai Noepac churi; cai Lamecpac churi, cai Matusalenpac churi, cai Enocpac churi, cai Jaredpac churi, cai Malaleelpac churi, cai Cainampac churi, cai Enospac churi, cai Serpac churi, cai Adanpac churi, cai Diospac churi.
42004001	Jesus, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca, Jordan yacumanta ticrarca; Samai paita pushacpi, chunlla allpapi causarca chuscu chunca puncha.
42004002	Chaipi supai paita camarca, Micuna illacpi, mana imata micushpa causarca," chairaicu yarcachirca;
42004003	Yarcacpi, supai paita nirca: Can Diospac churi cashpa, cai rumita "tanta tucui" nishpa rimai.
42004004	Jesus cutiparca: —Quillcara tiyan: "Runa mana tantallahuanchu causan".
42004005	Huasha, supai shuc jatun urcuman paita pusharca; paiman tucui llactacunata ñahuipilla ricuchishpa,
42004006	nirca: —Cai llactacunapi apu canata cushcanqui; ñucapac mari canun; ñuca munashcaman chaicunata cusha.
42004007	Can ñucata yapaichacpi, cai tucui canpacmi canca.
42004008	Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Quillcara tiyan: "Canpac Apu Diosta yupaichanqui, paillatata uyanqui.
42004009	Chai huasha, supai Jerusalen llactaman paita pusharca; Diospac huasi jahuapi paita shayachishpa nirca: —Can Diospac churi cashpa, caimanta uraman shitari;
42004010	quillcara mari tiyan: "Paipac angelcunata cachanca canta ricuncapac.
42004011	Angelcuna canta maquipi japinunca, ama rumipi susurincapac"
42004012	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Quillcarapash tiyan: "Canpac Apu Diosta ama camaichu".
42004013	Supai Jesusta camashca huasha, "shuc punchacama" nishpa chincarirca.
42004014	Jesus, Diospac Samaipac ushaihuan juntashca cashpa, Galileaman ticrarca; tucui llactacunapi paimanta rimarirca.
42004015	Tantarina huasicunapi yachachic carca; tucui uyaccuna paita chacchanurca.
42004016	Shuc puncha, Jesus Nazaret llactaman rirca; chai llactapi huiñashca carca. Samana puncha cacpi, tantarina huasiman rirca; yaicushpa, quillcata ricuncapac shayarirca.
42004017	Profeta Isaias quillcashcata paimah cunurca. Quillcata pascashpa, cashna quillcashcata tuparca:
42004018	Apu Diospac Samai ñucapimi; pai ñucata jahuirca. Tsuntsu runacunaman cushi shimita uyachincapac cachahuarca; shuncu llaquirishcacunaman quishpina puncha shamunca rashcata huillancapac; ñausa runacunapac ñahuicunata pascancapac cachahurca; aitai tucushpa causaccunman "quishpichishcami canquichic" nishpa rimancapac.
42004019	Diospac huatami cai huata nishpa tucuicunaman rimancapac.
42004020	Chaita uyachishpa, quillcata pillushpa yanapacman cushpa, tiyarirca; tantarina huasipi tiyaccuna paiman ricurashpa saquirinurca.
42004021	Paica rimai callarirca cashna nishpa. —Cunan puncha cancuna uyashca shimi pactarirca,
42004022	Tucuicuha "yapa alli riman" nishpa rimaranurca; pai rimashca shimicunamanta mancharinurca; mancharishpa ninurca: —Manachu Josepac churi can cai?
42004023	Jesus paicuna rimarashcata uyashpa nirca: —Cai shimicunata rimanquichic ima chari: "Yachac, can quiquinta janpiri". "Can Cafamaunpi rashcata quiquin llactapi rurai".
42004024	Huasha nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Manapí profeta quiquin llactapi llaquishcami can.
42004025	Uyahuaichic: Achca huaccha huarmi Israel llactacunapi tiyanurca Elias causashcapi, quimsa huata sucta quilla tupu mana tamiashcapi, tucui allpapi jatun yaricai tiyashcapi.
42004026	Chai llactacunamanta mana pipacman Dios Eliasta cacharca; shuc chican llactapi causac huaccha huarmipacman paita cacharca, Sidonmanta Sarepta nishca llactapi.
42004027	Chashnallata, Israel llactacunapi achca sisu runa tiyarca Eliseo profeta causashcapi; paicunamanta mana shucllapash pichai tucurca; ranti, Naaman shutiyuc runa, Siriamanta cashpallata, pichara saquirirca.
42004028	Chai shimicunata uyashpa, tantarina huasipi tiyaccuna yapa piñarinurca.
42004029	Jesusta japishpa, llacta canchaman pushanurca urcu uma jahuaman, chaimanta huaicuman shitancapac; chai urcu jahuapi Nazaret llacta tiyarca.
42004030	Chashnapash, Jesus Ilushpirishpa paicunapacmanta rirca.
42004031	Chaimanta rishpa, Galileapi tiyac Cafamaun llactaman pactarca; chaiman pactac, samana puncha runacunata yachachicurca.
42004032	Uyaccuna pai yachachishcamanta mancharinurca, ushaihuan yachachirca mari.
42004033	Pai rimarashca tantarina huasipi, shuc supai japishca runa tiyarca; chai runa, Jesusta ricushpa, caparishpa nirca: —
42004034	¡Caimanta llucshi! ¿Imaraicu ñucanchihuan satirinqui, Nazaretmanta Jesus? ¿Ñucanchicta tucuchincapacchu shamunqui? Canta ricsini, can Diosmanta shamuc santo runami canqui.
42004035	Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus supaita piñashpa nirca: —¡Upallai! ¡Cai runamanta llucshi! Supai uyashpa, runata allpaman urmachishpa tucuicunapac ñaupacpi, paimanta llucshirca, paita mana huacllichicshpa.
42004036	Chaita ricuccuna mancharishpa, paicunapura rimanacunurcanishpa: —¡Manapacha! ¡Cai runa supaicunata rimacpi, supaicuna paita uyanun!
42004037	Tucui chai suyupac llactacunapi Jesusmanta rimarirca.
42004038	Tantarina huasimanta llucshishpa, Jesus Simonpac huasiman rirca. Simonpac huarmi mama sinchi uncushpa siricurca; Jesusta "paita alliyachipai" nishpa mananurca.
42004039	Jesus paiman cumurishpa, uncuita pinashpa rimarca; rimacpi, uncui saquirirca. Chai ucullapi jatarishpa, huarmi paicunahuan rimaricurca, paicunata sirbicurca.
42004040	Inti yaicushcapi, tucui sami uncushcacunata Jesuspacman pushamunurca; Jesusca caranpi maquicunata churashpa, tucuicunata alliyachirca. Huaquin uncushcacunamanta supaicuna llucshinurca caparishpa: —¡Can Diospac Churimi canqui! Ranti Jesus supaicunata piñarca, mana paicunata rimachirca, yachanurca mari Jesus Mesias cashcata.
42004041	Cayantiman tutamantashitu, Jesus chai llactamanta llucshishpa, shucman rirca, runa illashcaman. Runacuna, paita mashcashpa rishpa, pai tiyashcaman pactanurca. Paita jarcanayashpa, "ama richu" ninurca.
42004042	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Shuc llactacunapipash cushi shimita uyachina cani; chaipac mari shamurcani.
42004044	Chashna cacpi, Galilea llactacunapi tiyac tantarina huasicunapi camachishpa puricurca.
42005001	Shuc puncha, Genesaret nishca cucha patapi tiyashcapi, achca runa Jesuspacman tantarinurca Diospac shimita uyancapac.
42005002	Yacu patapi ishcai canua tiyarca; amucuna canuamanta llucshishpa, llicata maillaranurca.
42005003	Shuc canua Simonpac carca. Jesus chai canuaman yaicushpa, amuta nirca: —Chaupiman ansa tancaichic. Huasha, canuapi tiyarishpa, runacunata yachachirca.
42005004	Rimanata tucuchishcapi, Simonta nirca: —Cucha chaupiman rishunchic llicata shitancapac, yacu aichacunata japincapac.
42005005	Pedro nirca: —Yachachic, tuta pacaricta llicata shitashpallata, mana imata japircanchic; chashnapash, can rimacpi, cutillata camasha.
42005006	Llicata shitashpaca, achca yacu aichacunata japinurca; ñalla llica lliquirirca.
42005007	Shuc canuapi tiyaccunata cayanurca "yanapac shamuichic" nishpa, Shamunucpi, ishcaintin canuata juntachinurca, ñalla panparicta.
42005008	Simon Pedro, chaita ricushpa, Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, nirca: —Apunchic, ñucamanta anchuri, ñuca juchayuc runa cani.
42005009	Chashna achca yacu aichacunata japishcaraicu, pai paihuan tiyaccunantin mancharinurca.
42005010	Chashnallata, Cebedeopac churicuna Jacobo Juantin, Simonhuan llancaccuna mancharinurca. Jesus Simonta nirca: —Ama manchaichu; cunanmanta runacunata japiccama canqui.
42005011	Paicuna, canuacunata huatashpa, tucuita saquishpa, Jesus-huan rinurca.
42005012	Shuc puncha, Jesus shuc llactapi tiyacpi, shuc sisu runa shamurca; Jesusta ricushpa, paipac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, paita mañarca nishpa: —Apunchic, can munashpa, ñucata janpina ushanqui.
42005013	Rimacpi, Jesus maquihuan paita llancarca nishpa: —¡Munanimi, pichashca saquiri! Chai ucullapi, chai runa alliyarca;
42005014	Jesus paita nirca: —Ama pitapash huillaichu. Pacriyayapacman rilla; Moises rimashcata paiman cunqui camari shina can alliyachi tucushcamanta, can ña alliyashcata tucuicuna yachancapac.
42005015	Jesus "ama huillaichu" nishpa nicpipash, caran puncha ashtahuan paimanta rimarirca; achca runacuna paipacman tantariccuna carca paita uyancapac, uncuicunamanta allichi tucuncapac.
42005016	Ranti, Jesus runa illashcaman ric carca Dios-huan rimarincapac.
42005017	Shuc puncha Jesus yachachicucpi, huaquin fariseocuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash paita uyaranurca; paicuna Galilea llactacunamanta, Judeamanta, Jerusalenmanta shamunushca carca; paicunapac nahuipi Jesus, Diospac ushaihuan uncuccunata alliyachicurca.
42005018	Huaquin runacuna, shuc suchu runata cahuitupi huantushpa, shamunurca "Jesus tiyashca huasiman yaicunata munanchic —nishpa—, paipac ñaupacpi uncushcata saquincapac".
42005019	Ranti, achca runa tiyashcaraicu, mana yaicuna ushanurcachu; chashna cacpi, huasi jahuaman sicanurca: shuc jutcuta rurashpa, uncucta cahuitupi uraicuchinurca.
42005020	Jesus chai runacuna inishcata yachashpa, suchu runata nirca: —Canpac juchacuna pichara saquirinun.
42005021	Chashna nicpi, chai fariseocunahuan yachaccunahuan uyashpa, shuncu ucupi ninurca: —¿Pitac can cai runa? Chashna rimashcahuan Diosta camicun. Diosllami juchacunata pichana ushan.
42005022	Jesus paicuna yuyarashcata yachashpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu chashna yuyaranquichic?
42005023	¿Imata ashtahuan rimanalla can: "Canpac juchacuna pichai tucunun" nishpa rimanachu? ¿"jatarishpa puri" nishpa rimanachu? ¿Imata ninquichic? ¿Manachu cutipahuanquichic? Allimi.
42005024	Cai RUNA cai pachapi juchacunata pichana ushashcata cunan ricuchinca rani. Chashna rimashpa, chai suchu runata nirca: —Jatari, canpac cahuituta apashpa ri.
42005025	Chai ucullapi, suchu runa, tucuicuna ricuranucpi, jatarishpa, cahuituta apashpa rirca, Diosta yupaichashpa.
42005026	Chaita ricushpa, tucuilla Diosta yupaichanurca mancharishpa nishpa: —¡Manapacha! Cunan puncha munanayactami ricurcanchic.
42005027	Jesus chaimanta llucshishpa, shuc gubirnu cullquita pallac runata ricurca; paipac shuti Levi carca; gubirnu cullquita pagana huasipi tiyacurca. Jesus paita nirca: —¡Ñucahuan shamui!
42005028	Chai runa uyashpa, jatarishpa, tucuita saquishpa, Jesusta catishpa rirca.
42005029	Huasha, shuc puncha Levi jatun raimita paipac huasipi rurarca Jesusta pacrachuncapac; achca gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna shuc runacunapash micuncapac shamunurca.
42005030	Fariseocunahuan camachic quillcata yachaccunahuan chaita ricushpa, Jesus yachachishcacunata piñanurca nishpa: —¿Imaraicu gubirnu cullquita pallaccunahuan juchayuccunahuanpash micushpa upiashpa purinquichic?
42005031	Rimanucpi uyashp Jesus paicunata nirca: —Alli causaccuna janpiccamata mana mutsunun; uncuccuna janpiccamata mutsunun.
42005032	Ñúcaca mana shamurcanichu allicuhata cayancapac; juchayuccunata mashcancapac shamurcani, Diosman ticranuchun nishpa.
42005033	Chashna nicpi uyashpa paicuna Jesusta tapunurca: —Juanta caticcunahuan fariseocunata caticcunahuanpash sasishpa, Dios-huan rimarishpa causanun; imaraicu canpaccuna micushpalla, upiashpalia causanun?
42005034	Jesus cutiparca: —¿Shuc sahuarinaman cayashcacunata sasichina allichu, cari paicunahuan tiyacucpi? Mana.
42005035	Shuc puncha cari pushai tucunca, sahuarina raimi tucurinca; chai huasha sasinunca.
42005036	Yachachishpa caitapash nirca: —Manapí rucu churanata llachapancapac mushu churanamanta shuc pitita pitinchu. Chashna ruracpi, mushu churanata huacllichin; mushu churana piti mana alli ricurin rucu churanapi.
42005037	Chashnallata, manapí mushu binota rucu cara purupi churan; chashna ruracpi, mushu bino cara puruta tucyachin, binontin cara puruntin huacllirin.
42005038	Chairaicu mushu binota mushu cara purupi huacaichina can.
42005039	Rucu binota upiac runa mushuta mana munanchu; rucu bino ashtahuan alli mari can.
42006001	Shuc samana puncha, Jesus shuc tarpushca ucuta puricucpi, yachachishcacuna trigo huancuta aisashpa, maquihuan ishcushpa, muyucunata micuranurca.
42006002	Chaita ricushpa, huaquin farisepcuna paicunata ninurca: —¿Imaraicu samana puncha mana ranata ruracunquichic?
42006003	Jesus cutiparca: —¿Manachu yachanquichic shuc cuti David rashcata, pai paipaccunantin yaricachicpi?
42006004	Diospac huasiman yaicushpa, camari tantacunata japishpa micurca; paihuan tiyaccunatapash cararca; chai laya tantacunata pacriyayacunalla micuna ushanun.
42006005	Huasha nirca: —Cai RUNA samana punchapi pai munashcata rurana ushan.
42006006	Shuc samana punchapash, Jesus tantarina huasiman yaicushpa, yachachincapac callarirca. Chaipi shuc alli maqui huacllishca runa tiyarca.
42006007	Camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunantin Jesusta chaparanurca, "samana puncha chai runata allichincachu" yuyashpa, paita juchachincapac.
42006008	Jesus paicuna yuyarishcata ricsishpa, chai maqui huacllishca runata nirca: —Uyai, jatarishpa chaupi shuncupi shayari.
42006009	Shayaricpi, Jesus chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Cancunata tapuni: ¿Samana puncha imata rana usharin? ¿manallita rana usharinchu? ¿shuc runata huañunamanta quishpichina usharinchu? ¿huañuncapac saquinachu? ¿Imata ninquichic?
42006010	Huasha, chaipi tiyaccunaman ricushpa, maqui chaquishca runata nirca: —Maquita chutachi. Chutachicpi, paipac maqui alliyashca saquirirca.
42006011	Chaita ricushpa, Jesusta chicniccuna yapa pinarinurca; paicunapura rimarishpa, "imata Jesusta rurashun" tapuriranurca.
42006012	Shuc puncha, Jesus shuc urcuman sicashpa, tuta pacaricta Dios-huan rimaricurca.
42006013	Puncha pacaricpi, yachachishcacunata cayashpa, paicunamanta chunca ishcaita acllarca apostolcuna tucuncapac.
42006014	Caicunami paicunapac shuticuna: Simon (huasha "Pedro" nishpa shutichirca), paipac huauqui Andres, Jacobo, Juan, Felipe, Bartolome,
42006015	Mateo, Tomas, Alfeopac churi Jacobo, Simon "celotes" nishca,
42006016	Jacobopac huauqui Judas, Judas Iscariote (cai runa puchucaipi Jesusmanta anchurishpa paita japichirca).
42006017	Jesus paipaccunantin urcumanta uraicushpa, shuc panpapi shayarirca; chaiman yachachishcacuna tantarinurca; shuc achca runacunapash tiyanurca Judeamanta, Jerusalenmanta, ñuchu yacu mayanpi tiyac Sidon Tiro llactacunamanta; paicuna Jesusta uyahcapac, uncuicunamanta allichi tucuncapac shamunushca carca.
42006018	Supai japishcacunapash alliyachi tucunurca.
42006019	Tucui runacuna Jesusta llancanata munanurca, tucuicunata mari paipac ushaihuan alliyachic carca.
42006020	Jesus paicunata ricushpa nirca: —Cushiyaichic, mana imayuccuna, Diospac pacha cancunapacmi.
42006021	Cushiyaichic cai allpapi yaricaccuna, sacsai tucunquichic mari. Cushiyaichic cunan huacaccuna, shuc puncha asinquichicmi.
42006022	Cushiyaichic runacuna cancunata chicninucpi, cancunata piñanucpi cancuna cai RUNATA llaquishcamanta.
42006023	Chashna tucucpi cushiyanquichic: jahua pachapi cancuna cui tucuna yapa alli canca. Paicunapac ñaupacuna chaillatata ranurca Dios cachashcacuhahuan.
42006024	-
42006025	Ranti, ¡cancuna achcata chariccuna!: Ña caipi cushita charircanquichic. ¡Cancuna sacsashca causaccuna!: Huasha yaricanquichic. ¡Cunan asiccuna!: Huasha huacanquichic.
42006026	Ayailla, tucui runacuna cancttnamanta allita rimanucpi. Cancunapac ñaupacuna chaillatata ranurca llulla profetacunahuan.
42006027	"Ñucata uyacuccunata nini: Cancunata chicniccunata llaquinquichic, cancunata pinaccunaman allita ruranquichic.
42006028	Cancunata manallita rimaccunata bendisianquichic; cancunata piñaccunamanta Diosta mañanquichic.
42006029	"Shuc ñahui aichapi canta macanucpi, shuctapash ricuchinqui; camisata quichunucpi, calsuntapash ama mitsaichu,
42006030	Canta imatapash mañanucpi cunqui; canpacta shuhuanucpi, "cai ñucapacmi" nishpa ama nichu.
42006031	"Shuccuna cancunahuan ruranuchun muhashca shina, paicunahuan rurahquichic.
42006032	"Cancunata llaquiccunallata llaquishpa, ¿ima allita ruranquichic? Juchayuccunapash paicunata llaquiccunata llaquinun.
42006033	Cancunata yanapaccunamanlla yanapashpa, ¿ima jatunta ranquichic? Juchayuccunapash chaita rurac canun.
42006034	"Cancuna imatapash cushpa manachiccunaman, "ñuca mutsuna pacha cuhuancami" yuyashpa, ima jatunta ranquichic? Juchayuccunapash juchayuccunaman cunun, cushca tuputa japincapac.
42006035	Cancuna ama chashna raichichu. Cancunata chiniccunata llaquinquichic, allita paicunata ruranquichic; mañachiccunaman cunquichic, imatapash mana chapashpa rantimanta. Cancuna chashna ruracpi, canbuna cui tucuna yapa alli canca, jatun Diospac churicuna canquichic; pai juchayuccunahuan mana pacrachuccunahuanpash alli shuncu can.
42006036	Alli shuncuyuc caichic cancunapac Yaya Dios shina.
42006037	"Ama taripaichichu, ama taripai tucuncapac. Ama cautsayachichu, ama cautsayachi tucuncapac. Quishpichichic, Diosca cancunata quishpichinca.
42006038	Cancuna cushpa cushcanquichic. Dios cancuna cushcamanta yalli cancunaman cunca. Cancuna tupushca tupullahuan tupui tucunquichic.
42006039	"¿Shuc ñausa runa shuc ñausa runata pushana ushancachu? ¿Manachu ishcaintin shuc jutcupi urmanunca?
42006040	Yachachishca runa paita yachachicmanta mana yallichu; maicanpash alli yachachishca cashpa, paita yachachic shina tucunca.
42006041	"¿Imaraicu canpac huauquipac ñahuipi tiyac mapashituta ricunqui, canpac quiquin ñahuipi tiyac caspita mana ricushpa?
42006042	¿Imaraicu canpac huauquita ninqui: "Huauqui, canpa ñahuimanta mapashituta anchuchihuapai" nishpa, canpac ñahuipi tiyac caspita mana ricushpa? ¡Llullacama! Ñaupacta canpac ñahuimanta caspita surcunqui, chai huasha canpac huauquipac ñahuimanta mapashituta surcuncapac alli ricunqui.
42006043	Alli yura alli muyucunata aparin, manalli yura manalli muyucunata aparin,
42006044	Caran yura pai aparishca muyumanta ricsirin. Chinimanta higo nishca muyucunata mana pallanchichu; pilchimanta ubillasta mana japinchichu.
42006045	Alli runa paipac shuncupi charishca allimanta allita llucshichin; manalli runa, manalli yuyaita charishpa, paipac shuncumanta manallita llucshichin. Runa shuncupi charishcamanta shimihuan riman.
42006046	¿Imaraicu ñucata, "Apulla, Apulla" nishpa cayahuanquichic, ñuca camachishcataca mana pactachinquichic?.
42006047	Shuc yachachina rimanata rimanca rani, uyahuaichic; Ñucapacman shamuc runa, ñuca camachishcata uyashpa pactachicpi,
42006048	shuc huasita rurashca shinami; ñaupacta ucuta allarca sinchi allpa tupanacama; chai jutcupi istanticunata shayachirca. Shuc puncha, yacu juntarirca, huasita urmachinayarca; huasica mana cuyurishcachu, sinchi allpa jahuapi shayachishca cashpa.
42006049	Ranti, ñuca camachishcata uyashpa mana pactachic runa, allpa jahuapi huasita shayachishca shinami; mana ucuta allacpi, yacu juntarishpa, huasita cuyuchishpa urmachirca; chai runa huasi illac saquirirca.
42007001	Jesus runacunaman rimanata tucuchishpa, Cafarnaun llactaman yaicurca.
42007002	Chaipi shuc suldaru apu tiyarca, paipac luncu yapa uncushca carca; ña huañunca ran; chai suldaru apu paita yapa llaquirca.
42007003	Chai suldaru apu, Jesusmanta uyashpa, judio runacunata paipacman cacharca rimancapac nishpa: —Shamupai ñuca luncuta alliyachincapac.
42007004	Paicuna Jesuspacman pactashpa, achcata mañanurca nishpa: —Cai suldaru apu alli can, pai mañashcata rurapanqui.
42007005	Pai ñucanchicta llaquin, ñucanchicpac shuc tantarina huasita rurarca.
42007006	Jesus chaita uyashpa paicunahuan rirca. Ña huasiman pactanca racucpi, suldaru apu mashicunata cacharca Jesusta rimancapac nishpa: —Apulla, ñuca mana imapash cani can ñuca huasiman yaicuncapac.
42007007	Chairaicu. ñuca quiquinllata mana shamurcanichu canhuan rimancapac. Can shimillahuan rimacpi, ñuca luncu alliyancami.
42007008	Ñúcaca, shuccunata uyac runa cashpa, suldarucuna apu cani. Shuc suldarata "ri" nicpi, pai rinmi. Shucta "shamui" nicpi, pai shamun. Ñuca luncuta "caita rurai" nicpi, pai ruranmi.
42007009	Jesus chaita uyashpa yapa mancharirca; paita caticcunata nirca: —Israelpipash chashna inishcata mana tuparcanichu.
42007010	Chai suldau apu cachashcacuna huasiman ticrashpa, uncuc luncuta alliyashcata tupanurca.
42007011	Shuc puncha, Jesus Naim nishca llactaman riracpi, pai yachachishcacuna achca runacunapash paihuan riranurca.
42007012	Llactaman pactacushcallapita, shuc huanushca runata panpancapac huantuccunahuan tuparirca; huañúshcaca huaccha huarmipac shuclla churi carca. Achca runa huarmita catiranurca.
42007013	Jesus paita ricushpa, llaquirishpa, nirca: —Huarmi, ama huacaichu.
42007014	Huañushcata huantuccunaman mayanyashpa, aya cajonta llancarca; llancacpi, shayarinurca. Jesus huañushcata nirca: —Huanpra, jatari nini.
42007015	Chai ucullapi huañushca runa causarirca, rimancapac callarirca. Jesus paita mamaman curca.
42007016	Tucui runacuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharishpa, Diosta yupaichanurca nishpa: —¡Jatun profeta nucanchipacpi jatarirca! ¡Dios paipac runacunamanta yuyarircami!
42007018	Bautisac Juanpash chai tucuita uyarca, paito caticcuna huillanucpi. Chashna cacpi paicunamanta ishcaita cayashpa,
42007019	Jesuspacman cacharca tapuncapac paichu shmuna cac, shuctachu chapana.
42007020	Chai runacuna Jesuspacman pactashpa, ninurca: —Bautisac Juan ñucanchicta cachamurca canta tapuncapac: ¿Canchu shamuna cac? ¿shuctachu chapana canchic?
42007021	Chai ucullapi, achca uncushcacunata alliyachirca; supai japishcacunamanta supaita jichurca; mana ricuc ñausacuna ricuncapac callarinurca.
42007022	Chashna rurashpa, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Juanpacman ticraichic; cancuna ricushcata uyashcatapash huillanquichic. Paita rimanquichic nishpa: Ñausa runacuna ricunun; jancacuna alli purinun; sisu runacuna pichara saquirinun; upa rinricuna uyanun; huañushcacuna causachi tucunun; cushi shimita tsuntsu runacunaman huillanun.
42007023	¡Ñucahuan tuparic runa cushiyucmi can, ñucamanta mana piñarishpa anchuricpi!
42007024	Juanpaccuna rishca huasha, Jesus Juanmanta rimancapac callaritca cashna nishpa: —¿Imata ricuncapac chunlla allpaman rircanquichic? ¿Huaira cuyuchishca pintutachu ricuncapac?
42007025	Chai mana cacpi, ¿imata ricucrircanquichic? ¿Sumac churanata churarishca runatachu?. Chashna churarishcacuna, raimishpalla causaccuna apucunanapac huasicunapi tiyanun.
42007026	Shinacpi, ¿imata ricucrircanquichic? ¿Shuc profetachu?. Ari; ashtahuanpash, profetamanta yalli cacta ricurcanquichic.
42007027	Juanmanta mari quillcara tiyan: Riqui, ñuca shimita apac runata cacharani, canta ñaupashpa ñanpita allichincapac.
42007028	"Shuti nini: Bautisac Juan cunan punchacama causashca runacunamanta yallimi can; chashna cacpipash, Diospac pachapi ura cac runa Juanmanta yalli jatunmi can.
42007029	"Achca runacuna gubirnu cullquita pallaccunapash Juanta inishpa bautisai tucushpa, Diosta chacchanurca;
42007030	ranti fariseocuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash, Juanpacpi mana baudsai tucushpa, Diosta mana chacchanurcachu.
42007031	Huasha Jesus nirca; —¿Cunan causaccunamanta imata rimasha? ¿Imashina ricurinun?.
42007032	Huahuacuna shinacanun; pulasacunapi pucllashpa, shuccuna shuccunata ninun: "Pincullurcanchic, cancunaca mana tushurcanquichic; llaquilla taquircanchic, cancunaca mana huarcanquichic"
42007033	Cairaicu nini: Bautisac Juan tantata mana micushpa, binota mana upiashpa causarca; cancunaca "supaita charin" nircanquichic.
42007034	Huasha, cai RUNA shamurca; pai micuc can, upiac can; cancunaca ninquichic: Cai runa micuisiqui, upiaisiqui can: manallicunahuan gubirnu cullquita pallaccunahuan llaquicpura can.
42007035	Ranti, Diospac yachai pai rurashcacunapi ricurin.
42007036	Shuc puncha, shuc fariseo runa Jesusta cayarca paihuan micuncapac; Jesus fariseo huasiman yaicushpa, mesapi micuncapac tiyarirca.
42007037	Shuc chai llactamanta manalli huarmi, Jesus fariseo huasipi micuracpi uyashpa, shuc asnac yacu butita apashpa paipacman rirca; huasiman yaicushpa,
42007038	Jesuspac chaquipi cuncurirca huacashpa; paipac ñahui huiquihuan Jesuspac chaquita jucuchirca, paipac acchahuan chaquichishpa; huasha, Jesuspac chaquicunata muchashpa, asnac yacuhuan chaicunata armachirca.
42007039	Fariseo runa, chai tucuita ricushpa, paipac shuncupi nirirca: "Cai runa profeta cashpa, yachanman ima laya cashcata paita llancac huarmi; juchayuc huarmi cashcata ricsinman".
42007040	Chashna yuyaracpi, Jesus paita nirca: —Simon, shuc shimita canta rimachihuapai. Simon nirca: —Rimailla, Yachachiccama.
42007041	Jesus nirca: —Shuc dibiyachic runa ishcai dibiyucta charirca. Shuc pichca patsac dibirca, shuc pichca chunca.
42007042	Chai ishcai dibiyuccuna mana imahuan paganata charinucpi, dibiyachic paicunata quishpichirca. Chai ishcaimanta maicantac ashtahuan llaquinca?.
42007043	Simon cutipashpa rirca: —Yalli dibiyuc yalli llaquinca yachin. Chashna nicpi uyashpa Jesus paita nirca: —Chashnami can, alli yuyarcanqui.
42007044	Huasha huarmiman ricushpa, Simonta nirca: —¿Cai huarmita ricuranquichu? Ñuca canpac huasiman yaicushcapi, ñuca chaquita mana maillahuarcanqui; ranti, cai huarmi ñuca chaquita paipac ñahui huiquihuan maillarca, paipac acchahuan chaquichirca.
42007045	Can ñucata mana mucharcanquichu, ranti, cai huarmi caiman yaicushcamanta pacha, ñuca chaquita mana saquishpa muchan.
42007046	Can ñuca umapi asnac huirata mana tallircanquichu; cai huarmi ñuca chaquicunata asnac yacuhuan armachirca.
42007047	Chairaicu canta nini: Paipac juchacuna, achca cashpallata, pichashca saquirinun, cai huarmi achca llaquishcaraicumanta. Maicanpash ansalla perdonashca cashpa, ansalla llaquin.
42007048	Huasha huarmita rimarca nishpa: —Canpac juchacuna pichara saquirinun.
42007049	Chai shimicunata uyashpa, Jesus-huan micuraccuna paicunapura rimai callarinurca nishpa: ¿Pitac can cai runa juchacunatapash pichancapac? Jesus huarmita nirca: —Can inishca canta quishpichirca; casilla ri.
42008001	Chaimanta rishpa, Jesus achca llactacunata purirca, camachishpa, Diospac pachamanta yachachishpa. Chunca ishcai apostolcuna paihuan rinurca.
42008002	Shuc huarmicunapash paita catinurca; Jesus paicunata supaimanta uncuimantapash quishpichishca carca. Shuc Maria Magdalena carca; paimanta canchis supaicunata jichushca carca.
42008003	Shuc Juana shutiyuc carca, Chuzapac huarmi; pai Herodespac imacunata ricuccama carca; shuc Susana shutiyuc carca; achca shuccunapash Jesus-huan puriccuna carca, cullquihuan paita yanapashpa.
42008004	Camachishpa Jesus puriracpi, achca runa paita ricuncapac llactacunamanta shamunurca; chai runacunata ricushpa, Jesus yachachishpa nirca: —
42008005	Shuc runa chacraman rirca tarpuncapac. Tarpucpi, huaquin muyucuna ñahpipi urmanurca; ñanpita puriccuna chaita jaitanurca, pishcucuna micunurca.
42008006	Huaquin muyucuna rumiyuc allpapi urmanurca; huiñashpalla chaquirinurca, yacu illacpi.
42008007	Huaquin muyucuna huita ucupi urmanurca; huítaca alli muyucunata mana huiñachirca.
42008008	Huaquin muyucuna alli allpapi urmanurca; sumac huiñanurca, achcata aparinurca, caran muyu shuc patsac muyuta aparirca. Chashna rimarca Jesus; huasha, sinchi shimihuan nirca: ¡"Rinriyuc runa uyachun"!
42008009	Yachachishcacuna, Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, tapunurca: —¿Can rimashca imata yachachin?
42008010	Jesus nirca: —Dios paipac pachamanta pacashca shimicunata candunaman ricsichin; ranti, shuccunaman yachaehina shimicunahuan yachachini; paicuna ricushpallata, mana ricushca shina saquirinun; uyashpallata, mana atipanun.
42008011	Tarpucmanta rimashca caita yachachin.: "Tarpushca muyu Dios rimashca shimi can.
42008012	Ñanpipi urmashca muyucuna runata ricuchinun, Diospac shimita uyac runata; supai chai runapac yuyaimanta chai Diospac shimita quichun, ama inishpa quishpichi tucuchun nishpa.
42008013	"Rumiyuc allpapi urmashca muyucuna, shimita uyac runata, chaita cushihuan chasquic runata ricuchin; chaicuna mana unaichu ininun; mana sinchi inishcahuan inishpa, juchanayai shamucpi, juchapi urmanun.
42008014	"Huita ucupi urmashca muyucuna, Diospac shimita uyac runata ricuchin; chai laya runacuna cullquita, cushicunallata yuyanun; chairaicu mana aparinun.
42008015	"Alli ailpapi urmashca muyucuna, munaihuan, alli yuyaihuan Diospac shimita chasquic runata ricuchin; huiñai inishpa catinun, achcata aparinun.
42008016	"Manapí chinpusuta japichin imahuanpash chaita quillpancapac, cahuitu ucupi churancapac. Chaita jahuapi churanun, huasiman yaicuccuna ricunuchun nishpa.
42008017	Imatapash pacashca cashpa, pacllaman llucshichishcami canca; pacalla rimashcataca tucuicuna yachanunca.
42008018	Chashna cacpi, allita uyanquichic: Charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca; mana charic runata pai charishcashitutapash quichununca".
42008019	Jesus rimacucpi, paipac mama, paipac huauquicuna shamunurca; achca runa tantarinucpi, Jesus tiyashcaman mana pactana ushanurcachu.
42008020	Shuc runa Jesusta nirca: —Uyai, canpac mama canpac huauquicunapash canchapi tiyanun, canta salurana munanun.
42008021	Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Dios rimashca shimita uyashpa pactachic runacuna, paicunami ñuca mama, ñuca huauquicuna.
42008022	Shuc puncha, Jesus paipaccunantin shuc canuapi yaicushpa nirca: —Jacuichic chinpaman
42008023	Riranucpi Jesus puñuncapac siririrca. Cuncaimanta sinchi huaira jatarirca; bacucuna canuata jaitanucpi, ñalla panparirarca.
42008024	Jesusta ricchachishpa ninurca: —¡Yachachic, Yachachic, panparicunchicmi! Jesus riccharishpa, jatarirca; huairata bacucunatapash piñashpa rimarca; rimacpi, bacucuna samarinurca, tucui casilla saquirirca.
42008025	Chashna tucucpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —¿Cancuna inishca ima tucurca? Paicunaca, mancharishpa rimanacunurca nishpa: —¡Mana pacha! ¿Pitac can cai runa? Yacuta huairatapash rimacpi, paita uyanun.
42008026	Cahuishpa cahuishpa Gadara nishca allpaman pactanurca, cucha chinpaman.
42008027	Jesus canuamanta llucshicpi, chai llactamanta shuc runa Jesuspacman shamurca. Chai runa unaimanta supai japishca carca. Llushti puric carca; mana huasipi causac carca; aya jutcu panpapi causac carca.
42008028	Jesusta ricushpa, paipac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, caparirca nishpa: —¿Imaraicu ñucanchihuan satiringui, Jesus, jatun Diospac churi? Ama ñucata ñacachipaichu.
42008029	Chashna rimarca, Jesus supaita "chai runamanta llucshi" nishpa rimashcaraicu. Achca cuti supai paita japishca carca; runacuna jillai huascacunahuan huatanucpi, pai huascacunata pitishpa, chunlla allpacunaman miticuc carca, supai purichishcaman.
42008030	Jesus paita tapurca: —Ima shuti canqui? Pai cutiparca: —Nuca shuti "jatunbula". Achca supaicuna paipac ucupi yaicunushca carca mari.
42008031	Chai supaicuna Jesusta mañanurca ama paicuna causashca jutcuman cachachun.
42008032	Shuc urcupi achca cuchicuna micuranurca; supaicuna Jesusta mañanurca nishpa: —Chai cuchicunapi ñucanchicta yaicuchipai.
42008033	Jesus "yaicuichiclla" rimacpi, chai supaicuna runamanta llucshishpa, cuchicunapi yaicunurca; yaicushpaca shuc huaicuta cuchaman shitarinurca; yacupi chucallishpa huañunurca.
42008034	Cuchicunata ricuccuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharishpa callpanurca tucuicunaman huillacrincapac.
42008035	Paicuna rimashcata uyaccuna, ima tucushcata ricushun nishpa, Jesus tiyashcaman rinurca; chaiman pactashpa ricunucpi, chai supai japishca runa ña alliyashpa, churanata churarishpa Jesus-huan rimaricurca; paita ricushpa, mancharinurca.
42008036	Chai runahuan tucushcata ricushcacuna imashnata supaimanta quishpichishca cashcata paicunaman rimanurca.
42008037	Chashna cacpi, Gadara suyupi causac runacuna Jesusta mahanurca "caimanta ripai" nishpa, yapa mancharishca canurca mari. Chairaicu, Jesus canuapi yaicushpa rirca.
42008038	Supaicunamanta quishpichi tucushca runa Jesusta mañarca nishpa: —Canhuan pushahuapai. Jesus paita nirca: —
42008039	Saquinlla; canpac huasiman ticrashpa, Dios canhuan rashcata tucuicunaman huillanqui. Chashna nicpi, chai runa nshpa, tucui llactapi tiyaccunaman Jesus paihuan rurashcata huillarca.
42008040	Jesus cuchata chinpashpa ticracpi, runacuna paita chaparanucpi, cushihuan paita chasquinurca.
42008041	Paicunahuan nmanshcapi, shuc runa shamurca, Jairo shutiyuc, tantanna huasipi camachiccama. Jesuspac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, paita mañarca nishpa: —Ñuca huasiman shamupai.
42008042	Shuc ushushillata chanrca, chunca ishcai huatayuc; paica uncushpa huañurarca. Jesus nshcapi, achca runacuna paita catishpa, tancashpa tancashpa punranurca.
42008043	Chai runacuna ucupi shuc uncushca huarmi tiyarca. Chunca ishcai huatata yahuar tallinshpa causarca; janjpiccunahuan paipac cullquita tucuchishca cacpi, paita mana janpina ushanurcachu.
42008044	Chai huarmi Jesusman huashamata mayanyashpa, paipac churanata llacarca; llancashpallahuan paipac yahuar saquinrca.
42008045	Chashna tucucpi, Jesus nirca: —¿Pitac llancahuarca? Tucuicuna "ñuca mana" nishpa nmanucpi, Pedro nirca: —Yachachiccama, achca runacuna canta ñitinun, tancashpa tancashpa quichquiyachinun; ¿canca "pitac llancahuarca" ninqui?
42008046	Jesus cutillata nirca: —Huaquin runa llancahuarca; ñuca ushaihuan shuc runata alliyachishcata yacharcani man.
42008047	Huarmi, chaita uyashpa, "Jesus yachanmi" yuyashpa, chucchushpa Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncunrca. Tucui runacuna uyanucpi, imaraicu Jesusta llancashcata nmarca; "llancashpallahuan alliyachi tucurcani" nirca.
42008048	Jesus paita nirca: —Ushushi, can inishcaraicu alliyachi tucurcanqui. ¡Casilla n!
42008049	Jesus chaira nmacucpi, shuc runa Jairopac huasimanta shamushpa, paita nirca: —Canpac ushushi ña huañurca; ama Jesusta quillachichu.
42008050	Jesus chaita uyashpa Jairota nirca: —Ama llaquinchu; inilla, canpac ushushi alliyancami.
42008051	Huasiman pactanucpi, manapita saquirca paihuan yaicuncapac: Pedrohuan, Jacobohuan, Juanhuan huahuapac yayacunahuan yaicunurca.
42008052	Chaipi tiyaccuna huahuamanta huacaranurca capanshpa. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama huacaichichu, huahua mana huañushcachu, puñuranlla.
42008053	Chashna nicpi, uyaccuna paita asiranurca, huahua huañushcata yachashpa.
42008054	Jesus huahuata maquimanta japishpa, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Huahua, jatan!
42008055	Chai ucullapi huahua causanshpa jatanrca. Jesus nirca: —Paita caraichic.
42008056	Huahuapac yayacuna manchannurca; Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cai tucushcata ama pitapash huillaichichu.
42009001	Shuc puncha, Jesus paipac shunca ishcai runacunata tantachishpa, tucui laya supaicunata jichuna ushanata, uncuccunata janpina ushanatapash paicunaman curca.
42009002	Chai huasha, Diospac shimita uyachincapac, uncuccunata janpincapac paicunata cacharca cashna nishpa: —
42009003	Ama imatapash apanquichichu; punna caspita, shicrata, tantata cullquitapash ama apanquichichu; shuc churanallata apanquichic.
42009004	Shuc huasipi yaicushpa, chaillapi saquinnquichic llactamanta llucshinacama.
42009005	Shuc llactapi cancunata mana chasquinucpi, chaimanta llucshishpa, chaquimanta allpata chausinquichic, paicuna mana alli rashcata ncuchincapac.
42009006	Chashna nicpi, paicuna tucui uchilla llactacunata nnurca, Diospac alli shimita camachishpa, uncuccunata janpishpa.
42009007	Jatun apu Herodes Jesus rashcacunata uyarca; uyashpami ninrca: "Pi chan canca cai runa, huaquincuna "Juanmi" ninun man, huañushca cashpa causanshcami.
42009008	Shuccuna "profeta Eliasmi" ninun; shuccuna "ñaupa tiyashca profetami causanshca"; chashna nmanun.
42009009	Ranti, Jerodes nirca: —Ñucallata Juanta huañuchichircani; pi chan canca cai runa; paimanta achcata nmahuanun. Chashna nishpa Jerodes Jesusta ncunata munarca.
42009010	Jesus camachincapac cachashcacuna ticramushpa, tucui rashcata Jesusta huillanurca. Jesus uyashpa, paicunahuan runa illashcaman nrca, Betsaida nishca llacta mayanpi.
42009011	Runacuna, chaita yachashpa, Jesusta catishpa nnurca; pai tiyashcaman pactanucpi, Jesus paicunata Diospac pachamanta yachachirca, uncuccunata alliyachirca.
42009012	Ña tutayaracpi, apostolcuna Jesusta ninurca: —Runacunata cachannqui; mayan huasicunapi micuncapac, puñuncapac nnuchun, cai panpapi manaima tiyan.
42009013	Jesus cutiparca: —Cancuna paicunata caranquichic. —¿Imahuan? —ninurca—; pichca tantata, ishcai yacu aichata channchic. Ñucanchillata micuna rantishpa, paicunata carashun imachai.
42009014	Pichca huarancashi canurca cancunalla. Jesus nirca: —Runacunata pichca chunca pichca chunca tiyanchichic.
42009015	Tucuicuna tiyannurca.
42009016	Tiyannucpi, Jesus tantacunata yacu aichacunatapash japirca. Huasha, jahuaman ncushpa, Diosta pacrachushpa, chaicunata paquishpa apostolcunaman curca, paicuna runacunata carancapac.
42009017	Tucuicuna sacsacta micunurca; puchushcata pallashpa, chunca ishcai ashancata juntachinurca.
42009018	Shuc puncha Jesus chunlla allpaman nrca Dios-huan nmanncapac; yachachishcacuna paihuan tiyanurca. Jesus paicunata tapurca: —Runacuna pimi ninun ñucata?
42009019	Cutipanurca: —Huaquincuna "Bautisac Juanmi" ninun; huaquincuna "Eliasmi" ninun; huaquincuna "Shuc ñaupa profetacunamanta causanshca" ninun.
42009020	Jesus cutillata tapurca: —Cancunaca pimi nishpata nihuanquichic nucata? Pedro nirca: —Can Dios jahuishca runami canqui.
42009021	Chashna nicpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama pitapash huillaichichu.
42009022	Huasha nirca: —Cai RUNA achcata llaquichi; tucunca; rucucuna, pacnyaya apucuna, yachaccuna paita chicninunca, paita huanuchinunca; chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causanncami.
42009023	Huasha, Jesus tucui runacunata nmarca nishpa:' —Maicanpash ñucata catinayashpa, quiquinpac munaita saquichun, crusta apanshpa ñucata catichun.
42009024	Maicanpash causaita quishpichinayashpa, chaita chincachincami; causaita chincachic ñucaraicu, causaita tupanca.
42009025	¿Imata yapachin shuc runa tucui cai pachapi tiyashcata yapachishpa, pai quiquinllata chincachicpi?.
42009026	"Maicanpash ñucamanta ñuca yachachishcamantapash pincancpi, cai RUNApash paimanta pincanncami, pai apu tucushpa, paipac Yayahuan angelcunahuanpash shamuna punchapi.
42009027	Shuti pacha cancunata nini: Caipi tiyaccunamanta huaquincuna chaira mana huañushpa, Diospac pacha shamushcata ncununca.
42009028	Pusac puncha huasha, Jesus shuc urcuman sicarca Dios-huan nmanncapac; Pedro, Jacobo, Juan paihuan nnurca.
42009029	Dios-huan nmacucpi, paipac" ñahui shuc laya tucurca; paipac churana yuraclla, punchaclla inti shina ncunrca.
42009030	Cuncaimanta, ishcai runa ncunmunurca Jesus-huan nmanshpa: shuc Moises carca, shuc Elias carca;
42009031	paicunapash yuraclla ncunranurca; Jesus Jerusalen llactapi huañunca rashcata nmanranurca.
42009032	Pedro paihuan tiyaccunantin, yapa puñunayashpallata mana puñunurca,
42009033	Chai ishcai runa ña Jesusmanta anchunranucpi, Pedro Jesusta nirca: —Yachachic, alli tiyaranchic caipi. Can munacpi, quimsa tanputa rurashun: canpac shuc, Moisespac shuc, Eliaspac shuc. Mana yachashpa chashna nmarca.
42009034	Chaira nmacucpi, shuc puyu paicunata quillparca; puyu ucupi yapa manchannurca.
42009035	Chai puyumanta shuc shimi uyanrca cashna nishpa: —Caimi ñuca llaquishca Chun. Paita uyana canquichic.
42009036	Huasha, shimi upallarca, mana uyanrca; Jesus sapalla tiyarca. Yachachishcacuna manapita paicuna ncushcata huillanurca.
42009037	Cayantin puncha, urcumanta uraicunucpi, achca runa paicunahuan tupanncapac nnurca.
42009038	Paicunamanta shuc sinchi shimihuan Jesusta nirca: —Yachachic, ñuca chunmanta imatapash rurapai, ñuca shuclla chunmi.
42009039	Shuc supai paita japic can; paita capanchin; shimimanta putscuta llucshichin, paita yapa ñacachin, paimanta mana llucshinata munan.
42009040	Can yachachishcacunata mañarcani supaita llucshichincapac; mana ushanurcachu.
42009041	Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¡Mana iniccuna, manallita ruraccuna! ¿Imuracama cancunahuan tiyasha?¿Imuracama cancunata apansha? Canpac chunta pushamui.
42009042	Huanpra mayayamucpi, supai paita allpaman urmachirca, sinchita capanshpa, quihuinshpa. Chashna tucucpi, Jesus supaita piñashcahuan nmashpa, huanprata alliyachirca.
42009043	Chaita ncuccuna Diosta chacchanurca. Jesus rashcacunamanta tucuicuna manchannucpi, pai yachachishcacunata nirca: —
42009044	Uyahuaichic, ñuca nmanca rashcata ama cuncanchichu: Juchayuccuna cai RUNAta japinunca.
42009045	Yachachishcacuna, Jesus nmashcata mana atipanurcachu; paicunapac mana japipac carca; "can nmashcata ñucanchicta atipachipai" nishpa nmancapac manchanurca.
42009046	Shuc puncha, Jesus yachachishcacuna paicunapura nmanshpa, tapunacunurca "ñucanchicmanta maican yalli can" nishpa.
42009047	Jesus, paicuna shuncu ucupi yuyarashcata yachashpa, shuc huahuata cayashpa, paipac ñaupacpi shayachishpa, paicunata nirca: —
42009048	Nuca shutipi cai huahuata chasquic ñucata chasquin; hucata chasquicca ñucata cachamushcata chasquin. Cancunamanta ura cac runa, mai jatun canca.
42009049	Chai huasha Juan nirca: —Yachachiccama, shuc runata canpac shutipi supaicunata jichushcata tuparcanchic; mana ñucanchic bulamanta cacpi, paita "ama chashna ruraichu" nircanchic.
42009050	Jesus nirca: —¿Imapac jarcachishcanquichic?. Ñucanchicta mana chicnic runa ñucanchihuan tucun.
42009051	Jesus cai pachamanta nna pacha pactamucpi, pitapash mana manchashpa, Jerusalenman nna yuyaita japirca.
42009052	Ñaupacta huaquincunata cacharca shuc Samana llactapi micunata puñunatapash allichincapac.
42009053	Chai llactapi causaccuna Jesusta mana chasquinurcachu, pai Jerusalenman nrashcaraicu.
42009054	Santiagohuan Juanhuan chaita yachashpa, Jesusta ninurca: —Apunchic, jahua pachamanta ninata urmachishun paicunata rupachincapac: ¿munanquichu?
42009055	Jesus paicunata piñarca;
42009056	chaimanta shuc llactaman rirca.
42009057	Riranucpi, shuc runa ñanpipi Jesusta nirca: —Maimanpash can ricpi, canta catishami.
42009058	Jesus paita nirca: —Chaccacuna puñuna jutcuta charinun, pishcucunapash huasita charinun; ranti, cai RUNA maipi puñunata mana charinchu.
42009059	Astanipi, Jesus shuc-huan tuparishpa, paita nirca: —Ñucahuan shamui. Pai cutiparca: —Ñaupacta huca yayata panpacrisha.
42009060	Jesus paita nirca: —Ñucapi mana iniccuna huañushcacunata panpanuchun; can Diospac pachamanta rimacrinqui.
42009061	Shucca Jesusta nirca; —Apunchic, canta catinata munani; ñaupacta ñuca aillucunata "rinimi, samashun" rimachihuapai.
42009062	Jesus paita nirca: —Maicanpash tacllata japishpa huashaman ricucpi, Diospac pachaman yaicuncapac mana allichu can.
42010001	Chai huasha, shuc puncha Jesus canchis chunca ishcai runacunata acllashpa, paicunata ishcaipura pai rinca rashca llactacunaman cacharca; paicuna Jesusta ñaupashpa rinurca.
42010002	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Pallana chacra achcami, pallaccuna ansallami. Chacra amuta mañaichic pallaccunata paipac chacraman cachachun.
42010003	Richic. Cancunata manso huihuacuna shina cachani pumacuna ucupi.
42010004	Cullquita huacaichina carata, shicrata ushutatapash ama apaichichu. Ñanpipi manapihuan rimarinquichic.
42010005	Shuc huasiman yaicushpa, cashna ninquichic: "Caipi tiyaccunaman ganas causai shamuchun".
42010006	Alli shuncu runa chaipi tiyacpi, cancuna apashca ganas causaita chasquincami; mana tiyacpi, cancunapacman ticranca.
42010007	Chai huasillapi saquirinquichic; imatapash cancunata caranucpi, micunquichic, upianquichic. Llancac runaman pai yapachishcata cuna can, "Runk huasita ama puricachaichichu.
42010008	Shuc llactaman pactashpa, runacuna cancunata chasquinucpi, imatapash cancunaman carashcata micunquichic.
42010009	Chaipi tiyac uncuccunata janpinquichic. Runacunata rimanquichic: Diospac pacha mayanllami.
42010010	"Cancunata shuc llactapi mana chasquinucpi, callecunapi rimanquichic:
42010011	"Cai llactamanta ñucanchic chaquipi llutarishca allpatapash chausinchic, cancunahuan saquirinun. Chashnapash, caita uyaichic: Diospac pacha mayanyaran".
42010012	Cancunata nini: Sodoma llactamanta runacuna chai llactapi tiyaccunamanta ura ñacachi tucununca.
42010013	¡"Corosain llacta, Betsaida llacta, cancunapac yapa manchaipac canca! Nuca cancunapacpi rashcacunata Tiro llactapi Sidon llactapi ruranushca cacpi, unaimanta chai llactacunapi tiyaccuna Diosman ticranunman carca; chaita ricuchincapac tsuntsu churanata churarinunman carca, ushpatapash uma jahuapi churanunman carca.
42010014	Chairaicu nini: Taripana puncha cancuna chai llactacunamanta yalli sinchi nacachi tucunquichic.
42010015	"Canca, Cafarnaun llacta, caran puncha yalli casha ninquichu? Tucuimanta yalli pincachishcami canqui.
42010016	"Cancunata uyac runa nucata uyahuan. Cancunata mana chasquic runa ñucatapash mana chasquin; ñucata mana chásquicca ñucata cachamushcata mana chasquin.
42010017	Chai canchis chunca ishcai runacuna achca cushiyashcahuan ticranurca; Jesusta ninurca: —Apunchic, supaicunapash ñucanchicta uyanurca canpac shutimanta.
42010018	Jesus nirca: —Supaita shuc rayo shina jahuamanta urmarashcata ricurcani.
42010019	Cancunaman ushaita curcani machacuicunata, upitinticunata jaitancapac, cancunata chicniccunata atincapac; cancunaman mana ima tucunca.
42010020	Chashna cacpipash, ama cushiyaichichu supaicuna cancunata uyashcamanta; cancunapac shuticuna jahua pachapi quillcara cashcamanta cushiyanquichic.
42010021	Chashnapi, Jesus achca cushiyashpa Diospac Samai paita cushichicpi, nirca: —Canta chacchani, Yayalla; can jahua pacha amu canqui, cai pacha amu canqui; can yachaccunaman pacashcata mana yachac runacunaman ricsichinqui. Ari, Yaya, can chashna munarcanqui.
42010022	Ñuca Yaya tucuita ñuca maquipi churarca. Manapí Diospac Churita ricsin, Yayalla paita ricsin. Chashnallata, manapí Yayata ricsin, churilla paita ricsin; churi munashcacunapash Dios Yayata ricsinun.
42010023	Chai huasha, yachachishcacunaman ricushpa, pacalla paicunata nirca: —Cushiyuccunami cancuna ricurashcata ricuccuna.
42010024	Achca profetacuna jatun apucunapash cancuna ricurashcata ricunayashpa, mana ricunurcachu; cancuna uyarashcata uyanayashpa, mana uyanurcachu.
42010025	Shuc puncha, shuc camachic quillcata yachac, Jesusta camasha nishpa, paita tapurca: —¿Chicapac causanata japincapac imata rurana cani?
42010026	Jesus cutiparca nishpa: —¿Imata quillcara tiyan camachic quillcapi?
42010027	Pai nirca: —Canpac Apu Diosta tucui shuncuhuan, tucui almahuan, tucui ushaihuan, tucui yuyaihuan llaquina canqui. Shuccunataca can quiquinta shina llaquina canqui.
42010028	Jesus paita nirca: —Alli rimarcanqui; chaita rurashpa, huiñai causanata charinqui.
42010029	Chai runa, mana yanca tapushcata ricuchincapac, cutillata tapurca: —¿Pitac can chai "shuccuna" nishca ("projimo" nishca)?
42010030	Jesus cutipashpa, cashna rimarca: —Shuc runa Jerusalenmanta Jericoman riracpi, shuhuacuna paita japinurca; paita llipachishca huasha, tucui pai charishcata quichushpa, miticunurca, chai runata nalla huañushcata saquishpa.
42010031	"Chai ñanpillata shuc pacriyaya rirarca; chucrishca runata ricushpallata, paita mana yanaparca.
42010032	Shuc huasha shamushca levita nishca runapash, chucrishcata ricushpallata, mana yanapashpa rirca,
42010033	Ranti, shuc samaritano runa, chaillatatac rishpa, chucrishca runata ricushpa, llaquirirca;
42010034	paipacman mayanyashpa, chucricunata huirahuan, binohuan janpirca, churanahuan pillurca; huasha paipac caballopi sicachishpa, samana huasiman paita pusharca; chaipi paita cuirarca.
42010035	Cayantin puncha, pai rinca rashpa, ishcai cullquita huasi amuta curca nishpa: "Allita ricunqui cai runata; ashtahuan mutsuricpi paita janpincapac, ñuca ticramucpi cushcanqui".
42010036	Chashna rimarca Jesus; huasha tapurca: —Chai quimsa runamanta maican chucrichishca runata pai quiquinta shina llaquirca?.
42010037	Yachac runa cutiparca: —Chucrishcata yanapashca runami yachin. Jesus paita nirca: —Canpash chasnallata ruranqui.
42010038	Jesus purishpa, shuc uchilla llactaman pactarca. Shuc Marta shutiyuc huarmi huasipi paita chasquirca.
42010039	Chai huarmi shuc ñañata charirca, Maria shutiyuc; pai Jesuspac chaqui mayanpi tiyarishpa, paipac shimita uyararca.
42010040	Marta micunata, puñunata imatapash allichirarca. Jesuspacman rishpa nirca: —Yachachic, ¿manachu ricunqui ñuca ñaña sapalla saquihuashcata tucuita allichincapac?. Paita rimai ñucata yanapachun.
42010041	Jesus cutiparca nishpa: —Marta, Marta, caiman chaiman purishpa, achcacunata rurashpa llaquirinqui.
42010042	Shuclla mutsurin. Maria mai allita acllarca, chaita paimanta mana quichununcachu.
42011001	Shuc puncha Jesus Dios-huan rimaricurca; tucuchitpi, shuc pai yachachishca runa nirca: —Apunchic, Juan paita caticcunaman Dios-huan rimanata yachachishca shina, ñucanchicta yachachipai
42011002	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna Dioshuan rimarishpa, cashna rimanquichic: Yaya, tucuicuna canta ricsinuchun. Can Apu tucuncapac shamui.
42011003	Caran puncha ñucanchic mutsushca tantata cunqui. Ñucanchic manallita rashcata quishpichipai, ñucanchicpash quishpichinchic shuccuna ñucanchicman manalli rashcata. Juchanayaipi urmancapac ñucanchicta ama saquichu.
42011005	Huasha Jesus nirca: —Cancunamanta shuc runa paipac mashipacman rishpa chaupi tuta, paita nin: "Mashi, quimsa tantata mañachihuai;
42011006	shuc mashi shamuhuarca mari, ñucaca mana imata charinichu paita carancapac".
42011007	Chai runa huasi ucumanta cutipan nishpa: "Ama quillachihuaichu; puncu ña huichcara can, huahuacuna ñucahuan sirinun; mana ushanichu jatarishpa tantata cuncapac".
42011008	Chai runa tacashpa cayaracpi, ¿manachu paipac mashi jatarinca tantata cuncapac?. Mashi cashcaraicu mana jatarishpaca, ama ashtahuan quillachi tucuncapac jatarinca, tucui mutsushcata paiman cunca.
42011009	"Chashna cacpi cancunata nini: Mañaichic, cushcanquichic. Mashcaichic, tarinquichic. Puncuta tacaichic, pascanuncami.
42011010	Tucui manac chasquin; mashcac tarin; puncuta tacac runaman pascanun.
42011011	"¿Cancunamanta maican yaya, paipac churi, "tantata cuhuapai" nicpi, shuc rumita paiman cunca? ¿Aichata mañacpi, yaya machacuita cuncachu?
42011012	¿Lulunta mañacpi, upitintita cuncachu?
42011013	Chashna cacpi, cancuna, manallicuna cashpallata, alli imacunata churicunaman cunquichic, ¿manachu cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya Diospac Samaita paita mañaccunaman cunca?
42011014	Shuc puncha, Jesus shuc runamanta supaita llucshichicurca; chai runa supairaicu mana rimac carca, upa shimi carca; supai llucshicpi, runa rimai callarirca. Runacuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharinurca;
42011015	ranti, huaquincuna ninurca: —Cai runa Belcebú nishca supaicuna apupac ushaihuan supaita jichun.
42011016	Shuccuna "mana raipacta rurai jahua pachapi" nishpa Jesusta camashpa ninurca.
42011017	Jesus, paicuna yuyarashcata ricsishpa, nirca: —Shuc llactapi causaccuna chican chican chaupirishpa, paicunapura piñarinucpi, chai llacta tucurincami; chashnallata, shuc huasipi causac aillucuna, paicunapura piñanacushpa, tucurinuncami.
42011018	Supaicunapash chican chican tucushpa, ¿manachu tucurinunca? Caita nini "supai apupac ushaihuan supaicunata jichunqui" ninquichic mari.
42011019	Ñuca supai apupac ushaihuan supaicunata jichucpi, ¿cancunata caticcuna pipac ushaihuan supaicunata jichunun?. Paicuna rurashcahuan cancuna pantashcata ricuchinun.
42011020	Shuti pacha, ñuca Diospac ushaihuan supaicunata jichuni; chashna rashpa, Diospac pacha cancunapacman pactamushcata ricuchini.
42011021	"Shuc sinchi runa huasita ricucpi, huasipi causaccuna casilla tiyanun.
42011022	Ranti, shuc ashtahuan sinchi runa shamushpa paita aticpi, huasipi tiyashcacunata japishpa, apashpa rinca.
42011023	Maicanpash ñucahuan mana tiyashpa, ñucata chicnin; ñucahuan mana pallac manaimata japin.
42011024	"Shuc millai supai runamanta llucshishpa, chunlla allpacunapi puricachan, samasha nishpa; maipi samanata mana tarishpa, paipac shuncupi nirin: "Ñuca llucshishca runa ucuman ticrasha".
42011025	Ticrashpaca, chai runata tupan chushac huasi shina pichashcata, allichishcata.
42011026	Chaita ricushpa, chaimanta rishpa, shuc canchis supaicunata pushamun ashtahuan millaicunata; tucuicuna chai runapi causancapac yaicunun; yaicunucpi, chai runa ashtahuan manalli tucun.
42011027	Jesus chashna rimacucpi, shuc chaipi shayac huarmi, runa ucumanta caparishpa, nirca: —¡Cushiyucmi canta pacarichishca huarmi, canta chuchuchishca huarmi!.
42011028	Jesus cutiparca: —Ashtahuan cushiyuccuna canun Dios rimashcata uyaccuna, chaita pactachiccuna.
42011029	Achca runa Jesuspacman tantarimunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cunan causaccuna manalli canun, shuc mana raipacta mañanun; shuc mana raipacta mana ricununcachu; profeta Jonas-huan tucushcata yuyarichisha.
42011030	Ninive llactapi causaccunaman Jonas ricurina shina carca; chashnallata cunan causaccunaman cai RUNA unancha shina canca.
42011031	"Taripana puncha, sur nishcamanta jatun apu huarmi, cunan causaccunata taripashpa, cautsayachinca, pai carumanta shamurca mari Salomonpac shimicunata uyancapac; cancunapacpica shuc Salomonmanta ashtahuan jatun tiyanmi.
42011032	Ninive llactapi causashcacuna cunan causaccunata cautsayachinunca taripana punchapi, paicuna Diosman ticranurca mari Jonas paicunaman Diospacmanta rimashcapi; cáipica shuc Jonasmanta astahuan jatun tiyanmi.
42011033	"Manapí shuc chinpusuta japichin pacashcapi churancapac, mana mala ucupi churancapacpash; jahuapi churan, huasipi tiyaccunata ricuchincapac.
42011034	Ñahuicuna achic shinami canun aichapac; canpac ñahuicuna alli cacpi, tucui aicha punchayanca; canpac ñahuicuna manalli cacpi, tucui aicha tutapi tiyanca.
42011035	Yuyanqui canpac achic ama tuta tucuchun.
42011036	Canpac aicha punchayashca cacpi ima yanapash illac, tucuita punchaclla ricunqui, shuc chinpusu paipac achic-huan ricuchishca shina.
42011037	Jesus rimanata tucuchishcapi, shuc fariseo runa micuncapac huasiman cayarca. Jesus shamushpa mesaman tiyarirca.
42011038	Micuncapac maquita mana maillacpi ricushpa fariseo runa mancharirca.
42011039	Jesus paita nirca: —Cancuna, fariseocuna, canchamanta callanacunata mucahuacunatapash maillanquichic; ranti, cancunapac shuncu shuhuashcacuhahuan manallita rashcacunahuan juntashca can.
42011040	¡Upacuna! ¿Canchapacta rurac ucupactapash rurashcata manachu yachanquichic?
42011041	Tsuntsu runacunaman cancuna charishcata cuyaichic; cancuna chashna ruracpi, tucui chuya saquirinca.
42011042	"¡Ayailla cancuna, fariseocuna! Cancuna menta nishcamanta, ruda nishcamanta, tucui sami micuna pancamantapash chunca raquita Diosman cunquichic; ranti, cusca causanata, Diosta llaquinata ñahuilla ricunquichic. Caicunata pactachina can, chai shuccunata mana saquishpa.
42011043	"¡Ayailla, cancuna, fariseocuna! Tantarina huasicunapi ñaupac tiyarinacunata munanquichic; callecunapi salurai tucunata munanquichic.
42011044	"¡Ayailla, cancuna! Mana ricuric aya jutcucuna shina canquichic, runacuna chaicuna jahuapi mana yachashpa purinun:
42011045	Chashna rimacpi, shuc camachic quillcata yachac Jesusta nirca: —Yachachiccama, can rimashcahuan ñucanchictapash caminqui.
42011046	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¡Ayailla cancunapash, camachic quillcata yachaccuna! Mana marcaipaccunata shuccunata apachinquichic, cancunaca shuc rucallahuanpash mana llancanquichic.
42011047	"¡Ayailla cancuna! Cancunapac ñaupacuna huañuchishca profetacunapac pantioncunata shayachinquichic.
42011048	Chashna rurashpa, cancunapac ñaupacuna alli rashcata ricuchinquichic, paicuna profetacunata huañuchinurca mari, cancunaca paicunapac pantioncunata shayachinquichic.
42011049	"Chairaicu, Dios tucuita yachac cashpa, nirca: Profetacunata apostolcunatapash paicunapacman cachanca rani; paicunaca huaquincunata huañuchinunca, huaquincunata ñacachinunca.
42011050	Cunan causac runacuna ñacachishca mi canunca cai pacha callarishcamanta huañuchi tucushca profetacunapac yahuarmanta,
42011051	Abelmanta Zacariascama; paita Diospac huasipi tiyac altar mayanpi huañuchinurca. Cutillata nini: Cunan causaccuna chai tucuicunamanta ñacachi tucununca.
42011052	"¡Ayailla cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna! Yachana llaveta japircanquichic; cancunallatac mana yaicunquichic, yaicushun niccunataca jarcanquichic".
42011053	Jesus chai shimicunata rimashcapi, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash paihuan yapa piñarinurca; paita quillachincapac achcata tapunurca,
42011054	pai nishcapi urmachishun nishpa, paita cautsayachincapac.
42012001	Shuc puncha, achca huaranca runacuna tantarinurca, paicunapura ñitirishpa. Jesus rimancapac callarishpa, ñaupac pai yachachishcacunata yachachishpa nirca: —Llullacama fariseocunata yuyanquichic.
42012002	Imapash pacashca cashpa, pacllaman llucshichishca canca; pacalla rimashca yachai tucunca.
42012003	Shinacpi, cancuna tutapi rimashcata punchapi uyachinunca; cancuna huasi ucupi pacalla nishcata, huasi jahuamanta caparishpa huillanunca.
42012004	"Nuca mashicuna, cancunata nini: Aichata huañuchiccunata mana manchanachu; chaipac huasha ña mana ushanun imatapash rancapac.
42012005	Maicanta manchanata ricuchisha: Huañushca huasha cancunata ucupachaman shitana ushacta manchana canquichic. Ari, paitami manchana canquichic.
42012006	¿Manachu pichca pishcushituta ishcai cullquipi catunun? Chashna cacpipash, Dios chaicunamanta shucllatapash mana cuncarinchu.
42012007	Cancunapac uma acchacunapash yupashca canun. Ama manchaichichu cuti; cancuna achca pishcunamanta yalli canquichic.
42012008	"Shuti cancunata nini: Maicanpash runacuna ñaupacpi ñucamanta alli rimacpi, cai RUNApash paimanta alli rimanca Diospac angelcuna ñaupacpi;
42012009	ranti, maicanpash ñucamanta rimashpa "paita mana ricsinichu" nicpi runacunapac ñaupacpi, "paita mana ricsinichu" ninunca Diospac angelcuna ñaupacpi.
42012010	"Maicanpash cai RUNAta camishpa rimacpi, quishpichi tucunca; ranti, Diospac Samaita camishpa rimacpi, mana quishpichi tucuncachu.
42012011	"Tantarina huasicunaman, taripaccunapacman, apucunapacman cancunata pushanucpi, ama llaquirinquichichu imata rimashun nishpa, imashnata rimashun nishpa. Rimana pacha pactaricpi, Diospac Samai cancunata rimanata yachachinca.
42012013	Shuc puncha, shuc runa Jesusta nirca: —Yachachiccama, ñuca huauquita rimai ñucanchic yayamanta japishcata ñucahuan chaupichichun.
42012014	Jesus cutipashpa, paita nirca: —Runahuan, ¿pimi ñucata churarca cancunata taripancapac, cancunapacta allichincapac?
42012015	Huasha nirca: —Cullquita yapacta munanata yuyanquichic. Shuc runa tucuita charicpipash, pai charishcacunahuan mana causaita rantina ushanca.
42012016	Chashnapi cai yachachina rimanata rimarca nishpa: —Shuc cullquiyuc runami carca; paipac chacracunamanta yapa achcata pallarca.
42012017	¿Imatata rasha? yuyarirca. ¿Maipi huca pallashcata huacaichisha? Ñuca huacaichina huasicuna yapa uchilla canun.
42012018	Ajá, caita rasha: chai uchilla huasicunata urmachisha ashtahuan jatuncunata shayachincapac.
42012019	Achcata charishpa, achca huatata mana ima pishihuanca. Chaicunahuan micusha, upiasha, cushi causasha, samasha.
42012020	Chashna yuyaracpi, Dios paita nirca: Upa runa, cunan tuta canpac almata apancapac shamununca. ¿Can tantachishcata pitac japinca?
42012021	Chashna tucun quiquinpacllata tantachic runa, Diospacpi mana cullquiyuc tucucpi.
42012022	Chai huasha, Jesus yactiachishcacunata nirca: —Ama llaquirichichu "causancapac imata micushun, imata upiashun" nishpa.
42012023	Causana micunamanta yalli can; aicha churanamanta yalli can.
42012024	Pishcucunata yuyarichic: mana tarpunun, mana pallanun huasipi huacaichincapac; chashnapash, Dios paicunata caran. Cancuna pishcunamanta yalli cahquichic.
42012025	"Cancunamanta maican imatapash rashpa, causaita unayachinca?.
42012026	Uchillacunatapash mana rurana ushashpa, ¿imapac jatuncunamanta llaquirinquichic?.
42012027	"Sisacunata ricuichic: maha llancanun, mana puchcanun; chashnapash, cancunata nini: Salomon tucui laya churanacunata charicpipash, sisacuna pai churarishcamanta yalli sumac ricurinun:
42012028	"Dios mana unaichu causac sisacunata chashna churachicpi, ¿manachu ashtahuan allita cancunata churachinca, ansalla iniccuna?
42012029	Chairaicu, ama llaquirichichu imata micushun, imata upiashun nishpa.
42012030	Diosta mana iniccuna chaicunamanta llaquirinun; cancuna Yayata charinquichic, pai yachan cancuna chai tucuita mutsushcata.
42012031	Diospaccunata mashcaichic, chai shuccunataca cui tucunquichic.
42012032	"Uchilla runabula, ama manchaichichu; cancunapac Yaya paipac pachata cancunaman cuncami.
42012033	Charisticacunata catushpa, imapash illaccunaman cuyaichic. Mana ismuric shicracunata cancunapacta ruraichic, mana tucuriccunata tantachichic jahua pachapac; chaipi shuhuacuna mana yaicunun, susu mana micun.
42012034	Can yapa munashca tiyashcapi, chaipi canpac shuncu tiyanca.
42012035	"Allichirishca caichic, chinpusuta japichishpa chaparaichic.
42012036	Patron shuc raimimanta ticramunata chaparac luncu shina caichic, pai shamushpa cayacpi urastalla pascancapac.
42012037	Cushiyucmi chai luncucuna, patron shamunata chaparaccuna. Shuti nini, patron paicunata. tiyarichinca, paicunata caranca.
42012038	Patron unai tuta shamushpa, tutamantashitu shamushpa, luncucunata chaparashcata taricpi, cushiyucmi chai luncucuna.
42012039	Caita yachaichic: Huasi amu shuhua shamunca rashca pachata ricsishpa, chapanman shuhua ama huasiman yaicuncapac.
42012040	Chashnailata cancuna allichirishca caichic, cancuna mana yuyashcapi cai RUNA shamunca mari.
42012041	Pedro chaita uyashpa, Jesusta tapurca: —Apunchic, ¿chai can rimashea ñucanchipacllachu rimarcanqui? ¿tucui runacunapacchu rimarcanqui?
42012042	Jesus nirca: —¿Maican alli yuyayuc, runa canca, patron, huasipi tiyacunata carancapac mincashpa saquishca?
42012043	Chashna ruracuc luncu patron shamuna pachapi, ¿manachu? Cushiyucmi chai luncu.
42012044	Shuti cancunata nini: patron charishcacunata ricuncapac chai luncuta churanca.
42012045	"Ranti, chai luncu "patron unayancami" yuyashpa, shuc luncucunata quiliachincapac callaricpi, ashtahuanpash micuncapac, upiancapac, machancapac cailaricpi,
42012046	pai mana yuyashcapi, mana yachashcapi, paipac patron shamunca, paita ñacachinca, manalli runacunata shina cautsayachinca.
42012047	"Shuc luncu paitac patron munashcata yachashpallata chaita mana allichishpa charicpi, patron munashcata mana pactachicpi, yuyaita llipachishcami canca;
42012048	ranti, shuc luncu, paipac patron munashcata mana yachashpa, mana ruranata ruracpi, ansallami llipachishca canca. Shue runaman achcata cunucpi, achcata paimanta mañanunca; shuc runaman achcata mincanucpi, ashtahuan paimanta mañanunca.
42012049	"Ñuca cai pachaman ninata japichincapac shamurcani; na japiricpi, alli canman.
42012050	Shuc bautisanahuan bautisai tucuna cani; chai pactarinacama yapa llaquirini.
42012051	"¿Ñuca cai pachaman ganas causanata apamuncapac shmushcata yuyanquichichu? Mana, piñanacunata apamuni.
42012052	Cunanmanta pacha shuc huasipi pichca runa tiyacpi, quimsa iscaihuan piñanacushpa causanunca.
42012053	Yaya churihuan piñashpa causanca, churica yayahuan; chashnallata mama ushushihuan pinanacunca, ushushi mamahuan. Cari mama cachun-huan macarinunca, cachunca paipac cari mamahuan.
42012054	Jesus caitapash nirca runacunata yachachispa: —Cancuna, inti yaicushcamanta puyucuna jataricpi ricushpa, ninquichic: "Tamianca ran" Chashna tucun.
42012055	Uramanta huairacpi ninquichic: "Rupai puncha tucunca ran"; cancuna nishca shina tucun.
42012056	¡Llullacamacuna! Tamia punchata, rupai punchata ricsinquichic jahuaman ricushpa; ¿imaraicu cai punchacunapi tucucushcata mana japinquichic?.
42012057	"¿Imaraicu alli cashcata yachancapac cancunallata mana yuyanquichic?
42012058	Can shuc runahuan ima llaquitapash charishpa, urastalla paihuan allichinqui, chaira apupacman mana pactashpa. Mana chashna racpi, apu canta chapaman cunca, chapaca chunta curralqui canta huichcanca.
42012059	Chaimanta mana llucshinqui tucuita allichinacama.
42013001	Shuc puncha, huaquin runacuna Jesusta huillancapac shamunurca shuc galileo runacunaman tucushcata; Pilato paicunata huañuchishca carca, paicuna Diosman huacra yahuarta chasquichishcapi.
42013002	Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Chai galileo runacuna chashna huañushcaraicu, shuccunamanta ashtahuan juchayuc cashcata yuyanquichichu?
42013003	Mana, shuti nini; cancunaca paicuna shinalla huañunquichic, Diosman mana ticrashpa.
42013004	"Jerusalen llactapi shuc huasi tularishcapi (torre de Siloe nishca huasi), chunca pusac runa chai ucupi huañunurca; ¿chashna huañushcacuna shuccunamanta ashtahuan juchayuc cashcata yuyanquichichu?.
42013005	Mana, nini; tucuicunaca paicuna shinalla huañunquichic, Diosman mana ticrashpa.
42013006	Huasha shuc yachachinata rimarca cashna nishpa: —Shuc runa shuc higuera nishca yurata charirca chacrapi. Muyucunata pallasha nishpa ricpi, shucllapash mana tiyarca.
42013007	Chacra ricuccamata cayashpa nirca: Ña quimsa huata shamuni muyucunata cai yuramanta pallancapac, mana aparinchu. Cuchui, ¿imapac yanca shayan caipi?
42013008	Ricuccama paita nirca: —Apulla, ama cuchushun, saquilla shuc huatata; ñuca yura muyucta allashpa, alli allpata churasha; aparinca ima chari. Mana aparicpi, chai shuti cuchunquimi.
42013010	Shuc cuti, samana puncha cacpi, Jesus tantarina huasipi yachichicurca.
42013011	Chaipi shuc huarmi tiyarca, chunca pusac huatata uncushca; shuc supai paita cumuyachishca carca; allita shayarishpa purincapac mana usharcachu.
42013012	Jesus paita ricushpa nirca: —Huarmi, canpac uncuimanta llushpichishca canqui.
42013013	Chashna nishpa maquita paipac jahuapi churacpi, chai huarmi allita shayarirca; shayarishpa, Diosta chacchancapac callarirca.
42013014	Tantarina huasi apu, Jesus samana punchapi huarmita allichishcaraicu piñarishpa, chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Sucta puncha tiyan llancancapac; chai punchacunapi shamunquichic allichi tucuncapac; samana punchapi mana allichu.
42013015	Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¡Llullacamacuna! ¿Manachu samana punchapi cancunapac huacrata pascashpa yacuman apanquichic upiachincapac?
42013016	Cai huarmica, Abraanpac ushushi cacpi, supai paita huatashcata charicpi chunca pusac huatamanta, ¿manachu paita uncuimanta llushpichina carca samana punchapi?
42013017	Jesus chaita rimacpi, tucui paita chicniccuna pincarishpa saquirinurca; ranti, runacuna Jesus sumac rashcacunata ricushpa cushiyanurca.
42013018	Shuc cuti, Jesus cashna nishpa yachachirca: —¿Imahuan Diospac pachata chinpapurachisha? ¿Imashnata ricurin?
42013019	Shuc mostaza nishca muyu shinami; tarpunucpi, huiñan, yura tupu tucun; huairapi huanpuric pishcucuna paipac pallcacunapi huasinun.
42013020	Cai shuctapash rimarca: —¿Imata nishpa Diospac pachata atipachisha?
42013021	Leyadura nishca shinami; shuc huarmi ansashituta japishpa, quimsa tupu harinahuan masan, chai ansashituca tucuita punquichin.
42013022	Jesus Jerusalenman rirashpa, pai purishca llactacunapi runacunata yactiachirca.
42013023	Shuc runa paita tapushpa nirca: —Apunchic, ¿manachu ansalla runacuna quishpinunca?
42013024	Jesus cutiparca: —Cariyaichic quichqui puncuta yaicuncapac; achca runa yaicunata munashpa, mana ushanuncachu.
42013025	Huasi amu puncuta huichcacpi, canchamanta caparishpa cayanquichic nishpa: "Apulla, apulla, puncuta pascai". Paica cutipanca: "Cancunata mana ricsinichu".
42013026	Cancuna ninquichic: "Canhuan micuc carcanchic, upiac carcanchic; can ñucanchic llactacunapi yachachic carcanqui".
42013027	Pai cutipanca: "Cancunata mana ricsinichu. Ñucamanta anchurichic, manallita ruraccuna".
42013028	Cancunaca huacanquichic, ñacarishpa caparinquichic Abraanta, Jacobta, Isaacta tucui profetacunantin Diospac huasiman yaicushcata ricushpa, cancuna canchaman jichushca cashpa.
42013029	Tucui suyucunamanta shamununca, raimincapac Diospac huasiman yaicununca.
42013030	Cunan puchucai caccuna ñaupaccuna canunca; cunan haupac caccuna puchucaicuna tucununca.
42013031	Chai punchallapi, huaquin fariseocuna Jesuspacman shamushpa ninurca: —Caimanta shucman ri; Herodes canta huañuchinata munan.
42013032	Jesus cutiparca: —Chai huacllic runapacman richic; paita cashna ninquichic. "Cunan puncha caya punchapash supaicunata jichusha, uncuccunata alliyachisha; caya puncha huasha, ñuca ruranata tucuchisha.
42013033	Chai puncha pactamunacama, ñuca ñanpita rirani, shuc profeta Jerusalen llactapi mari huañuna
42013034	"Jerusalen, Jerusalen: Profetacunata huañuchic canqui, Dios cachashcacunata rumihuan shitac canqui. Achca cuti canpac churicunata tantachinata munarcani, shuc atallpa mama paipac huahuacunata ricra ucupi ucllashca shina, canca mana munarcanquichu.
42013035	Uyaichic cuti: cancunapac huasi jichushca saquirinca; ña mana ricuhuanquichic, cancuna cashna rimanacama: "Diospac shutipi shamuc yupaichashca cachun".
42014001	Shuc samana puncha, Jesus shuc fariseo runapac huasiman yaicucpi micuncapac, shuc fariseocuna chaparanurca paita juchachincapac.
42014002	Chaipi shuc uncushca runa tiyarca, huicsa punquirishca.
42014003	Jesus paita ricushpa, camachic quillcata yachaccunata fariseocunatapash tapurca nishpa: —¿Samana puncha uncushca runata alliyachipacchu? ¿manachu alliyachina?
42014004	Tapucpi uyashpa chunlla saquirinurca. Upallanucpi Jesus uncushcata maquimanta japishpa alliyachirca; huasha, huasiman paita cacharca.
42014005	Fariseocunata nirca: —Cancunapac huacra shuc jutcuman urmacpi, manachu urastalla surcunquichic samana puncha cacpipash?
42014006	Chaita uyashpa mana imata cutipana ushanurcachu.
42014007	Huaquincuna mesapi ñaupac tiyarinata japinucpi ricushpa Jesus cashna camachirca: —
42014008	Can shuc sahuarina raimiman cayashca cashpa, ama ñaupac tiyarinapi tiyarichu; canmanta ashtahuan jatun cayashca tiyanman ima chari;
42014009	pai shamucpi huasi amu canta rimanca: "Anchuripai cai runa can tiyarishcapi tiyarincapac". Canca pincarishpa, puchucai tiyarinapi tiyarinami canqui.
42014010	Ranti, can shuc sahuarina raimiman cayashca cashpa, puchucai tiyarinapi tiyaricpi, alli canca; chashna racpi, huasi amu canta ninca: J "Mashi, ñaupacman tiyaric shamui". Canca canhuan pacta cayashcacuna ñaupacpi jahuayachishcami canqui.
42014011	Maicanpash jaiunyashpa pincachishca mari canca; maicanpash uchillayashpa jahuayachishcami canca.
42014012	Huasha, Jesus paita micuncapac cayashcata nirca: —Can shuc raimita rurashpa, ama cayanquichu canpac mashicumata, canpac huauquicunata, canpac aillucunata, canpac mayanpi causac cullquiyuccunata; paicunapash canta shuc puncha micunapac cayanunca, chaihuan pagai tucurcanqui.
42014013	Ranti, can shuc raimita rurashpa, tsuntsu runacunata, suchucunata, janca chaquicunata, ñausacunata cayanqui,
42014014	Chashna rurashpa, cushiyanqui Paicuna mana imata mari charinun canta pagancapac; allicuna causarina puncha pagai tucunqui.
42014015	Chai shimicunata uyashpa, chaipi micuraccunamanta shuc nirca: —¡Cushiyucmi Diospac pachapi micuncapac tiyaric runa!
42014016	Nicpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Shuc runa jatun raimi micunata allichirca; achea runacunata cayarca.
42014017	Micuna puncha pactacpi, shuc luncuta cacharca cayashcacunata rimancapac: "Shamuichic, ña tucui allichira can".
42014018	Cayashcacuna "mana shamushun ima chari" nii callarinurca. Shuc nirca: "Shuc allpata rantircani, cunanshitu ricucrini; quishpichihuai, mana ri ushanichu".
42014019	Shuc nirca: "Chunca huacrata rantircani chaicunahuan allpata yapuncapac, chaicunata camancapac racuni; quishpichihuai, mana ri ushanichu".
42014020	Shuc nirca: "Cunan puncha sahuarircani, chairaicu mana ri ushanichu".
42014021	Chai luncu huasiman ticrashpa, amuta: tucuita: huillarca. Amu uyashpa, piñarishpa, luncuta nirca: —Ucta llactaman ri; callecunapi, pulasacunapi can tupashca tsuntsucunata, suchucunata, jancacunata, ñausacunata caiman pushamunqui".
42014022	Chai luncu rishpa, cutillata ticrashpa nirca: —Apu, can rimahuashcata pactachircani; cuti, chaira chushac tiyan micuna ucupi
42014023	Amu nirca: —Cutillata ri, ñanpicunapi maipipash tupashcacunata shamuchinqui micuna ucu juntarinacama.
42014024	Ranti, chai ñaupac cayashcacuna mana pipash ñuca micunata camanunca.
42014025	Achca runacuna Jesus-huan purinucpi, paicunata nirca:
42014026	—Shuc runa ñucahuan samushpa, paipac yaya-mamata, paipac huarmita, paipac huauquicunata, paipac aillucunata, pai quiquinllatata ñucamanta yalli llaquishpa, ñuca yachachishca tucuncapac mana allichu.
42014027	Ñucata catic runa crusta mana aparishpa, ñuca yachachishca tucuncapac mana allichu.
42014028	"Shuc runa, huasita" rurasha nishpa, manachu ñaupacta pai charishca cullquita yupan, pactancachu manachu pactanca ima chari, huasita tucuchincapac nishpa?.
42014029	Mana chashna rurashpa, istanticunata shayachishca huasha, mana tucuchi ushanman, cullqui illacpi; chaita ricuccuna paita asinunca nishpa:
42014030	"Cai runa huasincapac callarishpa mana tucuchina usharcachu.
42014031	"Chashnallata,:shuc suldaru apu macanacuncapac risha nishpa, manachu ñaupacta paipac shuncupi yuyan: "Ushashachu chunca huaranca suldarucunahuan ishcai chunca huarancahuan shamucta atincapac?.
42014032	Mana ushashpaca, paiman shimita cachan nishpa: "Mana macanacunata munanichu, mashipura allichishunchic".
42014033	"Cunan cancunata nini: Maicanpash tucui charishcata mana saquishpa, ñuca yachachishca cancapac mana allichu.
42014034	Cachi alli can; cachi paipac mishquita chincachicpi, imahuan cutillata cachiyanca.
42014035	Mana imapac alli can, jichununlla. Yuyayuc runa atipachun".
42015001	Achca gubirnu cullquita pallacunahuan juchayuccunahuan Jesuspacman shamuccuna carca paita uyancapac.
42015002	Chaita ricushpa, fariseocuna camachic quillcata yachaccunantin paimanta rimaranurca nishpa: —Cai runa juchayuccunahuan puric can, paicunahuan micuc can.
42015003	Jesus chaita uyashpa, paicunata cashna rimarca: —
42015004	Shuc patsac obejata charic runa, shuc chincaricpi, ¿manachu shuccunata saquishpa, chincarishcata mashcacrin tarinacama?.
42015005	Tarishpaca, chaita ricrapi aparishpa rin cushiyashpa.
42015006	Huasiman pactashpa, paipac mashicunata mayanpi causaccunatapash tantarichishpa nin: "Ñucahuan cushiyaichic, chincarishca obejata tarircani mari".
42015007	Chashnallata tucun, shuc runa juchata saquishpa Diosman ticracpi; chai runa iscun chunca iscun alli runacunamanta yalli Diosta cushiyachin.
42015008	Shuctapash rimarca cashna nishpa: —Chunca cullquita charic huarmi, shuclla chincaricpi, manachu chinpusuta japichishpa cullquita mashcan, huasita pichan tucui cuchucunapi ricun cullquita tarinacama?.
42015009	Tarishpaca, paipac aillucunata mayanpi causaccunatapash tantarichishpa nin: "Cushiyaichic ñucahuan, chincarishca cullquita tarircani mari".
42015010	Chashnallata tucun, shuc juchayuc runa llaquirishpa Diosman ticracpi; jahua pachapi angelcuna yapa cushiyanun.
42015011	Jesus shuctapash rimarca cashna nishpa: —Shuc runami carca, ishcai churiyuc yaya.
42015012	Quipa churi yayata nirca: "Yaya, ñucapacta cuhuai". Yayaca, charishcacunata chaupichishpa, churicunaman curca
42015013	Manapash unaipi, quipa churi paipaccunata japishpa, caru llactaman rirca; chaipi nuspa shina causashpa, pai apashcacunatai tucuchirca.
42015014	Tucuita jichushca huasha, jatun yariciai tucurca chai llactapi.
42015015	Yaricashpa, shuc huiracuchapacman llancacapac yaicurca. Huiracucha cuchicunata michincapac paita cacharca.
42015016	Cuchicuna micushca sacha muyucunata ihicunayan, manapi mari paita caran.
42015017	"Yuyaita japishpa, chai runa nirca: Ñuca yayapacpi achca llancac runa tiyan, achca micunata charinun; ñuca, ranti, caipi yaricashpa huañurani.
42015018	Cunanllata rincapac racuni. Yayapacman pactashpa rimasha: Ñuca yayalla, Diosta piñarcani, cantapash piñarcani;
42015019	canpac churi cancapac mana allichu cani: llancaccama shinallapash chasquihuapai;
42015020	"Chashna nirishpa jatarishpa, yayapacman rirca. Chaira carupi tiyashcapi, yaya paita ricurca; ricushpa shuncupi llaquirirca; paipacman callpashpa rishpa, paita ucllarca, mucharca.
42015021	Churi yayata nirca: "Yaya, Diosta piñarcani, cantapash piñarcani; canpac churi cancapac mana allichu cani".
42015022	Ranti, yaya luncucunata nirca: "Ucta, alli churanata apacrichic paita churachincapac. Shihuita paipac maquipi churaichic; ushutatapash churachichic.
42015023	Huira huacra huahuata apacrichic, huañuchichic. ¡Micushunchic, raimishunchic!
42015024	Cai ñuca churi huañushca cashpa, causarircami; chincarishca cacpi, paita tarircani". Chashna nicpi, raimincapac callarinurca.
42015025	"Paipac ñaupac churi chacrapi tiyarca. Huasiman ticrashpa, cajashcata, tushushcata uyarca.
42015026	Chaita uyashpa, shuc luncuta cayashpa tapurca: ¿"Imatái chai uyarishca"?.
42015027	Luncu cutiparca: "Canpac huauqui ticramushcami, canpac yayaca huira huacrata huañuchirca pai alli ticramushcaraicu".
42015028	Chaita uyashpa sinchi piñarirca; piñarishpa huasiman mana yaicuna munarca. Paipac yaya canchaman llucshishpa, "yaicuilla, churi" nirca.
42015029	Churica yayata nirca: "Yaya, uyahuai; achca huatata canhuan llancarani, can rimashcata tucuita pactachircani; chashnapash, mana shuc atallpatapash cuyahuarcanqui ñuca mashicunahuan micushpa cushiyancapac.
42015030	Ranti, chai canpac churi shamucpi, can charishcacunata manalli huarmicunahuan tucuchishca huasha, mai huira huacrata huañuchircanqui".
42015031	Yaya paita cutiparca; "Churi, can huiñai ñucahuan tiyanqui, tucui ñuca charishcacuna canpacmi.
42015032	Ranti, raimina carca, cushiyarina carca, cai canpac huauqui huañushca cashpa causarirca mari; chincarishca cacpi, paita tarircanchic".
42016001	Jesus runacunata yachachishpa caitapash nirca: —Shuc yapa cullquiyuc runami carca. Tucui charishcacunata ricuncapac shuc ricuccamata charirca; chai runa patron charishcacunata mana allita ricuc carca, nalla tucuchirca; chaita patronta huillanurca.
42016002	Patron ricuccamata cayashpa nirca: —¿Imata ruracunqui ñuca charishcacunahuan? Quillcacunata allichi, ñucahuan ña mana llancancachu ranqui.
42016003	Ricuccama, chaita uyashpa, shuncupi nirirca: —¿Cunanmanta imata rurashpa causasha, ñuca patron jichuhuan mari? ¿Chacrata rashpachu? Mana ushanichu. ¿Mañacushpa puricachashachu? —Pincachihuan
42016004	Ajá, ñami yachani imata ranata caimanta llucshicpi, runacuna huasipi chasquihuancapac:
42016005	Chashha nirishpa, patronta dibic runacunata huasha huasha cayarca. Shuc shamucpi, paita tapurca: —¿Mashna dibinqui patronta?
42016006	Pai nirca: —Huirata dibini shuc huaranca litro tupu. Ricuccama paita nirca: —Caica canpac quillca; tiyarishpa, shucta quillcai "pichca &patsac dibini"
42016007	Huasha shucta cayashpa tapurca: —¿Canca mashnata dibinqui? Pai nirca: —Arrosta dibini shuc patsac ashanca tupu. Paita nirca: —Caica canpac quillca; "pusac chunca ashanca" quillcai. Chashnallata shuccunahuan rurarca.
42016008	Patron, cuiraccama rashcata uyashpa, paita chaccharca shuhua shina rashcapipash, pai yuyayuc cashcamanta. Cai causaipacta mashcaccuna paicunapura rurashcacunapi Diospaccunata mashcaccunamanta yalli yuyayuc canun. Chashna nirca Jesus; huasha paicunatarcamachkca nishpa: —
42016009	Cai mana alli yapachishca cullquihuan mashicunata ruraichic, cullqui tucurishcapi, mashicuna jahua pachapi cancunatachasquincapac.
42016010	Ansallata allita ricuc runa. achcatapash allita ricunca; ansallata mana ricuc runa achcatapash mana allita ricunca.
42016011	Cai pacha cullquihuan cancuna mana alli ruracpi, ¿pitac mai jatuncunata cancunaman cunca?.
42016012	Cancuna shucpaccunata mana alli ricucpi, ¿pitac cancuna quiquinpacta cunca?
42016013	"Manapí ishcai, patronhuan tucuna ushan; shucta llaquishpa, shucta chicninca. Shucta uyashpa, shucta mana uyancachu. Dios-huan, cullquihuan mana tucuna usharinchu.
42016014	Fariseocuna, cullquita yapa munaccuna cashpa, Jesus rimshcata uyashpa paita asinurca.
42016015	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancuna, runacuna ñaupacpi allicuna shina ricurishpa causanquichic; ranti, Dios cancunata ucuta ricsin; runacunapacpi "jatun cani" nishpa niccunata Dios chicnin
42016016	"Juan shamushcacama Moisespac camachia quillca tiyarca, profetacuna yachachishcatapash pactachina carca. Chaimanti Diospac pacha uyachishcami can; tucuicunaca chaiman yaicusha niccunata ñacachinun;
