42016017	ranti, cai pachahuan jahua pachahuan tucuricpipash, camachic quillcapi tiyac mana chincarincachu, illacta pactarinca.
42016018	"Shuc runa quiquin huarmita jichushpa shuc-huan sahuaricpi, jatun juchata aparin; chashnallata, cari jichushca huarmihuan sahuaric runa jatun juchata aparini:
42016019	"Shuc yapa cullquiyuc runami carca; sumac churanata churaric carca; caran puncha raimi punchapi shina micuc carca.
42016020	Cullquiyuc runapac huasi puncupi, shuc tsuntsu runa, :Lazaro shutiyuc, allpapi tiyacushpa causac carca; carachalla aparishca carca.
42016021	Cullquiyuc runapac mesamanta urmac puchucunata micunayarca; manapí paita cararca; allcucunapash paipac carachacunata llahuac carca.
42016022	"Shuc puncha, chai tsuntsu runa huañurca; huañucpi, angelcuna jahua pachaman pushanurca, Abraan tiyashcaman. Cullquiyuc runapash huauñuca; huañucpi, panpanurca.
42016023	Ucupachapi tiyashpa, ñacarishpa, caruman Abraanta ricurca; Lázaro paihuan tiyarca.
42016024	Paicunata ricushpa caparirca nishpa: —Yaya Abraan, ñucamanta llaquiripai, Lazarota ñucapacman cachamupai, paipac maqui rucata yacupi jucuchishpa, ñuca calluta chirichincapac, cai ninapi yapa ñacarini mari.
42016025	Abraan cutiparca nishpa: —Churi, yuyari, can causacushcapi cushilla causarcanqui, mana ima canta pishirca; ranti Lazaro mana imata charirca, nanaipi causarca. Cunan caipi cushilla causan, ranti, can nanachishcami canqui.
42016026	Ashtahuan rimasha: Shuc jatun huaicu cancunata ñucanchicmanta anchuchin. Caimanta cancunapacman chinpasha niccuna mana ushanun chinpancapac; chashnallata, cancuna tiyashcamanta ñucanchicpacman mana chinpaipac can.
42016027	Cullquiyuc runa chaira nirca: —Chashna cacpi, yaya, canta mañani: Lazarota ñuca yaya huasiman cachapanqui,
42016028	pichca huauquicunata charini mari; paicunata rimachun ama cai nanai pachaman shamuncapac.
42016029	Abraan nirca: —Moises quillcashcata, profetacuna quillcashecta yachanun, paicunata uyanuchun.
42016030	Cullquiyuc runa nirca: —Mana, yaya Abraan; shuc huañushcacunamanta paicunapacman ricpi, Diosman ticranuncami.
42016031	Abraan cutiparca: —Moisesta profetacunatapash mana uyanucpi, shuc huañushca runa causaricpipash mana ininuncachu.
42017001	Shuc puncha Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Runacunata juchaman aisaccuna huiñai tiyanunca; ayailla chashna ruraccuna.
42017002	Alli canman chai runapac cuncapi jatun rumita huatashpa, ñucñu yacuman shitanuchun. Yuyanquichic cuti.
42017003	Canpac huauqui canta piñacpi, paita quishpichinqui.
42017004	Shuc punchallapi canchis cuti canta mana allita rarashpa, canchis cuti "ñuca rurashcamanta llaquirini" nistipa canpacman shamucpi, paita quishpichina canqui.
42017005	Shuc puncha yachachishcacuna Jesusta ninurca: —Ñucanchic inishcata huiñachipai.
42017006	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancuna inishca shuc uchilla muyu shina cacpi, chaipi shayac yurata ninquichicman "Chaimanta anchuri, ñucñu yacuman shitari" nishpa, paica cancunata uyanman.
42017007	"Cancuna shuc luncuta charishpa, pai chacra pichashcamanta, huacracunata michishcamanta ticracpi, ¿paita "tiyari micuncapac" ninquichichu? Mana.
42017008	Paita ninquichic: "Ñuca micunata allichishpa carahuanqui; huasha can micunqui"
42017009	¿Chai luncuta pacrachunachu ranata rashcamanta? Mana.
42017010	Chashnallata, cancuna Dios rurai nishcata rurashca huasha ninquichic: "Llancaccunallami canchic, ruranallatami rurarcanchic".
42017011	Jesus Jerusalenman rifashpa,rSamaria mayanta, Galilea mayanta rirca.
42017012	Shuc llactaman yaicushcallapita; chunca sisu runacuna paita tupancapac llucshinurca.
42017013	Carupi shayarishpa caparinurca nishpa: —Jesus, yachachiccama, ñucanchicmanta llaquiripai.
42017014	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Pacriyayacunapacman ricuchiricrichic. Riranucpi, alliyachi tucunurca.
42017015	Paicunamanta shuc ña picharishcata ricurishpa, urastalla ticrarca, sinchi shimihuan Diosta chacchashpa.
42017016	Jesuspac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, paita pacrachurca; chai runa Samariamanta runa carca.
42017017	Jesus, paita ricushpa, nirca: —¿Manachu chuncapura canurca picharacuna? ¿Shuccuna maipi tiyanun?
42017018	Cai sapalla, mana judio cac runa, Diosta chacchancapac ticramurca.
42017019	Huasha paita nirca: —Shayari, canpac huasiman ri; can inishca canta quishpichirca.
42017020	Shuc puncha fariseocuna Jesusta tapushpa ninurca: —¿Imura Dios apu tucuncapac shamunca? Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Dios apu tucuncapac shamushpa, mana ricuipacchu canca.
42017021	Mana ninuncachu "caipi can", "chaipi can" nishpa; Diospac pacha ña cancunapacpi tiyan.
42017022	Huasha yachachishcacunata nirca: —Shuc puncha, cancuna cai RUNA causashca punchacunata ricunayashpa, shucllatapash mana ricunquichic.
42017023	Cancunata ninunca: "Caipi can, chaipi can". Chashna niccunata ama uyanquichichu, ama catinquichichu.
42017024	Shuc rayu jahua pachapi ricurin shucmanta shuccama llinpiashpa; chai layallata canca cai RUNA shamuna puncha.
42017025	Chai puncha pactanacama achcata paita llaquichinunca; cunan causaccuna "paita mana munanchic" nishpa jichununca.
42017026	"Cai RUNA shamuna punchapi, Noe causashca punchacunapi shina tucunca,
42017027	Runacuna micuranurca, upiaranurca, sahuariranurca Noe jatun canuapi yaicushca punchacama; chai huasha, jatun tamia shamushcapi, tucuilla huañunurca.
42017028	"Chashnallata tucurca Lot causashca punchacunapi: runacuna micuranurca, upiaranurca, ranticunurca, catucunurca, tarpucunurca, huasicunata shayachicunurca.
42017029	Lot Sodoma llactamanta llucshishcapi, jahua pachamanta nina asufrehuan urmarca, tucuicunataca huañuchirca.
42017030	Chashnallata tucunca cai RUNA shamuna punchapi,
42017031	Chai puncha, huasi jahuapi tiyaccuna ama uraicunuchun huasi ucumanta charishcacunata apancapac; chacrapi tiyaccuna ama huasiman ticranuchun.
42017032	Lotpac huarmiman tucushcata yuyarinquichic.
42017033	Maicanpash causaita quishpichisha nishpa, chaita chincachincami; causaita chincachic runa chaita cutillata charinca.
42017034	Cancunata nini: chai tutapi, ishcai shuc cahuitupi puñununca: shucta pushanunca, shucta saquinunca.
42017035	Ishcai pacta cutacununca: shuc apai tucunca, shuc saquishcami canca.
42017036	Ishcai runa chacrapi tiyanunca: shucta pushanunca, shucta saquinunca
42017037	Chai shimicunata uyashpa Jesusta tapunurca: —Apunchic, maipi chashna tucunca? Pai cutiparca: —Huañushca aicha tiyashcapi ancacuna tantarinunca.
42018001	Shuc puncha, Jesus runacunata yachachincapac imashnata Dios-huan rimana can mana sanpayashpa,
42018002	cashna rimarca: —Shuc llactapi shuc taripac runa tiyarca; Diosta mana manchac, runacunata mana llaquic carca.
42018003	Chai llactallapita shuc huarmi tiyarca; chai taripac runapacman rirca mañancapac nishpa: "Shuc runa ñucata chicnihuan; ñucanchicpura tucushcata allichipai".
42018004	Taripac runa unaita chai huarmita mana uyarcachu. Shuc puncha yuyarirca: "Ñuca Diosta mana manchashpallata, shuccunata mana llaquishpallata,
42018005	cai huarmi yallicta quillachihuacpi, paita uyashpa allichisha, casi ricuhuancapac".
42018006	Jesus nirca: Chaitami rimarca manalli taripac runa.
42018007	Diosca, pai acllashcacuna, punchantin tutantin paiman caparinucpi, ¿manachu paicunata uyanca?. Cúnaca cancunata tapuni: ¿Cai RUNA shamuna puncha chaira inic runa tiyancachu cai pachapi?.
42018009	Jesus cai rimahata uyachirca huaquin runacunaraicu, paicuna "ñuca alli runami cani, shuccuna huacllic runa canun" nishpa yuyaccuna carca. Cashna nirca. —
42018010	Ishcai runa Diospac huasiman rinurca paihuan rimarincapac. Shuc fariseo runa carca; shuc gubirnu cullquita pallac runa carca.
42018011	Fariseo runa shayashpa, cashna nirca: "Dios, ñuca mana shuc runacuna shina cashcaraicu canta pacrachuni: paicuna shuhua canun, manallita ruraccuna, shucpac huarmita japiccuna canun; mana cai gubirnu cullquita pallac runa shinachu cani.
42018012	Caran semana ishcai cuti sasic cani; tucui ñuca charishcacunamanta chunca raquita cuc cani".
42018013	Ranti, gubirnu cullquita pallac runa, cuchupi tiyashpa, ñahuicuna jahuaman shayachinata manchashpa, maquihuan pai quiquinta huactararca nishpa: "Dioslla, ñucamanta llaquiripai, juchasapa runa mari cani!".
42018014	Shuti cancunata nini: Cai runa paipac huasiman ticrashpa, Dioshuan allichishpa rirca; ranti, fariseo runa mana. Maicanpash pai quiquinta jahuayachishpa uchillayachishcami canca; maicanpash pai quiquinta uchillayachishpa, jatunyachishcami canca.
42018015	Shuc puhcha llullu huahuacunata Jesuspacman pushamunurca "paicunata llancapai" nishpa; yachachishcacuna, chaita ricushpa, piñarishpa "anchurichic caimanta" ninurca.
42018016	Jesus paicunata cayashpa nirca: —Imaraicu huahuacunata quillachinquichic? Paicuna ñucapacman shamunata ama jarcaichichu; Diospac pacha paicuna shina caccunapac mari can.
42018017	Shuti cancunata nini; Diospac pachata chasquic runa, huahua shina mana chasquishpa, mana imura jahua pachaman yaicuncachu.
42018018	Chaipi tiyaccunamanta shuc apu runa Jesusta tapurca: —Alli yachachiccama, imata rana cani mana tucuric causaiman pactancapac?
42018019	Jesus paita nirca: —¿Imaraicu ñucata "Alli" nishpa hihuanqui?. Shucllami alli, Dios.
42018020	Canca Dios rurai nishcacunata yactianqui: Shucpac huarmihuan ama llutarinquichu; runata ama huahuchinquichu; ama shuhuanquichu; ama shucmanta llullashpa rimanquichu; canpac yayata, canpac mamata yupaichanqui".
42018021	Rimacpi uyashpa, chai runa nirca: —Chai tucuita huahua eashcamanta pactachircani.
42018022	Jesus chaita uyashpa nirca: —Chaira shuc canta pishin: Tucui charishcacunata catushpa, tsuntsu runacunaman cunqui; chashha rashpa, jahua pachapi cullquiyuc tucunqui; chai huasha ñucahuan shamunqui.
42018023	Chai runa uyashpa yapa llaquirirca, yapa cullquiyuc mari carca.
42018024	Jesus paita llaquirishcata ricushpa, nirca: —Cullquiyuccuna mana yaicunallachu canun Diospac pachapi.
42018025	Shuc camello nishca huihua tupulli jutcuta ashtahuan pasanalla canca, cullquiyuc runa Diospac pachaman yaicunamanta.
42018026	Chaita uyaccuna ninurca: —¿Chashna cacpi, pitac quishpina ushanca?
42018027	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Runa mana ushashcata Dios ushan.
42018028	Pedro nirca: —Apunchic, ñucanchic tucuita saquircanchic canta catincapac.
42018029	Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Shuc runa huasita cacpi, yaya mamata cacpi, huauquicunata capi, huarmita cacpi, churicunata cacpi, Diosraicu saquishpa,
42018030	cai pachapi pai saquishcamanta yalli cui tucunca; cai pacha tucurishca huasha, mana tucuric causaita japinca.
42018031	Jesus chunca ishcaicunata chicanman cayashpa, paicunata nirca: —Jerusalenman riranchic, chaipi, profetacuna cai RUNAmanta quillcashcata pactarinca.
42018032	Paita mana judio caccunaman cununca; paita asinunca, caminunca, tiucanunca.
42018033	Paita llipachinunca, huañuchinunca; chashnapash quimsa puncha huasha causarincami.
42018034	Chashna nicpi uyashpa, yachachishcacuna mana imata atipanurcachu; "imata nin cai runa mana yachanchic" ninurca; Jesus rimashca mana atipaipacchu carca.
42018035	Jesus Jerico nishca llacta mayanman pactashcapi, shuc ñausa runa "imatapash cuyahuaichic" nishpa ñanpipi tiyacurca.
42018036	Achca runacuna ñanpita purinucpi uyashpa, "imata tucun" nishpa tapurca.
42018037	Cutipanurca: —Nazaretmanta Jesus caita riran.
42018038	Ñausa runa chaita uyashpa caparirca: —Jesus, Davidpac churi, ñucamanta llaquiripai
42018039	Ñaupacpi riraccuna paita piñanurca "Upallai" nishpa; ranti, pai ashtahuan sinchi caparirca: —Davidpac churi, ñucamanta llaquiripai.
42018040	Jesus, caparishcata uyashpa, shayarirca; shayarishpa, "paita pushamuichic" nirca. Pushamunucpi, paita tapurca: —
42018041	¿Imata munanqui ñuca canta rancapac? Ñausa runa nirca: —Apunchic, ñuca ricunata munani.
42018042	Jesus paita nirca: —Ricuilla, can inishcamanta alli tucurcanqui.
42018043	Chai ucullapi, ñausa runa ricuncapac callarirca; Diosta chacchashpa, Jesusta catishpa rirca. Chaita ricushcacunapash Diosta chacchanurca.
42019001	Jesus Jerico llactaman pactashpa, callecunata purirarca.
42019002	Chai llactapi shuc cullquiyuc runa tiyarca, Zaqueo shutiyuc, gubirnu cullquita pallacunapac apu.
42019003	Pai Jesusta ricsinata munarca; allpalla runa cashpa, achca runacuna juntarinucpi, paita mana ricuna usharcachu.
42019004	Chashna cacpi, ñaupacman callpashpa, shuc yuraman sicarca; chai mayanta Jesus rina carca.
42019005	Jesus chaiman pactashpa, Zaqueota yurapi ricushpa nirca: —Zaqueo, utcalla uraicui, canpac huasipi saquirinca rani.
42019006	Chaita uyashpa, Zaqueo urastalla yuramanta uraicurca; cushiyashpa, Jesusta huasipi chasquirca.
42019007	Chaita ricushpa, tucui runacunai Jesusta huashapi rimai callarinurca "shuc juchayuc runapac huasipi saquirin" nishpa.
42019008	Zaqueo manapita manchashpa, Jesusta nirca: —Apulla, ñuca charishcacunamanta chaupita tsuntsu runacunaman cunca rani; pimantapash umachishpa ñuca yallicta japishca cashpa, chuscurcuti yapashpa cutichisha.
42019009	Jesus paita nirca: —Cunan puncha cai huasiman quishpichina yaicurca; cai runapash Abraanpac churimi can.
42019010	Cai RUNAca chincarishcata mashcancapac, paita quishpichincapac shamurca.
42019011	Runacuna chai shimicunata uyaranurca. Jerusalenman pactana mayanpi, Jesus shuc yachachina rimanata rimarca, paicuna "Diospac pacha pactanca ran ima chari" nishpa yuyanucpi.
42019012	Cashna rimarca: —Shuc jatun runa caruman rirca, pai quiquinpac llactapi apu tucuna shimita japincapac, apu tucushpa ticrancapac.
42019013	Chaira mana rishpa, chunca paihuan llancaccunata cayashpa, caranman cullquita curca nishpa: —Cai cullquihuan rantishpa catushpa llancaichic nuca ticranacama.
42019014	Chai llacta runacima paita chicninurea; chairaicu, paipac huashalla shimita cachanurca "mana munanchic cai runa ñucanchic apu tucuchun" nishpa.
42019015	Chashnapash, paita chai llactamanta aputa ruranurca; chai huasha ticramurca. Huasiman pactashpa, chai paihuan llancaccunata cayaita, cullquita cushcacunata, "ñuca cushca cullquihuan mashnata yapachinurca" yachancapac.
42019016	Ñaupac shamushpa nirca: —Apu, can cuhuashca cullquihuan chunca cullquita yapachircami.
42019017	Pai nirca: —Allimi, alli runa, pactachic runa canqui; ansallahuan allita rashcaraicu, chunca llacta apu tucunqui.
42019018	Shuc shamushpa nirca: —Apu, can cuhuashca cullquihuan pichca cullquita yapachircani.
42019019	Paitapash nirca: —Allimi, can pichca llacta apu tucunqui.
42019020	Shuc shamushpa ninca: —Apu, caica canpac cullqui; shuc churanahuan pillushpa huacaichircani,
42019021	canta mancharcani mari; can millai shuncuyuc canqui; can mana cushcata mañanqui, mana tarpushcata pallanqui.
42019022	Chashna nicpi uyashpa, apu nirca: —Mana alli llancacruna, can rimashcallahuan canta taripani. Ñuca sinchi runa cashcata, mana cushcata mañac cashcata, mana tarpushcata pallac cashcata yacharcanqui;
42019023	Chashna cacpi, ¿imaraicu nuca cushca cullquita mana bancopi churarcanqui mirarincapac, ñuca ticramushpa chai cullquita yapashcantin japincapac?
42019024	Chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Cullquita quichuichic paimanta, chunca cullquita charicman cuichic.
42019025	Paicuna ninurca: —Apu, ña chunca cullquita charin.
42019026	Apu cutiparca: —Mana imananchu; charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca; ranti, mana charic runa pai charishcashitutapash quichui tucunca.
42019027	Ñucata chicniccunataca caiman pushamuichic, ñuca ñaupacpi paicunata huañuchichic.
42019028	Chai shimicunata rimashca huasha, Jesus yachachishcacunata ñaupashpa Jerusalenman rirca.
42019029	Betfage llactaman, Betania llactaman pactashpa, Olivos nishca urcu mayanpi, Jesus ishcai yachachishcacunata nirca:
42019030	—Ñahuipura tiyac tacsha llactaman richic. Chaiman pactashpa, shuc burro nishca huihuata huatashcata tupanquichic; chai burro jahuapi manapí chaira sicarcachu; pascashpa apamunquichic.
42019031	"Imapac pascanquichic" tapunucpi, cutipanquichic: "Apu paita mutsunmi".
42019032	Yachachishcacuna rinurca, Jesus nishca shina tupanurca.
42019033	Burrota pascanucpi, amucuna shamushpa ninurca: —
42019034	¿Imapac cai burrota pascaranquichic? Yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Apu paita mutsunmi.
42019035	Pascashpa Jesuspacman burrota apanurca, Churanacunata burro jahuapi mantashpa, Jesusta sicachinurca.
42019036	Jesus riracpi, runacuna churanacunata ñanpipi mantanurca.
42019037	Olivos nishca urcu uraicuna mayanman pactacpi, Jesusta caticcuna cushiyashcahuan caparishpa, Diosta chacchanurca cashna nishpa: —
42019038	¡Apunchicpac shutipi shamuc jatun Curaca bendisiashca cachun!. ¡Jahua pachapi ganas causai yupaichanapash cachun!
42019039	Runa ucumanta huaquin fariseocuna Jesusta ninurca: —Yachachiccama, canta caticcunata upallachi.
42019040	Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Paicuna upallanucpi, rumicuna caparinunca.
42019041	Jerusalen mayanman pactanucpi, Jesus llactata ricushpa nirca:
42019042	—Cai canpac punchapi ima alli cashcata can yachashcapi, alli canman. Ranti, chai canpac pacashca can, canpac ima alli cashcata mana atipanqui.
42019043	Llaqui punchacuna pactamununca; canta chicniccuna llacta muyucta quinchata ruranunca; tucui particunamanta canta llaquichinunca, canta urmachinunca.
42019044	Ucupi tiyaccunata huañuchinunca; canmanta shuc rumi shuc rumi jahuapi mana saquirincachu, Dios canta quishpichincapac shamushcata can mana atipashcaraicu.
42019045	Chai huasha, Jesus Dipspac huasiman yaicurca; chaipi catuccunata, ranticcunata chaimanta llucshichirca nishpa: —
42019046	Quillcashcacunapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Ñuca huasi Dios-huan rimarina huasi canca", cancuhaca shuhua huasita chaita rarcanquichic.
42019047	Caran puncha Jesus Diospac huasipi yachachic carca; pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunantin llacta rucucunantin Jesusta huañuchishun nishpa, imashnata rurashun nishpa yuyaranurca.
42019048	Ranti, imashna ranata mana yachanurca, tucui ruhacuna Jesusta munaihuan uyanucpi.
42020001	Shuc puncha, Jesus Diospac huasipi runacunata yachachirarca, Diospac alli shimita camachirarca; pacriyaya apucuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna rucucunantin shamushpa, Jesusta ninurca: —
42020002	¿Ima ushaihuan can rurashcata ruranqui? ¿Pimi canta chaita rurancapac rimarca?
42020003	Jesus cutiparca nishpa: —Ñucapash cancunata shuc shimita tapunca rani:
42020004	¿Pimi Juanta cacharca bautisancapac? ¿Dioschu paita cacharca? ¿Runacunachu paita cachanurca? Cutipahuaichic.
42020005	Rimacpi, paicunapura rimarincapac callarinurca: ¿"Imata rimashun? Ñucanchic "Dios paita cacharca" nishpa rimacpi, pai ninca: ¿Imaraicu paita mana inircanquichic?
42020006	Ñucanchic "runacuna paita cachanurca" nishpa rimacpi, tucui runacuna rumihuan ñucanchicta huañuchinunca; Juan Diospacmanta rimac cashcata shuti yuyanun mari.
42020007	Chairaicu Jesusta ninurca: —Mana yachanchichu.
42020008	Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Ñucapash ima ushaihuan chaicunata rurashcata mana rimashachu.
42020009	Chai huasha, Jesus runacunaman cai rimanata rimarca: —Shuc runa uya nishca chacrata rurarca; shuc runacunaman mañachishpa, chaimanta rirca unayasha nishpa.
42020010	Pallana pacha pactaricpi, shuc luncuta cacharca chacra amupacta chai runacunaman manancapac; paicuna, chai luncuta huactashpa, imapash illac cachanurca.
42020011	Chashna, tucucpi, chacra amu shucta cacharca; paitapashi piñanurca, huactanurca, imapash illac cachanurca.
42020012	Chaira shuctapash cacharca; llancaccuna paitapash chucrichishpa callpachinurca.
42020013	"Puchucaipi chacra amu nirirca: ¿'Imata rasha? Ñuca llaquishca churita cachasha; paita yupaichanunca ima chari'.
42020014	Llancaccuna paita ricushpa rimanacunurca nishpa: Caimi amu charishcacunata japina cac, paita huañuchishunchic pai japinca rashcacunata amuyancapac.
42020015	Paita japishpaca, chacramanta llucshichishpa huañuchinurca. ¿Chacra amu imata ruranca chai runacunata?.
42020016	Paicunata huañuchinca, chacrata shuc runacunaman mañachinca. Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —¡Mana chashna tucuchun
42020017	Ranti, Jesus paicunaman ricushpa nirca: —Shinacpi, imata nishpa nin cai quillcara: "Huasita shayachiccuna jichushca rumi huasi siqui rumi tucurca.
42020018	Chai rumi jahuapi urmac runa paqui paqui tucunca; chai rumi runa jahuapi urmashipa, paita ñitinca".
42020019	Pacriyaya apucuna, camachic quillcata yachaccunapash Jesus paicunamanta rimashcata atipanurca; chairaicu, chai ucullapi paita japinata munanurca; ranti, runacunata manchanurca.
42020020	Jesusta mana japi ushashpa, shuc runacunata paipacman cachanurca, alli runacuna shina ricurishpa Jesusta pantachincapac, paita imatapash rimachishpa cautsayachincapac, gubirnu apuman paita chasquichincapac.
42020021	Chai runacuna Jesusta tapunurca: —Yachachiccama, can shutita rimac cashcata yachanchic; runapi ricurishcallahuan mana taripanquichu; Diosman ric ñanpita mana umachishpa ricuchinqui.
42020022	Rimai cuti: ¿Roma llactapi causac Incaman cullquitai pagana allichu? ¿manachu alli?
42020023	Jesus, paicuna manalli yuyaihuan tapushcata yachashpa, nirca: —¿Imaraicu urmachinayahuanquichic?
42020024	Shuc cullquita ricuchihuaichic. ¿Pipacta can cai ñahui, caipi tiyashca shutipash? Cutipanurca: —Incapac.
42020025	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Incapacta Incaman cuichic, Diospacta Diosman cuichic.
42020026	Chashna cutipacpi, mana ushanurca ima pantashca shimitapash rimachincapac runacuna ñaupacpi; Jesus cutipashcamanta mancharishpa churilla tucunurca.
42020027	Shuc puncha, huaquin ranacuna "saduceos" nishcacuna Jesuspacman rinurca; paicuna "huañushcacunai mana causarinuncachu" nishpa yachachinun; chairaicu, Jesusta tapushpa ninurca: —
42020028	Yachachiccama, Moises quillcashcacunapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Shuc huarmiyuc runa huahua illac huañucpi, paipac huauqui chai huarmihuan sahuarichun; paicunapac huahua huñuscapac shutita apanca; chashna nin Moises quillcashca; cunan allita uyanqui:
42020029	Canchis huauquipura tiyanurca. Rucu huauqui shuc huarmita japirca, huahua illac huañurca.
42020030	-
42020031	Paipac quipa chai huarmillahuan sahuarirca, paipash huahua illac huañurca. Tucui canchis huauquipura huasha huasha chai huarmillahuan sahuarinurca, huahua illac huanunurca.
42020032	Puchucaipi huarmipash huanurca.
42020033	Causarina puncha, chai huarmi maicanpac canca, tucui canchis paihuan sahuarishca cacpi?
42020034	Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Cai causaipi caricuna huarmicunapash sahuarinun.
42020035	Ranti, chai shuc causaiman pactancapac baliccuna, causarincapac baliccuna, mana sahuarinuncachu.
42020036	Ña mana huañununca, angelcuna shina tucununca; Diospac churicuna canun, Dios paicunata causachicpi.
42020037	Huañushcacuna causarina canata quiquin Moises yachachirca. Ruparashca yurapi Dios paiman ricurishcapi, Moises paimanta rimashpa nin: "Abraanpac Dios, Isaacpac Dios, Jacobpac Dios".
42020038	Dios mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu, causaccunapac Diosmi. Diospacpi tucuicuna causayuc canun.
42020039	Chaita uyashpa, huaquin camachic quillcata yachaccuna ninurca: —Alli rimashcanqui, Yachachiccama.
42020040	Chai pachamanta imatapash tapunata manchanurca.
42020041	Chai huasha Jesus nirca: —¿Imaraicu Mesias Davidpac churi cashcata ninun?
42020042	Davidllata, Salmos nishca quillcapi, cashna nin: Apu ñuca Aputa rimarca nishpa: Ñuca alli maquiman tiyari
42020043	ñuca canta chicniccunata atinacama.
42020044	Davidllata Mesiasta "Apu" nishpa rimacpi, ¿imashna paipac churi canca?
42020045	Tucui runacuna uyanucpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata. nirca:
42020046	Yuyanquichic camachic quillcata yachaccunata; paicuna suñi churanata churarinata munanun; callecunapi salurai tucunayanun; tantarina huasicunapi ñaupac tiyarinacunata munanun; micunacunapipash ñaupac tiyarinata mashcanun.
42020047	Huaccha hurmicuna charishcacunata shuhuanun, paiounata umachishpa "cancunamanta Diosta mañacunchic" nishpa. Upata ñacachi tucununca.
42021001	Jesus Diospac huasipi tiyacushpa, cullquiyuccuna camari malacunapi cullquita churacushcata ricurarca.
42021002	Shuc huaccha huarmi shamushpa, manaimayuc cashpa, ishcai cullquishituta chai malapi churarca.
42021003	Chaita ricushpa, Jesus nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cai huaccha huarmi tucuicunamanta ashtahuan curca;
42021004	paicuna puchushcamanta mari cunurca; ranti, cai huarmi causancpac charishcata illacta curca.
42021005	Huaquin runacuna Diospac huasimanta rimaranurca nishpa: —Ricuichic chai sumac ricuric huasita, alli sami rumicunahuan rurashca, runacuna cuyashca curihuan sumacyachishca. Jesus paicunata nirca: —
42021006	Shuc puncha, cancuna ricurashca huasimanta, shuc rumi shuc rumi jahuapi mana saquirincachu, illacta tulachishcami canca.
42021007	Chashna nicpi Jesus, paita tapunurca: —Yachachiccama, imura chashna tucunca? ¿Ima imata ricurinca chai tucui tucunca racucpi?.
42021008	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Yuyanquichic ama umachi tucuncapac. Achca runa ñuca shutipi shamununca mari, "ñuca Cristopi cani" nishpa, "caimi Diospac pacha" nishpa. Ama paicunata uyanqujchichu.
42021009	"Macanacui tiyan nishpa uyaricpi, ama mancharichichu; chai ñaupacta tucuna can, ranti tucurina mana urastalla shamunca.
42021010	Huasha paicunata nirca: —Llacta shuc llactahuan macanacununca. Shuc ninacuna shuc runacunahuan macarinunca.
42021011	Allpa sinchi cuyurinca; jahua pachapi manchaipaccuna ricurinunca; huaquin suyucunapi jatun yaricai tiyanca; millai uncuicunapash tiyanunca.
42021012	Chaira mana chashna tucushcallapita, japi tucunquichic; cancunata llipachinunca, chunta curralpi huichcanunca, jatun apucunapacman pushai tucunquichic ñucaraicu.
42021013	Chashna tucucpi, cancuna ñucata catishcata ricuchincapac alli canca.
42021014	Chairaicu, ama llaquirinquichichu imata rimashpa paicunamanta quishpirishun nishpa.
42021015	Ñucalla cancunata yachac shimicunata rimachisha; cancunata chicniccuna imatapash cutipana mana ushanuncachu.
42021016	"Cancunapac quiquin yayacuna; huarmicuna, aillucuna, mashicuna cancunata japinunca, taripaccunamah cui tucunquichic; huaquincuna huañuchi tucunquichic.
42021017	Ñucaraicu tucui runacunapi chicni tucunquichic.
42021018	Mana imananchu; cancunapac umamanta shuc acchallapash mana chincarincachu.
42021019	Cancuna allita ranapi mana sanpayashpa quishpichi tucunquichic.
42021020	"Suldarucuna Jerusalen llactata muyuchishcata cancuna ricucpi, chai llacta tulai tucuna puncha pactamurcami.
42021021	Chashnapi, Judeapi tiyaccuna urcucunaman miticunuchun; llactapi tiyaccuna chaimanta llucshinuchun; chacrapi tiyaccuna ama llactaman ticranuchun.
42021022	Chai punchacunapi mari Jerusalen ñacachi tucunca, quillcashcacuna paimanta rimashca pactarincapac.
42021023	¡Ailla huicsayuc huarmicuna, chuchuchic huarmicunapash! Cai llacta jahuapi jatun llaqui shamunca, runacuna sinchi ñacachi tucununca.
42021024	Huaquincuna huañuchishcami canunca, huaquincuna shuc llactacunamah pushai tucununca, huatara tucushpa causancapac; mana judio caccuna Jerusalenpi causanunca paita mapayachishpa Dios munashca punchacama.
42021025	"Intipi, quillapi, estrellacunapi manchaipaccuna ricurinunca; allpapi runacuna mancharishcalla causanunca, ñucñu yacu caparishcata uyashpa.
42021026	"Ima tucunca ran" yuyashpa, manchaihuan chucchushpa, yuyai illac shina purinunca, tucui jahua, pacha tularinca mari.
42021027	Chashnapi, cai RUNAta ricununca; jatun ushaihuan apu tucushpa, puyucuna jahuapi shamurashcata ricununca.
42021028	Chai tucui callaricpi, cariyanquichic, umata jatachinquichic, urastalla mari quishpichishcami canquichic.
42021029	Caitapash rimarca; —Higuera nishca yurata yuyarichic.
42021030	Paipac pancacuna ña tucyacpi, rupai pacha pactashcata yachanquichic.
42021031	Chashnallata, ñuca rimashca pactarincapac callaricpi, Diospac pacha pactamurashcata yachanquichic.
42021032	Shuti cancunata nini: cunan causaccuna chaira mana huañucpi, ñuca rimashca shimi pactarincami.
42021033	Jahua pacha cai pachapash tucurinuncami; ranti, ñuca shimicuna mana chincarinuncachu.
42021034	"Yuyanquichic; ama upayachi tucuichichu; yallicta micushcamanta, machashcamanta, cai causaipacta yuyashcamanta cancunapac yuyai ama upayachun, chai punchapi ama japi tucuncapac shuc tuclla urmashca shina;
42021035	chashna mari shamunca chai puncha tucui suyucunapi causaccunaman.
42021036	Allichirishpa chaparaichic; huiñailla Diosta mañaraichic chai tucuita quishpincapac, cai RUNApacman mana manchashpa rina ushancapac".
42021037	Punchapi Jesus Diospac huasipi yachachic carca, tutapi Olivos urcuman ric carca puñuncapac.
42021038	Tucui runacuna tutamantashitu Diospac huasiman shamuccuna carca paita uyancapac.
42022001	Pascua nishca raimi, mana punquichishca tanta micuna puncha ña pactamurarca.
42022002	Pacriyaya apucunahuan yachaccunahuan imashnata Jesusta huañuchincapac mashcaranurca, runacunata manchashpa.
42022003	Chashna cacpi, supai Judas Iscariote ucupi yaicurca; Judas chunca ishcai Jesus acllashcacunamanta carca.
42022004	Pai pacriyaya apucunaman rishpa, paicunahuan Diospac huasipi tiyac suldaru apucunahuanpash rimarirca imashna Jesusta japishpa paicunaman cuncapac.
42022005	Paicuna uyashpa cushiyanurca; "cullquita cushcanqui" paita ninurca;
42022006	pai "allimi" nishpa, Jesusta runa illashca pachapi japinata munarca, paita apucunaman chasquichincapac.
42022007	Mana punquichishca tanta micuna puncha ña pactarca; chai punchallapita, cordero nishca huihuata huañuchina carca.
42022008	Chastina cacpi, Jesus Pedrota, Juanta cashna nistipa cacharca: —Ñucanchic pascua micunata micuncapac tucuita allichicrichic.
42022009	Paicuna tapunurca: —Maipitac munanqui ñucanchic allichincapac?
42022010	Jesus nirca: —Uyahuaichic: Cancuna llactaman yaicushpa, shuc yacu mancata apac runata tupanquichic. Paita catishpa, pai yaicushca huasiman yaicunquichic.
42022011	Yaicushpa huasi amuta ninquichic: "Yachachiccama canta nin: Maipi tiyan micuna ucu, ñuca runacunahuan pascua micunata micuncapac?".
42022012	Pai huasi jahua patapi shuc jatun ucuta" ricuchinca tucui ñucanchic mutsushcacunantin; chaipi micunata allichinquichic.
42022013	Chashna rimacpi, Pedrohuan Juanhuan llactaman rishpa, Jesus rimashca shina tarinurca; chaipi pascua micunata allichinurca.
42022014	Micuna pacha pactashcapi, Jesus paipac apostolcunahuan micuncapac tiyarirca.
42022015	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Yapa munarcani cai: pascua micunata cancunahuan micuncapac, ñuca chaira mana huañushpa.
42022016	Cancunata nini: Cai raimita mana cuti rashachu, Diospac pacha pactarinacama.
42022017	Chashnapi, shuc basuta japishpa, Diosta pacrachushpa, nirca. —Caita japichic, tucuicuna huasha huasha upiaichic;
42022018	cancunata nini, Diospac pacha shamunacama binota mana upiashachu.
42022019	Huasha, tantata japishpa, Diosta pacrachurca; chaita paquishpa, paicunaman curca nishpa: —Cai ñuca aichami can, cancunata quispichincapac huañuchishca cana aicha. Ñucata yuyarishpa chaillatata ruranquichic.
42022020	Micushca huasha, binota japishpa nirca: —Cai bino Dios runacunaman mushu cushca shimita ricuchic yahuarmi; cai yahuar cancunata quishpichincapac tallishcami can.
42022021	Ñucata chasquichinca rac runa caipi can ñuca mayanpi.
42022022	Cai RUNA paiman ricushishca ñanpita rin; ¡ailla paita japichic runa!.
42022023	Rimacpi, paicunapura tapurinurca pi chari canca chashna ruranca rac.
42022024	Apostolcuna paicunapura piñarishpa rimariranurca paicunamanta maican mai jatun can.
42022025	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cai pachapi gubirnu apucuna runacunapac amu cashca shina paicunata pushanun; pushaccunataca "allita ruraccuna" nishpa ninun.
42022026	Cancuna mana chashnachu cana canquichic; ranti, cancunamanta maicanpash yalli cashpa, puchucai shina causachun; pushac runaca yanapac runa shina causachun.
42022027	Maican yalli can: ¿micuncapa tiyaric runachu? ¿paita carac runachu?. ¿Manachu micuncapac tiyaric runa yalli can?. Chasnapash, ñuca cancunapacpi yanapac runa shina tiyani.
42022028	Ñucata ñacachinushcapi, cancuna mana jichuhuarcanquichic.
42022029	Chairaicu, cancunaman shuc pachata cunca rani, ñuca Yaya cuhuashca shina.
42022030	Chai ñuca pachapi ñucahuan micunquichic, upianquichic ñuca mesallapi. Chashnapi cancuna, apucuna tucushpa, Israel chunca ishcai miraita taripanquichic.
42022031	Chai huasha Jesus Pedrota nirca: —Simon, Simon, uyahuai: supai apu, cancunata urmachinayashpa, upata quillachinca;
42022032	chashnapash, ñuca canmanta mañarcani can inishcata ama saquincapac. Canca ñucaman cuti ticrashpa, canpac huauquicunata cariyachinqui.
42022033	Simon Jesusta nirca: —Apunchic, canta chunta curralpi huichcanucpi, canhuan risha; huañuha cacpica, canhuan pacta huañushami.
42022034	Jesus cutiparca: —Pedro, canta nini: cunan tuta cari atallpa chaira mana caparicpi, can "paita mana ricsinichu" nishpa quimsa cuti ninqui.
42022035	Chai huasha, Jesus paicunata tapurca: —Ñuca cancunata cullqui illac, shicra illac, ushuta illac cachashcapi, ¿imapash cancunata pishircachu? Cutipanurca: —Mana ima ñucanchicta pishircachu.
42022036	Chashnapi paicunata nirca: —Ranti, cunan cullquita charic apachun, shicrata charic apachun. Mircanuta mana charic paipac churanata catuchun mircanuta rantincapac.
42022037	Cancunata nini: Quillcashcacuna rimashca ñucapi pactarina can. Cashna quillcara tiyan: "Mana. allita rurac runahuan shina paihuan ruranurca". Ñucamanta quillcashcacuna rimashca illacta pactarina can.
42022038	Paita ninurca: —Apunchic; caipi ishcai mircanu tiyan. Jesus cutiparca: —Pacta can.
42022039	Chai huasimanta llucshishpa, Jesus paipac yachai, Olivos urcuman rirca; yachachishcacuna paita catinurca.
42022040	Chaiman pactashpai, paicunata nirca: —Dios-huan rimaricuichic, ama juchanayai shamucpi urmancapac.
42022041	Paicunamanta anchurishpa, runa maquihuan rumita shitashca tupu caruman rishpa, Dios-huan rimarca cashna nishpa: —
42022042	Yaya, can munashpa, cai llaquita ñucamanta anchuchi; ranti, ama ñuca munashcata ruraichu, can munashcata rurai.
42022043	Rimacpi, jahua pachamanta shuc angel shamushpa, paita sinchicuchirca.
42022044	Jesus yapa ñacarishpa, ashtahuan sinchita mañarca. Junpirishpa, paipac junpi yahuar tucurca; shutushpa allpacama tallirirca.
42022045	Dios-huan rimashca huasha jatarishpa, yachachishcacuna tiyashcaman ticrarca; llaquirishcamanta puñurashcata paicunata tuparca.
42022046	Paicumata nirca: —¿Imaraicu puñuranquichic? Shayarichic, Dios-huan rimarichic ama juchanayaipi urmancapac.
42022047	Jesus chaira rimacucpi, achca runacuna pactamunurca; paicunata pushac Judasmi carca, chunca ishcaicunamanta runa. Jesusman mayanyashpa, paita mucharca;
42022048	Jesus paita nirca: —Judas, ¿shuc muchahuan cai RUNAta japichinquichu?
42022049	Jesus-huan tiyaccuna, tucunca rashcata yachashpa, tapunurca: —Apunchic, ¿mircanuhuan huactashunchu?
42022050	Paicunamanta shuc, pacriyaya jatun apupac luncuta huactashpa, paipac rinrita pitirca.
42022051	Jesus, chaita ricushpa, nirca: —Saqukhic; pacta can. Luncupac rinrita llancashpa alliyachirca.
42022052	Huasha, paita japincapac shamushca pacriyaya apucunata, Diospac huasita ricuccamacunata judio apucunatapash rimarca nishpa: —Shuhua runata japincapac shina caspicunahuan, mircanucunahuan shamushcanquichic.
42022053	Caran puncha Diospac huasipi cancunahuan tiyarcani; mana japihuarcanquichic. Ranti cunan cancunapac pachami, supai pachami, pai apu-cana pachami.
42022054	Chashna rimacpi, paita japishpa, Jatun pacriyaya apupac huasiman pushanurca. Pedro carumanta Jesusta catirarca.
42022055	Huasi patiopi ninata japichishpa tiyarinucpi, Pedropash paicunahuan tiyarirca.
42022056	Shuc yanapac huarmi, paita nina mayapi tiyacucpi ricushpa, nirca: —Cai runapash Jesus-huan tiyac carca.
42022057	Pedro nirca: —Huarmi, paita mana ricsinichu.
42022058	Astanipi, shucca paita ricushpa nirca: —Canpash paipaccunamanta canqui. Pedro cutiparca: —Mana paipaccunamantachu cani.
42022059	Unai huasha shuc runa nirca: —Shut pacha, cai runa paihuan tiyac carca, galileo runa mari can.
42022060	Pedro nirca: —Runahua, can rimashcata mana yachanichu. Chai ucullapi, Pedro chaira rimaracpi, shuc cari atallpa caparirca.
42022061	Jesus ticrashpa Pedroman ricurca. Pedroca Jesus rimashcata yuyarirca, pai nishcapi: "Cunan tuta cari atallpa chaira mana caparicpi, can quimsa cuti ñucamanta ninqui "paita mana ricsinichu".
42022062	Chaimanta llucshishpa yapa huacancapac callarirca.
42022063	Jesusta ricuc runacuna paita asincapac macancapac cailarinurca.
42022064	Paipac ñahuicunata quillpashpa, paita huactashpa tapunurca: —¿Rimai, pimi canta huactan?
42022065	Tucui sami shimicunata piñashcahuan paita rimaranurca.
42022066	Ña punchayacpi, judio apucuna, pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash tantarinurca; Jesusta paicunapacman pushanurca; chaipi paita tapunurca:
42022067	—Rimai, ¿Mesiaschu canqui?. Jesus cutiparca: —Ñuca "ari" nicpi, mana inihuanquichic;
42022068	imatapash cancunata tapucpi, mana cutipahuanquiehic.
42022069	Chashnapash, caita yachaichic: Cunanmanta cai RUNA ushayuc Dios-huan pacta jahua pachapi tiyanca.
42022070	Chaita uyashpa, paita tapunurca: —¿Shinacpi Diospac Churichu canqui? Jesus nirca: —Ari, cancunallata rimarcanquichic: Diospac Churi cani.
42022071	Chaita uyashpa, ninurca: —Shuc ricuyac runacunata ña mana mutsunchic. Ñucanchicllata paipac shimimanta uyashcanchic.
42023001	Judio apucuna Jesusta taripashca huasha, Pilatopacman paita pushanurca.
42023002	Chaiman pactashpa, Jesusta juchachiranurcanishpa: —Cai runa ñucanchic llactapi causaccunata huacllichirashcata tuparcanchic. Gubirnuman pagana cullquita ama paganquichic nishpa camachin; "ñuca Mesias Apu cani" nishpa riman.
42023003	Pilato Jesusta tapurca: ¿Judiocunapac Jatun Curacachu canqui? Jesus cutiparca: —Ari, chashnami can.
42023004	Pilato pacriyaya apucunata, chaipi tiyac runacunatapash nirca: —Cai runa ima manallita rashcata mana tarinichu.
42023005	Paicuna cutillata rimanurca nishpa: —Runacunata huacllichin Judea llactacunapi yachachishcahuan; Galileamanta callarishpa, caicama pactamurca.
42023006	Chaita uyashpa, Pilato tapurca: —¿Galileamantachu cai runa?
42023007	"Ari" ninucpi, Pilato Jesusta Herodespacman cacharca, pai mari Galileapi apu carca; chai punchacunapi Jerusalenpi tiyarca.
42023008	Herodes, Jesusta ricushpa, yapa cushiyarca; paita unaimanta ricunayarca; paimanta achcata uyashcarca mari; "shuc mana raipacta ñuca ñaupacpi ruranca" nishpa yuyararca.
42023009	Chairaicu paita unaita tapurca; ranti, Jesus mana shuc shimitapash rimarcachuu.
42023010	Pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash Jesusta juchachishpa rimaranurca.
42023011	Herodes paihuan tiyaccunantin Jesusta millanurca; paita asishpa, chiuclla ricuric churanata churachinurca; chai huasha Pilatopacman cutillata paita cacharca.
42023012	Chai punehallapitac Herodes-huan Pilatohuan llaquicpura tucunurea, chai pachacama chicnicpura canurca mari.
42023013	Pilato, pacriyaya apucunata judio apucunatapash tantachishpa, nirca: —
42023014	Cai runata ñucapacman pushamurcanquichic, "tucui runacunata huacllichin" nishpa. Cancunapac ñaupacpi paita tapurcani; cancuna juchachishcata mana tupanichu paipi;
42023015	Herodespash paipi ima mana allita mana tupashpa, ñucapacman cutillata cachamurca. Cai runa mana huañuchipacchu can.
42023016	Chairaicu, paita llipachishpa cacharishami.
42023017	Raimi punchapi Pilato runacunata cushichincapac shuc chimta curralpi huichcashca runata cacharina carca.
42023018	Chaita uyashpa tucui runacuna shuclla shina caparinurca: —¡Cai runata huañuchi, Barrabasta cachari!
42023019	Barrabas, shuc runata huañuchishcamanta, runacunata macanacuncapac jatarichishcamanta, chunta curralpi huichcara carca)
42023020	Pilato, Jesusta quishpichinata munashpa, paita juchachiccunahuan rimarirca;
42023021	paicuna caparinurca: —¡Paita chacatai, paita chacatai!
42023022	Quimsaniqui cuti Pilato paicunata nirca: —¿Ima manallita rurarca? Cai runa mana huañchipacchu can; chairaicu, paita llipachishpa cacharishami.
42023023	Paicuna ashtahuan sinchi caparinurea, "paita huañuchina can" nishpa.
42023024	Pilato uyashpa paicunata nirca: —Cancuna mañashcata rurasha.
42023025	Barrabasta cacharishpa, Jesusta paicunaman curca, paihuan paicuna munashcata rancapac.
42023026	Jesusta huañuchincapac pushashpa riranucpi, chacramanta shamucuc runata japinurca, Simon shutiyuc Cirene llactamanta runa; crusta marcachinurca Jesuspac huashalla apancapac.
42023027	Achca runacuna huarmicunapash huacashpa, llaquirishpa Jesusta catiranurca.
42023028	Jesus ticrashpa nirca: —Jerusalen huarmicuna, ñucamanta ama huacaichichu, cancuna quiquinmanta cancunapac huahuacunamanta huacaichic.
42023029	Shuc puncha cashna rimarinca: "Huahua illac huarmicuna, cushiyaichic; mana huicsayuc huarmicuna, mana chuchuchic huarmicunapash cushiyanuchun".
42023030	Chashnapi, urcucunaman caparinunca nishpa: "Ñucanchic jahuapi urmaichic, ñucachicta quillpaichic".
42023031	Chahua caspihuan chashna rurashpa, imata chaquishca yurahuan ruranunca?.
42023032	Jesus-huan pacta huañuchincapac ishcai shuhua runata pushanurca.
42023033	Calvario urcuman pactanushcapi, Jesusta chacatanurca; paihuan pacta, ishcai shuhua runacunatapash: shucta alli maquipi, shucta lluqui maquipi.
42023034	Jesus nirca: —Yaya, paicunata quishpichipailla, paicuna rashcata mana mari yachanun. Suldarucuna paipac churanacunata japinurca lichayuc tucushcacuna.
42023035	Runacuna tucui chaipi tucushcata ricuranurca. Judio apucuna Jesusta asinurca cashna nishpa: —Shuccunata quishpichirca; pai quiquinta quishpichichun Diospac Mesias cashpa, Dios acllashca cashpa.
42023036	Suldarucunapash asinurca; jayac binota upiachishpa ninurca: —
42023037	Can judiocunapac jatun Curaca cashpa, canllatata quishpichi.
42023038	Crus umapi quillcashca tiyarca cashna nishpa: "Cai judiocunapac jatun Curacami".
42023039	Chacatashca shuhuacunamanta shuc Jesusta pihashpa nirca: —¿Manachu Mesias canqui? Can quiquinta quishpichi, ñucanchitapash quishpichi.
42023040	Ranti, shuc shuhua runa paipac mashita piñashpa nirca: —Can paihuan pacta huañurashpa, ¿manachu Diosta manchanqui?
42023041	Ñucanchic mana allita rashcaraicu ñacachi tucunchic; ranti, pai imapash mana allita mana rarcachu.
42023042	Huasha Jesusta nirca: —Jesus, can apu tucushpa canpac huasiman pactashpa, ñucata yuyaripanqui.
42023043	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Shuti pacha nini, cunan punchallapi ñucahuan pacta jahua pachaman yaicunqui.
42023044	Chaupi punchapi inti quillparirca, tucui allpapi yanayarca chaupi chishicama.
42023045	Diospac huasipi huarcurashca cortina chaupita lliquirirca.
42023046	Jesus sinchi shimihuan nirca: —¡Yaya, ñuca samaita canpac maquipi saquini! Chashna nishpa huañurca.
42023047	Suldaru apu, tucusheata ricushpa, Diosta chaccharca nishpa: —Shuti pacha, cai runa alli runa carca.
42023048	Tucui chaita ricuncapac tantarishca runacuna, tucushcata ricushpa, llaquirishpa huasiman ticranurca.
42023049	Jesusta ricsiccuna, Galileamanta paita catishpa huarmicunapash carumanta tucuita ricunurca.
42023050	Tiyarca shuc alli runa, Jose shutiyuc, Judeapi tiyac Arimatea llactamanta; pacriyaya apucunamanta carca.
42023051	Chai runa Diospac pachata chapararca, chairaicu chai apucuna Jesusta huañuchincapac rurashcata Jose mana munarcachu.
42023052	Chashna cacpi, chai runa apu Pilatopacman rishpa, Jesuspac aichata mañarca.
42023053	Paita crusmanta uraicuchishpa, churanahuan pillushpa, shuc rumipi allashca jutcupi panparca; chai jutcupi manapí chaira panpai tucushcachu carca.
42023054	Pascua allichina punca carca; samana puncha ña callarinca racurca.
42023055	Jesus-huan Galileamanta shamushca huarmicuna, Joseta catishpa, aya panpana jutcuta ricunurca; imashna Jesuspac aichata panpanushcata ricunurca.
42023056	Huasiman 'ticrashpa, asnac yacuta; asnac huirata allichinurca, Chai huasha, samana puncha cacpi, samanurca Dios rurai nishcata pactachishpa.
42024001	Samana naupac puncha, tutamantashitu, huarmicuna asnaccunata apashpa, aya jutcunamn ticranurca.
42024002	Chaiman pactashpa, jutcuta quillpac rumita anchuchishcata ricunurca;
42024003	jutcuman yaicushpa, Jesuspac aichata mana tupanurcachu.
42024004	Mancharishpa, "imata tucurca" nishpa yuyanucpi, ishcai runa yuraclla churarishca ricurimunurca, paicunapac mayanpi shayarinurca.
42024005	Huarmicuna, paicunata ricushpa, yapa mancharishpa, urai uma saquirinucpi, chai runacuna ninurca: —¿Imaraicu causacta huañushcacuna ucupi mashcanquichic?
42024006	Mana caipichu, ña causarirca. Chaira Galileapi tiyashcapi cancunaman rimashcata yuyarichic; cashna nishcarca:
42024007	"Cai RUNA juchayuccunaman cui tucunca, paita cruspi huañuchinunca; chashnapash quimsa puncha huasha causarincami".
42024008	Chai shimicunata uyashpa, huarmicuna Jesus rimashcata yuyarinurca;
42024009	aya jutcumanta llucshishpa, chunca shuc apostolcunapacman ticranurca; shuccunapash paicunahuan tiyanurca. Tucuita paicunaman huillanurca.
42024010	Chai huarmicuna Maria Magdalena, Juana, Santiagopac huarmi Maria canurca shuc huarmicunapash.
42024011	Ricushcata apostolcunaman huillanucpi, mana uyanushcachu, "cai huamicuna yanca rimanun, nuspashcallata huillanun" nishpa.
42024012	Ranti, Pedro jatarishpa, callpashpa aya jutcuman rirca; pactashpa, ucuman ricushpa, aichata pillunushca churanacunallata ricurca, Ima tucushcata yuyarashpa, mancharishpa huasiman ticrarca.
42024013	Chai punchallapi, ishcai Jesus yachachishcacuna Emaus nishca tacsha llactaman riranurca. Chai llacta Jerusalenmanta shuc puncha purina carca.
42024014	Paicuna rirashpa, Jerusalenpi tucushcata rimariranurca.
42024015	Rimarishpa riranucpi, quiquin Jesus llutarimushpa paicunahuan rirarca.
42024016	Paita ricucushpallata, Jesus cashcata mana yachanurca.
42024017	Jesus paicunata tapurca: —¿Imata rimariranquichic purirashpa?
42024018	Paicuna yapa llaquirishpa shayarinurca. Paicunamanta shuc, Cleofas shutiyuc, cutiparca: —¿Canllachu Jerusalenpi tucushcata mana yachanqui?
42024019	Jesus tapurca: —¿Ima tucushca cuti? Ninurca: —Nazaretmanta Jesusman tucushca. Profeta runami carca. Diospac ñaupacpi, runacunapac ñaupacpi yapa ushayuc carca pai rurashcahuan pai rimashcahuanpash.
42024020	Chashna cacpipash, pacriyaya apucuna ñucanchic gubirnu apucunapash paita cautsayachishpa huañuchinurca, cruspi chacatanurca.
42024021	Pai tucui Israel runacunata quishpichinca rashcata yuyarcanchic; ranti, pai huañushcamanta ha quimsa puncha can.
42024022	Huaquin huarmicuna ñucanchicta manchachinurca. Tutamantashitu aya jutcuman rinurca;
42024023	ayata mana tupashpa, ticranurca "angelcunata tuparcanchic" nishpa.
42024024	Ñucanchicmanta huaquincuna aya jutcuman rinurca, huarmicuna rimashca shina tucuita tupanurca; ranti, Jesusta mana tupanurcachu.
42024025	Paicuna rimashcata uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¡Upacunalla, yuyai illac shina canquichic profetacuna rimashcata mana atipashpa!.
42024026	¿Manachu Mesias chai llaquicunata aparina carca jahua pachaman yaicuncapac?
42024027	Moisesmanta callarishpa, profetacuna quillcashcata catishpa, quillcacuna Mesiasmanta rimashcata yachachirca.
42024028	Chashna yachachicucpi, paicunapac llacta mayanman pactanurca; Jesusca nic tucushpa, caruman ric shina tucurca.
42024029	Paicuna paita jarcanurca nishpa: —Ñucanchihuan saquiripailla, ña tutayaran, puncha tucuriran.
42024030	Chashna rimanucpi, Jesus huasiman yaicurca paicunahuan saquirincapac. Huasha, micuncapae tiyarishpa, tantata japirca; Diosta pacrachushpa, chaita paquishpa paicunaman cureca.
42024031	Chai ucullapi, paicunapac ñahuicuna pascarinurca; Jesusea ña chincarishca carca.
42024032	Chashna tucucpi, rimanacunurca: —Pai nanpipi rimarishcapi quillcacunata atipachishpa, ¿manachu ñucanchic shuncu cushiyashpa rupararca?
42024033	Jatarishpaca; Jerusalenman ticranurca. Chunca shuc apostolcunata tantarishcata tupanurca shuc Jesusta caticcunahuan pacta.
42024034	Chaipi tantariccuna paicunaman huillanurca nishpa: —Apunchic causarimushcami, Simon Pedroman ricurimushcami.
42024035	Paicunapash ñanpipi tucushcata huillanurca, "Paita tantata paquishcapi ricsircanchic" nishpa.
42024036	Chashna rimariranucpi, quiquin Jesus paicunapacpi ricurimurca; paicunata salurashpa nirca: —¿Ganas causaita charichic!
42024037	Rimacpi uyashpa, mancharinurca "ayachu imata" nishpa.
42024038	Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Imaraicu mancharinquichic? ¿Imaraicu ñuca aya cashcata yuyacunquichic?
42024039	Ñuca maquicunata chaquicunata ricuichic; ñucallami cani. Llancahuaichic, ayaca aichata tullutapash mana charinchu; ñuca aichayuc cani.
42024040	Chashna rimashpa, chaquicunata maquicunata paicunaman ricuchirca.
42024041	Paicuna cushimanta chaira mana ininucpi, upa shina tiyanucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Micunata charinquichichu ñucata carancapac?
42024042	Cusashca challuata caranurca.
42024043	Jesus chaita japishpa, paicunapac naupacpi micurca,
42024044	Huasha nirca: —Ñucapi tucushca ñuca cancunahuan tiyashpa rimashca pactarincapac tucurca, chashna mari Moisespac quillcapi, profetacunapac quillcapi, salmos nishca quillcapi quillcara tiyarca.
42024045	Chashnapi, paicunapac yuyaita pascachirca quillcashcacunata atipana ushancapac, cashna nishpa: —
42024046	Caimi quillca nishca: Mesias huañuna can, quimsa punchapi causarina can;
42024047	paipac shutipi tucui llactacunapi, Jerusalenmanta callarishpa, Diosman ticranuchun juchacuna pichai tucuncapac uyachina can.
42024048	Cancuna chai tucuita yachanquichic cancunallata ricushcaraicu.
42024049	Uyahuaichic: Ñuca Yaya cusha nishcata cancunaman cachashami; Jerusalen llactapi saquirichic jahuamanta shamuna ushaita chasquinacama.
42024050	Chaita rimashca huasha, Jesus paicunata Betaniaman pusharca; chaiman pactac, maquicunata jahuaman rashpa, paicunata bendisiarca.
42024051	Bendisiacucpi, paicunamanta anchurishpa, jahua pachaman pushai tucurca
42024052	Paicuna, Jesusta yupaichashca huasha, yapa cushiyashpa, Jerusalenman ticranurca;
42024053	punchantin Diospac huasipi tiyaccuna carca, Diosta chacchashpa.
43001001	Callaripi Dios Rimashca shimi tiyarca; Causac Rimashca Shimica Dios-huan pacta tiyarca, Dios mari carca,
43001002	Callari pacha, cai Causac Rimashca Shimi Dios-huan pacta tiyarca.
43001003	Pairaicu tucuilla tiyancapac callarirca; cai Causac Rimashca Shimi illac mana ima rurarishcachu.
43001004	Paipacpi causai tiyararca, cai causaica runa yuyaita punchayachic carca.
43001005	Cai puncha tutapi achicyarca, tutaca punchata mana chasquircachu.
43001006	Shuc Dios cachashca Juan shutiyuc runa ricurimurca.
43001007	Cai runa punchata ricsichincapac shamurca, pai rimashcamanta tucui runa ininuchun nishpa.
43001008	Chai runa mana punchachu carca; punchata ricuchincapac shamurca.
43001009	Causac Rimashca Shimi shuti puncha carca; cai pachaman shamurca runapac yuyaita achicyachincapac.
43001010	Causac Rimashca Shimi cai pachapi tiyarca; paimanta Dios cai pachata rurashcapipash, cai pacha runacuna paita mana ricsinurcachu.
43001011	Paipaccunapacman shamurca, paipaccunaca paita mana chasquinurcachu.
43001012	Ranti, paita chasquishcacunaman, paipi inishcacunaman Diospac churi tucuna ushanata curca.
43001013	Chai Causac Rimashca Shimi mana runa munaimantachu shamun, mana runa yahuarmantachu shamun, Diosmantallami shamun.
43001014	Chai Causac Rimashca Shimi runa tucurca, ñucanchihuan causarca, llaquishcahuan shutihuanpash juntashca. Ñucanchic paita sumacyachishcata ricurcanchic, Dios Yayapac shuclla Churi cashcamanta.
43001015	Juan paimanta rimarca nishpa: "Caimi ñuca rimashca runa; ñuca paimanta rimarcani nishpa: Nuca huashalla shamuc ashtahuan jatunmi; ñuca chaira mana pacarishcapi, pai causararca mari".
43001016	Pai tucuita charic cashpa, pai charishcamanta tucui laya allita cuti cuti chasquircanchic.
43001017	Camachic quillcata Moisesmanta charinchic; imata can llaquina, imata can shuti Jesuscristota ricushpa yachanchic.
43001018	Manapí Diosta ricurcachu; paipac shuclla Churi —paipash Dios cashpa, Yayahuan pacta tiyan— Diosta ñucanchicman ricsichirca.
43001019	Shuc puncha, Jerusalenmanta judio apucuna pacriyayacunata levitacunatapash Juanpacman cachanurca paita tapuncapac: —¿Can pitac canqui?
43001020	Pai pasacta rimarca: —Ñuca mana Mesiaschu cani.
43001021	Cutillata tapunurca: —¿Eliaschu canqui? —Mana -nirca. —¿Shamuna cac profetachu canqui? —Mana-nirca.
43001022	Chashna nicpi, paicuna cutillata tapunurca: —¿Pitac canqui? ¿Can quiquinmanta imata ninqui? Rimai, ñucachicta cachashcacunaman can imatapash cutipashcata apana canchic.
43001023	Juan paicunata cutiparca: —Ñuca chunlla allpamanta shamuc runami cani; cai shimita huillancapac shamuni: "Apunchicraicu shuc cusca ñanipita pascaichic", profeta Isaias rimshca shina.
43001024	Huaquincuna fariseo bulamanta canurca.
43001025	Paicuna cutillata tapunurca: —Can mana Mesias cashpa, mana Elias cashpa, mana profeta cashpa, ¿imaraicu bautisanqui?
43001026	Juan cutiparca: —Nuca yacullahuan bautisani; cancuna ucupi shuc cancuna mana ricsishca runa tiyanmi, ñuca huashalla shamuc runa.
43001027	Paipac ushutapac huascata pascancapacpash mana allichu cani.
43001028	Chai tucui Betaniapi, Jordan yacu chinpapi tucurca; chaipi Juan bautisac carca.
43001029	Cayantin puncha, Juan, Jesusta paipacman shamuracpi ricushpa, nirca: —Caimi Diospac Cordero, cai pacha juchata maillac runa.
43001030	Paimantami rimarcani nishpa: Ñuca huashalla shuc runa shamunmi; pai ñucamanta ashtahuan jatunmi; ñuca chaira mana pacarishcapi, pai causararca.
43001031	Pai pi cashcata mana yacharcanichu; chashnapash, yacuhuan bautisancapac shamurcani paita judiocunaman ricsichisha nishpa.
43001032	Huasha nirca: —Diospac Samaita jahua pachamanta urpi shina uraicushcata ricurcani, Jesuspac jahuapi shayarirca.
43001033	Pai pi cashcata chai pacha chaira mana yacharcanichu; chashnapash, yacuhuan bautisancapac ñucata cachamuc Dios nihuarca: "Can, Samai uraicushpa shuc runa jahuapi shayarirashcata ricucpi, paimi Diospac Samaihuan bautisanca".
43001034	Ñuca paita ricushca huasha nini: Pai Diospac Churimi can.
43001035	Cayantiman, Juan ishcai yachachishcacunahuan chaipi tiyarca.
43001036	Jesusta chaita purishcata ricushpa, nirca: —¡Ricuichic, caimi Diospac Cordero!
43001037	Yachachishcacuna, chaita uyashpa, Jesusta catishpa rinurca.
43001038	Jesus ticrashpa, paita catinucpi ricushpa, paicunata tapurca: —¿Imata mashcanquichic? Cutipanurca: —¿Yachachiccama, maipi causanqui?
43001039	Jesus cutiparca: —Ricuc shamuichic. Paicuna Jesus-huan rishpa, maipi causashcata ricunurca; chaipi saquirinurca, chishinaya mari carca.
43001040	Chai Juan rimashcata uyashpa Jesusta catishcacuna, shuc Andres carca, Simon Pedropac huauqui.
43001041	Andres huauqui Simonta mashcancapac rirca; paita tupashpa nirca: —Uyai, Mesiasta tuparcanchic (Mesias nishpa "Cristo'' nin). Paitaca Jesuspacman pusharca.
43001042	Jesus Simonman ricushpa saquirirca; huasha nirca: —Can Juanpac churi Simon canqui; Cefas shutichishcanqui (Cefas nishpa "rami" nin).
43001043	Cayantiman, Jesus Galileaman risha nishpa, Felipe-huan tuparirca; paita nirca: —Nucahuan shamui.
43001044	Chai runa Betsaida nishca llactamanta carca; chai llactamantallata canurca Andres-huan Pedrohuan.
43001045	Felipe, Natanaelhuan tuparishpa, paita nirca: —Uyai, Moises camachic quillcapi rimashca runata tuparcanchic; profetacunapash paimanta rimanurca: paimi Nazaretmanta Jesus, Josepac churi.
43001046	Rimacpi uyashpa Natanael nirca: —¿Nazaretmanta ima allipash llucshincachu? Felipe nirca: —Ricuc shamui.
43001047	Jesus, Natanael shamuracpi ricushpa, paimanta nirca: —Caimi shuc alli israelita runa, mana umachic runa.
43001048	Natanael paita tapurca: —¿Imamanta ricsihuanqui ñucata? Jesus cutiparca: —Chaira Felipe carita maria cayashcapi, can higuera yura llantupi samacucpi, canta ricurcani.
43001049	Chaita uyashpa, Natanael nirca: —Yachachiccama, can Dipspac Churi canqui, Israelmanta Jatun Curaca canqui.
43001050	Jesus cutiparca: —¿"Can higuera yura llantupi samarashcata ricurcani" nishpa nishcamanta ininquichu? Astahuan jatuncunata ricunqui.
43001051	Ari, shuti nini: Shuc puncha, jahua pacha pascarata ricunquichic; Diospac angelcuna cai RUNA jahuapi sicashcata uraicushcatapash ricunquichic.
43002001	Ishcai puncha huasha, Galileamanta Cana nishca llactapi shuc sahuarina tiyarca; Jesuspac mama chaipi tiyarca.
43002002	Jesuspash yachachishcacunantin sahuarinaman cayashcami carca.
43002003	Micuranucpi, bino tucurishca; Jesuspac mama chaita ricushpa, Jesusta nirca: —Churi, bino tucurishcami.
43002004	Jesus cutiparca: —Huarmi, ¿imata rimac shamuhuanqui? Ñuca pacha chaira mana pactamurcachu.
43002005	Chaita uyashpa, Jesuspac mama yanapaccunaman nirca: —Jesus rimanca rashcata ruranquichic.
43002006	Chaipi sucta jatun rumi manca tiyarca, judiocuna maillarincapac; caran manca shuc patsac litro tupushi carca.
43002007	Jesus yanapaccunata nirca: —Mancacunata yacuhuan juntachichic. Manñacama juntachinurca;
43002008	huasha Jesus nirca: —Cunan mancamanta huishishpa, raimicamata upiachichic. Upiachinurca.
43002009	Paica bino tucushca yacuta upiarca, maimanta apamunushcata mana yachaspa (yacuta huishiccuna yachanurca)
43002010	Upiacpi, cusa-canata cayashpa nirca: —Tucui raimicunapi ñaupacta alli binota upiachinun; cayashcacuna ña shincayanucpi, upa binota upiachinun. Ranti, can alli binota puchucaicama huacaichircanqui.
43002011	Chashnami Jesus Cana llactapi ñaupac mana raipacta rurarca; chaita ricushpa, yachachishcacuna paipi ininurca.
43002012	Chai huasha, Jesus paipac mamantin aillucunantin yachachishcacunantin Cafarnaun llactaman rirca; chaipi shuc punchacuna saquirirca.
43002013	Judiocunapac pascua nishca raimi pactamuracpi, Jesus Jerusalenman sicarca.
43002014	Diospac huasipi achca runa tiyarca; huacracunata, obejacunata, urpicunata caturanurca; cullquita turcaccuna mesa muyucta tiyacunurca.
43002015	Jesus, chaita ricushpa, huasca huancuhuan tucuicunata Diospac huasimanta callpachirca huacracunantin obejacunantin; cullquita allpaman jichurca, mesacunata ticrachishpa.
43002016	Urpicunata catuccunata nirca: —¡Chaita anchuchichic caimanta! ¡Ñuca Yaya huasita ama catuna huasita raichichu!
43002017	Chaita ricushpa, yachachishcacuna ñaupa profetacuna quillcashcata yuyarinurca; cashna quillcara tiyarca: Canpac huasita ricushpa, llaquirishpa huañunayahuan.
43002018	Judiocuna paita tapunurca: —¿Can chaita rancapac ushaita charishcata ricuchincapac, ima munanayacta ricurishcata ruranqui?
43002019	Jesus cutiparca: —Cai Diospac huasita urmachichic; ñucaca quimsa punchapi shayachisha.
43002020	Judiocuna paita ninurca: —Chuscu chunca sucta huatata cai huasita ruranapi llancanurca, canca quimsa punchallapi shayachisha ninquichu?
43002021	Jesus "cai huasita" nishpa paipac quiquin aichamanta nishcarca.
43002022	Pai huañushcamanta causarishcapi, yachachishcacuna chai Jesus rimashcata yuyarinurca; Dios quillcashcata Jesus rimashca shimicunatapash ininurca.
43002023	Jesus Jerusalenpi tiyashcapi pascua punchacuna, achca runacuna pai mana, raipaccunata ruracpi ricushpa, paipi ininurca.
43002024	Ranti, Jesus "paicunapi mana inishcachu, tucuicunata ricsirca mari.
43002025	Manapita tapushpallata, runapac shuncu ucupi tiyashcata yacharca.
43003001	Tiyarca shuc runa fariseo bulamanta, Nicodemo shutiyuc, judiocunapacpi jatun runa.
43003002	Chai runa Jesus-huan rimarincapac tuta rishpa, paita nirca: —Yachachiccama, canta Dios cachashcata ñucanchicta yachachincapac yachanchic; manapipash can rashcacunata rana ushanman, Dios mana paihuan tiyashcapi.
43003003	Jesus paita nirca: —Shuti pacha canta nini: Maicanpash mana cuti pacarishpa, Diospac pachata mana ricuna ushancachu.
43003004	Nicodemo paita tapurca: —¿Imashna shuc runa pacarina ushanca rucu cashpa? ¿Mamapac huicsapi yaicuna ushancachu cutillata pacarincapac?
43003005	Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti canta nini: Shuc runa yacumanta Samaimantapash mana pacarishpa, Diospac pachapi mana yaicuna ushancachu.
43003006	Aichamanta aichalla pacarin; Samaimanta samai pacarin.
43003007	Ama mancharichu "cutillata pacarina canquichic" nishpa nuca nishcamanta.
43003008	Huaira maipipash huairan; huairashcata uyanqui; ranti, huaira maimanta shamushcata, maiman rirashcata mana yachaipac can. Chashnallata tucun Samaimanta pacarishcacunata.
43003009	Chashha nicpi uyashpa; Nicodemo tapurca: —¿Imashnata can rimashca tucunca?
43003010	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Can Israelpi yachachiccama cashpa, ¿manachu chaicunata yachanqui?
43003011	Shuti nini, ñucanchic yachashcata rimanchic, ricushcata huillanchic chashnapash, ñucanchic huillashcata mana ininquichic.
43003012	Ñuca cai pachamanta rimashcata cancuna mana inishpa, jahuapachamanta rimacpi pishi inihuanquichic.
43003013	Manapí jahua pachaman sicarcachu; shuc runalla sicarca, jahua pachamanta uraicushca runa, paimi cai RUNA.
43003014	Moises chunlla allpapi shuc machacuita caspipi shayachishca shina, cai RUNApash shayachishcami canca,
43003015	paita iniccuna huiñai causaita charincapac.
43003016	"Dios runacunata yapa llaquishpa, paipac shuclla churita paicunaman cuyarca, paita iniccuna ama chincarinuchun nishpa, ranti huiñai causaita charinuchun.
43003017	Dios paipac Churita mana cachamurcachu cai pachata cautsayachincapac, cai pachata quishpichincapac paita cachamurca.
43003018	Diospac churita inic runa mana taripashcachu, canca; ranti, mana iniccuna ña taripashca canun, Diospac shuclla churita mana inishcamanta.
43003019	Mana iniccuna cautsayachishca canun cairaicu: Puncha cai pachaman shamurca; runacunaca tutata punchamanta ashtahuan munanurca, paicuna rashcacuna mana alli cashcaraicu.
43003020	Mana allita ruraccuna punchata chicninun, punchaman mana shamunun, ama paicuna rurashca ricurincapac.
43003021	Ranti, allita ruraccuna punchaman shamunun paicuna rashcacuna Dios munashca shina cashcata ricuchincapac.
43003022	Chaipac huasha, Jesus yachachishcacunantin Judea suyuman rirca; chaipi paicunahuan causashpa bautisac carca.
43003023	Juanpash Enon nishca panpapi, Salin mayanpi bautisacurca, chaipi yacu achca tiyarca mari, runacunaca chaiman shamuccuna carca bautisai tucuncapac
43003024	Chai pacha Juanta chaira mana chunta curralpi huichcanushcarca.
43003025	Shuc puncha, Juanta caticcunahuan shuc judiocunahuan paicunapufa piñarishpa, bautisarinamanta rimarincapac callarinurca.
43003026	Juanpacman rishpa, paita ninurca: —Yachachiccama, Jordan yacu chinpapi canhuan tiyashca runa, can rimashca runa, cunan paipash bautisaran, tucuicunaca paita catinun.
43003027	Juan paicunata nirca: —Runa mana imata amuyana ushan, Dios mana munacpi. Cancunallata uyahuarcanquichic "ñuca mana Mesiaschu cani" nishpa nishcapi, ñuca "paita ñaupashpa cachashca runami cani" nishcapi.
43003029	Shuc sahuarinapi, cusa-cana huarmicanata japin; cusa-canapac mashi, paita uyashpa cushiyan paita llaquishcaraicu. Ñucapash cunan yapa cushiyani;
43003030	paita mari tucuicuna catina canun; ñucata saquihuanucpi alli canman.
43003031	Jahuamanta shamuc tucuicunamanta yalli can; cai pachamanta shamuc cai pachamantami can, cai pachapaccunamanta riman. Ranti, jahua pachamanta shamuc tucuimanta yalli can;
43003032	pai uyashcata ricushcatapash riman; chashnapash pai rimashcata manapí uyan.
43003033	Pai rimashcata uyac runa Dios shutita rimashcata ricuchin;
43003034	Dios cachashca runa Diospac shimicunata riman, Dios paipac samaita mana mitsashpa cuyan.
43003035	Yaya Churita llaquin, tucuita Churipacpi mincashpa saquirca;
43003036	Churita inic runa huiñai causaita charin; ranti, Churita mana inishachu nic runa causaita mana ricuncachu, Diospac piñaita aparinca.
43004001	-
43004003	Jesusta caticcuna pai bautisashcacunapash Juan-paccunamanta yalli achca canurca (quiquin Jesuscristo mana bautisacchu carca; yachachishcacuna bautisaccuna carca). Fariseocuna chaita uyanurca; chairaicu, Jesus Judea suyuta saquishpa, Galileaman ticrarca.
43004004	Samaria nishca suyuta rina carca; chaita purishpa,
43004005	Jesus Sicar nishca llactaman pactarca; chai llacta mayanpi Jacob paipac churi Joseman cushca allpa tiyarca.
43004006	Chaipi tiyan Jacobpac yacu pucru. Jesus purishpa sanpayacpi, yacu pucru mayanpi tiyarirca. Chaupi punchashi carca.
43004007	Samariamanta shuc huarmi yacuta huishincapac shamurca. Jesus paita nirca: —Yacuta upiachihuai.
43004008	Yachachishcacuna llactaman rinushcarca micunata rantincapac.
43004009	Chai huarmi "yacuta upiachihuai" nishcata uyashpa, Jesusta nirca. —¿Can judio runa cashpa, "upiachihuai" nishpa mañahuanquichu, ñuca Samariamanta huarmi cacpipash? (judiocunahuan Samaria runacunahuan mana munarishpa causanun).
43004010	Chashna rimacpi Jesus paita nirca: —Can Dios cushcata ricsishpa, yacuta mañaracta ricsishpa, paita mañanquiman, paica causana yacuta canta cuyanman.
43004011	Huarmi nirca: —Apulla, imahuan yacuta huishincapac mana charinquichu, yacu pucruca yapa cucha can; ¿maimanta causana yacuta surcunqui?
43004012	¿Can ñucanchic yaya Jacobmanta yallichu canqui? Pai cai yacu pucruta ñucanchicman saquirca; cai yacumanta paillata upiarca, paipac churicunapash paipac huacracunapash upianurca.
43004013	Chashna nicpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Cai yacuta upiac runa cuti upianayancami; ranti, ñuca cunca rashca yacuta. upiac, huiñaipac mana upianayancachu.
43004014	Ñuca cushca yacuca runa ucumanta llucshishca pululuc yacu shina canca, mana tucuric causaita cuncapac.
43004015	Chaita uyashpa huarmi nirca: —Apulla, chai yacuta upiachihuai ama cuti upianayancapac, ama caiman shamuncapac yacuta huishincapac.
43004016	Jesus paita nirca: —Canpac carita mashcacri; tupashpa, caiman shamunquichic.
43004017	Huarmi nirca: Cari illac cani. Jesus cutiparca: —Shutita rimanqui cari illac cani nishpa.
43004018	Pichca carita charircanqui; cunan charishcaca mana canpac carichu.
43004019	Huarmi nirca: —Apulla, ñuca yuyacpi, tucuita yachac canqui.
43004020	Ñucanchic ñaupacuna cai urcuman shumuccuna carca Diosta yupaichancapac; cancunaca Jerusalenpi Diosta yupaichana can ninquichic.
43004021	Chashna rimacpi, Jesus cutiparca: —Uyahuai, huarmi; shuc puncha mana cai urcupi, mana Jerusalenpi Dios Yayata yupaichanquichic; chai puncha ña pactamuran.
43004022	Samariamanta runacuna, mana ricsishcata yupaichanquichic; ñucanchic, judiocuna, pitata yupaichashcata yachanchic, quishpichina judiocunamanta shamun mari.
43004023	Chashna cacpipash, cunanmanta pacha shuti yupaichaccuna shuncuhuan, mana shimillahuan Dios Yayata yupaichanunca, Diospac Samai munashca shina. Chai laya yupaichaccunata Dios mashcan.
43004024	Dios Samaimi can; Diosta yupaichaccuna yuyaihuan yupaichana canun, Diospac Samai munashca shima.
43004025	Chaita uyashpa, huarmi nirca: —Mesias (Cristo shutichishca) shamunca rashcata yachani. Pai shamushpa, tucuita ñucanchicta yachachinca.
43004026	Jesus paita nirca: —Canhuan rimacuc Mesiasmi, ñuca Mesiasmi cani.
43004027	Chashna rimariranucpi, Jesus yachachishcacuna pactamunurca; pai shuc huarmihuan rimarirashcamanta mancharinurca. Chashnapash, manapí paita tapurca "imatata munanqui", "imatata cai huarmihuan rimaranqui" nishpa.
43004028	Huarmi, mancata chaipi saquishpa, llactaman callpashpa rirca, runacunaman huillancapac.
43004029	Paicunata nirca: —Ricuc shamuichic shuc runata. Pai nuca rurashcata tucuita rimahuarca. ¿Manachu Mesias canca? Rimacpi uyashpa, achca runacuna llactamanta shamunurca Jesuspacman.
43004031	Paicuna shamunacama, yachachishcacuna cuti cuti Jesusta rimanurca nishpa: —Yachachiccama, micuilla.
43004032	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca micunata charini, cancuna mana ricsishca micuna,
43004033	Chaita uyashpa, yachachishcacuna paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —¿Maicanpash paita carashcachu canca?
43004034	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca micuna caimi: Ñucata cachamuhuashca rimashcata pactachina cani, pai callarishcata tucuchina cani.
43004035	¿Manachu ninquichic "pallana pachacama chaira chuscu quilla pishin"? Ranti ñuca cancunata nini: Tarpushcacunata ricuichic, pallancapac tucui ha pucura can.
43004036	Pallac runa yapachishcata japin; pai pallashca huiñai causancapac can; chashna, tarpuc runahuan pallac runahuan pacta cushiyanun.
43004037	Cai rimashca shuti can: "Shuc tarpun, shuc pallan"
43004038	Cancuna mana tarpushcata pallancapac cacharcani; shuc runacuna llancanurca, cancunaca paicuna llancashcata japinquichic.
43004039	Achca chai Samaria llactamanta runacuna Jesusta ininurca huarmi huillashcamanta, "ñuca rurashcata tucuita huillahuarca" nishpa nishcapi.
43004040	Chairaicu, Samariamanta runacuna Jesuspacman shamushpa, ninurca: —Ñucanchihuan saquiripailla. Chashna mañanucpi, Jesus ishcai puncha chaipi saquirirca.
43004041	Jesus nishcata uyashpa, ashtahuan achca runacuna paita ininurca.
43004042	Huarmitaca ninurca: —Cunan mana can rimashcamanta ininchic. Ñucanchicllata paita uyashpa, pai cai pachata quishpichic cashcata ininchic.
43004043	Ishcai puncha huasha, Jesus Samariamanta llucshishpa, Galileaman rirca.
43004044	Jesusllatami nishcarca: Shuc profetata paipac quiquin llactapi mana yupaichanun.
43004045	Chashna cacpipash, Galileaman pactashcapi, chaipi causac runacuna cushiyashcahuan paita chasquinurca, pai Jerusalenpi rurashcacunata yuyarishpa, paicunapash chai llactaman rinushcarca pascua raimita rancapac.
43004046	Shinacpi, Jesus Cana llactaman shamurca; chai llactapi yacumanta binota rurashcarca. Chaipi shuc aputa yanapac runa tiyarca; paipac churi Cafarnaun llactapi uncushca carca.
43004047	Chai runa Jesus Judeamanta Galileaman shamushcata uyashpa, paita ricucrirca; Jesuspacman pactac nirca: —Ñuca churita janpincapac shamupai, huañunalla uncushcacan.
43004048	Jesus nirca: —Cancuna, mana raipaccunata munanayacta ricuriccunatapash mana ricushpa, mana ininquichic.
43004049	Chai runa cutillata mañarca nishpa: —Apulla, shamupai ñuca churi manara huañucpi.
43004050	Rimacpi, Jesus cutiparca: —Rilla, canpac churi alliyashcami can. Chai runa Jesus rimashcata inishpa rirca.
43004051	Huasiman riracpi, luncucuna paita tupancapac llucshinurca nishpa: —¡Canpac churi causaran!
43004052	Pai tapurca: —¿Imura alliyancapac callarirca? Ninurca: —Caina, chaupi puncha mayanlla, uncui saquirirca.
43004053	Ninucpi uyashpa, chai pachallapi Jesus "canpac churi alliyashcami" nishpa rimashcata yuyarirca; chairaicu pai aillucunantin Jesusta ininurca.
43004054	Chai mana raipacta Judeamanta Galileaman ticrashpa rurarca; naupa shuc mana raipacta rurashcarca.
43005001	Shuc punchacuna huasha, judiocuna shuc raimita ranucpi, Jesus Jerusalenman ticrarca.
43005002	Chai llactapi, Obeja nishca puncu mayanpi, shuc uchilla cucha tiyan; hebreo shimipi Betesda ninun; pichca patio tiyan.
43005003	Chai patiocunapi achca uncuc runacuna allpapi sirinurca: ñausacuna, janca chaquicuna, suchucuna; tucuicuna yacu cuyurinata chaparanurca.
43005004	Maicanpi, shuc angel shamushpa yacuta cuchapi cuyuchic carca. Yacu cuyuricpi yacuman naupac yaicuc runa ima uncuimantapash alliyashca saquiric carca.
43005005	Chai uncushcacunapurapi shuc tiyarca, quimsa chunca pusac huatata uncushca.
43005006	Jesus paita sirishcata ricushpa, unaimanta uncucushcata yachashpa, paita tpurca: —¿Alliyanata munanquichu?
43005007	Chai runa cutiparca: —Apunchic, manapi yacuman pushahuan yacu cuyurishcapi; ñuca yacuman yaicusha nishpa yuyacpi, shuc ñaupashpa rihuan.
43005008	Jesus paita nirca: —Shayari, canpac cahuituta apashpa ri.
43005009	Chai ucullapi, chai runa allichi tucurca; paipac cahuituta apashpa rirca. Chai puncha samana puncha carca.
43005010	Chairaicu, judiocuna paita ninurca: —Cunan puncha samana punchami; cahuituta apana mana allichu.
43005011	Pai cutipashpa nirca: —Ñucata alliyachishca runa nihuarca: "Canpac cahuituta apashpa ri".
43005012	Paita tapunurca: —¿Pitac can chai runa, canta chashna rimac?
43005013	Alliyachi tucushca runa maican paita alliyachishcata mana yacharcachu, Jesus chaipi tiyac ninacuna ucupi chincaricpi.
43005014	Astanipi, Jesus Diospac huasipi paita tupashpa nirca: —Uyai, cunan ña alli canqui; ama cuti juchallinquichu, impash yalli sinchi canta tucunman.
43005015	Chashna nicpi uyashpa, chai runa judiocunaman huiliacrirca nishpa: —Jesusmi ñucata alliyachihuarca.
43005016	Chairaicu judiocuna Jesusta quillachincapac callarinurca, chai laya rashcacunata samana puncha rashcamanta.
43005017	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca Yaya huiñai llancashpa causan, ñucapash llancac cani.
43005018	Chaita uyashpa, judiocuna ashtahuan paita huañuchinayanurca, samana puchata mana huacaichishcaraicu; ashtahuanpash, "Dios ñuca yayami" nishpa, paillatata Dios tucun.
43005019	Jesus paicunata rimarca nishpa: —Shuti cancunata nini: Churi mana imata pai quiquinmanta rurana ushan; ñaupacta paipac Yaya rurashcata ricun. Yaya rashcata Churipash ruran.
43005020	¿Imaraicu? —Yaya Churita llaquishcaraicu, pai rashcata Churiman ricuchin; chaira shuc rashcacuna tiyan yalli jatuncuna; cancuna chaicunata ricushpa mancharinquichic.
43005021	Caita uyaichic: Huañushcacunata Yaya causarichin, causaita cutichishpa; chashnallata Churipash causaita cun pai munashcacunaman.
43005022	"Yaya manapita taripanchu; taripana ushaita paipac churiman curca,
43005023	tucuicuna churita yapaichanuchun nishpa Yayata shina. Churita mana yupaichac runa paita cachashca Yayatapash mana yupaichan.
43005024	Shuti cancunata nini: Ñuca rimashcata uyac runa, ñucata cachamushcata inishpa, mana tucuric causaita charin; mana cautsayachi tucunca, huañuimanta causaiman ña chinparca mari.
43005025	"Uyahuaichic: Huañushcacuna Dios Churipac shimita uyana pacha ña pactarirca; chai shimita uyaccuna causanuncami.
43005026	Yaya tucui causaita charishpa, causaita cuyana ushaita Churiman curca.
43005027	Chashnallata, taripana ushaita paiman curca cai RUNA cashcaraicu.
43005028	"Ñuca rimarashcamanta ama mancharichichu; tucui huañuscacuna paipac shimita uyana pacha pactamuran mari; chaita uyashpa, pantiocunamanta llucshinunca.
43005029	Allita rurashcacuna huiñai causanaman causarinunca; ranti, manallita rurashcacuna cautsayachi tucuncapac causarinunca.
43005030	"Ñuca quiquin munaimanta mana imata rana ushani. Ñuca Yaya rimahuacpi taripani, ñuca taripashcaca alli can, cachamunhuashca Yaya munashcata rurac mari cani, mana ñuca munashcata.
43005031	Ñuca quiquinpacpi ricuyac cashpa, ñuca rimashca mana imapac canman;
43005032	ranti, ñucamanta rimac tiyanmi, pai ñucamanta rimashca shuti can.
43005033	"Cancuna runacunata Juanpacman cacharcanquichic ñucamanta tapuncapac, pai rimashcaca shuti can.
43005034	Chaita mana rimanichu "ricuyacta mutsuni" nishpa; cancuna quishpichi tucuncapac nishpa rimani.
43005035	"Juan achic shina ricuchicurca, cancunaca pai ricuchishcahuan mana unaichu cushiyashun nircanquichic.
43005036	Ñuca shuc ñucamanta rimacta charini, Juanmanta yalli cac. Ñuca rurashcacuna Yaya nucata cachamushcata ricuchinun; Yaya mincahuacpi, chai rashcacunata ruracuni.
43005037	Cachamuhuashca Yayallata ñucamanta huiñai riman; cancuna mana imura paita uyarcanquichic, mana imura paita ricurcanquichic.
43005038	Dios rimashca shimita mana uyanquichic, pai cachamushcata mana inishcamanta.
43005039	Dios quillcashcacunata allita ricuc canquichic, chaicunapi huiñai causaita tarishun yuyarishpa; chai quillcashcacunaca ñucamanta rimanun;
43005040	ranti, cancuna mashcashca causaita charincapac ñucaman shamunata mana munanquichichu.
43005041	"Mana runacunapacpi jahuayachi tucunata munanichu.
43005042	Ashtahuanpash, cancunata ricsini, cancuna Diosta mana llaquishcata yachani.
43005043	Ñuca Yayapac shutipi shamurcani, cancunaca mana chasquihuanquichic; ranti, shuc paipac quiquin shutipi shamucpi, paita chasquinquichic,
43005044	¿Imashna inina ushanquichic cancunapuralla chacchanacushpa causashpa, Diosllapi chacchai tucunata mana munashpa?
43005045	Cancunata juchachic Moisesmi, cancuna inishca Moises, "paita ininchic" nishpa ninquichic mari.
43005046	Yancamanta chashna rimanquichic. Cancuna Moisesta inishpa, ñucatapash ininquichicman, ñucamanta mari Moises quillcashpa saquirca.
43005047	Ranti, cancuna Moises rimashcata mana inishpa, ñuca rimashcata pishi ininquichic.
43006001	Shuc punchacuna huasha, Jesus Galipeapi tiyac cucha chinpaman rirca.
43006002	Achca runacuna, Jesus uncuccunata janpincapac mana raipaccunata ruracpi ricushpa, paita catinurca.
43006003	Jesus shuc urcuman yachachishcacunantin sicashpa, chaipi tiyarirca.
43006004	Judiocunapac pascua raimi ña pactamurarca.
43006005	Jesus, achca runacuna paita catishpa shamucpi ricushpa, Felipeta nirca: —¿Maipi tantata rantishun caicunata carancapac?
43006006	Felipeta camashpalla chashna rimarca, pai ima ranata yacharca mari.
43006007	Felipe cutiparca: —Tanta ishcai patsac sucre tupu mana pactancachu, caran shuc ansa micuncapac.
43006008	Shuc yachachishca runa, Andres shutiyuc Simon Pedropac huauqui, nirca: —
43006009	Caipi tiyan shuc huanpra; pichca cebada tantata ishcai yacu aichantin charin. ¿Pactancachu ima chari tucuicunata carancapac?
43006010	Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Runacunata tiyarichichic. Chai panpa yapa quihuayuc carca; tiyarinucpi, caricunalla pichca huarancashi canurca.
43006011	Jesus, tantacunata japishpa, Diosta pacrachushpa, runacunata cararca. Yacu aichatapash cararca, caran shuc munashca tuputa.
43006012	Pacta micunucpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Puchushcacunata pallaichic ama imapash huacllirincapac.
43006013	Pallanucpi, pichca tantamanta puchuscahuan chunca ishcai ashanca juntarirca.
43006014	Runacuna, Jesus chai mana raipacta ruracpi ricushpa, ninurca: -¡Mana pacha! Caimi cai allpaman shamunca rashca profeta.
43006015	Chaita. uyashpa, Jesus aputa rancapac paita pushanca rashcata atipashpa, urcu jahuaman sapalla rirca.
43006016	Ña tutayaracpi, yachachishcacuna cuchaman uraicunurca;
43006017	shuc canuapi yaicushpa, cuchata chinpancapac callarinurca Cafarnaun llactaman pactancapac. Ña unai tuta cacpi, Jesus chaira mana shamushcarca.
43006018	Yuyaita huairacpi, yacu piñarirca, jatun bacu jatarinurca.
43006019	Cahuishpa cahuishpa paichca kilometro tupu purinucpi, Jesus yacu jahuata purishpa paicunapacman mayanyamushcata ricunurca; mayanyamucpi ricushpa, upata mancharinurca.
43006020	Jesus paicunata nirca: —¡Nucami cani, ama manchaichichu!
43006021	Paicuna Jesusta canuapi yaicuchishun nishpa, manapash unaipi paicuna rirashca allpaman pactanurca.
43006022	Cayantiman, chinpapi saquirishca runacuna shuc canualla tiyashcata ricunurca, chai canuapi yachachishcacunalla rinushcarca. Jesus mana rishcarca paicunahuan.
43006023	Tiberiades llactamanta shuc canuacuna shamunurca, Jesus Diosta pacrachushpa runacunata carashca mayanpi llutarishpa.
43006024	Chaipi tiyashca runacuna, Jesus yachachishcacunantin illanucpi ricushpa, chai canuacunapi yaicushpa, Jesusta mashcashpa Cafarnaunman rinurca.
43006025	Cucha chinpaman pactashpa, yacu patapi Jesusta ricushpa, paita tapunurca: —Yachachiccama, imura caiman pactarcanqui?
43006026	Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti pacha nini, cancuna mana mashcahuanquichic mana raipaccunata atipashcamanta, tantata sacsacta micushcamanta mashcahuanquichic.
43006027	Tucuric micunamanta ama llancaichichu, shuc sami micunamanta llancaichic, nicpi mana tucuric, huiñai causaita cuc micunamanta; cai RUNA chai micunata cancunata caranca, paita mari Dios Yaya chashna rancapac mincarca.
43006028	Chaita uyashpa, tapunurca: —¿Imata rurashpa Dios munashcata rurashun?
43006029	Jesus cutiparca: —Caimi Dios munashca: pai cachamushcata inichic.
43006030	Chashna nicpi, cuti tapunurca: —¿Ima munanayacta ricuricta ruranqui, ñucanchic chaita ricushpa inincapac?
43006031	Ñucanchic ñaupacuna chunlla allpapi "maná" nishca micunata micunurca; cashna mari quillcara tiyan: "Jahua pachamanta tantata paicunata cararca".
43006032	Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Chai jahua pachamanta tantata mana Moiseschu cararca, nuca Yayami quiquin jahua pachamanta tantata caran.
43006033	Dios carashca tantaca jahua pachamanta uraicushca runami: paimi runacunata causachic tanta.
43006034	Chashna rimacpi, paicuna ninurca: —Apunchic, chai laya tantata huinai ñucanchicta carai.
43006035	Jesus cutiparca: —Ñucami cani causaita cuc tanta. Ñucaman shamuc mana imura yarcancachu, nucapi inic mana imura upianayancachu.
43006036	Ranti, ña rimarcani, cancuna ñucata ricushpallata mana ininquichic.
43006037	Yaya cachashcacuna tucuilla ñucapacman shamunun; ñucapacman shamuc runacunata mana callpachishachu.
43006038	Jahua pachamanta mana shamurcanichu ñuca muñashcata rancapac, ñucata cachamuc munashcata rancapac shamurcani.
43006039	Ñucata cachamuc Yaya munashca caimi: "Ñuca canman cushcacunata mana shucllatapash chincachinquichu, puchucai puncha tucuicunata causarichinqui", chashna nishpa nihuarca Dios Yaya.
43006040	Ñuca Yaya munashca cashna mari can: Diospac Churita ricshispa iniccuna huiñai causaita charinuchun, ñucaca paicunata puchucai puncha causachina cani.
43006041	Chairaicu, judiocuna Jesusta huashata rimai callarinurea, pai "ñuca jahuapachamanta uraicushca tantami cani" nishpa nishcamanta.
