43006042	Paicunapura rimariranurca: —¿Cai Jesus shutiyuc runa manachu Josepac churi can? paipac yayata, paipac mamata ricsinchic. ¿Imaraicu cunan "ñuca jahua pachamanta uraicushcami cani" nin?
43006043	Chaslina rimaranucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama yanca rimanacuichichu.
43006044	Manapí nucaman shamun, ñucala cachamushca Yaya paita mana pushamucpi; ñucaca puchucai puncha paita causarichisha.
43006045	"Profetacuna quillcashcacunapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Dios tucui runacunata yachachinca". Tucui Yayata uyaccuna, paimanta yachacuccunapash ñucaman shamununca.
43006046	Manapí Yayata ricurcachu; shucllami paita ricurca: Paimanta shamuc runa, pailla Yayata ricurca. "Shuti pacha cancunata nini: Ñucapi imc mana rucuric causaita charin. Ñuca causaita cuc tantami cani.
43006049	Cancunapac ñaupacuna chunlla allpapi "maná" nishca mucunata micunurca, micushpallata huañunurca;
43006050	ranti, ñuca jahua pachamanta uraicuc tantamanta rimani; chaita micuc runa mana huañunchu.
43006051	Ñuca jahua pachamanta uraicushca causac tantami cani; chai tantata micuc huiñai causanca. Ñuca cunca rashca tantaca ñuca aichami can; chaita cushami runacuna causancapac.
43006052	Chashna rimacpi, judiocuna paicunapura piñashpa rimai callarinurca, nishpa: —¿Imashnami cai runa paipac quiquin aichata ñucanchicta caranca?
43006053	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cancuna cai RUNApac aichata mana micushpa, paipac yahuarta mana upiashpa, mana causaita charinquichichu.
43006054	Ñuca aichata micuc runa, ñuca yahuarta upiac runa huiñai causaita charin; ñucaca puchucai puncha paita causarichisha.
43006055	Ñuca aicha shuti pacha micunami; ñuca yahuar shuti pacha upianami.
43006056	Ñuca aichata micuc, ñuca yahuarta upiac ñucahuan llutarishcami can, ñuca paihuan llutarishcami cani.
43006057	"Ñucata cachamushca Yaya causayuc can, ñucaca paimanta causani; chashnallata, ñucata micuc ñucamanta causanca.
43006058	Jahua pachamanta uraicushca tantamanta rimani; chai tanta mana cancunapac ñaupacuna micushca tanta shinachu; paicuna micushpallata huañunurca; ranti, cai tantata micuc huiñaipac causanca.
43006059	Jesus chai shimicuna tantarina huasipi rimarca, Cafarnaun llactapi.
43006060	Jesus rimashcacunata uyashpa, huaquin yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Pai rimashca shimi mana chasquipacchu; yancamanta paita catinchic.
43006061	Jesus, paicuna yuyashcata yachashpa, nirca: —¿Nuca rimashcachu cancunata pihachin?
43006062	¿Cai RUNA ñaupa tiashcaman sicaracta ricushpa, imata ninquichicman?
43006063	Samai causaita cucmi; aicha mana imapac can, Ñuca cancunaman rimashca shimicunaca samaimi, causaimi canun.
43006064	Ranti, cancunamanta huaquincuna chaira mana ininunchu. Chashna rimarca Jesus mana iniccuta callarimanta ricsishcaraicu; chashnallata, paita japichinca rashca runata ricsirca. Huasha nirca: —Chairaicu cancunata rimarcani nishpa: Manapí nucaman shamuna ushan, Yaya mana pushamucpi.
43006066	Chai pachamanta, achca yachachishcacuna paita jichunurca, paihuan ña mana puriccunachu carca. Chashnapi Jesus chunca ishcai apostolcunata tapurca: —¿Cancunapash ñucata jichunata munanquichichu?
43006068	Simon Pedro cutiparca: —Apunchic, ¿pipacman rishun? Canlla huiñai causaita cuc shimicunata charinqui.
43006069	Can Diospac Churi cashcata ña inircanchic yachanchicpash.
43006070	Jesus paita cutiparca: —¿Manachu ñuca cancunata chunca ishcaita acllarcani? Chashnapash, cancunamanta shuc supai can.
43006071	Chashna nishpa, Simonpac churi Judas Iscariotemanta rimarca, Judas mari Jesusta japichinca racmi, chunca ishcaicunamanta cashpallata.
43007001	Shuc, punchacuna huasha, Jesus Galilea suyuta purirarca. Judeapi saquirinata mana munarcachu, judio apucuna paita huañuchincapac masheahurca mari.
43007002	"Tanpucuna" nishca raimi pactamuracpi, judiocunapac jatun raimi cacpi,
43007003	aillucuna Jesusta ninurca: —Ama caipi saquirichu; Judeaman ri, chaipi tiyac canta caticcuna can rurashcacunata ricunuchun.
43007004	Ricsi tucusha nic runaca rashcacunata mana pacalla ruran. Can mana raipaccunata rurashpa, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi chaicunata ruranqui.
43007005	Chashna rimanurca paipac aillucunapash mana paipi inishcaraicu.
43007006	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca pacha chaira mana pactamun; cancunapac ima pachapash alli can.
43007007	Cai pachamantacuna cancunata mana chicninunchu; ranti, ñucata; chicninun, paicuna rurashca mana alli cashcata ricuchini mari.
43007008	Raimiman richic cancuna; ñuca mana rishachu, ñuca puncha chaira mana pactarin.
43007009	Chai shimicunata rimashca huasha Jesus Galileapi saquirirca.
43007010	Ranti, Jesuspae aillucuna raimiman rishca huasha, paipash Jerusalenman sicarca; mana runacuna ucupi, sapalla rirca.
43007011	Judio apucuna raimi punchacunapi paita mashcaranurca nishpa: —¿Maipi tiyan chai runa?
43007012	Runacunapura achcata Jesusmanta rimarirarca. Huauquincuna ninurca: "Alli runami"; ranti, shuccuna ninurca: "Manalli can, runacunata umachin mari".
43007013	Ranti, manapí paimanta runacuna ucupi rimarca, judio apucunata manchashcamanta.
43007014	Chaupi raimi huasha, Jesus Diospac huasiman yaicurca runacunata yachachincapac.
43007015	Judiocuna mancharishpa ninurca: —¿Cai runa imashna chashna achcata yachan, mana yachachishca cashpa?
43007016	Jesus nirca: —Ñuca yachachishca mana ñucamantachu, ñucata cachamushcamantami.
43007017	Dios munashcata pactachisha nic runa, ñuca yachachishca Diosmantachu shamushcata ñuca quiquinmantachu rimarashcata ricsincami.
43007018	Quiquinmanta rimac runacunapacpi chacchai tucuncapac riman; ranti, shuc runa paita cachamushcapacpi chacchai tucunata munashpa, chai runa allita rimacmi, paita inina can,
43007019	¿Manachu Moises camachic quillcata cancunaman curca? Chashnapash, cancunamanta shucllapash chaita mana pactachinchu. ¿Imaraicu ñucata huañuchinata munanquichic?
43007020	Runacuna paita ninurca: —¡Can supaita charinqui! ¿Pimi canta huañuchinata munan?
43007021	Jesus cutiparca: —Tucuicuna mancharinquichic, ñuca, samana puncha, shuc mana raipacta rurashcamanta.
43007022	Uyahuaichic: Moises "huahuacunapac pincai carata pitina can" nishpa rimacpi (chaita rana mana Moisesmantachu shamun, cancunapac naupacunamanta shamun), cancuna chaita ruranquichic, samana puncha cacpipash.
43007023	Chaita samana puncha rana usharicpi Moises rimashcata pactachincapac, ¿imaraicu piñahuanquichic shuc uncuc runata janpishcamanta samana punchapi?
43007024	Ama ricurishcamantalla taripaichichu. Cancuna taripana cacpi, cuscata taripanquichic.
43007025	Chashna rimacpi Jesus, huaquin Jerusalenpi causaccuna tapunurca: —¿Manachu cai runata mashcaranun huañuchincapac?
43007026	Ricuichic: tucuicunapac ñaupacpi rimaran, paita mana imata ninun. ¿Cai runa Mesias cashcata ñucanchic apucuna ininunchu ima chari?
43007027	Chashnapash, cai runa maimanta shamushcata yachanchic; ranti, Mesias shamucpi, maimanta shamushcata manapí yachancachu.
43007028	Chashna ninucpi uyashpa, Jesus Diospac huasipi yachachishpa, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —"Canta ricsinchic, can maimanta shamushcata yachanchic" nishpa ninquichic: ranti, ñuca mana ñuca munaimanta caipi tiyanichu; shucmi tiyan, pai cusha nishcata pactachicmi; pai ñucata cachamuhuarca, paitaca mana ricsinquichic.
43007029	Ñuca paita ricsini, paimanta mari shamuni, paimi ñucata cachamuhuarca.
43007030	Chashhapi, "paita japishunchic" ninurca: ranti manapi paita japirca, pai huañuna pacha mana pactashcaraicu.
43007031	Achca runacuna paita ininurca; ninurca: —Mesias shamushpa, ¿cai runamanta ashtahuan mana raipaccunata rurancachu?
43007032	Fariseocuna, Jesusmanta runacuna rimarashcata uyashpa, pacriyaya apucunapacman rinurca; paicunahuan rimarishpa, Diospac huasita ricuc chapacunata cachanurca "Jesusta japichic" nishpa.
43007033	Jesus nirca: —Mana unaita cancunahuan tiyashachu, ñucata cachamushcapacman ticrana cani.
43007034	Ñuca ricpi, mashcahuanquichic, ranti mana tupahuanquichic; ñuca tiyanca rashcaman mana rina ushanquichic.
43007035	Chaita uyashpa, judiocuna paicunapura rimarinurca: —¿Maiman rinata munanca cai runa, ñucanchic mana paita tupana ushancapac? ¿Griegocunahuan causac judiocunapacman rincachu, paicunata yachachincapac?
43007036	¿Imata nishpa chai shimicunata rimarca: "mashcahuanquichic, ranti mana tupahuanquichic; ñuca tiyanca rashcaman man rina ushanquichic"? ¿Imata nishpa chashna nirca?
43007037	Raimi puchucai puncha tucui punchacunamanta ashtahuan jatun carea. Jesus, Diospac huasipi shayarishpa, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Upianayac ñucaman shamuchun, ñucata inic upiachun.
43007038	Quilleara tiyan: "Nucata inic runapac shuncumanta causac yacucuna llucshinunca".
43007039	Jesus chashna rimashpa, paita iniccuna chasquinca rashca Samaimanta rimarca; chai Samai chaira mana shamushcarca, Jesus chaira mana sumacyachishca cacpi.
43007040	Huaquin runacuna, Jesusta uyashpa, ninurca: —Cai runa shamuna cac Profetami.
43007041	Shuccuna ninurca: —Cai runa Mesiasmi. Ranti, shuccuna ninurca: —Mana. Mesias mana Galileamantachu canca.
43007042	Diospac quillcacuna ninun: "Mesias Davidpac aillucunamanta canca, Belen llactapi pacarinca, chai llactamanta mari carca Curaca David".
43007043	Shinacpi, Jesus-raicu runacuna chican chican tucunurca.
43007044	Huaquincuna paita japinata munanurca, ranti manapí paita japirca.
43007045	Chapacuna ticramushpa, fariseocunapacman pacriyayacunapacman rinurca; paicuna tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu mana pushamurcanquichic chai runata?
43007046	Cutipanurca: —¡Mana pacha! ¡Manapi runa pai rimashca shina riman!
43007047	Fariseocuna ninurca: —¿Cancunapash umachi tucurcanquichichu?
43007048	¿Apucunamanta, fariseocunamantapash shucllapash Jesuspi inishcachu? Mana.
43007049	Chai yanca runacunalla, camachic quillcata mana yachaccunalla paita ininun; chai runacuna maldisiashca canun.
43007050	Chashna ninucpi, Nicodemo, Jesus-huan rimarincapac shuc tuta rishca runa, fariseo bulamanta cashpa, paicunata nirca:
43007051	—¿Shuc runata cautsayachina usharinchu manarac paita uyacpi, pai rurashcata yachancapac?
43007052	Fariseocuna paita cutipanurca: —¿Canpash Galileamantachu canqui? Quillcacunata ricunqui yachancapac; chaicunata yachashpa, Galileamanta mana shuc profetallapash shamushcata ricunqui.
43007053	Chashna ninucpi, caran runa paipac huasiman rirca.
43008001	Jesus Olivos urcuman rirca.
43008002	Cayantin puncha, tutamanta, Diospac huasiman ticrarca. Tucui runacuna paipacman shamunurca; pai tiyarishpa, paicunata yachachi callarirca.
43008003	Camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunantin shuc manalli huarmita pushamunurca; chai huarmi shuc carihuan juchallishca ucupi japi tucushcarca. Paita chaipi tiyaccuna chaupi shuncupi shayachishpa,
43008004	Jesusta ninurca: —Yachachiccama, cai huarmi shuc carihuan juchallishca ucupi japi tucurca.
43008005	Chai laya huarmicunata "rumihuan shitashpa huañuchina can" Moisespac camachic quillca nin. ¿Canca imata ninqui?
43008006	Jesusta camashpa chaita tapunurca paita cautsayachincapac. Tapunucpi, Jesus jahualla tiyarishpa, allpapi maqui rucahuan quillcai callarirca.
43008007	Cutillata tapunucpi, Jesus shayarishpa nirca: —Cancunamanta maicanpash jucha illac cashpa, ñaupac rumita shitachun.
43008008	Cutillata jahualla tiyarishpa, allpapi quillcashpa catirca.
43008009	Paicuna, Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, shuc shuc llucshinurca; rucucuna ñaupacta llucshinurca; manapi saquirirca; Jesus sapalla tiyarca paipac ñaupacpi shayac huarmintin.
43008010	Jesus jatarishpa, huarmita tapurca: —Huarmi, ¿maipi tiyanun canta juchachiccuna? ¿Manapí canta cautsayachircachu?
43008011	Huarmi nirca: —Manapí, apulla. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñucapash mana canta cautsayachinichu. Rilla, ama cuti juchallichu.
43008012	Chai huasha, Jesus runcunata yachachishpa nirca: —Ñuca cai pacha achicmi cami; ñucahuan puric mana tutapi causanchu, causaita cuc achicta charinca.
43008013	Chashna rimacpi, fariseocuna paita ninurca: —Can quiguinpacpi ricuyac canqui; can ricuyae shina rimashca mana imagac can.
43008014	Jesus cutiparca: —Ñuca rimashca balinmi, ñuca quiquinpacpi ricuyac shina rimashpallata. Ñuca maimanta shamushcata, maiman rishcata yachani mari, ranti cancuna mana yachanquichic.
43008015	Cancuna runa yachai taripanquichic. Ñuca manapi taripanichu;
43008016	ñuca shuc runata taripacpi, ñuca taripashca alli canman; mana mari ñucalla taripani; cachamuhuashca Yaya ñacahuan pacta taripan.
43008017	Cancunapac camachic quillcapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Ishcai runa chaipuraila rimanucpi, paicuna rimashca shuti can, paicunata injna can".
43008018	Chashna cacpi; ñuca shuc ricuyac cani; ñucata cachamushca Yayapash ricuyac can, ishcaipura canchic.
43008019	Chashna rimacpi uyashpa, paita tapunurca: —¿Maipi tiyan canpac Yaya? Jesus cutiparca: —Cancuna mana ñucata ñuca Yayatapash ricsinquichic; ñucata ricsishpa, ñuca Yayatapash ricsinquichicman.
43008020	Jesus chai tucuita Diospac huasipi yachachishpa rimarca, camari malacuna mayanpi. Manapí paita japirca, japi tucuna pacha mana mari pactarishca carca.
43008021	Jesus judiocunata nirca: —Ñuca rishami; cancuna mashcahuanquichic; ranti, cancunapac juchahuan huahunquichic. Ñuca rinaman mana ushanquichic shamuncapac.
43008022	Judiocuna paicunapura rimarinurca: —Pai quiquinllata huañurincachu imata, pai rinaman ñucanchic mana rina ushashcata nin mari.
43008023	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancuna cai pachamanta canquichic; ñuca jahua pachamanta cani.
43008024	Chairaicu nircani: Cancunapac juchahuan huanunquichic. Ari, ñuca cac cashcata cancuna mana inishpa, cancunapac juchahuan huañunquichic.
43008025	Chaita uyashpa, paita tapunurca: —¿Pitac canqui? Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Callarimanta rimarani cunan rimashcallata.
43008026	Achcacunata yachani cancunamanta; cancunata cautsayachina ushaiman, ranti mana munanichu; ñuca Yayamanta huillasha, pai mari ñucata cachahuarca, paica shutita riman; ñuca paimanta yachashcata runacunata huillani.
43008027	Jesus Yayamanta rimarashcata paicuna mana atipanurcachu.
43008028	Chairaicu paicunata nirca: —Cancuna cai RUNAta cruspi jatachishpa ninquichic: Shuti pacha, pai cacmi carca; pai quiquinmanta mana imata rashcachu; Yaya paita yachachishcallata rimarca.
43008029	Ñucata cachamuhuashca ñucahuan tiyan; mana imura sapalla saquihuarca, pai munashcata mari huiñai pactachini. Jesus chashna rimashcapi, achca runacuna paipi ininurca.
43008031	Jesus paipi inic judiocunata nirca: —Cancuna shuti jinu ñuca yachachishca cancapac, ñuca rimashcata pactachishpa causana canquichic;
43008032	chashna causashpa, shuti cashcata yachanquichic; shuti cáshcaca cancunata quishpinca.
43008033	Cutipanurca: —Ñucanchic Abranmanta mirashcacuna canchic, manapi ñucanchicta huatara charirca, ¿Imaraicu ninqui "quishpira canquichic" nishpa?
43008034	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: juchayuc runata jucha huatashcata charin.
43008035	Huatara rúnaca mana huiñaipac aillu can; ranti, churi huiñaipac aillu can.
43008036	Shinacpi, churi cancunata quishpichicpi, shuti pacha quishpira canquichic.
43008037	Cancuna Abraanmanta mirashcacuna cashcata yachani; chashnapash, ñucata huañuchinata munanquichic, ñuca rimashcata mana pactachinayashpa.
43008038	Ñuca Yaya ricuchihuashcata huillani, cancunaca cancunapac yaya nishcata rurac canquichic.
43008039	Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —¡Ñucanchic yaya Abraanmi! Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Cancuna shuti pacha Abraanpac churicuna cashpa, pai rurashcata ruranquichicman.
43008040	Ranti, cancuna ñucata huahuchinata munanquichic, Dios yachachihuashca shutita rimacpipash. ¡Abraan mana imura chashna rurarcachu!
43008041	Cancunapac yaya rurashca shinallata ruranquichic. Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —¡Ñucanchic mana huaira huahuacuna canquic, shuc yayallata charinchi: Dios!
43008042	Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Dios cancunapac yaya cacpi, ñucata llaquinquichicman, Diosmanta mari shamurcani, Diospac shutipi tiyani caipi. Mana ñuca quiquin munaimanta shamurcanichu, Dios ñucata cachamuhuarca.
43008043	¿Imaraicu ñuca rimarashcata mana atipana ushanquichic? Cancuna mana munashcaraicu ñuca shimita uyana.
43008044	Cancunapac yaya supai apumi; cancuna paipaccuna canquichic, pai munashcata rurana munanquichic. Callari pachamanta pai huañuchisiqui can. Mana imura shutita rimarcachu, paipi shuti illan mari. Pai llullashcapi, pai cashca shina riman; pai llullaisiqui mari can, llullanapac yaya can.
43008045	"Ranti, ñuca shutita rimacpi, cancuna mana inihuanquichic.
43008046	Ricushun: ¿Cancunamanta maican ñuca shuc juchallatapash charishcata ricuchinca? Shutita rimacpica, ¿imaraicu mana inihuanquichic?
43008047	Diosmanta cac runa Dios rimashcata uyan; ranti, cancuna mana Diosmanta cashpa, ñucata mana uyahuanquichic.
43008048	Chashnapi, Judiocuna paita ninurca: —Can Samariamanta runa canqui, supai japishca runa canqui nishpa shutita rimanchic.
43008049	Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Ñuca mana supai japishca runachu cani, ñuca Yayata yupaichani; ranti, cancuna ñucata millahuanquichic.
43008050	Ñucata yupachihuaichic nishpa mana purinichu, ñucata yupaichac tiyanmi, paimi taripanca.
43008051	Shuti cancunata nini: Ñuca rimashcata uyac runa mana huañuncachu.
43008052	Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —Cunan shuti pacha yachanchic can supai japishca runa cashcata. Abraan huañurca, tucui profetacunapash huañunurca; canca ninqui: Ñuca rimashcata uyac runa mana huañuncachu.
43008053	¿Ñucanchic yaya Abraanmanta yallichu canqui? Pai huañurca profetacunapash huañunurea. ¿Pimi canqui nishpata yuyanqui?
43008054	Jesus cutiparca: —Ñucallatata yupaichacpi, mana imapac can. Ranti, ñucata yupaichac ñuca Yayami; cancuna "pai ñucanchic Diosmi" ninquichic,
43008055	paita mana ricsishpallata. Ñuca, ranti, paita ricsini "paita mana ricsinichu" nishpa, cancuna shina llullaisiqui caiman. Ranti, shuti pacha paita ricsini, pai rimashcata uyani
43008056	Cancunapac yaya Abraan, cai punchata ricunayashpa, cushiyarca; ricushca huasha cushihuan juntarirca. —
43008057	Chashna rimacpi uyashpa, judiocuna ninurca: —¿Pichca chunca huatata manarac charishpa, Abraanta ricurcani nishpa ninquichu?
43008058	Jesus cutiparca: —Ari, manarac Abraan pacarishcapi, ñuca ña tiyarcani.
43008059	Cashna nicpi Jesus, judiocuna paita shitancapac. Jesus miticushpa, Diospac huasinmanta llucshirca.
43009001	Shuc puncha, Jesus shuc ñausa pacarishca runahuan tuparirca.
43009002	Yachachishcacuna Jesusta tapunurca: —Yachachiccama, ¿pipac juchamanta cai runa ñausa ñahui pacarirca? ¿pai quiquinpac juchamantachu? ¿yayacunapac juchamantachu?
43009003	Jesus cutiparca: —Mana paipac juchamantachu, mana yayacunapae juchamantachu. Chashna tucurca cai runapi Diospac ushai ricurincapac.
43009004	Chaira puncha cacpi, ñuca Yaya mincahuashcata rurana cani. Tuta mayanyaran, tutapi mana llancaipac can. Ñuca cai pachapi tiyashpa, cai pacha achicmi cani.
43009006	Chashna rimashpa, Jesus allpapi tiucarca tiucahuan turuta rarca, turuta ñausa runa ñahuicunapi llutarca.
43009007	Huasha paita nirca: —Siloé nishca yacupi maillaricri (Siloé nishpa "Cachashca" nin). Chai runa chaita uyashpa maillaricrirca, ricushpa ticramurca.
43009008	Paita ricsiccuna, diosmantata mañarashcata ricushcacunapash ninurca: —¿Cai runa manachu diosmantata mañac tiyacuc carca?
43009009	Huaquincuna ninurca: —Shuti, paimi can. Shuccuna ninurca: —Mana, shuc can, pailla yachic shina ricurin. Pai nirca: —Ñucallata cani. Chashnapi, paita tapunurca: —¿Imanata cunan ricuna ushanqui?
43009011	Paicunata cutiparca: —Chai Jesus shutiyuc runa turuta rarca, ñuca ñahuicunapi llutarca, Siloé yacuman maillaricri nihuarca. Ñucata rircani, maillarircani, cunan ricuni.
43009012	Chashnapi, paita tapunurca: —¿Maipi tiyan chai runa? Pai nirca: —Mana yachanichu.
43009013	Ñausa cashca runa fariseocunapacman pushanurca.
43009014	Jesus turuta rashcapi hausa runapac ñahuicunata alliyachincapac, samana puncha carca.
43009015	Fariseocuna paita tapunurca: —¿Imashnata ricui callarircanqui? Pai cutiparca: —Turuta ñahuicunapi llutahuarca; ñahuicunata maillashpa, ricui callarircani.
43009016	Huaquin fariseocuna ninurca: —Chai runa mana Diosmantachu can, samana puncha llancarca mari. Shuccuna ninurca: —¿Juchayuc runa ushancachu chashna rancapac? Chican chican yuyarinurca;
43009017	chairaicu ñausa runata tapunurca: —¿Canca imata ninqui canpac ñahuicunata alliyachishca runamanta? Pai cutiparca: —Profeta cashcata nini.
43009018	Judiocuna mana ininurcachu chai runa ñaupa ñausa cashcata; chairaicu, paipac yayacunata cayanurca paicunata tapuncapac: —
43009019	¿Cancunapac churichu cai runa? ¿ñausachu pacarirca? ¿imashnata cunan ricun?
43009020	Cutipanurca: —Cai ñucanchic churi cashcata yachanchic; ñausa pacarishcatapash yachanchic; ranti, imashnata cunan ricushcata mana yachanchichu; pimi paita alliyachishcata mana yachanchichu. Paillatata tapuichic; yuyayuc can, paillata rimanca.
43009022	Chashna rimanurca judiocunata manchashcaraicu, judiocuna rimanushcarca mari "tantarina huasimanta jichui tucununca Jesus Mesias cashcata niccuna".
43009023	Chairaicu, ñausa runapac yayacuna ninurca "paillatata tapuichic, yuyayuc can" nishpa.
43009024	Judiocuna chai ñausa pacarishca runata cutillata cayashpa ninurca: —Diospac ñaupacpi shutita rimai. Chai runa juchayuc cashcata yachanchic.
43009025	Pai cutiparca —Juchayucchu canca, mana juchayuc canca ima chari. Ñuca caitami yachani: Ñuca ñausa carcani, cunan ricuna ushani.
43009026	Fariseocuna cutillata paita tapunurca: —¿Imata rurashpa canpac ñahuicunata alliyachirca?
43009027	Cutiparca: —Ña rimarcani, cancunaca mana inihuanquichic. ¿Imapac cutillata uyana munanquichic? ¿Cancunapash paita catinata munanquichichu?
43009028	Chashnapi, paita camishpa ninurca: —Can paita catic canqui; ñucanchic Moisesta catinchic.
43009029	Dios Moisesta rimashcata yachanchic; ranti, cai runa maimanta cashcatapash mana yachanchic.
43009030	Chai runa nirca: —Cancunata uyashpa mancharinimi; pai maimanta shamushcata mana yachanquichic, paica ñuca ñahuicunata alliyachirca.
43009031	Dios juchayucta mana uyashcata tucui runa yachan; Dios alli runata uyan, pai rimashcata pactachicta uyan.
43009032	Callarimanta pacha, mana uyarishcachu shuc runa ñausa pacarishcapac ñahuicunata alliyachishcata.
43009033	Cai runa mana Diosmanta cashpa, mana pai rashcata rana ushanman.
43009034	Chashna nicpi, fariseocuna paita ninurca: —¿Can pacarishcamanta juchalla aparishca canqui, ñucanchítaca yachachinayanquichu? Chashna nishpa, paita tantarina huasimanta jichunurca.
43009035	Jesus chai runata shitanushcata uyashpa, paihuan tuparishpa, nirca: —¿Diospac Churita ininquichu?
43009036	Runa nirca: —¿Pitac can ñuca paita inincapac?
43009037	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Paita ricushcanqui, canhuan rimariran; ñucami cani.
43009038	Chaita uyashpa, chai runa Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa nirca: —¡Ininimi, Apunchiclla!
43009039	Huasha Jesus nirca: —Ñuca cai pachaman shamurcani runacunata shucta shucmanta chicanyachincapac; chaimanta, mana ricuccuna ricununca; ricuccunaca ñausa tucununca.
43009040	Chaita uyashpa chaipi tiyac fariseocuna Jesusta ninurca: —¿Ñucanchipash ñausachu canchic?
43009041	Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Cancuna ñausa cashpa, jucha illac canquichicman; ranti, "ricunchicmi" nishpa nicpi, cancunapac jucha ashtahuan saquirin.
43010001	"Shuti cancunata nini: Maicanpash obeja curralman puncuta mana yaicushpa, shuhuami.
43010002	Obejacunata ricuccama puncuta pascashpa yaicun.
43010003	Puncuta ricuccama paiman pascan, obejacuna paipac shimita uyanun; pai obejacunata quiquin shutihuan cayan, canchaman paicunata llucshichin:
43010004	Tucui paipac obejacunata llucshichishpaca, paicunata ñaupashpa rin; obejacunaca paita catinun, paipac shimita ricsinun.
43010005	Chican runaman mana catinuncachu; ashtahuan, paimanta miticununca, paipac shimita; mana ricsishcaraicu.
43010006	Chai laya shimicunahuan Jesus judiocunata rimarca; paicuhaca Jesus rimashcata mana japinurcachu.
43010007	Huasha Jesus nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Ñuca obejacuna yaicuna puncumi cani.
43010008	Tucui ñucamanta ñaupac shamushcacuna shuhua canurca, obejacunaca paicunata mana uyanurcachu.
43010009	Ñuca puncumi cani; cai puncuta yaicuc runa quishpichi tucunca; yaicuna, llucshina ushancami pai munashcapi; micunata tarinca.
43010010	Shuhua runa shuhuancapaclla shamun; ñucaca obejacuna causaita charinuchun nishpa shamurcani, alli causaita charinuchun nishpa.
43010011	"Ñuca alli michic cani. Alli michic obejacunaraicu huañun.
43010012	Ranti, cullquiraiculla llancac runa, puma shamucpi ricushpa, obejacunata jichushpa callpan; pumaca obejacunata chausichin, huaquincunata huañuchin.
43010013	Chai runa cullquita yapachincapaclla llancac cashpa, mana ansallapash yuyarin obejacunamanta.
43010014	-
43010015	Ñuca alli michic cani. Ñuca Yaya ñucata ricshishca shina, ñucapash paita ricsini, obejacunaca ñucata ricsinun. Ñuca causaita obejacunaraicu cuyani.
43010016	Shuc obejacunapash tiyanmi ñuca obeja bulamanta chican; chaicunatapash tantachina cani; ñuca shimita uyanuncami; chaimanta, shuc bulalla, shuc michiclla tucunca.
43010017	"Yaya ñucata llaquin ñuca causaita cuyashcamanta, causaita cutillata japincapac.
43010018	Manapí chai causaita quichuhuancachu, munashpa chaita cuni. Chaita cuncapac ushani huañushpa, chaita cutillata japina ushani causarishpa. Chashna ushanata Yayamanta chasquircani.
43010019	Chashna rimacpi Jesus, judiocuna uyashpa, cutillata chican chican tucunurca.
43010020	Paicunamanta achcacuna ninurca: —¿Imaraicu paita uyanquichic?; supai japishca runa can, nuspa runa can.
43010021	Ranti, shuccuna ninurca: —Supai japishca runa mana pai rimashca shina riman. ¿Shuc supai ushancachu ñausa runata alliyachina?
43010022	Invierno pacha carca; Jerusalenpi jatun raimita ruracunurca Diospac huasita paiman ricuchishca punchata. yuyarishpa.
43010023	Jesus Diospac huasipi tiyarca, "Salomon portico" nishcata purirashpa.
43010024	Judiocuna pai muyucta tantarishpa tapunurca: —¿Imuracama ñucanchita llaquichinqui can pi cashcata mana rimashpa? Can Mesias cashpa, pasacta rimai.
43010025	Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Nuca cancunata ña rimarcani, cancunaca mana inihuanquichic. Ñuca Yayapac shutipi rurashcacuna pasacta ricuchinun;
43010026	ranti, cancuna mana inihuanquichic mana ñuca obejacuna cashcaraicu.
43010027	Ñuca obejacuna ñuca shimita ricsinun; paicunata ricsini, paicuna ñucata catishpa shamunun.
43010028	Mana tucuric causaita paicunaman cuyani; mana huiñaipac huañuncachu; ñuca maquimanta manapipash paicunata quichunca.
43010029	Ñuca Yayami chai obejacunata cuhuarca; Yayaca tucuita yallinmi. Ñuca Yayapac maquimanta manapí paicunata quichuna ushanca.
43010030	Ñucahuan Yayahuan shuclla canchic.
43010031	Chashna rimacpi uyashpa, judiocuna rumicunata japinurca Jesusta shitancapac.
43010032	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Achca alli rashcacunata cancunapac ñaupacpi rurarcani ñuca Yaya cuhuashca ushaihuan; ¿maican alli rurashcacunaraicu rumihuan shitanata munahuanquichic?
43010033	Judiocuna cutipanurca: —Mana can allita rashcaraicu rumihuan shitanca ranchic; can rimashcahuan Diosta piñashcaraicu canta rumihuan shitanata munanchic; can runalla cashpa, canllatata Dios tucunqui.
43010034	Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Cancunapac camachic quillcapi manachu quillcara tiyan: "Cancuna dioscuna cashcata ñuca nircani?
43010035	Quillcacuna rimashcata inina can, chaita tucui runa yachan; Diosca paipac shimita rimai tucushcacunata "dioscuna" nishpa nirca.
43010036	Chashna cacpi, ¿imaraicu ñuca "Diospac Churi cani" nishcamanta, "can Diosta piñanqui" nihuanquichic? Diosllata ñucata chicayachishpa cai pachaman cachamuhuarca.
43010037	Mana ñuca Yaya rurashcallata ruracpica, ama inihuaichichu.
43010038	Ranti, ñuca chaicunata ruracpica, cancuna ñucata mana inishpallata, ñuca rurashcacunata inichic; chashna rashpa, Yaya ñucapi tiyashcata, ñucaca Yayapi tiyashcata shuc rai yachanquichic.
43010039	Chai shimicunata uyashpa, judiocuna Jesusta japinata yuyanurca; ranti, Jesus paicunapac maquimanta quishpirirca.
43010040	Jesus Jordan yacu chinpaman ticrarca, ñaupa pacha Juan bautisarashca allpapi saquirirca.
43010041	Achca runacuna paipacman rinurca; paita ricushca huasha ninurca: —Juan mana raipacta mana rurashcapipash, tucui cai runamanta huillashca shuti carca.
43010042	Achca chaipi causaccuna Jesusta ininurca.
43011001	Shuc puncha, shuc Lazaro shutiyuc runa uncushca carca. Betania llactamanta carca; paipac panicuna, Maria shuc, Marta shuc, chai llactallapi causanurca.
43011002	Mariami carca Jesuspac chaquita asnac yacuhuan armachishca, acchahuan chaquichishpa.
43011003	Payapura Jesusman shimita cachanurca nishpa: —Can llaquishca runa uncushcami.
43011004	Jesus, chaita uyashpa nirca: —Cai uncui mana huañuchincapac can, Diosta sumacyachincapac can, Dios Churipash sumacyachi tucunca chaimanta.
43011005	Jesus yapa llaquirca Martata, paipac ñañatapash, paicunapac turi Lazarotapash; chashnapash, Lazaro uncushcata uyashpa, ishcai puncha pai tiyashcallapi saquirirca.
43011007	Chaipac huasha, yachachishcacunata nirca: —Jacuichic Judeaman.
43011008	Yachachishcacuna cutipanurca: —Yachachiccama, ¿ñacalla judiocuna canta rumihuan shitancapac mashcanurca, canca chaiman ticranata munanquichu?
43011009	Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Manachu puncha ¿chunca, ishcai pachata charin? Punchapi puric mana, tacarinchu punchata ricushpa.
43011010	Ranti, tutata puric tacarincami mana ricushpa.
43011011	Huasha nirca: —Ñucanchic llaquishca Lazaro puñuran, paita ricchachincapac racuni.
43011012	Yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Apunchic, pai puñuracpi alliyancami.
43011013	Jesus chashna rimashpa, Lazaro huañushcata rimashcarca; ranti, yachachishcacuna samahcapac puñurashcata yuyanurca.
43011014	Chashnapi, Jesus pasacta rimarca nishpa: —Lazaro huañushcami.
43011015	Ñuca chaipi mana tiyashcamanta cushiyani cancuna inincapac. Jacuichic, ricucrishun.
43011016	Tomas, Dídimo nishca, shuc yachachishcacunata nirca: —Jacuichic paihuan pacta huañuncapac.
43011017	Jesus pactashcapi; Lazaro chuscu puncha ña panpara carca.
43011018	Betaniamanta Jerusalenman mana caru carca, quimsa kilometro tupushi caru carca.
43011019	Jerusalenmanta achca runacuna shamunushca carca Martata, Mariata cushichincapac Lazaro huañushcamanta.
43011020	Marta, Jesus shamuracpi uyashpa, paita tupancapac llucshirca. Maria huasipi saquirirca.
43011021	Marta Jesus-huan tuparishpa, paita nirca: —Apunchic, can caipi tiyashca cacpi, ñuca turi mana huañunmanchu carca.
43011022	Chashnapash, can imatapash Diosta mañacpi, canta cuncami; chaita shuti yachani.
43011023	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Canpac turi causarincami.
43011024	Marta nirca: —Huañushcacuna causarinucpi paipash causarinca rashcata yachani.
43011025	Chashnapi Jesus paita nirca: —Ñuca causarina cani, ñuca causai cani. Ñucata inic huañushca cashpallata causarincami.
43011026	Cai causaipi ñucata inic runa mana huiñaipac huañuncachu. ¿Chaita ininquichu?
43011027	Marta nirca: —Ari, Apunchic, can Mesias cashcata inini, can cai pachaman shamuna cac Diospac Churi cashcata ininimi.
43011028	Marta chaita rimashpa, paipac ñañata cayacrirca; paita pacalla nirca: —Yachachiccama caipimi, canta cayaran.
43011029	Maria chaita uyashca shina, shayarishpa Jesusta ricuncapac rirca.
43011030	Jesus chaira mana pactashca carca llactaman; Marta paita tupashcallapita tiyarca.
43011031	Huasipi Mariahuan tiyaccuna, paita yanapancapac shamushcacuna, pai shayarishpa uctalla llucshicpi ricushpa, paita catishpa rinurca, "aya jutcuman huacancapac riran" yuyashpa.
43011032	Maria, Jesus tiyashcaman pactashpa, paipac chaqui mayanpi cuncurishpa nirca: —Apunchic, can caipi tiyashca cacpi, ñuca turi mana huañunmanchu carca.
43011033	Chashna nishpa Maria huacai callarirca; paihuan shamuc judiocunapash huacaranurca; Jesus, chaita ricushpa, shuncupi yapa llaquirirca;
43011034	paicunata tapurca: —¿Maipi paita panparcanquichic? Cutipanurca: —Apunchic, ricuc shamui.
43011035	Jesus huacai callarirca.
43011036	Judiocuna ricushpa ninurca: —¡Mana pacha! ¡Paita yapa llaquirca!
43011037	Huaquincuna ninurca: —Pai ñausa runapac ñahuicunata alliyachirca; ¿manachu imatapash rana ushanman carca Lazaro ama huañuncapac?
43011038	Jesus upata llaquirishpa, aya jutcuman shamurca; chai jutcu quinraipi tiyarca, rumihuan quillpashca.
43011039	Jesus nirca: —Rumita anchuchichic. Marta, huañushcapac pani, nirca: —Apunchic, asnan ña chuscu puncha panparami can.
43011040	Jesus cutiparcai: —¿Manachu canta nircani, can inishpa Diospac ushaita ricunca rashcata?
43011041	Rimacpi, rumita anchuchinurca. Jesus jahuaman ricushpa nirca: —Pacrachu, Yaya; ñuca shimita uyarcanqui.
43011042	Can huiñai uyahuashcata yachani; caita nini caipi tiyaccunamanta, paicuna can cachamuhuashcata inincapac,
43011043	Huasha, caparirca: —¡Lazaro, chaimanta llucshi!
43011044	Chashna nicpi, huañushca runa llucshircami; chaqui maqui huatara carca, uma churanahuan pillushca. Jesus nirca: —Paita pashcaichic, paipac chaquihuan purichun.
43011045	Achca runacuna, Mariata ricuncapae shamushcacuna, Jesus rurashcata ricushpa, ininurca.
43011046	Ranti, huaquincuna Fariseocunapacman rishpa, Jesus rurashcata huillanurca.
43011047	Chaita uyashpa, fariseocunahuan, pacriyaya apucunahuan rimarincapac tantarishpa, ninurca: ¿Imata rurashun? Cai runa achca mana raipaccunata ruran.
43011048	Ñucanchic paita chashnalla saquicpica, tucui runacuna paipi ininunca; romano apucuna shamununca ñucanchic Diospac huasita tulancapac, nucanchic llactacunata tucuchincapac.
43011049	Chashna ninucpi, paicunamanta shuc Caifas shutiyuc —chai huatapi pacriyayacunapac jatun apu carca—, nirca: —Cancuna mana imata yachanquichic,
43011050	mana atipanquichiq shuc runalla tucui runacunamanta huañuna cashcata, ama tucui llactacuna urmachi tucuncapac.
43011051	Caifas chashna rimashpa, mana pai quiquinmantachu rimarca; pacriyayacunapac jatun apu cashpa, Dios paita rimachicpi, Jesus judiocuna rantimanta huañunca rashcatal nirca;
43011052	mana judio runacuna rantimantalla, tucui Diospac. chausirishca churicunatapash shucllapi tantachincapac Jesus huañuna cashcata ricuchirca.
43011053	Chashna cacpi, chai punchamanta judio apucuna "imata rashpa Jesusta huañuchishun" nishpa yuyaranurca.
43011054	Chairaicu; Jesus runacunai ucupi mana puricchu carca; Judeamanta llucshishpa, Efrain nishca llactaman rirca, chunlla allpa mayanpi; chaipi jichurirca yachachishcacunantin.
43011055	Pascua raimi puncha ña pactariracpi, achca runa tucui llactacunamanta Jerusalenman rinurca, manarac raimi puncha callaricpi maillarincapac.
43011056	Jesusta mashcaranurca Diospac huasipi paicunapura rimarishpa: —¿Raimiman shamuncachu? ¿manachu shamunca ima chari?
43011057	Fariseocunahuan pacriyaya apucunahuan rimarinushca carca nishpa: —Maicanpash Jesus maipi tiyashcata yachashpa huillachun, paita japincapac.
43012001	Pascua raimipac sucta puncha pishicpi, Jesus Betania llactaman rirca, Lazaropacman; chai runata causachishca carca huañushca cacpi.
43012002	Chai huasipi; shuc tuta alli micunata allichinurca Jesusraicu; Marta caracurca; Lazaro Jesus-huan pacta mesapi tiyarishpa micurcra.
43012003	Maria asnac yacuta apamurca shuc libra tupu, achca balic; chai yacuhuan Jesuspac chaquicunata armachirca; huasha acchahuan chaquichirca. Llanpu huasipi chai; sumac asnac yacu asnarca.
43012004	Chashna tucucpi, Simonpac churi Judas Iscariote nishca —pai Jesuspac runa cashpa paita japichinca racurca—, nirca; ¿Imaraicu chai achca balic asnac yacuta mana catunushca tsuntsucunata yanapancapac?
43012006	Chashna rimarca mana tsuntsucunata llaquishcaraicu; ranti, pai shuhua cashcaraicu; cullquita huacaichiccama cashpa, chai cullquimanta quiquinpacta shuhuac carca.
43012007	Jesus paita nirca: —Cai huarmita casilla saqui; chai asnac yacuta ñuca panpai tucuna punchapac huacaichishca carca.
43012008	Tsuntsucuna huiñai cancunapacpi tiyanunca, ñuca mana huiñaichu cancunahuan tiyashami.
43012009	Achca runacuna Jesus Betaniapi tiyashcata yachashpa, chaiman rinurca Jesus-huan rimarincapac, Lazarotapash ricuncapac; pai huañushca cacpi, Jesus paita causachishca carca.
43012010	Pacriyaya apucuna Lazarotapash huañuchina yuyaita japinurca,
43012011	pairaicu mari achca runacuna Jesusta ininurca, pacriyaya apucunata jichushpa.
43012012	Cayantin punchapi, raimiman shamushca runacuna Jesus llactaman pactamunca rascata yachashpa,
43012013	ramos pancacunata japishpa, paita tupancapac rinurca, caparishpa: —¡Diospac shutipi shamuc chaccashca cachun! Israelmanta Jatun Curaca yupaichashca cachun!
43012014	Jesus shuc burro huihuata tupashpa, paipac jahuapi tiyarirca, cashna mari quillcara tiyarca:
43012015	Sion llacta, ama manchaichu; canpac Jatun Curaca shuc burro jahuapi tiyarishca shamuran.
43012016	Chai ucu, yachachishcacuna chai tucuita mana japinushcachu; ranti huasha, Jesus sumacyachishca cacpi, chai tucui paimanta quillcara tiyashcata yuyarinurca, chairaicu chashna tucushca carca.
43012017	Jesus Lazarota aya jutcumanta cayashpa causachishcapi, paihuan tiyaccuna ricushcata huillanurca.
43012018	Chairaicu, runacuna Jesusta tupancapac rinurca, chai mana raipacta rurashcata yachashpa.
43012019	Fariseocuna, chaita ricushpa, paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —Mana imata rana ushanchichu; tucui runacuna paita catishpa rinun.
43012020	Raimiman shamushcacuna huaquincuna mana judio canurca.
43012021	Paicuna Felipapaeman rishpa ninurca: —Ayalla, Jesusta ricunata munanchic.
43012022	Felipe uyashpa Andresta rimarca; ishcaintin Jesusta huillacrinurca.
43012023	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cai RUNA sumacyachishca cana pacha ña pactamurca.
43012024	Shuti cancunata nini: Trigo muyu allpa ucupi mana huañushpa, mana mirarinchu; huañushpaca, achcata aparin.
43012025	Quiquin causaita llaquic runa chaita chincachincami; ranti, cai pachapi quiquin causaita chincachic runa huiñai causaipac chaita huacaichin.
43012026	Ñucata yanapanata munac catihuachun; ñucata yanapacca ñuca tiyanallapi tiyanca, ñuca Yaya paita llaquinca.
43012027	"Cunan ñuca yapa llaquirini. ¿Imata rimasha? —¿Yaya, cai llaquimanta quishpichihuai" nishpa rimashachu? —¡Mana, chaipacmi shamurcani!
43012028	Yaya, canpac shutita sumacyachipai. Chashnapi, jahua pachamanta shuc shimi uyarirca nishpa: —Paita sumacyachircani, cutillata sumacyachisha.
43012029	Chaipi tiyaccuna, chaita uyashpa, ninurca: —Tulunshi carca. Huaquincuna ninurca: —Shuc angel paita rimarca.
43012030	Jesus nirca: —Chai uyarishca shimi mana ñucaraicu, cancunaraicumi rimashca can.
43012031	Cunan cai pacha taripai tucunca, cunan cai pachapac amu jichushcami canca.
43012032	Ñucaca cruspi shayachishca cashpa, tucui runacunata ñucaman aisasha.
43012033	Chashna rimashpa, ima laya huañuihuan huañuna cashcata atipachirca.
43012034	Chaita uyashpa, runacuna ninurca: —Mesias huiñaipac causana cashcata yachanchic, quillcashcacuna chashna ninucpi. ¿Imaraicu "cai RUNA shayachishca cana can" nishpa rimanqui? ¿Pitac can chai RUNA?
43012035	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Chaira ansa puncha tiyan. Chai puncha tiyanacama purichic, manarac tuta shamucpi; tutapi puric maiman rirashcata mana yachanchu.
43012036	Puncha tiyanacama, punchata inichic, puncha churicuna tucuncapac. Chai shimicunata rimashca huasha Jesus miticurca.
43012037	Jesus achca mana raipaccunata judiocunapac ñaupacpi rurashcapipash, paicuna mana ininurcachu;
43012038	chashna, profeta Isaias quillcashca pactarirca, cashna mari quillcashcarca: Apulla, ¿pitac ñucanchic rimashcata inirca? ¿Piman Dios paipac ushaita ricuchirca?
43012039	Chashnallata, mana inina ushanurcachu, Isaiasllata shucpi cashna quillcashpa saquishcamanta:
43012040	Paicunapac ñahuhicunata ñausachirca, paicunapac yuyaita upayachirca. ama ñahuicunahuan ricunuchun, ama yuyaihuan japinuchun, hucaman ama ticranuchun ñucapi alliyachi tucuncapac.
43012041	Isaias chashna rimarca Jesusta sumacyachishcata ricushcaraicu, Jesusmanta mari rimarca.
43012042	Chashnapash, achca judiocuna judio apucunapash Jesusta ininurca; inishpallata, runacuna ucupi mana chaita rimanurca fariseocunata manchashcamanta, tantarina huasicunamanta ama shitai tucuncapac.
43012043	Runacunapacpi chacchai tucunata Diospacpi chacchai tucunamanta ashtahuan munanurca mari.
43012044	Chai huasha, sinchi shimihuan Jesus nirca: —Ñucata inic runa mana ñucallata inin, ñucata cachamushcatapash inin.
43012045	Ñucata ricuc runa ñucata cachamushcatapash ricun.
43012046	Ñuca, achic cashpa, cai pachaman shamurcani ñucata iniccuna ama tutapi saquirinuchun nishpa.
43012047	Ñuca shimita uyashpa mana pactachic runata mana taripanichu; ñuca mana shamurcani runata taripancapac, paita quispichincapac shamurcani.
43012048	Ñucata millashpa, ñuca shimicunata mana chasquic runa taripacta charin; ñuca rimashca shimi paita taripanca puchucai punchapi.
43012049	Ñuca mana mari rimarcani ñuca shutipi; ñuca cachamushca Yaya imata huillanata, imata yachachinata rimahuarca.
43012050	Ñuca Yaya rimashcaca mana imura huañunaman pushan. Shinacpi, ñuca rimashcata Yaya nihuashca shina rimani.
43013001	Cayantin puncha, jatun raimi puncha "pascua" nishca carca. Jesus, cai pachamanta Yayapacman rina puncha pactamushcata yacharca; cai patchapi paihuan tiyaccunata yapa llaquishpa, chai llaquishcata paicunaman ricuchirca.
43013002	Tuta micunata micuranurca; supai apu Judas Iscariotepac shuncupi Jesusta japichina yuyaita churashca carca.
43013003	Jesus yaeharcami Yaya paipac maquipi tucuita churashcata, chashnallata pai Diosmanta shamushcata, Diosman ticranca rashcata.
43013004	Micuranucpi shayarishpa, manto nishca churanata surcushpa, chaquichina churanata chunpillirca.
43013005	Huasha, shuc batiapi yacuta tallishpa, apostolcunapac chaquicunata maillai callarirca, chunpillishca churanahuan chaquichishpa.
43013006	Simon Pedropacman shamucpi, Pedro paita nirca: —Apunchic, ¿ñuca chaquicunatachu maillanca racunqui?
43013007	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca racushcata cunan mana japinquichu, huasha atipanqui.
43013008	Pedro paita nirca; —¡Ñuca chaquicunata mana mahlahuanquichu! Jesus cutiparca: —Canpac chaquicunata mana maillachihuacpi, mana imata ñucahuan charinquichu.
43013009	Chaita uyashpa, Pedro Jesusta nirca: —¡Chashna cacpi, mana chaquicunallata, maquicunata umatapash maillahuai!
43013010	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Armashca runa chaquicunallata armana mutsun, tucui pichashca cacpi. Cancuna pichashca canquichic, ranti mana tucuilla pichashca canquichic.
43013011	Yacharca mari maican paita japichinca rashcata. Chairaicu nirca "mana tucuicuna pichashcachu canquichic".
43013012	Chaquicunata maillashca huasha, manto churanata cutillata churarishpa, mesaman tiyarishpa nirca: —¿Ñuca rashcata japircanquichichu?
43013013	Cancuna "Yachachiccama", "Apu" nihuanquichic; allita rimanquichic, chashna mari cani.
43013014	Ñuca yachachiccama cashpa, apu cashpa, cancunapac chaquicunata maillacpi, cancunapash chaquicunata maillanacuna canquichic.
43013015	Ñuca rurashcahuan cancunata yachachircani cancuna chashnallata rancapac.
43013016	Shuti cancunata nini: Shuc luncu mana amunanta yallichu; cachashca runa mana paita cachashcamanta yallichu.
43013017	¿Chaita atipanquichichu? Ñuca camachishcata pactachichic; chaita pactachishpa cushi causanquichic.
43013018	"Ñuca mana tucui cancunamanta rimarani. Ñuca acllashcacunata ricsini; chashnapash, quillcacuna nishca pactarina can; cashna quillcara tiyan: Ñucahuan pacta micuc runa. ñucata chicnic tucurca.
43013019	"Chaita huillani manarac pactashcallapita; chai pactarina pacha, ñuca cac cashcata cancuna inincapac.
43013020	Shuti cancunata nini: Ñuca cachashcata chasquic runa ñucallata chasquin; ñucata chasquicca ñucata cachamushcata chashquin.
43013021	Chaita rimacpi, Jesus upata llaquirishpa nirca: —Uyahuaichic, cancunamanta shuc ñucata japichinca ran.
43013022	Chashna nicpi uyashpa, yachachishcacuna paicunapura ricunacushpa saquirinurca, maicanmanta rimarashcata mana yachashpa.
43013023	Paicunamanta shuc, Jesus yapa llaquishca, Jesus mayanpi tiyarishpa micurarca;
43013024	Simon Pedro maquihuan paita ricuchirca pimanta rimarashcata tapuncapac.
43013025	Paica Jesusman ashtahuan mayanyashpa, paita tapurca: —Apunchic, ¿pitac can?
43013026	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca cai tanta paquita paiman cunca rani, allita ricunqui. Chashna nishpa, shuc tanta paquita jucuchishpa, Judas Iscarioteman curca.
43013027	Judas chai tantata japishca shinalla, supai paipac ucuman yaicurca. Jesus paita nirca: —Can ruranca rashcata utcalla rurai.
43013028	Micuraccuna chai Jesus rimashcata mana atipanurcachu.
43013029	Judas cullquita huacaichiccama cacpi, huaquincuna yuyanurca: "Raimipac mutsushcata rantinqui" nishpa chari chaita rimarca; "tsuntsu runacunaman imatapash cuyanqui" nishpa rimarca ima chari.
43013030	Judas chai tanta paquita japishca shina, llucshirca. Pai llucshishcapi tuta carca.
43013031	Judas rishca huasha Jesus nirca: —Cunan cai RUNA sumacyachishcami canca; chashnallata Dios paipac Churipi sumacyachishcami canca.
43013032	Dios paipac Churipi sumacyachishca cashpaca, Diosllata paipac Churita sumacyachinca, cunanllatami paita sumacyachinca.
43013033	Ñuca huahuacuna, cancunahuan ña mana unayashachu. Mashcahuanquichic, chashnapash, judiocunaman rimashca shina, cancunata nini: Ñuca rinaman mana ri ushanquichic.
43013034	Mushu rurai nishcata cancunaman cuni, caimi: Llaquinacushpa causaichic. Ñuca cancunata llaquishca shina, cancunapash llaquinacuna canquichic;
43013035	Cancuna llaquinacushpa causacpi, cancuna ñuca yachachishca runa cashcata tucuicuna yachanunca.
43013036	Chashna nicpi Jesus, Pedro paita tapurca: —Apunchic, ¿maimata rinca ranqui? Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca rinaman mana ushanqui cunan ñucata catishpa rincapac; shuc puncha ñucata catishpa rihuanqui.
43013037	Pedro paita nirca: —Apunchic, ¿imaraicu cunanllata mana ushani canta catina? Canraicu huañunalla chapacuni.
43013038	Jesus paita nirca: —¿Ñucaraicu huañunalla chapacunquichu? Uyahuai: Cari atallpa manarac caparicpi, can quimsa cuti "paita mana ricsinichu" ninqui.
43014001	Huasha Jesus rimai callarirca cashna nishpa: —Ama llaquirichichu. Cancuna Diosta ininquichic, ñucatapash inichic.
43014002	Ñuca Yayapac huasipi achca ucu tiyan. Mana chashna cacpi; "cancuna tiyanata allichincapac rinca rani" nishcata mana rimaiman carcani.
43014003	Ñuca rishpaca, tiyanacunata allichishca huasha, ticramushami, cancunata ñucahuan pushashk; ñuca tiyashcapi cancunapash tiyancapac.
43014004	Ñuca rirashcaman yachanquichic, ñanpitaca ricsinquichic.
43014005	Tomas Jesusta nirca: —Apunchic, can rirashcaman mana yachahchichu; ¿imashna ñanpita ricsishun?
43014006	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca ñanpi cani shutipash cani, causaipash cani. Manapipash Yayapacman rina ushanun, mana ñucahuan rishpa.
43014007	Cancuna ñucata ricsishpaca, ñuca Yayatapash ricsinquichicman; cunan pachamanta ña paita ricsinquichic, paita ricurarcanquichic mari.
43014008	Chashnapi Felipe paita nirca: —Apunchic, Yayata ñucanchicman ricuchipai, chailla pactan.
43014009	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Felipe, unaimanta cancunahuan tiyani, ¿chairachu mana ricsihuanquichic? Ñucata ricuc Yayatapash ricun; ¿imaraicu ninqui "Yayata ñucanchicman ricuchi?
43014010	¿Yaya ñucapi tiyashcata, ñucaca Yayapi tiyashcata manachu ininqui? Ñuca cancunaman rimashca shimicuna mana ñucamantallachu riniani; ñucapi tiyac Yaya Dios tucui ñuca rashcacunata ruran.
43014011	Inihuaichic: Yaya ñucapi tiyan, ñucaca Yayapi tiyani, Chaita mana inishpaca, ñuca rashcacunaraicu inihuaichic.
43014012	Shuti cancunata nini: ñucata inic runa ñuca rurashcacunallata ruranca; ashtahuanpash, chaicunamanta yalli jatuncunata ruranca, Yayapacman rinca rani mari.
43014013	Cancuna imatapash ñuca shutipi mañacpica, ñuca chaita rurashami, Yaya Churipi sumacyachi tucuncapac.
43014014	Ari, cancuna imatapash ñuca shutipi mañacpica, chaita rurashami.
43014015	"Cancuna ñucata llaquishpa, ñuca rimashca shimicunata pactachinquichic,
43014016	ñucaca Yayata mañasha, pai shuc Yanapacta cachanca, huiñaipac cancunahuan tiyancapac.
43014017	Chai yanapac shutita rimac Samaimi; cai pacha runacuna paita mana chasquina ushanun, paita mana ricsishcaraicu, mana ricushcaraicu; ranti, cancuna paita ricsinquichic, cancunahuan causan mari, cancunapi tiyancami.
43014018	Cancunata mana huacchayashcata saquishachu; cancunapacman ticrashami. "Astanipi, cai pacha runacuna ñucata mana ricununcachu; ranti cancuna ricuhuanquichic, ñuca causashcallahuan mari cancunapash causanquichic.
43014020	Chai puncha atipanquichic ñuca Yayapi causashcata, cancuna ñucapi causashcata, ñuca cancunapi causashcata.
43014021	Maicanpash ñuca rimashca shimicunata chasquishpa pactachicpi, paimi ñucata llaquin. Ñuca Yayaca ñucata llaquicta llaquinca; ñucapash paita llaquisha, paiman ricuchirisha.
43014022	Chashna rimacpi Jesus, Judas (mana Judas Iscariote nishca) paita tapurca: —Apunchic, ¿imaraicu ñucanchicmanlla ricuchirinca ranqui, mana tucui runacunaman?
43014023	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñucata llaquic runa ñuca yachachishcata pactachinca; ñuca Yayaca paita llaquinca, paipacman shamushun paipac shuncupi tiyancapac.
43014024	Ñucata mana llaquic runa ñuca yachachishcata mana uyanchu. Cai cancuna uyarashca shimicuna mana ñucapacchu, ñucata cachamuhuashca Yayapacmi.
43014025	"Cancunahuan tiyarashpa cai shimicunata rimani,
43014026	Santo Samai, yanapac cashpa, cai shimicunata allita atipachinca, ñuca yachachishcata yuyarichinca; ñuca Yaya ñuca shutipi chai santo Samaita cachanca.
43014027	"Ñuca rishpa, ganas causaita cancunaman saquini. Ñuca ganas causanata cancunaman cuni; cai ganas causana mana cai pacha runacuna cushca shinachu. Ama llaquirichichu, ama manchaichichu.
43014028	Ñuca cancunaman huillashcata uyarcanquichic; cashna nircani: "Riranimi, mana huiñaipac, ticrancapaclla rirani. Cancuna ñucata llaquishpaca, cushiyanquichicman Yayaman rini nishpa rimashcaraicu, Yaya ñucata yallin mari.
43014029	Manarac pactaricpi cai tucuita rimani, chai tucucpi cancuna inincapac.
43014030	"Na mana unaita cancunahuan rimarishachu, cai pachapi apu cac shamun mari. Pai ñucahuan mana imata charicpipash,
43014031	chashna tucuna can; chashna tucucpi, ñuca Yayata llaquishcata, pai mincahuashcata pactachishcata runacuna yachanunca. Jatarichic, jacuichic".
43015001	"Ñuca ubillas yura shinami cani, ñuca Yaya yurata ricuccamami.
43015002	Ñuca Yaya muyuta mana aparic pallcata cuchuncami; ranti, muyuta aparic pallcacunata ricunca, yanca pallcashitucunata cuchushpa ashtahuan aparincapac.
43015003	Cancuna na pichara canquichic ñuca cancunaman rimashca shimiraicu.
43015004	Ñucahuan llutarishpa catichic, ñuca cancunahuan llutarishpa catishca shina. Shuc pallca quiquinmanta mana aparinchu; yuraman mana llutashca cashpa, mana aparinchu; chashnallata, cancuna mana aparinquichic ñucahuan mana llutarishca cashpa.
43015005	Ñuca ubillas yurami cani, cancuna yura pallca canquichic. Maicanpash ñucahuan llutarishca catic ñucapash paihuan llutarishca, achca muyuta aparinca. Ñuca illac mana imatapash ushanquichic.
43015006	"Ñucahuan mana llutarishca runa jichui tucunca, huacllic pallca shina; chaquirincami; huasha, chai chaquishca pallcacunata tantachinunca rupachincapac.
43015007	Cancuna ñucahuan llutarishca cashpa ñuca yachachishcata pactachicpica, cancuna munashcata mañanquichic, mañashcata cushcanquichic.
43015008	Cancuna achcata aparishpa ñuca yachachishcacuna tucucpi, ñuca Yaya sumacyachishca can.
43015009	Yaya ñucata llaquishca shina, ñuca cancunata llaquircani; ñucata llaquishpa causaichic.
43015010	Cancuna, ñuca shimicunata uyashpa, ñucata llaquishpa catinquichic; ñucapash ñuca Yaya rimashca shimicunata uyarcani, paita llaquishpa causani.
43015011	"Chashna rimarcani cancuna ñucahuan cushiyancapac, cushiyashcahuan juntarincapac.
43015012	Ñuca rurai nishca caimi: Llaquinacuichic, ñuca cancunata llaquishca shina.
43015013	Shuc runa quiquin causaita cucpi shuc mashita llaquishpa, chai runata tucuicunamanta yalli llaquishcata ricuchin,
43015014	Cancuna ñuca mashicuna canquichic ñuca rimashcata pactachicpi.
43015015	Cancunata "luncucuna" nishpa mana rimashachu, luncu mana mari yachanchu amu rurashcata; ranti, cancunata "mashicuna" nini, ñuca Yayamanta uyashcata cancunaman huillarcani mari.
43015016	"Cancuna mana ñucata acllahuarcanquichic; ñuca cancuñata acllarcani; caipacta cancunata acllarcani: "Ñuca shimita tarpucrichic nishpa, tarpushca aparichun, aparishca ama chincarichun" nishpa.
43015017	Cancuna imatapash ñuca Yayaman mañacpi cushcanquichic. Shinacpi, caita cancunata nini: Llaquinacushpa causaichic.
43015018	"Cai pacha runacuna cancunata chicninucpica, paicuna ñaupac ñucata chicnishcata yuyarinquichic.
43015019	Cancuna cai pachamanta cacpica, cai pacha runacuna cancunata llaquinunman, paipaccunata llaquishca shina. Ranti, ñuca cancunata cai pachamanta acillarcani; chairaicu, cai pachapaccuna cancunata chicninun, cancuna mana cai pachamanta cacpi.
43015020	Cancunaman rimashcata yuyarinquichic; caita nircani: Shuc luncu mana paipac patronmanta yalli can. Ñucata llaquichinurca, cancunatapash llaquichinunca; ñuca yachachishcata caticcuna cancuna yachachishcatapash catinunca.
43015021	Ñucaraicu cancunata chicninunca, ñucata cachamushcata mana mari ricsinun.
43015022	"Ñuca paicunata camachincapac mana shamushca cacpica, juchata mana aparinunman; ranti, cunan juchata aparinun ñucata chicnishcaraicu;
43015023	chaita yachashpa ruranun, ñucata chicnic ñuca Yayatapash chicnin mari.
43015024	Ñuca paicunapac ñaupacpi manapí rana ushashcata mana rurashca cacpica, juchata mana aparinunman; ranti, chai mana raipaccunata ricunurca; ricushpallata ñucata ñuca Yayatapash chicninun.
43015025	Chashna tucun camachic quillcapi quillcara pactarincapac; cashna nin: Yancamanta, ñucata chicnihuanurca".
43015026	"Shuc puncha, Yanapac, shutita rimac Samai shamuncami; ñuca paita Yayapac shutipi cachasha; pai, Yayamanta shamuc cashpa, ñucamanta huillanca.
43015027	Cancunapash ñucamanta huillanquichic, callari pachamanta mari ñucahuan tiyarcanquichic.
43016001	"Chai tucuita cancunaman rimani cancuna inishca ama pishiyancapac.
43016002	Tantarina huasicunamanta cancunata shitanunca; ashtahuanpash, cancunata huañuchinunca; paicuna chashna rurashcahuan Diosta yupaichashcata yuyanunca.
43016003	Chaita ruranunca Yayata hucatapash mana ricsishcaraicu.
43016004	Chaita cancunata rimani cancuna ñucamanta yuyarincapac chashna tucucpi. Callarimanta mana rimarcanichu cancunahuan tiyashcaraicu.
43016005	"Cunaca, ñucata cachamushcahuan tiyancapac rinca rani, ¿imaraicu mana tapuhuanquichic "maimata rinqui" nishpa?
43016006	Tapuna rantimanta upata llaquirinquichic ñuca rimashcamanta.
43016007	Chashnapash, ñuca ricpica, cancunapac alli canca, shutita rimani, Ñuca mana ricpica, cancunata Yanapac mana shamuncachu; ranti, ñuca rishpa, paita cancunapacman cachasha.
43016008	Pai shamushpaca, cai pacha runacuna juchata rashcata ricuchinca, ñuca jucha iliac cashcata ricuchinca, Dios paicunata taripanca rashcata ricuchinca.
43016009	Juchallinurca ñucata mana inishcaraicu.
43016010	Ñuca jucha illac cashcata ricuchinca, ñupa Diospacman rinca rani mari; shinacpi, ña mana ricuhuanunca.
43016011	Dios cai pacha runacunata taripanca rashcata ricuchinca, cai pacha amu ña cautsayachi tucurca mari.
43016012	"Chaira achca tiyahuan cancunaman rimancapac; ranti cancuna cunan mana japina ushanquichic.
43016013	Shutita rimac Samai shamucpimi, atipana ushanquichic; pai tucuita atipachinca; mana paipac quiquin shutipi rimanca, paiman rimanushcata huillanca, ima tucunatapash ricsichinca.
43016014	Pai ñucata yupaichanca, ñucapacmanta japinca mari cancunaman ricsichincapac.
43016015	Tucui ñuca Yaya charishcata ñucapash charini; chairaicu nini: "Samai hucapacmanta japinca cancunaman ricuchincapac.
43016016	"Unailla mana ricuhuanquichic, astanipi cuti ricuhuanquichic, Yayapacman rinca rani mari.
43016017	Chashha nicpi, huaquin yachachishcacuna rimariranurca nishpa: —¿Imata nishpa nin chai shimicunata? "Unailla mana ricuhuanquichic, astanipi cuti ricuhuanquichic" nin; "chashna tucunca Yayapacman rinca rashcamanta" nin.
43016018	Imata nishpa nin chai "Unailla, astanipi". Pai rimarashcata mana atipanchichu.
43016019	Jesus, paicuna tapunayashcata yachashpa, nirca: —Ricushun: Ñuca caita nircani: "Unailla mana ricuhuanquichic, astanipi ricuhuanquichic cutillata". Manachu chaimanta tapunacunquichic?
43016020	Uyahuaichic cuti: Shuc puncha cancuna huacanquichic, ñacarinquichic, cai pachapaccuna cushiyanucpi; ranti, shuc puncha cancuna llaquirishca saquirincami, chaipac huasha cushiyanquichic.
43016021	Shuc huarmi pacarichina puncha ñacarin, huahua nanai paita japicpi; huahua pacaricpi, nanashcata cuncarin, shuc huahua pacarishcamanta cushiyashpa.
43016022	"Chashnallata, cancunapash cunan llaquirinquichic; ranti, ñuca ticracpi cushiyanquichic; chai cushiyashca pipash cancunata mana quichuncachu.
43016023	Chai punchapi mana imata tapuhuanquichic. Uyahuaichic: Cancuna imatapash Yayata mañacpi ñuca shutipi, pai cuncami.
43016024	Cunancama mana imata ñuca shutipi mañarcanquichic. Mañashpa cushcanquichic, cancuna cushiyashca pactarincapac.
43016025	"Cunancama rimashcata chinpapurachina shimicunahuan rimarcani; chashna shimicunahuan ña mana rimashcachu, pasacta Yayamanta huillasha.
43016026	Chai punchapi ñuta shutipi mañanquichic. Ñucaca mana ninichu "cancunamanta Yayata mañasha". Mana mutsurincachu.
43016027	Yayallata cancunata llaquin mari, cancuna ñucata llaquishcaraicu, ñuca Yayamanta shamushcata cancuna inishcaraicu.
43016028	Ari, Yayapacmanta llucshircani cai pachaman shamuncapac, cunan cai pachata saquishpa, Yayapacman ticranca rani.
43016029	Rimacpi uyashpa, yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Cunan pasacta rimaranqui, tucuita atipanchic.
43016030	Can tucuita yachashcata cunan ricsinchic, canta imatapash tapuncapac mana mutsurin. Chairaicu can Diosmanta shamushcata ininchic.
43016031	Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —¿Cunanchu ininquichic?
43016032	¡Cancuna chausirina pacha pactacpi, caran amu shuc caiman, shuc chaiman miticuncapac, ñucata sapalla saquishpa! Mana imananchu, ñuca mana sapalla tiyani, ñuca Yaya ñucahuan tiyan.
43016033	Chai tucuita rimarcani, cancuna ñucahuan llutarishpa ganaslla causancapac." Cai pacha runacunapi llaquichi tucunquichic; mana imananchu, cariyanquichic, ñuca paicunata atircani.
43017001	Chashna rimarca Jesus; chai huasha, jahuaman ricushpa nirca: —Yaya, pacha pactamurca. Canpac Churita sumacyachipai, canpac Churi canta sumacyachincapac.
43017002	Tucui runacunapac apu canata paiman curcanqui, chai runacunaman huihai causaita cuyachun nishpa.
43017003	Caimi huihai causai: Canta shuclla shuti jinu Diosta ricsinuchun, canta llaquinuchun can cachashca Jesucristontin.
43017005	Cunaca ñucata sumacyachipai, Yaya, ñuca canhuan tiyashcapi sumacyachi tucushpa causashca shina, manarac cai pacha tiyashcapi;
43017006	"Can cuhuashea cai pacha runacunaman canpac shutita ricsichircani. Canpaccuna canurca, can paicunata cuhuarcanqui, paicunaca canpac shimita chasquinurca.
43017007	Tucui can cuhuashca canmanta shamushcata cunan ininun.
43017008	Can rimahuashca shimicunata paicunaman rimarcani, paicunapa chai shimicunata chasquinurca; ñuca canmanta llucshishcata alli atipanun, can cachamuhuashcatapash ininun. Paicunamanta mañani, can cuhuashca runacunamanta; paicuna canpac canun; shuccunamanta mana mañanichu.
43017010	Tucui ñuca charishca canpacmi, chashnallata tucui can charishca ñucapacmi; ñuca paicunapi sumacyachishca cani.
43017011	"Ñuca ña mana cai pachapi tiyashachu, paicunaca cai pachapi saquirinun; ñuca canpacman ticranca rani. Sumac Yaya, can ñucaman cushca runacunata canllata canpac ushaihuan ricupanqui paicuna shuclla cancapac, ñucanchic shuclla cashca shina.
43017012	Ñuca paicunahuan causashcapi, paicunata pusharcani; paicunata quishpichircani can cuhuashca ushaihuan; Manapí chincarirca; chincarina cashcalla chincarirca, quillca nishca pactarihcapac.
43017013	"Cunan canpacman rirani; cai shimicunata cai pachapi tiyashpa rimani, paicuna ñuca cushita shuncupi charincapac.
43017014	Canpac shimita paicunaman huillarcani; cai pacha runacuna paicunata chicninun paicuna mana cai pachamanta cashcaraicu, ñucapash mana cai pachamantachu cani.
43017015	Can paicunata cai pachamanta llucshichipai nishpa mana mañanichu; ranti, paicunata supai apumanta quishpichipai.
43017016	Paicuna mana cai pachamanta canun, ñucapash mana cai pachamantachu cani.
43017017	"Paicunata shuti cashcahuan canraicu chicanyachipai; can rimashca shimi shutimi can.
43017018	Can ñucata cai pachapaccunaman cachamuhuashca shina, ñuca paicunata cai pachapaccunaman cachani.
43017019	Paicunamanta canman camari shina curinimi, paicunapash canman curishpa, can mincashcata rurashpa causancapac.
43017020	"Sumac Yaya, mana ¿paicunamantallachu mañani; tucui ñucapi ininacunamantapash mañani, paicuna rimashcamanta ininacuna.
43017021	Paicunapura shuclla canuchun. Can, Yaya, ñucapi tiyashca shina, ñuca canpi tiyashca shina paicuna shuclla ñucanchicpi canuchun nishpa mañani. Shucllapi causanuchun, cai pacha runacuna can cachamuhuashcata inincapac.
43017022	Can cuhuashcata paicunaman curcani, paicunapura shuclla cancapac, hucanchicpura shuclla cashca shina.
43017023	"Ñuca paicunapi tiyasha, can ñucapi tiyanqui; paicuna allipacha shuclla tucunuchun. Chashnami, cai pacha ruhacuna can ñucata cachamushcata atipanunca; chashnallata, can cai pacha runacunata llaquishcata ñucata llaquishca shina yachanunca.
43017024	"Yaya, caita munanni: Can mincahuashcacuna ñuca tiyanallapi tiyanuchun, ñucata ña sumacyachishcata ricushpa manarac cai pacha tiyashcapi shina.
43017025	Alli Yaya, cai pachamanta caccuna canta mana ricsinun; ranti ñuca canta ricsini, caicunapash yachanun can ñucata cachashcata.
43017026	Can pi cashcata paicunaman ricsichircani, canta ashtahuan ricsichisha, can ñucapi churashca llaquinaca paicunapac shuncupi tiyachun, ñuca quiquinllata paicunapi tiyancapac.
43018001	Rimanata tucuchishcapi, Jesus yachachishcacunantin Cedrón nishca yacu huahua chinpaman rirca. Chaipi shuc chacra tiyarca; chaiman Jesus yachachishcacunantin yaicurca.
43018002	Jesusta japichie Judas chai allpata ricsirca, chaipi mari achca cuti Jesus yachachishcacunantin tantaric carca.
43018003	Judas shuc suldaru bulata pushashpa chaiman pactarca nina purucunata, caspicunata, mircanucunata apashpa. Pacriyaya apucuna fariseocunantin chai suldaru bulata paiman cunurca Diospac huasita ricuc chapaeunatapash.
43018004	Jesus tucui ima tucunata yachashpa, paicunapacman rishpa tapurca: —¿Pitata mashcanquichic?
43018005	Ninurca: —Nazaretmanta Jesusta. Judaspash paicunahuan tiyarca.
43018006	Jesus nirca: ¿Ñucami cani. Chaita uyashpa paicuha huashahuan rishpa, allpaman urmanurca.
43018007	Jesus cutillata paicunata tapurca: ¿Pitata mashcanquichic? —Nazaretmanta Jesusta — ninurca.
43018008	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ña uyarcanquichic, ñucami cani. Ñucata mashcacpica, caicunata ama quillachichichu.
43018009	Chashna tucurca Jesus rimashca pactarincapac, cashna mari rimashcarca: "Can cuhuashcacunamanta shucllapash mana chincarishcachu".
43018010	Simon Pedro, mireanuyuc cashpa, chaita surcushpa, shuc apupac luncuta huactarca, paipac rinrita pitirca; chai luncu Malco shutiyuc carca.
43018011	Jesus Pedrota nirca: —Mircanuta cara ucupi sati. ¿Manachu cai jatun llaquita apana cani, Yaya chashna munacpi?
43018012	Suldarucuna chapacunantin Jesusta japishpa huatanurca.
43018013	Ñaupac, Anaspacman paita pushanurca; Anas Caifaspac huarmi yaya carca, pacriyayacunapac jatun apu chai huata.
43018014	Caifasllata judiocunata rimashcarca nishpa: "Shuc runallata huañuchina astahuan alli canca ama tucuicuna huañunuchun".
43018015	Simon Pedro shuc yachachishca runahuan Jesusta catiranurca. Chai yachachishca runa jatun apuhuan ricsishca carca, chairaicu Jesus-huan pacta huasiman yaicurca.
43018016	Pedro canchapi saquirirca, puncullapi. Chai aputa ricsic yachachishca runa puncuta ricuccamahuan rimancapac llucshirca, Pedrota yaicuchincapac.
43018017	Puncuta ricuccama —shuc huarmi carca— Pedrota tapurca: —¿Manachu canpash chai runata catic canqui? —Mana- nirca.
43018018	Luncucuna chapacunapash, ninata japichishpa, rupayaranurca, yapa chiri mari carca. Pedropash paicunahuan tiyarca.
43018019	Pacriyaya jatun apu Jesusta tapurca pai yachachishcacunamanta camachishcamantapash.
43018020	Jesus cutiparca: —Ñuca tucuicunapac ñaupacpi rimarcani; ñuca huiñai judiocuna tantarina huasicunapi yachachic carcani; pacalla mana imata yachachircanichu.
43018021	¿Imata tapuhuanqui? ¿Ñucata uyashcacunata tapunqui; paicuna ñuca yachachishcata yachanun.
43018022	Chashna nicpi, shuc Diospac huasita ricuc runa maqui palahuan Jesusta huactarca nishpa: —¿Chashnachu jatun aputa rimarin?
43018023	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca manallita rimashca cacpica, nihuai imapi manallita rimarcani; alli rimashca cacpica, ¿imaraicu macahuanqui?
43018024	Chashnapi, Anas Jesusta jatun apu Caifaspacman cacharca.
43018025	Pedro nina mayanpi rupayararea. Chaipi tiyaccuna paita ninurca: —¿Manachu canpash pai yachachishcacunamanta canqui? —Mana- nirca.
43018026	Shuc jatun apupac luncu, Pedro rinrita pitishcapac aillu, paita nirca: —Ñuca quiquin ñahuicunahuan canta Jesus-huan chacrapi ricurcani.
43018027	Pedro nirca: —Mana Chai ucullapi cari atallpa caparirca.
43018028	Caifaspac huasimanta Jesusta gubirnu apupacman pushanurca. Inti ña pacaricpi, judiocuna apupac huasiman mana yaicunurca ama mapayancapac, chai puncha pascua micuna puncha mari carca.
43018029	Chairaicu, Pilato paicunapacman llucshirca tapuncapac: —Imamanta cai runata juchachinquichic?
43018030	Cutipanurca: —Cai runa mana juchayuc cashcapica mana canpacman pushamunchicman carca.
43018031	Pilato picunata nirca: —Cancunallata japichic, cancunapac yachai paita taripaichic. Judiocuna ninurca: —Ñucanchic manapita huañuchina ushanchic,
43018032	Chashna rimanucpi, Jesus rimashca pactarirca pai imashna huañuna cashcata huillashcapi.
43018033	Pilato ucuman yaicushpa, Jesusta shamuchishpa, paita tapurca: —Juidiocunapac Jatun Curacachu canqui?
43018034	Jesus nirca: —¿Can quiquinmantachu chaita ninqui? ¿shuccuna huillashcatachu rimanqui?
43018035	Pilato paita cutiparca: —¿Judiochu cani ñuca? Canpac llacta runacuna, pacriyaya apucuna canta ñucaman chasquichinurca. ¿Imatata rurarcanqui?
43018036	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca mana cai pacha apucuna shinachu cani. Paicuna shina cacpica, ñuca runacuna macarinunman judiocuna ñucata ama japincapac; fanti, ñuca shuc laya apumi cani.
43018037	Nicpi uyashpa Pilato tapurca: —Jatun Curacachu canqui? Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ari, ñuca Jatun Curacami cani. Cai pachaman shamurcani tucuicunaman shuti cashcata ricsichincapac. Shutita catic runacuna ñuca shimita uyanun.
43018038	Pilato tapurca: —¿Imaita can shuti? Chashna tapushpa, judiocunahuan rimarincapac llucshirca; paicunata nirca; —Cai runapi ima manallita mana tarinichu.
43018039	Caran huata, pascua punchapi, shuc huichcashca runata cacharic cani cancunapac yachai. Judiocunapac jatun Curacata cacharincapac munanquichichu?
43018040	Paicuna caparishpa ninurca: —¡Mana paita! ¡Barrabasta cachari! Barrabas shuc millai shuhua runa carca.
43019001	Chashnapi, Pilato Jesusta japishpa llipachichirca.
43019002	Suldarucuna, Jesusta japishpa, shuc casha llaututa ahuashpa, paipac umapi churanurca; shuc puca churanatapash churachinurca;
43019003	huasha, paipacman mayanyarishpa ninurca: —¡Canta saluranchic, judiocunapac Jatun Curaca! Chashna nishpa, maqui palahuan paita huactaranurca.
43019004	Pilato cutillata judiocuna tiyashcaman llucshirca. Paicunata nirca: —Uyahuaichic, cai runapi ima juchata mana tupashpa cancunaman cutillata pushamuni.
43019005	Chashna nicpi, Jesus llucshirca; casha llaututa paipac umapi charirca, puca churanata churarishca. Pilato, paita ricuchishpa, nirca: —¡Ricuichic cai runata!
43019006	Pacriyaya apucuna chapacunapash paita ricushpa, caparinurca nishpa: —¡Paita huañuchi, paita huañuchi! ¡Cruspi chacatashca huañuchun! Pilato paicunata nirca: —Cancunallata japichic, paita huañuchichic, ñuca ima juchata mana tupanichu paipi.
43019007	Judiocuna cutipanurca: —Ñucanchic yachai, paita huañuchina can, "Diospac Churi cani" nirca mari.
43019008	Chaita uyashpa, Pilato ashtahuan mancharca.
43019009	Jesusta huasi ucuman cutillata pushashpa, Pilato paita tapurca: —¿Maimanta canqui? Jesus chunlla saquirirca.
43019010	Pilato paita nirca: —¿Imaraicu mana rimahuanqui? ¿Canta huañuchina, canta cacharina ushashcata manachu yachanqui?
43019011	Chashnapi, Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñucata mana imata rana ushanquiman Dios mana munashcapi; chairaicu, ñucata canman chasquichishca runa canmanta yalli juchayuc can.
43019012	Chai pachamanta, Pilato Jesusta cacharinata munarca; ranti, judiocuna paita caparinurca: —Paita cacharishpa, Incahuan mana mashichu canqui; pipash jatun Curacami cani nishpa, Incata chicnin.
43019013	Chaita uyashpa, Pilato Jesusta canchaman llucshichirca; huasha, taripana tiyarinapi tiyarirca, hebreo shimipi "Gábata" nishcapi (Gabata nishpa, "rumihuan rurashca panpa" nin runa shimipi).
43019014	Pascua micunata allichina puncha carca, chaupi puncha mayanlla. Pilato Jesusta ricuchishpa nirca: —Caimi cancunapac Jatun Curaca!
43019015	Paicuna caparishpa ninurca: —¡Huañuchun, huañuchun! ¡Cruspi paita huañuchi! Pilato nirca: —¿Cancunapac Jatun Curacata huañuchishachu? Judiocuna ninurca: —¡Ñucanchipac Jatun Curaca Incallami can!
43019016	Chaita uyashpa, Pilato Jesusta paicunaman curca chacatashca cancapac. Paicunaea Jesusta japishpa chacatancapac pushanurca.
43019017	Jesus, crusta marcashpa, Calvario urcuman rirca (hebreo shimipi Gólgota ninun; nicpi, "aya tullu panpa").
43019018	Chaipi paita chacatanurca; ishcai runatapash chacatanurca shuc alli maquiman, shuc lluqui maquiman.
43019019	Pilato shuc quillcata quillcachirca crus umapi churancapac; chai quillcapi cashna quillcara tiyarca: "Nazaretmanta Jesus judiocunapac Jatun Curaca".
43019020	Achca runacuna chai quillcashcata ricunurca; chai urcu llactamanta mana caru carca; quillcashcaca quimsa shimipi quillcara carca: arameo shimipi, griego shimipi, latin shimipi.
43019021	Judio apucuna Pilatota ninurca: —Can quillcashcata "judiocunapac Jatun Curaca" nishpa pichana can; "judiocunapac Jatun Curaca cani nirca" nishpa quillcanqui.
43019022	Pilato nirca: —Ñuca quillcashca quillcara saquirin.
43019023	Jesusta chacatashca huasha, suldarucuna paipac churanacunata japinurca caranpac shuc; cushmaca mana sirara carca, illacta ahuara carca;
43019024	chairaicu ninurca: —Caita ama pitishun; lichayucpac saquirichun. Chashna quillca nishca pactarirca, cashna mari quillcara tiyarca: "Ñuca churanacunata paicunapura cunacurca; ñuca cushmaca lichayucpac saquirirca".
43019025	Crus chaquipi Jesuspac mama tiyarca, paipac ñaña Cleofaspac huarmi Mariapash, Maria Magdalenapash.
43019026	Jesus paipac mamata ricushpa, yachachishca Juanpash chaillapi tiyacpi ricushpa, mamata nirca: —Huarmi, chaimi canpac churi.
43019027	Huasha, yachachishca runata nirca: —Chaimi canpac mama. Chai pachamanta chai yachachishca runa Jesuspac mamata paipac huasiman pusharca.
43019028	Chaipac huasha, Jesus pai raranata ña pactachishcata yachashpa, quillca nishca pactarincapac nirca: —Upianayahuan.
43019029	Chaipi shuc jayac bino manca tiyarca; suldarucuna shuc esponjata japinurca; jayac binopi jucuchishpa, pintupi huatashpa, Jesusta upiachinurca.
43019030	Jesus jayac binota camashca huasha, caparishpa nirca: —Tucui illacta pactarirca. Umata lapushpa huañurca.
43019031	Cayantin puncha jatun raimi pascua nishca carca. Ayacuna ama cruspi saquirincapac, judiocuna Pilatopacman nnurca "ayacunata chaimanta anchuchipai" nishpa mañancapac.
43019032	Suldarucuna rishpa, Jesushuan pacta chacatashcacunapac chancacunata paquinurca.
43019033	Jesuspacman mayanarishpa ña huañushcata ricushpa, paipac chancacunata mana paquinurcachu;
43019034	shuc suldaru tucsinahuan paipac tintilluta tucsirca; chai ucullapi yahuar yacupash llucshirca.
43019035	Chaita ricushca runa "Chasna tucurca" nin, pai rimashca shuti can; pai yachanmi shutita rimashcata cancuna inincapac.
43019036	Chashnarmi quillca nishca pactarirca: "Paipac tullucunata mana shucllatapash paquinquichichu".
43019037	Shucpi nin: "Tucsishcaman ricununca".
43019038	Chaipac huasha, shuc Arimateamanta runa Jose shutiyuc (paipash Jesusta catic carca, pacalla catic carca judiocunata manchashcamanta) Pilatopacman rirca Jesuspac ayata manancapac. Pilato pai mañashcata cucpi, chai runa Jesuspac ayata apashpa rircai.
43019039	Shucpash Nicodemo shutiyuc shamurca; chai runa shuc cuti Jesus-huan rimarincapac tuta rishcarca. Chai runa asnac yacuta apamurca shuc patsac libra tuputa.
43019040	Jesuspac ayata japishpa asnac yacuhuan armachishpa, churanahuan pillunurca judiocunapac yachai panpancapac.
43019041	Chai manyata shuc chacra tiyarca, chacrapi shuc aya jutcu; manapí chaira chai jutcupi panpai tucushca carca.
43019042	Chaipi Jesuspac ayata churanurca; caruman chincachincapac mana ushanurcachu, samana puncha nalla pactanca racurca mari.
43020001	Semana ñaupac puncha tutamantashitu, chaira tuta ucupi, Maria Magdalena Jesus ta panpanushca jutcuman rirca. Chaiman pactac, nimita anchuchishcata ricurca.
43020002	Callpashpa, Simon Pedropacman, chai shuc yachachishca Jesus yapa llaquishca runapacman rirca. Paicunata tupashpa nirca: —¡Aya jutcumanta Apunchicta surcunurca, maipi churanushcata mana yachanchichu!
43020003	Rimacpi uyashpa, Pedrohuan chai shuc yachachishca runahuan aya jutcuman rinurca.
43020004	Ishcaintin pacta callpanurca; chai shuc yachachishea runa Pedromanta yalli callpashpa, ñaupae aya jutcuman pactarca.
43020005	Ricuncapac cumurishpa, churanacunata allpapi ricurca; mana yaicurcachu.
43020006	Unailla Pedro pactarca. Aya jutcuman yaicushpa, churanacunata allpapi ricurca.
43020007	Jesuspac umata pillunushca churana mana allpapi tiyarca shuc churanacunahuan, shuccpi patachira tiyarca.
43020008	Chai yachachishca runa, ñaupac pactamuc runa, paipash yaicurca; ricushpa inirca.
43020009	Quillcapi quillcara tiyashcata "Jesus huañushcacunamanta causarina can" nishpa, chai pachacama mana atipanushcarca.
43020010	Chaita ricushpa, chai yachachishcacuna huasiman ticranurca.
43020011	Maria aya jutcu mayanpi huacashpa saquirirca. Huacashpa, aya jutcuman ricuncapac cumurishpa,
43020012	ishcai angelcunata yuraclla churarishcata ricurca; Jesuspac aicha tiyashcapi tiyanurca, shuc umaman, shuc chaquiman.
43020013	Angelcuna huarmita tapunurca: —Huarmi, ¿imaraicu huacaranqui? Pai nirca: —Apunchicta apanurca, maipi churanushcata mana yachanichu.
43020014	Chashna nishpa, ticracpi ricushpa, Jesus chaipi shayashcata ricurca; Jesus cashcata mana yacharca.
43020015	Jesus paita nirca: —Huarmi, ¿imaraicu huacaranqui? ¿Pitata mashcacunqui? Pai, chacracamami yuyashpa, nirca: —Ayalla, can paita apashca capi, maipi churashcata rimahuai, ñuca paita apancapac.
43020016	Chashna rimacpi, Jesus paita nirca: —¡Maria! Paica ticrashpa nirca: —¡Raboni! ("raboni" nishpa "yachachiccama" nin)
43020017	Jesus paita nirca: —Cacharihuai, chaira caipi tiyani mari; ñuca huauquicunapacman rishpa, paicunata rimanqui: "Ñuca Yayapacman, huca Diospacman rinca rani; pai cancunapac Yayami, cancunapac Diosmi".
43020018	Chashna rimacpi, Maria yachachishcacunapacman rishpa nirca: —Apunchicta ricurcani, caita nihuarca. Jesus rimashcataca huillarca.
43020019	Chai punchallapi, ña tutayaracpi, Jesus yachachishcacuna shuc huasipi tiyanurca; judiocunata manchashcamanta huasi puncu huichcara carca. Cuncaimanta Jesus yaicurca; paicuna chaupi shuncupi shayarishpa nirca: —¡Ganas causanata charichic!
43020020	Huasha, paipac maquicunata, paipac tintilluta tucsishcata ricuchirca. Apostolcuna, Jesusta ricushpa, yapa cushiyanurca.
43020021	Jesus cutillata nirca: —¡Ganas causanata charichic! Ñuca Yaya cachamuhuashca shina, ñucapash cancunata cachani.
43020022	Huasha, paicuna jahuapi pucurca nishpa: —Santo Samaita chasquichic.
43020023	Cancuna pichashca juchacuna pichara saquirinunca; cancuna mana pichashca juchacuna mana pichara saquirinunca.
43020024	Shuc yachachishca runa, Tomas shutiyuc Didimo nishca, Jesus shamushcapi illarca.
43020025	Shuccuna paita rimanurca: —Apunchicta ricurcanchic. Pai cutipashpa nirca: —Paipac maquipi clavo jutcuta mana ricushpa, ñuca maqui rucata chai jutcupi tintillu jutcupipash mana satishpa, mana inishachu.
43020026	Pusac puncha huasha, yachachiscacuna chai huasillapi tiyanurca; Tomas paicunahuan tiyarca. Puncu huichcara cacpi, Jesus yaicurca; paicuna chaupi shuncupi shayarishpa nirca: —¡Ganas causanata charichic!
43020027	Huasha Tomasta nirca: —Tomas, maqui rucata sati caipi, ñuca maquita llancai; canpac maquita ñuca tintillu jutcupi sati; ama inina illac caichu; inishcayuc cana canqui.
43020028	Tomas nirca: —¡Ñuca Apulla, ñuca Dioslla!
43020029	Jesus shuc achca munanayacta ricuriccunata rurarca yachachishcacuna ñaupacpi, chaicuna cai quillcapi mana quillcashca tiyanun.
43020031	Chaicunata quillcarcani Jesus Mesias cashcata cancuna inincapac; cancuna chashna inishpa, paipac causaita charinquichic.
43021001	Jesus yachachishcacunaman cutillata ricurirca Tiberiades cucha patapi; cashna tucurca:
43021002	Simon Pedro-huan, Tomas-huan, Natanael-huan ishcai Cebedeopac churicunahuan shuc ishcai yachachishcacunahuan pacta tiyanurca.
43021003	Simon Pedro nirca: —Llicancapac rirani. Shuccuna ninurca: —Canhuan shamushun. Rishpa canuaman yaicunurca. Tuta pacaricta mana imata japinurca.
43021004	Punchayacucpi, Jesus tiyu panpapi ricurimurca; chai runacuna Jesus cashcata mana yachanurca.
43021005	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Runacuna, ¿imatapash japircanquichichu? —Mana imata japircanchic -ninurca.
43021006	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Llicata alli maquiman shitaichic, tarinquichicmi. Llicata shitashpa, achca yacu aichacunata japinurca, llicata mana aisana ushanurca,
43021007	Chai Jesus llaquishca runa Pedrota nirca: —¡Apunchicmi! Simon Pedro "Apunchicmi"nishcata uyashpa, churanata churarishpa —llatan mari carca— yacuman shitarirca.
43021008	Shuccuna canuahuan shamunurca llicata aisashpa; yacu patamanta mana caru carca, shuc patsac metro tupulla.
43021009	Allpaman pactaccuna ninata japichishcata ricunurca; nina jahuapi shuc challua tiyarca; tantapash tiyarca.
43021010	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cunan japishca aichacunamanta apamuichic.
43021011	Simon Pedro, canuaman sicashpa; llicata allpaman aisarca; jatun challua juntarashca shuc patsac picha chunca quimsa; chashna achca cacpipash, llica mana lliquirishcachu.
43021012	Jesus paicunata nirca: —Micuc shamuichic. Paicuna "can pitac canqui" nishpa tapunata manchanurca, Jesus cashcata yachashpallata.
43021013	Jesus mayanyashpa, tantata japishpa paicunaman curca; yacu aichatapash cararca. l
43021014	Chaihuan quimsa cuti Jesus yachachishcacunaman ricurimurca causarishca huasha.
43021015	Micushca huasha, Jesus Pedrota nirca: —Juanpac churi Simon, ¿caicunamanta yalli llaquihuanquichu? Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Ari, Apunchic, ñuca canta llaquishcata yachanqui. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñuca obeja huahuacunata michinqui.
43021016	Unailla cutillata tapurca: —Juanpac churi Simon, ¿ñucata llaquihuanquichu? Pedro paita cutiparca: —Ari, Apunchic, ñuca canta llaquishcata yachanqui. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñuca obejacunata michinqui.
43021017	Quimsaniqui cuti tapurca: —Juanpac churi Simon, ¿ñucata llaquihuanquichu? Pedro, Jesus quimsa cuti "llanquihuanquichu" nishpa tapushcamanta llaquirishpa, nirca: —Apunchic, can tucuita yachanqui; ñuca canta llaquishcata yachanqui. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñuca obejacunata michinqui.
43021018	Shuti pacha canta nini: Can malta cashcapi, canllata churaric carcanqui, can munashcaman ric carcanqui. Can rucuyacpimi, ricracunata chutachinqui, shucca canta churachinca, can mana munashcaman pushai tucunqui.
43021019	Chashna rimashpa Jesus imashina Pedro huañunca rashcata Diosta sumacyachincapac ricsichirca. Huasha paita nirca: —¡Catihuai!
43021020	Pedro ticrashpa, Jesus yapa llaquishca nina paicunata catimurashcata ricurca; chai runa puchucai tuta micunapi Jesuspac mayanpi tiyashpa, paita tapushcarca "Apulla, pimi canta japichinca ran" nishpa.
43021021	Pedro paita ricushpa, Jesusta nirca: —Apunchic, ¿cai runaca imata tucunca?
