43021022	Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca ticranacama pai caipi saquirichun ñuca munacpica, canta mana imananchu. Can catihuai.
43021023	Cashna Jesus nicpi, chai runa mana huañunca rashcata huaquincunapura rimarirca; ranti, Jesus mana nircachu" "mana huañunca ran" nishpa; "cai runa ñuca ticranacama caipi saquirichun ñuca munacpica, canta mana imananchu" nishpa nirca.
43021024	Caimi chai tucuita huillac runa, paillata chaicunata quillcashpa saquirca; pai shutita rimashcata yachanchic.
43021025	Shuc achcacunatapash Jesus rurarca; chaicunata shuc shuc quillcanucpi, quillcashca pancacuna tucui cai pachapi mana yaicununman yachin.
44001001	Teófilo, ñuca ñaupa quillcashca pancacunapi tucui Jesus yachachishcacunamanta, pai callarishcapi rurashcacunata churarcani,
44001002	pai jahuapachaman pushai tucushca punchacama. Pai acllashca Apostolcunata Diospa Samaihuan pai rimashcacunata atipachishca huasha.
44001003	Paicunahuanmi taririrca pai ñacarishca huasha, achcacunahuan pai causac casncata ricsichishpa, paicunaman chuscu chunca puncha tupu ricurirca, chaipi paicunata Dios Apu cana Pachamanta (Reino de Dios) rimarca.
44001004	Shuc cuti paicunahuan micucushpa paicunata cashna rimarca: —Jerusalenmanta ama caruyanquichicchu; chapaichic Yaya rimashca pactarichun; ¿manachu ña chaimanta cancunata rimarcani?
44001005	Juan Yacuhuan bautisarca, cancuna ranti manapash unaipi Diospa Samaihuan bautisai tucunca ranquichic.
44001006	Chairaicu chaipi tantarishcacuna tapunacurca: —Apunchic, ¿cunachu Israelmanta Apu jinu tucunca ranqui?
44001007	Pai cutiparca: —Yaya paipa munaihuan chai pachacunapi ruranca rashcata cancuna imata yachana charinquichic.
44001008	Chashnapash shuc ushaita chasquinquichicmi, Diospac Samai cancunapacman uraicumucpi, ñucamanta Jerusalenpi, tucui Judeapi, Samariapi, tucui pachapi ricuyaccuna tucunca ranquichic.
44001009	Chaita rimashca huasha, pai sicashcata ricunurca, shuc puyu paicuna ricushcata qillparca.
44001010	Paicuna allipacha jahuaman ricushpa shayacushcapi, ishcai runa yuraclla churarishca paicunaman mayanyanurca
44001011	cashna rimashpa: —Galileamanta runacuna, ¿imata rashpami jahuamanlla ricushpa shayanquichi? Caimanta cunan jahua pachaman pushai tucuc Jesusllata pai rishca shinallatacmi ticramunca.
44001012	Chashnapi, paicuna Olivos nishca urcumanta ticramunusca, chaimanta Jerusalenman mana caru can: samana puncha paicuna puri ushashca tupu.
44001013	Llactapi pactashpa paicuna causana huasipi yaicunurca; paicuna canurcami: Pedro, Juan, Santiago, Andres, Felipe, Tomas, Bartolome, Mateo, Alfeopa churi Santiago, Shuncuhuan Curishca (el Fanático) shutiyuc Simon, Santiagopac huauqui Judas.
44001014	Tucuipura paicuna Dioshuan rimarinapi huiñai catiranurca, Jesuspac mama Maria paipac aillucunandin.
44001015	Chai punchacunapi chaipi shuc patsac ishcai chunca runacuna tantarishca tiyanurca. Pedro cai runa ucupi shayarishpa rimancapac callarirca chai huauquicunata:
44001016	—Huauquicuna, Diospac Samai ñaupa quillcapi rimashca pactarina carca; David Judasmanta rimashca: pai millai runacunata Jesusta japichincapac pusharca.
44001017	Ñucanchic-huan puric carca, ñucanchic shinallata llancac.
44001018	Jesusta catushpa japishca cullquihuan shuc allpata rantirca, huasha huaicuman urmarca, paipa huicsa tucyacpi chunchullicuna chausirinurca.
44001019	Pai chashna tucushcata tucui Jerusalenmanta runacuna yachanurca, paicunapac shimipi chai allpata rimanurca Aceldama, aya panpa.
44001020	Yachanchic Diosman Taquinacuna (Salmos) pancacunapi quillcashca tiyan: "Pai causashca allpa chushac saquirichun, ama pi runata chaipi causana yuyai tiyachun". Chaillapita rimanpash: "Pai rantimanta shuc llancachun".
44001021	Chairaicu, allimi canca shuc runa chai Jesus causarishcata ricuyac ñucanchiman llutarichun, shuc, chai Jesus ñucanchihuan causacushcapi puric,
44001022	Juan bautisashpa purishcamanta pai jahua pachaman pushai tucushcacama.
44001023	Ishcaita shayachinurca: Jose Barsabata, Cusca shuncuyuc nishca, Matiasta.
44001024	Chai huasha cashna rimarinurca: —Apunchic, can tucuicunapac shuncuta ricsinqui; ricsichi cai ishcaicunamanta maicantata acllarcanqui,
44001025	pai Apostol tucuchun Judas rantimanta, cai rinaman rishpa saquishcaraicumanta.
44001026	Lichayucta yachancapac racpi, Matias lichayuc tucurca, paita chunca shuc Apostolcunaman yapachinurca.
44002001	Pentecostes puncha pactashcapi tucuilla shucllapi tantarishca tiyanurca.
44002002	Cuncaimanta sinchi huaira shina jahua pachamanta uyarimushpa tucui paicuna tiyacushca huasipi juntarirca.
44002003	Chaipi ricunurca shuc nina callu shinacuna caran umapi shayarishcata,
44002004	tucuilla. Diospac Samaihuan juntarishca saquirinurca, caran shimipi rimancapac callrinurca, chai Samai paicunata rimachishca shina.
44002005	Jerusalenpi canacurca tucui mama-llactamantacuna shamushca Diosta llaquic judiocuna.
44002006	Chai tulupushcata uyashpa achcacuna chaima rinacurca, mancharishca saquirinurr ca, caranlla quiquin shimipi rimashcata uyashpa.
44002007	Tucuilla mancharicushiyashpa tapurinurca: —¿Manachu Galileamanta canun tuciu chai rimacuccunaca?
44002008	¿Shinacpi imaraicuta caranlla ñucanchicpac quiquin shimipi rimashcata uyacunchic?
44002009	Caipi tiyanchic Partomanta runa, Mediamanta, Elanmanta; cuti shuccunaca causanchic Mesopotamiapi, Judeapi, Capadociapi, Pontopi,
44002010	Asiapi, Frigiapi, Panfiliapi, Egiptopi, Cirene mayapi tiyac Libia suyumanta; maicancunaca Romamanta runa canchic, maicancunaca judio, cuti shuccunaca mana judio cashpapash paicunapac ininata catiranun;
44002011	Cretamanta, Arabiamanta shamushcacunapash tiyan, chashnapash Diosmanta sumac rimashcacunata tucuilla quiquinpac shimipi uyacunchic.
44002012	Ima tucucushcata mana yachashpa, mancharishpa tapurinurca: —¿Caica imatata ñucanchicman ricsichinayan?
44002013	Ranti shuccunaca, asishpa rimanurca: —Machac mari canun.
44002014	Chashnapi Pedro chunca shuc Apostolcunahuan shayarishpa, sinchi shimihuan rimarca: —Judio runacuna, Jeresalenpi causaccunapash ñuca shimita uyapaichic; allita atipashpa ricunquichic.
44002015	Cancuna rimashca shina mana machacchu canchic; chaira tutamantalla can.
44002016	Cunan caipi pactaricunmi profeta Joel shutiyuc rimashca:
44002017	"Puchucai punchacunapi tucuncami, riman Dios, ñuca Samaita tucui runapacpi tallichincapac rani; cancunapac churicuna ushushicunapash ñucaraicu huillanunca, maltacuna rucucunapash nuspaicunatami nuspanunca.
44002018	Chai punchacunapi ñuca Samaita ñuca chulucunapash jahuapi tallichishami,
44002019	Jahuapachapi sumaimanacunatami rasha; cai allpapica: yahuar, nina, cushni jatarishca tiyanca.
44002020	Intica yanayancami, quillaca yahuaryancami, Apunchicpac puncha chaira mana pactashcapi, jatun puncha, manaricuipac puncha.
44002021	Chashnapash, Apunchicpac shimipi mañashpa quishpichi tucununcami".
44002022	Israelmanta runacuna uyahuaichic: Nazaretmanta Jesusta ñucanchic ucupi ushaita Dios cushcarca: Paita rurachirca mana raipaccunata, sumac ricuriccunatapash, cancuna chaita yachanquichic.
44002023	Chashnapash, cancunaca millai runacunaman japishpa curcanquichic, paita huañuchircanquichic, cruspi chacatarcanquichic, Dios munashca shina, pai unaimanta rimashca shina.
44002024	Ranti Dios paita causachirca huañuimanta quishpichishpa; mana allichu carca huañui paita yallincapac,
44002025	paimanta David cashna riman: 'Apunchicta huiñaipac ñucapac uaupacpi charini, paita ñucapac yachac maquipi charishpa mana urmashachu.
44002026	Chairaicu ñuca shuncu cushiyahuan, canta cushiyashcahuan chacchani, ñuca aichapash chapashpa samacun.
44002027	Mana mari panparallapi jichuhuanquichu, mana saquinquichu canta allipacha catic ismusha tucurichun.
44002028	Causai ñanpita ricsichihuashcanqui, can ñucahuan tiyacushpa cushichihuanquimi.'
44002029	Huauquicuna, allita atipachishpa rimashcata uyahuaichic: rucu yaya David huañurca, panpai tucurcapash, paipac aya jutcuca ñucanchic ucupi cunancama sirin.
44002030	Ranti pai tucunca rashcata huillac cashpa, yacharca Dios quiquinpac shutipi rimashcaraicu shuc paipac aillu jatun apu tucunca rashcata.
44002031	Chairaicu ñaupacta ricurca Mesias huañushcacunamanta causarishcata, paimanta mari cashna rimashpa nirca, mana panparashcapi jichui tucurcachu, paipac aichapash mana ismurcachu.
44002032	Caimi Jesus, tucui ñucanchic ricushcanchic paita Dios causachishcata.
44002033	Tucuita ushac Diospac maquihuan jatunyachishca, Yayamanta cachamuna nishca Diospac Samaita cunan tallichishca, chaitami cancuna uyanquichic, ricucunquichic.
44002034	Shutimi can, David mana jahua pachaman sicarcachu, chashnapash, riman: Apunchic, ñucapac Apunchicta rimarcami: Ñucapac yachac maquiman tiyari,
44002035	ñucami canta pinaccunata canpa chaqui ucupi churancapac racuni.
44002036	Chashna cacpi Israelmanta tucui runacuna allita yachanuchun, Dios chai cancuna cruspi chacatashca Jesusta APUNCHIC, MESIAS rurashcata".
44002037	Chai shimicunata uyashpa, yapa llaquirishcahuan Pedrota chai shuc Apostolcunatapash tapunurca: —¿Imata ruracpimi alli tucunca, huauquicuna?
44002038	Pedro paicunata cutiparca: —Cancunapac causaita allichichic cancunamanta caranlla Jesucristopac shutipi bautisarishpa, cancunapac juchacunamanta pichashca saquirincapac. Diosca paipa Samaita cancunaman cuncami;
44002039	pai cushami rimashcaca cancunapacmi, cancunapac churicunapacpash, tucui chicanmanta Apunchic cayashca runacunapacpash.
44002040	Cuti shuc achca shimicunahuan, Pedro paicunata camachirca: —Chicanyaichic cai millai runacunamanta.
44002041	Pai rimashca shimita uyaccuna bautisai tucunurca; chai puncha iniccunaman quimsa huaranca tupu yaparinurca.
44002042	Apostolcuna rimashcata mana sanpayashpa pactachiccuna carca, tucui charishcacunata cunacushpa, misata ranapi, Dioshuan rimarinapipash.
44002043	Tucui runacuna mancharishpa ricunurca mancharicushiyashcacunata Apostolcuna ruracpi ricushpa.
44002044	Tucui chai iniccuna shuc yuyaillapi catiranurca, paicuna charishcata tucui chaipuralla charishpa.
44002045	Allpa, tucui imacuna charishcata catushpa, caran runa mutsushcata ricushpa raquiccuna carca.
44002046	Caran puncha Diospac huasiman cushiyashcahuan riccuna carca; huasicunapi misata rashpa, tucuipura cushiyashcahuan micuccuna carca.
44002047	Diosta chacchacuna carca, tucui runacuna paicunata llaquiccuna carca; caran puncha Apunchic mirachicurca chai tantarishcacunaman quishpichicushcacunata.
44003001	Pedro Juantin chishi mayanman Dioshuan paipac huasipi rimarinaman "riranurca, chashnapi shuc suchu runa, mamapac huicsa ucumanta chashna pacarishca, apamuranushcata ricunurca.
44003002	Chai runata tucui puncha churaccuna carca Diospac huasipi tiyac Sumac Puncu nishcapi, chaipi paita churaccuna carca llaquirishcahuan diosmantata (limosna) chaiman yaicuccunata mañashpa tiyancapac.
44003003	Pedro Juantin Diospac huasiman yaicucushcata rictishpa diosmantata paicunata mañarca.
44003004	Pedro, Juanta paipac mayanpi charishpa, chai runata ricushpa saquirishpa rimarca: —Ñucanchiman ricui.
44003005	Chai suchu runa paicunapac ñahuiman allipacha ricurca, imallapash cuhuanunman yuyashpa.
44003006	Chashnapi Pedro paita nirca: —Curi, cullqui mana charinichu, ñuca charishcata canman cuni: Nazaretmanta Jesus Mesiaspac shutipi purincapac callari.
44003007	Yachac maquimanta japishpa, jatachirca.
44003008	Chaillapita paipa chancacuna chaqui mucucunapash sinchiyanurca, pahuaillahuan shayarirca, purincapac callarishpa paicunahuan Diospac huasiman yaicurca quiquin chaquihuan, pahuashpa, Diosta chacchashpa.
44003009	Tucui runacuna pai puricushpa Diosta chacchacushcata ricunacurca; diosmantata
44003010	Sumac Puncupi mañashpa tiyacllata cacpi ricushpa yapa mancharinurca, chashna. tucushca ricushpa.
44003011	Chai alliyashca runa mana llushpirinayarca Pedropac, Juanpac mayanmanta, chairaicu chashna mancharishca runacuna, callpashpa rinacurca Salomonpac puncu canchaman, chaipi paicuna canacurca,
44003012	Pedro, runacuna tantarishcata ricushpa, paicunata cashna nirca: —Israelmanta runacuna, ¿imaraicuta alliyachishcamanta mancharinquichic? Mana ñucanchic ushaihuanchu, mana ñucanchic yapa alli cashcamantachu paita purichircanchic.
44003013	Yachaichic Abrahanpac Dios, Isaacpac Dios, Jacobpac Dios, ñucanchic rucucunapac Dios, paipac runa Jesusta jahuayachirca. Paita japishpa apucunaman cancuna curcanquichic; Pilato cacharina munashcapi, chashnallata cancuna mana munarcanquichic.
44003014	Mana juchayuc runata cacharichina rantimanta, ashtahuan huañuchisiqui runata cacharichircanquichic;
44003015	ranti causaiman pushac Aputa huañuchichircanquichic. Chashnapash Dios paita causachirca; chaita ricushcaraicu ñucanchic rimanchie.
44003016	Jesupac shutipi inishcaraicu, cai Shuti alliyachishca cai cancuna ricsishca suchu runata. Shinacpi, Cristopi inishcaraicumi cai runa allipacha alliyashca saquirishca, tucui cancuna ricushca shina.
44003017	Yachanimi, huauquicuna, cancuna apucunantin mana yachashpa huañuchishcata.
44003018	Ranti Dios chashna rurashcahuan pactachirca tucunca rashcata huillaccuna rimashcata: Paipac Mesias ñacarina cashcata.
44003019	Chairaicu, juchacunamanta nanarishpa alli causaiman ticraichic. Chaipi shuti Apunchicca alli causaita apamuncami yachin
44003020	shamuna Mesiasta cachamushpa.
44003021	Chai Mesias Jesusmi can, jahua pachapi tiana can, cai pacha mushuyachi tucunacama, chaimanta Dios ña rimarca tucunca rashcata huillaccunapac shimihuan.
44003022	Moises rimarca: "Apunchic Dios ñuca shina runata cai huauquicuna ucumanta shayachinca. Uyapanquichic tucui pai rimanca rashcata.
44003023	Chai runata mana uyac llacta ucumanta callpachishcami canca.
44003024	Tucui tucunca rashcata huillaccuna, Samuelmanta callarishpa, pai huasha shamuccunapash, cai punchacuna pactamunamanta rimanushcami.
44003025	Cancunami chai runacunapac huahuacuna canquichic, Dioshuan cancunapac rucucunahuan curishca shimita chasquincapac racuccuna, Dios Abrahanta cashna rimashcapi: "Canpac churicunapimi bendisiashca canunca tucui cai allpamanta aillucuna".
44003026	Naupacta cancunapacta nishpa huañushcamanta causachishca paipac runata, paita cachamushcami bendisionta cancunaman apamuncapa, cancuna mana allicunamanta anchurina cacpi.
44004001	Chaira paicuna chai runacunata rimacushcapi pacri yayacuna pactamunurca, Diospac huasipi ricuccunapac apupash, saduceocunantin.
44004002	Yapa piñarishca canurca runacunata yachachishcamanta, rimaranacurcapash ima shina Jesus causarishca tucui runacuna causarina cashcata ricuchicushcata.
44004003	Paicunata japishpa chunta curralpi cayanticama churanurca ña tutayacushcaraicu.
44004004	Paicuna rimashcata uyashpa achcacuna ininurca, iniccuna mirarishpa caticushca ña pichca huarancaman pactarca.
44004005	Cayanti puncha Jerusalenpi tantarinurca apucuna, rucucuna, yachachic quillcata yachaccuna,
44004006	Yaya pacricunapac apu Anas, Caifas, Jonatan, Alejandro, tucui chai Yayapacripac aillumanta caccuna chaillapita canurca.
44004007	Pedrota Juantapash paicunapac ñaupacman cayashpa tapunurca: —¿Pipac ushaihuata, pipac shutipita chaita rurarcanquichic?
44004008	Chashnapi Pedro, Diospac Samaihuan juntarishca cashpa, paicunata cutiparca: —Llacta apucuna, Israelmanta rucucuna,
44004009	cunan cutipana canchic shuc uncuc janpi tucushcamanta, pimi janpirca rushpachu tapunquichi. Tucuilla allita uyapaichic
44004010	chasnallata cai Israelmanta runacuna tucuilla allita uyanuchun: Janpi tucushcami Nazaretmanta Jesucristopac shutiraicu, paita cancuna cruspi chacatarcanquichic, chashnallata Dios paita huañushcacuna ucumanta causachirca; pairaicumi cai runa cunan cancunapac ñaupacpi alli, paipac quiquin chaquihuan shayacun.
44004011	Jesusmi, cancuna, huasi ruraccuna mana alli nishpa jichushca rumi, ranti cunan sapiyachic rumi tucushca.
44004012	Chairaicu, cai tucui pachamanta runacunapacpi shuc mana mari tiyan Diospacman pactancapac nicpi.
44004013	Chai Pedro Juantin yapa cuscata rimashcata ricushpa mancharishca saquirinurca, yachanurca paicuna mana quillca imatapash yachashcata, mana ricsiracunapash canurca. Yachanurca mari Jesus-huan puriccuna cashcata,
44004014	ranti paicunapac mayanpi ricunurca chai alliyashca runa shayacushcata; chashnamanta mana shuc shimi rimanurcachu.
44004015	Taripana ucumanta llucshichi tucunurca, chai huasha paicunapura rimarincapac callarinurca:
44004016	Imatami rurashun cai runacunata. Cai Jerusalenpi tucuilla yachanun paicuna mana raipacta rurashcata, ñucanchic chaimanta rimanata mana ushanchic.
44004017	Ranti ricuna canchic chai ama ashtahuan uyarichun runa ucupi. Shinacpi manchachina canchic ama cuti rimanuchun chai shutita pi runa ñaupacpipash.
44004018	Paicunata cayachishpa rimanacurca ama cuti Jesus-manta rimancapac, ama paimantapash yachachincapac.
44004019	Chashnapi Pedro Juantin cutipanurca: —Cunan cancunallata allita ricuichic, ¿allichu can Diospac ñaupacpi paita mana uyashpa ashtahuan cancuna rimashcata pactachincapac?
44004020	¡Imashnata mana rimashun ñucanchic ñahuihuan ricushcata, ñucanchic rinrihuan uyashcata!
44004021	Cuti manchachina shimicunata paicunata rimashpa cacharinacurca, mana ñacachinata ushanurca runacunaraicu.
44004022	Tucuillami Diosta chaccharanurca tucushcamanta, chai janpi tucuc runa ña paica chuscu chunca yalli huatata charirca.
44004023	Cachari tucushca shina, Pedro Juantin mashicunapacman rishpa rimanurca apucuna, pacriyayacuna, rucucuna paicunaman rimashcata.
44004024	Paicuna rimashcata uyashpa, tucuilla shuclla shimihuan Diosta rimanurca: —Apunchic, can rurarcanqui jahua pachata, cai pachata, mama cuchata, tucui paicunapi tiyactapash.
44004025	Can yuyaita churarcanqui canpa runa ñucanchipac yaya Davidpi, cai shimicunata: "Mama llactacunapi macanacui tiyan, ruranacunapi yapa yuyarishca tiyan, ¿imapami chaicunata yuyarinquichic?
44004026	Cai pachamanta jatun apucuna tantarinun, paipac churicunapash Apunchicta, paipac Mesiasta piñashpa huancurinushca.
44004027	Chashnami cai llactapi tucurca: Herodes Poncio Pilatopash Diosta mana ricsiccunahuan Israel runacunahuanpash shuclla yuyaita japinurca Jesus canpa Mesiasta millashpa,
44004028	chashna can munashpa yuyarishcata paicuna pactachinurca, can chashnapac canpac ushaihuan, canpac yuyaihuan rurashpa saquishcata.
44004029	Cunan Apunchic, riqui ñucanchicta paicuna piñashcata, canpa runacunata sinchicuchi canpac Shimita ama manchashcahuan yachachinuchun.
44004030	Chashnallata canpac ushaita ricsichi uncuccunata janpishcahuan, mancharicushiyanacunahuan canpac alu runa Jesuspac shutiraicu".
44004031	Paicuna Dioshuan rimarinata tucuchiscapi paicuna tiyacushca ucu chucchurirca, chashnapi tucuilla" Diospac Samaihuan juntarishca saquirinurca, chairaicu Diospac Shinuta mana manchashcahuan rimancapac callarmurca.
44004032	Inishpa caticuccuna tucuula shuclla shuncuta, shuclla yuyaita charinurca: paicuna charishca tucuicunapac carca, mana pipash amu tiyarcachu.
44004033	Apostolcuna Apunchic Jesus huañushcacunamanta causarishcata ushaihuan ricsichinacurca, tucui paicuna yapa llaquishca canurca.
44004034	Paicuna ucupi mana tsuntsu tiyarcachu, tucui paicunamanta allpa, huasi chariccuna catuccuna carca,
44004035	cullquitaca Apostolcunapac maquipi churaccuna carca, cuti paicunaca caran runa mutsushca tuputa ricushpa cuccuna carca.
44004036	Chashnami rurarca Jose, Apostolcuna Bernabe shutichishca (nicpi: cushiyachishca); pai Levi miraimanta carca, Chipremanta runa,
44004037	pai charishca allpata catushca huasha cullquita Apostolcunapac maquipi churac shamurca.
44005001	Shuc runa Ananias shutiyuc paipac huarmi Safirantin, paicuna ishcaipura rimarishca huasha, shuc allpata catunurca,
44005002	chaupi cullquita paicunapacta saquichinurca huarmipash yachashpallata, chaishuc chaupita Apostolcunapac maquipi churarca.
44005003	Pedro rimarca: —Ananias, ¿canpac shuncutachu supaiman curcanqui? ¿Diospac Samaitachu umachisha yuyanqui? ¿mana yachanmichu yuyanqui canpac allpamanta chaupi cullquita huacaichishcata?
44005004	¿Piñashcahuanchu catuchinacurca? Chashna catushpa, ¿manachu canlla illacta chai cullquita japina usharcanqui? ¿allitami ruranichu yuyanqui? Mana runacunatachu llullashcanqui, Diostami llullashcanqui.
44005005	Rimashcata uyashpa Ananias allpapi urmarca, chailla-pita huañurca; yapa manchari shamurca tucui chaita uyaccunaman.
44005006	Maltacuna jatarishpa, chai ayata pillushpa panpaneapac apanacurca.
44005007	Quimsa pacha huashapi huarmipash pactamurca, pai mana yacharca cari tucushcata.
44005008	Pedro paita tapurca: —¿Chai tupupichu cancunapac allpata caturcanquichic? Pai cutiparca: —Ari, chai tupupimi caturcancmc. Pedro paita rimarca:
44005009	—¿Cancuna ishcantipurachu Diospac Samaita camana munarcanquichic? Ricui, caipi ticramuranun canpac carita panpancapac riccuna. Paicunallatami cantapash apanunca.
44005010	Chaillapita Safira paipac chaqui mayanpi huañushca urmarca. Chai maltacuna ticramushpa huañushcata tupanurca, paipac cari mayanpi panpancapac apashpa rinurca.
44005011	Tucui iniccuna yapa mancharinacurca, chashnallata chaita uyaccunapash mancharinacurca.
44005012	Apostolcuna achca mancharicushiyaipacunata runa ucupi ruranurca. Tucui iniccuna Salomonpac puncu canchapi huancurishpa tantariccuna carca;
44005013	ranti chaishuccunaca mana paicunaman mayanyaccunachu carca, paicunata yapa llaquicushpapash.
44005014	Chashna, huarmi caricunapash achcacuna Apunchicman inishcahuan llutarinacurca.
44005015	Cuti chashnallata uncuccunatapash paicuna purina ñanpiman cahuitupi surcuccuna carca, Pedro chaita riracpi paipac llantuuapash japichun nishpa.
44005016	Jerusalen llacta mayanmantacunapash pactaccuna carca paicunapacman uncuccunata apashpa, supai japishcacunata pushashpa, tucuilla janpirishca saquiriccuna carca.
44005017	Pacriyayacunapac apu tucui paihuan llutarishcacunapash, tucui paicuna saduceos nishcacuna canurca; yapa piñashpa,
44005018	Apostolcunata japishpa chunta curralpi churanurca.
44005019	Ranti tuta ucupi Apunchipac angel puncucunata pascashpa paicunata canchaman surcurca, rimashpa:
44005020	—Richic, Diospac huasipi shayarishpa yachachichic runacunata cashna causashca samita.
44005021	Rimashcata uyashpa, pacarina mayanta Diospac huasipi yaicushpa runacunata yachachincapac callarinacurca. Chaicamaca pacri yayacunapac apu paipaccunahuan pactamushpa, tantarinata ruranurca, israelitacunapac jatun tantarina, japi tucushcacunata pushancapac cachanurca.
44005022	Huacaichicamacuna rishpa paicunata mana tarinurca. Ticramushpa rimanacurca:
44005023	—Paicunata huacaichishpa saquishcataca sumacta quillparatami tarircanchic, huacaichicamacunaca puncu mayanpi shayaranurca; cuti pascashpa ricucpica, mana pitapash ucupi tarircanchic.
44005024	Huacaichiccunapac apu pacriyayacunapac apucunapash, chaita uyashpa yapa mancharishca saquirinacurca, paicunapura tapurinacurca imami tucushcanca nishpa.
44005025	Chashnapi shuc runa pactamushpa cashna paicunata rimarca: —Cancuna japishpa quillpashca runacuna Diospac huasipimi runacunata yachachiranun.
44005026	Chaipi huacaichiccuna apu paipac runacunahuan Apostolcunata japicrinurca, chashnapash mana piñashcahuan, runacunapi rumihuan shitai tucunata manchashcaraicumanta.
44005027	Ña japishpa apamushcapi, apucuna ñaupacpi shayachinacurca, chashnapi pacriyayacunapac apu paicunata tapushpa rimarca:
44005028	—¿Manachu cancunata rimarcanchic ama yachachinquichichu chai runamanta? Chashna cacllapita, pai yachachishcata cancuna tucui Jerusalenpi rimashpa purishcanquichic, chairapash ñucanchiman jahuachinquichic chai runa huañushcamanta.
44005029	Pedro tucui Apostolcunantin cutipanurca: —Diostami ashtahuan runacunamanta ñaupacta uyana canchic.
44005030	Ñucanchipac rucu yayacunapac Dios Jesusta huañushcacunamanta causachirca, cancuna paita shuc caspimanta huarcuchishpa huañuchircanquichic.
44005031	Dios paipac yachac maquiman jahua pachapi paita churashca, Jatun Apu, Quishpichicta rurashpa, Israelta mushu causaita cuncapac, juchamanta pichai tucuncapac.
44005032	Chaimanta ñucanchicmi ricuyac canchic, paita uyaccunaman cushca Diospac Samaipash.
44005033	Chashna rimashcata uyashpa yapa piñarishpa paicunata huañuchinata munanurca.
44005034	Ranti shuc fariseo Gamaliel shutiyuc, camachic quillcata yachac, tucui runacuna llaquishca, apucuna tantarishca ucupi shayarishpa, canchaman chai japishca runacunata llucshichishpa, rimarca:
44005035	—Israelmanta runacuna, allita atipashpa ricuichic cai runacunahuan ranca racushcata.
44005036	Mana unai can, Teudas caipi jatun runa shina ricurimushca, paimau llutarinurca chuscu patsac runacuna. Chashnapash paita huañuchinacurca, tucui paita caticcuna chausirishpa chincarinurca.
44005037	Runacunata yupacushca pachapi, Galileamanta Judas shayarirca, paita tucui runacuna catinurca; paipash chincarircami paita caticcunapash illacta chausirinurca.
44005038	Chairaicumi cai shimicunahuan cancunata cunan camachini: Cuncarichic cai runacunamanta, rinacuchunlla. Paicuha ruracushca runa yuyaimanta shamuc cashpaca, paipac munaimi chincarinca;
44005039	ranti Diosmanta shamuc cacpica, mana paita tucuchinata ushanquichichu. Yahcamantami Diosta macancapac shayarinquichic. Pai rimashcata pactachinurca.
44005040	Chashnapi Apostolcunata cayashpa, llipachishca huasha, Jesuspac shutipi ama cuti yachachincapac rimashpa, cacharinacurca
44005041	Apostolcuna tantarina ucumanta yapa cushi llucshinacurca Jesuspac shutiraicu ñacarishcamanta.
44005042	Tucui puncha yachachinurca Diospac huasipi, runa huasicunapipash Mesias Jesuspac Cushi Shimita.
44006001	Chai pachapi, Jesusta caticcuna achca mirarishcaraicu, griego shimita rimaccuna hebreo shimita rimaccunahuan piñarinacurca, paicunapac huaccha mamacuna mana allita ricui tucushcaraicu, caran puncha ricunapi.
44006002	Apostolcuna tucui yachachishcacunata tantachishpa rimanacurca: —Mana allichu yachin Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachinata chicanman saquishpa, micuna caranamanlla yuyarincapac.
44006003	Chairaicu, huauquicuna, acllaichic cancunamanta canchis alli pactachic runacunata, Diospac Samaihuan juntashcacuna, achca yachaita chariccunata, chaita paicunaman mincancapac.
44006004	Ranti ñucanchica Dios-huan rimarinapi, paipac shimi yachachinapi catishun.
44006005	Tucui chaipi tantarishca runacuna chai yuyailla canacurca; acllanurca Estebanta, yapa inishcapi puric, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca runa cashcaraicu, Felipeta, Procorota, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, Nicolastapash, Cristota inishcapi llutarishca Antioquiamanta runa carca;
44006006	Apostolcunapac naupacpi shayachinacurca, paicunaca maquicunata uma jahuapi churashpa, Diosta mañanurca.
44006007	Diospac shimi tucuicunaman pactacurca, Jerusalenpica achca yachachishcacuna mirariranurca. Rimacpica achca yaya pacricunapash inishcapi yaicunurca.
44006008	Esteban, Diospac cuyaihuan ushaihuanpash juntashca cashpa, mancharicushiyanacunata runacuna ñaupacpi rurac carca.
44006009	Quishpiracunapac tantarina huasimanta achca runacuna, Cirenemantacuna, Alejandriamantacuna, maicancuna Ciliciamanta, Asiamantacuna pactanurca Estebanhua rimaricunurca.
44006010	Ranti mana yallinata ushanurca pai yapa yalli yachashcahuan rimacpi.
44006011	Chairaicu maican runacunata umachinacurca cashna rimanuchun nishpa: "Ñucanchic uyarcanchicmi cai runa Moisesta Diostapash piñacushcata".
44006012	Chashna shimicunahuan runacunata, apucunata, Camachic quillcata yachaccunatapash piñachinacurca; cuncaimanta pactamushpa, japishpa, judio apucuna tantarishcaman pushanurca.
44006013	Chaipi llullac ricuyaccuna cashna rimanacurca: —Cai runa huiñaipac piñacunllami ñucanchipac Diospac huasimanta, Camachic quillcamantapash.
44006014	Paimanta uyarcanchicpash cai Diospac huasita ñucanchicman Moises saquishca yachaicunatapash Nazaretmanta Jesus tulachinca rashcata.
44006015	Tucui chai judio apucuna tantarinapi tiyacuccuna, Estebanman ricushpa, paipac ñahuita shuc angelpac shina ricurishcata ricunacurca.
44007001	Chashnapi pacriyayacunapac apu tapurca: —¿Chaica shutichu?
44007002	Esteban cutiparca: —Yayacuna, huauquicuna, uyahuaichic: Jatun Dios Abrahanta Mesopotamiapi ricurirca, chaira pai mana Jarranman shamushcapi.
44007003	Chaipi paita rimarea: "Canpac aillucunata, canpac allpata saquishpa ñuca ricuchinca rashca allpapi causacrinqui".
44007004	Caldeamanta llucshishpa, Jarranpi causac shamurca. Paipac yaya huañushca huasha, cai cunan causacushca allpaman Dios paita pushamurca.
44007005	Mana ima allpata curcachu; ranti chai allpata cushami nishpa shimita curca; paipacta, paipac churicunapactapash, pai mana churiyuc cashpapash, chashna rimai tucurca.
44007006	Dios cashna rimarca: "Canpac churicuna chican allpapimi causanunca, huatashca, ñacachishcami chuscu patsac huata causanunca".
44007007	Ashtahuan rimarca: "Cancunata huatashpa ñacachic runacunata ñucami taripasha. Chaimanta llucshishpa cai panpapimi ñucata yupaichahuanquichic". Chai shimi curishcata ricuchishpa ullu carata pitirina tucunurca;
44007008	chashna, paipac churi Isaac pacaricpi, Abrahan ullu carata, pitirca pusac puncha pactarishcapi; Isaac chashnallata rurarca Jacobta, Jacobpash chashnallata ñucanchic chunca ishcai rucu yayacunata.
44007009	Rucu yayacunaca, Joseta piñashpalla, Egiptoman riraccunata catunurca. Chashnapash Dios paihuan tiyacurca,
44007010	Tucui llaquicunamanta paita quishpichirca; achca yachaita paiman curca; Egiptomanta jatun apu Faraon paita yapa llaquirca, paita Egiptomanta huainaru shayachirca tucui paipac imacunamantapash.
44007011	Egiptopi Canaanpipash yaricai tiyarca, mana ushaipac yaricai pacha tucurca, chashnapi ñucanchipac yayacunaca mana imata micuipa tucunurca.
44007012	Jacob micuna Egiptopi tiyashcata yachashpa chaiman ñucanchic yayacunata cacharca.
44007013	Ña ishcai cuti rishcapi, huauquicunata Jose pai cashcata rimarca, chashna Faraon ricsirca maican llactamanta Jose cashcata.
44007014	Jose paipac yaya Jacobta cayachirca, tucui paipac aillucunatapash, paicuna canurcami canchis chunca pichca runa.
44007015	Jacob Egiptoman rirca, chaipi huañurca, ñucanchic yayacunapash.
44007016	Siquenman apashcacuna, Abrahan paipac cullquihuan Hamorpac churicunata rantishca aya jutcupi panpai tucunurca.
44007017	Dios Abrahanta rimashca shimi pactarincapac mayanyacushcapi, achca mirashpa Egiptopi juntarinurca.
44007018	Chashnapi shuc jatun apu Egiptopi shayarirca, pai mana yacharca Josemanta.
44007019	Chai apu, mana allicunata ñucanchic aillucunata rurashpa, ñucanchic rucucunata paicunapac mushu pacarishca huahuacunata ama causanuchun nishpa jichuchirca.
44007020	Cai pachapi Moises pacarirca, Diospac ñaupacpi alli carca. Quimsa quilla yayapac huasipi causarca,
44007021	pai jichui tucushcapi, Faraonpac ushushi japishpa quiquin churita shina huiñachichirca.
44007022	Chairaicu Moises egipciocunapac tucui yachaicuanta japirca.
44007023	Alli camachic carca, llancanapipash yapa alli. Pai chuscu chunca huata pactachishcapi paipac aillu Israel runacunata ricunayarca.
44007024	Shuc runa macai tucucushcata ricushpa, paita quishpichicrirca, chai jahuapi chai egipciota huañuchishpalla yuyaita japirca.
44007025	Paica yuyarcami paipac aillucuna atipanuncami Dios paicunapac quishpina paipac maquipi churashcata, ranti paicuna mana atipanacurcachu.
44007026	Cayantiman paicunapacman pactashcapi macariranurca, pai macarinata saquichinayashpa rimarca: "Cancunaca huauquipurami canquichic, ¿allichu ishcantipuramanta nanarincapac?".
44007027	Chashna rimashcata uyashpa, chai mashita macacuc runa paita piñashpa rimarca:
44007028	"¿Canchu ñucanchicta amu shina taripancapac shayaunqui? ¿Egipciota cainan huañuchishca shinallatachu ñucatapash huañuchinayahuanqui?".
44007029	Chashna rimashcata uyashpa Moises miticushpa Madian allpaman, chican runa shina causacrirca, chaipi ishcai huahuata charirca.
44007030	Chuscu chunca huata huasha, pai Sinai urcu, chunlla allpapi cashcapi, shuc angel casha yura rupacushcapi ricuric shamurca.
44007031	Moises mancharicushiyarca ricuricushcata ricushpa. Pai allita ricusha nishpa mayanyashcapi Apunchicpac shimita uyarca:
44007032	"Ñucami canpac yayacunapac Dios cani, Abrahanpac Dios, Isaacpac, Jacobpac". Moises yapalla manchaita charishpa ricuncapacllapash mana munarca.
44007033	Ranti Apunchica paita rimarca: "Ushutata surcuri, cai panpaca Dios acllashca allpa mari can".
44007034	Nucapac runacuna cai Egiptopi ñacarishcata ricushcanimi, paicuna huacashcata uyashcanimi, uraicurcanimi paicunata quishpichincapac. Cunaca caiman shamui, Egiptomanmi canta cachanca rani".
44007035	Cai Moisesta, paicuna cashna piñashpa callpachishcata: "¿Canchu ñucanchicta amu shina taripancapac shayarinqui?", Dios cachamurca amuta rurashpa, qiushpichicta shayachishpa, casha yurapi ricurishca angel yanapashcahuan.
44007036	Paimi paicunata llucshichirca, Egiptopi mancharicushiyanacunata nirashpa, Puca ñucñu yacupi, chuscu chunca huata chunlla allpapipash.
44007037	Cai Moisesllatacmi israelitacunata rimarca: "Diosmi cancuna huauqui ucumanta ñuca shina shuc runata cancunaman cunca".
44007038	Paillatacmi, chunlla allpapi tantanacuipi, angel Sunaipi rimashcata ranti, paica ñucanchic yayacunaman rimacurca; paimi causai shimicunata japishpa cancunaman ricsichirca.
44007039	Paitami ñucanchicpac yayacuna mana uyanata munanurca; Egiptoman ticranata munanurca,
44007040	Aaronta cashna rimashpa: Huacacunata rurashpa shayachi, paicuna ñanpita ricuchinuchun, chai Egiptomanta ñucanchicta llucshichic Moisesmanta mana yachanchicchu ima tucushcata".
44007041	Chashnapi shuc malta huacrata ruranurca paipac ñaupacpi camaricunata churashpa raiminurca paicuna rurashca huacra ñaupacllapita.
44007042	Dios paicunamanta chicanyarca, sacracunata catinuchunlla nishpa saquirca, Profeta pancacunapi nishca shina: "Israel runacuna, ¿chuscu chunca huata chunlla allpapi causashpa camarita ricuchihuarcanquichichu?
44007043	Mana, ashtahuan aparcanquichicmi Molocpac tanputa, cancunapac huaca Refanpac cuillurtapash, cancunalla chacchancapac rurashca huacacuna; chairaicu cancunata Babilonia huashaman callpachishami".
44007044	Chunlla allpapi ñucanchicpac rucu yayacuna curishca shimita ricuchic tanputa charinacurca; Dios Moisesta pai ricushca shinata rurachun nishca,
44007045	huasha japic ñucanchicpac rucu yayacuna, Josue apu cashcapi Diosta mana ricsiccunapac allpata quichushcapi, chaiman yaicuchinurca, Dios paicunapac ñaupacpi callpachiscapi. Chaita huacaichishpa David tiyashca punchacama charinacurca,
44007046	pai Diospac ñaupacpi yapa alli carca, paita mañarca Jacobpac Diospacta shuc huasita rurachihuai nishpa.
44007047	Chashnapash, Salomon chai Diospac huasita shayachishpa tucuchirca.
44007048	Ranti alli rimacpi, Jatun Diosca mana runa rurashca huasipichu causan, profeta rimashca shina:
44007049	"Jahua pacha ñucapac tiyarinami, allpaca ñuca chaquicuna samana. ¿Ima huasitashi ñucapacta ruranquichic? riman Apunchic. ¿Maipishi ñuca samanata ruranquichic?
44007050	¿Manachu ñucallatac tucui caicunata rurarcani?".
44007051	Ranti cancunaca, sinchi umata charishpa, cancunapac shuncuta rumiyachircanquichic, rinrita quillparcanquichic; huiñaipac cancuna Diospac Samaita chasquinata mana munanquichic, cancunapac yayacuna shinallata.
44007052	¿Tiyarcachu ima chari profetacunamanta shucllapash, cancunapac yayacunapacpi mana chicni tucuc? Paicuna huañuchinurca Alli Runa shamunca rashcamanta rimaccunata; paitami cunan cancuna catushpa huañuchishcanquichic;
44007053	cancuna Camachic Quillcata angelcunamanta chasquishpapash mana pactachircanquichic.
44007054	Chasna rimashcata uyashpa yapa paicunapac ucupi paihuan piñarinacurca, quirupash uyaricta.
44007055	Esteban, Diospac Samaihuan juntarishpa ñahuita jahuaman jatachishpa, Dios jatunyashcata ricurca, paipac yachac maquiman Jesus shayacushcatapash ricurca; chaipi rimarca:
44007056	—Jahua pacha pascarishcatami ricuni, chaipi chai Runa Diospac yachac maquiman shayan.
44007057	Ranti paicunaca sinchita caparishpa, rinricunata quillparinacurca, chai huasha tucui paimanlla urmanacurca; llacta canchaman tancashpa chaipi rumihuan shitancapac nishpa,
44007058	juchachiccuna, shuc malta runa Saulo shutiyucpac chaquipi jahua churanacunata saquishpa, Estebanta rumihuan shitancapac callarinurca.
44007059	Paicuna rumihuan shitacushcapi, Esteban cashna Diosman caparirca: —Apunchic Jesus, ñuca causaita chasquipai.
44007060	Chai huasha cuncurishpa, sinchi shimihuan rimarca: —Apunchic, cai juchamanta paicunata quishpichi. Chaita rimashca huasha huauurca.
44008001	Saulo chashna huañuchishcata ricushpa cushiyashcahuan ricurca. Jerusalenpi tiyac iniccunata mana ushaipac piñashpa chai punchamanta japincapac callarinacurca. Tucuilla Samariaman, Judeaman chausirishpa rinacurca, ranti Apostolcunamana.
44008002	Shuc alli shuncuyuc runacuna Estebanta panpanacurca, paimanta huacanacurcapash.
44008003	Cuti Saulo iniccunata piñashpa caticurca, huasicunapi yaicushpa caricuna huarmicuna imapash japishpa chunta curralman apacurca.
44008004	Miticushpa chausirishcacuna, paicuna pactashcapi Diospac Cushi Shimita ricsichishpa purinurca.
44008005	Samaria llactaman Felipe pactashpa Mesiasmanta rimancapac callarirca.
44008006	Felipe rimashcata tucui runacuna yapa allihuan chasquinacurca. Paita uyancapac, pai mancharicushiyanacunata rashcata ricuncapac pactaccuna carca;
44008007	achca supai, japishca, runacunamantami supaicuna caparishpa llucshiccuna carpa, chashnallata. achca suchu, janca runacuna janpirishca saquirinacurca,
44008008	chashnamanta achca cushiyai tiyarca chai llactapi.
44008009	Ña unaimanta causacurca chai llactapi shuc runa Simon shutiyuc, pai yachac runa carca. Samariamanta runacuna mancharishca canurca pai rurashcacunata ricushpa, chairaicu jatunmi cani pai yuyac carca.
44008010	Tucuilla, huahuacuna rucucunapash, paillapi yuyaita churashca canurca, paimanta rimaccuna carca: "Caitami Diospac jatun ushai rimanun".
44008011	Paita uyaccuna carca, unaimanta paipac sacra yachaicunahuan umachishpa causashcaraicu;
44008012	ranti Felipe Diospac Pachamanta Cushi Shimita, Jesucristo Mesiasmanta rimacpi inishpa, caricuna huarmicunantin bautisai tucuncapac callarinacurca.
44008013	Simonpash inircami, bautisai tucushca huasha mana chicanyarcachu Felipemanta: mancharicushiyashca carca Felipe rurashcacunata ricushpa.
44008014	Jerusalenpi tiyac Apostolcuna, Samariamantacunapash Diospac Cushi Shimita chasquishcata yachashpa, Pedrota Juantin chaiman cachanurca.
44008015	Paicuna Samariaman pactashpa Dios-huan rimarinacurca chaimanta runacunapash Diospac Samaita chasquinuchun nishpa;
44008016	paicunamanta mana pimanpash uraicushca mari carca, chaira Apunchic Jesuspac shutillapimi bautisashca canurca.
44008017	Apostolcuna maquita umapi churacpi iniccuna Diospac Samaita chasquinacurca.
44008018	Apostolcuna maquita churashpa Diospac Samaita chinpachishcata ricushpa, Simon cullquita ricuchishpa,
44008019	paicunata rimarca: —Cai ushaita ñucatapash cuhuaichic, ñucapash maicanpipash maquita churacpi pai Diospac Samaita japichun.
44008020	Pedro paita cutiparca: —Anchuri caimanta canpac cullquintin, Dios cuyashcata cullquihuanmi rantina can yuyashcaraicu.
44008021	Cai ushaica mana canpacchu can, mana atipanquichu Dios rurashcacunata.
44008022	Chairaicu, cai canpac mana allimanta nanari, Apunchicta mañai can pantashcacunamanta quishpichichun,
44008023	canpac ucupi jayaclla juntarishcami canqui, mana allicunapipash huatashcami causacunqui.
44008024	Simon cutiparca: —Ñucaraicu Apunchicta mañapaichic, cai pinashpa rimashca shimicuna ama japihuanuchun.
44008025	Pedro Juantin Apunchicpac Shimita camachishca huasha Jerusalenman ticranurca, Diospac Cushi Shimita Samaria llactacunapi yachachishpa.
44008026	Apunchicpac angel Felipeta cashna nishpa rimarca: —Chaupi puncha tucushcapi ri Jerusalenmanta Gazaman, chunlla allpata rina ñanpiman.
44008027	Paica rirca, chashnapi tarirca shuc Etiopiamanta runata, Etiopiamanta Ñusta Candacespacpi llancac runa, cullquita huacaichic runa. Jerusalenman shamushcarca Diosta chacchancapac,
44008028	cuti ticracushpa paipac carroza nishcapi tiyarishpa ricucurca Profeta Isaias quillcashcata.
44008029	Diospac Samai Felipeta rimarca: —Mayanyashpa chaiman llutari.
44008030	Felipe callpashpa mayanyarca, chaipi uyarca Profeta Isaias quillcashcata ricushpa caticushcata, paita tapurca: —¿Quillcashcata atipanquichu?
44008031	Pai cutiparca: —Mana pipash yachachihuacpi mana atipaipacchu tucuni. Chasna, Felipeta sicachishpa paipac mayanpi tiyachirca.
44008032	Cai quillcatami ricushpa caticurca: "Shuc cordero shina huañuchinaman pushai tucurca; shuc oveja shina chunlla paipac acchata piticucpac naupacpi, chashna pai mana shimita pascarcachu.
44008033	Paita millanurca, tucuita paita quichunurca; paita caticcunata pillapash yupanata ushancachu. Causaccunapac allpamanta paita ishcunacurca".
44008034	Etiopiamanta runa Felipeta tapurca: —Ayalla, ¿Profeta pimanta caipi rimashcata riman? ¿Paimantallatachu, shucmantachu rimacun, imata?
44008035	Chashnapi Felipe, chai quillcapi churashcallahuanta, Jesuspac Cushi Shimita ricsichirca.
44008036	Ñanpita rirashcapi, yacu tiyashcaman pactanurca, chaipi chai runa rimarca: —Ricui, chaipi yacu tiyan. ¿Allichu canman can bautisahuacpi?
44008037	Felipe paita rimarca: —Can tucui shuncuhuan inicpi usharincami. Pai cutiparca: —Jesucristo Diospac Churi cashcata ininimi.
44008038	Chaipi paipac carrozata shayachishpa, ishcantin yacuman rinacurca. Felipe chaipipaita bautisarca.
44008039	Paicuna yacumanta llucshisheapi, Diospac Samai Felipeta shuc cachai anchuchirca; chaishucca mana cuti ricurcachu, pai rirashcaman yapa cushihuan rirca.
44008040	Felipe Azotopi cashcarca, chaimanta Cesareaman pactanacama Diospac Cushi Shimita llactacunapi yachachishpa rirca.
44009001	Saulo chaira Apunchicpac yachachishcacunata huañuchina yuyaihuan, pacri yayacunapac apupacman rishpa
44009002	Damascomanta tantarina huasipac apucunapacta quillcata mañarca, chai ininata catic cari huarmi imapash japishpa Jerusalenman apamunata ushancapac.
44009003	Pai rirashcapi, ña Damascoman pactana mayanpi, cuncaimanta shuc jahua pachamanta achic pai cashcapi llinpiarca.
44009004	Allpaman urmarca, chaipi cashna rimashca shimita uyarca: —Saulo, Saulo, ¿imaraicumi piñashpa catihuanqui?
44009005	Paica tapurca: —¿Canca pimi canqui, Apunchic? Chai shimi paita cutiparca: —Ñucami can piñashpa japinayashca Jesus cani;
44009006	jatari, ri llactaman, chaipimi can rurana cashcata rimarinca.
44009007	Paipac mashicuna mancharishca shayarinurca, rimashcata uyashpapash mana ricushcaraicu.
44009008	Saulo allpamanta jatarirca, ñahuicunata pascara charishpapash mana imatapash ricuna usharcachu. Maquimanta japishpa Damascoman pushanurca.
44009009	Ñausa carca, quimsa puncha mana imatapash micushpa, mana upiashpa causarca.
44009010	Damascopi shuc yachachishca Ananias shutiyuc runa causac carca. Apunchic, nuspaipi, paita cayarca: —Ananias. Pai cutiparca: —Caipimi cani, Apunchic.
44009011	Apunchicca paita caita rimarca: —Cuscaman ri, Judas huasiman. Chaipi Tarsomanta Saulo shutiyuc runamanta tapui, pai Dios-huan rimaricun.
44009012	Cunanshitu cai nuspaita charishca: Shuc runashi Ananias shutiyuc yaicushpa, paipac maquita umapi churan, pai ñausayashcata janpincapac nishpa.
44009013	Ananias ranti paita cutiparca: —Apunchic, achca shimimanta uyashcani chai runamanta, pai imashna Dios iniccunata Jerusalenpi yapa ñacachiscata;
44009014	caipica yaya pacricunapac apucunamanta ushaita apamushca, tucui canpa shutita rimaccunata japishpa quillpancapac.
44009015	Apunchic paita cutiparca: —Rilla, cai runa yapa yanapanca rahuan, ñuca shutita ricsichincami Diosta mana ricsiccunata, Israel runacunatapash.
44009016	Ñuca ricsichinca rani tucui pai uacarincapac rashcata, ñuca shutiraicu.
44009017	Ananias rirca, huasipi yaicurca, maquicunata paipac jahuapi churashpa paita nirca: —Huauqui Saulo, canman cachamuhuashcami Apunchic Jesus, can shamucushca ñanpipi ricuricllata, can cuti ricuc ushancapac, Diospac Samaihuanpash juntashca saquirincapac.
44009018	Chaillapita paipac ñahuimanta challua cara shina tallirinurca; ñahuita chushacchishpa, ricuna usharca. Jatarishpa bautisai tucurca;
44009019	huasha, micushpa, sinchicuipash paiman shamurca. Damascomanta yachachishcacunahuan Saulo ansata tiyarca,
44009020	manapash unaipi chaimanta tantarina huasicunapi Jesus Diospac Churi cashcata yachachincapac callarirca.
44009021	Paita uyaccuna tucuilla mancharicushiyashca saquirinacurca, cashna rimanacushpa: —Cai mari Jerusalenpi chai shutita rimaccunata piñashca japic can, ¿manachu? Caimanpash paicunata japishpa pacri yayacunapac apucunapac ñaupacman pushancapac shamuc mari can, ¿manachu?
44009022	Ranti Pablo, sinchi tucushpa, Damascomanta judiocunata pantachichirca, Jesus Dios cachamushca cashcata ricsichishcahuan.
44009023	Unaiman, judiocuna huañuchincapac rimanurca.
44009024	Pablo yacharca paicuna ruranca rashcata. Paicuna tuta punchantin llacta puncupi huañuchincapac ricucushcaraicu,
44009025	shuc tuta pai yachachishcata caticcuna, shuc ashancapi churashpa, huascahuan quincha huashaman uraicuchinurca.
44009026	Jerusalenmai pactashcapi, yachachishcacunahuan llutarinata munarca; chashnapash tucuilla manchanurca pai yachachishca jinu cashcata mana yachashpa.
44009027	Chashnapi Bernabe japishpa Apostolcunapacman pusharca ricsichincapac. Saulo paicunaman rimarca ima shina pai Apunchicta ñanpipi ricushcata, paita rimashcata, pai Damascopi tucui runacunapac ñaupacpi Jesusmanta yachachishcatapash rimarca.
44009028	Saulo paicunahuan pai munashcaman puric carca, Apunchicmata tucuipac ñaupacpi yachachishpa.
44009029	Pai rimarirca piñanacurcapash griego shimita rimac judiocunahuan, paicunaca paita huañuchinata yuyarinurca;
44009030	paipac huauquicuna chaita yachashpa, Cesareaman pushanurca, chaimanta Tarsoman cachanurca.
44009031	Chai pachapi, iniccuna mana pipash quillachishca causaranurca tucui Judeapi, Galileapi, Samariapipash, Apunchicta catinapi sinchiyashpa, jatunyashpa, yaparishpa riranurca Diospac Samai cariyachishcahuan.
44009032	Pedro tucui chai suyucunata ricushpa puricurca, chashnapi uraicurcami Lidapi tiyac iniccunata ricuncapac.
44009033	Chaipi tarirca shuc Eneas shutiyuc runata; pai suchu cashpa, ña pusac huata sirishcamanta mana jatarinata usharcachu.
44009034	Pedro paita rimarca: —Eneas, Mesias Jesus canta alliyachin; jatari, canpac puñunata allichi.
44009035	Chaillapita jatarirca. Lidamanta, Saron panpamanta tucui runacuna ricunurca, paicuna Apunchicta ininurca.
44009036	Jafapi shuc yachachishca Tabita shutiyuc tiyarca, chai Ushpita rimanayan, pai yapa alli shuncuyuc huarmi carca.
44009037	Chai punchacuna uncurirca, huanurca. Maillashca huasha jahuapi tiyac patapi paipac ayata churanurca.
44009038	Lidamanta Jafaman mayanlla can; yachachishcacuna Pedro chaipi cashcatayachashpa, ishcai runata cachanurca Jafaman utcalla shamuchun rimashcahuan.
44009039	Pedro paicunahuan rirca. Pai pactashcallapi jahua pataman sicachinurca; chaipi huaccha huarmicuna huacashpa ricuchiranurca Tabita causashcapi rurashca churanacunata.
44009040	Pedro tucuicunata canchaman llucshichirca; cuncurishpa Dios-huan rimarirca; huasha ayaman ricushpa rimarca: —Jatari Tabita
44009041	Pai ñahuita pascarca, Pedrota ricushpa tiyarirca. Pedro maquimanta japishpa jataichirca. Iniccunata huacchacunantin cayashpa, causacta paicunaman ricuchirca.
44009042	Jafapi tiyac runacuna tucui yachanurca, achcacuna Apunchicta ininurca.
44009043	Pedro unaita Jafapi saquirirca, shuc huihua carata allichic Simon shutiyuc runapac huasipi.
44010001	Cesarea llactapi Cornelio shutiyuc runa causac carca, pai chaipi tiyac soldadocunapac capitan carca.
44010002	Alli shuncuyuc runa carca, pai tucui paipac ailluhuan Diosta manchashpa causac runa carca. Runacunaman achca diosmantata cuc carca, Dioshuan rimarinata mana saquicchu carca.
44010003	Chishi mayanma shuc nuspaita charirca: Allipacha Diospac angelta ricurca paipac quinchara ucupi yaicushpa paita cayacushcata: —Cornelio.
44010004	Pai allipacha ricushpa saquirirca, manchashcahuan paita tapurca: —¿Ñucatachu mashcahuanqui, Apunchic? Angel cutiparca: —Can Dios-huan rimarishca, canpac diosmantacuna Diospac naupacpi alli ricurinushca.
44010005	Cunan pitapash Jafaman cachai Simon Pedro shutiyuc runata mashcachun,
44010006	ñucñu yacu patapi tiyac huacra carata allichic Simonpac huasipimi tiyacun.
44010007	Angel chincarishca huasha, ishcai runata shuc alli shuncuyuc soldadota cayarca;
44010008	tucuita rimashca huasha Jafaman paicunata cacharca.
44010009	Cayantiman, chaupi puncha tucushcapi, paicuna llacta mayanpi rirashcapi, Pedro huasi jahuaman Dios-huan rimarincapac sicarca.
44010010	Yarcachicpi micunayarca, paipac micunata yanunacama paica shuc nuspaita charirca:
44010011	Jahua pacha pascarishcata ricurca, chaipi shuc imachari, shuc jatun llachapa shina jahua pachamanta uraicucucta ricurca; paipac chuscu chaquishitucunaca allpapi tacariranurca.
44010012	Chai ucupi tucui sacha huihuacuna, machacuicuna, pishcucunapash tiyanurca.
44010013	Shuc shimi paita rimarca: —Pedro, jatari; huañuchishpa micui.
44010014	Pedro rimarca: —Chaitaca yuyarincapacllapash mana allichu, Apunchic, maican punchapash can mana munashca, huacllichicta mana micushcanichu.
44010015	Cutipash chai shimi paita rimarca: —Dios "allimi" rimashcata, canca ama huacllichicmi can rimaichu.
44010016	Quimsa cutimi chashna rimai tiyarca, chai huasha chai ricuricuc jahua pachaman apai tucurca.
44010017	Pedro mana yacharcachu chai nuspai yachachinayashcata. Ranti chai pachallapita, Cornelio cachamushca runacuna, Simonpac huasita mashcashpa puricuccuna, huasi puncupi pactamunacurca.
44010018	Cayashpa tapunacurca Simon paicuna Pedro shutichishca, chai huasipichu causan nishpa.
44010019	Pedro chaira yuyaricurca pai nuspashcamanta, chashnapi Diospac Samai paita rimarca: —Shuc runacunami canta mashcaranun;
44010020	uraicui, paicunahuan rilla, ñucami paicunata cachamurcani.
44010021	Pedro paicunapacman uraicushpa rimarca: —Ñucami cancuna mashcacushca runa cani. ¿Imatapash mutsushpami shamunquichic?
44010022	Paicuna cutipanurca: —Alli shuncuyuc, Diosta manchashpa causac, tucui judiocuna llaquishca capitan Corneliomi, shuc angelmanta canta paipac huasiman cayachina shimita chasquishca, can rimashcatami pai uyanayan.
44010023	Pedro huasiman cayashpa paicunata puñuchirca. Cayanti puncha paicunahuan rirca, paihuan rinurcapash Jafamanta maican huauquicuna.
44010024	Cayantiman Cesareaman pactarca. Cornelio paicunata chapacurcami, cayashcarcapash paipac aillucunata, paipac quiquin mashicunatapash.
44010025	Pedro yaicushcapi, Cornelio paita tarincapac llucshirca, chaillapita paipac chaqui mayanpi cuncurirca;
44010026	ranti Pedro cashna rimashpa jatachirca: —Jatari, ñucapash runallatami cani.
44010027	Huasiman paihuan rimarishpa yaicurca, achca runa tantarishcata tarishpa rimarca:
44010028	—Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina shuc judiota pai inishcamanta mana ushan chican runacunahuan llutarincapac, paipac huasipi yaicuncapac; chashnapash, ñucata Dios yachachihuashcami ama huacllishca maican runatapash rimancapac.
44010029	Chairaicu, can cayancapac cachashcapi, shamurcanillami. Cunan yachanata munanimi imashnamanta cayachihuashcata.
44010030	Cornelio cutiparca: —Na chuscu puncha tucun, cashna pachallapita ñucapac huasipi chishi mayanta Dios-huan rimaricurcaru, chaipi shuc sumac churarishca runa ricurihuarca, pai rimahuarcami:
44010031	—"Cornelio, can Dios-huan rimarishca, canpac diosmantacuna Diospac ñaupacpi alli ricurinushca.
44010032	Pitapash Jafaman cachai Simon Pedro shutiyuc runata cayachun, ñucñu yacu patapi causac huacra carata allichic Simonpac huasipimi tiyacun". Utcalla canman shimita cacharcani, canca shamupashcanqui.
44010033	Cunaca, tucuilla caipi Diospac ñaupacpi canchic, can Apunchicraicu nucanchicmanrimashcata uyancapac.
44010034	Chashnapi Pedro rimarca: —Cunanmi alli shutipacha ricsini Dios mana pitapash mana chicanyachishpa ricushcata,
44010035	paica chasquin paihuan puricta, alli cusca pactachicta, maimanta runa cacpipash.
44010036	Pai Israelpac churicunata paipac shimita rimarca, Dios cachamushca ganas causaita Jesusraicu pactamuna cashcata uyachishpa, pai tucuipac Apunchic can.
44010037	Cancuna allita yachanquichic judiocunapac llactapi tucushcata, Galileamanta callarishpa, Juan bautismomanta camachishca huasha:
44010038	Ima shina Dios Nazaretmanta Jesusta paipac Samaita curca, paipac ushaita ricsichishpa, pai allita rurashpa purirca, supai japishca runacunamanta supaita anchuchishpa, Dios paihuan cashcaraicu chaita rurarca.
44010039	Ñucanchic ricuyac canchic tucui pai judiocunapac llactacunapi Jerusalenpipash rurashcamanta. Huasha paita huañuchinacurca shuc caspimanta huarcuchishpa.
44010040	Chashnapash quimsa puncha huasha huañushcacunamanta Dios paita causachirca, pai munashcamanta ricui tucurca,
44010041	mana tucuicunapacpi, Dios unaimanta acllashca ricuyaccunapacllapi, ñucanchicmi canchic, paihuan micushcanchic, upiashcanchic pai huañushcacunamanta causarimushca huasha.
44010042	Paimi ñucanchicta cacharca runacunata camachincapac, pai causaccunapac, huañushcacunapac taripac Diospacpi shayachi tucushcata ricsichincapac.
44010043	Tucui Profetacuna paimanta rimanun: tucui paita iniccuna paipac shutiraicu juchacunamanta quishpina cashcata.
44010044	Chaira Pedro rimacushcapi, Diospac Samai tucui chaipi uyacuccunapacpi shamurca.
44010045	Pedrohuan shamuc Judeamanta inic runacuna mancharinacurca: —¡Ima shina Dios paipac Samaita mana judiocunatapash cuyashcaraicumanta!
44010046	Caica allipacha shutimi carca: chican shimipi rimaranurca, Diosta chaccharanurca.
44010047	Chashnapi Pedro rimarca: —¿Cristopac bautismota mitsarincachu cai ñucanchic shinallata Diospac Samaita chasquic runacunata?
44010048	Jesus Mesiaspac bautismota paicunata chasquichirca. Chai huasha, paicunahuan shuc punchacunallapash saquirincapac rimanurca.
44011001	Apostolcuna Judeamanta huauquicunantin yachanacushcarca, ima shina mana judiocunapash Diospac Shimita japishcata.
44011002	Pedro Jerusalenman rishcapi, judio yachaita catic iniccuna paita cashna rimancapac callarinacurca:
44011003	—Mana iniccunapac huasipi yaicushcanqui, paicunahuanpash micushcanqui.
44011004	Chashnapi Pedro tucui pai rurashcacunata paicunaman rimarca:
44011005	—Dios-huan rimaricurcani Jafa llactapi; chaipi shuc nuspaita charircani: Shuc imachari uraicucurca, shuc jatun llachapa shina ricuric jahua pachamanta uraicucurca ñuca tiyashcacama; chaipi shayarirca paipac chuscu chaquishi tucunahuan.
44011006	Allipacha chaiman ricurcani, chaipi tiyarcami chuscu chaquiyuc sacha huihuacuna, millai huihuacuna, allpata llucarishpa puriccuna, huairata puric pishcucunatapash.
44011007	Shuc shimitapash uyarcani: "Pedro, huañuchi, micui".
44011008	Ñuca cutiparcani: "Manapacha, yuyarincapallash mana allichu chaica, ñuca shimiman mana maican puncha can mana munashca, huacllichic mana yaicushcachu".
44011009	Chai shimi cutillata rimahuarca: "Dios 'allimi' rimashcata, canca ama mana allichu nishpa rimaichu".
44011010	Chaica quimsa cuti chashna tucurca, chai huasha jahua pachaman aisashpa sicachinurca.
44011011	Chai pachapi ñucanchic tiyashca huasipi Cesareamanta cachamushca quimsa runacuna pactacrinurca ñucata mashcashpa.
44011012	Diospac Samai rimahuarca paicunahuan richunlla nishpa. Cai sucta huauquicuna ñucahuan canurca, huasha chai runapac huasiman yaicurcanchic.
44011013	Pai ñucanchicman rimarca ima shina pai shuc angelta ricurca paipac huasipi pactacpi, chai angel rimashcarca: "Jafaman shimita cachai Simon Pedrota cayashpa;
44011014	pai rimashcamanta canman canpac aillucunantin quishpina pactamunca".
44011015	Ñuca paicunaman rimancapac callarishcapi, chaillapi Diospac Samai paicunapac jahuapi uraicurca, ñucanchipac jahuapi ñaupac uraicushca shina.
44011016	Chaipi yuyarircani Apunchic rimashca shimicunata pai rimashcapi: "Juan yacuhuan bautisarca, ranti cancunaca Diospac Samaihuanmi bautisai tucun-quichic".
44011017	Paicuna Apunchic Jesucristopi inishcaraicu Dios cuyashcata cushca hucanchicman shinallata, ¿ñucaca ushaimanchu carcani pai munashcata 'mana' rimancapac?
44011018	Chashna rimashpata uyashpa ña mana imatapash rimanacurca, Diosta chacchanurca cashna rimashpa: —Mana iniccunatapash Dios cuti paipacman shuncuta shayachina yuyaita cushcami causaiman yaicuna ushancapac.
44011019	Piñashpa catic tucushcamanta, Esteban huañuchi tucushcapi chausiriccuna pactanurca Feniciacama, Chipre, Antioquiacama, judiocunallata Diospac Shimita camachishpa.
44011020	Chashnapash, tiyarcami paicunamanta maicancuna Chipremanta, Cirenemantapash, paicunaca Antioquiaman pactashpa griegocunatapash camachinacurca Apunchic Jesuspac Cushi Shimita rimashpa.
44011021	Apunchic paicunahuan cashcaraicu, achcacuna ininacurca Diosman shuncuta shayachishpa.
44011022	Chashna tucushcamanta Jerusalenpi tiyac iniccunaman pactarca, chairaicu Bernabeta Antioquiaman cachanurca.
44011023	Pactashcapi Dios cuyashcata ricushpa, yapa cushiyarca, paicunata rimarcapash tucuilla huancurishpa Apunchihuan catincapac;
44011024	pai alli runa, Diospac Samaihuan juntarishca, inishcapipash sinchi catic cashcaraicu, achca runacuna Apunchicta ricsinacurca.
44011025	Chashnapi Bernabe Tarsoman rirca Saulo mashcancapac.
44011026	Tarishpa Antioquiaman paita pusharca. Shuc huata chai iniccuna llactapi ishcantin causanurca, achca runacunata yachachishpa; Antioquiapimi yahachishcacuna 'cristianocuna' rimai tucuncapac callarinurca.
44011027	Chai punchacuna Jerusalenmanta Profetacuna uraicunacurca.
44011028	Paicunamanta shuc, Agabo shutiyuc, Diospac Samai paita ricsichishcaraicu, jatun yaricai tucui pachaman shamunca rashcata huillarca. (Claudio Jatun Apu cashcapi chai yaricai tiyarca).
44011029	Yachachishcacuna caran amu ushashca tuputa yanapancapac rimanacurca Judea llactacunapi causac huauquicunata.
44011030	Chashna ruranacurca; Pablohuan Bernabehuan tantachishca cullquita cachanacurca.
44012001	Jatun Apu Herodes iniccunamanta maican runacunata ñacachincapac yuyarirca.
44012002	Mircanuhuan Santiagota huañuchichirca, pai Juanpac huauqui carca;
44012003	judiocuna chashna rashcata allihuan ricunucpi Pedrotapash japichirca. Pascua punchacuna carca.
44012004	Japichishca huasha, chunta curralpi quillpachirca, paita ricuncapac churarca chunca sucta soldadota, caranpi chuscu chuscu shayachishpa. Pai yuyarcami Pascua huasha Pedrota tucui runacunapac ñaupacpi surcushpa ricuchincapac.
44012005	Chashna Pedro chunta curralpi ricui tucunacama, iniccuna sinchita Dios-huan pairaicu rimarinacurca.
44012006	Herodes chashna tucui runacunapac ñaupacpi shayachishpa ricuchincapac racurca; chai tuta, Pedro ishcai soldado ucupi puñucurca, ishcai jillai huascahuan huatashca, paita ricuncapac mincashcacuna chunta curral puncupipash tiyanurca.
44012007	Cuncaimanta, Apunchicpac angel ricurirca, tucui chunta curral punchaclla tucurca. Maquihuan tintillu panpapi huactashpa Pedrota causachishpa, nirca: —Utcalla jatari. Chashnapi jillai huascacuna maquimanta urmanurca,
44012008	cutipash paita angel rimarca: —Chunpita huatari, ushutatapash churari. Chashna rurarca pai; angel cuti paita rimarca: —Jahua churarinata churarishpa catihuai.
44012009	Paipac huashalla Pedro llucshirca. Pai mana yacharcachu chai angel ruracushca shuti cashca imapash, shuc nuspai shina paita yachirca.
44012010	Paita ricuccamacunata ishcaipi saquishpa rinurca; chashna jillaimanta rurashca puncuman pactanurca; chai puncu cancha llucshina cashpa, paipac munai pascarirca. Llucshinurca; puricushcapi cuncaimanta chai angel paipac mayanmanta chincarirca.
44012011	Pedro allipacha yuyaita japishpa rimarca: —Ayalla, shutimi cashca: Apunchicmi paipac angelta cachamushca Herodespac maquimanta llushpichihuancapac, judiocuna ñucata ruranca rashcamanta quishpichihuancapac.
44012012	Pai ña allita yuyaita japishcapi, Juan Marcospac mama Mariapac huasiman rirca, chaipi achcacuna tantarinacushcarca Dios-huan rimarincapac.
44012013	Puncupi tacacrirca, shuc cuitsa: Rosa shutiyuc, pimi canca nishpa ricucrirca;
44012014	Pedropac shimita ricsishpa, yapalla cushiyashpa, pascana rantimanta, ucuman callpashpa, Pedromi puncupi can nishpa rimarca.
44012015	Paicuna cutipanurca: —¿Ima, nuspachu canqui? Paica, shuti chaipimi, nishpa rimarca. Chaishuccunaca rimanurca: —¿Paipac angelmi canca?
44012016	Pedro chaicama cayacurcami. Paicuna pascashcapi, paita jinu ricunurca, rimai paicunata mana tiyarcachu.
44012017	Maquihuan ricuchishpa chunlla tucuncapac rimarca; chaipi paicunata rimarca ima shina Apunchic chunta curralmanta paita surcushcata. Paicunata rimarcapash: —Caita Santiagoman, chaishuc huauquicunamanpash rimaichic. Chai huasha llucshishpa chaimanta shucman rirca,
44012018	Punchayashcapi yapa tulupui tiyarca soldado ucupi, Pedro imata tucushcanca nishpa tapuriranurca.
44012019	Herodes mashcachirca, chashnapash mana tuparcachu, chairaicu huacaichicamacunata tapuchishca huasha, paicunata huañuchichirca. Chai huasha Pedro Judeamanta Cesareaman rirca; chaipi saquirirca.
44012020	Chai pachapi Herodes piñarishca carca Tiro, Sidon, iscantin llactamanta runacunahuan. Paicuna, allita rimarishca huasha, paipac ñaupacman pactanurca; ñaupac Biastohuan alli mashi tucunurca, pai chai Jatun Apupac cullquita huacaichic runa carca; paicuna mañanurca ganas causaita paicunapura charincapac, tucui chai runacuna chai Jatun Apupac allpamanta mari micunata tariranurca.
44012021	Paicuna rimashca puncha pactaricpi, Herodes, Jatun Apupac churanata churarishpa, paipac tiyarinapi tiyarishpa, paicunata rimarca.
44012022	Pai rimashcata uyashpa runacuna caparinurca: —¡Chashna rimacucca mana runachu, Diosmi can!
44012023	Cuti chashnapi cuncaimanta Apunchicpac angel paita huacllichirca, Diospac shutita shuhuashcaraicu; chaipi curu micushca huañurca.
44012024	Diospac shimi jatunyashpa, mirarishpa ricurca.
44012025	Bernabe Saulontin, paicunaman mincashcata tucuchishpa, Jerusalenmanta ticranurca, paicunahuan Juan Marcosta pushashpa.
44013001	Antioquiapi ininacuna ucupi profetacuna, yachachiccuna canurca: Bernabe, paicuna Yana Runa rimacushca Simeon, Cirenemanta Lucio, Jatun Apu Herodeshuan huiñac Manaen Saulopash.
44013002	Shuc puncha paicuna sasishpa Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, Diospac Samai paicunata rimarca: —Bernabeta Saulontin chicanyachipaichic, ñuca mincanata ruranuchun.
44013003	Cutillata sasishpa Dios-huan rimarinurca; maquicunata umapi churashca huasha paicunata cachanurca.
44013004	Diospac Samai mincashcata uyashpa Seleuciaman rinacurca, chaimanta Chipreman yacuta rinurca.
44013005	Salaminapi pactashpa judiocunapac tautarina huasicunapi Diospac Shimita uyachinurca; Juanpash chaillapita paicunata yanapacurca.
44013006	Chai islata Pafoscama rinurca,. Chaipi shuc yachac judiota tarinurca; pai mana profetachu carca, paipac shuti carcami Jesuspac churi;
44013007	pai causacurcami Apu Sergio, Pablohuan, yapa alli yuyayuc rana. Pai Bernabeta Saulontin cayancapac cacharca, pai Diospac Shimita uyanata munarca;
44013008	ranti Elimasca, nicpi Yachac, mana munarcachu, Aputa inishcamanta chicanyachinayashpa.
44013009	Chashnapi Saulo, Pablopash paita rimanchic, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca cashpa, paiman allipacha ricushpa rimarca:
44013010	—Can, supaipac churi, umachinahuan, mana allicunahuan juntarishca, alli cashcata piñac, ¿maican punchallaca Apunchipac cusca ñanpicunata huishtuyachinata saquinquichu?
44013011	Cunashitumi Diospac maqui canpac jahuapi urmanca ran, ñausami saquirinqui, unaita punchata mana ricuna ushanquichu Dios munanacama.; Chaillapita paipac ñahui yanayarca. Amuca maquicunahuan mashcacurca pillapash maquimanta japihuachun nishpa.
44013012	Chai Apu pai jinu ricurca, chairaicu inirca.
44013013	Pablo paipac mashicunantin Pafosmanta Panfiliamanta Pergecama canuapi rinacurca. Juan chaipi paicunamanta chicanyashpa Jerusalenman ticrarca;
44013014	ranti paicunaca, Pergemanta llucshishpa, Pisidiamanta Antioquiaman pactanurca. Sabado puncha tantarina huasipi yaicushpa tiyarinurca.
44013015	Profetacunata camachic quillcatapash catishca huasha, tantarina huasi apucuna caita rimancapac cachanurca: —Huauquicuna, sinchicuchincapac shimicunata charishpa, rimaichiclla.
44013016	Pablo shayarishpa, maquihuan paicunata cayashpa, rimarca: —Israelpac churicuna, tucui cancuna Diosta manchashpa causaccunapash uyaichic:
44013017	Cai Israel llactamanta Dios, ñucanchicpac rucucunata acllarca, paicunata mirachirca Egiptopi chican runa shina causacushcapi. Sinchi maquihuan chaimanta paicunata llucshichirca;
44013018	chuscu chunca huata chunlla allpapi paicunata carashpa charirca.
44013019	Canchis Canaanmanta mama llactacunata chincachishpa,
44013020	paicunaman chai allpata curca, chuscu patsac pichca chunca huata huashamanta. Chai huasha Taripaccunata paicunaman curca profeta Samuel shayarinacama.
44013021	Chashnapi shuc Jatun Aputa mañanurca, Diosca Quispac, churi Saulta paicunaman curca; pai carcami Benjaminpac aillu; chuscu chunca huatata Jatun Apu causarca.
44013022	Chashnapash chai huasha Dios paita anchuchirca, pai rantimanta shayachircami Davidta, paimanta cai chacchashca shimita rimarca: Jesepac churi Davidta; ñuca munashca shina runata tarircani, pai tucui nuca munashcacunata pactachincami.
44013023	Cunan ricushun, Davidpac allumanta Israelpac shuc quishpichicta churashca, pai rimashca shina: chai Jesusmi.
44013024	Pai chaira mana pactamushcapi, Juan juchacunamanta nanarina bautismota yachachirca;
44013025	Juanca paipac causaita cai pachapi tucuchincapac racushcapi, paimantallata rimarca: "Mana cancuna yuyashca runachu cani; ranti yuyarichic ima shina ñucamanta huasha shamucuc ñuca mana paipac chaquimanta ushutallapash llushpichipac runa cani"
44013026	Huauquicuna, Abrahanmanta shamuc huahuacuna; cancunapash Diosta manchashpa causaccuna: ñucanchicman cai quishpina shimita cachamushcai
44013027	Alli shutipachami Jerusalenmanta runacuna, paipac apucunantiu Jesus cashcata mana ricsinata ushanurca; huañuchichishpaca, tucui sabadopi profetacunamanta uyachishcata pactachinurca.
44013028	Huañuchina tupu juchallishcata mana tarishpapash, Pilatota mañanurca huañuchichun nishpa.
44013029	Tucui paimanta quillcara tiyashca pactarishcapi caspimanta uraicuchishpa panpanurca
44013030	Ranti Dios paita huañushcacunamanta causachirca.
44013031	Paihuan Galileamanta Jerusalenman riccunata achca puncha ricurirca, paicunami cunan paipac ricuyaccuna canacun runacuna ñaupacpi.
44013032	Nucanchic shamunchicmi cancunata cai Cushi Shimita uyachincapac: Chai Dios ñucanchic rucucunata cushami rimashcata
44013033	churicunaman cushpa pactachishca, Jesusta huauñushcamanta causachishpa. Cashna quillcara tiyarca ishcainiqui Salmopi: "Can ñuca huahua canqui, cunan canta huiñachishcani".
44013034	Huañushcamanta causachishpa, mana cuti huañuna ushancapac, Dios cashna rimashcata charin: "Davidta cusha rimashcata pactachishami".
44013035	Chashnallata pactachirca shucpi quillcashcata: "Canta allipacha catic ismuncapac ama saquinquichu".
44013036	Pacta yachanquichic ima shina David, Dips mincashcata pactachishca huasha, huañurca; paipac rucucuna rishcaman rirca, paipac aichaca ismurca.
44013037	Ranti, Dios causachishcaca mana ismun, chaica Jesusmi can.
44013038	-
44013039	Chashnamanta allita yachapaichic, huauquicuna, pairaicumi juchacunamanta pichai tucunquichic; chairapash, tucui chai Moisespac camachic quillcahuan mana pichai tucuc ushashcacuna, Jesuspi inishpa, tucui chaicunamanta pichashca, quishpichira saquirinun.
44013040	Yapa yuyarishpa causaichic, ama profetacuna rimashca shina tucuncapac:
44013041	Uyaichic, tucuita millaccuna, mancharichic, callpaichic, cancuna causashca punchacunami jatun ruraicunata ranca racuni; cancuna chaita uyashpa mana ininquichicmanchu".
44013042	Paicuna llucshicushcapi mañanurca chaishuc sabadotapash chaimantallata rimai tucuncapac.
44013043	Tantarina tucurishcapi achca judiocuna, inincapac callarishcacunapash Pablohuan, Bernabehuan rinaicurca; paicuna chaicunahuan rimarishpa catinurca, Diospac cuyaita mana chincachishpa catincapac.
44013044	Sabado pactashcapi ñalla tucui llactamanta runacuna Diospac Shimita uyancapac pactanurca.
44013045	Chashna achca runata ricushpa, judiocuna yapa piñarinurca; chairaicu Pablo rimashcamanta chican shimita rimashpa piñashpa caparinacurca.
44013046	Chashnapi Pablo Bernabentin sinchi shimihuan rimanurca: —Cancunatami ñaupac Diospac Shimita rimana carcanchic; ranti chasquinata mana munanquichic huiñaipac causaita, cunan ñucanchic rincapac racunchic Diosta mana ricsiccunaman yachachincapac.
44013047	Cashna Apunchic rimashca: "Cai pachamanta achictami canta rurasha, quishpinata tucui pachaman pactachi ushancapac"
44013048	Diosta mana ricsiccuna chaita uyashpa yapa cushiyanacurca, Apunchicpac chashna rimashca shimicunata chaccharanurca; Diospac huiñaipac causaita chasquinacuna ininurca.
44013049	Chaicamaca Diospac Shimi chai suyupi ricsi tucushpa catirca.
44013050	Chashnamanta judiocuna cullquiyuc huarmicunata, inishcapi callarishcacunata llactamanta apucunatapash, Pablota Bernabentin piñashpa japincapac callarinurca; chashna chai allpamanta callpachinurca.
44013051	Paicuna chaquimanta ushpata chausirinurca, paicuna mana alli rashcaraicu; chaimanta Iconio llactaman rinurca,
44013052	yachachishcacunata cushihuan Diospac Samaihuan juntarishcacunata saquishpa.
44014001	Iconiopi chashnallata tucurca. Pablo Bernabentin judiocunapac tantarina huasipi yaicunacurca; paicuna yapa allita rimashcaraicu achca judiocuna griegocunapash ininurca.
44014002	Ranti mana ininata munac judiocuna, Diosta mana iniccunata mana alli shimicunata rimashcahuan piñachishpa, chai ishcai huauquicunata callpachincapc yuyarinurca.
44014003	Chashna paicuna ruracpipash Pablo Bernabentin unaita chaipi causanurca, mana manchashpa shimihuan yachachishpa; Apunchicpac yanapaihuan mancharicushiyanacunata rurashpa, paipac Shimi yachachishcata ricsichinurca.
44014004	Chai llactamanta runacuna ishcai yuyaita japinurca: maicancuna judiocunahuan canurca, shuccunaca Apostolcunahuan canurca.
44014005	Judiocuna mana iniccunapash paicunapac apucunantin shayarishpa, Apostolcunata rumihuan huactachincapac racushcata yachashpa,
44014006	Licaoniapi tiyac llactacunaman miticushpa rinurca: Listra, Derbe, chai mayanpi tiyac llactacunaman rinurca;
44014007	chaipipash Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachinurca.
44014008	Listriapi causacurca shuc suchu runa, pacarishcamanta janca runa, mana maican puncha purinata ushashcarcachu.
44014009	Shuc puncha, pai Pablo rimashcata uyacushcapi, Pablo allipacha paita ricurca, pai inishcata yachashpa;
44014010	chaipi caparishpa rimarca: —Shayari. Chai runa pahuashpa, shayarishpa, purincapac callarirca.
44014011	Chai runacuna Pablo rurashcata ricushpa, Licaonia runacunapac shimipi caparincapac callarinurca: —Dioscuna runapac aichata japishpa ñucanchicta ricuncapac shamunushca.
44014012	Bemabeta Zeusmi rimanurca, Pablotaca, Hermes, pai yachachiccama cashcaraicu.
44014013	Zeuspac huasimanta yaya pacri llacta mayanpi shayacuc cari huacracunata, llautucunata chaiman apachirca; tucui runacunahuan rimarishpa camarita paicunaman ricuchinayarca.
44014014	Chashnata Bernabe Pablontin yachashpa, churanata lliquicta aisarishpa, runa ucuman rishpa, caparinurca:
44014015	—¿Allichu caita rurana? Ñucanchicpash cancuna shinallata runami canchic; Cushi Shimita cancunaman rimanchicmi cai huacacunata jichushpa Causac Diosman cancuna ticrancapac; pai rurarcami jahua pachata, allpata, ñucñu yacuta, tucui paicunapi tiyashcacunatapash.
44014016	Callari pachapi pai saquircami caranlla amu munashca ñanpita catichun nishpa;
44014017	chashnapash pai rurashcacunahuan ricsichi tucurcami. Jahua pachamanta tamiata cachamun, tarpuna pachacunatapash; chashnamanta micunata charinchic, ñucanchicpac shuncutapash cushihuan juntachin.
44014018	Chashna rimashca shimicunahuan runacunata uyachinurca, ama camarita paicunaraicu ricuchincapac,
44014019	Yachachincapac chaipi saquirishcapi, Antioquiamanta, Iconiomanta judiocuna shamushpa, runacunata umachinurca; Pablota rumihuan shitashpa, llactamanta canchaman aisashpa shitanurca, huañushcami yuyashpa.
44014020	Ranti yachachishcacuna paipac mayanpi tantarishcapi, jatarishpa cuti llactaman ticrarca. Cayantiman Derbeman Bernabehuan ticrarca.
44014021	Diospac Cushi Shimita chai llactapi ricsichishca huasha, chaipi achca runacuna paicuna yachachishcata catinurca; chaimanta Listraman ticranurca chai huasha Iconioman, chaimanta Antioquiaman.
44014022	Jesusta caticcunata sinchicuchiranurca, inishcapi sinchicuichic rimashca shimicunahuan; paicunata rimaccuna carca: "Achca llaquicunata yalushpami Diospac pachapi yaicushun".
44014023	Caran iniccuna. tiyashca ucupi, shuc pushaccamata churanurca, Dios-huan rimanshca, sasishca huasha, paicuna imshca Apunchicman paicunata mincaccuna carca.
44014024	Pisidia suyuta chinpacta purishpa Panfiliaman pactanurca;
44014025	Perge llactapi Diospac Shimita uyachinurca, chaimanta Ataliaman rinurca.
44014026	Chaimanta Antioquiaman yacuta rinurca; chaimanta rinushcarca Diospac maquipi mincashcacuna paicunaman mincashcacunata pactachincapac.
44014027	Chaipi pactashpa, iniccunata tantachinurca; rimanurca tucui Dios paicunahuan rurashcata, ima shina Dios paita mana ricsiccunata inishcaman yaicuchishcata.
44014028	Chaipi unaita saquirinurca yachachishcacunahuan.
44015001	Maican Judeamanta shamuccuna huauquicunata cashna yachachiranurca: "Mana ullu carata pitirishpa Moisespac quillcapi yachachishca shina, mana quishpina ushanquichic".
44015002	Chashna rimashcamanta jatun piñanacuna tiyarca Pablo Bernabentin chai judiocunahuan. Antioquiamantacuna rimanurca Pablo Bernabe, paicunamanta maicancunantin Jerusalenman rincapac, chai rimaricushcamanta Apostolcunahuan pushaccamacunahuanpash allichincapac.
44015003	Iniccuna yanapanurca paicuna rincapac; Fenicia, Samaria allpacunata rinurca; chashna rirashpa huauquicunata rimashpa rinurca Diosta mana ricsiccuna Diosta inishcata; chashna rimashcata uyashpa chai huauquicuna yapa cushiyanurca.
44015004	Jerusalenman pactashcapi, iniccuna Apostolcunantin pushaccamacunantin yapa allita chasquinurca; chaipi paicunata rimanurca tucui Dios paicuna maquihuan rurashcata.
44015005	Ranti maican fariseo ucumanta runacuna, ha inishcaman tucushcacuna, rimanurca: —Paicunata ullu carata pitirinuchun, Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachinuchun rimana canchic.
44015006	Apostolcuna pushaccamacunantin tantarinurca paicuna rimashcata allita atipashpa ricuncapac.
44015007	Paicuna rimaricushpa yapa sinchi tucucucpi, Pedro jatarishpa paicunata rimarca: —Huauquicuna, callarishcamanta cancuna pacta yachanquichic, cancuna ucumanta Dios acllahuarca Diosta mana ricsiccuna ñuca shimimanta Diospac Cushi Shimita uyashpa, paicunapash inincapac.
44015008	Diosca, shuncucunata ricsic cashpa, paicunatapash chasquircami, paipac Samaita ñucanchicman cushca shinallata cushpa.
44015009	Ñucanchicta paicunatapash chaipuralla ricushca; paicunapac shuncucunata chuyayachishca paicuna inishcaraicu.
44015010	¿Allichu canca Diosta camancapac cunan cashna cai yachachishcacunata paicuna jahuapi ñucanchic rucucuna, ñucanchicllata mana aparina ushashca llashaita apachincapac?
44015011	Mana; ininchicmi Apunchic Jesuspac cuyaihuan quishpina cashcata; paicunapash chashnallata.
44015012	Tucui tantarishcacuna chunlla tucunurca Pablota, Bernabeta uyancapac; paicuna rimanurca Dios paicunapac maquihuan rurashca mancharicushiyanacunata paita mana ricsic runa ucupi.
44015013	Paicuna rimanata tucuchishcapi, Santiago callarishpa, rimarca: —Huauquicuna, uyahuaichic:
44015014	Simon yuyachishcami ima shina Dios, callarishcamanta pacha yuyarishcata paita mana ricsishca ucumanta shuc runacunata paipacta jinu acllashcata. Profetacuna ña rimanushcarca, cashna rimashcapi:
44015016	"Caimanta huasha ticramushami cuti Davidpac urmashca huasita jatachincapac; tularishcata jatachishpa cutillata shayachisha,
44015017	tucui runacunapash Apunchicta mashcanuchun, tucui ñucapac shutita ña chariccunantin:
44015018	chashna Apunchic riman unaimanta rimashpa charishcata".
44015019	Chairaicu, ñuca yuyani mana alli can mushu inincapac callarishcacunata llaquicunahuan quillachincapac.
44015020	Allimi canca yachin paicunata quillcacpi ama micunuchun huacacuna ticllayachishcata, mana sahuarishpa causanamanta chicanyanuchun, ama yahuaryuc aichacunata micunuchun yahuartapash ama micunuchun.
44015021	Yuyaricpica, unaimanta caran llactapi Moisespac camachic quillcata caran sabado yuyachinun yachachiccamacuna.
44015022	Yachachishcacuna pushaccamacunantin tucui tantarishca runacunapash, yuyarinurca paicunamanta maicancunata acllashpa Antioquiaman cachancapac Pablohuan Bernabentin. Judas Barsaba Silapash acllai tucunurca; paicuna pushaccama huauquicuna canurca.
44015023	Paicunahuan cai quillcata cachanurca: "Apostol huauquicuna pushaccama huauquicunantin allilla causacuichic rimanun Antioquiamanta, Siriamanta, Ciliciamanta huauquicunata, Diosta mana inishca runa ucumanta shamushcacuna.
44015024	Caipi yachashcanchic maican caimantacuna, mana ñucanchic mincashcacuna, cancunata ansata pantachinushca, llaquichinushca paicuna rimashca shimicunahuan.
44015025	Ranti cunan, tantarinaman cayashca huasha, tucuilla yuyarishcanchic cancunapacman caimanta maicancunata cachancapac, ñucanchipac llaquishca huauquicuna Pablo, Bernabehuan;
44015026	cai runacuna paicunapac causaita Apunchic Jesucristota yanapancapalla charinushca.
44015027	Chashnamanta cachanchicmi Judashuan Silasta, paicunapash ñucanchic rimashca shina cancunata shimihuan jinu rimanunca.
44015028	Yuyarishcanchicmi Diospac Samai ñucanchicpash, mana ashtahuan cancunapac jahuapi llaquicunata churancapac; ashtahuan caicunata shuti ruraichic nishpa mañanchic:
44015029	camarita shina huacacunaman cushca aichacunata ama micuichichu; yahuartapash sipishpa huauuchishca aichacunatapash ama micuichichu, mana sahuarishpa causanamanta chicanyaichic. Tucui chaicunata huacaichishpa allimi canquichic. Samashun",
44015030	Cachashcacuna, Antioquiaman rinurca; chaipi tucuicunata tantachispa quillcata cunurca.
44015031	Quillcata uyashpa, tucuilla cushiyanurca yapa sumac shimicuna cashcaraicu.
44015032	Judas Silapash, paicunapash profetacuna cashpa, achca rimashca shimicunahuan huauquicunata sinchicuchinurca, ñaupacman catina yuyaita cunurca.
44015033	Unaimanta, allihuan samashun rimai tucunurca huauquicunapacpi paicuna cachai tucushcamallata ticrancapac.
44015035	Pablo Bernabentin Antioquiapi saquirinurca, Apunchicpac Cushi Shimita yachachishpa, uyachishpa; chaillapita shuccunapash paicunahuan canurca.
44015036	Achcanaya punchacuna huasha Pablo Bernabeta rimarca: —¿Imaraicu tucui chai ñucanchic Apunchicpac Shimita yachachishca llactacunapi tiyac huauquicunata cutillata mana ricucrinchic allichu tiyaranun imachari?
44015037	Bernabe paihuan pushanayarca Juan Marcosta.
44015038	Pablo, ranti, yuyarca mana allichu pushancapac paicunamanta Panfiliapi chicanyashpa, mana paicunahuan purinaman ric runata.
44015039	Piñanushpa, chicanyanurca. Bernabe Marcosta pushashpa Chipreman rirca;
44015040	ranti Pablo, Silashuan mashiyarca; paipac huauquicuna Diosman paicunata mincanurca;
44015041	paica rishpa purirca Siria, Cilicia iniccunata sinchicuchishpa.
44016001	Derbeman Listramanpash pactarca. Chaipi shuc Tímoteo shutiyuc yachachishcahuan taririrca, pai carcami Diosta inic judio mamamanta, paipac yayaca ranti Greciamanta.
44016002	Listramanta Iconiomanta huauquicunapash paimanta alli shimicunata rimashcaraicu,
44016003	Pablo paihuan richun munarca. Paita japishpa ullu carata pitirca, chaimanta judiocuna pai Greciamanta yaya charishcata yachashcaraicu.
44016004	Liactacunata rirashpa, runacunaman apostolcuna pushaccamacunantin Jerusalenpi rimashcata ricshichishpa rinacurca, paicunapash pactachinuchun nishpa.
44016005	Iniccuna inishcapi sinchiyashpa catinurca, ashtahuan caran puncha mirarishpa rinurca.
44016006	Diospac Samai Asia allpapi Cushi Shimita yachachincapac mana munashcamanta, rinurcalla Frigiapi, Galacia suyupi mana shayarishpa.
44016007	Misiaman pactana mayanpi, Bitiniaman rinata yuyarinurca, ranti Jesuspac Samai mana munarcachu.
44016008	Chairaicumanta Misiata rishpalla Troademan uraicunurca.
44016009	Chaipi chai tuta Pablo shuc nuspaita charirca: Shuc Macedoniamanta runa, shayarashpa, paita rimacurca: Macedoniaman shamushpa ñucanchicta yanapai.
