44016010	Chai nuspaita charishca huasha, Macedoniaman utcalla rincapac yuyarircanchic, Dios paipac Shimita chaimanmi yachachincapac cayacun yuyarishpa
44016011	Chairaicu Troademanta Samotraciaman cusca rircanchic. Cayantin punchapi Neapolispi shayarircanchic,
44016012	chaimanta Filiposman rircanchic, chai llacta Macedoniapi jatun llacta can, chaipi Romamanta Apu ricuccama tiyan. Cai llactapi unainayata saquirucanchic.
44016013	Sabado puncha llactamanta canchaman llucshircanchic, yacu pataman, chaimanmi judiocuna Dios-huan rimarincapac tantarinurca, Pablo yuyashcamanta. Chaipi tiyarishpa, tantarishca huarmicunahuan rimarircanchic.
44016014	Paicunamanta shuc, Lidia shutiyuc, Tiatiramanta, purpura nishcata catuccama, Diosta inic carca, uyashpa tiyarca; Apunchicca paipac shuncuta pascachirca Pablo rimacushcata allita atipancapac.
44016015	Pai aillucunantin bautismota chasquishca huasha, ñucanchicta cayarca: —Ñuca allipacha Diosta caticmi yuyashpa, shamuichic ñucahuan, ñuca huasipi saquirichic. Mana munacpipash chaiman pai pushashpa rirca.
44016016	Ñucanchic Dios-huan rimarinaman rirashcapi, shuc malta huarmi ñucanchihuan tuparirca; pai yachac carca, ima tucunca rashcata huillac carca, pai chashna cashcamanta amucuna achca cullquita japiccuna carca.
44016017	Pablota, ñucanchictapash cashna caparishpa caticacharca: —Cai runacuna Jatun Diosta catic runacunami canun, paicunaca cancunata ricsichiranunmi quishpina hanpita.
44016018	Chai cuitsa caran puncha chashna caparishpa purirca; ña Pablo amishpa, paiman ticrashpa chai supaita rimarca: —Jesucristopac shutipi canta rimani, paimanta llucshi. Chaillapita llucshirca.
44016019	Paipac amucuna, chashna tucushcahuan cullqui japina tucuricpi ricushpa, Silasta Pablontin japishpa, llacta pacllaman apucuna ñaupacman aisashpa pushanurca;
44016020	chaipi jatun apucunapac ñaupacpi churashpa, cashna rimashpa ricsichinurca: —Cai runacuna ñucanchic llactapi quillachiranun;
44016021	paicunaca judio runacunami canun, camachiranunpash ñucanchic mana yachashca, mana pactachipac yachaicunata, ñucanchic romano cashcaraicu.
44016022	Runacuna paicunahuan piñaricpi, churanata llatanashpa caspihuan huactachichinurca jatun apucuna.
44016023	Caspihuan yuyaita huactashca huasha, quinchara ucupi quillpanacurca; mincanurca chaipi ricuccamata allita paicunata ricuchun.
44016024	Pai chashna mincai tucushpa, ashtahuan ucu quinchara ucuman paicunata churashpa, chaquicunata jillai sapipi canichispa churarca.
44016025	Chaupi tuta Pablo Silaspash taquishcahuan Dios-huan rimarinacurca. Shuc quillpashcacuna uyaranurcalla.
44016026	Cuncaimanta, shinchi allpa cuyurina tiyacpi chunta curral sapicunantin chucchurirca. Chashna tucushcallapita tucui puncucuna pascarinurca, jillai huascacunapash tucui quillpashcacunamanta llushpirinurca.
44016027	Ricuccama causarirca, tucui puncucuna pascarata ricushpa mircanuta surcurca huañurincapac, tucuimi llucshinushca yuyashpa.
44016028	Chashnapi Pablo caparirca: —Ama susurichu, tucuillami caipi canchic.
44016029	Ricuccama achicta mañashpa, shuc pahuaillahuan ucuman yaicushpa, chucchurishpa Pablo Silaspac chaqui mayanpi urmarca.
44016030	Paicunata canchaman surcushpa tapurca: —Quishpincapac ¿imatami rurana cani?
44016031	Paicuna cutipanurca: —Apunchic Jesuspi inina canqui, chaimi can canpac aillucunantin quishpinqui.
44016032	Chaipi paita, tucui paipac huasipi tiyaccunantin Diospac Shimita uyachinurca.
44016033	Ricuccamaca chashna tuta ucupipash paicunata japishpa, paicunapac chucrishcacunata maillarca; chaillapita bautismota tucui paipac aillucunantin chasquinurca.
44016034	Huasha paipac huasiman paicunata cayarca, micunata cararca, tucui paipac aillucunahuan cushiyarca Diosta inishcamanta.
44016035	Cayanti tutamanta jatun apucuna chapacunahuan ricuccamata rimancapac cacharca: —Cachari chai runacunata.
44016036	Chai ricuccama Pabloman pai uyashca shimita rimarca: —Jatun apucuna cancunata cacharichun rimancapac cachamunushca. Chairaicu cunanca ama imatapash manchashpa, richiclla.
44016037	Ranti Pablo chapacunata cutiparca: —Imanashi. Ñucanchicta tucui runacunapac ñaupacpi llipachinurca; manapash allita yachashpa, ñucanchic romano runacuna cacpipash chunta curralpi quillpanacurca, ¿cunanca pacallachu ñucanchicta surcushun yuyanun? Manapacha chaita uyanayanichu. Paicuna jinu shamushpa surcuc shamunuchun. Chapacuna jatun apucunapacman rimacrinurca paicuna uyashcata; paicuna romano runacuna cashcata yachashpa mancharinurca.
44016039	Chai huasha "ñucanchicta quishpichipaichic" nishpa mañancapac paicuna cashcaman rinurca; canchaman surcushca huasha, cai llactamanta richic nishpa rimanacurca.
44016040	Pablo Silaspash chunta curralmanta llucshishpa, Lidiapac huasiman rinurca, chaipi huauquicunahuan tuparinurca. Paicunata sinchicuna yuyaicunata rimashca huasha, chaimanta rinurca.
44017001	Anfipolista Apoloniatapash rishpa, Tesalonicaman pactanurca, chaipi shuc tantarina huasi tiyarca.
44017002	Pablo, paipac yachaita catishpa, chaipi pactashpa quimsa sabado paicunahuan rimarinurca. Quillcashcacunamanta yuyaita surcushpa,
44017003	camachicurca, ricsichicurcapash ima shina Mesias ñacarina carca, ima shina huañushcacunamanta causarina carca, cashna shimihuan tucuchic carca: "Chai Mesias Jesusmi can, ñuca cancunaman ricsichicushca".
44017004	Maican judiocuna uyashpa Pabloman Suasmanpash llutarinurca; chashnallata achca Greciamanta runacuna, paicunapash judiocuna inishcata japinacushcarca; chai ucupi achcanaya chariyuc huarmicunapash tiyanurca.
44017005	Chashnata mana allihuan ricushpa, judiocunaca millai, quilla runacunata tantachinacurca, paicunahuan llactapi quillachishpa puriranurca. Jasonpac huasipi pactacrinurca Pablomanta, Silasmantapash tapushpa, paicunata runacunapacman pushancapac.
44017006	Paicunata mana tupashcaraicu, Jasonta maican huauquicunantin apucunapac ñaupacman cashna caparishpa aisashpa rinurca: —Chai runacunata jatachishpa puriccuna caipipash pactamunacushcami,
44017007	Jasonca paicunata chasquishca paipac huasipi. Tucui paicuna Cesar rimashcata mana uyanun, shuc Jatun Apu Jesusmi tiyan nishpa.
44017008	Chashna rimashca shimicunata uyashpa, apucuna tucui runacunapash mancharinurca.
44017009	Chairaicumanta paicunaca cullquita mañanurca paicunata cacharincapac.
44017010	Utcalla chai tuta, Bereaman Pablota Silastapash huauquicuna cachanurca. Chaipi pactashpa tantarina huasiman rinacurca.
44017011	Bereamanta judiocunaca Tesalonicapi tiyaccunamanta ashtahuan allicuna canurca, chairaicu allihuan chasquinurca Diospac Shimita. Caran puncha Quillcacunata allipacha ricuranurca, Pablo rimashca shinachu can nishpa.
44017012	Achcacuna ininurca, Diosta mana ricsiccunapash, chariyuc huarmicuna caricunapash.
44017013	Bereapi Diospac Shimita Pablo yachachicushcata Tesalonicamanta judiocuna yachashpa, chaiman runacunata huacllichincapac, macanacuchincapac rinurca.
44017014	Chashnapi utcalla huauquicuna Pablota ñucñu yacu pataman cachanurca, ranti Silas Timoteontin chaipi saquirinurca.
44017015	Pablota pushaccuna paita Atentas llactacama pushashpa rinurca, chaimanta ticramushpa Silas Timoteontin utcalla Pablohuan tuparicrinuchun shimita apashpa rinurca.
44017016	Pablo Atenaspi chaishuccunata chapacushpa, yapa nanarirca tucui llacta huacalla juntaracpi ricushpa.
44017017	Pablo tantarina huasipi judiocunahuan, Diosta muchaccunahuanpash rimaric carca, chashnallata llacta pacllapi tuparishcacunahuan.
44017018	Maican yapa quillcayuccunapash paihuan rimariccuna carca. Shuccuna tapuccuna carca: —¿Imallapash rimancapac charincachu imachari chai rimaisiqui runa? Shuccunaca Jesus huañushcamanta causarinata rimashcata uyashpa, rimaccuna carca: —Chican Dioscunamanta uyachishpa puric shina yachin.
44017019	Japishpa Areopago nishcaman pushaspa, paita tapunurca: —¿Can rimacushca mushu yuyaicunata yachana ushanchicchu?
44017020	Alli shutipacha can mana maipi uyashcacunata rimanqui, can imata rimanayashcata yachanayanchicmi.
44017021	Yachai tiyan ima shina chaimanta runacuna chicanmanta shamuccunapash rimanun, uyanun imapash paicunaman mushu pactashcallata.
44017022	Pablo chaupi Areopagopi shayarishpa, rimarca: —Atenasmanta runacuna, tucui cancuna charishcacunamanta ricushpa atipashpa ricuni cancunapac dioscunaman llutarishpa causashcata.
44017023	Llactata puricushpa achca huacacunata shuc altar nishcatapash ricushcani; chai altar cashna quilicayuc: "Mana ricsira Diosraicu". Cunan ricushun, cancuna mana ricsishpa chacchacushcata, ñuca ricsichincapac shamuni:
44017024	Cai pachata, tucui caipi tiyaccunata rurac Dios, jahua pachamanta cai pachamanta amu cashpapash, mana runacuna rurashca huasicunapichu causan.
44017025	Mana runa maquimanta yanapaita mutsunchu, yanapaita chapacuc shina, pai tucuicunaman causaita, samaita cuyan, tucui imatapash.
44017026	Shuc runamantalla tucui llactacunata surcurca cai pachapi causanuchun nishpa, paillata caran llactapac saihuata ima tupu causana cashcata churarca.
44017027	Paita mashcanuchun munarca, ñausa shina mashcashpa unaiman tupanunman imachari;
44017028	manapi paimanta carupi canchic, paipi causanchic, cuyurinchic, cai pachapi tiyanchic, shuc cuyailla rimac nishca shina: "Diosmanta miraicuna canchic".
44017029	Chairaicu, Diospac miraicuna cashpa, mana allichu Diosta curihuan, cullquihuan, sumac ricuric rumicunahuan chinpapurachina, chaicunaca runa rurashcallami canun.
44017030	Cunan ricuichic: Diosca, mana yachashpa rurashcacunata cuncarishpa, cunan pai riman tucui runacunata, tucui cai pachapi causaccunata, Diosman shuncuta shayachincapac.
44017031	Ña pai shuc puncha rimashcata charin tucui cai pachata sumacta taripancapac pai acllashca runahuan; chashna tucunca racushcamanta tucuicunata ricsichishpa paita huañushcacunamanta causachirca.
44017032	Huañushcamanta causarinata uyashpa, maicancuna asinacurca, shuccunaca rimanurca: —Chaimantaca shuc punchapimi uyanata munanchic.
44017033	Chaipimi Pablo paicuna ucumanta llucshirca.
44017034	Chashna cacpipash, maican runacuna paiman llutarishpa ininacurca. Paicuna canurcami Dionisio Areopagita nishca, chaimanta shuc huarmi Damaris shutiyuc shuccunapash.
44018001	Chashna tucushca huasha, Pablo Atenasta saquishpa Corintoman rirca.
44018002	Chaipi tuparca Aquila shutiyuc judiota, pai Pontomanta carca, mushulla Italiamanta shamushcacuna paipac huarmi Priciliantin, jatun apu Claudio tucui judiocuna Romamanta llucshinuchun rimashcaraicu. Pablo paicunahuan ailluyarca;
44018003	chai llancanallata charishcaraicu paicunahuan llancashpa causancapac saquirirca; paicunaca tsala churana ahuac canurca.
44018004	Caran sabado rimaric carca tantarina huasipi, judiocunata griegocunatapash uyachisha nishpa.
44018005	Ranti, Silas Timoteontin Macedoniamanta pactashcapi, Pablo Diospac Shimita yachachinamanlla tucurca, judiocunata Jesus Mesias cashcata uyachisha nishpa.
44018006	Paicuna mana uyanayashpa piñashcahuan cutipanucpi, Pablo paipac churanamanta ushpata chausirishpa, paicunata rimarca: —Cancunallami imapash tucucpi yachanquichic; ñuca mana juchallinichu. Cunanmanta Diosta mana ricsiccunapacman rini.
44018007	Chaimanta llucshishpa shuc Diosta muchac Ticio Justo shutiyuc runapac huasiman rirca, paipac huasi tantarina huasi mayanpi carca.
44018008	Tantarina huasi apu, Crispo, tucui paipac aillucunantin Apunchicta inirca; achca Corintomanta uyac runacunapash, inishpa bautismota chasquinurca.
44018009	Shuc tuta nuspaipi Apunchic Pablota nirca: —Ama manchaichu, ama chunllayaichu, rimacuilla,
44018010	ñucami canhua tiyacuni, mana pipash canta macashpa susurichincachu, cai llactamanta achcacuna ñuca runacuna cashcaraicu.
44018011	Pablo chaipi shuc huata chaupi saquirirca paicunata Diospac Shimita yachachishpa,
44018012	Ranti Galion Acayamanta apu cashcapi, tucui judiocuna shuclla runa shina Pablota japishpa, taripana huasiman pushanurca, rimashpa:
44018013	—Cai runa ñucanchicta camachicun Diosta chacchana, ñucanchic quillcapi mana munashca shina.
44018014	Pablo ña cutipanca rashcapi, Galion judiocunata rimarca: —Judio runacuna, huañuchishcamanta, jatun juchallishcamanta ima cacpica, cancunata uyaiman chari;
44018015	ranti, Diosmanta yachachishca, cancunapac Camachic Quillcamanta cashcaraicu, ñuca mana munani chaicunamanta taripancapac.
44018016	Taripana huasimanta tucuicunata llucshichirca.
44018017	Chaillapita tucuilla, tantarina huasi apu Sostenesta japishpa, taripana huasi ñaupacllapita yuyaita macashpa churanurca. Ranti Galion mana imallapash rimarcachu.
44018018	Pablo chaira unainayata Corintopi saquirirca, chai huasha chaipi tiyac huauquicunata saquishpa, Siriaman rincapac barcopi yaicurca, Priscilata Aquilantin paihuan pushashpa. Cencreaspi umata llushtichirca, shuc pactachina shimita charishcaraicu.
44018019	Efesoman pactashcapi, chaipi paicunamanta chicanyashpa, tantarina huasiman rirca; chaipi judiocunahuan rimarincapac callarirca.
44018020	Paicunaca Efesopi unaita saquirichun munanurca, ranti Pablo mana munarcachu,
44018021	ashtahuan paica cai shimicunahuan puchucarca: —Dios munacpi, cuti ticramusha chari. Efesomanta ñucñu yacuta rirca.
44018022	Cesareapi llucshishpa, iniccunata ricucrirca, chai huasha Antioquiaman rirca.
44018023	Chaipi unaita causarca, chai huasha cuti rirca Galacia suyu, Frigia suyuta ricuncapac, yachachishcacunata sinchicuchincapac.
44018024	Efesoman Apolo shutiyuc judio pactarca, pai Alejandriamanta carca; alli rimac, Camachic Quillcata yapa yachac.
44018025	Apunchicpac ñanpi catinapi paita yachachinushcarca, allipacha shuncuhuan rimashpa Jesuspac causaimanta yachachic carca, shinapash Juanpac bautismollatami paica ricsirca.
44018026	Apolo mana manchashpa tantarina huasipi rimancapac callarirca; chashnapi Aquila Priscilantin uyanurca. Paicunahuan pushashpa ashtahuan yallita Diospac ñanpimanta paita yachachinurca.
44018027	Apolo Acayata rina yuyaita charishpa, huauquicuna sinchicuchinurca, quillcanurcapash yachachishcacunata, allita chasquinuchun nishpa. Pai pactashcahuan, Dios yanapashcaraicu, achcata sinchicuchirca iniccunata.
44018028	Mana pipash cutipana usharcachu, pai tucuipac ñaupacpi judiocuna rimashcamanta chican shimita rimacpi; cashna, allipacha, Camachic Quillcahuan Jesus Mesias cashcata ricsichic carca.
44019001	Apolo Corintopi tiyacunacama, Pablo Efesoman pactarca jahua urcucunata chinpashpa; chaipi shuc yachachishcacunata tuparca,
44019002	paicunata tapurca: —¿Cancuna inina callarishcapi Diospac Samaita chasquircanquichichu? Paicuna cutipanurca: —Diospac Samaimanta mana shuc shimillapash mana uyashcanchichu.
44019003	Pablo paicunata cuti tapurca: —Shina cacpi, ¿ima bautismota chasquircanquichic? Cutipanurca: —Juanmanta bautismota chasquircanchic.
44019004	Pablo paicunata rimarca: —Juanmanta chasquishca bautismoca juchamanta nanarinatami ricsichicurca; chashnapash runacunata rimarca paimanta huashalla shamucucta inincapac, chaica Jesusmi can.
44019005	Uyashpa bautismota chasquinacurca Apunchic Jesuspac shutipi.
44019006	Chai huasha Pablo paicunapac uma jahuapi maquicunata churacpi, Diospac Samai paicunapacman uraicurca; chaillapita chican shimicunata, tucunca rashcacunata rimancapac callarinurca.
44019007	Paicuna chunca ishcai runacuna canurca.
44019008	Pablo tantarina huasiman rishpa quimsa quilla tucuipac ñaupacpi Diospac pachamanta yachachirca, paicuna allita atipashpa uyahuanuchun nishpa.
44019009	Maicancuna mana atipashpa uyanata munanucpi, ashtahuan piñanucpi ñanpimanta chicanyachinucpi ricushpa, Pablo paicunata chicanman saquishpa, yachachishcacunahuan tantaric carca, Tiranopac yachana huasipi caran puncha rimariccuna carca.
44019010	Ishcai huata chashna causanurca; chairaicu Asia suyumanta tucui runacuna, judiocuna, griegocunapash Diospac Shimita uyanata ushanurca.
44019011	Dios Pablopac maquihuan achca mancharicushiyanacunata rurarca,
44019012	paimanta rimacpica Pablo churarashca llachapac pitita uncuccuna jahuapi churashcallahuan janpiriccuna carca, supaicunapash callpaccuna carca.
44019013	Judiocunamanta maican, supaita callpachishpa puriccuna, camana munanurca Apunchic Jesuspac shutita japishpa uncuccunamanta callpachincapac, casfana rimashpa: —Pablo yachachishca Jesuspac shutipi, canta llucshi nishpa rimani.
44019014	Chaita ruraccuna canurcami judio pacri yayacunapac apu Escevaspac canchis churicuna;
44019015	ranti chai supai paicunata cutiparca: —Jesustaca ricsinimi, Pablo pi cashcatapash yachanimi, ranti cancuna pi cashcata mana yachanichu, ¿pimi canquichic?
44019016	Chaillapita chai supai japishca runa chai runacunata japishpa yuyaita macarca, chairaicu chai huasha paicunaca llushti, susurishca chai huasimanta callpana tucunurca.
44019017	Chashna tucushcamanta shimi Efesopi tiyac tucui runacunaman pactarca, judiocunaman griegocunamanpash. Tucuilla yapa mancharishca saquirinurca, Apunchic Jesuspac shutica ashtahuan jatunyashca saquirirca.
44019018	Ininapi callarishcamanta maicancuna paicuna mana alli rashcamanta tucuicunapac ñaupacpi juchata rimacrinacurca;
44019019	chashnallata, sacracunapash quillca pancacunata tantachishpa illacta rupachinurca, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi. Chai pancacunata yupashpa camacpi, pichca chunca huaranca cullqui llucshina cashcarca.
44019020	Chashna, Apunchicpac ushaihuan, paipac Shimi yapa runacunapi miraricurca.
44019021	Tucui chaicunata rurashca huasha, Pablo allipacha Jerusalenman rinata yuyarirca Macedoniata Greciatapash rishpa. Yuyarirca: Jerusalenta ricucrishca huasha, Romatapash ricucrinami cani.
44019022	Macedoniaman ishcai paita yanapaccunata cacharca, Timoteo Erastontin, ranti paica ansata chaira Asia marcapi saquirirca.
44019023	Chai punchacunapi Apunchicpac mushu ñanpiraicu piñarishpa jatarinurca runacuna.
44019024	Shuc runa Demetrio shutiyuc, cullquimanta imatapash rurac, chai cullquimantallata huacacunata ruracurca Artemisapac huasimanta ricushpa, achca cullquita chaihuan japic canurca chaipi llancaccuna;
44019025	tucui paicunata tantachishpa rimarca: —Mashicuna, cancuna yachanquichic cai cullqui japishcamanta ñucanchic alli causaita charina cashcata.
44019026	Ranti cancunallata ricushcanquichic, yachashcanquichic imapash, mana Efesollapi, tucui cai Asia suyupi, chai Pablo runacunata shuc yuyaita churashcata, pai runa rurashcaca mana dioschu can rimashpa.
44019027	Mana ñucanchicpac llancanallachu chincarincapac racun, ashtahuan Jatun Artemisapac huasimi jichui tucushca saquirinca racun; chashna tucushpaca paita muchana tucurincami cai Asiapi tucui pachapipash.
44019028	Chai shimicunata uyashpa piñarishpa cashna caparincapac callarinurca: —Efesiocunapac Artemisaca jatunmi can.
44019029	Tucui llactapi yapa tulupushca tiyarca, tucuilla teatro nishcaman callpanurca, Gayota Aristarcontin aisashpa, paicunaca Macedoniamanta canurca, Pablohuan puriccuna.
44019030	Pablo tucui chai runacunata ñahuichinayarca, ranti yachachishcacuna mana saquinurca.
44019031	Chashnallata chai Asia suyumanta maican apucunapash, paipac mashicuna cashpa shimita cachanurca, ama teatroman mayanyachun nishpa.
44019032	Caranlla pai munashcata caparicurca. Jatun tantarinapi tucuilla chausirishca canurca, maicancunaca mana yachanurca imaraicu chaipi tantarinushcata.
44019033	Chashnapi, runa ucumanta shuc runata Alejandro shutiyucta sumacta camachinurca, paita judiocuna ñaupacpi churanurca. Alejandro munarcami runacunata ricsichincapac imaraicu chashna tucushcata, maquihuan ricuchishpa chunllayachinayarca.
44019034	Runacuna judio cashcata yachashpa ñalla ishcai patsac tuputa tucuilla sinchita capariranurca: —Efesiocunapac Artemisaca jatunmi can,
44019035	Ña sanpayashcapi, llactamanta shuc apu paicunata chunllayachishpa, rimarca: —Efesomanta runacuna, ¿manachu tucuilla yachanchic cai Efeso llacta paipac ucupi Artemisapac huasita, paipac jahua pachamanta urmashca huacatapash huacaichishpa charishcata?.
44019036	Chashna cashcamanta mana pipash rimancachu; chairaicu, allimi yuyani cancuna chunllayancapac, allita yuyarishpa imatapash rurancapac.
44019037	Cai cancuna apamushca runacuna mana juchallinushcachu, ñucanchic diostapash mana piñanushcachu.
44019038	Demetrio paipac mashicunantin pihuanpash piñanacuita charishpa, chaipacta tantarinacuna apucunapash tiyanun. Chaipi ima juchallishcacunamantapash taripana tiyachun.
44019039	Cuti shuc juchachinacuna tiyacpi, Jatun Tantarinapi allichina tucunca.
44019040	Aluta yuyaricpi, juchachi tucuna ushanchic cunan piñarishpa rashcamanta, mana impash tiyarca nucanchic chashna piñarishcahuan cushparincapac.
44019041	Chashna rimashca huasha, chausichirca tantarinata.
44020001	Puñarishpa jatarishcacuna chunllayashca huasha, Pablo yachachishcacunata cayachirca sinchicuchincapac; chai huasha paicunamanta anchurishpa Macedoniaman rirca.
44020002	Chai suyuta yachachishcacunata sinchicuchishpa purishca huasha, Greciaman rirca.
44020003	Chaipi, quimsa quilla huasha, Siriaman barcopi ticrasha yuyarca; ranti chaipi yacharca judiocuna paita mana alli ranata yuyacushcata, chairaicu Macedoniata ticranata yuyarirca.
44020004	Asiamanta pai rinca racushcapi, paihuan rinurca Pirropac churi Sopratos, Berca llactamanta; Aristarco, Segundopash, Tesalonicamantacuna; Derbemanta Gayo Timoteontin; Asiamanta Tiquico, Trofimontin.
44020005	Paicuna ñaupashpa ñucanchicta Troadepi chapanurca.
44020006	Ranti ñucanchicca, Pascua raimi huasha, Filiposmanta ñucñu yacuta rircanchic; pichca puncha huasha Troadepi paicunata japicrircanchic, chaipi shuc semana unayarcanchic.
44020007	Semana callarishca punchapi tantarircanchic misata rancapac; Pablo cayantiman rina cashpa, paicunahuan rimaricurca. Chashna paicuna rimaricushca chaupi tutacama unayarca,
44020008	ñucanchic tantarishca ucupi achca chinpusucuna tiyarea.
44020009	Shuc malta runa, Euriquio shutiyuc, jahua patapi tiyac quincha jutcupi tiyacurca. Pablo rimashpa caticushcapi ashtahuan puñunai paita japirca; ña puñuihuan mana ushashpa, quimsa (quimsaniqui) niqui pata jahuamanta allpaman urmarca, huañushcata jatachinurca.
44020010	Pablo uraicushpa, paipac jahuapi siririrca, paita ucllarishpa, rimarca: —Ama mancharichichu, chaira samaita charinmi.
44020011	Cuti jahuaman sicashpa, misata rashpa micurca. Punchayana mayancama rimaricushca huasha, rirca.
44020012	Chai malta runamanta rimacpica, tucuipac cushiraian causacta apamunurca.
44020013	Ñucanchicca barcoman rircanchic, chaimanta Asoman rircanchic; chaipi Pablohuan tuparina carcanchic, paica allpata rirarca, pai rimashca shina.
44020014	Chashna tucurca, Asopi tuparircanchic, ñucanchichuan barcopi sicarca, chaimanta Mitileneman pactarcanchic.
44020015	Chaimanta llushpiriccuna, cayantiman Quios mayanman pactarcanchic; chaishuc punchaman Samosta ricurcanchic; chaimanta shuc puncha huasha Miletoman pactarcanchic, Trogillonpi shayarisuca huasha.
44020016	Pablo allipacha yuyarishcarca Efesopi mana shayarishpa rincapac, ama yanca Asiapi unayasha nishpa; utcalla rirarca Jerusalenpi Pentecostes puncha pactana yuyaihuan.
44020017	Miletomanta Efesoman shimita cacharca, chaimanta pushaccamacunata cayarca.
44020018	Pactashcapi paicunata rimarca: —Cancuna yachanquichic Asiapi callarishca punchamanta ñuca ima shina cancunahuan causashcata;
44020019	ñuca uchilla cashcata yuyarishpa Apunchicta yanapashcani, chai tucui judiocuna huacaita, llaquita cuhuacpipash.
44020020	Cancuna yachanquichic mana mancharishpa cancunaraicu tucuita rurashcata. Cancunata camachircani, yachachircani tucuipac ñaupacpi, caran huasipipash;
44020021	judiocunata nicpi, griegocunata nicpi Diosman shuncuhuan ticrarinuchun Apunchic Jesuspi inincapacpash cayashcanimi.
44020022	Cunan Jeruslenman Diospac Samai pushashca rirani, mana yachani chaipi ima tucuna cashcatapash.
44020023	Diospac Samaica caran llactapi piñashpa japi tucuna, piñashpa quillpai tucunallatami ricsichihuan.
44020024	Shinapash, manapacha ñuca causaimanta yapalla yuyarinichu, ñuca ashtahuan munanimi tucuchinata, pactachinatapash Apunchi Jesus mincashcata: Cushi Shimimanta ricuyac cana.
44020025	Cunan ricuichic, ñuca yachani cancuna mana cuti ricuhuanata, cancuna ucupi Diospac Pachamanta yachachircani. Chairaicu, cunan cancunata rimanata ushani ñuca mana juchayuc cashcata, cancuna imapash tucunca rashcamanta,
44020027	Dios munashcata mana pacashpa tucui cancunata yachachishcaraicu.
44020028	Allita caranlla ricurishpa causanquichic, cancunaman Diospac Samai mincashca runacunatapash cancunata ricuc shina churashpa; chashna cancuna inishpa huancurishcacunapac michiccuna canquichic, pai paipac quinquin yahuarhuan chaita tuparca.
44020029	Yachani ñuca rishca huasha, cancuna ucupi millai atuc yaicumuna cashcata, paicunamanta mana quishpinquichichu,
44020030	cancunamantapash maicancuna tiyancami Diosmanta yachashcata pantashcahuan yachachiccuna, paicunahuanmi yachachishcacunata aisashpa rinunca.
44020031	Chairaicu, yuyarishpa chapacuichic: yuyarichic quimsa huatata, tuta punchantin, huacashcahuan caran cancunata camachinata mana saquishcanichu.
44020032	Cunan Diospac maquipi, pai cuyashca Diospac Shimipipash cancunata saquini; paillami ushan cancunata jatunyachincapac, acllashcacuna japinata cancunapash japina ushancapac.
44020033	Mana pipac cullqui, mana pipac curi, mana pipac churana munashpa ricushcanichu.
44020034	Yachanquichic cancuna ñuca quiquin maquihuan llancashcata, ñucapacta, ñuca mashicuna mutsushcata tupancapac.
44020035	Tucuipi cancunata ricuchishcani ima shina llancana canchic mana imayuccunata yanapancapac, cai Apunchic Jesuspac shimicunata yuyarishpa: Cuyana chasquinamanta ashtahuan yalli cushita apamun.
44020036	Rimanata tucuchishca huasha, tucuicunahuan cuncurishpa Dios-huan rimarirca.
44020037	Tucuilla huacaranurca, Pablota ucllarishpa muchanurca;
44020038	yapa llaquirishca canurca pai mana cuti ricuhuanquichichu rimashcaraicu. Chai huasha barcocama paihuan rinurca.
44021001	Paicunamanta llushpirishca huasha, cutillata yacuta rishpa Cosman cusca rircanchic; cayantiman Rodasman rircanchic, chaimanta Pataraman, Miramanpash pactarcanchic.
44021002	Chaipi shuc barcota Feniciaman riracta tarishpa chaipi yaicushpa rircanchic.
44021003	Chipre islata ricurcanchic, chaita lluqui maquiman saquishpa, Siriaman ñahuichashpa catircanchic. Tiropi llutarircanchic, chai barco quipicunata chaipi saquina cashcaraicu.
44021004	Chaipi yachachishcacunahuan tuparircanchic chairaicu canchis puncha paicunahuan saquirircanchic. Diospac Samai paicunata rimashcaraicu, Pablota Jerusalenman ama richun nishpa camachinurca;
44021005	chashna cacpipash, semana tucurishcapi paicunata saquishpa, hucanchic rirashcaman catircanchic. Tucuilla, huarmicuna huahuacunantin llacta canchacama ñucanchihuan rinurca. Tiyupi Dios-huan rimarincapac cuncurishca huasha,
44021006	paicunamanta anchurircanchic, barcoman yaicurcanchic, ranti paicunaca huasiman ticranurca.
44021007	Tiromanta Tolemaidaman rircanchic, chashha ñucanchic purinata tucuchircanchic. Huauquicunahuan chaipi tuparishpa, shuc puncha paicunahuan saquirircanchic.
44021008	Cayantiman llucshishpa Cesareaman pactarcanchic; Diospac Shimita yachachishpa puric Felipepac huasiman rircanchic, paica canchispuramanta acllashca mari carca; chai huasipi saquirircanchic.
44021009	Paipac chuscu ushushicuna mana sahuarishca saquirinushcarca, paicunaca profetacuna canurca.
44021010	Chaipi ñucanchic ña unainayata tiyacushcapi Agabo shutiyuc profeta Judeamanta shamushca;
44021011	ñucanchicta ricuncapac pactamurca. Pablopac chunpita japishpa, maqui chaqui huatarishpa, rimarca: —Caitami Diospac Samai riman: Cai chunpipac amuta cashnami Jerusalenpi judiocuna huatanunca, Diosta mana ricsiccunaman paita cununca.
44021012	Chaita uyashpa, ñucanchic chaipi tiyaccunapash Pablota Diosmanta mañarcanchic ama Jerusalenman richun nishpa; ranti Pablo cutipaica: —Yancamanta huacacpi cancunata allichu yachin, shuncuta pantachinayahuanquichichu. Apunchic Jesusraicu mana jillai huascallatachu aparina yuyaita charini, ashtahuan Jerusalenpi huañuchi tucushami.
44021014	Mana saquichipac tucushpa, casula ricurcanchic, rimashpa; —Dios munashca shina tucuchun.
44021015	Allichina punchacuna tucurishca huasha Jerusalenman rircanchic.
44021016	Cesareamanta maican yachachishcacuna ñucanchihuan rinurca Nasonpac huasipi saquicrinacama; paica Chipremanta carca, callarishcamanta yachachishca runa; paipac huasipi saquirircanchic.
44021017	Nucanchic Jerusalenman pactashcapi cushihuan huauquicuna chasquinurca.
44021018	Cayantiman Pablota Santiagopac huasicama ñucanchihuan pusharcanchic, chaipi tucui pushaccamacuna tantarishca canurca.
44021019	Pablo paicunahuan tuparirca, chaipi rimarca tucui paipac maquihuan Dios rurashcata, Diosta mana ricsic ucupi.
44021020	Pai rimashcata uyashpa, Diosta chacchanurca, paitaca rimanurca: —Huauqui, canllata ricunqui chai tucui huaranca judiocuna ininaman llutarishcata, shinapash tucuilla Camachic Quillcata cuscata pactachishpa catic canun
44021021	Cuti canmantapash ansa rimashcata uyanushca: canshi Diosta mana ricsic ucupi causac judiocunata, Moises yachachishcata jichuncapac camachinqui; churicunapac ullu carata pitincapac mana munashpa, rucucunamanta yachaicunata mana pactachina rimashpa. ¿Imata ruracpimi alu tucunca?.
44021022	Shuc tantarinata rurancapac cayacpi alli tucunca yachin, mana unaipichu can shamushcata yachanunca;
44021023	chairaicu ñucanchic rimashcata uyana tucunqui: Nucanchicmanta chuscu runa cushca shimita pactachina canun;
44021024	paicunata canhuan pushai, paicunahuan sasicrinqui, paicuna accha pitirishcamanta cullquita cui; chashnami yachanunca canmata rimashca mana shuti cashcata, ashtahuan chaipimi ricununca canpash camachic quillca rimashcata pactachicushcata.
44021025	Ininapi mushu callarishcacunamanta rimacpi, quillcancami racunchic ñucanchic rimarishcapi yuyarishcata: ama micunuchun huacacunapacta huañuchishca aichacunata, sipishpa huañuchishca aichacunatapash, llutarishpalla causanatapash saquinuchun.
44021026	Chashna Pablo cayantiman, chai runacunata paihuan pushashpa, sasicrirca, Diospac huasiman yaicurca sasina puncha tucurishcamanta camarita ricuchina cashcamantapash rimancapac.
44021027	Canchis puncha pactanca rashcapi, Asiamanta judiocuna, Diospac huasipi paita ricushpa, runacunata cariyachishca huasha, Pablota japishpa,
44021028	caparinurca: —Israelitacuna, ñucanchicta yanapaichic: Cai runami maipipash ñucanchicmanta mana allita rimac, ñucanchic camachic quillcamanta cai allpamantapash mana allita yachachishpa puric can. Chairapash maican Greciamanta runacunatapash cai Diospac huasipi yaicuchishca, pai sumac cashcata huacllichishpa.
44021029	Chaita rimanurca llactapi Efesomanta Trofimo Pablohuan puricushcaraicu; chairaicu Diospac huasiman yaicuchishcami yuyanurca.
44021030	Llactapi tucuilla piñarinurca, achca runa ricuncapac rinurca, Pablota japishpa Diospac huasi canchaman aisashpa shitanurca, puncucunata utcalla quillpashpa.
44021031	Paita huañuchincapac yuyaricushcapi, soldadocunapac apuman tucui Jerusalen llacta runacuna jatarishca shimi pactarca.
44021032	Utcalla soldadocunata paipac apucunantin japishpa callpashpa rirca. Soldadocunata paipac apuntin ricushpa, Pablota huactacushcamanta saquinurca.
44021033	Soldado apu Pabloman mayanyashpa, paita japirca, ishcai jillai huascahuan huatachirca, chai huasha pi cashcata yachancapac, ima rurashcata tapurca;
44021034	ranti runa ucumanta caranlla chican shimita capariranurca. Mana imatapash yachanata ushashpa yapa tulupushcaraicu, soldadocunapac huasiman pushachirca.
44021035	Chacana siquipi pactashcapi, soldadocuna marcashpa pushanurca runacuna yapa piñarishcaraicu;
44021036	chashna cashpa runacuna huashamanta: Huañuchi nishpa caparishpa shamuranurca.
44021037	Ña soldado huasiman yaicuchinca racushcapi soldado aputa Pablo rimarca: —¿Ishcai shimillapash canta rimanata ushanichu? Soldado apu cutiparca: —¿Griego shimita rimanata yachanquichu?
44021038	¿Shinacpi manachari chai cunanlla chuscu huaranca runacunata cariyachishpa chunlla allpaman paicunahuan ric Egiptomanta runachu canqui?
44021039	Pablo cutiparca: —¿Pi, ñuca? Ñucaca Tarsomanta judio runami cani, Ciliciamanta maipipash uyarishca llacta; Diosmanta rimani, cai runacunata ansata rimana munani.
44021040	Chai soldado apu: ari, nirca. Pabloca chacanapi shayaranlla; runacunata maquihuan ricuchirca. Tucuilla chun saquirinurca, chaipi paipac quiquin shimipi paicunata rimarca:
44022001	—Ñucapac yayacuna, huauquicuna, uyapaichic ñuca quishpinamanta rimanca rashcata.
44022002	Paicunapac quiquin shimipi rimacpi uyashpa, ashtahuan yalli munaihuan uyashpa saquirinurca. Pablo rimashpa catirca:
44022003	—Ciliciamanta Tarsopi pacarishca judio runami cani, shinapash cai llactapi huiñashcami cani; Gamaliel yachachishcami cani, ñucanchicpac yayacunapac Camachic Quillca allita pactachinapi yachashpa huiñacmi cani. Diosta ininapi yapa sinchita, cancuna cunan caticushca shinami catic carcani.
44022004	Ñucallata cai mushu ininata chincachina yuyaihuan millarcani, cari huarmicunantin japishpa chunta curralpi satichircani.
44022005	Ñuca chashna cashcamanta ricuyac canunmi pacri yayacunapac apu, rucucuna tantarishcapash. Paicunami Damascomanta huauquicunapacta quillcata cuhuanurca; chaiman rircani chai runacunata tupashpa, Jerusalenman japishpa apamuncapac, chaipi ñacachi tucuncapac.
44022006	Ña Damasco mayanlla cashcapi cuncaimanta, chaupi puncha cashcapi, shuc jatun achic jahua pachamanta shamushpa, ñuca mayanpi llinpiyarca.
44022007	Allpapi urmashpa, shuc shimi cashna rimacushcata uyarcani: "Saulo, Saulo, ¿canchu chashna piñashpa catihuanqui?".
44022008	Ñuca tapurcani: ¿Canca pita canqui, Apunchic? Pai cutipahuarca: "Nucami can pinashpa japinayashca Nazaretmanta Jesus cani".
44022009	Nucahuan riraccuna chai llinpiyashcata ricunurca, ranti mana atipanurca ñucata rimacushcata.
44022010	Ñuca rimarcani: Apunchic, ¿imatami rurana cani? Apunchic cutipahuarca: "Jatarishpa Damascoman rilla, chaipimi tucui can rurana cashcata rimanunca".
44022011	Achic llinpiyashcamanta ñausa cashcaraicu, ñuca mashicuna Damascoman maquimanta aisashpa pushahuanurca.
44022012	Shuc runa Ananias shutiyuc, Camachic Quillca rimashca shina alli shuncuyuc runa, Ilactamanta tucui judiocuna rimashcaraicu, ricuc shamuhuarca;
44022013	ñucaman mayanyashpa, rimahuarca: "Huauqui Saulo, canpac ñaihui cutillata alliyachun". Ñuca chaillapita paita ricuna usharcani.
44022014	Chashnapi pai rimarca: "Ñucanchic rucucunapac Dios pai munashcata canta ricsichinayashca, Cusca Runata ricuchun munashca, paipac shimitapash uyachishca.
44022015	Cunanmanta paipac ricuyacmi canqui tucui runapac ñaupacpi, can uyashcamanta ricushcamantapash.
44022016	Ña cunan ama yanca tiyacuichu; jatari, bautismota chasqui, canpac juchacunata maillai, paipac shutipi mañashpa".
44022017	Jerusalenman ticrashcapi, Dios-huan paipac huasipi rimaricushcapi, shuc nuspaita charircani.
44022018	Chaipi Apunchicta ricurcani, pai ñucata rimahuacurca: "Utcalla Jerusalenmanta ri, mana uyanuncachu can ñucamanta rimashcata".
44022019	Ñuca paita cutiparcani: Apunchic, paicuna yachanun mari tantarina huasicunapi, ñuca canta iniccunata japishpa purishcata, paicunata macachincapac;
44022020	chairapash, canpac ricuyac Estehanpac yahuarta tallichicushcapi, chaipi ñuca carcani, paicuna rurashcahuan cushiyashpa, paicunapac churanata charicurcani.
44022021	Ranti Apunchic rimahuarca: "Ri, ñucami canta caruman cachanca rani, Diosta mana ricsic llactacunaman".
44022022	Chai tucuita rimanacama uyanacurca, ña chai huasha caparinurca: —Ñucanchic ñahuimanta chai runata anchuchi, causancapallapash mana allichu.
44022023	Jahua churanata lliquirishpa, ushpata jahuaman shitashpa capariranucpi,
44022024	soldadocunapac apu huasi ucuman yaicuchirca, paita llipachishpa rimachincapac imaraicuta paimanta chashna caparinacun.
44022025	Ña paicuna macancapac sumacta huatashcapi, chaipi shayacuc soldado aputa tapurca: —Shuc romano runata mana taripashpapash, ¿ushanquichicllachu macancapac?
44022026	Chaita uyashpa, chai soldado apu aputa rimacrirca: —Allita yachashpami imatapash rurana canqui, chai runa romano mari can.
44022027	Jatun apu paipacman rishpa, tapurca: —¿Alli shuti pachachu romano canqui? Pablo cutiparca: —Shutimi.
44022028	Cuti jatun apu rimarca: —Yapalla achca cullquitami romano tucuncapac curcani. Pablo paita cutiparca: —Ranti ñucaca pacarishcamanta charini.
44022029	Macanca racuccuna utcalla anchurinacurca, chai jatun apullata upata mancharirca shuc romano runata jillai huascahuan huatachishcaraicu.
44022030	Cayantiman, imamanta judiocuna chashna juchachiranun nishpa yachanayashpa, cacharirca, pacri yayacunapac apucunatapash tantachichirca, Pablota uraicuchishpa paicunapac ñaupacpi shayachirca,
44023001	Pablo Rucucuna tantarishcaman ricushpa, rimarca: —Huauquicuna, cunancama Diospac ñaupacpi cuscata purishcani.
44023002	Chashnapi, pacri apu Ananias paita yanapaccunahuan shimipi huactancapac cacharca.
44023003	Pablo chaipi rimarca: —¡Yanca yuracyachishcalla aya jutcu, Diosmi canta huactanca! ¿Camachic quillca rimashca shina taripancapac caipi tiyacushca, huactachina allichu, ñucata macashcahuan Camachic Quillcata huacllichicunqui mari?
44023004	Chaipi tiyaccuna rimanurca: —¿Canchu Diospac pacri aputa pinanqui?
44023005	Pablo cutiparca: —Huauquicuna, mana yacharcanichu pai pacri apu cashcata. Ari, shutimi, Quillca chashna riman: "Ama piñashca shimihuan canpac aputa rimanquichu".
44023006	Pablo yacharca chaupi runa saduceocuna, chaishuc chaupi runa fariseocuna cashcata, chairaicu tucui Tantarishca ucupi caparirca: —Fariseocunapac churi cashpa, fariseomi cani, cancuna taripahuacunquichicmi huañushcamanta causarinata chapashcaraicu.
44023007	Pai chashna rimashca shinalla piñanacui tiyarca fariseocuna saduceocunahuan; chairaicu tantarishcacuna ishcaipi raquirinurca.
44023008	(Saduceocuna rimanun huañushcamanta causarina illanmi nishpa, angelcunapash illanmi, ima samaipash mana tiyanchu nishpa rimanun, ranti fariseocunaca tucui chaicuna tiyanmi nishpa rimanun).
44023009	Tucuilla capariranurca, fariseocunamanta maican Quillca yachachiccuna shayarishpa, piñarishcahuan rimanurca: —Mana ima juchatapash cai runapi tupanchic. Shinacpi, ¿alli shuti pachachu shuc angel, shuc aya imapash paita rimashcata yachanquichic?
44023010	Paicuna piñarishca ashtahuan yalli sinchi tucurca. Pablo piti piti rai tucunata manchashpa, soldado apu soldadocunata cayachirca, chaimanta surcushpa pucaraman pushancapac.
44023011	Cayantin tutapi Apunchic Pablota ricurishpa, rimarca: —Sinchicui. Can Jerusalenpi ñucaraicu rimashca shina, chashnallatami Romapipash rimana canqui.
44023012	Ña pacarishcapi, maican judiocuna shuc tantarinata charinurca, chaipi sumacta yuyarishcahuan shimita curinurca ama micuncapac, ama upiancapac Pablota huañuchinacama.
44023013	Shimita curiccuna chuscu chunca yalli canurca.
44023014	Pacri apucunapacman rishpa rimacrinurca: —Sumacta yuyarishcahuan shimita curishcanchic ama imallapash micuncapac Pablota huañuchinacama.
44023015	Cunanca cancuna soldado Aputa mañaichic cancunapacman pushamuchun pai rurashcamanta ashtahuan allimanta ricuncapac nishpa, ñucanchicta caipi chapacushunmi chaira mana pactashcallapita huañuchincapac.
44023016	Ranti Pablopac panimanta huahua, paicuna huañuchina munacushcata yacharca; soldado huasiman rirca, paicuna yaicuchicpi, paica Pablota rimacrirca.
44023017	Pablo shuc soldado aputa cayashpa nirca: —Cai huanprata canpac jatun apupacman pushashpa ri, paita shuc shimita rimanayan.
44023018	Chai soldado apu jatun apupacman pusharca, chaipi rimarca: —Japishca Pablo cayahuarca, canpacman cai huanprata pushamuchun nishpa mañahuarca, cantashi shuc shimita rimanayan.
44023019	Chai jatun apu maquimanta japishpa, chicanman pushashpa, tapurca: —¿Shutichu rimanata charinqui? ¿Imata can?
44023020	Chai huanpra rimarca: —Judiocuna rimarinushca canta caya puncha mañashpa apu tantanacuiman Pablota pushachincapac, pai rurashcamanta ashtahuan allimanta ricuncapac nishpa.
44023021	Chaitaca ama uyanquichu, paicunaca miticushpami chapanca ranun paicunamanta chuscu chunca yalli runa tupu, Pablota huañuchinacama mana micuna, mana upiana sumacta yuyarishpa shimita curishcaraicu. Ñami chaparanun, canpa shimillami pishin.
44023022	Jatun apu chai huanprata caita mincashpa cacharca: —Ama pitapash rimanquichu chaimanta ñucaman rimashcata.
44023023	Chai huasha ishcai soldado apucunata cayashpa nirca: —Tuta iscun pachapi, ishcai patsac soldadocunata allichishcata charina canquichic Cesareaman rincapac, chaipipash rina canun sucta chunca soldado caballohuan, ishcai patsac tucsinahuan.
44023024	Pablo rincapacpash caballota allichina canquichic, chashna huainaru Felixpacman pactachina canquichic.
44023025	Shuc quillcatapash cashna shimicunahuan cacharca: "Claudio Lisias huainaru Felixpac ñaupacpi cai quillcahuan pactan,
44023026	caita rimancapac:
44023027	Judiocuna cai runata japinushcarca, ña huañuchinca ranurca; romano cashcata yachashpa, soldadocunahuan rishpa paicunamanta quishpichircani.
44023028	Imamanta juchachicushcata yachanayashpa, paipac apu tantanacuiman pusharcani;
44023029	chaipi yacharcani paicunapac Camachic Quillcamanta juchachiranushcarca, ranti paipac juchaca mana huañuchincapac, japishpa quillpancapac tupu mana jatunchu carca.
44023030	Chai huasha yacharcani judiocuna cai runata huañuchincapac chapacushcata, chairaicu canman cachacuni, paita juchachicuccunatapash rimarcani paicuna rimana cashcata canpac ñaupacpi rimanuchun".
44023031	Soldadocuna, rimashcata pactachishpa, Pablota japishpa, Antipatrisman tuta pushanurca;
44023032	cayantiman pucaraman ticranurca, ranti caballopi puriccuna paihuan rinurca.
44023033	Cesareaman pactanurca, quillcata huainaruman cunurca Pablotapash ricsichinurca.
44023034	Quillcata ricushca huasha maican suyumanta cashcata tapurca; Ciliciamanta cashcata yachashpa,
44023035	paita rimarca: —Canta juchachiccamacuna shamucpi canta uyashami. Herodespac huasipi ricui tucushca tiyancapac cachai tucurca.
44024001	Pichca puncha huasha pacri apu Ananias, maican rucucuna, shuc quillca runa, Tertulo shutiyuc, Cesareaman rinurca; chaipi Pablota juchachinurca.
44024002	Pablota cayachishca huasha, Tertulo cai shimicunahuan Pablota juchachirca: —Canraicu alli causaita charinchic,
44024003	tucui can cai llactamanta alli rashcacunaraicu pacrachunchicmi huiñaipac, jatun huainaru Felix.
44024004	Ranti mana yapalla quillachinata munashpa, canta mañanimi ñucanchicta uyancapac, canpac yachai, llaquishca shuncuhuan.
44024005	Tupashcanchicmi cai mana alli runa tucui cai pachapi tiyac judiopura macanacuchicushcata, chairapash paica nazareno nishca runacunata pushaccama can;
44024006	allita rimacpi, pai Diospac huasita huacllichincapac racushcapi japircanchic.
44024007	-
44024008	Canllata tapushpa camai, chaimi nucanchic shuti rimacushcata yachanqui.
44024009	Judiocuna chai shimi shutimi nishpa yanapanurca.
44024010	Huainaru ricuchishcahuan rimai nishcapi Pablo rimarca: —Unaimanta can allita taripashpa caticushcata yachashpa cai ñucanchic llactapi, ñuca quishpinamanta canta rimanayani.
44024011	Canllata shuti cashcata yachana ushanqui ima shina chunca ishcai puncha can ña cai Jerusalenman ñuca shamushca;
44024012	mana Diospac huasipi, mai llactapi, mai tantarina huasipi imapash mana ricuhuanacushcachu pihuanpash piñanacushpa shayashcata, runacunata cariyachicushcata imapash;
44024013	chairaicu, ñucata juchachicushcamanta canpac ñaupacpi mana ricuyaccuna tucuna ushanun.
44024014	Caita shuti canpac ñaupacpi, ari nishpa rimani: ñuca rucucunapac Diosta caticunimi cai ñanpita rishpa, paicuna chican yuyaita catic rimahuanun, camachic quillcapi, profetacuna rimashcata allipacha inishpa.
44024015	Paicuna chapacushca shinallata, ñucapash Diosmanta chapacuni, shuc puncha allicuna, manallicuna huañushcamanta causarinata.
44024016	Chairaicullata, Diospac ñaupacpi, runacunapc ñaupacpi chuya shuncuyuc causaipi causacuni.
44024017	Achca huata huasha diosmantata camaritapash cai ñuca llactaman apamurcani.
44024018	Chaita racushcapi Diospac huasipi tupahuanurca, camachic quillcapi rimashca shina chuya shuncuyuc tucushca carcani, chaipi mana ima runa piñarishpa jatarishca tiyarcachu.
44024019	Ranti Asiamanta maican judiocunami, cunan caipi canpac ñaupacpi juchachincapac shamuna canurca, imallapash juchachinata charishca cashpa.
44024020	Mana cacpi, caicunallata rimanuchun ima juchatami tupanurca ñuca apu tantanacui ñaupacpi taripai tucushcapi;
44024021	cai shimicunata shuti rimarcanimi: "Caipi taripahuanquichicmi huañushcamanta causarinaraicu".
44024022	Felix, chai mushu ñanpimanta alli yachashca cashpa, cai shimicunata rimashpa cacharca: —Soldado apu Lisias shamucpimi allipacha caimanta ricushun,
44024023	Pablota ricuncapac capitanta rimarca, chashnapash ama yapalla huashapi catirayashpa, paipac aillucuna ricuna munacpi ricunuchunlla.
44024024	Huasha punchacunaman Felix paipac huarmi Drusilantin shamurca, pai judio huarmi carca; Pablota cayachishpa Jesus Mesiaspi ininamanta rimachirca.
44024025	Ranti Pablo cusca causanamanta, aicha manashcacunamanta yallinata, huasha taripai tucunamanta rimashcata uyashpa, Felix mancharishpa rimarca: —Cunanshituca rilla. Shuc cuti cayashcanqui chari.
44024026	Felix chasnapash Pablomanta cullquita chaparca, chairaicu caran cuti paihuan rimarincapac cayachinurca.
44024027	Ishcai huata huashapi Porcio Festo Felix rantimanta shamurca; paica judiocunahuan alli saquirinata mimashpa, Pablota quillpashpa saquirca.
44025001	Cesareaman pactashcamanta quimsa puncha huasha, Festo Jerusalenman rirca.
44025002	Chaipi pacriyaya apucuna judio apucunapash Pablota juchachishpa rimancapac callarinurca.
44025003	Mana alli yuyaihuan shuc yanapaita shina Festota mañanurca, Pablota Jerusalenman pushancapac; chaicama paicunaca ñanpillapi huañuchishun yuyaranurca.
44025004	Ranti Festo Pabloca Cesareapimi quillparan nishpa paicunata cutiparca, paillatami utcalla Jerusalenmanta risha nuca. Chairapash rimarca:
44025005	—Cancunamanta apucuna ñucahuan rishun, chai runa imatapash juchallishca cacpi, paita juchachina ushanquichic.
44025006	Festo Jerusalenpi pusac punchachu, chunca punchachu saquirirca imachari, chai huasha Cesareaman rirca, Cayantiman taripana tiyarinapi tiyarishpa, Pablota cayachirca.
44025007	Pai shamushcata ricushpa, Jerusalenmanta shamushca Judiocuna paipacpi juntarishpa jatun juchallishcacunahuan juchachinurca, shinapash ricuyaccunata mana ricuchina ushanurca.
44025008	Pablo tucui paicuna rimashcamanta cashna rimashpa quishpicurca: —Judiocunapac Camachic quillcapi rimashcamanta mana pishiyashcanichu, Diospac huasita mana huacllichishcanichu, Romamanta Incatapash mana piñashcanichu.
44025009	Chashnapi Festo, judiocunahuan mashi tucunayashpa, Pablota tapurca: —Jerusalenman rishpa, ¿chaipi ñuca ñaupacpi taripai tucunata munanquichu?
44025010	Pablo cutiparca: —Incapac taripana ñaupacpimi cani, caipimi taripai tucuna cani. Mana imapipash judiocunata huacllichishcanichu, canllata pacta yachanqui.
44025011	Chairaicu, huañuchi tucuna tuputa juchallishca cashpa, ari, huañushami. Ranti paicuna rimashcamanta mana ricuyaccunata charishpa, mana pipash paicuna maquipi saquinata charihuanchu. Incapacman rina munani.
44025012	Festo paihuan taripaccunata tapushca huasha, cutiparca: —¿Incapacman rina mañanqui? Incapacmanmi rinqui.
44025013	Ansa puncha huashacunapi Cesareaman apu Agripa nishca paipac pani Berenicentin Festohuan tuparincapac pactanurca,
44025014	unainayata chaipi tiyashcaraicu, apu Festoman Pablomanta rimarca cai shimicunahuan: —Caipi shuc runata charinchic, Felix japishpa quillpashcata.
44025015	Ñuca Jerusalenman pactashcapi pacri apucuna rucucunantin pai juchallishcacunata ricsichihuanurca, mañahuanurca paita huañuchincapac.
44025016	Ñuca paicunata rimarcani ima shina romanocuna mana yancamanta shuc runata juchachiccunapac maquipi saquina yachashcata; ñaupac juchayuc runa juchachiccunahuan ñahuipurarina tiyana can, chashnami juchachishca runa quishpina shimicunata rimana: ushan.
44025017	Paicuna ñucahuan shamunurca, chaillapita taripancapac tiyarishpa, chai runata, cayachircani.
44025018	Ranti juchachiccuna paita mana ñuca yuyashca shina jatun juchacunahuan juchachinurca;
44025019	allita, ricucpi, paicuna ininamanta, shuc ña huañushca Jesusmanta Pablo causanmi riman; chaimantami. chicanyan paicuna yuyai.
44025020	Mana imatapash ruraipac tucushpa, paita tapurcani Jerusalenman rinayanman imachari, chaipi tucuncapac.
44025021	Ranti Pablo Incapacpi taripai tucunata mañarca. Chairaicu quillpashpa charinuchun mañarcani Incapacman cachanacama.
44025022	Agripa Festota rimarca: —Ñucapash uyanayaiman chai runata, Festo rimarca: —Caya paita uyanqui.
44025023	Cayantin puncha tucuilla yapa ricuchishcahuan Agripa Berenicentin taripana huasiman pactanurca, paicunahuan soldado apucuna llactamanta apucunapash rinurca. Festo Pablota cayachishpa
44025024	rimarca: —Apu Agripa tucui caipi tiyaccunantin, caipi cai runata ricunquichic; pairaicu tucui judio runacuna ñucata ricuncapac shamuhuanushca, caipi nicpi Jerusalenpipash, caparishcahuan maftahuanushca ama ashtahuan shuc puncha causachun.
44025025	Ñuca atipashcani, paita huañuchicta mana juchallishcachu; ranti, paillata Incapacman rinata mañashcaraicu, chaiman taripai tucuncapac cachanata yuyarishcani.
44025026	Chashna cacpipash, ¿imata nishpa chari Incaman paimanta quillcasha? Chairaicu tucui cancunata ricsichini, canta ashtahuan, apu Agripa, paita tapupaichi; chashnami imallapash quillcanata ushasha.
44025027	Ñuca yuyani yapa yuyai illac shinami tucusha, cashna japishca runata mana quillcapi pai juchallishcacunata churashpa cachashpa.
44026001	Agripa Pablota rimarca: —Canpac shimihuan canraicu rimai. Chashnapi Pablo, paipac maquita chutachishpa, cashna callarirca:
44026002	—Vapa cushiyani cunan canpac ñaupacpi, apu Agripa, ñucaraicullata quishpina shimita rimana ushashpa, chai tucui judiocuna ñucata rimashcamanta; ashtahuan cushiyani cunan canpac naupacpi ñucamahta rimana ushashcaraicu,
44026003	can yapa ricsic canqui manachu paipac yachaicunata. Chairaicu canta mañani allita atipashcahuan uyahuai nishpa.
44026004	Tucui judiocuna ricsinun ñuca causai ima shina maltamanta cashcata, ima shina ñucapac aillu ucupi cai Jerusalenllapita causarcani.
44026005	Paicunallatami rimanunca, munashpaca, huiñaipac ricsihuanacun; quiquin fariseo shina causashcani; chai ñanpita catina sinchi mari can.
44026006	Cunan caipi taripai tucucuni Dios ñucanchic rucucunata cushca shimita chapacushcaraicu.
44026007	Chai cushca shimita ñucanchic chunca ishcai aillucuna shuncuhuan Diosta tuta punchantin muchashpa pactana munanchic. Caita chapashcaraicumi, apulla, judiocuna juchachihuanun.
44026008	Ranti, ¿ima shina chari canquichic huañushcacunata Dios causachina ushashcata mana inina munaccuna?
44026009	Cunan ricuichic ñucallata callarishcapi yuyarcanimi tucui ushaicunahuan Nazaretmanta Jesusta yallinami nishpa;
44026010	chashna Jerusalenpi rurarcani: Pacu apucuna cachashcahuan, achca iniccunata japishpa quillpachircani, paicunata huañuchicushcapi yapa cushiyashcahuan ricurcani
44026011	Achca cuti, tucui tantarina huasicunapi pactashpa, achca ñacarinacunata churashpa, paicuna ininamanta chicanyachinata munarcani; yapalla pinari tiyahuacpi, caru llactacunapipash paicunata piñashpa japincapac rircani
44026012	Chashnapi, Damascoman rirashca ñanpipi, pacri apucuna cachashcahuan,
44026013	chaupi punchapi, jatun apulla, shuc achic jahua pachamanta shamushcata ricurcani, intimanta yalli llinpic, tucui ñucahuan riraccunantin japi tucurcanchic.
44026014	Tucuilla allpaman urmarcanchic; ñucaca hebreo shimipi rimashcata uyarcani: "Saulo, Saulo, ¿piñarishcachu cahuanqui? Yancamanta nanarinqui tucsinapi jaitashpa".
44026015	Ñuca cutiparcani: ¿Ricsinichu canta, Apunchic? Apunchicca rimarca: "Can piñashpa japinayashca Jesusmi cani.
44026016	Cunan jatarishpa allita atipanqui: Canta ricurimushcani canta acllancapac, ñucapac ricuyac tucuncapac caipi ricushcamanta, huasha canta ricuchinca rashcamantapash.
44026017	Canta tucuimanta quishpichishcanquimi, canpac aillucunamanta nicpi, Diosta mana ricsiccunamanta nicpi, paicunapacman canta cachani,
44026018	Canmi paicunapac ñahuita pascachinqui, chashnami tutapi causashcamanta achicta ricununca, supai japishcamanta Diosman ticranunca; chaimi, ñucapi inishpa juchacunamanta pichai tucuna Dios paipac churicunapacta huacaichicushcatapash tupanquichic".
44026019	Chai punchamanta, apu Agripa, cai jahua pachamanta nuspaita cuscatami catishcani.
44026020	Chairaicu, ñaupa Damascomanta runacunata, chai huashalla Jerusalenmantacunata tucui Judea llactamantacunatapash Diosta mana ricsiccunantin, rimashcani nanarishpa Diosman ticranuchun, huasha llaquicuna tiyana cacpipash ñaupacman catina yuyaihuan.
44026021	Chairaicumi judiocuna Diospac huasipi japishpa huañuchinata munahuanurca.
44026022	Ranti, Diospac yanapaihuanmi chaira causacuni rucucunata huahuacunatapash yachachina ushancapac. Mana imatapash yapachinichu profetacuna Moisespash tucunca rashcamanta rimashcata:
44026023	Mesias huañuna cashcata, pai huañushcacunamanta ñaupac causarishpa, achicta ricsichina cashcata paipa llactamanta runacunata Diosta mana ricsiccunatapash.
44026024	Pablo chaicama pai quishpina shimita rimashcapi, Festo caparishcahuan rimarca: —¿Nuspachu canqui, Pabio? ¡Can yapa yachashcahuan yuyai illac saquiricunqui!
44026025	Pablo cutiparca: —Mana nuspachu cani, apu Festo; ñuca: shimica cusca, shutimi can. Tucui caicunamanta apu allitami yachan, chairaicumi mana manchashcahuan rimacuni. Ñuca pacta yachani pai caicunamanta imacamapash yachashcata, mana chican cuchupi tucushcaraicu.
44026027	Apu Agripa, ¿profetacuna rimashcata ininquichu? Ñuca can inic cashcata ricsini.
44026028	Agripa paita cutiparca: —Ashtallata rimanquiman carca, cristiano imachari tucuiman.
44026029	Pablo paita rimarca: —Ansaraicu, achcaraicu imapash, Dios munanman, mana canlla tucui caipi uyacuccunantin, ñuca shina tucunquichiman...; jillai huascata chicanman saquishun.
44026030	Ña chashnapi apu jatarirca, huainaru, Berenice, tucui chaipi tantarishcacunantin;
44026031	ña anchuricushpa paicunapura cashna rimarishpa rinurca: —Cai runa huañuchi tucuncapac, quillpara charincapac imapash mana juchallishcachu.
44026032	Agripa Festota rimarca: —Mana Incapacman rinata mañashcapi, cacharinalla carca.
44027001	Italiaman ña rina rimashcapi, shuc soldado apu maquipi saquinurca Pablota chaishuc japishcacunantin; chai soldado apu Augusta shutiyuc legion nishcamanta carca, paipac shuti carcami Julio.
44027002	Adramitiomanta barcopi yaicurcanchic, Asia ñucñu yacu patata purincapac. Ñucanchihuan Aristarco rirarca, Tesalonica llactamanta macedonio runa.
44027003	Cayantin puncha Sidonman pactarcanchic; Julio yapa alli shuncuyuc cashpa, Pablota paipac aillucunata ricuncapac, paicunapacpi yanapai tucuncapac nishpa saquircalla.
44027004	Chaimanta llucshiccuna Chipre huasha shinalla rircanchic, huaira yapa huashaman tancanaraicu,
44027005	chaimanta Ciliciapac, Panfiliapac ñucñu yacucunata chinpashpa, Liciamanta Miraman pactarcanchic.
44027006	Chaipi chai soldado apu shuc Alejandriamanta barcota tuparca Italiaman riracta, chaiman sicachi tucurcanchic.
44027007	Achca punchacuna allimanta purircanchic, racushcapi Gnido mayanman pactarcanchic. Huaira mana alliman tancacpi Creta huasha shinalla rishpa catucanchic, Salmon allpa mucu uranillata.
44027008	Racushcapi, islata muyuchishpa Buenos Puertos nishcaman pactarcanchic, Lasea llacta mayanpi.
44027009	Yapalla unayarcanchic, sasina raimipash ña tucurishcarca; chairaicu yacuta purina manchaipac tuncucapac callarirca.
44027010	Chashnapi Pablo paicunata rimarca: —Mashicuna, yacuta rishpa catina yapa manchaipac tucunca rashcata ricuni; huacllishpapash mana quipicunalla, barcolla imapash huacllinuncachu, ñucanchic quiquin jinumi huanushun.
44027011	Ranti chai soldado apu Pablo rimashcata mana uyashpa, barcota pushaccamata ashtahuan yapa uyarca.
44027012	Chairapash, chai puncu tamia pachapi mana alli cacpi, tucuilla chaimanta anchurincapac rimanurca, Fenixman pacta usharincami nishpa, Africahuan, Corohuan ñahuipura saquirin; chaipi tamia pachapi quishpinata munanurca.
44027013	Uraimanta huaira jatarishcata ricushpa, paicuna munashcaman pactashunmi yuyanurca; barcota huatashcamanta llushpichishpa, Creta mayan shinalla rinacurca.
44027014	Ranti, manapash unaipi urcumanta sinchi huaira jatarirca, paicuna euroaquilon nishca.
44027015	Chai barco, huaira tancashca, mana sinchicuna ushacpi, huaira apashcaman shitai tucurcanchic.
44027016	Cauda shutiyuc isla huashaman tucushcapi, racushcapi shuc uchilla canuata japina usharcanchic.
44027017	Ña jahuaman sicachishca huasha, huascacunahuan canuata huatashpa sinchicuchinurca; Sirte tsatsapi ama chaquirincapac, shuc huanpuric caspita cacharircanchic. Chashna, huaira apashcaman shitai tucurcanchic,
44027018	Cayantiman, chaira huaira yapa sinchi cashcaraicu, chaupi quipicunata yacuman jichuna tucunurca.
44027019	Ña quimsa niqui punchapi paicuna quiquin maquihuan barcomanta jatun llachapacuna huascacunantin yacuman jichunurca.
44027020	Mashna puncha chari ña inti cuillurcunapash mana ricurinurca, chai huairapash mana shayarishcaraicu ña quishpina yuyai mana tiyarcachu.
44027021	Unai ña mana micuc causarcanchic. Chashnapi Pablo tucuipac ñaupacpi shayarishpa rimarca: —Mashicuna, ñucata uyashpa Cretamanta mana llucshishcapi, mana cashna llaqui mana imapash chincarina tiyana carca.
44027022	Shinapash, cunan cancunata rimani sinchicuichic nishpa; runaca mana huañunquichichu, barcollami chincarinca.
44027023	Rimanimi, cai tuta Dios ricurihuashcaraicu, paipacmi cani ñuca, paitapash yanapani,
44027024	caita rimahuarca: "Pablo, ama manchaichu, Incapac ñaupacman pactanquimi, ñuca canraicu tucui canhuan riraccunata huanunamanta quishpichinimi".
44027025	Chairaicu, sinchicuichic mashicuna; Dios rimashcata yapa uyani, pai rimashca shinami tucunca.
44027026	Shinapash shuc islapimi chaquirishun.
44027027	Chunca chuscu niqui tuta pactashcapi, Adriatico ñucñu cuchaman aisai tucushpa rirashcapi, chaupi tuta pactashcapi, barcota pushaccamacuna allpa mayanma rirashcata yachanurca.
44027028	Paicuna yacupi tupushpa camacpi quimsa chunca canchis metro cucha carca; ashtanipi cuti tupucpi ishcai chunca canchis carca.
44027029	Rumihuan imapash tacarinata manchashpa chuscu jillai sillucunata siquimanta yacuman shitanurca, chai huasha utcallapash pacarichun nishpa chapanurca.
44027030	Marinerocuna barcomanta miticunayashpa, shuc uchilla canuata huascacunata suniyachincapac nishpa uraicuchincapac callaricushcapi, Pablo barco capitanta soldadocunantin rimarca:
44027031	—Chaicuna mana barcopi saquiricpi, cancuna mana quishpinata ushanquichichu.
44027032	Chashnapi soidadocuna, chai uchilla canuata japirac huascacunata pitishpa urmachinurca.
44027033	Pacarincapac chapacushcapi, Pablo tucuicunata rimarca: —Ña chunca chuscu puncha mana imatapash micushpa, chapashpalla causacunquichic.
44027034	Causana munashpa, micuichiclla; mana pimantapash shuc acchallapash yanca urmashpa chincarincachu.
44027035	Chaita rimashca huasha, shuc tantata japishpa, tucuipac ñaupacpi Diosta pacrachushpa paquishpa micuncapac callarirca.
44027036	Tucuilla cariyashpa, paicunapash micunacurca.
44027037	Tucuipura ishcai patsac canchis chunca sucta runa carcanchic chai barcopi tiyaccuna.
44027038	Sacsacta micushca huasha, barcota ansata pancallachinurca, trigota ñucñu yacuman jichushpa.
44027039	Punchayashcapi, mana ricsinata ushanurca chai allpata; ranti shuc tsatsayuc tuyacata ricunurca, chaillapi imashnapash barcota chaquichincapac tucuilla yuyarinurca.
44027040	Jillai sillucunata yacupi cacharinurca; timonmanta huascacunatapash llushpichinurca; siquimanta jatun llachapata jahuapi huarcuchishpa, huaira tancashca allimanta tsatsaman mayanyanurca.
44027041	Ranti shuc jahuallapi tacarishpa, chaillapi chaquirinurca; barcopac punta saticta tucushpa, tanlla chaipi chaquirirca, ranti paipac siquica bacu huactashcahuan chausicurca.
44027042	Chashna tucucpi, japishcacunata huañuchincapac soldadocuna yuyarinurca ama pipash huaitashpa quishpichun nishpa.
44027043	Ranti soldado apu mana munarca, Pablota quishpichinaraicu; ashtahuan huaitana yachaccunata mayanman flaupac paicunata huaitachirca.
44027044	Chaishuccunaca caspi pala, imapipash yanaparishpa, allpaman llucshinuchun rimarca. Chashna rurashpa, tucuilla mana imapash tucushca, allicuna allpaman pactarcanchic.
44028001	Huañuimanta quishpishca huasha, ña yachai tiyarca chai isla Malta cashcata.
44028002	Chaipi tiyac runacuna mana maipipash ricushca alli shuncuhuan ñucanchicta chasquinurca. Achca ninata japishpa, chaiman cayai tucurcanchic, yapa tamia, chiri tiyashcaraicu.
44028003	Pablo caspi pallcacunata japishpa ninaman shitacushcapi nina rupaihuan shuc machacui llucshispa, Pablopac maquipi pilluricrirca.
44028004	Chaimanta runacuna, maquimanta machacui huarcuracpi ricushpa, paicunapura rimarinurca: —Cai runa huañuchic mari canca; ñucñu yacumanta quishpicpipash, ranti Dios mana munan ashtahuan causancapac.
44028005	Pablo maquita chausirishpa machacuita ninaman shitarca, mana imapash tucurcachu.
44028006	Chaishuccunaca punquishpa, cuncaimanta huañushca imapash urmancami nishpa chaparanurca; unainayata chapashca huasha, mana imapash tucucpi ricushpa, chaipi ranti shuc diosmi can nishpa rimancapac callarinurca.
44028007	Publio shutiyuc runa, chaimanta apu, chai mayanllapi paipac huasita charirca. Paica ñucanchicta chasquishpa quimsa puncha paihuan charirca.
44028008	Chai punchacuna jinu paipac yaya jatun uncui quichatapash charishpa, puñunapi siricurca. Pablo ricucrirca; pairaicu Diosta mañashpa, maquicunata paipac jahuapi churacpi alliyarca.
44028009	Chashnata ricushcaraicu, islapi tiyac shuc uncuccuna paipacman shamushpa alliyachi tucunurca.
44028010	Yapa llaqui tucurcanchic, ña ñucanchic rina pactarishcapi tucui ñucanchic mutsushcata cui tucuicanchic.
44028011	Quimsa quilla huashapi, chai isiapi tamia pachata quishpic barcopi yaicushpa rircanchic. Alejandriamanta carca; Castorpac Poluxpac huacacunata puntapi apai cacharca.
44028012	Siracusaman pactashpa, chaipi quimsa puncha saquirircanchic;
44028013	chaimanta, allpa mayan shinallata rishpa Regioman pactarcanchic. Cayantiman uraimanta huairamurca, chashna Pozuelosman ishcai punchallapi pactarcanchic;
44028014	chaipi huauquicunata tuparcanchic. Chaipi shuc semana tuputa saquichi tucurcanchic; chaimanta shuti Romaman pactarcanchic.
44028015	Romamanta huauquicuna, ñucanchic pactashcata yachashpa, Apio pacllaman Quimsa Huasi nishca pacllaman ricuc shamunurca. Pablo paicunata ricushpa Diosta pacrachushpa, cuti sinchicurirca.
44028016	Romapi pactashcapi, Pablota quiquin huasipi causancapac saquinurca, shuc paita ricuccama soldadohuan.
44028017	Quimsa puncha huasha, Pablo judio apucunata cayachirca. Paicuna tantarishcapi rimarca: —Huauquicuna, ñuca mana imata aillucunata rashcallapita, rucucuna yachachishcata mana pantachicucllapita, Jerusalenpi japi tucushpa romanocuna maquipi saquihuanurca.
44028018	Pai-cuna tapushca huasha, cacharinata munahuanurca, huañuchina tupu juchata mana juchallishcaraicu.
44028019	Ranti judiocuna mana munashcaraicu, Incapacpi taripai tucunata mañarcani, mana ansapash ñuca llactamanta runacunata juchachina yuyaihuan.
44028020	Cairaicumi cancunata cayarcani, cancunahuan rimarinata munashpa; allita rimacpica, Israel chapashcata ñucapash chapashcaraicumi cai jillai huascacunata aparani.
44028021	Paicuna cutipanurca: —Ñucanchic mana japishcanchichu Judeamanta canmanta rimashpa quillcamushcata, mana ima huauquipash caiman pactamushcachu canmanta mana alli rimashca shimihuan.
44028022	Imashna cacpipash, allimi canca canpac shimimanta jinu can yuyashcata uyana; yachanchic mari ima shina can yachachishca tucui pachapi mana allihuan chasqui tucushcata.
44028023	Tucui paicuna shuc puncha tantarincapac saquirinurca; pactashcapi ashtahuan achcanaya paipac huasiman ricuc shamunurca. Pai rimashcapi uyachirca Diospac Pachamanta; Jesusmantapash inichinayarca Moisespac camachic quillcata profetacunatapash yuyachishpa. Chashna tutamanta callarishpa tutacama rimarinurca.
44028024	Maicancuna pai rimashcata uyanurca, shuccunaca mana.
44028025	Pablo chai shimicunata rimacpi, judiocuna ña rinacurca, paicunapura sinchita rimanacushpa; chashnapi Pablo cai puchucai shimihuan paicunata rimashpa cacharca: —Alli shutipachami Diospac Samai ñucanchic yayacunata profeta Isaiaspac shimihuan rimashca:
44028026	"Chai runacunaman rishpa rimacri: Mashna uyashpapash mana atipanquichichu, mashna ricushpapash mana ricunquichichu,
44028027	paicunapac yuyai quillparishca cashcaraicu. Uyancapac sinchimi canun, ñahuita quillpanushcami ñahuihan ama ricuncapac, rinrihuan ama uyancapac, yuyaihuanpash ama atipancapac, ama Diosman ticrashpa ñucapacpi janpi tucuncapac".
44028028	Chairaicu uyapaichic, cai Diospac quishpina Diosta mana ricsiccunacpamanmi cachanca racunchic: paicuna shuti uyanuncami.
44028030	Pablo chaipi ishcai huata pai llancashcahuan causarca, tucui paipacman pactaccunata chasquishpa, manapi quillachishca.
44028031	Diospac pachamanta yachachic carca, Jesus Mesiasmantapash mana manchashpa yachachicurca.
45001001	Pablo, Jesus Mesiaspac runa, Dios cayashcaraicu apostol tucushca, Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachih-capac acllashca.
45001002	-
45001004	Cai Cushi Shimi cui ucunca rashcata profetacuna rimanushcarca, Dios quillcashca Shimipi; paipac Churimanta riman, runapi rimashpa yuyacpi, Davidpac aillumanta pacarirca; ranti, huañushcacunamanta causarishcapi Jatun Ushayuc Diospac Churi tucurca, Diospac Samai nurashcaraicu.
45001005	Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu, apostol tucuna cuyaita chasquircani, tucui llactacunapi paipac shutiraicu inina tiyachun nishpa.
45001006	Diosta mana ricsiccuna ucuman cachamuhuashca, cancunapash chai ucumantallata canquichic,
45001007	Romantacuna; paicuna Jesus cayashca mari canun, Dios llaquishcacuna, cusca shuncuyuc tucuncapac cayashcacuna. Diospac cuyaita ganas causaitapash ñucanchic Yayamanta, Apunchic Cristo Jesuspac Yayamantapash charichic.
45001008	Tucuimanta ñaupac ñuca Diosta pacrachuni, Jesus Mesiaspac shutipi, tucui cancaraicu, tucui cai pactiapi cancuna inishcamanta yapa rimai tiyashcaraicu.
45001009	Dios-huan rimarishcapi cancunamanta yuyarihi; chaimahta Diosllata yachan, paitami muchani tucui shuncuhuan paipac Churipac Cushi Shimita rimashpa.
45001010	Tucui pachapi mañani cachahuachun cancunata ricucrincapac, pai chashna munacpi.
45001011	Yapa cancunata ricunayahuan, shuc Diospac Samaipac cuyaillapash cancuna sinchicuncapac chinpachiman.
45001012	Allita yuyacpi, cancuna ñucapash cariyanca ranchic tucuilla inishcata chaipuralla charishpa.
45001013	Cancunatami rimani, huauquicuna, achca cuti cancunapacman rinata yuyarishcani, ranti cunancama mana ushashcanichu.
45001014	Ñuca yuyaipi, Diosta mana ricsicunamanta allicunata pallashca shina, chashnallatami cancunamantapash japinata munarcani. Griegocunata, chican runacunata, quillcayuc "mana quillcayuc runacunatapash yanapana yuyaitami charini.
45001015	Chairaicumi cancuna Romamanta runacunaman-pash Diospac Cushi Shimita cusha nishpa yapa yuyarini.
45001016	Ñucata mana manchanayahuanchu cai Cushi Shimita rimaricapac; pai canmi paita iniccunata quishpichina Diospac ushai, tucuimanta ñaupac judiocunata, chai huasha griegocunatapash.
45001017	Cai Cushi Shimi ricsichicun ima shina Dios runacunata chuya shuncuyuc rurashcata inishcaraiculla, Dios quillcashca Shimipi rimashca shina: Chuya shuncuyuc runa ininamanta causanca.
45001018	Chashnallata jahua pachamanta ricsichicun ima shina Dios mana alli ñahuihuan ricucun, mana alli shuncuyuc cashcata tucui mana alli taripashcacunatapash, chai runacuna mana alli rashcahuan shuti shimita callpachishcata.
45001019	Tucui Diosmanta ricsishca pasacta ricunalla can: Diosllata ricsichirca.
45001020	Diosta mana ricuipac cashca, cai pacha rurai tucushcamanta pai rurashcacunapi yuyaihuan ricsi tucun: paipac ushai, pai Dios cashca; chairaicu mana quishpichi tucuna ushanun.
45001021	Diosta ricsishpapash, mana pai munashca shina paita chacchanurca, mana pacrachunurcapash; ranti, paicuna yapalla yuyaricpi paicuna shuncu huishtuyashca, ashtahuan ñausayarca.
45001022	Yapa yachacmi canchic rimashpapash, yuyai illaccunapac rimaita charinurca.
45001023	Mana huañuc Diosta huañucta ranurca, runa shina, pishcu shina, aichacuna shina, machacui shina ricuric huacacunata rurashpa.
45001024	Chairaicu, paicuna munashcapi jichushpa, juchallinapi Dios paicunata saquirca, pincaipaccunata rurashpa quiquin paicunapac aichacunallatatac huacllichinurca.
45001025	Paicunapac Dios llullanami; maquihuan rurashcacunata chacchanushca, jatunyachinushcapash, quiquin Huiñachicta chacchana rantimanta: ¡Huiñaipac pai bendisiashca cachun. Amen!
45001026	Chairaicu pai saquircalla paicuna aicha mañashcapi huatashca shina causanuchun: paicunapac huarmicuna ña mana carihuan yumarinurca, huaclli tucunurca;
45001027	caricunapash chashnallata: huarmihuan causanata saquishpa, caripura munarinurca; chashna paicuna aichallapita ñacarinurca, paicuna pantashcamanta.
45001028	Shuti shimita mana ricsinata munashpa, Diosta mana chasquinurca; paipash chashnallata, paicuna huacllishca yuyaipi saquirca, mana alli ruranuchun nishpa:
45001029	chairaicu palicunapi mana tiyan cusca taripana, huacllshca yuyaita charinun, cullquiyana yuyai, mana allicuna, chiquicui juntarishcacuna, huañuchina yuyaicuna, macanuna yuyai, umachina yuyai, mana imatapash rurana yuyai; mana alli shimicuna juntarishca canun.
45001030	Llulla shimicunata rimanun, Diosta camana munanun, carimi canchic rimanun, umachisiquicuna, mana allicunata rurancapac yapa yachaccuna. Yayacunata mana uyanun,
45001031	mana yuyarishicahuan ranacun, shimita mana pactachiccuna, llaquina illaccuna, mana llaquishcahuan imatapash ruraccuna.
45001032	Ricsinacun Dios rimashcata: chashna rurashpa causaccunaca huañuchi tucuna cashcata; chashna cacpipash, mana chaicunallatachu ruranun, ashtahuan mana alli rurashcacunata ricushpa, yapa cushiyanun.
45002001	Chairaicu mana quishpinata ushanqui, pi cashpapash, shuccunata taripashpa, Shucta taripashpa, canllata cautsayaricunqui, can taripacushcata canpash ruranqui.
45002002	Ranti yachanchic, Dios allita yachashpa, cautsayachishcata chashha ruraccunata.
45002003	Canca, mashi, ¿chashna ruraccunata taripanqui manachu? ¿canpash chashnallata ruracushpa, canca Dios cautsayachishcamanta quishpishachu yuyanqui?
45002004	Ashtahuan Dios alli shuncu, chapac, atipashpa ricucllatachu ricunqui? ¿ranti manachu atipanqui pai yapa alli shuncuhuan canta paiman ticrachun munashcata?
45002005	Ranti, canpac shuncuta sinchiyachishpa, mana alliyanata munashpa, canllata ñacarinacunata tantachicunqui, Dios taripana puncha cuscata taripancapac shamuna pachapi.
45002006	Paimi caran amu rurashca tuputa cunca.
45002007	Mana huañuna, jatunyachic ñanpita mashcashpa caticcunaman huiñaipac causaita cunca;
45002008	ranti, piñashpa shuti cashcata mana uyaccunaman, ashtahuan mana cusca taripanata caticcunaman, paicunapac sinchi ñacarinami tiyanca.
45002009	Huacai, ñacarinami tiyanca mana allita ruraccunapac, tucuimanta ñaupac judiomi ñacarinca, griegopash ñacarinata charincami;
45002010	ranti, jatunyanata ganas causaita allita rurac runamanpash Dios cuncami, tucuimanta ñaupac judioman, chai huasha griegoman,
45002011	Dios tucuicunata chaipuralla llaquishcaraicu.
45002012	Camachic quillcata mana ricsishpa juchalliccuna, Camachic quillcata mana ricsishpami huañununca; ranti Camachic quilicata ricsishpa juchalliccuna chai Camachic quillca rimashca shinami taripai tucununca.
45002013	Camachic quillcata uyashcallahuan mana pactarinchu, Dios-huan ailluyancapac pactachina mari can.
45002014	Allita uyahuaichic: Diosta mana ricsiccuna Camachic quillcata mana charinun; mana yachashpallata Camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishpa, paicunallata quiquinpac Camachic quillca tucunun;
45002015	chashna paicuna ricsichiranun shuncu ucupi Camachic quillca charishcata. Caran amupi paipac yuyai rimashcatapash ricsinun paicuna rurashcamanta allimi, mana allimi rimashcapi.
45002016	Runapura mana ricsishcata, Dios taripashca punchami ricsichinca; ñuca yachachishca Cushi Shimipi rimashca shina, Jesus Mesiaspac maquipi churashpami taripanca.
45002017	Ranti can, judiomi cani nishpa rimanqui, shuc Camachic quillcatami catini rimanqui, Diospi jatunyanqui.
45002018	Can Dios munashcata ricsinqui, Camachic quillcaca ashtahuan alli cashcata acllancapac canta yachachin.
45002019	Chairaicu ñausacunata purichicmi cani allipacha yuyacunqui, tuta ucupi ricuric achic,
45002020	mana yachaccunata yachachic, huahuacunata cusca ñanpita ricsichic, chashna yuyarinqui can yachashca shuti shimita Camachic quillcapi charishcaraicu.
45002021	Chashna chari, can shuccunata yachachic cashpa, ¿manachu canllata yachachirinata ushanqui? Mana shuhuana rimanqui, ¿canca manachari shuhuanquichu?
45002022	Shucpac carihuan shucpac huarmihuan mana causana rimanqui, chashna rimashpallata ¡canca ruranqui! Huacacunata millanimi nishpallata, paipac huasicunamanta shuhuanqui.
45002023	Camachic quillcahuan jatunyanqui, ranti mana pactachishpa canpac Diosta camicunqui.
45002024	Ari, Dios Quillcashca Shimipi rimashca shina, cancunaraicu Diosta mana ricsiccuna Diospac shutita piñanun.
45002025	Ullu carata pitina can Camachic quillcata pactachicpimi imallapipash canta yanapanca; ranti, mana pactachicpi mana imallapash yanapancachu.
45002026	Cashna yuyarishun, maicancuna mana pitishca cashpallata, Camachic quillcapi rimashcata pactachishpa, ¿manachu ullu carata pitishca tupullata jahuayachishca tucunca?
45002027	Paipac aichapi chai pitinata mana chasquishca runa, Camachic quillca rimashcata pactachic canta taripancami: canta Camachic quillcayuc, ullu carata pitishca cashpallata, mana pactachic.
45002028	Judio cana mana jahua cashcallata ricuchinachu, ullu carata piti tucunapash mana chaillapi tucurinchu;
45002029	mana, judio cashcata ucumanta llucshishcahuanmi ricsichina can; ullu carata pitichishcapash aicha ucumantami can, Diospac Samai rurashca, mana quillcapi rimashcaraiculla; pipash chashna causashpa Diospacpi yupaichashcami canca; runacunapacpica mana.
45003001	Shinacpi, ¿imallapipash yalli cashcata judio charinchu? ¿pai ullu carata pitirishca imapaclla allichu?
45003002	Allita ricucpica jatunmi. Tucuimanta yuyaricpi, paicunaman Dios rimashcacunata ricsichishcaraicu.
45003003	Maicancuna mana cuscata catishca ¿imananchu? ¿Paicuna mana cuscata catishca, Dios cusca rashcata huacllichicachu?
45003004	Chaita mana ansapash yuyarina canchic; Dios mana llullac can, ranti runacunaca tucuilla llullaccuna Dios Quillcashca Shimipi rimashca shina: Can shuti rimashcata ricsinuncami, taripai tucushcapi atinquimi.
45003005	Ranti, ñucanchic mana alli cashca Dios cusca cashcata jahuachicpi, ¿imata rimana tucunchic? ¿Dios mana cusca can piñarishcapi?, ¿ñucanchicta ñacachishcapi? Runa yuyaipi churashpami cashna rimani caita.
45003006	Mana ansapash chashnachu; chashna cacpi, ¿tucui pachata Dios taripanata ushanmanchu?
45003007	Ranti, ñuca llullashcaraicu, Dios cusca cashca ashtahuan jatunyachishca saquiricpi, ¿ñucata juchashpa rimanata ushahuanunchu?
45003008	Chashna cacpi mana allicunata rurana tucunqui alli rurashca ricurichun; maican llullaisiquicuna chaitami ñucanchic yachachinchic rimanun, chai shimicunamanta taripai tucunami canun.
45003009	Chashna cacpi, ¿yallichu canchic? ¡Mana ansallapash! Cunanshitu ricsichircanchic ima shina tucuilla, judiocuna Diosta mana ricsiccunapash, jucha ucupi causaranun,
45003010	chashna Dios Quillcashca Shimipash riman:
45003011	Shuc chuya shuncullapash mana tiyan, Diosta mashcancapac shucllapash yuyayuc mana tiyan.
45003012	Tucuilla pantashca purinacurca, tucui chincarinurca, shucllapash allita mana ruran, shucllapash.
45003013	Paipac tuncuri pascara aya jutcumi, pai rimashca shimicuna umachincapaclla canun.
45003014	Machacui janpita shimi ucupi apai cachanun, sinchi piñaicuna shimimanta llucshicun.
45003015	Yahuar tallincapac utcalla callpanun;
45003016	paicuna purishca ñanpita huacllinun, llushtiyaita saquinun,
45003017	alli causanaman rina ñanpita mana ricsinun;
45003018	paicunapi mana tiyan Diosta muchana
45003019	Ranti yachanchic, ima shina tucui Dios Quillcashca Shimipi, judiocunaraicu quillcan. Caihuan tucuicuna shimi quillpashca saquirinuchun, chashnallata tucuilla juchayuc cashcata ricsirinuchun.
45003020	Chairapash, mana pipash jucha illac saquirincachu, Camachic quillcata pactachircanimi nishpalla: chai Camachic quillcaca jucha tiyashcata allipacha ricsichic can.
45003021	Ranti cunan ricurcanchic chai Camachic quillca Profetacunapash yachachishcallata: Mana chai Camachic quillcallahuata Dios ñucanchicta cusca shuncuyuc, chuya shuncuyucta ruran.
45003022	Dios ñucanchicta cusca shuncuyucta ruran Jesucristopi inishcaraicu, chai inina tucuicunapac alli can, mana pitapash yallichishpa.
45003023	Tucuilla juchallishcaraicu, tucuicuna Diosmanta chicanyashca canun.
45003024	Ranti pai, cuyashpa, paipac quishpichinata cun, Jesucristo ñucanchipacta tarishcaraicu.
45003025	Ari, pai Dios Yaya, munashcarca Jesuspac yahuarhuan, ñucanchic inishcaraicu quishpinata tupachun. Chashna ñucanchicta yachachin Dios cusca cashcata.
45003026	Manachu ñaupaca, mashna juchallicpipash saquiclla carca: Chaica Dios chapana punchami carca. Ranti cai pachapi, Dios ricsichin pai cusca cashcata: pai cusca can, chuya shuncuyuc can; chasnallata cusca runata, chuya shuncuyucta ruran tucui Cristo Jesuspi iniccunata.
45003027	¿Cunaca, ñucanchic jatunyashca tiyanchu? Tucurishcami. ¿Imaraicu? Mana Camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicu, ranti inishcaraicu.
45003028	Ñucanchic rimanchicmi, inishcaraicu runa cuti Diospacpi llaqui tucunchic nishpa, ranti mana Camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicu.
45003029	¿Ima? ¿Diosca judiocunapacllachu? Chaishuc llactacunapacpash can.
45003030	Shuclla Diosmi tiyan, paimi inishcaraicu quishpichinca ullu cara pitishca judiocunata, mana pitichishcacunatapash.
45003031	Chashna cacpi, ¿inishcami Camachic quillcamanta yallichu can? Mana chaichu, ashtahuan Camachic quillcata sinchicuchicmi.
45004001	Cunan, ¿imatami rimashun ñucanchic Yaya Abrahanmanta? ¿Tarircachu imatapash?
45004002	Abrahan rurashcacunahuan jucha illac tucushca cashpa, jatunyarinata ushanmi; ranti Diospac ñaupacpi mana ushan.
45004003	¿Chashnamanta Dios Quillcashca Shimita uyanayanquichu?: "Abrahan Diospi inirca, chairaicu Dios jucha illacta shina paita chasquirca".
45004004	Cunan ricushun; shuc runa imatapash ruracpi, cullquita mana cuyashca cui tucun, paiman cuna cashcata cui tucun.
45004005	Ranti, shuc runa juchamanta Quishpichic Diosta inicpi, Dios jucha illacta shina paita chasquin, pai mana imatapash rurashcallapita.
45004006	Cashnapi yuyarishpami, Davidpash cushiyai riman Dios cuyashcahuan jucha illac tucushca runata, pai mana imatapash rurashcallapita.
45004007	Cushiyanuchun mana alli rashcacunamanta Dios cuncarishpa, juchamanta quishpichishcacuna.
45004008	Dios mana cuti paipac juchamanta yuyarishca runa cushiyachun.
45004009	Cunan ricushun: ¿cai cushiyana ullu cara pitishcacunapacllachu can, mana pitishcacunapacpash cancachu? Ña rimarcanchic ima shina Abrahan ininamanta jucha illac tucushcata.
45004010	¿Ranti chaica ullu cara pitirishca huashachu carca? ¿Ñaupactachu carca? Ñaupac, mana huasha.
45004011	Paipac aichapi ricurincapac cara pitinata chasquirca; Dios paipac ininaraicu ña jucha illac paita rurashcarca, chaira pai mana cara pitishpa, paita yaya ninun, Dios paicunapac ininatapash ricun jucha illac paicunatapash rurancapac.
45004012	Cara pitishcacunapac yayapash can, paicuna cara pitishca cashpapash, yaya Abrahan chaira mana cara pitishcapi charishca ininata catinun.
45004013	Abrahanta Dios shuc shimita curca, ashtahuan rimanchicman chari, paipac churicunaman shuc shimita curca, cai pacha paicunapacpi nishpa, caita mana Camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicuchu curca, pai ininahuan Dios-huan ailluyashcaraicumi curca.
45004014	Ranti cunan, chai rimashca shimi ñucanchicpi pactarincapac Camachic quillcata pactachina canchic, chaipi ña mana imanan inina.
