45004015	Chashna cacpi, ¿chai cushca shimi pipacta canca? Camachic quillcapac yachaica cautsayachincapaclla can, ¿manachu? Camachic quillcahuan pantaicunahuan huiñaipac huancu purinun ishcanticuna.
45004016	Chairaicu inina ñanpi can, Diospac cuyaiman pushac mari can; chashnami Abrahanman cushca shimi tucui paipac churicunapi pactarin. Mana Camachic quillcapi rimashca churicunapaclla, Abrahanpac ininata caticcunapacpash.
45004017	Abrahanca tucui ñucanchipac yaya can, chashna riman Dios Quillcashca Shimipi: "Tucui runacunapac yayatami rurani". Huañushcacunata causaita cuc ñaupacpimi ñucanchic yaya can; pai chaira mana tiyaccunata tiyacpi shina cayan; Abrahanca chai Diospimi inirca.
45004018	Mana chapaipacta chapashcaraicumi, chai inina paita tucuicunapac yaya rurarca, quillcapi rimashca shina: "Chashnami canunca canpac miraicuna".
45004019	Ininapi catircalla, paipac aicha causaita mana cuna ushacpipash (shuc patsac huatata charirca chaipi), paipac huarmi Sarapash ña huahuata mana charina ushashcapi.
45004020	Chashna cashpapash Dios cushca shimimanta mana pantai yuyaita charirca, ashtahuan ininapi sinchi tucurca, Diosta jatunyachirca,
45004021	allipacha yuyarishpa pai rimashcata pactachincami, pai ushaita charishcaraicu.
45004022	Diosca chai ininata ricushpa jucha illac paita rurarca.
45004023	Mana cuncari tucurca. Dios Quillcashca Shimipi quillcara tiyaccuna mana pairaicullachu quillcashca canun;
45004024	ñucanchipacpash allimi canun, ñucanchipash ininchic Apunchic Jesusta huañushcacunamanta causachicta.
45004025	Pai ñucanchic juchacunaraicu japi tucurca, ñucanchic jucha illac tucuncapac causachi tucurca.
45005001	Ininaraicu, cunan jucha illac tucushcanchic, ña Dios-huan mana piñanacushca canchic Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu.
45005002	Pairaicu cai ñucanchic causacushca Dios cuyashcata chasquircanchic, chairapash Diospacpi jatunyachi tucunata chapacunchic.
45005003	Chairapash: llaquicunata charishpa jatunyanchic, chai llaquicuna ñucanchicta sinchicuchinun;
45005004	sinchicunamanta, cui tucuna shamun; chaimanta ranti chapana shamun;
45005005	paica mana yanca chapanchichu, Diospac cuyai ña tallichi tucurca ñucanchic shuncupi, ñucanchicman cushca Diospac Samaihuan.
45005006	Cunan ricuichic, ima pachapita Cristo huañushca ñucanchiraicu: Ñucanchic chaira juchasapa, jucharaicu sanpayashca cashcapi.
45005007	Alli shuti jinu, shuc runaraicu ñucanchic causaita mana cunallachu can; shinapash, shuc alli runaraicu, pita yachashun quiquinpac causaita cuiman imachari.
45005008	Ranti Mesias huañurcami ñucanchiraicu, chaira ñucanchic juchasapa cashcallapita; chashnami ñucanchicta Dios yapa llaquishcata ricsichin.
45005009	Cunan, Mesiaspac yahuaraicu jucha illac tucushcanchic, chairaicullatami cunanca astahuan ñacachi tucunamanta pairaicu quishpishun,
45005010	Ñucanchic Diosta piñac cashcapi, paipac Churi huañushcahuan Dios-huan allichircanchic; cunanca ashtahuan paihuan allichishcaraicu, paipac causaimanta ñucanchicta quishpichincami.
45005011	Mana chaillachu: Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu Diospi sinchi tucunchic, pairaicu Dios-huan ailluyashcanchic:
45005012	Cunan ricushun; shuc runaraiculla jucha cai pachaman pactashcarca, juchahuan huañui pactamurca; chai huasha huañui tucui pachaman pactarca, tucuicuna juchallishcaraicu.
45005013	Chaira Camachic quillca mana tiyarca, ranti jucha cai pachapi ña tiyarca. Camachic quillca mana tiyashcaraicu, paita mana uyashcamanta mana imatapash rimaipac tucurca;
45005014	ranti chashnallata runacunapi huañui tiyarca Adanmanta Moises-cama, paipac jucha mana Adanpac shiha cacpipash. Ranti, shuc Adanmanta yalli shamuna carca.
45005015	Chaita ricushuri, Diospac cuyai, mana runa urmashcata allichincapacllachu carca, ashtahuan yallitami rurarca. Shutimi, shuc runa pantashcamantalla achca runa huañun; ranti, Diospac cuyai ashtahuan yalli yancamanta juntarirca runacunapi, cai shuclla runaraicu; pai Jesucristo can;
45005016	Diospac cuyai mana ñaupa pantashcata allichincapacllachu carca, ashtahuan yallita rurarca. Shuc runalla huañuchic juchata apamurca, ranti Diospac cuyai juchamanta quishpinata cai juchasapa pachaman apamun;
45005017	Ari, shuc runa pantashcaraicu huañuna tiyarca, ranti quiquin causaipi causaccuna mana tupushca Diospac cuyaita, chuya shuncuyanatapash yancamanta shuc runaraiculla Diosmanta chasquinacurca: pai can Cristo Jesus.
45005018	Allita yuyaricpi, shuc runa juchallishpa, huañuita tucuicunapacta apamushca shina, chashnallata shuclla cautsayachi tucushpa ñacarirca; chashna pai tucuicunapacta causaita cuc quishpinata tarirca.
45005019	Caitami rimanayanchic: shuc runa mana uyashcamanta tucuilla juchasapa tucurcanchic, chashnallatami shuclla uyashcaraicu jucha illac achcacunata ruran.
45005020	Huasha japishca Camachic quillcallata, juchacunata mirachincapaclla alli carca; ranti, jucha achca tiyashcapi, Diospac cuyai ashtahuan juntarirca.
45005021	Jucha huañuipi runata charishca shina, Diospac cuyaipash quiquin causaipi causachinca; Dios-huan cuti ailluyachishca huasha, huiñaipac causaita cunca Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu.
45006001	Tucui caimanta ¿ima yachachinallapash surcuipacchu? ¿Diospac cuyai achca shamuncapac ashtahuanchu juchallishpa catishun? Mana chashnachu can.
45006002	¿Juchapac huañushcacuna paiman huatashca catincapac allichu canca?
45006003	¿Caita cuncarincapac allichu canca? Bautismoraicu Cristo Jesuspi yaicurichishcacuna, paipac huañuipi yaicurishcacuna tucurcanchic.
45006004	Chai bautismoraicu Cristohuan panpai tucurcanchic paipac huañuita chasquina ushancapac; chashna Cristo huañushcamanta Yayapac ushaihuan causachi tucushca shina, ñucanchicpash chashnallata shuc mushu causaipi purina tucunchic.
45006005	Paiman llutarichishca saquirishcanchic paipac huañui shinallata charishcaraicu; shuti pachami chashnallata causarinatapash paihuan chasquishun.
45006006	Caita allita yuyaripaichic: Ñaupa ñucanchic cashca Cristohuan chacatai tucurca, ñucanchic aichamanta chaira juchapi huatarashcata llushpichincapac.
45006007	Huañushpaca juchamanta llushpirina mari tucunchic.
45006008	Cristohuan huañushca cashpa, paihuan causana cashcatapash ininchicmi.
45006009	Yachanchic Cristo, huañushcacunamanta causarishca huasha, mana cuti huañushcata, huañui chai huasha mana imatapash paita ruranata ushan.
45006010	Huañui paita yallinata ña mana ushan. Cristopac huañui, juchapac chicapac huañui mari carca; ranti paipac causana Diospacta causanami can.
45006011	Chashnallata cancunapash juchapac huañushca caichic, ranti Diospac causac Cristo Jesusraicu.
45006012	Chashna cacpi, jucha ña ama cuti amuyachun cancunapac ismuna aichata; ama pai mana alli ruranacunaman aisashcapi urmachichun;
45006013	cancuna aichapash juchata rurancapac ama yanapachun. Ranti, Diosman curichic huañush camanta causaiman ticramushcacuna shina; cancunapac aichacunapash Diosta yanapac canuchun.
45006014	Juchaca ña mana cuti yallincachu cancunata, mana Camachic quillcapi caticushcaraicu, ranti Diospac cuyaipi caticushcaraicu.
45006015	Cuti tapuni: ¿Mana Camachic quillcata caticushcaraicu juchallishunllachu? Mana chashnachu.
45006016	Cancuna pimanpash huatashca shina pai rimashcata uyancapac curishpa, cancuna paiman huatashca tucunquichic, pai rimashcatapash pactachina canquichic. Chai amu jucha cacpi, huañunaman rinquichic; ranti inina rimashcata uyashpa, chuya shuncuyuc causanata charinquichic.
45006017	Ranti Diospacraicu juchapi huatashca causashpapash, cancuna shucman amuyachi tucurcanquichic; rimacpica, Diosmanta chasquishca inina, paita tucui shuncuhuan caticunquichic.
45006018	Chaihuan, juchamanta llushpirishpa, chuya shuncu causanapi huatashca saquirircanquichic.
45006019	Runapi yuyarishpami rimacuni, cancuna caicunata mana atipana ushashcaraicu. Ñaupa cancuna aichahuan juchacunata rurashpa, mana alli juchacunapi huatashca saquirircanquichic, chaipi jatunyashpa; ranti cunan, cuscata causaichic chuya shuncuyuc tucunacama.
45006020	Cancuna juchapi huatashca causacushpa, allicunata rurancapac mana ansapash yuyarircanquichic.
45006021	Ranti, ¿yuyarinquichichu imallapash japishta chai cunan cancuna pincaipacmi rimashcata rurashcamanta? Chaica huañuiman pushacun.
45006022	Cunan ranti, juchamanta quishpichishca cashpa, Diosta yanapac canquichic. Cancuna llancashcahuan chuya shuncuyuc tucushpa rinquichic; puchucaipi ranti, huiñai causaita japinquichic.
45006023	Juchaca huañuiman ñucanchicta pushashpa pacrachun; ranti Diosca Apunchic Cristo Jesuspi huiñai causaita cuyan.
45007001	Cancuna, huauquicuna, Camachic quillcata yachanquichic. ¿Cuncarircanquichichu ima shina shuc runa causaillapi Camachic quillcata pactachina cashcata?
45007002	Sahuarishca huarmimanta rimacpi, paipac cariman Camachic quillca rimashca shina llutarichishca can pai causanacama. Ranti cari huañucpi, paica quishpira saquirin sahuarishcamanta.
45007003	Ranti, cari causacushcallapita, shuc carihuan llutarishpa, crusta paquin chai huarmi; ranti, cari huañushca huasha, shuc-huan sahuarishpapash mana crusta paquin.
45007004	Cancunahuanpash chashnallata tucurca, huauquicuna, Mesiaspac aichapi Camachic quillca cancunapac huañurca; chashnami shucpac maquiman rinata usharcanquichic, pai huañushcacunamanta causachi tucurca ñucanchic Diospacta Ilancancapac.
45007005	Ñucanchic causai aichalla cashcapi, juchaman urmachic munanaicunata Camachic quillca cariyachishca, cancuna aichapi huañuita tarpuchiranurca.
45007006	Ranti, cunan, ñucanchicta huatacushcapac huañushca cashpa, Camachic quillcamanta llushpirishca saquirinchic; chashnami shuc mushu causaihuan yanapanchic, ranti mana chai callari pacha Camachic quillcahuan.
45007007	Chashna cacpi, ¿Camachic quillca juchami nishpachu rimana canchic? Mana chashnachu. Ranti ñuca juchata mana ricsimanchu carcami Camachic quillca illashcapi. Mana Camachic quillca cashcapi, mana ricsiman carcani shuccunapacta munapayana mana alli cashcata, pai caita riman: "Shuccunapacta ama munapayanquichu".
45007008	Chai Camachic quillca rimashcata yachashpa, juchaca ñucapi tucui sami munapayanacunata churarca; ranti, Camachic quillca mana tiyacpi, juchaca huañushca carca.
45007009	Ñaupac, Camachic quillca illac causarcani; ranti, Rurai-nishca shamushcapi, juchata cuti causaita curca;
45007010	ranti ñucaca huañurcani; chaipi yachai tiyarca, causancapac cushca Rurai-nishca huañuita apamuhuarca.
45007011	Rurai-nishca tiyashcaraicu jucha ñucata umachihuarca, chai Rurai-nishcallahuata huañuita cuhuarca.
45007012	Chashna cashpa, Camachic quillca allimi can, Rurai-nishcapash chashnallata sumac, alli can.
45007013	Ranti, alli cashpallata chari, ¿ima paichu ñucata huañuchishcahuanca? Manapacha chashnachu. Juchami allipi yanapaita tarishpa huañuita cuhuarca. Chashnami, Rurai-nishcaraicu jucha maicama pai jucha cashcata ricsircanchic.
45007014	Yachanchic Camachic quillca samaimanta cashcata, ranti ñuca aichayuc, tulluyuc cani, huatara shina juchaman catushca.
45007015	Ima tucushcatapash mana mari yachanichu, rurana munashca allita mana ruranichu, ashtahuan ñuca millashca mana allita rurani.
45007016	Cunan, mana munashcata rurashpa, Camachic quillca alli cashcata yachani;
45007017	ranti, chai shuti, mana ñucachu mana allita ruracuni, ñuca ucupi tiyac juchami mana allita ruran.
45007018	Alli ruranata munashami, ranti mana rurashachu.
45007019	Allita yuyaricpi, rurana munashca allita mana ruranichu, ashtahuan mana munashca mana allita rurani.
45007020	Chairaicu; ñuca mana munashcata rurashpa, mana ñucachu mana allita ruracuni, ñuca ucupi tiyac juchami ruran.
45007021	Chairaicu caita atipashpa ricuni: alli cashcata ruranca racushcapi, cuti maquipi mana alli rurana shamuhuan.
45007022	Diospac Camachic quillcata ricushpa, ucupi shuti cushiyanimi;
45007023	ranti, ñuca aicha ucupi shuc camachic quillca tiyashpa macanacucun ñuca yuyashcahuan; chashnami cai ñuca aicha ucupi tiyac camachic quillcapi japi tucushca saquirini.
45007024	Achcatami llaquirini. ¿Ñuca ucupi tiyac huañuimanta quishpinata ushashachu?
45007025	Achcata Diosta pacrachushun Apunchic Jesucristoraicu. Shina cacpi, ñucallatami yuyaihuan Diospac Camachic quillcapi huatara cani, ranti aichahuan iuchapac camachic quillcapi huatara cani.
45008001	Chairaicu, Cristo Jesusman llutarishcacunapac ña mana tiyan cautsayachina.
45008002	Samaimanta causaita cuc Camachic quillca Cristo Jesuspi canta quishpichin juchapac huañuipac Camachic quillcamanta.
45008003	Caita Camachic quillca mana usharcachu, aicha yapa sanpa cashcaraicu. Dios rurarca: Paipac quiquin Churita cachamurca juchasapa aichata japishpa; chai aichallapitami chicapac juchata cautsayachirca.
45008004	Chashna, Camachic quillcapi mañashca ñucanchicpi pactarinata ushan, ña mana aicha mañashca shina ruranchic, ashtahuan Samai mañashcata ruranchic.
45008005	Aicha pushashca causaccuna, aichapac cashcata yuyarinun, chaita munanun; ranti Samai pushashca causaccuna, samai pushashcaman rinacun.
45008006	Aicha munashcacuna huañui canacun; ranti Samaimanta causai, ganas causai can.
45008007	Shuti pachami, aicha rurashca Diosta piñachincapac rurashcami can. Mana cushiyan, cushiyanata mana ushancachu Dios munashcata pactachishcahuan.
45008008	Chairaicu, aicha mañashcata rurashpa causaccuna Dios mañashcata mana pactachi ushanun.
45008009	Ranti cancuna mana aichapac canquichic, Samaipacmi canquichic, Diospac Samai mari cancuna ucupi causacun. Pipash Cristopac Samaita mana charishpa, mana Cristopacchu can.
45008010	Ranti, Cristo cancuna ucupi cashpa, jucharaicu aicha huañuiman ricpipash, samaica causacun Diospac cuyaipi cashcaraicu.
45008011	Cristota huañushcamanta causarichicpac Samai cancunapi tiyacpi, Jesusta huañushcacunamanta causarichic, cancunapac huañushca aichatapash causaita cuncami; cancuna ucupi causacuc paipac Samaihuanmi ruranca.
45008012	Chashna cacpi, huauquicuna, aichata mana imatapash cunata canchicchu, pai munashcatapash ama catishun;
45008013	pai rimashcata catishpa huañuimanmi rinquichicman; ranti cancuna, Samai yanapashcahuan, aicha rurashcata chincachishpa, causaitami charinquichic;
45008014	Diospac Samai pushashcata puriccuna, paicunalla Diospac churicuna canun.
45008015	Cancunaca mana huatara samaitachu chasquircanquichic manchanaman ticrancapac, churicuna tucuna Samaitami chasquircanquichic, paimi ñucanchicta "Abba, Yaya" rimachin.
45008016	Chai Samaillata ñucanchic samaita allipacha ricsichin ñucanchic Diospac churicuna cashcata.
45008017	Churicuna cashpa, japina caccunapash canchic, Diosmanta japinata chasquiccuna, Cristohuan japina cashcata chasquishun; cunan paihuan ñacaricushpa, paihuan jatunyachishcatapash chasquishun.
45008018	Alli shuti pacha, ñuca yuyarini cunan cai causaipi ñucanchic ñacaricushca manapacha tupuipacchu can ñucanchicpi huasha shamunca racuc jatunyachishcahuan.
45008019	Ailita yuyaricpi, tucui Dios rurashcacuna allipacha chaparanun achicman Diospac churicuna lluchshinuchun.
45008020	Nicpi, runacuna yancamanta llancana tucushpa, mana pai munashcaraicuchu chashna tucurca, ranti Dios chashna munashcaraicu.
45008021	Chashna cashpapash, pai huañuna cashcamanta llushpirinata chapacun, Diospac churicuna quishpina causaiman pactanacama.
45008022	Yachanchic tucui Dios rurashcacuna huacanun, ñacarinun, huachacuc shina,
45008023	Mana paicunalla, ñucanchicpash, ñucanchic charinata ricsichishpa Samaita cui tucushcacuna cashpapash, ucupi chunlla huacanchic, maican puncha Dios ñucanchic aichata quishpichichun, quiquin churicunata rurachun nishpa.
45008024	Cui tucushca quishpinata chapana canchic; ranti ricurashcata chapana, chaica ña mana chapaipacchu can: ¿ricuimanta amishcata chapaipacchu?
45008025	Shina cacpi, mana ricushcata chapancapac sinchita shayarishpami chapana tucun.
45008026	Chairapash ñucanchic sanpayashcapi Samai yanapac shamun, ñucanchic mana yachanchic imata jinu mañana cashcata. Chashnapi quiquin Samaillata jiquishcahuan mana rimashcahuan ñucanchiraicu mañan.
45008027	Ranti chai shuncucunata ricsicca yachan Samai imata mañacushcata, pai chuya shuncuyuccunaraicu Dios munashca shina mañashcamanta.
45008028	Ashtahuan rimacpi, Dios tucui imacunata paita llaquiccunapac maquipi, paicunapac allipac churan, paicunata cayashca mari pai quiquin munashcaraicu.
45008029	Pai ñaupacta ricsishcacunata, paipac Churi shina tucuna ushaita curca, quiquin pai shinata, achca huauqui ucupi pai tucuimanta ñaupac shayachun nishpa.
45008030	Chairaicu, ñaupacta acllashcacunata cayashpa, cusca runacunata ruran, chai huasha jatunyaita cun.
45008031	¿Ashtahuan rimaipacchu? Dios ñucanchihuan cacpi, ¿ñucanchicta ushancachu pillaca?.
45008032	Chai Dios paipac Churillatata mana quishpichishpa, paita ñucanchiraicu ashtahuan cushpa, ¿manachu pairaicu ñucanchicman imatapash cunca?
45008033	¿Pitac juchachinata ushanca Dios acllashcacunata, pai paicunata cusca runacunata rurashcata yachashpa?.
45008034	¿Maicanllaca huañuiman cachana ushancachu? ¿Chaitaca Jesus Mesias rurancachu? Mana, paimi huañurca, ashtahuan rimacpi causarirca, paillata Diospac yachac maquiman tiyan, paillata ñucanchiraicu mañacun.
45008035	¿Pillaca Cristo llaquishcamanta ñucanchicta llushpichinata ushancachu? ¿Camai tucushcachu ushanca, llaquirishcachu, piñashpa japishcacunachu, yaricai-chu, llushti causanachu, manchaipaccunachu, mircanuchu ushanca?
45008036	Cashna riman Dios quillcashca shimi: Canraicu tucui puncha huañunalla causanchic, huañuchincapac huacracunata shina ñucanchicta ranun.
45008037	Ranti tucui chaicunata yallishunmi ñucanchicta llaquicraicu.
45008038	Yachanimi ñuca, ima huañui, ima causai, ima samai ushaicuna, cunan causai, huasha tucunca rashca, ima cai pachamanta ushaicuna, jahuapachamanta cashpa, huaicu ucumanta cashpa, ima cai pachapi causac ima cashpapash, mana ushancachu Dios llaquishcamanta ñucanchicta llushpichincapac, chai llaquishcata tupanchicmi Apunchic Cristo Jesuspi.
45009001	Cristo Jesuspimi alli shutipacha cancunata rimani; ñuca yachaimi chaitaca chashnami nihuan Diospac Samaipi:
45009002	Ñuca charinimi shuc jatun llaquirinata shuc catinlla nanaitapash;
45009003	munaimanmi Diospacpi millai tucushpa, Cristomanta chicanyachishca canata judiocunapac allipac, ñuca llactamanta huauquicuna.
45009004	Paicunami Israel runa canun, paicunata Dios quiquin churicunata shina chasquirca, paicuna ucupipash Paillata samacun. Curishca shimicuna, Camachic quillca, chacchana, cusha nishcacunapash paicunapacmi.
45009005	Callari yayacunamanta huahuacuna canun, Cristo paicunamanta pacarishca can; pai, tucuimanta yalli, huiñaipac bendisiashca Dios. Chashna cachun.
45009006	Diospac shimi mana pactarishcachu mana rimana ushanchic mari, mana tucui Israelpac churicunachu Israel mirai canun.
45009007	Chashnallata, mana tucui Abrahanmanta shamuccuna paipac churicunachu canun, chaimanta pai cashna rimai tucurca: "Isaacpac churicuna canpac churicunami canunca".
45009008	Cashnami chaica rimanayan: Abrahanpac churi cashcaraicu mana Diospac churimi rimaipac mari; Abrahanpac churicuna canunmi Dios cusha nishcamanta pacarishcacuna.
45009009	Cusha nishca cashna nin: "Cai pacha shinapimi ticramusha, Saraca shuc churitami charinca"
45009010	Caipash tiyan: Rebecapash, ñucanchic yaya Isaacpac huarmi huicsayuc tucurca,
45009011	chaira chai ishcai huahuacuna mana pacarishcallapita, paicuna manarac allita, manallita, rashcallapita, Dios rimarca: "Rucumi quipapac runa tucunca".
45009012	Chashnami acllana Diosmanta" shamun, cayana mana rurashcamantachu can, cayac munashcamantami shamun.
45009013	Chaimanta Dios Quillcashca Shimipi cashna rimah: "Esaumanta yalli Jacobta llaquircani".
45009014	¿Caipi rimashcata atipanquichicchu? ¿Dios mana cusca Taripacchu can? Mana chaichu.
45009015	Allita yachacpi, pai Moisesta cashna rimarca: "Ñuca munashcatami quishpichisha, ñuca munashcamantami llaquirisha",
45009016	Chashna cashpa, mana ñucanchic munashcaraicu, rurashcaraicu tucunca imapash; Dios-raicumi, pai ñucanchicta llaquishcaraicu.
45009017	Dios Quillcashca Shimipi faraonta riman: "Ñucapac ushaita ricsichincapac, tucui pachapi ñuca Shutita ricsinuchun nishpa, canta faraon shayachucani". Chashna cashpa mari Dios, llaquishcahuan ricun pai munashcata, pai munashcapac shuncuta sinchicuchin.
45009019	Cunanca rimahuanquichicmi: Pai munashcata ruracpi mana pipash rimacpi, mana piñarinmanca, ¿manachu?
45009020	¡Ayalla runa! ¿Dios rurashcamanta rimancapac pita canqui? ¿Imaraicumi chashna rurahuarcanqui, allpa manca paita ruracta rimancachu?
45009021	¿Manca-allpa llancac manachu chai sapiramantallata sumac ricuricta, yancalla mucahuata, imapash rurana ushan?
45009022	Ari, Dios pai ima shina piñarishcata, paipac ushaipash maicama pactashcata ricsichincapac, mana ushaipac chapashcahuan chaparca manalii runacunata.
45009023	Shuc mucahuacunahuan paipac Jatunyaita ricsichinayarca; alli rimacpi, ñucanchic, ñucanchicta ñaupacta ña allichishca jatunyachincapac.
45009024	Chaipacmi cayai tucushca carcarichic, mana judio ucumantalla, Diosta mana ricsiccunamantapash,
45009025	cashna profeta Oseashuan rimachirca: "Mana ñuca runata ñucapac rimashami, mana ñuca llaquishcata llaquinimi rimasha.
45009026	Mana ñuca ranachu canquichic rimai tucushcallapita, causac Diospac churicuna rimai tucunquichic".
45009027	Israelmanta rimashpa, Isaias cashna caparin: "Israel churicuna ñucñu yacumanta tsatsa shina achca cashpapash, ansa puchu quishpinunca;
45009028	Apunchicca cai allpapi paipac shimita utcalla pactachinca".
45009029	Cashnapash Isaias rimarca: "Tucuita Ushac ñucanchicta mana churicunata saquishca cacpi, Sodoma shina tucunchicman carca, Gomorra shina canchicman carca".
45009030	¿Imata rimashun shinacpi? Diosta mana ricsiccuna chuya shuncu tucunata mana mashcashpapash, tarinacushcami.
45009031	Ranti Israel, Camachic quillcapi chuya shuncuyanata chapashpa, mana pactarca chai Camachic quillcaman. ¿Imaraicu?
45009032	Rurashcamantalla, mana ininamanta chapashcaraicu. Chaipi urmanurca, jarcacuc rumipi nictarishpa, Cristo
45009033	paimanta cashna rimashca tiyan: "Ricui, Sionpicmi shuc rumita tacarincapac churani, shuc urmachic caca; pipash paipi inina churashpa mana pantashca saquirincachu''.
45010001	¿Huauquicuna, tucui shuncuhuan judiocuna quishpichi tucunuchun munani, paicunaraicupash Diosta mañani.
45010002	Paicunaraicu caita rimani: Yapami Diosta yuyarinun shinapash pantarishca atipashcahuan.
45010003	Mana atipanun ima shina Dios chuya shuncuyuccunata ñucanchicta ruran, ranti paicuna munashca shina chuya shuncuyuc tucunayanun, Chashna rurasha, Diospac ñanpita quishpilla purinun. Camachic quillca Cristoman purichin, chaihuanmi chuya shuncuyuc tucui iniccuna tucununca.
45010005	Camachic quillcamanta shamuc chuya shuncuyuc tucunamanta Moises cashna quillcan: "Maicanpash chaita pactachishpa, pairaicumi causanca".
45010006	Ranti, ininamanta pacarishca chuya shuncuyuc tucunamanta cashna riman: "Ama shuncu ucupi rimaichu: ¿pillaca jahua pachaman pactancachu?; rimacpica, Cristota uraicuchina yuyaihuan.
45010007	Ama rimaichupash: ¿pillaca huaicuman uraicuncachu?; rimacpica, Cristota huañushcamanta sicachina yuyaihuan".
45010008	Shinapica ¿imata nin? "Diospac shimi canpac mayanpi, canpac shimipi, canpac shuncupi tiyacun". Rimacpica, ñucanchic cushi shimita yachachishcamanta riman.
45010009	Canpac shimihuan Jesus Apunchicmi rimashcaraicu, canpac shuncupipash paita Dios huañushcacunamanta causachishcata inishcaraicu, quishpichi tucunquimi.
45010010	Shuncumanta inicta, Dios chasquinmi; ranti shimihuan rimacca quishpirami tucun
45010011	Chairaicu Dios quillcashca shimi nin: "Paita iniccunamanta mana pipash pantarishca tucununcachu".
45010012	Judio griegomanta caipi chicanyachishca mana tiyanchu; tucuilla chai Apunchicllata charinun, paita mañaccunata achcata cucmi can paica.
45010013	Chashna, Apunchicpac Shutita rimac quishpirami tucun.
45010014	Ranti, ¿Apunchicpac shutita rimaipacchu canca chaira paita mana inishpa? ¿Paipi ininata ushashunchu pai rimashcata mana uyashpa? ¿Uyaipacchu canca pipash paimanta mana rimacpica?
45010015	¿Imashnata rimanunca mana cachai tucushca cashpaca?. Dios quillcashca shimipi cashna riman: "Cushihuan pactamuichic alli shimita apamuccuna".
45010016	Shina cacpipash, mana tucui allihuan uyanurca chai Cushi Shimita. Isaias cashna nin: "Apunchic, pillapash inircachu ñucanchic rimashcata".
45010017	Cashna cashpa, ininaca uyashcamanta shamun, uyashcaca Cristopac cushi shimi can.
45010018	Ranti ñuca tapuni: ¿Rimashcata manachu uyanurca? Ari uyanushcami. Diospac shimi nin: "Rimaccuna caparishca tucui allpapi uyarishcami, paicunapac shimi cai pachapi mai cuchucamapash pactashcami".
45010019	Ranti, chairapash tapucunimi: ¿Israel runacuna mana atishcaraicuchu can? Callarincapac, Moises rimashcata japini: "Ñucami mana llactallapash cashca llactamanta canta tunpachisha, yuyai illac llactahuanmi canta piñachichisha"
45010020	Isaiaspash astahuan riman: "Ñucata mana mashcaccuna tupahuanurca, mana ñucamanta tapushpa puriccunata ricurimurcani".
45010021	Rani, Israelmanta cashna riman: "Tucui puncha yanapana munarcani mana uyac piñarisiqui llactata".
45011001	Chairaicu tapuni: ¿Dios paipac runacunata jichushcachu canca? ¡Manapacha! Ñucallata Israel runa cani, Abrahanpac churicunamanta, Benjaminpac runa ucumanta.
45011002	Callarishcamanta Dios israelitacunata paipac runacunata rurashcarca; mana jichushcachu chai acllashca runacunata. ¿Manachu cuncarishcanquichic Eliasmanta Dios Quillcashca Shimipi rimashcata, ima shina pai Diospac ñaupacpi Israelta juchachishcata?
45011003	Pai rimacurca: "Apunchic, canpac profetacunata huañuchinacurca, altar nishcacunata huacllichinurca, ñucaca sapalla saquirircani; cunanca ñucatapash huañuchinayahuanun".
45011004	Dios paita cutiparca: "Canchis huaranca mana Baalpac ñaupacpi cuncuric runacunatami huacaichishcata charini.
45011005	Chashnallata cunanpash ansa Israel runacuna saquirinushca, Dios munashcaraiculla acllashcacuna.
45011006	Ranti Dios munashcaraiculla cashpa, mana paicuna rurashcaraicuchu carca. Chashna cashpa Diospac cuyai mana Diospac cuyaichu canman.
45011007	¿Imata rimashun chaimanta? ¿Israel mana tarishcachu pai mashcacushcata? Acllashcacunaca tarinurcami,
45011008	ranti shuccuna mana atipac tucunurca, Dios Quillcashca Shimipi rimashca shina: "Dios paicunata yuyai illac samaita curca; paicunaman mana ricuc ñahuita curca, mana uyac rinritapash curca, cunan punchacama ama uyancapac".
45011009	Davidpash riman: "Paicuna sumac micunacun paicunallata huatachishpa urmachic ticta canuchun, chaipi paicuna ñacarinata tarinuchun.
45011010	Paicunapac ñahui puyuyashpa ña ama ricuchun, cumuyashca huiñaipac purinuchun".
45011011	Cutipash tapuni: ¿Mana cuti jatarincapacchu urmanurca? ¡Mana chaichu! Ashtahuan paicuna urmashcaraicu mari quishpichi tucuna Diosta mana ricsiccunaman pactamushca, chashna tucushcamanta Israel runacuna tunpanuchun nishpa.
45011012	Israel pantashcaraicu cai pacha yapa chariyuc tucurca, pai ansalla pantashcaraicu Diosta mana ricsic runacuna chariyuc tucunushca. Chuya shuncuyuc Israel tucucpi, ¿tucuicuna yalli charina cashcata yuyarinquichicchu?
45011013	Cancunata, Diosta mana ricsiccunata rimani: Diosta mana ricsiccunapacman cachashca cani, ñuca ruranapi ñuca ushashca tuputami rurani;
45011014	ñuca huaquin aillucuna cancunamanta tunpanuchun nishpami caita rurani, chashna maicanllatapash quishpinaman pushaiman nini.
45011015	Paicunata mayanman jichushcaraicu, tucui cai pacha Dios-huan ailluyarca, paicuna chuya shuncuyuc tucucpi, ¿imachari canca? ¡Huañuimanta causaiman chinpana!
45011016	Mushu ñaupac muyucunata Diosman cucpi, tucui huasha aparishca Diosman cushca saquirin. Sapi chuya shuncuyachishca cacpi, pallcacunapash chuya shuncuyachishca saquirinun.
45011017	Olivomanta maican pallcacuna piti tucunushca, ranti canca, shuc sacha olivo shina, paicuna rantimanta chai yurapi satichi tucushcanqui, chashna chai yura ancucunahuan, huiquihuan causanqui.
45011018	Ranti, ama jatunyaichu quiquin pallcacuna mana allichu canun nishpa; mana canchu sapita sinchicuchicunqui, ashtahuan sapimi canta sinchicuchicun.
45011019	Rimanqui imapash: "Ñucata satichincapacmi shuc pallcacunata pitinushca".
45011020	Allimi can. Mana inishcaraicu piti tucunurca, canca inina charishcaraiculla sinchicucunqui. Ama yapalla jatunyaichu, ashtahuan allita atipashpa causai.
45011021	Dios ashtahuan quiquin pallcacunata mana quishpichishca cashpa, cantapash mana quishpichincachu.
45011022	Chashna cacpi, Dios alli shuncu, cusca cashcata ricui: urmaccunahuan cusca carca pai, canhuanca alli, can alli causashcaraicu. Mana chashna cashpa, canpash piti tucunquimi.
45011023	Ranti judiocuna, inina cashcata mana piñashpa, satichi tucununcami: Diosca ushaita charin cutillata satichincapac.
45011024	Ashtahuan canta sacha olivomanta pitishpa, chican yuramanta cacpipash, alli olivopi satichinurca; ashtahuan paicunaca, quiquin olivomantallata cashpa, satichi tucununcallami paipac quiquin yurapi chai layallata yura cashpa.
45011025	Ñuca munani, huauquicuna, Dios ñucanchic mana yachashcata ruranca rashcata, ama cancuna judiocunamanta yallicmi canchic yuyarincapac: ansa Israel runa mana atipac tucushpa saquirinca ranun mana Diosta ricsiccuna tucuilla yaicunacama.
45011026	Chashnapimi Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina tucui Israel quishpichira tucunca: "Sionmanta shuc quishpichic llucshinca, paimi Jacobpac churicunata tucui juchacunamanta pichanca.
45011027	Cashnami canca paicunahuan ñucahuan curishca shimi, paicunata quishpichishcapi.
45011028	Cushi Shimimanta rimacpi, paicuna piñarishca canun, cancuna allipac. Ranti, acllai tucunamanta nicpi, paicunata Dios llaquinmi paicunapac yayacunaraicu,
45011029	Dios acllashcata pai cuyashcacunantin mana quichunata ushan.
45011030	Cancuna Diosta mana uyac cacpipash, paipac llaquina cancunaman pactarca, judiocuna paihuan piñarishcaraicu;
45011031	chashnallata paicunapash cunan piñarishca canun cancunapacman paipac llaquina pactashcaraicu, paicunapash cunan tucuicunahuan llaquinata tupana ushancapac.
45011032	Dios tucui runata jucha ucupi churarca, tucuicunamanta llaquirincapac.
45011033	¡Imapaclla achcata can tucui Dios charishca, paipac yuyai tucui pai yachashcapash!. Pai ruranca rashca mana yachaipac, paipac ñanpicunapash mana ricsipac canun.
45011034	Chaimanta rimacpi: "¿Maicanllaca yachashcachu Apunchcpac yuyaita? ¿Paita camachiccama tiyarcachu?
45011035	¿Maicanllaca paiman imatapash curca pai cutichina cancapac?"
45011036	Alli rimacpi, tucui paimanta shamun, Pai rurashca canun, Paiman ticrana tucun. ¡Pai huiñaipac jatunyashca cachun!. Chashna cachun.
45012001	Cancunata mañani, huauquicuna, Diospac llaquirinaraicu paiman curichic causac camari shina: chaimi cancunapac samaimanta chacchana,
45012002	Ama cai pacha runacuna rurashcata catichicchu, cancunapac yuyaipi mushuyaichic. Chashnami. yachanquichic maicarimi alli quiquin Dios munashca can, maicanmi alli can, maicanmi allihuan Dios chasquishca can, maicanmi quiquin alli pactachishca can.
45012003	Dios cuhuashca cuyai ushaita cuhuan tucui cancunata rimancapac quiquin cancunallatata ama yapalla llaquirichicchu nishpa; paipac tupulla alli can, caranlla Diospacpi churai tucushcata yuyarichun.
45012004	Ñucanchic aicha cashcata. ricuichic: Achca uchilla aichacunayuc cashpapash, shuclla can: ranti mana tucuilla; shuclla llancanata charinun.
45012005	Ñucanchicpash chasnallata; achca cashpallata, shuclla aicha tucunchic Cristopi, tucuilla yanaparinchic.
45012006	Diospac: cuyaita caranlla chican layata charinchic; Dios chashnapac curca caranman. Dios cuyashcaraicu profeta cashpa, rimachun paipac inina yachachishcata.
45012007	Yanapanata cui tucushca cashpa, yanapachun; yachachinata cui tucushca cashpa, yachachichun;
45012008	camachinata cui tucushca cashpa, camachichun.: Chashnallata, mana mitsashcahuan cuna canqui; pushaccama cashpa, sinchicushpa pushachun; llushticunata yanapac, cushihuan yanapachun.
45012009	Ama llullashcahuan cuyai tiyachun. Mana allita millaichic, alli cashcata yapa ricuichic.
45012010	Huauquipura cuyanacuipi tucuipura cuyanacushcata ricsichichic. Muchanapi: caran amu chaishucta ashtahuan muchanata yuyaripaichic.
45012011	Ruranata pactachinapi: ama sanpayaichicchu. Cancunapac causaipi Diosta yapa yuyarishpa, Apunchicta yanapaichic.
45012012	Cushihuan chapanata chapaichic. Llaqui shamushcapi: ama piñarichicchu. Tucui pachapi Dios-huan rimarichic.
45012013	Mutsushpa causac iniccunahuan: cancuna charishcata paicunaman cuichic. Puriccunata cancunapac huasipi chasquichic.
45012014	Cancunata piñashpa japiccunata bendisiachic; bendi-siaehic, ama paicunata piñashcahuan ricuichicchu.
45012015	Cushi runacunahuan cancunapash cushiyaichic; huacaccunahuan cancunapash huacaichic.
45012016	Tucui shuclla yuyaihuan purichic. Jatun tucunata ama mashcaichicchu, ashtahuan tucuimanta uchilla tucunata mashcaichic.
45012017	Mana allita rai tucushpa, ama chaillahuata cutichicchu; allicunata rurashpa, runacunapacpi llaqui tucunata yuyarichic.
45012018	Tucuicunahuan alli causanapi sinchicuichic, macanacuna caricunamanta ama callarichun.
45012019	Cancunaca ama taripaichicchu? llaquishca huauquicuna, Diosmi ñacachinataca yachan; Dios, quillcashca shimillapita riman: "Ñucami ñacachisha, ñucami pai ñacarina cashcata cusha, Apunchic riman.
45012020	Huasha riman: "Canta piñac yaricai cacpi, carai; upianai cacpi, upiachi; chashna rurashpami paipac uma jahuapi ninata tantachinqui",
45012021	Mana alli canta: ama yallichun, ashtahuan allicunallata rurashpa mana allita yalli.
45013001	Tucuilla ñucanchicta pushac apucunata uyanuchun; mana tiyan mari paipac munaimanta apu, tucui apu Diosmanta shamun; chairaicu cunan tiyaccuna Dios munashcaraicu tiyanun.
45013002	Chairaicu, maicanpash apuhuan piñarishpa, Dios munashcatapash piñacun; mana pactachina munashpa, paicunallata cautsayachi tucunca ranun.
45013003	Chashna cashpa, allita ruracushpa, apucunata mana manchanachu can; mana allita ruracushpa, shuti manchana tucun. ¿Apucunata manchanata saquinayanquichu? Allillata rurai, chaipimi paicunaca canmanta cushiyanunca.
45013004	Paicuna Diosta yanaparanun canta alliman pushancapac, Ranti, mana allita causashpa, manchai, mana yancachu aiñita charinun, chairapash mana allicunata taripac, ñacachic Diosta yanapac canun.
45013005	Chairaicu uyana paicunata canchic: mana manchashpalla, ranti alli cashcaraicu.
45013006	Chairaicullata cuna cullquita cuna tucunquichic, chai cullqui tantachiccunapash Diosta yanapaccunallata canun.
45013007	Caranman paiman cuna cashcata cuichic: Yanapana cullquita mañac shamucpi, yanapana cullquita cunquichic; cuna cullquita mañac shamucpi, chai cullquita cunquichic; muchaipac runata muchanata cuichic; yupaichana runata yupaichaichic.
45013008	Cuna cullquita illacta cuichic pimanpash cuna cacpi; ama pitapash dibichicchu; cuyaillata shuti caranlla dibinacuichic, ¿manachu, pipash shucta llaquishpa tucui Camachic quillcata pactachishca?
45013009	Cunan ricui, "ama shucpac huarmihuan, shucpac carihuan causaichu, ama huañuchichu, ama shuhuaichu, ama chiquicuichu", tucui chaishuc rurai nishcacunantin cai shimita pactachishcallahuan pactachi tucunun: "Shuc runata canpac aichata llaquishca shina llaquinqui".
45013010	Cuyaihuan mana allita mana pi runatapash ruranchicchu. Chairaicu cuyaillapi tucui Camachic quillca pactachi tucun.
45013011	Cancuna yachanquichic ima pachapi ñucanchic causacushcata, ñami puñuimanta causarina pacha pactarishca. Ñucanchic quishpichi tucuna, inina callarishcamanta ashtahuan mayanllapi cunan charinchic:
45013012	pacarina ña mayanlla can, puncha ña ricurimun. Shinacpi, tutapi ruranacunata saquishpa, achicpac aiñicunata japishun.
45013013	Quiquin punchapi shina cuscata purishun; chairaicu, saquishun jatun micunacunapi machanata, mana alli huarmicunahuan purina, mana alii yachaicunata, piñacunata, chiquicuita, imacunatapash.
45013014	Ashtahuan chaicuna rantimanta, Apunchic Cristo Jesusta shuc churanata shina churarichic, aicha mañashcataca ama uyaichicchu.
45014001	Ininata mana sinchic charicta allihuan chasquichic, pai yuyarishcamanta mana imatapash rimashpa.
45014002	Maican tucuita micunallami nishpa yuyarin, ranti shuccuna, ashtahuan manchaita charishpa, quihuacunallata micunun.
45014003	Maican micuc mana micucta ama millachun; chashnallata, mana micuc micucta ama taripachun, Dios paita chasquishca mari.
45014004	¿Canca shucpac runata taripanata ushanquichu? Shayaralla saquirichun, urmachun imapash, chaitaca paipac amu ricunca ran. Ranti mana urmancachu, pai shayarancapac Apunchic ushaita charin mari.
45014005	Shuc runa riman: Shuc punchacuna shuc punchacunamanta astahuan alli canun; chai shucpacca, tucui puncha chaipuralla canun: chashnapi caran amu allipacha yuyarishcata rurachun.
45014006	Punchacunata atishpa causac, Apunchicraicu ruran; tucuita micuc Apunchicraicu ruran, pai pacrachushcapi chaita ricsinchic. Mana micuc Apunchicraicu ruran, paipash Diosta pacrachun.
45014007	Shutipacha rimacpi, mana pipash quiquin amupacta causan, mana quiquin amupacta huañun.
45014008	Causacushpa, Apunchicpac causanchic; huañushpapash, Apunchicpac huañunchic. Causashcapi huañushcapipash, Apunchicpac canchic.
45014009	Chaipac Mesias huañushpa cuti causaiman ticrarca, causaccunapac huañushcacunapacpash Apunchic tucuncapac.
45014010	Chashna cacpi, ¿canchu canpac huauquita caminqui? ¿Canpash canpac huauquitachu millanqui? Tucuilla Diospacpi taripai tucushun.
45014011	Cashna quillcara tiyan: "Ñucapac causairaicu, Apunchic riman, ñuca ñaupacpi tucuicunami cuncurinunca, ñucatami tucui shimi chacchahuanca".
45014012	Chashna cashpa, caran amumi rurashcamanta Diosta rimana tucunchic.
45014013	Chairaicu, shucmanta rimanata tucuilla saquishunchic; ashtahuan ñucanchic huauquipac ñaupacpi mana churana canchic jarcanata, urmachina imapash.
45014014	Apunchic Jesusraicu ricsini allipacha yachanipash, mana ima paipac munai chuya cashcamanta huacllishcata; mana chuyachu nishpa yuyaricpimi, chashna tucun.
45014015	Ranti shuc micunaraicu canpac huauquita llaquichishpa, chaica mana cuyai can. Can micushcaraicu ama huacllichun maican runapash, pairaicumi Cristo huañushca.
45014016	Can rurashcata ricushpa ama pipash juchallichun, shuti cacpipash.
45014017	Diospac pacha mana micunachu, mana upianachu; ashtahuan canmi cusca taripana, alli causai, cushi causana Diospac Samaipi.
45014018	Pipash cashna Cristota yanapashpa, Diosta cushiyachin, runacuna llaquishcapash can.
45014019	Mashcashun shinacpi, alli causai ñanpipi purichicta tucuilla ashtahuan allicuna tucuncapac.
45014020	Shuc micunaraicu ama huacllichinquichu Dios rurashcata. Tucui micuna chuya can, ranti ñucanchic micushcahuan shucta juchallichina mana alli can.
45014021	Ranti allimi maican pachallapipash aichamanta, vinomanta sasina imamantapash, chaicunaraicu canpac huauqui juchallina cacpi.
45014022	Chai canpac ucupi sinchi yuyarishcata, canpacpi huacaichi, Diosca ricucun mari. Cushiyachun maican runapash, ucupi sinchita yuyarishca huasha, mana chicanta rurashpa.
45014023	Ranti ishcaita yuyashpa micuc, cautsayarin mana pai inishcata rurashcaraicu, imatapash ñaucanchic inishcamanta chicanta rurashpa juchatami ruranchic.
45015001	Ñucanchipac inina sinchi can, mana sinchi ininata chariccunapac urmaicunata ñucanchic aparina tucunchic, ñucanchipac cushiyanallata mashcana rantimanta.
45015002	Ñucanchicmanta tucui chai shuc runapi cushiyanata cushun, alli ruranapi yanapashpa.
45015003	Cristopash mana paipac quiquin cushiyanata mashcarca; Camachic quillca chaimanta riman: "Piñaccuna canta piñashca ñucapi urmarca".
45015004	Yachanchicpash tucui callari pachapi quillcashcacuna ñucanchicta yachachincapac quillcai tucunurca, ñucanchic chapashcata sinchicuchispa chapancapac, Camachic quillca cushiyachishpa sinchicuchishcahuan.
45015005	Cushiyana, sinchicuna Diosmanta shamun, pai cancunaman cuchun shuclla yuyaihuan purinata, chaimi cristiano purina.
45015006	Chashna tucuilla shuclla shimihuan, Apunchic Jesus Mesiaspac Yaya Diosta chacchanquichic.
45015007	Chairaicu, tucuipura chasquinacuichic, Cristo Diosta jatunyachincapac cancunata chasquishca shina.
45015008	Caita cancunata rimani: Judiocunapac runa Cristo tucurca paicunapac rucucunaman Dios cusha nishcata pactachincapac, Dios pactachic cashcatapash ricsichincapac.
45015009	Diosta mana ricsiccunapash Diosta pacrachuna canun, paicunamanta llaquina charishcaraicu. Cashna riman Camachic quillca: Chairaicu canta taquishami, chacchashapashmi canpac Shutita Diosta mana ricsiccuna ucupi.
45015010	Shucpi cashna yapachin: Cushiyaichic, mama-llactacuna, canpac runacunantin.
45015011	Cutipash riman: Tucui llactacuna Apunchicta chacchaichic, pai jatun cashcamanta tucui mama-llactacuna rimaichic.
45015012	Isaiaspash riman: Jese aillu ucumanta shuc shamunca, paimi mama-llactacunata pushancapac shayarinca, Diosta mana ricsiccuna paitami chaparanun.
45015013	Chapanata chapachic Dios cancunapac ininata cushihuan, alli causaihuan juntachichun, Diospac Samaipac ushaihuan achca chapanata cancuna charinquichicmi.
45015014	Ñuca jinu yachani, huauquicuna, cancunapash alli yuyaicunata charinquichiq, tucuita yachanquichic, ushanquichic cancunapura camachirincapac.
45015015	Chashna cacllapita, quillcashcani cancunata cuti yuyachincapac, maicanpi sinchi shimicunahuan. Dios chai cuyaita cuhuasticaraicumi chaita rurani.
45015016	Pai, Cristo Jesuspac yaya pacrita rurashpa Diosta mana ricsiccunapacman cachahuarca Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachincapac, Diosta mana ricsiccunapac camari, Diospac Samai sumacyachishca, alli chasqui tucuchun.
45015017	Diosta yanapashcaraicu Cristo Jesuspi jatunyani.
45015018	Chashna, manapacha imamantapash rimashachu, Cristollata ñuca maquihuan, ñuca shimihuan, ñuca rurashcahuan, Diosta mana ricsiccuna ininapi yaicuncapac rurashcallatami rimasha.
45015019	Tucui caicuna mancharicushiyanacunahuan rurai tucunurca, Diospac Samaipac ushaihuan. Chashnami, Cristopac Cushi Shimita tucuiman apashpa rishcani, nicpica Jerusalenmanta Iliriacama.
45015020	Ranti yapa yuyarishcahuan, chaimanta cushiyanimi, Cristota mana ricsishcallapi yachachishcani, ama shuccuna ña callarishcata catisha nishpa,
45015021	Camachic quillcapi rimashca shina: "Paimanta mana shuc shimillapash rimai tucuccuna paita ricununcami, mana imatapash uyaccuna ricsinuncami".
45015022	Cai llancanaraicu mashna cuti chari cancunata mana ricucri usharcani.
45015023	Ranti cunan cai suyucunapi mana imatapash rurana charishpa, unai cancunata ricucrinayashpa,
45015024	¿Españaman rishpa chari ricucrisha. Chaipi chari cancunata ricusha, cancuña ranti yanapahuanquichic chari ñuca chaiman rincapac, cancunahuan tiyashpa cushiyashca huasha.
45015025	Cunan, Jerusalenman rirani chaipi tiyac iniccunata yanapancapac.
45015026	Chashna nincapacca, Macedoniamantacuna, Acayamantacunapash shuc yanapaita tantachinushca, Jerusalenpi tiyac inic tsuntsucunapacta.
45015027	Rurancapac rimanushca, allita yuyaricpi ruranami canurca. Diosta mana ricsiccuna Diospac pachaman rinata judiocunamanta chasquinurca, chashnallata paicunapash cai pachamantapachuan yanapana tucunun.
45015028	Cai mincashcata pactachishpa, tantachishcata paicunaman cushca huasha, cancunapacman risha, chaimantami Españaman risha.
45015029	Ñuca yachani, cancunapacman rishpa, Diospac bendisioncunahuanmi pactasha.
45015030	Ranti ñuca cancunata mañani, huauquicuna, Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu, Diospac Samaipac cuyairaicupash, yanapahuachic ñucaraicu Dios-huan rimarishpa,
45015031	Judeapi tiyac mana iniccunamanta quishpichihuancapac,
45015032	Jerusalenpi tiyac iniccunapash cushihuan chasquinuchun ñuca apacushca yanapaita.
45015033	Chashnami cushi cancunapacman pactasha; Dios munacpi, cancunahuan samasha.
45015034	Alli causaita charic Dios tucui cancunahuan tiyachun. Cashna cachun.
45016001	Ñucanchic pani Febeta cancunata mincani, pai Cencreaspi tiyac iniccuna ucupi diaconisa can.
45016002	Allita paita chasquichic, Apunchicpac shutipi, inina catic huauquipura shina; paita tucui pai mutsushcapi yanapaichic; paipash achcatami yanapashca, ñucatapash yanapahuashcami.
45016003	Ñucata Cristo Jesuspi yanapac Prisca Aquilastapash yuyarinimi.
45016004	Ñucata huañunamanta quishpichinaraicu paicunapac causaita cunayanurca. Mana ñucalla pacrachucuni, chashanallata Diosta mana ricsiccunamanta iniccunapash pacrachununmi.
45016005	Cancunapac huasipi tantaric iniccunata yuyarinimi, rimaichic. Epenetotapash yuyarinimi, pai tucuimanta ñaupac Asia allpamanta Cristoman curirca.
45016006	Mariatapash yuyarinimi, pai cancunaraicu achcata rurashca.
45016007	Yuyarinimi Andronicota Juniastapash; paicuna aillu cahuanun, quillpai tucushcamanta mashi canun; yachachishcacunamanta jatun canun, ñucamanta ñaupac Cristota catic tucunurca.
45016008	Ampliatotapash yuyarinimi, pai Apunchicpi mashi cahuan.
45016009	Urbanotapash yuyarinimi, Cristopi ñucanchicta yanapac can, ñuca llaquishca mashi Estaquistapash.
45016010	Apelestapash yuyarinimi, pai yapa Cristoraicu ñucarirca, Aristobulopac aillucunatapash.
45016011	Ñuca aillu Hereodiontapash yuyarinimi, Narcisopac aillucunatapash, Apunchicpi ininun paicuna.
45016012	Yuyarinimi Trifenata Trifosatapash, paicuna sinchita Apunchicraicu llancaranun.
45016013	Apunchic acllashca Rufotapash yuyarinimi, paipac mamatapash, pai ñuca mama shina can.
45016014	Sincritota, Flegonta, Hermesta, Patrobasta, Hermasta, paicunahuan tiyac huauquicunatapash yuyarinimi.
45016015	Filologota, Juliata, Nereota panintin, Olimpasta, paicunahuan tiyac Cristopi tucui huauquicunatapash yuyarinimi.
45016016	Tucuipura ucllarishcahuan tupanacuichic. Tucui Cristopi iniccuna cancunamanta yuyarinunmi.
45016017	Diosmanta huauquicuna, allita atipashpa tiyaichic; tiyancami runa, cancuna yachashcamanta chicanta yachachispa, chausichinata llaquicunatapash jatachiccuna; paicunamanta chicanyaichic.
45016018	Chashna runacuna Apunchi Cristota mana yanapanacun mari, paicunapac huicsallatami yanapanun, allimanta sumac shimicunahuan upacunata umachinun.
45016019	Tucui yachanun cancuna yapa uyac cashcata, chairaicu cushiyanimi. Ranti munanimi, allita ruranalla cancuna chapacuichiclla, ranti mana allimantaca anchurichic.
45016020	Alli causaita charic Dios mana unayancachu supaita nitishpa cancuna chaqui ucupi saquincapac.
45016021	Apunchic Cristo Jesus cancunata bendisiachun. Ñucahuan llancac Timoteo cancunata yuyaricunmi, ñuca aillu Lucio, Jason, Sosipatros, tucui paicunapash.
45016022	Nuca, Tercio, cancunata cai pancata quillcarcani, Apunchicpi cancunata yuyarinimi.
45016023	Gayopash yuyarinmi; pai huasita mañachihuashca; iniccunatapash huasita mañachishca.
45016024	Llactamanta cullquita huacaichiccama Erasto ñucanchic huauqui Quartopash yuyarinunmi.
45016025	Dios jatunyashca cachun. Pai charin cancunata sinchicuchina ushaita, ñuca yachachishca Cushi Shimipi rimashca shina, Cristo Jesusta ricsichishpa, huiñai pachamanta pacashca ruranata ricsichishpa,
45016026	ranti cunan ña ricsichi tucushca, profeta quillca pancacunapi tucui llactacunaman ricsichincapac aparanun, huiñaimanta Dios munashca shina, inina paicunapi tiyashcahuan.
45016027	¡Dios huiñaipac jatunyashca cachun, pai shuclla yucuita yachac can, Cristo Jesusraicu! Chashna cachun.
46001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Dios munashcaraicu Jesucristopac yachachishca tucuncapac cayashca cashcani. Sostenes shutiyuc huauquintin,
46001002	cai pancata quillcacuni Corinto llactapi tiyac Diosta iniccunaman; cancuna Cristo Jesuspi Diospac chicanyachishca cashcanquichic, paipac runacuna tucuncapac cayashca carcanquichic, Apunchic Jesucristota iniccunahuan pacta, pai ñucanchic Apu can, paicunapacpash can.
46001003	Ñucanchicpac Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesucristopash cancunapacpi paipac cuyaita, paipac alli causaita tallichinuchun.
46001004	Tucui pachapi cancunaraicu Diosta pacrachuni, Jesucristoraicu cancunapacpi Dios paipac cuyaita tallichishcamanta.
46001005	Pairaicu Dios cancunata pai cuyashcahuan juntachirca, alli rimana ushanapi achca yachana ushanapipash.
46001006	Chashnapi Cristomanta rimashca Cushi Shimi cancuna alli ricsishcanquichic.
46001007	Chashnami tucui Dios cuyashcacunata charinquichic Apunchic Jesucristo shamuna punchata chapacushpa. Dios cancunata sinchicuchincami, Apunchic Jesucristo ticramushcapi ama pipash juchallircami rimana ushancapac.
46001009	Dios mana pishiyan pai cusha nishcamanta, paimi cancunata cayarca paipac Churi Jesucristohuan, paihuan llutarishca causancapac.
46001010	Huauquicuna, Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi mañani shuclla yuyaita charipaichic nishpa, ama chicanyashca causaichicchu. Shuclla yuyaihuan purichic, shuclla yuyarishcahuan, shucllata atipashcahuan.
46001011	Huauquicuna, caita rimacuni Cloepac aillucunamanta uyashca cashpa, chicanyanashi tiyan cancuna ucupi.
46001012	Caita uyarcani: Cancunamanta maican ninun: "Ñuca Pablopac cani"; huaquincuna ninun: "Ñuca Apolopac cani"; shuc nin: "Ñuca Pedropac cani"; cuti shucca riman: "Ñuca Cristopac cani".
46001013	¿Cristo raquirishcachu imata? ¿Cancunaraicu Pablochu chacatai tucurca? ¿Pablopac shutipichu bautisai tucurcanquichic ima chari?
46001014	Diosta pacrachunimi, cancunata mana bautisarcanichu, Crispo, Gayollata ñuca maquihuan bautisarcani.
46001015	Chashna cancunamanta mana pipash rimanata ushan ñucapac shutipi bautisai tucushcata.
46001016	Estefanaspac aillucunatapash bautisarcanimi, chaimanta cuti shuc runacunata bautisashcata mana yuyarinichu.
46001017	Cristo mana bautisancapacchu cachamuhuarca, Diospac Cushi Shimita ricsichincapacmi cachamuhuarca, mana sumac rimashca shimicunahuan; chashna ruracpi Cristo cruspi huañushca urayachi tucunca mari.
46001018	Cristo cruspi huañushca yanca shimi can juchapi caticcuna ricucpi; ranti cai shimillata Diospac ushai can quishpinaman riraccunapac.
46001019	Cashna riman Dios quillcashca shimipi: "Yachaccunapac yachaita huacllichishami, atipaccuna atipashcata anchuchishami".
46001020	¿Yachaccama, yachachiccama, cai pacha yachaicunamanta yachaccunapash ushanushcachu? Dios cai pachamanta yachaita yancata rurashca, mana imapash alli.
46001021	Dios paipac yachaihuan churarca cai pachamanta runa ama runa yachashcahuan paita ricsincapac; ashtahuan munarca paita chapaccunata Cushi Shimihuan quishpichincapae, cai Cushi Shimi yanca rimashca shimi, mana imapash alli cacpipash.
46001022	Judio runacuna mancharicushiyanacunata ricunayanun, griego runacuna astahuan yalli yachaita mashcanun;
46001023	ranti ñucanchic shuc chacatashca Mesiasmanta yachachinchic. Judio runacunata cai yapa pinachin, mana judio runacunapac yanca rimashca shimi can;
46001024	ranti Dios cayashcacunapac, judio mana judio cacpipash, cai Mesias Diospac ushai, Diospac yachai can.
46001025	Diospi yanca shina ricuric, runa yachashcamanta ashtahuan yalli mari can; Diospi sanpa shina ricuric, tucui runa ushaimanta yalli sinchi mari can.
46001026	Huauquicuna, maicanlla cayai tucushcata ricuichic. Cancunamanta ansashitulla runa yachaipi yachac jinu tiyan, mana tucui apu canquichic, cancunamanta mana achca tiyan ushac ailluyuccuna;
46001027	ashtahuan rimacpi, yapa yachaccunata pincachincapac, Dios acllarcami upa runacunata; ushaccunata pincachincapac sanpa runacunata acllashca.
46001028	Dios acllashcami cai pachamanta tucui millashca yanca runacunata, rimacpi, mana imatapash yachaccunata acllashca, yachaccunata urayachincapac.
46001029	Chashnami Diospac ñaupacpi mana pipash jatunyanata ushanca.
46001030	Shina cacpipash Diosllata cancunata Cristo Jesushuan llutachishca, paillata Cristo ñucanchic yachai cancapac munarca, Cristoraicu juchamanta pichashca canchic, Diospac chicanyachishca canchic, quishpichishcapash canchic.
46001031	Chaimanta Dios quillcashca shimipipash tiyan: "Maicanpash jatunyanata munashpa, Apunchicpi jatunyachun".
46002001	Chashnapash huauquicuna, Diospi pacashca shimicunata cancunata ricshichincapac rishcapi, mana sumac, mana atipaipac shimicunahuanchu rimacrircani.
46002002	Cancunahuan causacushpa, mana shuc imamantapash yachanata munarcanichu, Jesucristomantalla, ashtahuan allita rimacpi, chacatashca Jesucristomantalla.
46002003	Sanpa shina manchaihuan chucchurishpa cancunapacpi pactarcani;
46002004	cancunata Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachishpa, cancunata uyachincapac mana sumac shimicunahuanchu rimarcani, ranti Diospac Samai yanapashcahuan, Diospac ushaihuan,
46002005	cancunapac inina Diospac ushaimanta shamuncapac, mana runa yachaimanta.
46002006	Ranti, ininapi rucuyashcacunata sumac, sinchi shimicunahuan rimanchic. Shinapash, chai sumac rimashca shimicuna mana cai pachamanta rimashca shimi shina canun, mana apucuna rimashca shina canun, chaicuna utcalla chincarinca ranun.
46002007	Chaica Diospi pacashca yachai can, pai chaira cai pachata mana rurashcallapita, ñucanchicta jatunyachincapac yuyarishca.
46002008	Chaita manapacha atipanushca cai pachamanta apucuna, chaita atipashpa mana chacatanunman carca Apunchicta.
46002009	Chaimanta Diospac quillcapi rimara tiyan: "Dios paita llaquiccunapacta allichishcata mana maican ñahui ricushcachu, maican rinri mana uyashcachu, pillapash chaira mana yuyarishcachu".
46002010	Tucui caicunata Dios ñacanchicman ricsichircami paipac Samaihuan, Diospac Samai tucuita taripac can quiquin Dios ucupi tiyashcantin.
46002011	¿Shuc runapac shuncupi yuyashcata pita yachana ushan? Quiquin paipac ucupi tiyac samailla yachan. Chashnallata Diospac Samailla quiquin Dios ucupi tiyashcata yachan.
46002012	Mana cai pachamanta samaitachu chasquircanchic, Diosmanta shamuc Samaitami chasquircanchic, Dios ñucanchicta llaquishpa cuyashcacunata allita atipancapac.
46002013	Diospac Samai ñucanchicta yachachisca shimicunahuan tucui caicunamanta rimanchic, mana quiquin ñucanchic yachaimanta yachashca shimicunahuanchu rimanchic. Chashnami Diospi iniccunata Diosmanta shamuc yuyaicunata yachachinata ushanchic.
46002014	Dios cushca samaita mana charic Diospac Samaimanta shamucta mana chasquina ushan, yanca mari can, pai yuyacpi. Mana atipanata ushanpash Dios cushca samaihuan taripana cashcaraicu.
46002015	Ranti maicanpash Diospac Samaita charishpa tucuita taripanata ushan, paitaca mana pipash taripancachu.
46002016	Chaimanta Camachic quillca riman: "¿Apunchicpac yuyaita pillapash ricsinchu? ¿Maicanllapash paita yachachinata ushanchu?". Chashna cashpapash, Cristopac yuyaita charinchic.
46003001	Huauquicuna, ñuca cancunata mana Diospac Samaihuan puriccunata shina rimanata usharcani, runa yuyaipi yuyarishpami cancunata rimarcani, Cristopi yuyaricpi chaira huahuacunata shina.
46003002	Mailla yachanahuan cancunata yachachircani, shuc llullu huahuata micuna rantimanta chucuta cushca shina, chaira sinchi micunata cancuna mana micuna ushac cacpi. Cunanpash chaira mana ushanquichic,
46003003	runa yuyaillata charishcaraicu. Cancuna chaira chiquicurishpa, macanacushpa caticushpa chaira runa yuyaillapi caticunquichic, shuccuna caticushca shinallata.
46003004	"Ñuca Pablopacmi cani"; shucca: "Ñuca Apolopacmi cani", chashna rimashcahua chaira runa yuyaillapi caticunquichic.
46003005	Allita rimacpi, ¿Pablo ima cashcata yachanquichicchu? Apolo, ima cashcata yachanquichicchu? Yanapaclla canacun, paicunaraicu Apunchicpi inishcanquichic. Ñucanchicmanta caran runa Apunchic mincashcata rurarcanchic:
46003006	Ñuca tarpurcani, Apolo jucuchirca, ranti Diosmi huiñachirca.
46003007	Chashnamanta tarpuccama jucuchiccamantin mana imapash canun, Dioslla tucui can, paimi tarpushcata huiñachichin.
46003008	Tarpuccama, jucuchiccama chaipuralla canun, shinapash caran runa rurashca tuputa Dios cunca ran.
46003009	Tucuilla Dios mincashcapi llancanchic, cancunaca Dios llancacushca allpa canquichic, Dios ruracushca huasi.
46003010	Ñuca huasi rurana yachac cacpi, chai huasita rancapac Dios ñucata callarichihuarca, ranti shuc ñuca callarishcapi llancashpa caticun. Chashnapash, caranlla shayachicushcata allita ricushpa huasina tucun,
46003011	ña mana pipash shuc sapita cuti churaipac tucun, chai sapi Jesucristo can.
46003012	Cai sapi jahuapi shuti huasinalla tucun curihuan, cullquihuan, chiuclla rumicunahuan, caspihuan, huamahuan, pancahuan imapash;
46003013	ranti caran runa llancashcata puchucai taripanapimi tucui camai tucunca ran, chai puncha ninahuan shamunca, chai nina camanca caran runa ima shina llancana rurashcata.
46003014	Maicanpash mana rupac huasita rurashca cashpa, shuc cuyanata chasquinca;
46003015	ranti rupacpica, paillata imapash illac saquirinca ran, amuca quishpinca chari, ranti nina ucumanta quishpishca shina.
46003016	¿Manachu yachanquichic Diospac huasi cancuna cashcata? ¿Diospac Samaipash cancuna ucupi causacushcata manachu yachanquichic?
46003017	Pipash Diospac huasita huacllichicpi, Dios paitami huacllichinca, Diospac huasi sumaimana can, chai huasi cancunallata mari canquichic.
46003018	Ama pipash amullata umarichun: maicanpash cai pacha yachaita yapa yachac cashpa, mana yachac, upa shina tucuchun; chaimi alli quiquin yachac tucunca.
46003019	Diospac ñaupacpi cai pachamanta yachai mana imapash can, yanca. Chaimanta Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Cai pachamanta yachaccunata quiquin paicunapac yachaillapita Dios urmachin".
46003020	Shucpi riman: "Yachaccunapac yuyaicuna yanca cashcata Apunchic yachan".
46003021	Chairaicu ama pipash jatunyachun, maican runatapash catisticamanta, tucuillami cancunapac canun.
46003022	Pablo, Apolo, Pedro, cai pacha, causai, huañui, cunan causacushca, shamunca racuc: tucui cancunapac can,
46003023	cancunaca Cristopac canquichic, Cristoca Diospac can.
46004001	Cristopac runa shinalla cancuna ñucanchicta ricuna. canquichic, Diospi pacara yuyaicunata yachachincapac mincashcacuna.
46004002	Mincashcacuna cashpa, pactachic cashcata ricuchina can.
46004003	Ñucamanta rimacpi, mana imanahuanchu cancuna ñucamanta yuyashca, cai pachamanta apucuna taripashca mana imanahuanchu. Quiquin ñucapash mana tariparinichu.
46004004	Chashna cacpipash, ñuca ucupi tiyac Diospac Samai mana imamanta juchachihuacpipash, Diospac ñaupacpi mana jucha illacchu saquirini. Apunchic quiquin ñucata taripac can.
46004005	Chairaicu, ama ñaupacta taripaichicchu imatapash; Apunchic shamunacama chapaichic, paimi cunan pacara cashcata pacllapi llucshichinca, shuncupi yuyashcata ricsichinca. Chaipi shuti Diosmanta caranlla pai chacchana tupu cashcata cui tucunca.
46004006	Huauquicuna, cancunami cai shimicunata Apolopi, ñucapi yuyarishpa rimachihuanquichic; rimanimi ñucanchicmanta caita yachanuchun nishpa: Quillcarapi rimashcamanta ama ashtahuan rurancapac, ama pipash shucta jatunyachishpa chaishucta urayachincapac.
46004007	Ricushun, ¿canta maicanllaca tucuimanta yalli jatunyachishcachu? ¿Diosmanta mana chasquishcata imallatapash charinquichu? Paimanta chasquishca cashpallatachu, canpac munaimanta tupashca shina jatunyanqui.
46004008	Allita yuyacpi, cancuna ña tucuita charinquichic, mana imapash pishin, ñucanchic illac jatun apu tucushcanquichic. Shutipacha cancuna apu cacpi alli canman, ñucanchicpash cancunahuan apu cancapac.
46004009	¿Ñuca yuyarini, ñucanchicta, Apostolcunata huashaman Dios jichushca shina yachin, huañuncapac saquishcacunata shina. Angelcuna, runacuna, tucui pachapash ñucanchimanlla ñahuita churashpa tiyanun.
46004010	Cristoraicu upa runa shina ricui tucunchic, ranti cancunaca Cristoraicullata, yapa yachaccuna shina ricui tuncunquichic. Ñucanchic sanpa canchic, ranti cancuna sinchi. Ñucanchic millai tucunchic, ranti cancuna muchai tucunquichic.
46004011	Cunanllata yaricaihuan, llushtiyashpa ñacarinchic; runacuna ñucanchicta ñacachinun, mana quiquin huasita charindic,
46004012	ñucanchic maquihuan sanpayacta llancanchic. Piñashca shimihuan rimai tucushpa, bendisiashca shimihuan cutichinchic; piñashpa cati tucushpapash ñahui ricunchic.
46004013	Llullashca shimihuan huashachi tucushpapash, alli shuncuhuan cutipanchic. Cai pachamanta jamtsita shina ricunun, runacunapac ismata shina. Chashna canchic cunan punchacama.
46004014	Mana pincachincapacchu caita cancunaman quillcani, ashtahuan quiquin churicunata shinami camachini, cancunata llaquini mari.
46004015	Chunca huaranca runa Cristomanta yachachicta charishpapash, yayataca mana achcata charinquichicchu. Ñucami Cushi Shimihuan Cristopac causaita cancunata curcani.
46004016	Chairaicu ñuca causaita catipaichic cancunata mañani.
46004017	Chairaicullata ñuca Cristopi llaquishca, mana umachic churi Timoteota cancunapacman cachacuni. Paimi ima shina ñuca Cristo Jesusta inishpa causacushcata cancunaman yuyachinca, ñuca purishcapi tucui iniccunata yachachishca shina yachachinca.
46004018	Cancunamanta maicancuna ñuca "mana rincami yuyashpa", jatunyashpa tiyanun;
46004019	ranti, Apunchic munacpi mana unaillachu cancunata ricucrisha. Chaipimi ricusha chai jatunyashpa tiyaccuna imaliatashi rurana ushanun, mana paicuna shimihuan rimac ushashcailata.
46004020	Diospac pacha mana rimaillachu can, astahuan ushaimi can.
46004021	¿Imata ashtahuan alli can?, ¿cancunapacpi piñashcahuan pactashachu?, ¿ashtahuan alli shuncuhuanchu, llaquishcahuanchu pactasha?
46005001	Cancunamanta shuc runa quiquin la-mamata paipac huarmita rurashpa tiyashcata yachashcani. Cai yapa jatun jucha can, Diosta mana ricsic ucupipash mana chashna tucushcachu.
46005002	Chashna tucushcamanta chairapash cancuna jatunyanquichic llaquirina rantimanta. Ashtahuan allita ranquichicman carca cancuna ucumanta chai runata callpachishpa.
46005003	Ñuca, aichahuan mana cancunahuan tiyashpapash, ñuca samai chaipi can, cancunahuan tiyacushca shina, Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi chashna causac runata ña cautsayachishcanimi.
46005004	Cancuna tantarishcapi, ñuca samai cancunahuanmi tiyanca, Apunchic Jesuspac ushaipash chaillapitami canca.
46005005	Chaipimi chai runata supaiman cunquichic, chaipi paipac aicha huacllichi tucuchun, ranti, paipac samai quishpichishca cachun Apunchic Jesus shamushcapi.
46005006	Chashna rurashcacunahuan cancuna mana jatunyana canquichic. Uyashcanquichic cai rimaita: "Ansa levadurashitu achca tanta rurana harinata punquichin".
46005007	Chairaicu, chai huacllichic rucu levadurata canchaman jichuichic, Pascua raimipi, levadura iliac, mushu tanta shina cancuna cancapac, chashna mari canquichic cancuna. Cristo ñucanchipac pascua camari tucushcaraicu, cancuna levadura illac tanta cana canquichic.
46005008	Shina cacpi, Pascua raimita rurashun; rucu levadurata jichushun, chaica mana alli, huacllichic can; levadura illac tantata ashtahuan charishun, chaicuna chuya shuncu, cusca causai canun.
46005009	Juchalliccunahuan ama llutarinquichicchu, quillcarcani chaishuc cuti.
46005010	Chashna rimashcahuan mana tucui cai pachamanta mana allicunamanta chicanyancapacchu rimarcani, rimacpi mitsaccunamanta, shuhuaccunamanta, huacata chacchaccunamanta. Tucui paicunamanta chicanyanayashpa, cai pachamantami llucsina tucunquichicman.
46005011	Quillcashcahuan rimanayarcanimi, huauquimi cani rimashpaliata, mana alli causac, mitsac, huacata chacchac, rimaisiqui, machaisiqui, chashnacunahuan ama llutarincapac. Chashna runahuan, paihuan micuncapacllapash mana allichu.
46005012	¿Chicanmantacunata ñucachu taripasha? Cancunami cancunahuan tiyaccunata taripana canquichic yachihuan.
46005013	Chicanmantacunata saquichic Dios taripachun, ranti cancunaca, mana alli runata callpachichic cancuna ucumanta.
46006001	¿Cancunamanta maicanpash shuc huauquipacpi mana alli rai tucushcamanta rimana charishpa, Diosta mana ricsic apucunapacpi taripai tucuncapac allichu? ¿manachu ashtahuan Diospac runacunapacpi taripai tucuna alli can?
46006002	¿Shuc puncha tucui pacha runacunata cancuna taripana cashcata, manachu yachanquichic? Cai pachata taripana cashpallata, ¿cai uchilia juchashitucunatachu mana taripanata ushanquichic?
46006003	¿Quiquin angelcunallatatac ñucanchic taripana cashcata manachu yachanquichic? Shina cacpi, cai causaimanta llaquicunata cancunallami taripana canquichic.
46006004	Chashnamanta, cai causaipi piñanacuita charishpa, ¿allichu can cancuna iniccuna, mana iniccunapacpi taripai tucuna?
46006005	Cancunata pincachincapac caita rimani. ¿Cancunamanta manachu shucllapash tiyan, huauqui ucupi llaqui tiyacpi taripana ushancapac?
46006006	¡Mana huaquipura macanacuilla tiyan, ashtahuan Diosta mana ricsic apucunapacman taripai tucuncapac rinquichic!
46006007	Cancunapurallata macanacushca cancuna mana alli cashcata ricsichicun. Imatapash rurai tucushpa, ¿chunlla ñacarina manachu astahuan alli canman? Shuhuai tucushpapash chunlla saquirina, ¿manachu ashtahuan alli can?
46006008	Ranti cancuna, mana cuscata taripanquichic, quiquin huauquitapash shuhuanquichic.
46006009	Diosta chicnishpa causaccuna, Diospac pachapi mana yaicuna cashcata, ¿manachu yachanquichic? Ama umachi tucuichicchu, Diospac pachapi yumashpa juchalliccuna mana yaicu ushanunca mari; huacata chacchaccunapash, shucpac huarmihuan, shucpac carihuan causaccunapash, caripura yumariccunapash,
46006010	shuhuaccunapash, yanca llancachiccunapash, machaisiquicunapash, camisiquicunapash, umachishca shuhuaccunapash, mana yaicuna ushanuncachu.
46006011	Cancunamanta maicancuna chashna carcanquichic; ranti cuna, Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi, Diospac Samaipac shutipi, juchamanta pichashca saquirircanquichic, sumacyachishca, Dios-huanpash ailluyachishca saquirircanquichic.
46006012	Cai rimai tiyan: "Ñuca munashcata rurana ushanimi". Shuti can chai, ranti mana tucuita ruranachu. Ari, ñuca mana huatara cashpa ñuca munashcata rurashallami, ranti mana imapash huatashca charihuana can.
46006013	Cai rimaipash tiyan: "Micuna huicsa juntachincapac can, huicsaca micunata chasquincapac". Chaica shutimi can; chashna cacllapita, chaicunata Dios huacllichinca ran. Ranti, ñucanchic aicha mana maipipash yumarincapac can; ñucanchic aicha Apunchicpac can, Apunchic ñucanchic aichapac can.
46006014	Dios Apunchicta huañushcamanta causachishca shina, ñucanchictapash paipac ushaihuan causachincami.
46006015	Cancunapac aicha Cristopac aicha cashcata, ¿manachu yachanquichic? Chai Cristopac aichata japishpa shuc nuspa huarmiman llutachincapac, ¿allichu canca? Mana allichu shuti.
46006016	Shuc runa, shuc nuspa huarmihuan llutarishpa shuc aichalla tucushcata, ¿manachu yachanquichic? Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Ishcantinmi shuclla runa shina tucunquichic".
46006017	Chashnaliata, maicanpash Apunchicman llutaricpi, samaipi shuclla paihuan tucun.
46006018	Yumashpa juchallinamanta chicapac anchurichic. Maican juchatapash shuc runa ruracpi, chai jucha canchapi saquirin, ranti yumashpa juchallic quiquin paipac aichata juchallichin.
46006019	Cancunapac aicha Dios cushca Samaipac huasi cashcata, ¿manachu yachanquichic? Cancuna mana quiquin aichapac amu canquichic,
46006020	rantishcami canquichic. Chairaicu Diosta jatunyachina canquichic cancunapac aichahuan.
46007001	Cancuna quillcapi tapushcata cutipani. Alli canman runa mana sahuarishpa;
46007002	ranti, huarmita munashpa ñacarinamanta, caran runa quiquin huarmita charicpi, alli tucun; caran huarmi quiquin carita charicpi, alli tucun.
46007003	Cari, huarmi sahuarishpa, sahuarishcacuna ruranata pactachina canun.
46007004	Huarmi mana paipac quiquin aichapac amu can, paipac caripac can; caripash mana paipac quiquin aichapac amu can, paipac huarmipac can.
46007005	Chairaicu, ama mitsanacuichicchu cancunapura; cancunapura ama tacarincapac rimarishpa, chaica cancuna ushanacama sasichic cai pachapi Dios-huan rimarincapac. Chai huasha cutillata ishcantin llutarina canquichic; yancamanta yapalla munanayacpi supai urmachinca.
46007006	Chaita munashpa ruraichic; shinapash mana rurai nishcachu can.
46007007	Ñuca jinuca munaiman cancuna ñuca shina cancapac; ranti Dios caran runaman chican yuyaicunata cushca, nicpi, caita shucta, paitaca shuc layata.
46007008	Mana sahuarishcacunata huacchacunatapash rimani, allimi can mana sahuarishpa causana, ñuca shina.
46007009	Shinapash sapalla mana causanata ushashpa, sahuarinuchun; sahuarinami ashtahuan alli huarmita munashpa ñacarishpa causana rantimanta.
46007010	Ranti sahuarishcacunata, cai rurai nishcata cuni, mana ñuca rimascachu, Apunchic rimashcami can: Huarmi carita ama jichuchun.
46007011	Jichushca cashpa, ama cuti sahuarichun, munashpaca paipac carillahuata alliyachun. Caripash chashnallata, huarmita mana jichuna can.
46007012	Shuccunataca rimanimi, caica ñuca shimimi can, mana Apunchic rimashca: Maican huauquipash Diosta mana inic huarmita charishpa, chai huarmi, shina cashpallata, paihuan causanata munacpi, ama jichuchun.
46007013	Chashnallata, shuc inic huarmi, mana inic carihuan sahuarishca cashpa, cuti chai runa, shina cashpallata paihuan causana munacpi, paita ama jichuchun.
46007014	Mana inic cari, paipac huarmi inishcamanta sumacyachishca tucun; mana inic huarmipash, inic carihuan llutarishca cashpa chicanyachishca saquirin. Mana chashna cacpi, cancunapac churicuna ticllayuc canunman; ranti allita rimacpi, paicunapash Diospac chicanyachishca canun.
46007015	Cunan ranti, mana inic cari, mana inic huarmi imapash, jichunacunata munashpa, jichunacunuchunlla. Shina tucucpi, huauqui cashpa, pani cashpa imapash quishpira saquirinun, Dios cancunata alli causaipi causancapac cayashcaraicu.
46007016	Rimacpica, ¿can huarmi, yachanquichu canpac carita quishpichina ushashcata? ¿Can, caripash, yachanquichu canpac huarmita quishpichina ushashcata?
46007017	Imashna cacpipash, caran runa Apunchic cushca cuyaicunapi causachun, ñucanchic Dios cayashca pachapi cashca shina. Tucui iniccunata cai rurai nishcata cuni.
46007018	Cara pitishca runata Dios cayacpi, pai cashcata ama pacachun chai runa; cara mana pitishca cayai tucushpa, carata ama pitirichun. Cara pitishca,
46007019	cara mana pitishca cana mana imananchu. Dios rimashcata pactachina shuti chaimi yapa imanan.
46007020	Dios cayashca pachapi cashca shina caranlla catichun.
46007021	Huatara cashcapi cayai tucushca cashpa, chaimanta ama yapa yuyarichun; shinapash, chashna cashcamanta llushpirinata ushashpa, utcapanqui.
46007022	Huatara cashcapi Apunchicta inincapac cayai tucushca runa, cunan quishpichishca, Apunchicpac runa can; chashnallata, quishpishca cashcapi cayai tucushca cashpa, cunanca Cristopi huatara can.
46007023	Cancuna Dios rahtishcami canquichic, chairaicu shuc runacunapacpi mana huatai tucuna canquichic.
46007024	Shina cacpi, huauquicuna, caranlla Diospac ñaupacpi catichun pai cayai tucushca puncha cashca shina.
46007025	Mana sahuarinamanta, mana imatapash Apunchic rimahuashcachu, ranti ñuca yuyaita cuni, ñuca shimita cancuna uyanata yachashpa, Apunchic ñucata llaquihuashcaraicu.
46007026	Ñuca yuyacpi shuc runa pai cunan cashca shina saquirina can, yapa llaqui pachapi cunan causacushcaraicu.
46007027	Huarmiyuc cashpa, paita ama jichuichu; huarmi illac cashpa, ama mashcaichu.
46007028	Sahuarishpa, mana juchata ruranqui; shuc malta huarmipash sahuarishpa, paipash mana juchallin. Ranti sahuariccuna cai pacha llaquita charinca ranun, ñuca munaiman chaicunata ama charinuchun.
46007029	Huauquicuna, caitami rimanayani: Mana unai caipi causanca ranchic. Chairaicu, sahuarishcacuna mana sahuarishca shina causana canquichic;
46007030	llaquirishcacuna, raimipi cashca shina tiyana canquichic; ranti raimicuccuna, llaquirishca shina tiyana canquichic; ranticcuna, impash mana cancunapac cacpi shina causana canquichic;
46007031	cai pachapi cushiyashpa causaccuna, mana chashna causacushca shina ricuchina canquichic, cai ñucanchic ricucushca pacha tucurina mari can.
46007032	Tucui ima llaquirinacunamanta cancunata quishpichinata munaiman. Huarmi illac runa Apunchicpacta ruranacunapi yuyarin, paita cushiyachinamanta yuyarin;
46007033	ranti huarmiyuc runa cai pacha imacunamanta yuyarin, paipac huarmita cushiyachinamanta yuyarin;
46007034	chashna cashpa chaupichishca can. Chashnallata, cari illac huarmi mana imura sahuaric huarmipash, Apunchicpac ruranacunapi yuyarin, paipac aicha paipac samaipash Diospac chicanyachishca cashpa; ranti cariyuc huarmi cai pachapi tiyac imacunamanta yuyarishpa causan, paipac carita cushiyachinamantapash.
46007035	Caita cancunapac allipac rimani, mana tictata churasha nishpa, cancuna allita causancapac, Apunchicta tucui shuncuhuan yanapashpa.
46007036	Maicanpash pai mañashca huarmihuan, sahuarina pacha huata pactarishcaraicu, sahuarinami can yuyashpa, chashnami ashtahuan alli can yuyashpa, sahuarichunlla; chai mana jucha can.
46007037	Cuti shuc, mana munashpa, pai quiquinmanta munashcata ruracushpa, paipac shuncupi mana sahuarincapac sinchita yuyarishpa, allita racun.
46007038	Shina, pai mañashca huarmihuan sahuarishpa, allita ran; ranti mana sahuarishpa, ashtahuan yapa allita ran.
46007039	Sahuarishca huarmi cariman huatashca, can pai causanacama; ranti cari huañucpi, chai, huarmi quishpira ¿saquirin pihuanpash sahuarina ushancapac, shinapash chai cari inic runa cana can.
46007040	Ñuca yuyacpi mana cuti sahuarishpami ashtahuan yalli cushi causanca yachihuan. Caimi ñucapac yuyai, Diospac Samaita ñucapash charinimi yachihuan.
46008001	Huacacunaman camari shina cushca micunamanta rimanca rani. Chai ña ricsishca can: tucuilla yachaita charinchic; shina cacpipash yachaihuan jatunyashca tucunchic, ranti llaquina Dios cushca samaipi jatunyachin.
46008002	Maicanpash pacta yachanimi yuyashpa, chaira mana yachan maipi quiquin yachai cashcata.
46008003	Ranti maicanpash Diosta llaquicpi, Dios paita ricsin.
46008004	Huacacunaman camari shina cushca aichamanta nicpi, ¿micunallachu? Huacacuna cai pachapi mana imapash alli cashcata yachanchic; shuclla Dios tiyashcatapash yachanchic.
46008005	Shuc dioscuna tiyashcamanta cai pachapi jahua pachapipash rimai tiyan chaimanta rimacpi achca dioscuna, achca apunchiccuna mana pishinchu.
46008006	Shina cacpipash, shuc Dioslla ñucanchicpac tiyan: pai can Yaya. Tucui cai pachapi tiyashca paimanta shamun, ñucanchicpash paipac causanchic. Shuclla Apunchicpash tiyan, Jesucristo; pairaicu tucui imapash tiyan, ñucanchicpash pairaicullata tiyanchic.
46008007	Shina cacpipash mana tucuilla caita yachanun. Maicancuna chaira huacata chacchanapi yacharishcacuna, chai huaicacunaman chicanyachishca aichami yuyashpa micunun; chai aichata micushpa, paipac ininapi mana rucuyashca cashpa huaca ticllayachishcami cani yuyan.
46008008	Mana ñucanchic micushcaraicuchu Diospi chasqui tucushun; micushcaraicu mana ashtahuan alli tucushunchu, mana micushcaraicupash mana ashtahuan huacllishunchu.
46008009	Shutipacha ñucanchic munashcata rurana ushanchic, ranti yuyapanquichic, chai cancuna "munashcata rurashca" sanpa inina chariccunata ama juchapi urmachichun.
46008010	Can chaicunata yachac cashpa, huaca chacchanapi tiyarishpa micucushcapi, shuc sanpa inina charic huauqui ricushpa, yancamanta paipash chai camari shina huacacunaman cushca aichata micunca imapash.
46008011	Chashna, can yachashcahuan sanpa inina charic canpac huauquita juchallichinqui, Cristoca pairaicupash huañushca mari.
46008012	Mana sinchi inina charic huauquicuna, mana alli rurashcata ricuchishpa, quiquin Cristota ñacachinquichic.
46008013	Chairaicu, ñuca micushcamanta ñuca huauquita juchallichishpa, aichata maican punchapash mana micucpi chari alli tucuhuanca, ama ñuca huauquita juchallichincapac.
46009001	Ñucapash, ¿ñuca munashcata rurana ushac cashcata manachu ricunquichic? ¿Ñucapash manachu apostol cani?, ¿manachu ñucapash Apunchic Jesusta ricurcani? ¿Manachu cancunallata ñuca Apunchicpacta llancashcaraicu inic canquichic?
46009002	Maicancuna mana apostolta shina imachari ricuhuanun; ranti cancuna quiquin apostolta ñucapi ricuna canquichic, cancuna Apunchicpi inishpa caticushca ñuca apostol cashcata ricsichicun.
46009003	Caimi piñaccunamah ñuca cutipashca shimi:
46009004	Micunata upianata ñucapash japina ushanimi;
46009005	shuc inic huarmitapash charina ushanimi, shuc apostolcuna, Apunchicpac huauquicuna Pedropash charishca shina.
46009006	¿Bernabehuan ñucallahuanchu iniccunata yanapashpa causana cahchic?
46009007	¿Maican soldadollapash paipac munaimanta paipac ushaillahuan macanuncapac rinchu? Tarpushca uva ña pucucpi, ¿mana micuc runa tiyanchu? Huacrata huiñachishpallata, ¿chucu yacuta mana upiac runa tiyanchu?
46009008	Chaica runa yuyaillami can ama yuyanquichicchu, Moisespash camachic quillcapi caimanta rimanmi.
46009009	Cashna quillcashca tiyan camachic quillcapi: "Muyuta cutac huacrata ama sincata huatanqui". Mana Dios huacracunamanta yuyarishcatachu riman;
46009010	ñucanchicmanta yuyarishcatami rimacun. Ñucanchicraicu camachic quillca quillcashca tiyan, allpata yapuccama muyuta cutaccamapash pallai puncha micunca racushcata, ¿mana chari yachanquichicchu?
46009011	Chairaicu, ñucanchic cancunapi allicunata tarpushca cashpa, mana yapalla quiilachishca yachin cancunamanta ansa micunashitu mañashca.
46009012	Shuccuna cancuna charishcamanta micushpa causaranucpi, ñucanchicta ashtahuan yalli cuyana canquichic. Shinapash mana mañashcanchicchu, tucuitami ñacarishcanchic Cristopac Cushi Shimita yachachishcapi ama llaqui jatarichun nishpa.
46009013	Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina Diospac huasipi llancaccuna, Diospac huasiman cushca camarimanta micushcata. Rimacpica, Diosman camarita rupachina altarpi llancaccuna, Diosman chaipi camari shina cushca huacra aichamanta micunun.
46009014	Chasnallata Apunchic munarca Cushi Shimita ricsichiccuna, chai Cushi Shimipi llancashcahuan causanuchun.
46009015	Ranti ñuca mana shuc cutillapash cui tucuna cashcata mañashcanichu, caitapash mana quillcanichu cancunata imallapash mañanaraicu. Ñaupacta huañuiman, chai jatunyanata mana pipash quichuhuancachu.
46009016	Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachishcahuan mana jatunyanichu, mana saquipac pactachinami can yuyani. Mana yuyarinayahuanchu mana yachachishcamanta imashna ñacarina cashcata.
46009017	Ñuca munaimanta rurashpa, cui tucunata ña japishcani; ranti, pactachinata piñarishpa rurashpapash, Dios ñucaman mincashcata pactachicuni.
46009018	Chairaicu, ñuca cui tucushca canmi Diospac Cushi Shimita cushiyashcahuan yachachina, mana shuc cullqui imatapash chapashpa; nicpi, ñuca Cushi Shimita yachachishcamanta cui tucunata mana japishpa.
46009019	Mana pipash huatashca charihuacpipash, shinapash tucuicunata yanapani, ñuca ushashca tupu runata Jesucristopacman pushana yuyaillahuan,
46009020	Judiocunata pushanaraicu, runa ucupi judio tucushcani; rimacpi, paicunia Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachic cacpi, ñucapash paicuna shina pactachircani, mana imaraicu pactachina cashpallata.
46009021	Moisespac camachic quillcata mana pactachiccunata pushanaraicu, paicuna causashca shinallata causani, allita rimacpi ñucaca Diospac Camachic quillcatami pactachini, Cristota catic cashpa.
46009022	Ansalla iniccuna ucupi cashpa, paicuna shina ansalla inic tucuni, paicunatapash pushanaraicu. Maipipash paicuna shina tucushcani, maicanllatapash quishpinaman pushashami yuyashpa.
46009023	Tucuitami Cristopac Cushi Shimiraicu rurani, ñucapash paita chasquina ushancapac.
46009024	Callpashpa pucllacushcapi tucuilla callpanun, ranti shuc runalla cuyashcata japin. Shina cacpi, cuyashcata japina yuyaihuan callpaichic.
46009025	Shuc pucllanapi yaicunca raccuna sasinun. Paicuna chaita ranun, manapash unaipi chaquiric pancamanta llaututa japinaraiculla; ranti ñucanchic shuc mana chaquiric llaututa chasquinaraicu ñacarinchic.
46009026	Chairaicu ñuca ricushpa callpani; huairapi mana huactanichu;
46009027	chaipac rantimanta, ñuca aichata ñacachinimi, ñuca munashcata pai ruran, ama shuccunata yachachishca huasha ñucallata huashaman jichurishca saquirincapac.
46010001	Huauquicuna, tucui ñucanchic rucu yayacuna chai puyu llantupi purishcata paicuna ñucñu yacuta chinpashcatapash, cancuna cuncarincapac mana munanichu.
46010002	Chashna tucui paicuna Moiseshuan llutarishca saquirinurca puyupi, ñucñu yacupi bautisai tucushcamanta.
46010003	Chashnallata tucui paicuna chai Dios cuyashca micunallatata micunurca,
46010004	tucuiila chai Dios cuyashca upianamantallata upianurca. Paicunahuan puricuc rumimanta upianurca, chai rumi Cristo carca.
46010005	Chashna cacllapita, paicunamanta achca runa Diospac ñaupacpi mana alli canurca, chairaicu chaicuna chunlla allpapi huañushpa jichurinurca.
46010006	Paicuna tucushca ñucanchic ricuncapac tucurca, paicuna mana allita munashca shina ñucanchic ama munancapac.
