46010007	Chairaicu, ama huacacunata chacchaichicchu, paicunamanta maicancuna rurashca shina; chashna rurashcamanta Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Runacuna micuncapac, upiancapac tiyarinurca, chai huasha tushuncapac shayarinurca".
46010008	Yumashpa juchallinata saquichic, paicunamanta maicancuna juchallishca shina, chashnamanta shuc punchallapi ishcai chunca quimsa huaranca huañunurca,
46010009	Cristota camanata ama yuyashunchic, paicunamanta maicancuna rurashca shina; chashnamanta machacui canishca huañunurca.
46010010	Diosta ama camichicchu, paicunamanta maicancuna camishca shina; chashnamanta Diospac angel paicunata huañuchirca.
46010011	Tucui caicuna ñucanchic rucucunapi tucurca; ñucanchiraicu Dios quillcashca shimipi quillcara saquirirca, cai puchucai pachapi causaccuna atipashpa causana cashcata yuyachincapac.
46010012	Chashnamanta, sinchimi cani yuyac runa, urmanata yuyanqui.
46010013	Cancunapac llaquicuna runa ñacari ushana tupulla canushca. Cancuna Diosmanta chapana canquichic, runa ñacari ushana tupulla llaquicunata charincapac. Shina cacpipash, cancuna llaqui charishcapi Diosmi sinchicuchinca ama urmancapac.
46010014	Chairaicu, yapa llaquishca huauquicuna, huacacuna chacchanamanta anchurichic.
46010015	Yuyayuc runacunatami rimani, chairaicu cancunallata ñuca rimashcata taripana ushanquichic.
46010016	Bendisiashca vinota upiashcapi, chaimanta Diosta pacrachunchic; chashnapi Cristohuan shuclla tucunchic paipac yahuarpi; ñucanchic paquishca tantamanta micushpa, Cristohuan shuclla tucunchic paipac aichapi.
46010017	Achca cashpapash, shuc tantamantallata tucui micunchic, chairaicumi shuclla aicha canchic.
46010018	Israel runacunata ricuichic: camari shina cushca aichamanta micuccuna, paicuna camari shina ricuchishcahuan shuclla tucunun.
46010019	Chaihuan mana rimanichu shuc huaca allimi nishpa, camari shina cushca aicha shuc aichacunamanta yalli allimi nishpa.
46010020	Caitami ñuca rimani: Diosta mana ricsiccuna shuc camarita ricuchishpa, supaicunaman ricuchiranun, Diosta mana. Supaicunahuan cancuna llutarincapac ñuca mana munani.
46010021	Apunchicpac vinomanta, chaillapita supaipacmantapash mana upiaipacchu. Apunchicpac micunamanta, chaillapita supaipamantapash mana micuipacchu.
46010022	¿Apunchitacchu tunpachisha yuyanquichic? ¿Paimanta yalli sinchichu canchic imata?
46010023	Cai rimai tiyan: "Ñuca munashcata rurana ushanillami". Chai shuti can, ranti mana tucui alli can. Ñucanchic imata rurana ushacpipash, mana tucui Dios cuyashca sinchicuncapac yanapan.
46010024	Mana ñucanchipac allillata mashcana canchic, ashtahuan shuccunapac allita mashcana canchic.
46010025	Rantichishca aichata micuichiclla ama imatapash tapushpa, shuccuna imatapash yuyarinamanta;
46010026	tucui cai pacha paipi tiyashcacunantin Apunchicpac mari can.
46010027	Shuc mana inic runa micuncapac canta cayacpi, can chaiman rishpa, paicuna churashcata micuilla mana imatapash tapushpa, paicuna imatapash yuyanamanta.
46010028	Cunan cuti, maicanpash: "Cai aicha camari aichami" rimacpi, ama micuichicchu rimashcata uyashcaraicu, pai imatapash yuyarinamanta.
46010029	Shuc runa paipac ucupi charishca Diospac yachaimanta rimacuni, cancunapacmantaca mana. Ranti pipash tapunca imapashmi: ¿Ñuca munashcata rurashcamanta, shuc runapac Dios cushca yachaichu taripahuanca?
46010030	¿Micushcamanta Diosta pacrachucllapita camihuanuncachu?
46010031	Shina cacpi, micushpa, upiashpa, imatapash rurashpa, tucuita Diosta jatunyachincapac ruranquichic.
46010032	Ama pitapash yachachichicchu mana alli rurashcacunata: judio cacpi, mana judio cacpi, Diosta iniccuna cacpi imapash.
46010033	Ñuca ranti, tucuicunata ñuca rurashcahuan tucuipi paicunata cushiyachini; mana ñucapac allillata mashcashpa, ashtahuan shuccunapactami mashcani, paicunapash quishpinata charinuchun nishpa.
46011001	Ñuca shina causaichic, ñuca Cristota catishca shina
46011002	Tucui pachapi ñucamanta yuyarishcaraicu, ñuca yachachishca shina cancuna caticushcaraicu, yapa cushiyani.
46011003	Ranti munanimi Cristo caran runapac uma cashcata cancuna atipancapac, caripash paipac huarmipac uma cashcata atipancapac, Dios Cristopac uma cashca shina.
46011004	Shuc cari runa Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, Diospac Cushi Shimita imapash yachachicushcapi umata quillparishpa, paipac uma cacta pincachin.
46011005	Ranti, shuc huarmi Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, Diospac Cushi Shimita imapash yachachicushcapi, umata mana quillparishpa, paipac uma cacta pincachin; acchata illacta pitirishca shina can.
46011006	Shuc huarmi umata mana quillparinayashpa, ashtahuan acchata illacta pitirichun. Ranti shuc huarmi accha pitirinata pincashpa, umata quillparichun.
46011007	Shuc cari runa umata mana quillparinachu, Diospac ricchai cashcaraicu, Dios jatun cashcata ricsichicun. Ranti huarmica cari jatunyashcata ricsichicun,
46011008	carica mana huarmimanta rurai tucurca, huarmi shuti carimanta surcui tucurca.
46011009	Cari mana huarmiraicu tiyan, ranti huarmi shuti cariraicu tiyan.
46011010	Chairaicullata, angelcunaraicupash, huarmi shucta uyac cashcata ricuchic unanchata paipac umapi charina can.
46011011	Chashna cashpapash, cai pacha causaipi, huarmi illacpi cari mana tiyan, huarmipash cari illacpi mana tiyan.
46011012	Huarmi carimanta surcui tucushca cacpipash, cari huarmimanta pacarin, chashnallata ishcantincuna Diosmanta shamunun.
46011013	Cancunallata taripaichic, ¿shuc huarmi mana umata quillparishpa Dios-huan rimaricpi allichu canca?
46011014	Ñucanchic causaillapita ricunchic, ima shina shuc cari runa suni acchata huiñachina yapa pincaipac cashcata;
46011015	ranti shuc suni acchayuc huarmi sumac ricurin, paipac uma sumac quillpara saquirin.
46011016	Ima shina cacpipash, pipash caimanta rimarinata munashpa, ñucanchic mana shuc yachaita charishcata, iniccuna mana shuc yachaicunata charishcata yachana can.
46011017	Cunan caita quillcacushpa, mana cushiyashcahuanchu rurani, cancunapac tantarinacuna alli rurana rantimanta, cancunata huacllichicun.
46011018	Caita uyashcani, callarishun: Diosta chacchancapac tantarishcapi, chausirishca cancunapi ricurin; shutimi yuyani ñuca chaica.
46011019	¡Cancuna ucupi chicanyashca tiyana can, chaipimi maicanlla quiquin cristiano cashca ricsi tucunca!
46011020	Chashna chausirishca cashcaraicu, cancunapac tantarina ña mana Apunchicpac quiquin micuna can.
46011021	Ña micuna pacha pactashcapi, caranlla pai apamushca micunata japishpa micunun; maicancuna yaricai tiyacllapita, shuccunaca machanun.
46011022	¿Upiana huasi, micuna huasi cancunapacpi manachu tiyan? ¿Iniccunata millashcahuan ricuncapac allichu? ¿Tsuntsucunata pincachincapac allichu? ¿Ñuca rimanca rashcata yachanquichicchu? ¿Cushiyashachu? ¡Manapacha allichu chaica!
46011023	Caitami Apunchicmanta yacharcani: Apunchic Jesus pai japi tucunca rashca tutallata, paipac maquipi tantata japirca;
46011024	Diosta pacrachushca, huasha, paquishpa rimarca: "Caimi ñuca aicha, cancunapac allipac huañuchincapac cushca. Ñucata yuyarishpa caita niraichic".
46011025	Chashnallata, micushca huasha, paipac maquipi calista japishpa, nirca: "Cai calis mushu curishca shimi can ñuca yahuarhuan pactachishca. Caran upiashcapi, ñucata yuyarishpa caita ruraichic".
46011026	Chairaicu, Apunchic shamunacama, caran cai tantamanta micushcapi, caran cai calista upiashcapi, Apunchic huañushcata huillanquichic.
46011027	Chasnamanta, maicanpash chai tantamanta micushcapi, chai vinomanta upiashcapi, mana chuya shuncuyuc cashpa, Apunchicpac aichapi yahuarpi jatun juchata ruran.
46011028	Chairaicumanta, chai tantamanta chaira mana micushcapi, chai vinomanta chaira mana upiashcapi, caranlla ñaupacta ucupi tiyac Dios cushca yachaita ricuna canchic.
46011029	Micushpa upiashpa Apunchicpac aicha cashcata mana atipashpa, pai quiquinllata ñacarincapac micun, upian.
46011030	Chairaicu cancunamanta achca uncuc, sanpa tiyanun, maicancunaca huañunushca.
46011031	Ñucanchicllata allita tariparicpi, Apunchic ñucanchicta mana ñacachinmanchu;
46011032	shinapash ñucanchic yachancapac, ama ñucanchic huiñaipac ñacarinaman cai pachamantacunahuan richun nishpami, Apunchic ñucanchicta ñacachin.
46011033	Chairaicu huauquicuna, micuncapac tantarishcapi, chapanacuichic.
46011034	Maicanpash yaricai cashpa, paipac huasipi micuchun, ama chashna tantarinamanta Diospacpi ñacachi tucuncapac. Shuc imacunamantapash cancunata ricuncapac rishpami allichisha.
46012001	Huauquicuna, caita Dios cuyashcacunamanta cancunata yuyachini:
46012002	Cancuna chaira Diosta mana inic cashcapi cancunapac mana shimiyuc huacacunata ñausa shina catirayarcanquichic.
46012003	Ranti, cunan mana cashnachu Diospac Samaihuan. Diospac Samaihuan puric mana rimancachu: "Jesusta mana munanichu" nishpa, mana Diospac Samai paita rimachicpi.
46012004	Shuc runa caran laya Dios cuyashcata charincami, chashnapash shuc Samaillata chaita cuyacun.
46012005	Caran laya yanapana tiyan, shinapash tucui shuc Apunchicllata mincashca can.
46012006	Caran laya rurana ushaicuna tiyanun, ranti shuc Diosllata tucuita tucuicunapi ruran.
46012007	Caran runaman Dios cuyan paipac: Samaipac ushaita, chai runa shuccunata yanapancapac.
46012008	Maican runacunata Diospac Samai alli yuyaicunata rimachin; shuccunata, chai Samaillata Diospi pacara yachaicunata ricsichin.
46012009	Shuccuna, inina chasquinun chai Samaimantallata, ranti shuccunaca uncuccunata janpina ushaita chasquinun.
46012010	Shuccuna mancharicushiyanacunata rurana ushaita chasquinun, shuccunaca Diosmanta shamuc shimicunata yachachina ushaita chasquinun. Maicancuna, alli Samai, mana aili samai cashcata ricsina ushaita chasquinun; shuccunaca caran laya shimi rimana ushaita chasquinun; cuti shuccunaca chasquinun chai shimicunapi rimashcata atipachina ushaita.
46012011	Tucui chaicuna shuc Samaimantallata shamun, paimi caran runaman pai munashcata cuyan.
46012012	Shuc runa, paipac aichapi achca uchilla aichacunata charishpallata, shuclla aicha can. Chashnallata Cristo.
46012013	Tucui ñucanchic judio cashpa, griego cashpa, huatara cashpa, quishpira cashpa, shuc Samaillapita bautisai tucurcanchic shuc aichalla tucuncapac; chairapash tucuilla chai Samaimantallata upiachi tucurcanchic.
46012014	Runa mana shuc aichalla can, achca uchilla aichacunata charin.
46012015	Chairaicu, chaqui mashnapash mana maquichu cani, mana aichamantachu cani nishpa rimacpipash, aichamanta mana chican can.
46012016	Rinripash, mashna mana ñahuichu cani, chairaicu; mana aichamantachu cani nishpa rimacpipash, aichamanta mana chican can.
46012017	Tucui aicha ñahuilla cacpi, mana uyana ushanchicman. Tucui aicha rinrilla cacpi, mana mutquina ushanchicman.
46012018	Ranti Dios caran uchilla aichata pai allimi yuyashcapi churarca.
46012019	Shuc uchilla aichalla cacpi, runa mana tiyanman.
46012020	Allita yuyaricpi, achca uchilla aichacunata charishpallata, shuclla aicha canchic.
46012021	Ñahui, maquita "canta mana mutsunichu" mana rimana ushan; umapash, chaquicunata "cancunata mana mutsunichu" mana rimana ushan.
46012022	Rimacpi, ashtahuan yanca aichashitucuna ricuric, yalli mutsushca canun;
46012023	mana yapa mutsushca aichacunata, yapa sumacta churachinchic. Ranti pincaipac ricuric aichacunataca allita quillpanchic,
46012024	alli ricuriccunata mana quillpanchic. Ñucanchic aichamanta ashtahuan mana alli ricuriccunata, Dios jatunyachishca cancapac munashca;
46012025	chashna rurarca ñucanchic aicha ucupi ama chausirina tiyancapac, ashtahuan tucui uchilla aichapura ricurinuchun munarca.
46012026	Shuc uchilla aicha ñacaricpi, tucui shuccunapash ñacarinun; chashnallata, shuc uchilla aicha cuyai tucucpi, tucuilla cushiyanun.
46012027	Shina cacpi, cancuna Cristopac aicha canquichic, caran runa chai aichamanta uchilla aichami canquichic.
46012028	Dios munarca iniccuna ucupi apostolcuna ñaupac tiyancapac; chai huasha profetacuna; chai huasha yachachiccuna; chai huasha mancharicushiyanacunata ruraccuna, uncuccunata janpiccuna, yanapaccuna, pushaccamacunapash, chican shimicunata rimaccunapash tiyachun munarca.
46012029	Mana tucui apostol canun; mana tucui profeta canun. Mana tucuilla yachachic canun, mana tucuilla mancharicushiyanacunata rurac canun,
46012030	mana tucui uncuccunata janpina ushaita charinun. Mana tucuilla caran laya shimita rimac canun, mana tucui chai shimicunapi rimashcata atipachina ushaita charinun.
46012031	Chashna cacpi, tucuimanta ashtahuan alli Dios cuyashcacunata chasquina yuyaita cancuna charina canquichic. Ñucami cancunata ashtahuan alli ñanpita ricsichincapac racuni.
46013001	Tucui cai pachapi tiyac shimicunata rimashami, angelcunapac shimitapash rimashami, ranti mana llaquinata charishpa, antamanta campana tacacpi uyarishca shinallami casha.
46013002	Dios rimashcata runacunaman ricsichishami, paipac ucupi pacashca tiyashcacunatapash ricsishami, tucui imacunatapash yachashami, achca inina charishpa urcucunata cuyuchishami, ranti llaquinata mana charishpa, yancami casha.
46013003	Tsuntsucunaman tucui ñuca charishcata cuyashami, ñuca aichatapash rupachi tucuncapac cushami, chashnapash mana llaquinata charishpa, yanca rurashcallami canca.
46013004	Llaquinata charishca can llaqui tiyashcapi cushi canami; yapa alli shuncuyuc canami can; chiquicuita mana charinami can; mana yapa ushayucmi cani yuyanami can, mana jatunyanami can, mana pincai illac canami can, mana amupacllata yuyaric canami can; mana piñarinami can, chai piñarita mana huiñaipac huacaichinami can;
46013006	alli ruranamanta cushiyanami can; mana alli ruranamanta, mana.
46013007	Caimi llaquinata charishca can: Tucuimanta ñacarina, ima llaquipash tiyashcapi cushi cana, tucuita inina, tucuita chapana,
46013008	Llaquina maican punchapash mana chincarincachu. Profeta cana shuc puncha saquinuncami, cai pachapi tiyac shimicunapi ña mana rimanuncachu, pacashca yachaicunata ña mana mutsushunchicchu.
46013009	Pacashca yachaicuna, inina punchayachic shimicuna mana pactachishca mari canun,
46013010	pactachishca shamucpi, paicuna chincarinuncami.
46013011	Huahua cashpa, huahua shina yuyarircani, rimarcani, tariparcani; ranti rucuyashcapi, huashaman jichurihuarca tucui huahua shina cana.
46013012	Cunan, shuc rirpupi shina mana pasacta ricunchic; ranti shuc puncha ima shina cashcata pasacta ricushun. Cunan ñuca ricsishca mana pactachishca can, ranti shuc puncha ricsishami Dios ñucata ricsihuashca shina.
46013013	Cunan charinchic inina, chapana, llaquina; quimsa canun; shinapash cai quimsacunamanta "llaquina" ashtahuan yalli alli can.
46014001	Cancunapura llaquinacunata yuyarichic, chashnallata Dios cuyashcacunata tarinata yapa yuyarina canquichic, Dios ricsichishcacunata yachachina cuyaita ashtahuan yapa mashcaichic.
46014002	Chican shimita rimac runa, mana runacunata rimacun paita mana pipash atipashcaraicu, Diosta rimacun. Pai rimashca Diospac Samaimanta shamun, chaita mana pipash yachan.
46014003	Ranti, Dios rimachishcata yachachic, ininapi runacunata huiñachichicun, sinchicuchishcahuan, camachishcahuan.
46014004	Chican shimipi rimac runa, paillata ininapi huiñacun; ranti Dios rimachishcata yachachic runa, iniccunata huiñachicun.
46014005	Ñuca munaiman tucui cancuna chican shimipi rimana ushac cancapac; ranti ashtahuan yalli allimi canman tucui cancuna Dios rimachishcata shuccunata yachachiha; chaimi chican shimipi rimanamanta ashtahuan alli can; pai chican shimipi rimashcata atipaipac shimiman chinpachicpi alli can, iniccunata ininapi huiñashpa catincapac.
46014006	Chairaicu huauquicuna, ñuca cancunata ricucrishpa chican shimipi rimacpi, yanca ricucrishcalla saquirin; Dios ñucanchicmanta munashcata mana rimacpi, mana ima yachachinata cancunapi saquicpi, mana Dios rimachishcata yachachicpi, ima shina catina cashcata mana yachachicpi, yanca can.
46014007	Chashnallata, shuc pincullu, shuc huancar, mana caranlla chican uyarinata charic cashpa, mana yachai canman maican uyaricushcata.
46014008	Shuc macanacuipi, trompeta nishca pai rimanayashcata mana pasacta uyachicpi, mana pipash macarincapac shayarinmanchu.
46014009	Chashnallata cancunapipash tucun: cancuna mana atipaipac shimicunata rimacpi, mana pipash yachancachu imata rimanayashcata. ¡Chashnapi huairatami rimacunquichic!
46014010	Cai pachapi achca rimaicuna tiyanun, caran runa paipac quiquin rimaipi uyan.
46014011	Ranti shuc runa ñuca mana yachashca shimipi rimahuacpi, chai runapac chican cani ñuca, paipash chashnallata chican ñucapac.
46014012	Chairaicu cancuna, Dios cuyashcacunata yapa munacunquichic, achcata tupaichic ninimi, shinapash tarinami canquichic Diosta iniccunata ininapi sinchicuchiccunata.
46014013	Chairaicullata, chican shimipi rimac runa Diosta mañachun, pai rimashcata tucuicunata atipachina ushancapac.
46014014	Chican shimipi ñuca Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, ñuca samaihuan Dios-huan rimaricuni, ranti ñuca yuyai chican saquirin.
46014015	¿Chashnapi imatami rurasha? Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, Dios cushca samaihuan rimarina cani, shinallata ñuca yuyaihuanpash. Ñuca samaihuan taquina tucuni, shinallata ñuca yuyaihuanpash.
46014016	Canpac samaillahuan can Diosta chacchacushcapi, shuc mana alli atipac runa uyacushpa, Diosta mana canhuan pacrachunata ushan, can rimashcata mana atipashcaraicu.
46014017	Can Diosta pacrachucushca yapa allimi canca, ranti chaishucta ininapi huiñachichincapac mana yanapancachu.
46014018	Diosta pacrachunimi chican rimaicunata tucui cancunamanta yalli rimac cashcaraicu; ranti Diospac huasipi atipaipac shimicuna pichcallatami rimasha, chashnami runacunata yachachina ushasha chunca huaranca chican shimihuan rimashcamanta yalli.
46014020	Huauquicuna, huahua shina yuyanata jichuichic. Mana alli ruranapi shuti huahua shina caichic; ranti cancuna yuyarinapi rucu caichic.
46014021	Dios quillcashca shimipi quillcara tiyan: "Cai runacunata chican shimicunapimi rimasha, shinapash mana uyahuanuncachu, Apunchic riman".
46014022	Shina cacpi, chican shimipi rimana mana inina munaccunapac cari; iniccuriapac, mana. Ranti Dios rimachishcata ricsichina iniccunapac can; mana iniccunapac, mana
46014023	Iniccuna tantarishcapi tucuicuna chican shimipi rimacucpi, shuc mana alli atipac, mana inic runa imapash yaicushpa, tucuillami nuspa tucushpa juntaranquichic yuyanca. Ranti, tucuilla Dios rimachishcamanta rimaricushcapi, shuc mana inina munac runa, mana alli atipac runa imapash yaicushpai, pai juchayuc cashcata ricsirincami; chaipimi paillata tariparinca tucuicuna rimacushcata uyashpa.
46014025	Chashnami paipac shuncu ucupi pacashcacuna tucuipac ñaupacpi ricurinca, paica cuncurishpa Diosta chacchahca; chaipi shuti pai allipacha yachanca Dios jinu cancuriahuan tiyacushcata.
46014026	Tucui ñaupa rimashcamanta cai tiyan: Cancuna tantarishcapi, maicancuna Diosman taquina ushan; shuccuna yachachinuchun Dios caranman rimashcata ricsichishpa; mana cacpi chican shimipi rimashpa imapash, mana cacpi chai chican shimipi rimashcata atipachishpa imapash; shinapash tucui chai tucuicunapac allipac cachun:
46014027	Chican shimipi rimana tiyacpi, ishcai, quimsa runalla rimanuchun shuc shuc; chairapash, shuc runa chai chican shimipi rimashcata yachashca shimiman chinpachina can.
46014028	Iniccunamanta mana pipash chican shimipi rimashcata chinpachina ushac tiyacpi, chican shimipi rimanata saquinuchun, chaipac rantimanta caran runa ucupi yuyarichun, Dios-huanpash rimarichun.
46014029	Chashnallata Dios rimachishcata huillaccunapash ishcai, quimsalla rimanuchuri shuc shuc shuccunaca yuyarinuchun rimashcamanta.
46014030	Ranti shuc chaillapita tiyacuc runata Dios rimachicpi, rimacuc runa upallayachun.
46014031	Chashnami tucuilla shuc shuc; Dios paiman rimashcata ricsichinata ushan, tucuilla yachashpa ñaupacman catina ushancapac.
46014032	Dios ricsichishcata yachachiccuna paicunallata allita ricsichishpa catinuchun,
46014033	Dios alli causaipac Dios cashcaraicu, mana pantachinayac. Diospac ranacunapac yachaita catishpa,
46014034	tantarinacunapi huarmicuna chunlla tiyana canun, paicuna mana shuc shimi rimana nishcaraicu. Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina, cari rimashcallata pactachina canun.
46014035	Imtapash yachana munashpa, carita huasipi tapuna canquichic, shuc huarmi tantarinapi rimana mana aili cashcaraicu.
46014036	Diospac Cushi Shimi mana cancunapacpi callarishcata. mana cuncarina canquichic, mana cancunallachu chaita chasquircanquichic.
46014037	Maicanpash profeta cani yuyashpa imapash, mana cacpi, Diospac Samaimanta yachaita chasquishcata yuyashpa imapash, cai ñuca quillcacushca Apunchic rurainishca cashcata yachanca.
46014038	Pai mana yachana munacpi, paimi yachan!
46014039	Shina cacpi, huauquicuna, Dios rimachishcata huillana yuyaita yapa charichic, chican shimipi rimanata ama jarcaichicchu;
46014040	ima shina cacpipash, tucuita chuya shuncuhuan, cuscata ruraichic.
46015001	Huauquicuna, cunan cancunata yuyachini Diospac Cushi Shimita cancunaman ñuca yachachishcamanta. Paita chasquishca huashami, cunan cancuna sinchicushpa chaipi caticunquichic.
46015002	Chai Cushi Shimiraicu cancuna quishpichishca canquichic, cancuna sinchicushpa chaita catishpa; mana sinchicushpa, yancamanta inishcanquichic.
46015003	Ñaupac ñuca chasquishcata cancunaman yachachircani. Ñucanchic jucharaicu Cristo huañushcata yachachircani, Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina;
46015004	paita panpanurca; quimsa puncha huasha Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina causarirca;
46015005	causarimushpa Pedroman ricurirca, chai huasha chunca ishcai apostolcunaman.
46015006	Huasha; pichca pacha yalli runacuna tantarishcapi tucuicunaman ricurirca, achca paicunamanta chaira causaranun, ranti maicancunaca huañunuscha.
46015007	Huasha manapash unaipi Santiagoman ricurirca, chai huasha tucui yachachishcacunaman,
46015008	Puchucaipi, ñucatapash ricurihuarca, ñuca chaira huachana mana pactarishcapi pacarishca huahua cani.
46015009	Tucui apostolcunamanta quipami cani, mana ailichu ñuca apostol rimai tucuncapac, iniccunata piñashpa japic mari carcani.
46015010	Ranti Dios ñucahuan alli cashcaraicu cunan ñuca cashca cani; Dios ñucata mana yancalla llaquihuashcachu. Rimacpi, tucui paicunamanta yalli rurashcani; mana ñucachu rurashcani, Diosmi, pai ñucata llaquishpa yanapahuasticai.
46015011	Allita rimacpi, ñuca paicunapash chai Cushi Shimillatata rimanchic, cancunaca ñucanchic rimashcata inishcanquichic.
46015012	Cunan ricushun, Cristo huañushcamanta causarimushcata ñucanchic yachachinchic; shina cacllapita, cancunamanta maicancuna huañushcacuna mana causarinunchu rimanquichic.
46015013	Huañushcacuna causarina mana tiyacpi Cristopash mana causarishcachu;
46015014	Cristo mana causarishca cacpi, ñucanchic yachachicushca yanca can, cancuna inishcapash mana imapac alli can.
46015015	Chashna cashpa, ñucanchic Diosmanta llulla ricuyac canchicman, rimarcanchic mari Dios Cristota huañushcamanta causachishcata; yachacpica mana causachishca, huañushcacuna mana causarina shuti cacpi.
46015016	Huañushcacuna mana causarina cashcacpi, Cristopash mana causarishcachu;
46015017	Cristo huañushcamanta mana causarishcapi, cancuna inishca yanca can: chaira juchapi causacunquichic.
46015018	Chashna cacpi, Cristota inishpa huañushcacunapash chicapacmi chincarinushca.
46015019	Cai causaillapi. Cristota chapashpa, tucuicunamanta yalli llaquipac runami canchic.
46015020	Ranti shuti pachami Cristo huañushcamanta causarimushca. Paimi ñaupac pucucpi pallashca muyu shina can: huañushcamanta causarinapi tucuicunata ñauparca.
46015021	Shuc runaraicu cai pachaman huañui pactamushca shina, chashnallata shuc runaraicu huañushcamanta causarina pactamurca.
46015022	Adanpi tucui huañushca shina, chashnallata Cristopi tucuicuna causaita charinunca.
46015023	Shinapash caranlla paipac pacha pactashcapi: Cristo tucuimanta ñaupac; huasha, Cristo ticramucpi; paita caticcuna.
46015024	Tucurina chaipi shamunca, Cristo apucunata ushaicunatapash yallishpa, Dios Yayaman cai pachata cuna puncha.
46015025	Cristo amu causana can tucui paita chicniccuna paipac chaqui ucupi urmanacama;
46015026	puchacaipi paita chicnic huañuimi yalli tucuncami.
46015027	Dios tucui imacunata paipac chaqui ucupi churashcaraicu. Shinapash chaqui ucupi churashca saquirishcami rimashcapi, Diosllata mana chaqui ucupi saquirircachu, ashtahuan paimi tucui imacunata Cristopac chaqui ucupi churashca.
46015028	Ña tucui Cristopac chaqui ucupi churashca cacpi, chaipi Cristollata, pai Churi cashpa, Diosman curinca. Chashnami Dios tucuicunapi tucui canca.
46015029	Mana chashna cacpi, huañushcacunaraicu bautisariccuna yancamantami ruranunman. Huañushcacuna mana causaricpi, ¿allichu canca paicunaraicu bautisarina?
46015030	¿Allichu ñucanchic caran pachapi huañunalla mayanpi causana?
46015031	Ari, huauquicuna, caran puncha ñucapash huañuñalla causani. Cai shutimi can, Apunchic Jesucristopi cancuna inishcaraicu ñuca cushiyashca shina.
46015032	Efesopi pumacunahuan macarishcanimi, ¿chaimanta imallapash japishcanichu? Huañushcacuna mana causarina tiyacpi, ¿imanata maicancuna rimanun: "Micushunlla, upiashunlla, cayaman huañunami canchic"?
46015033	Ama umachi tucuichichu. Caita maicancuna rimanun: "Mana alli mashicuna alli yachaicunata huacllichinun"
46015034	Alli yuyaihuan causanaman ticrashpa, ña ama juchallichicchu, cancunamanta maicancuna Diosta mana ricsinquichic mari. Caita rimanimi cancunata pincachinaraicu.
46015035	Maicanpash tapunquichicmi: ¿Ima shina huañushcacuna causarinunca? ¿Ima shina aichahuan jatarinunca?
46015036	Yuyai illac canqui chashna tapuncapac. Can tarpucpi, muyu huañuna can yurashitu causaita charina ushancapac.
46015037	Tarpushcapi, mana huiñana yurata satinchic, muyutami tarpunchic, trigo muyu cacpi, ima muyutapash.
46015038	Chai huasha Dios pai munashca stiina ricuricta ran, caran muyunanta quiquin yurata surcun.
46015039	Mana tucui aicha chaipuralla canun; runapac aicha shuc can, huacracunapac shuc, pishcucunapac shuc, yacu aichacunapac shuc.
46015040	Chashnallata, jahua pachapi cuillurcuna tiyanun, chai pactiapi aichacuna tiyanun; ranti cuillurcuna paicunapac quiquin sumac ricurishcata charinun, caimanta aichacunapash quiquin paicunapac sumac ricurishcata charinun.
46015041	Inti llinpiyashca, quilla llinpiyashcamanta cuillurcuna llinpiyashcamantapash chican can; paicuna cuillurpura llinpiyashcapash caranpac chican can.
46015042	Huañushcacuna causarinapi chashnallata tucun. Ismunata panpahchic; ranti mana ismuna causarimun.
46015043	Panpashcapi millaipac can; causarimushcapi jatunyachishca can. Panpashcapi sanpa can; causarimushcapi sinchi can.
46015044	Huañuc aicha panpai tucun; huañushcamanta causarishcapi huiñaipac samaiyuc can. Shuc aichayuclla aicha tiyacpipash, shuc samaiyuc aichapash tiyan.
46015045	Dios quillcashca shimipi cashna riman: "Tucuimanta ñaupac runa, Adan stiutiyuc, causaiyuc aicha carca"; ranti puchucai Adan, causachie samai can.
46015046	Shinapash, samai mana ñaupacchu can, aichami ñaupac can, chai huashami samai can.
46015047	Ñaupac runa, allpamanta rurashca cashpa, cai pachamanta can; ranti quipa runa jahua pachamanta can.
46015048	Tucui cai pachamanta runa, chai allpamanta rurashca runa shina canun; ranti jahua pachamantacuna, chai jahua pachamanta runa shina canun.
46015049	Cunan allpamanta rurashca runa shina ricuric canchic, chashnallatami huasha jahua pachamanta runaman ricurishun
46015050	Caita rimani, huauquicuna, jahua pachapi mana yaicuna ushancachu aichamanta tullumanta cashca; chashnallata ismunaca mana ismuc mana tucuncachu.
46015051	Cai pacara shimita yachanuchun munani: Mana tucui huañushunchu, ranti ña pacha pactarishcapi, tucuillami
46015052	shuc laya tucushunchic, ñahui pin rashcapi, huama puru puchucai uyarishcapi. Huama puru uyarincami, huañushcacunaca mana cuti huañuncapac causachishcami canunca. Ñucanchicca shuc laya tucushcami saquirishun.
46015053	Ñucanchicpac ismuc aicha ña mana ismuc tucunca; ñucanchicpac huañuc aicha ña mana huañuc tucunca.
46015054	Ñucanchic ismuc aicha ña mana ismuc tucushcapi, ñucanchic huañuc aicha ña mana huañuc tucushcapi, chaipimi Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca pactarinca:
46015055	"Chicapac huañui yallishca saquirinca". "¿Huañui, can yallishca tiyanchu? ¿Huañui, canpac tucsina maipita can?".
46015056	Huañuipac tucsina juchami can, camachic quillcami juchaman ushaita curca.
46015057	Chairaicu Diosta pacrachushun, paimi Apunchic Jesucristopi ñucanchicman yallinata cun.
46015058	Chashnamanta, huauquicuna, ama sanpayashpa sinchicuichic, tucui pachapi Diospac ruranapi llancaichic; cancuna yachanquichic Apunchic-huan pacta rurashca mana yanca llancashca tucun.
46016001	Inic huauquicunata yanapancapac cullquita pallanamanta nicpi, Galaciamanta iniccunaman ñuca rimashcata cancunapash pactachichic.
46016002	Domingo punchacunapi, cancuna huacaichina ushashcata caranlla chicanman churaichic, ama ñuca pactashcapi cullquita pallacuncapac.
46016003	Ñuca pactashpa, cancuna acllashca runacunatami Jerusalenman quillcahuan cachasha, chaipi tiyac huauquicunapacman cancuna pallashca cullquita apashpa rinuchun.
46016004	Ñucapash rina tucucpi, ñucahuanmi paicuna rinunca.
46016005	Ñuca ricpica Macedoniata rina cani; Macedoniata rishca huasha, Corintopimi pactasha.
46016006	Unainayata imapash cancunahuan saquirishami, mana cacpi tucui tamia pacha imapash quiparishami; chaimanta maimapash rina cacpi, cancuna yanapana ushahuanquichic.
46016007	Mana ricushpalla rinayanichu, Apunchic munacpi, ashtahuan cancunahuan unainayata saquirishami yuyani;
46016008	ranti Pentecostes punchacama Efesopimi saquirisha,
46016009	chaipimi Apunchicpacta alli llancana tiyanca rahuan, achcata rurasha yuyani, ñucata chicniccuna achca juntaracpipash.
46016010	Timoteo cancunaman pactacpi, ama chicanlla ricunquichichu, paipash ñuca shinallata Apunchicpac ruranapi llancacushcata yuyarichic.
46016011	Shina cacpi, ama pipash cancunamanta piñashcahuan paita ricuchun; ashtahuan pai puricushcapi yanapaichic ñucata ricuc shamuhuachun, ñuca chaishuc huauquicunantin paita chapacunchic mari.
46016012	Ranti huauqui Apolota yapa rimashcanimi, huauquicunahuan rishpa cancunata ricucrichun; chai ucu rincapac mana munarca. Huashami pai rinca racun.
46016013	Ñahuita allita pashcashpa causaichic, inina sinchi cachun cancunapi. Cari caichic, sinchi tucushpa.
46016014	Tucui imatapash rurashcapi, llaquishcahuan ruraichic.
46016015	Huauquicuna, cancuna yachanquichic ima shina Acayapi, Estefanas paipac aillucunantin, tucuicunata ñaupashpa Diospac Cushi Shimita uyarca, chai huasha shuc huauquicunata yanapanurca paicunapash inina charinuchun nishpa.
46016016	Paicunata uyapaichic rimani, tucui cai ruranapi llancaccunatapash uyaichic.
46016017	Estefanas, Fortunato, Acaico shamushcaraicu yapa cushiyani, cancuna illashcapi
46016018	ñuca causaipi cushichihuanushca, cancunatapash cushichinushca. Chashna runacunata llaquina canquichic.
46016019	Asiamanta iniccuna cancunata yapa yuyarinun. Aquila, Prisca tucui paipac huasipi tantariccunantin Apunchicpi cancunata yuyarinacun.
46016020	Tucui huauquicuna cancunamanta yuyarishcata chasquichic. Cancuna yachai muchanacushcahuan yuyarinacuichic.
46016021	Ñuca, Pablo, cancunaman yuyarishcata quiquin ñuca maquihuanmi quillcani.
46016022	Maican runapash, Apunchicta mana llaquishpa, maldisiashca cachun. ¡Apunchic, shamui!
46016023	Apunchic Jesuscristo paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichichun.
46016024	Ñuca cancunata Cristo Jesuspi llaquishca cancunahuan cachun.
47001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Dios munashcaraicu Jesucristopac apostol cani. Ñuca huauqui Timoteontin cai pancata quillcacuni, Corinto llactapi tiyac iniccunaman Acayapi tiyac tucui Diospac runacunamanpash.
47001002	Ñucanchicpac Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesuscristontin, paicunapac cuyaita alli causaitapash cancunapi tallichinuchun.
47001003	Apunchic Cristo Jesuspac Yaya Dios bendisiashca cachun, paimi ñucanchicmanta llaquiric Yaya can, llaquirishcapi cushiyachic can.
47001004	Tucui llaquicunapi ñucanchicta cushichin, ñucanchicpash shuccuna llaqui charishcapi cushichina ushancapac, pai ñucanchicman cushca cushillahuata.
47001005	Cristopac ñacarina ñucanchicpi sinchi pactamucpi, ñucanchic paihuan ñacarinchic, chashnallata Cristoraicu cushiyana ñucanchicman juntarimun.
47001006	Ñucanchic ñacarinchicmi cancuna cushichinata quishpinata charichun nishpa; Dios ñucanchicta cushichicpi, cancunapash cushita charincapac can, ñucanchic shina sinchi llaquicuna charishcapi, sinchicushpa ñacarina ushancapac.
47001007	Cancunamanta achcatami chapanchic, ricushcanchic mari ima shina ñucanchichuan ñacarinquichic, chairaicullata Diosmanta shamuc cushichinata chasquina canquichic.
47001008	Huauquicuna, Asiapi chai tucui ñacarinata charishcamanta cancunata yuyachini. Mana ushaipac sinchi llaquicuna tiyanurca, ñalla causana yuyaipash tucurircami.
47001009	Huañuncapac saquishca shinami yachirca. Chashna tucushcapi yacharcanchic, ima shina sapalla mana ushanchic ima ruranapipash, ranti huañushcacunamanta causachic Dios yanapashcahuan ushanchic.
47001010	Diosca chashna ña huañunamanta quishpichirca, huashamanpash ñucanchicta quishpichishpa catincami.
47001011	cancuna Diosta mañashcahuan yanapacpi. Ñucanchicraicu achcacuna Diosta mañanucpi, chashnallatami achcacuna Diosta pacrachununca ñucanchicta yanapashcaraicu.
47001012	Caimi cushichihuan: cai pachapi tiyacushpa chuya shuncuhuan, cusca rurashcahuan causashcanchic, cancunahuanca ashtahuan alli. Mana ñucanchic shuncumantachu chashna causashcanchic, Dios llaquishpa yanapacpimi chashna causashcanchic.
47001013	Ñucanchic quillcashcacunapi cancuna uyashca, cancuna atipashca tiyan. Allita cancuna atipancapacmi munani,
47001014	cunancama atipashca shina, Apunchic Jesus ticramushcapi achcatami cushiyanquichic ñucanchicmanta, ñucanchicpash cancunamanta cushiyashca shinallata.
47001015	Chashna tucuncami yuyashpa, ñaupa cancunata ricucrisha yuyarcani, chashna cancunata ishcai cuti ricucriman carcani;
47001016	Macedoniaman rirashcapi cancunata ricusha yuyarcani; ticracushcapi, cutillata cancunata ricusha yuyarcani. Chaipi cancuna yanapahuanquichicman carca Judeaman ticramuncapac.
47001017	¿Mana allita yuyarishpachu chashna rinata munarcani? Ama ishcai shimiyucmi yuyahuanquichicchu, "ari" "mana" chaillapita nishpa.
47001018	Diosllata yachan, ñuca cancunata mana ishcai shimihuan rimashcata.
47001019	Ñuca, Silvano Timoteontin cancunata ricsichishca Diospac Churi Cristo Jesus shuc shimillami can mana ishcai. Cristo Diospac "Ari" can,
47001020	paipi (Cristopi) tucui Dios cusha nishcacuna pactarinun. Chairaicu, Diosta chacchashcapi, "Chashna cachun" rimanchic, Cristo Jesusraicu.
47001021	Diosllatami ñucanchicta cancunantin Cristoman llutachishpa sinchiyachin, paillata ñucanchictapash acllarca,
47001022	Pai ñucanchicta jahuirca quiquin paipac unanchahuan, Diospac Samaita ñucanchic shuncu ucupi churarca; ñucanchic japinca rashcata ricuchincapac.
47001023	Ñaupa yuyarishca shina chaira Corintoman mana rishcanichu; Diospash yachanmi cancunata yapa yuyarishcaraicu mana rishcata.
47001024	Huashalla cancunapac inina imana caticushcata ricushpa mana purinayanchicchu, cancunapac inina ña pacta sinchi can; ashtahuan cancuna cushi causancapacmi yanapanayani.
47002001	Chairaicu, cancunata cuti ricucrishcahuan llaquichina cashpa, mana rircanichu,
47002002	Caricunata ñuca llaquichicpi, ¿cancunamanta chicancuna cushiyachihuanuncachu? Cancuna, ñuca llaquishcacunallami cushiyachihuanquichic.
47002003	Chairaicu quillcarcanilla cancunaman, cancunaraicu llaquirina cashpa mana rircani, ashtahuan cancuna cushiyachihuariami cariquichic, Ñuca yacharcanimi cancunapash ñucahuan cushiyanata,
47002004	ranti chai pancata cancunaman quillcacushcapi, achcata yuyarishcahuan llaquirishpa huacarcani. Shinapash, mana cancunata llaquichincapacchu quillcarcani, ashtahuan cancuna ñuca yapa llaquishcata ricsinuchun nishpami quillcarcani,
47002005	Ñucata llaquichic runa mana ñucallatachu llaquichihuashca, ama yapalla paita juchachincapac, cancunatapash ansata llaquichishcami
47002006	Cancuna piñashpa camachishcahuan ña chai runata alli tuputami ñacachishcanchic rimani.
47002007	Cunan, chai juchamanta quishpichishpa, yanapana canquichic, yanca, rashpa yapalla llaquirishpa chicapac chincarinca imapash.
47002008	Chairaicu cancunata mañani cuti llaquishca ñahuihuan paita ricuichic.
47002009	Ñaupallata cai layamanta cancunata quillcarcani, ¿ushanquichicchu, manachu ushanquichic imata, ñucanchic camachishcata pactachincapac?
47002010	Shina cacpi, imamantapash shuc runata cancuna quishpichicpi, ñucapash paita quishpichinimi. Quishpichishami paita imamantapash quishpichina tiyacpi, cancunapi yuyarishpa Cristopac ñaupacpi.
47002011	Chashnami supai ñucanchic ucupi mana imatapash rurana ushanca, yachanchic pai ima shina ñucanchic pantancapac chapacushcata.
47002012	Cristopac Cushi Shimita ricsichincapac Troas llactaman pactashcapi, Apunchicraicu llancana pailla tiyahuarca.
47002013	Ranti, ñucanchic huauqui Titota mana tarishcaraicu mana cushi carcani. Chairaicu, paicunamanta llucshishpa Macedoniaman rircani.
47002014	Diosta pacrachuni Cristo Jesus atinapi ñucanchicta llutachishcaraicu, ñucanchicraicu paipac Cushi Shimita runacunaman ricsichin, sumac ashnaita tucuicunapi tallichishca shina.
47002015	Ñucanchic, Cristomanta Diosman sumac sicac ashnai shina canchic; chai ashnai, quishpiccunapi, chicapac chincariccunapi, tucuicunaman pactacun.
47002016	Chicapac chincariccunapac, chai ashnai huañui can, ranti quishpiccunapac, causaita cun chai sumac ashnai. ¿Yachanquichicchu picunami caita rurana ushanun?
47002017	Diospac Shimita, maicancuna rurashca shina, mana catunchicchu; cusca shimita Diospac ñaupacpi rimanchic, pai mincashcacuna mari canchic, Cristohuanpash ilutarishca mari canchic.
47003001	Cancunaman caita rimashpa, ¿cuti ñucanchillata jatunyashpami rimaranchicchu yuyanquichic? ¿Nucan-chicmanta alli rimac quillcatachu ricunata munanquichic?, ¿cancunatachu mañashun, maicancuna rurashca shina?
47003002	Cancunallatami ñucanchicmanta alli rimac quillca canquichic: ñucanchic shuncupi quillcashca quillca, paita tucui ricsinun, tucui ricuna ushanun.
47003003	Mana pantai can cancuna Cristollata quillcashca quillca cashca, ñucanchic maquihuan cushca; cai quillca mana jahuinahuan quillcashcachu, causac Diospac Samaihuan quillcashcami; chai quillca mana rumi palapi quillcashcachu can, runacunapac; shuncupi quillcashcami.
47003004	Diospac ñaupacpi, Jesucristo yanapashcahuan, chai chashna cashcata yachanchic.
47003005	Mana ñucanchicpac quiquin ushaihuanchu ñucanchic rashcata ruranchic, tucui ñucanchic rurana ushashca Diosmanta shamun,
47003006	paimi ushaita ñucanchicman cushca, mushu cunacushca shimita yanapana ushancapac, mana quillcapi cushca, Samaimantami shamuc. Camachic Quillca huañuchic mari can, ranti Diospac Samai causaita cun.
47003007	Cai rumi palacunapi quillcashca Camachic Quillca mana ushaipac llinpic-huan shamurca, Israel runacuna Moisespac ñahuita mana ricuc ushacta carca, yapa chiuclla cashcaraicu. Shinapash chai llinpic uchpayashpa tucurina carca. Cuti chai Camachia Quillca huañuchic cashpallata achca jatunyachishca shamurca;
47003008	cunan, ¡ima shina jatunyachishca chari canca Diospac Samaimanta shamuc mushu cunacushca shimita ricsichina!.
47003009	Rimacpi, ñucanchicta huañuchincapac Camachic Quillca cashpallata jatunyachishca shamurca, ¡mai jatunyachishca chari canca Dios ñucanchicta juchacunamanta pichashcata ricsichishca!
47003010	Camachic Quillca jatunyashca uchillami saquirin cai shuc-huan yuyaricpi, cai yapa jatonyachishca mari can.
47003011	Tucurina cashpallata jatunyachishca carca, ashtahuan yalli jatunyachishca mari canca chicapac causana.
47003012	Caita chapaccuna cashpa mari, mana manchashcahuan rimanchiclla.
47003013	Mana Moises shina ñahuita llachapahuan quillparinchicchu, llinpic huañurashcaca Israel runacuna ama ricuncapac.
47003014	Ranti paicuna mana atipanurca, chaira cunanpash, Camachic Quillcata ricushcapi, chai quillparacllata paicunata mana atipachiti, paicuna mana anchuchi tucunushca quillpacucta, chaica Cristoraicullami anchuchi tucurica.
47003015	Cunan punchacama; paicuna Moisespac quillcata ricushcapi, paicunapac yuyaita shuc llachapa quillpacun.
47003016	Ranti shuc runa Apunchicman shuncuhuan ticracpi, chai quillpacuc llushpirin.
47003017	Apunchicca Samai cashcaraicu, Apunchicpac Samai tiyashcapi, chaipi tiyan quishpira causana.
47003018	Chairaicu tucui ñucanchic, ñahuipi quillpacucta ña anchuchishcacuna, shuc rirpupi shina Apunchic jatunyashcata ricuchic canchic, quiquin paipac ricchai canchic, pai jatunyashcata ñucanchicpash ashtahuan charinchic, Apunchic munashcaraicu, pai Samai can.
47004001	¿Chairaicu mana sanpayanchic, Dios ñucanchicmanta llaquinata charishpa, cai llancanata ñucanchicman miricashcaraicu.
47004002	Ñucanchicmanta jichushcanchic pacallapi pincaipac ruranacunata; Diospac shimi yachachishcapi, mana umachinchic, mana llullanchic. Ashtahuan shuti shimillata rimanchic, chashnami Diospac ñaupacpi maican runapash ñucanchic alli cashcata yachanunca.
47004003	Ñucanchic yachachishca Cushi; Shimi, ¿shuti pacha mana atipaipac cari chicapac chincariccunapaclla.
47004004	Paicuna ininata mana charishcaraicu, cai pachamanta dios paicunapac yuyaita mana atipacta rurashca, ama paicuna ricunuchun jatunyachishca Cristopac Custi Shimipac llinpic achicta, pai Diospac ricchai mari can.
47004005	Mana ñucanchicmantachu yachachinchic, Jesucristo Apunchic cashcatami yachachinchic, ñucanchicca Jesusta muchashcaraicu cancunata yanapacllami canchic.
47004006	Yana ucumanta achicta surcuc Diosllatami, ñucanchic shuncupi achicta churashca, Dios jatunyashcata chai achic-huan ricuna ushanchic, Jesucristopi rirpupi shina ricuricucta.
47004007	Cai Diosta ricsina ushaita ñucanchic aichapi charinchic, cai aicha allpa manca shina can chai jatun ushai Diosmanta shamushcata ricsichincapac, mana ñucanchicmanta.
47004008	Chashna, achca llaquicunayuc cashpapash, ñaupacman riranchiclla; achca yuyaricuna tiyacpipash, shinapash mana sanpayanchicchu.
47004009	Piñashpa japinucpipash, mana jichushcachu canchic; urmachishpapash, mana huacllichinunchu.
47004010	Maimanpash rishcapi, Jesuspac huanuita ñucanchic aichapi apai cachanchic, paipac causaipash ñucanchicpi ricurincapae.
47004011	Causacushpa, ñucanchic Jesusraicu huañunalla causanchic, paipac causai ñucanchic huañuna aichapipash ricurincapac.
47004012	Chashnami, ñucanchicman huañui shamucpi, ranti cancunaman causai pactan.
47004013	Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Inina tiyahuacpi, chairaicu rimarcani". Chairaicu ñucanchicpash, chai shinallata inina charishpa, ininchic rimanchicpash.
47004014	Ñucanchic yachanchic, Apunchic Jesusta huañushcamanta causachic Diosllata, ñucanchictapash paihuan causachina cashcata; chai huasha tucui cancunahuan pacta, paipac ñaupacman pushanca.
47004015	Tucui caicuna cancunapac allipac tucushca, Dios cuyashcacunata achcata chasquishcamanta, chashnallata achcacuna Diosta pacrachunuchun, Diosta jatunyachishpa.
47004016	Chairaicu mana sanpayana canchic. Ñucanchic jahua ricuric aicha rucuyaracpipash, ranti ñucanchic ucupi caran puncha ashtahuan maltayaranchic.
47004017	Cai causaipi ñucanchic ansa ñacarishca mana unai tucurin; ranti chaimanta huiñaipac jatunyanata chasquinchic, yalli jatun achcapash can chai.
47004018	Ricuipac cashcapi ña ñucanchic ñahuita mana churanchic, mana ricuricpi ashtahuan churanchic, tucui ricuric imacuna tucuric cashcaraicu; ranti mana ricuriccunaca huiñaipac tiyana canun.
47005001	Cai pachamanta huasi shina canchic, shuc mana unaita causancapac rurashca tanpu shina; ranti ñucanchic yachanchic, cai tanpu tularicpi, jahua pachapi Dios ñucanchicpata mana ismuc huasita allichishpa charishcata; chai huasi mana runa maqui rurashcachu can,
47005002	Chairaicu cai cunan causacushca huasipi; tiyacushpa llaquirinchic; ña rina munanchicman jahua pacha huasiman,
47005003	paita ñucanchic shuc churanata shinami, churarishun; ama llatan ñucanchic saquirincapac.
47005004	Cai tanpupi cashpa llaquirishpa causanchic, llatanai tucunata mana munanchicman, ashtahuan churarashca jahuapi churachi tucunata munanchicman, cai huañuc aicha mushu causaipi yaicurishca saquirichiin.
47005005	Dios ñucanchicta chaipac ailichirca, ñucanchic japina cashcata ricuchishpa paipac Samaita ñucanchicman curca.
47005006	Chairaicu mana manchashcahuan imatapash ruranchic. Yachanchic cai aichapi causacunacama caru llactapi shina causacushcata, Apunchicmanta caruyashca.
47005007	Cunan paita mana ricuna ushanchic, inina sinchicuchishcahuan causanchic;
47005008	shinapash mana manchashpa causanchic, ranti alli canman cai aichamanta llucshishpa, ña Apunchicpac ñaupacman rina.
47005009	Chairaicu tucui pachapi Apunchicta cushiyachinata munanchic, cai aichapi causacushcapi, paimanta llucshishcapi imapash.
47005010	Tucuicuna Cristopi taripai tucuna canchic, caranlla pai causacushpa rurashcamanta chasquincapac.
47005011	Chashna, Diosta yupaichana cashcata yachashcaraicu, runacunatapash chaita ricsichinata munanchic. Dios ñucanchicta yapa allita ricsin, cancunapash ñucanchicta ricsincapac munani.
47005012	Mana cuti ñucanchicraicu rimancapacchu callarishcanchic; ashtahuan ñucanchicraicu cancuna cai cutillapash cushiyanuchun nishpami can, cancuna jahua ricuchishcallahuan mana shuncu ucupi tiyashcallahuan jatunyaccunata cutipana ushancapac.
47005013	Ñucanchic nuspa cacpi, Dios ñucanchicta uyachun, ranti alli yuyaihuan rimacpi, chaica cancunapacmi can.
47005014	Cristopac cuyai ñucanchic causaita pushacun, shuc runa tucuicunaraicu huañushcata chashnamanta tucuicuna huañushcata yachashpa.
47005015	Cristo tucuicunamanta huañurca, cunan causaccuna ama quiquinpacllata causanuchun; paipac canuchun; paicunaraicu pai huañushca huasha causarirca.
47005016	Chairaicu, ñucanchic mana pitapash cai pachamanta yuyaihuan taripanchic; ñaupa ima chari Cristomanta panta yuyaita charircanchic, cunan ña paimanta mana chai yuyaita charinchic.
47005017	Chairaicumanta, Jesucristohuan llutarishca runa mushu runa can: chai runapac causai tucurirca; cunan tiyac mushu can.
47005018	Tucui caita Dios rurarca; Diosllata Cristoraicu ñucanchicta paihuan allichirca; paillata tucui runacunata paihuan allichincapac ñucanchicta mincarca.
47005019	Rimacpi, Cristopi Dios cai shimita runacunaman ricsichincapac mincarca.
47005020	Chashnamanta, Jesucristopac cachashcacuna canchic, Diosllata ñucanchic shimihuan cancunata rimacun. Chairaicu, Cristopac shutipi "Dios-huan alliyaichic" rimanchic.
47005021	Cristo mana imapi juchallircachu; ranti ñucanchicraicu tucui ñucanchicpac juchacunata paita apachirca; chashna, Cristoraicu, ñucanchicta juchacunamanta quishpichirca.
47006001	Diosta yanapaccuna cashpa, Diospac cuyaita ama yanca jichuichichu cancunata rimanchic.
47006002	Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Can mutsushcapi, canta uyarcani; quishpina punchapi canta yanaparcani". Cunanmi mutsushca pacha can. ¡Cunanmi quishpina puncha can!
47006003	Mana maipipash mana pitapash mana alli rashcata ricuchinchicchu, ama ñucanchic rurashca mana alli saquirincapac.
47006004	Ranti, tucui rashcapi Diosta yanapac cashcata ricuchinchic: llaqui tiyashcapi, mana piñarishpa ñacarishcapi, mutsuna tiyashcapi, mana alli pactachina ushashcapi,
47006005	macai tucushcapi, piñashpa japi tucushcapi, piñarishpa jatarishcacunapi, sinchi llancanapi, tutacuna mana puñushcapi, yaricashcapi.
47006006	Diosta yanapac cashcata ricuchinchic ñucanchic cusca causashcahuanpash, ñucanchic shuti shimita ricsishcahuan, mana piñarishcahuan, alli shuncuyuc cashcahuanpash, Diospac Samaita ñucanchipi charishcahuan, ñucanchic shutipacha llaquinata charishcahuan,
47006007	ñucanchic yachachishca shuti cashcahuan, Diospac ushai ñucanchicpi cashcahuan. Cusca yuyaicunahuan macanacunchic, huactanapi cashpa, quishpinami imapash.
47006008	Maicanpi jatunyachishca canchic, cuti shucpica piñai tucunchic; maicanpi alli rimai tucunchic, cuti shucpica mana alli rimai tucunchic. Shuti shimita rimaccuna cashpallata, llulla runacuna shina ricui tucunchic.
47006009	Alli ricsira cashpallata, mana ricsishcacuna shina ricui tucunchic. Ña huañunalla cashpapash, chaira causacunchicmi; ñacachinunmi, shinapash mana huañuchinunchu.
47006010	Llaquirishca shina cashpallata, tucui pachapi cushi causanchic; imapash illac shina ricurinchic; ranti achca runacunami ñucanchiraicu tucuita charic tucunushca; llushticuna shina ricurinchic, ranti mana imapash ñucanchicta pishin.
47006011	Corintomanta huauquicuna, mana imatapash pacashpa cancunaman rimashcanchic; ñucanchic shuncuta pascashpa cancuna ñaupacpi churashcanchic.
47006012	Cancunapac ñaupacpi mana imatapash pacana charinchic; ashtahuan cancunami ñucanchicman pacashcanquichic.
47006013	Chairaicu, shuc yaya churicunata mañashca shina, ñucata ama imatapash pacahuaichichu nini, ñuca cancunata mana imatapash pacashca shina.
47006014	Mana iniccunahuan ama shucllayaichichu. Ñuca tapuni: ¿cusca taripanahuan, mana cusca taripanahuan chaipurallachu canun? ¿Achic tiyashcapi, chaillapita tuta tiyana ushanchu?
47006015	Cristohuan Supaihuan mana chai yuyaillata charina ushanun.
47006016	Diospac huasihuan huacacunapac huasihuan mana chaipuralla canun. Ñucanchic causac Diospac huasi canchic, paillata rimashca shina: "Paicuna ucupimi causasha, paicunahuanmi purisha; ñuca paicunapac Dios cacpi, paicuna ñuca runacuna canunca".
47006017	Chairaicu cashnapash Apunchic riman: "Chashna runa ucumanta llucshishpa, chicanyaichic; ticllayucta ansapash ama llancaichichu. Chaipimi cancunata ñuca chasquisha,
47006018	cancunapac Yaya casha; caocunaca churicuna, ushushicuna cahuanquichic, tucuita ushac Apunchic chashna riman".
47007001	Shina cacpi, llaquishca huauquicuna, caicunami cusha nishcacuna canacun. Cairaicu, aichapi, samaipi mapayachiccunamanta picharishca cana canchic; Diosta yupaichanapi, ñucanchic paipac chicanyachishcacuna catina canchic.
47007002	¡Cancuna shuncu ucupi shuc cuchushituta cuhuaichi! Taripanapi, tucuicunahuan cuscata taripashcanchic; mana pitapash huacllichishcanchicchu; mana pitapash umachishcanchicchu.
47007003	Caita mana cancunata camishcaraicuchu rimani; ña cancunata rimarcani, cancuna ñuca shuncu ucupimi canquichic, ñucahuan causancapac, ñucahuan huañuncapac.
47007004	Mana jarcashcahuan cancunata rimani, achcatapash cushiyani cancunaraicu. Chai tucui ñacarishcapi, ñaupacman catina yuyai shamuhuan, cushihuanpash juntarishcami cani.
47007005	Macedoniaman pactashcamanta mana ansapash samashcanchicchu; ashtahuan tucuipimi llaquicunallata tarishcanchic: ñucanchic mayanpi macanacui tiyashca, ñucanchic ucupi manchanai tiyashca.
47007006	Ranti Dios sanpayashcacunata sinchicuchic can; chairaicu Tito pactamushcahuan ñucanchicta sinchicuchirca;
47007007	mana pactamushcaraiculla, ashtahuan pai jinu cancunaraicu yapa cushiyashca carca. Pai, cancuna yapa ñucanchicta ricunayashcamanta rimarca; cancuna ñucamanta yapa llaquirishcata, yapa yuyarashcata ñucanchicman rimarca; tucui caicunata uyashcaraicu ashtahuan yapa cushiyarcani.
47007008	Ñuca cancunata ñaupac quillcashca yapa llaquichishca cacpipash, cunan chaimanta mana llaquirinichu. Ñaupac shuti llaquirircani, cancuna chai quillcaraicu llaquirishcamanta, shinapash mana unaita llaquirircanquichic;
47007009	cunan cushiyanimi, mana cancuna llaquirishcaraicu, ranti cancuna chai llaquirishcahuan Diosman ticrashcaraicu. Cancuna ñacarishca Diospac ñaupacpi alli ricurirca; rimacpi, cancunata mana imapipash huacllichishcanchicchu;
47007010	llaquirishcapi Dios munashca shina ñacarishpa, Diosman shuncupi ticrarina tucun quishpinaman pactana ushancapac; chashnapica mana imamanta llaquirina tiyan. Ranti cai pachamantacuna llaquirishca huañuiman pushacun.
47007011	Cancunapi llaquirina tiyashcapi, Dios munashca shina ñacarircanquichic, chashna ñacarishcamanta canan pai cushcata ricuichic. Tucushcata allita ricurcanquichic, chai huasha ñucata quishpichincapac shayarircanquichic; cancunata piñachichirca, manchaitapash curca. Chai huasha ñucata ricuna munaita charircanquichic, chaipi juchayuc runata ñacachina yuyaita japircanquichic. Chashnami chai tucushcapi cancuna mana ima rurashcata ricsichircanquichic.
47007012	Shina cacpi, ñuca quillcashcapi, mana piñac runata, piñai tucuc runata yuyarishpachu quillcarcani; astahuan Diospac ñaupacpi cancuna ñucanchimanta yuyarishcata ricsichincapacmi quillcarcani.
47007013	Cashnamanta ñucanchic cushiyashcanchic. Cai cushiyaita chasquishcamanta, ashtahuan yallimi cushiyanchic Tito cushi cashcata ricushpa; tucui cancuna paita cuti cariyachishcanquichic ñaupacman catishpa rincapac.
47007014	Ñuca ña Titota cancunamanta cushi cashcata rimarcani, shinapash mana llullashcanichu. Ashtahuan, tucui cancunaman ñucanchic rimashca shuti cashca shina, Titota ñucanchi rimashcapash shutini can: cancunamanta cushimi canchic rimarcanchic.
47007015	Pai cancanata ashtahuan yapa llaquin, cancuna pai rimashcapi uyashcata yuyarishpa, paita yapa yupaichashca-huan chasquishcata yuyarishpa.
47007016	Imapash tiyacpi cancuna ñucahuan cana cashcata yachashpami yapa cushiyani.
47008001	Cunan, huauquicuna, cancunata ricsichina munanchic Maccdoniapi tiyac iniccunaman ima shina Dios paipac cuyaita ricuchishcamanta.
47008002	Achca llaquicunata charishca cashpapash, paicuna yapa cushi canun; yapalla tsuntsucuna cashpapash, achcata chariccuna shina camarita cushcapi ricuchinushca.
47008003	Ñuca jinu ricuyac cani, tucui alli shuncuhuan paicuna, caranlla ushashca tuputa camarita cushcata.
47008004	Mana ushaipac ñucanchicta mañanurca, paicunapash iniccunata yanapana ushancapac.
47008005	Ñucanchic yuyashcamantapash yallicta ranurca, quiquin paicunallata camari shina curinurca, Apunchicta ñaupac, chai huasha ñucanchicta, Dios munashca shina.
47008006	Chairaicu Titota rimashcanchic, cancunamantapash japichun chai pallashca cullquita, unai pai cancuna ucupi pallancapac callarishca shina.
47008007	Cancuna yallishcanquichic tucuipi; inina cacpi, sumac shimi rimanapi, cancuna yachashcapi, yanapanapi mana quillashpa rurashcapi, ñucanchicmanta yachashca llaquinapipash, chashnallata cunan cai yanapanapi yallishcata ricsichina canquichic.
47008008	Mana cancunata rurai nishpa rimanichu chaita; cancuna shuccunaraicu yanapashcata ricsinuchun nishpami rimani, cancunapash quiquin llaquina charishcata ricsichina ushancapac.
47008009	Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina Apunchic Jesucristo alli shuncu cashpa, tacuita charishpallata, cancunaraicu tsuntu tucurca, pai tsuntsuyashcaraicu cancunata ama imapash pishichun nishpa.
47008010	Chaimanta cancunapac allipac ñuca yuyashcata rimam. Chaita rurashcallahuan cushiyana rantimanta, chaishuc huata-manta ashtahuan cushi pactachishcahuan callarircanquichic.
47008011	Shinacpi, cancuna ushashca tupu cushpa catishcapi, cancuna cushihuan callarishcapi rurashca shina cancuna munaimanta, chashnallata cunanpash tucuchinapi rurana canquichic.
47008012	Maicanpash alli shuti pacha cuyanayashpa cucpi, Dios pai cushca camarita chasquin, pai cushca tuputa. Illashcamanta Dios mana mañanchu.
47008013	Mana shuccunata yanapanaraicu, cancuna llushtiyanca- pacChu rimanchic;
47008014	ashtahuan tucui chaipuralla nishpami munanchic. Paicuna mana charishcata cunan cancuna charinquichic; shuc puncha, ranti, cancuna mana charishcata paicuna charinunca; chaipi shuti tucui chaipuralla canchic.
47008015	Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Achcata pallac runata mana puchurcachu, ansalla pallac runatapash mana pishircachu".
47008016	Diosta pacrachunimi shuncupi ñuca cancunamanta yuyarishca shinallata paipash yuyarishcaraicu.
47008017	Ñuca mincashcata japirca, paillata cancunamanta yapa yuyarishcaraicu, cunan paipac quiquin munaimanta cancunata ricuncapac riran.
47008018	Titohuan shuc huauquita cancunaman cachacuni, paimanta tucui iniccuna ucupi alli rimai tiyan, quishpina shimi yachachishcapi yapa alli yanapashcaraicu.
47008019	Chai-rapash, iniccuna ñucanchic-huan purincapac paita acllanurca, ñucanchicta yanapancapaC cai Apunchicta jatunyachinaraicu llancacushcapi, ñucanchic alli yanapana yuyai charishcatapash ricsichincapac.
47008020	Chashna, cai cullqui pallanata japicushcamanta, camishpa rimashca shimicunata quishpina munanchic;
47008021	chairaicu allicunallata ruranchic, mana; Apunchicpac ñaupacllapi, runacunapac ñaupacpipash.
47008022	Paicunahuanllata shuc huauquitapash cancunaman cachacuni, achca rurashcapi yanapana yuyai charishcata ñucanchicman pai ricuchishca, cunan ashtahuan, cancuna paipi chapaShcaraicu.
47008023	Pipash TitOmanta tapucpi, ñucapac mashimi nishpa rimaichic, cancunata yanapancapac ñucahuan llancashpa causac. Chaishuc huauquicunamanta tapunucpi, iniccuna paicunata cachashcata, paicuna Cristota jatunyachic cashcata rimana canquichic.
47008024	Iniccuna yachancapac, paicunata allipacha llaquishcahuan ricsichichic, ñucanchic cancunaraicu cushiyashca shuti cashcatapash ricuchichic.
47009001	Inic huauquicunapacta pallashca cullquimanta nicpi, yancami quillcana tucusha,
47009002	ña cancuna yanapana yuyai charishcata allipacha ricsini. Macedoniamanta huauquicunata cushiyashcahuan rimashcani, cancuna Acayamantacuna, chai-shuc huatamanta yanapana yuyailla chapacushcata; Maccdoniamanta achcacuna cancuna chashna yanapana yuyaita charishcata ricushpa, paicunapash chai yuyaillata charinushca.
47009003	Chashnamanta cancunaraicu ñuca alli rimashca ama llullashca shimi shina saquirincapac, cai huauquicunata cancunaman cachani. Alli rimacpi, cancuna ama cuncaimanta japi tucuncapac, yanca rashpa Macedoniamanta pipash ñucahuan rishcapi, cancuna cuncaimanta japi tucunquichicman. Cancuna chashna tucucpi pincaipac tucushun, cancunata yapa jatunyachishpa causashcaraicu; ¡manapacha rimanayanichu cancunallata ima shina pincaipac tucuna cashcamanta!
47009005	Chairaicullata, alli yachihuan cai huauquicuna cancunata ñaupacta ricucrishpa, cancuna rimashca pallana cullquita pactachincapac yanapanuchun. Chashnami cancuna pallashca cullqui cancuna quiquin shuncuhuan cuyashca ricurinca, mana mitsashpa cushca shina.
47009006	Caita yuyaripaichic: Ansalla tarpuc runa, ansalla pallan; achcata tarpuc runa, achcata pallan.
47009007	Caran amu shuncupi yuyarishcata cuna canchic, mana piñarishpa, mana mitsahcahuan imapash, Diosca cushiyashcahuan cuyacta mari llaquin.
47009008	Dios ushanmi, tucui cancuna mutsushcata cuncapac, ama imapash cancunata pishichun; cancunata puchushcahuan shuccunata yanapana ushanquichicman.
47009009	Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Mana mitsashcahuan tsuntsucunaman cushca, pai alli rurashcacuna amana chincarinunchu".
47009010	Dios tarpuc runaman muyuta cun, micunatapash cun; shina cacpi tucui cancuna tarpuncapac mutsushcatami pai cunca, paimi huiñachinca, paimi cancuna cuyashcamanta achcata aparichinca.
47009011	Chashna, tucuita charic tucushpa, shuncumanta jinu cuyana ushanquichic. Cancuna cachashca pallashca cullquimanta shuc huauquicuna ñucanchircaraicu Diosta pacrachununcami.
47009012	Chai yanapaita huauquicunaman apashpa, mana paicuna mutsushcallatachu apanchic, ashtahuan chairaicumantami paicuna Diosta achcata pacrachunca ranun.
47009013	Paicunaca Diosta chacchanuncami, cai yanapashca paicunata ricsichicun cancuna Cristopac Cushi Shimita pactachishcata. Paicunata, tucuicunatapash yanapashcaraicu Diostapash chac-chanuncami.
47009014	Cancunata yapa yuyarishpami Dios-huan rimarinunca, pai cancunapi yapa llaquishcata ricuchishcaraicu.
47009015	¡Diosta pacrachushun, shuc jatun cuyanata ñucanchicman cushcaraicu, shimi mana pactanchu paita pacrachuncapac!
47010001	Ñuca, Pablollatami, cancunata mañani, alli shuncuyuc Cristoraicu. Cancuna ucupi cashpa manchaisiquishi cani, rimai tiyan, ranti carumantaca carishi cani.
47010002	Rimanimi, cancunata ricuncapac rishcapi, ama piñachihuanquichicchu quiquin cari runa shina shayarishcata mana ricunayashpa; tucui ñucanchic rurashcamanta mana allita rimaccunahuan, shuti paicunahuan piñarishcata ricuhuanquichicmi.
47010003	Shutipacha runami canchic, ranti mana cai pachamanta runacuna shina macarinchic.
47010004	Ñucanchicpac aiñicuna mana cai pachamanta-chu canun, Diospac ushaimi can, chaihuan pucuracuna imapash chausi tucunllami. Chashnami, Diosta alli ricsincapac mana alli rimashcacunahuan,
47010005	piñashcacunahuan quillachic-cunata chausichinchic. Tucui runapac yuyaita Cristopac maquipi churanchic, paita uyac tucunuchun;
47010006	cancuna alli uyac tucushcallata, huasha mana uyac tucunucpi cancunata ñacachinatami munanchic.
47010007	Cancuna jahua ricurishcallata yapa ricunquichic. Maicanpash allipacha Cristoman curishca cashpa, yuyarichun ñucanchicpash Cristopac cashcata.
47010008	Yapalla sinchinayata cancunaman rimashpapash, mana pincarinichu; Apunchicca cancunapac inina huiñachincapacmi ushaita ñucanchicman curca, mana cancunata huacllichincapac.
47010009	Cai quillcacuna mana cancunata manchachincapac quillcashca shina ricurichun- mi munani.
47010010	Maicancuna rimanushca ñuca cachashca quillcacuna yapa sinchi rimaccunami nishpa; ranti quiquin ñuca jinuca mana manchaipac pitapash ricurini, mana sumacta rimani.
47010011	Chashna rimaccunata nini: Yuyahuanquichic ñuca cai carumanta quillcapi rimashcata, cancuna ucupi pactashpa rurashcahuanmi ricuchisha.
47010012	Paicunallata jatunyarishpa tiyaccunahuan, alli shutipacha mana pactarinata ushanchicchu. Ranti paicuna yuyarishca shina, paicunapura tupurishpa, yapa pantaranun.
47010013	Ñucanchic cashca tupullata chaccharinata ushanchic, Diosmi ñucanchic llancanapi maicama pactana cashcata churashca, paimi Corintopi cancunapacman pactancapac munarca.
47010014	Chairaicu, ñucanchicta mincashcamanta mana yallicunchicchu, cancunapacman mana pactashca cashpa, shuti yallicunchicman. Ñucanchic tucuimanta ñaupac Cristopac Cushi Shimihuan cancunapacman pactarcanchic.
47010015	Mana shuccuna rurashcahuanchu jatunyanchic, mincashcata-pash mana yallishcanchicchu. Ashtahuan cancunahuan yalli llancanayashpami chapacunchic, inina cancunapi huiñashpa ricpi, shinapash mana yallishpa.
47010016	Cancuna tiyashcamanta ashtahuan caruman Cristopac Cushi Shimita pactachincapac munanchic, shinapash mana shuccuna llancacushcapi satirishpa, ama shuccuna llancashcahuan jatunyarincapac.
47010017	Pipash jatunyanata munashpa, Apunchicpi jatunya-chun.
47010018	Shuc runa mana paillata jatunyashcaraicuchu chacchai tucun, Apunchic jatunyachishcami chacchai tucun.
47011001	¡Ushahuanquichicmanshi ñuca nuspashpa rurashcata casilla ricushpa! Imana cashpapash ñuca rurashcata ñahui ricuhuaichic
47011002	Ñuca cancunaraicu charishca tunpana Diosmantami shamuhuan. Shuc carillahuan cancunata sahuarichishcani; pai can Cristo, ñuca paiman cancunata cunayani shipas shina chuyata.
47011003	Ranti ñuca yuyani, machacui Evata umachishca shina, cancunapash umachi tucunquichic; chashna cancuna yuyai Cristollata allipacha yurarina rantimanta, chicanyashca tucunquichic.
47011004	Cancuna uyanqui-chiclla pipash ñucanchic ricsichishca Jcsusmanta shuc layata ricsichicpipash; chashnallata tucui shuncuhuan chasquinquichic cancuna ña chasquishca Samaimanta cuti shuc chican samaita; chashnallata, cancuna ña chasquishca Cushi Shimimanta cuti chican layatapash chasquinquichiclla.
47011005	Ima shina cashcapash, cancuna catishca "chai yalli apostolcunamanta" mana imapipash urayanichu.
47011006	Ñuca chari shimihuan mana sumacta rimana ushani, ranti yachashcahuan, ñucami cani; caita cancunata ricsichishcanchic achca cuti tucui ñucanchic rurashcacunapi.
47011007	¿Cancunaman Cushi Shimita yachachishcapi mana imata mañashpachu juchallircani ima chari? ¿cancunata jatachinaraicu ñuca jinu yalli uchilla tucushpachu juchallircani ima chari?
47011008	Shucmanta iniccunapac cullquita quichurcani, paicuna cullquita cuhuanucpi japircani cancunata yanapanarai-cu.
47011009	Cancunahuan tiyashpa imatapash mutsushcapi, mana pitapash quillachucanichu; Maccdoniamanta pactamuc huauqui-cunami ñuca mutsushcata cuhuanurca. Cancunata mañashpa mana quillachircanichu, chashnami catisha yuyani.
47011010	Ñuca alli shutipacha Cristota caticmi cani, ¿cashnallata tucui Acayapi ñuca chashna catinamanta quichuhuancachu?
47011011	¿Ñuca imaraicu chashna rimashcata yachanayanquichicchu? ¿Can-cunata mana llaquishcamantachu chashna rimani? ¡Dios yachanmi cancanata ñuca llaquishcata!
47011012	Ranti ñuca racushca shinallata rurashpa catinca rani, paicunamanta umachina yuyaita anchuchincapac, paicunaca umachina yuyaita mashcanun ñuca shina jatunyarincapac;
47011013	pantata yachachiccuna canun, umachiccuna, "Cristopac yachachishcacunami canchic" rimashcahuan quillparishpa puriccuna.
47011014	Caica maipipash tucun, ashtahuan quiquin supai jinumi tucun;
47011015	chairaicu paita yanapaccuna allipi yanapac runacuna shina tucushpa purinun. Shinapash tucurinuncami paicana rurashcaraicullata.
47011016	Cutillata cancunaman rimani, ñucata ama nuspami yuyahuanquichicchu; chashna cancuna yuyashpa, saquichiclla chai nuspa cancunata rimachunlla, ñucapash ansata jatun-yarisha ñucamantallata rimashpa.
47011017	Cai jatunyarinamanta mana Apunchic rimahuashcaraicuchu rimacuni, shuc nuspa runa shinami rimacuni.
47011018	¡Achcacuna paicunallata jatunya-rishpa uyarmun paicuna mrashcamanta! ¿ñucapash imata cani? ¡Jatunyarisha!
47011019	Cancuna tucuita yachac canquichic, ranti nuspacunata uyanquichiclla;
47011020	cancunata atishcahuan yanapan-capac mañaccunatapash yanapanquichiclla; paicunapacta sinchi llancanquichiclla, umachi tucunquichiclla, millashcahuan ricui tucunquichiclla, ñahui palapipash huactai tucunquichiclla.
47011021	Ñucata pincanayahuan caita rimancapac, ñucanchic yapa api tucurcanchic chashnallata cancanata rurancapac. Chashna rurashcamanta shuccuna jatunyaricpi, ñucapash jatunyarishami; shinapash caita shuc nuspa runa rimashca shinami rimani.
47011022	Hebreo runa mari canun paicuna. Ñucapash. Israel runa mari canun paicuna. Ñucapash canimi. Abrahanpac, churicuna canun paicuna. Ñucapash.
47011023	Cristota yanapac mari canun paicuna. Caipi shuc nuspa runa shina rimancapac callarini: ñuca paicunamanta yallimi cani. Ñuca paicunamanta yalli llancashcani, paicunamanta yalli japi tucushpa tucushcani, achca cuti huañunalla causarcani.
47011024	Pichca cuti judiocuna quimsa chunca iscun llutashcahuan ñacachihuanurca.
47011025	Quimsa cuti caspihuan macahuanurca, shuc cuti rumihuan shitahuanurca. Quimsa cuti ñuca rirashca barco yacupi panparirca; ña huañunalla, shuc pancha shuc tuta ñucñu yacupi huaitarcani.
47011026	Achcata purishpa, yacumanta quishpircani, shuhuacunamanta quishpircani, mashicunamanta-pash quishpircani, chican runacunamantapash quishpircani. Llacta ucupipash quishpircani, runa mana tiyashcapipash quispircani, mama-cuchamantapash quishpircani, umachishpa huauquimi canchic rimaccunamanta quishpircani.
47011027	Achca llancana, sanpayana tiyahuashcami; achca cuti mana puñus-cani; yaricaihuan, upianaihuan ñacarishcani; achca cuti mana micushcanichu; chirihuan ñacarishcani, churana pishihuacpi.
47011028	Tucui caicunamanta, ñuca jahuapi caran puncha iniccunamanta yurarina llashai tiyahuan.
47011029	Pipash uncucpi, ñucapash uncuni; shuc runata juchallichinucpi, mana ushaipac piñarini.
47011030	Jatunyarina munashpa, ñucanchicpi sanpa tiyashcata ricsichishpami jatunyarina canchic.
47011031	Apunchic Jesuscristopac Dios Yayallata huiñaipac chacchana tucunchic, paimi yachan ñuca shuti rimashcata.
47011032	Ñuca Damascopi cashcapi, Jatun Curaca Aretasta yanapac Huainaru, tucui llacta puncupi (ricuccamacunata) churarca, ñuca japi tucuchun yuyaihuan;
47011033	shuc runacuna, ñucata ashancapi churashpa, llacta quincha jutcumanta uraicuchihuanurca; chashnami paipac maquimanta quishpircani.
47012001	Amullata jatunyarina mana imapacpash alli can. Shina cacpipash Apunchicmanta nuspaipi ñuca chashquishca-manta, pai ñucata ricsichihuashcamanta rimana tucuni.
47012002	Shuc cristiano runata ricsini, ña chunca chuscu huata tucan pai jahua pachaman pushai tucushca. Mana yachani paipac aichachu pushai tucurca, samaichu pushai tacurca ima chari; chai Dios yachan.
47012003	Ranti yachani cai runa (aichantinchu, samaillachu ima chari, pita yachashun, Dios chaita yachan),
47012004	sumac pachaman pushai tucurca; chaipi mana yachashca shimicunata uyarca; chai shimicunata runa mana rimana ushan.
47012005	Chai ranata shuti jatanyachimanmi, ranti ñuca quiquin jmuca mana, ñucapi sanpa tiyashcamantaca imana ima chari.
47012006	Ñuca jatunyarincapac, mana nuspa runa shinachu racushca, shuti cashcallata rimacusha; ranti mana chashna ruram, ama maican runapash ñuca rimashcamanta, ñuca cashcamanta yallicta yuyancapac.
47012007	Chairaicu ama ñuca jatunyarincapac, shuc ñacarinata cui tucurcam, shuc casha shina aichapi satirahuan, supai cachamuhuashca uncui shina ñucata ñacachihuan.
47012008	Quimsa cuti Apunchicta mañashcani char nanaita anchuchihuachun;
47012009	ranti Apunchic rimahuarca: "Ñucapac ushaillahuan pacta charinqui, ñucapac ushai sanpacunapi ashtahuan yapa alli ricurin". Shina, sanpa cashpa yapa cushiyani, Cristopac ushai ñucapi ricurincapac.
47012010	Chash-nallata ñucapi sanpa tiyahuashcaraicu yapa cushiyani, piñai tucushpa, mana imatapash charishpa, Cristoraicu piñashpa japi tucushpa; ñucata ashtahuan yalli sanpa cashcapi, chaipi yalli sinchicani.
47012011	Shuc nuspa rana shina tucurcani, cancunaraicu chashna tucushcani. Cancunami ñucamanta alli rimana carcanquichic, mana imapi quipachu cani cancuna caticushca "yalli yachachiscacunamanta". ¡Ñuca yanca cashpallata!
47012012	Tucui cancuna ricushca mancharicushiyanacunata mana sanpayashpa cancuna ucupi rurarcani, tucui chashna rurashcacunahuan ricsishca saquirirca, ñuca quiquin yachachishca cashca.
47012013	Ñucanchictami piñan yuyashpa quishpichihuaichic, caillapi shuc iniccanamanta pishi cashcanquichic, cancanata ñuca mana imatapash mañashpa quillachishcallapi.
47012014	Caihuan cancunata quimsa cuti ricucrincapac ña allichirishcami cani, cunanpash mana imatapash mañashpa cancunata quillachishachu. Mana cancuna charishcatachu mashcani, cancunata jinumi mashcani; yayacunami churicuna-pacta cullquita tantachina canun yachihuan, churicuna yayacunapacta, mana.
47012015	Tucui shuncuhuan ñuca charishcata cushami, ñuca jinupash cancunapac allipac curishami; shina cacpipash ñuca ashtahuan cancunata llaquicpi, cancuna ashtahuan pishi llaquihuanquichic yachihuan.
47012016	Alli shutipacha, mañashpa cancunata mana quilla-chishcanichu. Chashna cacpipash, shuc tictapishi cancunata umachishpa urmachishcani, maicancuna ninun.
47012017	¿Ñuca cancunaman cachashca runacunahuanchu umachircani ima chari?
47012018	Titota cancunata ricucrichun rimarcani, paihuan shuc huauquita cacharcani. ¿Titochu cancunata umachirca? Cancuna ricushcanquichic yachin ima shina ñucanchic ishcai, shuclla yuyaihuan, shuclla ruraihuan rurashpa purishcata.
47012019	Cancunapac ñaupacpi ñucanchic rurashcamanta quishpinata mañashca shinami ricurin yachichuan, mana chaichu. Ashtahuan, Cristopac runacuna cashpami Diospac ñaupacpi rimacunchic. Shinapash tucui chai, llaquishca huauquicuna, cancunapac inina huiñashpa catincapacmi can.
47012020	Yuyarishcanimi, ñuca cancunata ricuncapac rishcapi, ¿ñuca munashca shinachu tupahuanquichic ima chari?, ¿ñucatapash cancuna munashca shinachu tupahuanquichic ima chari? Tiyancami yachihuan piñanacui, chiquichui, cancunapura piñanacuna, quiquinpacraiculla yuyana, camina, shucmanta rimana, jatunyarina, mana alli yachaicuna.
47012021	Ñuca quimsa cuti cancunata ricuncapac rishcapi, ñuca Dios pincachihuanca yachin cancunaraicu, achca cancanamantapash huacachihuanca yachihuan, huaquincuna unaimanta juchallishpa catiranun mari, chaira mana saquinushca yumashpa juchallinata, mana alli causaita, paicunapac aicha mañashcata chaira rurashpa catiranun.
47013001	Caihuanmi quimsa cuti cancunata ricucrmca rani. Imapash tiyacpi, ishcai quimsa ricuyaccunapac shimita uyashca huashami allichina tucunca.
47013002	Ñaupac juchallishpa causaccunata rimarcani, tucuicunatapash rimani, cunan carupi cashpapash cutillata rimani chaishuc cuti ricucrishcapi cancunata jinu rimashcata; cuti cancunata ricuncapac rishcapi, mana llaquishcahuan cuscatami taripasha,
47013003	cancuna mashcacunquichic mari Cristo alli shuti pachachu ñuca shimihuan riman imata. Cristoca cancunapac ñaupacpi mana sanpachu ricurishca, ashtahuan paipac ushaitami cancuna ucupi ricuchishca.
47013004	Shutimi can pai sanpa shina chacatai tucushca, ranti Diospac ushairaicu causacun. Chashnallata ñucanchicpash pai sanpa cashcata charinchic, ranti paihuan llutarishpa Diospac ushairaicu causashanmi cancanata yanapancapac.
47013005	Cancunallata tariparichic, inina cancunapi sinchichu can imata; cancuna quiquinllata camanacuichic cunan. ¿Manachu atipanquichic cancunapi .lcsucristo tiyacushcata? ¡Cancuna quiquinllata camanacushpa yalli tucushcapi chaipi shuti illancami!
47013006	Cancuna yachanquichicmi ñucanchic camana charishcapi mana alli tucushcata.
47013007	Chairaicu ñucanchic Dios-huan rimarishcapi, cancuna mana allicunata ama rurancapac paita mañanchic; mana ñucanchic taripai tucushcata ricsichincapac, ashtahuan cancuna allicunata rurancapac, ñucanchic camai tucushcapi yalli tucushca shina ricuricpipash.
47013008	Shuti cashcata huacllichincapac mana ushanchic, paita catinalla tucunchic.
47013009	Chairaicu yapa cushiyanchic ñucanchic sanpa cashcamanta, shinapash cancuna sinchi tucunata chapashpa; Dios-huan rimarishpa catishunmi cancuna pacta runa tucunacama.
47013010	Chaira cancunata mana ricucrishcallapita cai quillcata cancunaman cachani, ama yapa millai apu shina pactasha nini; shuti apumi cani Apunchic munashcaraicu, mana cancunata huacllichincapac, ashtahuan cancunapac inina huiñashpa catincapacmi.
47013011	Tucuchincapac, huauquicuna, cancuna causana cushi cancapac munani, cancunapac causana pactachishca tucunacama mashcaichic. Tucuipura sinchicurishpa, shuclla yuyaihuan, alli causaihuan; cashnami cuyanata, alli causanata cuc Dios cancunahuan causanca.
47013012	Chuya muchashcahuan muchana-cuichic.
47013013	Tucui iniccuna cancunata yuyarinun.
47013014	Apunchic Jcsucristopac ushai, Diospac llaquina, Diospac Samaipash tucui cancanahuan tiyanuchun.
48001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Apostol cani, mana runacuna cachashca, mana runacuna shayachishcaraicuchu cani; Jesucristo jinu, paita causachic Yaya Dios-huan shayachishcami cani.
48001002	Ñuca, tucui caipi ñucahuan tiyacuc huauquicunantin, Galaciapi tiyac Diosta iniccunaman cai quillcata cachacunchic.
48001003	Ñucanchicpac Yaya Dios, Apunchic Jesucristontin Diospac cuyaita, ganas causaitapash cancunapi tallichinuchun.
48001004	Jesu-cristo huañuiman curirca ñucanchic juchacunaraicu, cunan causacushca huacllishca pachamanta ñucanchicta quishpichinca-pac, Dios Yaya munashcata pactachishpa.
48001005	Diosta huiñaipac jatunyachishun. Chashna cachun.
48001006	Cancuna utcalla Diosmanta chicanyarishcaraicu yapa mancharishcami cani; pai Cristopac llaquinapi paiman cancunata cayarca, cancunaca chican quishpina shimita yachachiccunahuan rishcanquichic.
48001007	Alli nicpi mana tiyanchu shuc quishpina shimi. Rimacpica shuc runacuna mari cancunata pantachic tiyanun, Cristopac quishpina shimita pantata yachachishpa.
48001008	Chashnamanta, maicanpash ñucanchic ña yachachishca quishpina shimimanta chicanta yachachishpa huañuchun; ñucallata imapash, jahua pachamanta angel imapash cancami, mana imanancachu.
48001009	Ñaupa cancunaman rimashcata cutillata nini: Maicanpash ña cancuna chasquishca quishpina shimimanta chicanta yachachishpa, chai runa huañuchun.
48001010	Mana runacunata cushiyachinatachu mashcani, Diostami cushiyachinata munani. Runacunapacpi alli ricui tucuc cashpa, mana Cristota yanapacchu caiman.
48001011	Caita yachapaichic, huauquicuna: Ñuca yachichicushca quishpina shimi mana runa yuyaimantachu llucshishca.
48001012	Manapi runamanta yacharcanichu, manapi runamanta chasquircanichu, Jesucristo jinullatami ricsichihuarca.
48001013	Cancuna uyashcanquichicmi ima shina callari pachapi ñuca, judio yachaita caticushpa, tucui ñuca ushaihuan, Diosta miccunata piñashpa japircani, paicunata tucuchinatapash munarcani.
48001014	Ñuca judic yachaita caticushcapi, ñucanchic llactamanta shuc maltacunamanta ashtahuan yalli sinchi llutarishcami carcani ñucanchic inishcaman, rucunapac yachaicunata cuscata caticmi carcani.
48001015	Shinapash, Dios ñuca chaira mana pacarishcallapita acllahuarca, pai ñucata yapa llaquishcaraicu cayahuarca. Pai rimashca pacha pactashcapi,
48001016	paipac Churita ricsichihuarca, paipac quishpina shimita Diosta mana ricsiccunaman ricsichincapac. Chashna tucushcapi manapi runahuan rimarircanichu;
48001017	Jerusalenmanpash mana rircanichu, ñucamanta ñaupac apostol caccunata ricuncapac. Ashtahuan, utcalla Arabia allpaman rircani, chai huasha Damascoman ticramurcam.
48001018	Quimsa huata huasha Jerusalenman ticrarcani, Pedrota ricsina yuyaihuan; paihuan chunca pichca puncha tiyarcani.
48001019	Chashnapash mana shuc apostolcunata ricurcanichu, Apunchicpac huauqui Santiagollatami ricurcani.
48001020	Cai ñuca cancunaman quillcacushca mana llullachu, Diospac ñaupacpimi shuti cashcata rimani.
48001021	Siria, Cilicia allpacunaman chai huasha rircani.
48001022	Ran-ti Judeapi tiyac inic huauquicuna ñuca ricushpa jinu mana ric-sihuanurcachu.
48001023	Cai rimaillata ñucamanta uyanushcarca:"Ca-llari pacha ñucanchicta piñashpa japic runa, cunaca pai ñaupac chincachina munashca quishpichic shimita yachachic cachan".
48001024	Chashnamanta ñucaraicu Diosta chacchaccuna carca.
48002001	Chunca chuscu huata huasha cutillata Jerusalenman Bernabehuan rircanchic, Titotapash ñucahuan pusharcani.
48002002	Rircanimi Dios rimahuashcaraicu. Ña Jerusalenpi cashcapi, pushaccamacunahuan shuc tantarinata charircanchic, chaipi ricsichircani, ñuca quishpichic shimita Diosta mana ricsiccanaman ricsichicushcata.
