48002003	Chashnapi, Titollatapash pai griego cashcamanta pincai carata pitirincapac mana rimanurcachu.
48002004	Maicancuna yanca huauqui shina tucushpa pacalla miticushpa ñucanchic ucupi satirinushcarca; ñucanchic Cristo Jesuspi mana huatara shina sumac causashcata ricushpa huasha, cutillata camachic quillcapi huatachishpa urmachinarai-cu.
48002005	Shinapash mana ansallapash umachi tucurcanchicchu, quishpichic shimi shuti cashca cancunapi saquirincapac munashcaraicu.
48002006	Ranti pushaccamacuna huasha ima rurana cashcata mana rimanahuanurcachu (chai pushaccamacuna paicuna ñaupac cashcata mana yachanayanichu, Diosca mana runa jahua ricurishcaraicuchu taripan).
48002007	Ima ruranacunata rimana rantimanta, chaipi allipacha yachanacurca Dios paita mana ricsiccunaman quishpichic shimita yachachincapac ñucaman mincashcata, judiocunata yachachincapac Pedrota mincashca shina.
48002008	Pedrota judiocunapacman apostol shayachishca huasha cachac Diosllatami, ñucatapash Diosta mana ricsiccunaman apostol cachahuarca.
48002009	Chairaicu, Santiago, Pedro, Juanpash, paicuna iniccunamanta sapi canurca, paicuna allipacha ricsinurca cai mincanata Dios ñucaman cushcata. Ñucanchicta allipacha mashita rurashpa, ñucata Bernabetapash paicuna maquita cunurca, ñucanchic Diosta mana ricsiccana ucupi llancacushca-pash allimi ninurca, ranti paicunaca judio ucupi llancashpa catinunca.
48002010	Tsuntsucunamanta ama cuncarincapaclla rimai tucurcanchic, chaita shuti mana pishiyashpa pactachishcanhni.
48002011	Ranti Pedro Antioquia llactaman rishcapi, quiquin ñahuipi paita piñarcani, pai rurashca manapacha alli cashcaraicu.
48002012	Cashna carca; ñaupacmanta mana judio runacunahuan micucurca, Santiago cachamushca runacuna pactamunacama; chaipi chicanyancapac callarirca, ña paicunahuan micunata saquirca, pincai cara pitirinamanta rimaccunata manchashcamanta.
48002013	Inic judiocunapash Pedro umachishcahuan racushcata alli ricunurca, imata ña Bernabepash paicuna shinallata rurana tucurca.
48002014	Chairaicu, quishpichic shimi yachachishcata paicuna mana pactachicucpi ricushpa, tucui tantarishcacunapac ñanpacpi Pedrota rimarcani: "Can judio cashpallata, mana judio shina causacushcanqui; shina cacpi, ¿mana judio runacunata, judio shina causana canquichic nishpa rimana allichu?".
48002015	Pacarishcamanta ñucanchic judio canchic, mana Diosta mana ricsic juchasapachu canchic.
48002016	Chashnapash yachanchic ima shina manapi runapash juchamanta quishpira saquirinchic Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachishcamanta, ranti Jesucristollata inishcamanta. Chairaicu ñucanchicpash Jesucris-topi inishcanchic, cai ininaraicu juchamanta quishpichi tucuncapac, ranti mana camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicu.
48002017	Cunan ricushun, Cristoraicu juchamanta quishpinata mashcacushpallata, cuti ñucanchicllata juchasapa cashpa, ¿chashnapica Cristomi ñucanchicta juchasapa ruranchu rimashun? ¡Manapacha chashnachu!
48002018	Imatapash huacllichishca huasha cutillata allichishpa, amullata juchayuc cashcata ricsichicuni.

48002020	ña mana ñucachu causani, Cristomi ñucapi causan. Cunan ñuca aichapi causacushca causaita, Diospac Churipi inina charishcaraicumi causacuni, pai ñucata llaquishcamanta ñucaraicu huañuiman curirca.
48002021	Dios yapa alli shuncuyuc cashcata mana chicanman jichunayanichu; camachic quillcata pactachishcamanta ñuca juchamanta quishpira saquirina cacpi, Cristo yancamanta chari huañushca canman.
48003001	¡Upa Galacia runacuna! ¿Pitac cancunata sacrarca? Ñucanchic yachachishcapi quiquin cancunapac ñahuipi mari ricuchircanchic chacatashca Jesucristota.
48003002	Cai ta-pushcallata cutipahuaichic ninimi: ¿Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicuchu Diospac Samaita chasquircan-quichic?, ¿astahuan ñucanchicmanta uyashca shimipi inishca-raicuchu chasquircanquichic?
48003003	Yapalla upachu canquichic, chashna Diospac Samaihuan callarishpallata, cunan cuti runa yachaillapi catina manancapac.
48003004	¡Chai tucui alli yachashcacu-na yanca canushca! Manapacha, mana yanca canushcancachu ninimi.
48003005	Dios cancunata paipac Samaita jinu cushpa, cancuna ucupi mancharicushiyanacunata rurashpa, ¿yancachu ruran? Mana cancuna camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicuchu ruran, ranti cancuna uyashca shimita inishcaraicumi ruran.
48003006	Abrahan Diosta inirca, chairaicu Dios paita jucha illac shina chasquirca.
48003007	Chashnamanta, cancana yachana canquichic inina chariccunalla Abrahanpac quiquin churicuna cashcata.
48003008	Dios mana judio runacunatapash juchamanta paicuna inina charishcaraicu quishpichina ñaupacta yachashpa, camachic quillcapi Abrahanta cai sumac shimita ricsichirca: "Canraicumi tucui llactacuna bendisiashca canunca".
48003009	Chashnamanta tucui iniccuna, Abrahanhuan bendisiai tucunun, paipash mish-caraicu.
48003010	Moisespac camachic quillcapi ynyaita churaccuna maldisiashca canun, cashna camachic quillcata rimashcaraicu: "Maldisiashca cachun maicanpash tucui camachic quillcapi rimashcata mana pactachic runa".
48003011	Chashnamanta, ricunalla oan ima shina mana pipash juchamanta quishpichi tucushcata camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishcaraicu, cashna camachic quillca riman: "Inina charishcaraicumi chuya shuncuyuc runa causanca".
48003012	Ranti Moisespac camachic quillcaca mana ininamanta rimanchu, paica cashnami riman: "Camachic quillcata pactachic runa, pairaicumi causanca".
48003013	Camachic quillcapi maldisiai tucushcamanta Cristo ñucanchicta quishpichirca, pai jinu maldisiai ñucanchicraicu tucushpa, cashna camachic quillca riman: "Pipash caspipi huarcuchishpa huañushpa maldisiashca cachun".
48003014	Cai chashna tucurcami, mana judio runacunamanpash Abrahanta Dios cusha nishca bendision Cristo Jesuraicu pactana ushancapac; chashnami inina charishcamanta, Dios cusha nishca Samaita tucuicuna chasquina ushashun.
48003015	Hauquiccuna, runa atipaipac shimipimi rimani: Pactachina shimita shuc runa cushpa, cuti chai jahuapi paipac shutita quillcacpi, mana pipash shuc quillcata yapachina, anchuchina imapash ushan.
48003016	Chashnallata Dios Abrahanman paipac churimanpash cusha nishcacunata curca. Camachic quillcapi mana "churicunaman" rimanchu, shucllamantami riman; rimanmi: "canpac churimanpash", chaica Cristo can.
48003017	Caitami rimacuni: Dios Abrahanhuan shimita cunacunurca, paica chaita pactachirca. Chairaicu, Moisespac camachic quillca, pai chuscu patsac quimsa chunca huata huasha shamushca cashpa, mana ushanchu cunacushca shimita anChuchishpa, Dios cusha nishcata mayanman jichuncapac.
48003018	Dios ñucanchicman cunca rashca Moisespac quillcaraicu pactarina cashpa, ña mana cusha nishcachu canman; ranti Dios ña rimashca carca: Ñuca cusha nishcata Abrahanman cuyashami.
48003019	Shina cacpi, ¿Moisespac camachic quillca imallapash allichu can? Paica huashami cui tucurca runacuna mana uyashcata ricsichincapac; chai "churi" pactamunacama, paita cusha nishcami tiyarca. Angelcunahuan camachic quillcacui tucurCa, Moisesca Dios-huan runacunahuan rimarishcata chinpachic carca.
48003020	Ranti shuclla runa tiyashcapi chinpachiccama mana mutsurin, Diosca shucllami can.
48003021	¿Moisespac camachic quillca Dios cusha nishcata piñanmi rimanchicchu? Mana chaichu can. Camachic quillca causaita cuna ushac cacpi, ñuca jucha illac tucuiman cai camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishpa.
48003022	Ranti camachic quillca rimashcapi, tucuilla juchapi huatai tucushca canun, Jesuscristota iniccunalla Dios cusha nishcata chasqui ushancapac.
48003023	Inina chaira mana tiyashcapi, ñucanchicta huatashcata camachic quillca charirca, inina ricsi tucunacama.
48003024	Huatashca runa huahuacunata pushashca shina, camachic quillca ñucanchicta Cristoman pusharca, paita inishcahuan juchamanta pichara saquirincapac.
48003025	Cunan inina ña pactamurca, chairaicu huatara charic camachic quillcamanta chicanyashca canchic.
48003026	Cunan cancuna Cristo Jesuspi inina charishcaraicu tucuilla Diospac churi canquichic;
48003027	bautismoraicuca Cristohuan llutarishca tucushcanquichic, paita jinu churarishcapash canquichic.
48003028	Cunan ña mana imananchu judio cana, griego cana, huatara cana, quishpira cana, huarmi cana, cari cana imapash, Cristohuan llutarishca cashpa tucui cancuna shuclla cashcaraicu.
48003029	Cristopac cashpa, chaipi shuti Abrahanpac churicuna, Dios paita cusha nishcata chasquinacuna canquichic.
48004001	Caitami rimanayani: japinata chasquina chaira huahua cashcapi, shuc aillu ucupi huatara runa tiyashcamanta mana imapi chican ricurin, tucuipac amu cashpapash.
48004002	Shuc runacuna paita ricuccama tiyanan, pai rurana cashcata rurashpa cunun, paipac yaya rimashca pacha pactanacama.
48004003	Ñucan-chicpi chashnallata tucun: ñucanchic huahua cashcapi, cai pachamanta pacashca amucuna ñucanchicta huatara charinurca.
48004004	Ranti ña rimashca pacha pactarishcapi, Dios paipac Churita cachamurca, pai shuc huarmimanta pacarirca, Moisespac camachic quillcapi rimashcata pactachina tucurca;
48004005	chai camachic quillcahuan huatashcacunata quishpichishpa, Dios-pacpi ñucanchic churicuna shina chasqui tucuna ushancapac.
48004006	Ña paipac churicuna cashcata ricsichincapac, Dios paipac Churipac Samaita ñucanchic shuncucunaman cachamurca; chai Samaica caparin: "Ñuca yaya".
48004007	Shina cacpi, can ña mana huatara runa canqui, Diospac churimi canqui; paipac churi cashpa, japina cashcata chasquina canqui, pai chashna munashcaraicu.
48004008	Ñaupa, cancuna Diosta mana ricsic cashcapi, dioscunapi huatara carcanquichrc, alli rimacpi paicuna mana dioschu canun.
48004009	Ranti cunan ña Diosta ricsiccuna cashpa, ashtahuan allita rimacpi, cancuna Dios ricsishcacuna cashpallata, ¿alllichu canca cutillata chai sanpa tsuntsu ushaicunaman urmashpa, paipac huataracuna tucuncapac?
48004010	Cancuna raiminquichic maican punchacuna, quillacunapi, yuyarishca panchapi, huatapi imapash...
48004011	Yancamantami cancuna ucupi llancashcani yachihuan.
48004012	Huauquicuna, ñucata catihuaichic cancunata rimani, ñucapash cancuna shina tucushcaraicu. Mana imapipash piñachihuashcanquichiccu.
48004013	Cancuna ña yachanquichic, ñuca callarishcapi Cushi Shimimanta yachachincapac, shuc uncuita ñacaricushpami chaitaca rurarcani.
48004014	Chai uncui cancunata camancapac carca, cancuna ñuca chai uncuita charicpipash mana piñahuarcanquichic, mana callpachihuarcanquichic; chaipac rantimanta, shuc Diospac angelta shina chasquihuar-canquichic, quiquin Jesucristo cacpi shina.
48004015	¿Cancuna chai pacha cushiyashca tucurircachu? Cancunamanta allita yuyarish-pa rimanimi, cancuna ushashpa, ñahuitapash surcurinquichic-manmi carca ñucata cuncapac.
48004016	Cunanca, ¿cancunata chicnicchu cani, shuti cashcata rimashcaraiculla?
48004017	Chai runacuna cancunapi ñahuita churanushcami, shinapash paicuna ruranca racushca mana allichu can. Paicuna cancunata ñucanchicmanta chicanyachincapac munanun, chai huasha cancuna paicunamanlla yuyarinuchun nishpa.
48004018	Shuc-cunamanta yapa yuyarina yapa allimi can, shinapash alli yuyaihuan; huiñaipac cachun, mana cancunahuan ñuca tiyacushcallapi.
48004019	Ñuca huahuacunalla, cutillatami cancuna-raicu nanaicunata ñacarini, shuc huachanca racuc mama charishca nanaicunata shina; ñacaricushallami cancanapi Cristo allipacha pactamunacama.
48004020	Cancunahuanshi cunanshitullata chaipi tiyacuiman cancuna atipaipac shimipi rimancapac, pita yachashun, cancunata imana rimacpi chari alli tucunman.
48004021	Caita cutipahuichic, cancuna Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachina munaccuna: ¿manachu uyashcanquichic chai camachic quillca rimashcata?
48004022	Abrahan ishcai churitami charirca riman: shuc churi huatara huarmimanta, shucca quiquin huarmimanta; chai huarmica mana huatara carca.
48004023	Huatara huarmipac churi tucui runa shina pacarirca; ranti quishpira huarmipac churica Dios cusha nishca pactarincapac pacarirca.
48004024	Chashna tucushca yapa ricsichin; caran huarmi shuc cunacushca shimita ricSichin; shucca Sinai urcupi cunacushca shimita ricsichin; Agar can chai, cai cunacushca shimipi pacariccuna huatara pacarinun.
48004025	Allita rimacpi, Agar, Arabiapi tiyac Sinai urcu can; yuyaricpi cunan tiyac Jesuralen can; cai llacta huatara can tucui paipac churicunantin.
48004026	Ranti jahua pachamanta Jerusalen quishpira can, ñucanchicca paipac churicuna canchic.
48004027	Camachic quillca cashna rimashcaraicu: Mana huahuayuc huarmi, cushiyai, can mana huahuayuc canqui; can mana huahua pacarina nanaita ricsic, cushiyashpa capari. Jichui tucushca nuarmi cariyuc huarmimanta yalli achca huahuayuc tucuna cashcaraicu.
48004028	Huauquicuna, cancuna Isaac shinami canquichic; Dios cusha nishca huahuacunami canquichic.
48004029	Chai pachapi tucui runa shina pacaric churi, Samaimanta pacaric churita piñashpa japishca shina, chashnallatami cunanpash tucun.
48004030	¿Chashna-manta camachic quillca rimashcata yachanquichicchu? Caita rimau: "Huatara huarmita huahuantin callpachi, quishipira huarmipac churi japina cashcata huatara huarmipac churihuan mana chaupichirincachu.
48004031	Shina cacpi, huauquicuna, mana huatara nuarmipac churicunachu canchic, quishpira huarmipac churicunami canchic.
48005001	Cristo ñucanchicta quishpinata curca ñucanchic quishpira cancapac. Chairaicu chai quishpina charishcapi sinchicushpa causaichic, ama cuti huatara causanaman ticrashpa.
48005002	Uyahuaichic. Ñuca, Pablo, cancunata runanimi cancuna pincai carata pitichicpi, Cristo cancunapac mana imapash allichu canca.
48005003	Maican cara pitiric runatapash cutillata rimanayani, Moisespac camachic quillcapi rimashcata tucuita pactachinami can.
48005004	Camachic quillcata pactachishpa jucha-manta quishpinata cancuna mashcanquichic, chashna rurashpa Cristomanta chicanyashcanquichic; Diospac llaquinamantapash chicanyashcanquichicmi.
48005005	Ranti ñucanchicca Samairaicu ñu-canchic ininaraicupash juchamanta quishpichi tucunata chapan-chic.
48005006	Cristo Jesusman llutarishca cashpa, pmcai cara pitira, mana cara pitira cana yancami can. Jnina shuti allimi can, cai ininapash llaquinacushpa causanata ñucanchicman cuchun.
48005007	Cancuna alli caticurcanquichic. Shuti cashcata cancuna uyanata saquincapac, ¿pipash camachircachu?
48005008	Cancunata cayac Dios mana cashcancachu.
48005009	"Ansashitu levadura achca harinata punquichinmi", rimai tiyan;
48005010	Apunchicpi ñuca chapani cancana mana shuc yuyaita japina cashcamanta; ranti cancunata pantachic ranata Dios ñacachincami, pi cacpipash.
48005011	Huauquicuna, ranti, ñuca iniccunata pincai cara pitirinami chaira rimashpa puricpi, judiocuna mana piñashpa japihuanunmanchu; chashna cacpi Cristopac crusmanta yachachishca paicunata mana piñachinmanchu.
48005012	Ñuca yuyanimi chai cancunata quillachishpa puriccuna, shuc railla paicunallata curuta muyuta surcuricpi alli canman.
48005013	Huauquicuna, quishpira cancapac cancuna cayai tucurcanquichic. Shinapash cai quishpirapi ama ruranquichic-chu cancana aicha mañashcata. Ashtahuan llaquinacushcaraicu tucuipura yanaparina canquichic.
48005014	Camachic quillcapi rimashca cai pactachina shimipi pactacta tiyan; "shuc runata canpac quiquin aichata shina llaquina canqui".
48005015	Yuyashpa causaichic, cancanapura caninacushpa, micunacushpa causash-pa, cancunapurallatami huacllirinquichic.
48005016	Chashnamanta rimani: Samai munashca shina causaichic, ama cancana mana alli munashcacunata ruraichic-chu.
48005017	Mana alli munaicunahuan Samaihuan chicnicpura canun. Shuc shuccanahuan chicnicpura cashcaraicu, cancuna mana ushanquichic cancuna munashcata rurancapac.
48005018	Ranti cancunata Samai pushacpi, chaipi shuti camachic quillcamanta chican canquichic.
48005019	Mana alli munaicunata caticcuna rurashcata ricsinalla can: yumashpa juchallinun, ticllayuc, mana allicunata rurashpa juchallinun,
48005020	huacacunata chacchanun, sacrachinun. Huiñaipac piñarishca causanun, chicanyashpa, tunpashpa. Piñarisiqui canun, piñanacuchinun, chausichinun, chicanyachi-nun.
48005021	Chiquicuisiqui canun, machaisiqui, micuisiqui, tucui mana allita ruranunllami. Cancunata rimani ñaupac rimashca shina: chashna causaccuna Diospac pachaman mana yaicanun-cachu.
48005022	Ranti Samaica caita cun: Llaquina, cushiyana, ganas causai, mana piñarishpa chapana, llaquic cana, alli shuncuyuc cana, rimashcata pactachic,
48005023	mana amu munashcallata rurac, samaita catic. Tucui chaicunata mana maican camachic quillca cautsayachina ushanchu.
48005024	Jesucristopac caccuna juchasapa canata tucui manaalli munaicunantin illactami chacatanushca.
48005025	Samairaicu cunan causacushpa saquishun Samaillata ñucanchicta purichichun.
48005026	Jatunyana ñucanchicpi ama tiyachun, ama piñanacuita, chiquicuitapash ñucanchic ucupi churashun.
48006001	Huauquicuna, pitapash juchapi urmashcata ricushpa, cancuna samaihuan puriccuna cashpa, pai alliman ticrancapac yanapana canquichic. Ranti yapa llaquishcahuan rurana canquichic; shinapash caran runa yuyarishpalla rurachun, yancamanta cancunapash juchanayaipi urmanquichicman.
48006002	Ima llaquipash tiyashcapi tucuilla yanaparichic, chashnami Cristo rimashcata pactachinquichic.
48006003	Pi runapash mana ima cashpallata jatunyarishpa, paillata umarishca tucun.
48006004	Caran amu paipac quiquin causaita taripachun; paimantallata cushiyanata charishpa cushiyachun, shuccunamantaca mana.
48006005	Caran amumi quiquin paipac llaqui llashaita apari cachana tucun.
48006006	Cushi Shimimanta yachacuc, yachachic-huan tucui pai charishcata chaupichinacan.
48006007	Ama cancunallata umarichichu: Diosta mana pipash asinchu. Quiquin tarpushcatami pallana tucunchic.
48006008	Mana alli munaicunata tarpuc, chai mana alli munaicunamanta pallanca. Ranti Samai munashcata tarpucca, Samaimantami huiñaipac causanata pallanca.
48006009	Chairaicu mana sanpayashpa alli rnranacanata rurana canchic; mana sanpayashpa catishpaca, paipac pacha pactashcapi pallashunmi.
48006010	Chairaicu, caran ushashcapi tucuicunata alli rurashcahuan yanapana canchic, inic huauquicanata ashtahuan yalli yanapana canchic.
48006011	¡Cancuna ricuichic ima shina jatun quillcacunahuan quiquin ñuca maquihuan cunan cancunata quillcacuni!
48006012	Cancunata pincai cara pitirincapac rimaccuna, runacunapac ñaupacpi alli saquirincapacllami can, Cristopac crusraicu ama piñashpa japi tucushun nishpallami chashna ruranun.
48006013	Shinapash, chashnu cara pitirishca cashpallata, mana tucui camachic quillcapi rimashcata pactachinunchu. Chashna cancunata pincai cara pitirincapac rimanun, chashna cancuna aichapi chai ricuric mircata rurachishca huasha, paicuna jatunyarishun nishpami can chaita.
48006014	Ranti ñucaca, Apunchic Jesucristopac crusmantallami jatanyarina munani, mana shuc imamantapash.
48006015	Pincai cara pitirishca, mana pitirishca cana mana imapash allichu can; mushu causaita charina, chaimi alli can.
48006016	Tucui cashna causaccuna ganas causaita Diospac llaquinata chasquichic Diospac quiquin runacunantin.
48006017	Caimanta huashaman mana munanichu pipash llaquicanata apamuhuancapac; ñuca aichapi charishca mircacuna Jesuspac yanapac cashcata ricsichiranun.
48006018	Huauquicuna, Apunchic Jesucrsito paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichichun. Chashna cachun.
49001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Dios munashcaraicu Jesucristopac apostol cani, Efeso llactapi tiyac Diospac runacunaman, Cristo Jesusta iniccunaman cai quillcata cachani.
49001002	Ñucan-chicpac Yaya Dios Apanchic Jesucristontin paicunapac cuyaita ganas causaitapash cancanapi tallichinuchun.
49001003	Dios Yayata chacchashunchic, pai Jesucristopi tucui laya allicunata jahua pachamanta ñucanchicman curca.
49001004	Cai pachata chaira mana rurashcallapita, ñucanchicta Jesuscristopi acllarca paipac ñaupacpi tiyancapac, paipacta chicanyachishca, jucha illaccuna. Pai ñucanchicta llaquishcamanta,
49001005	Jesucristo-raicu pai huiñachishca huahuacuna cancapac japishca carcanchic, pai chashna munashcaraicu.
49001006	Chairaicunamanta huiñaipac Diosta chacchanchic pai cuyashcacunamanta, chaicunahuanmi ñucanchicta bendisiarca paipac llaquishca Churipi.
49001007	Dios achca llaquishcapi, paipac Churi tallichishca yahuar-raicu ñucanchicta huatara cashcamanta llushpichishca juchacunamantapash ñucanchicta pichashcami.
49001008	Dios ñucanchicpac yuyaita punchayachishpa, tucui atipanata cushpa, pai achca llaquishcata ricsichishca,
49001009	pai pacara charishca yuyaitapash ñucanchicman ricsichishca, rimacpi pai unaimanta rurana yuyarishcata.
49001010	Pai rimashca pactarishcapi, Dios tucuita Cristopac maquipi churanca ran, jahua pachamanta, cai pachamanta tucui imacunata.
49001011	Dios unaimanta ñucanchicta acllashcarca, ñucanchic Cristohuan llutarishca cashcaraicu japina cashcata japina ushancapac, Diosllata munashca shina; paimi tucui paipac ñahuipi alli ricurishcata ruran.
49001012	Ñucanchic Cristopi tucuicunamanta ñaupac yuyaita churaccuna cacpi, Dios jatun cashcaraicu chacchashpa causancapacmi chashna rurashca.
49001013	Cancunapash shuti shimita uyashcapi, quishpichic shimimanta rimai tucushcapi, Cristota inishpa, paiman llutachishca tucurcanquichic, Diospac sellashcapash saquirir-canquichic pai cusha nishca Samairaicu.
49001014	Dios tucui paipaccunata quishpichishca huasha, ñucanchicjapina cashcata Diospac Samai ricuchicun, pai jatun ushaita charishcaraicu chacchai tucuncapac.
49001015	Chairaicu, Apanchic Jesuspi cancuna inina charishcata yachashpa, tucui Diospac runacunatapash llaquishcata yachashpa,
49001016	cancunaraicu Diosta pacrachunata manapacha saquinichu, Dios-huan rimarishcapi cancunamanta yuyarishpa.
49001017	Apunchic Jesucristopac Diosta, jatunyachishca Yayata mañani alli yachana yuyaita cancunaman cuyachun, pai yachachishcata alli atipashpa, ashtahuan allita ricsincapac.
49001018	Imata cancuna chapancapac cayai tucushcata yachancapac, ima shina jatan japina cashcata Dios paipac runacunaman cunca rashcata yachanuchun yuyaihuanmi, cancunapac yuyaitapash Dios punchayachichun nishpa mañani;
49001019	chash-nallata, mai jatun paipac ushai cashcatapash yachancapac mañanami, chai ñucanchicpi iniccuna cashcamanta rurarin. Chai ushai Dios tucui ushaihuan ricuchishcallatami,
49001020	pai huañushcamanta Cristota causachishpa, jahua pachapi paipac yachac maquiman tiyachishcapi,
49001021	tucui ushaicanamanta yalli ushaiyucta rurashpa, apucunamanta, amucunamanta, apunchic-cunamanta yalli, tucui cunan pachapi tiyac, huasha tiyanca racuc pachapi tiyashcamanta jahuapi churashpa.
49001022	Tucui imacunata Cristopac chaqui ucupi churarca, inuccunaman quiquin Cristo jinu curirca, paipac uma cancapac.
49001023	Jniccuna Cristopac aicha canun, Cristo paihuan pacta tucun; ranti Cristoca tucuicunapi pacta tucun.
49002001	Mana alli rurashcacunaraicu, juchacunaraicu, ñaupac cancuna huañushcami carcanquichic,
49002002	chashna causa-cushpa, cai pacha ruranata caticurcanquichic, huairapi puric chai samai amu munashcata rurarcanquichic; pai sinchicuchin Diosta mana uyana munaccunata.
49002003	Chashnallata callari pachapi tucui ñucanchicpash causacurcanchic, ñucanchic aicha munashcata, ñucanchic juchasapa cashcata, yuyai rimashcata catishpa. Chashna cashcamanta, Diospac manchaipac ñaca-chinata charina carcanchic, shuccuna shinallata.
49002004	Ranti Dios yapa llaquinata charishpa, ñucanchicta yapa llaquishpa,
49002005	Cristopi ñucanchicmanta causaita curca ñucanchic chaira juchacunaraicu huañushca cashcallapita. Dios alli shuncuyuc cashcaraicu quishpmata cancuna chasquircanquichic.
49002006	Cristo Jesus-huan pacta Dios huañushcamanta ñucanchicta causa-chirca, paihuanpash jahua pachapi ñucanchicta tiyachirca.
49002007	Huasha pachacunapi yapa ñucanchicta llaquishcata ricuchin-capac caita rurarca, Cristo Jesuspi pai yapa ñucanchicta lla-quishcata ricuchincapac.
49002008	Dios alli shuncuyuc cashcaraicu quishpinata cancuna chasquishcanquichic, cancuna inic cashca-raicu. Caica mana cancuna munaimanta tarishcachu can, Diosmi cancanaman curca.
49002009	Mana cancuna rurashcamantachu caita tupashcanquichic, chairaicu cancunamanta manapi runa imamantapash mana jatunyarina ushanchu;
49002010	Diosmi ñucan-chicta rurashca; paimi allicunata rurancapac Cristo Jesuspi ñucanchicta surcurca, pai chashnapac huiñaimanta munashca cashpa.
49002011	Shina cacpi, cancuna, mana judio caccuna, "mana pincai cara pitirishca"judiocuna cancanata rimanan (carata runa aichapi pitinun, "cara pitirishca canchic" paicunallata rimarinun),
49002012	yuyarichic cancuna ñaupac Cristo illac, israel llactamanta chican, Dios cusha nishcata mana japina cashcata yuyarichic. Dios illac, mana imata chapashpa cai pachapi causacurcanquichic.
49002013	Ranti cunan, Cristo Jesus yahuarta tallichishcaraicu paiman llutarishca canquichic; ñaupac caruyachishca tiyaccuna cunan mayanyachi tucushcanquichic.
49002014	Cristo ñucanchipac ganas causai can. Judio runacunamanta, mana judio runacunamanta pai shuclla llactata rurarca, cancunapura piñacushpa causashcata allichishpa. Quiquin paipac aichapi
49002015	camachic quillcata anchuchishpa, tucui chai quillca rimashcata anchuchishpa, ishcai chican llactamanta shuclla mushu llactata, paiman llutarishcata rurarca.
49002016	Pai cruspi huañushpa, ishcantin llactacuna macanacushpa causashcata tucuchichirca, paicunata Dios-huan alliyachirca, ishcantinmanta shuclla aichata rurashpa.
49002017	Tucuicunaman ganas causai shimicanata rimancapac Cristo shamurca, cancuna carupi tiyaccunaman paipac mayanpi tiyaccunamanpash.
49002018	Cristoraicu, shuc Samaillapi Yayapac-man pactana ushanchic tucuilla.
49002019	Chairaicu, cancuna ña mana chican runa canquichic, ña mana chican allpapi tiyanquichic; cunanca ashtahuan Diospac runacuna japina cashcata japina ushanquichic Diospac aillucunapash canquichic.
49002020	Shuc huasi shinami cancuna canquichic, yachachishcacuna; profetacuna chai huasipac sapi canun, ranti quiquin sinchicuchic rumica Jesucristollata can.
49002021	Cristoman llutarishpami, tucui huasi alli sinchicurishpa jahuaman jatarinca, Apunchicpi shuc sumac Diospac chicanyachishca huasi tucunacama.
49002022	Chashnallata cancunapash, Cristoman llutarishca cashpa, tucui cancanapura llutarinquichic Diospac huasi tucunacama; chaipimi Dios paipac Samaihuan causanca.
49003001	Chairaicumanta ñuca, Pablo, cancuna mana judio-cunapac allipac chunta curralpi quillcara cani Cristo Jesusraicu.
49003002	Cancuna ña yachanquichic ima chari Dios yapa alli shuncuyuc cashpa, cai llancanata mincahuashca cancunapac allipac.
49003003	Dios pai pacashca yuyaita pacllapi churashpa, ñucata ricsichihuarca; ñaupallata caimanta cancunata ansashituta quillcarcani.
49003004	Quillcata ricushpa, Cristopac pacara yuyaita ñuca ricsishcata cancuna atipanata ushanquichic;
49003005	callari pachapi manapi runata ricsichishca carca chai pacara yuyaita, ranti .cunan Dios paipac Samaihuan apostolcunaman, profeta-cunaman ricsichishca.
49003006	Caimi chai pacara shimi: mana judio runacuna, judio runacuna shinallata, japina cashcata Diospac shimita uyashpa chashquinunca; shuc aichamantallata cashpa, Cristo Jesuspi Dios cusha nishcata paicunapash japina canan.
49003007	Ñuca yanca cashpallata, Dios munashcaraicu cai quishpichic shimita yachachincapac mincai tucushcani.
49003008	Tucui Diosta iniccunamanta ñuca yalli uchillami cani; shina cacllipita, Cristo mana judio runacunata tucui cushi shimita ricsichincapac acllahuarca.
49003009	Tucuita rurac Dios unaimanta pacara charishca yuyaita tucui cancunaman ricsichincapac mincai tucurcam.
49003010	Chashna tucurca tucui jahua pachamanta ushaicuna Dios chai tucui yachai charishcata ricsincapac cunan iniccunaraicu.
49003011	Dios pai huiñaimanta yuyarishcata Apunchic Jesucristopi pactachirca.
49003012	Diosman Cristopi mayanyancapac ushanchic, ñucanchic paipi inishcaraicu.
49003013	Chairaicu ama sanpayaichicchu rimani ñuca cancunaraicu ñacarishcamanta, cancuna chaicanamanta ashtahuan jatanyaranami canquichic.
49003014	Chairaicumanta Yayapac ñaupacpi cuncarinimi,
49003015	paimantami tucui aillu cai pachapi jahua pachapipash shutita japinun.
49003016	Yayata mañanimi Diospac Samairaicu pai sumac achca charishcamanta cancunapac ucupi shinchicuita ushaitapash cuchun,
49003017	Cristopash cancuna inishcaraicu cancunapac shuncu ucupi causachun. Chashnami cancuna, sinchi tucushpa, llaquinapi sapiyashpa,
49003018	tucui iniccunahuan atipana ushanquichic Cristopac llaquina mai jatun cashcata.
49003019	Chairaicu, ricsichic rimani chai llaquinata; pai ñucanchic tucui ricsi ushashcamanta yalli jatunmi; chashnami can cancana Diospi pacta juntarishca cancapac.
49003020	Cunanca Dios jatunyachishca cachun; paimi ñucanchic mañashcamanta, ñucanchic yuyashcamanta yalli rurana ushan ñucanchicpi tiyac paipac ushaihuan.
49003021	Iniccuna ucupi Cristo Jesuspi huiñai huiñai jatanyachishca cachun. Chashna cachun.
49004001	Chashnamanta ñuca, Apunchicraicu chunta curralpi quilpara, cancunata mañani: Allita causaichic, Dios chaipac cancunata cayarca, allita causancapac.
49004002	Uchillayashca, alli shuncuyuc caichic; mana piñarishpa chapaichic, llaquishcahuan cancunapura llaqui tiyashcapi quishpichirichic.
49004003	Diospac Samai yanapashcahuan, tucuilla huancurishpa causaichic cancunata ña huancuchishca ganas causairaicu.
49004004	Shuclla aicha, shuclla Samai tiyan, Dios cancunata shuclla chapanata charincapac cayashca shina.
49004005	Shuclla Apunchic, shuclla inina, shuclla bautismo tiyan;
49004006	shuclla Dios tiyan, pai tucuicunapac yaya can, tucuicunamanta yalli can, tucuicunahuan ruracan, tucuicunapi tiyan.
49004007	Ranti ñucanchic caranlla Cristo cuyaicunailata japishcanchic.
49004008	Chairaicu camachic quillca riman: "Jahua pachaman sicarca piñashpa japishcacunata paihuan pushashpa, runacunataca paipac cuyaita curca".
49004009	"Sicarcami" nishcapi, ¿ima rimanayashcata yachanquichicchu? Ñaupactami cai allpaman uraicurca nishpami rimanayan.
49004010	Uraicuc runallatami jahua pacha jahuaman sicarca, pai pactashcahuan tucuita juntachincapac.
49004011	Paillata munarca maicancuna apostol cancapac, shuccunaca profeta cancapac, shuccunaca quishpichic shimita huillac cancapac, cuti shuccunaca michic cancapac, yachachic cancapac.
49004012	Chashnami paipac runacunata yanapac cancapac yachachirca, Cristopac aichata huiñachichincapac,
49004013	tucuilla ininapi Diospac Churita ricsinapi shucllapi huancurishca canacama. Chashnami ñucanchic yuyaita rucuyachishpa, Cristopi pactarishca tucushun.
49004014	Ña mana huahuacuna shinachu, shuc yuyaita charishcamanta chicanta yuyarishun; shuc mushu yuyaita mana japishunchu, pantashca ñanpita puric runacuna umachishcahuan yachachishcata.
49004015	Chaipac rantimanta, shuncumanta cusca shimihuan rimashpa, Cristoman huiñashpa rina canchic, paimi aicha uma can.
49004016	Cristoraicu tucui aicha mana huacllirishpa caticun; caran uchilla aichacuna alli caticucpi, tucuilla llaquinapi huiñashpa jatanyashpa catiranun.
49004017	Caitami Apunchicpac shutipi rimashpa mincani. ama Diosta mana ricsiccuna shina causaichicchu; paicunaca yanca yuyaicunata pactachinun,
49004018	paicunapac yuyaipash yana tuta shina can. Diosmanta shamuc causairaicu mana cushiyanun-chu, paicunapac shuncu upayashpa cashpa mana atipanun.
49004019	Sinchiyanurca, mana alli ruraicunapi urmanushca, mana allicunata mana sanpayashpa rurashpa catinunlla.
49004020	cancunaca mana chashna causancapacchu Cristota ricsircanquichic,
49004021	alli shutipacha paimanta jinu uyashca cashpa, paimanta jinu ima shina causana cashcata yachashca cashpa.
49004022	Cancunapac ñaupac causaita saquina canquichic; paica huacllishcami can, mana alli munaicunapi umai tucushcaraicu.
49004023	Caucunapac yuyaita causaitapash mushuya-china canquichic,
49004024	mushu runa tucuna canquichic, Dios munashca shina; chaica cusca causaihuan chuya shuncuyuc cansascahuan ricsichirin.
49004025	Chashnamama, amacuti llullanquichicchu, ashtahuan shuccunata shuti cashcallata rimaichic, tucuicuna shuc aichamantallatacashpa.
49004026	Piñarishpa ama juchallichicchu, cancanapac pinari ama chishiachun.
49004027	Supai cancuna rurashcapi ama satirichun.
49004028	Shuhuashpa causac saquichan shuhuanata, ashtahuan llancapac shayarichun; shuc alli llancanata paipac maquihuan rurashpa imallapash charichun tsuntsucuna mañashcapi cancapac.
49004029	Mana alli shimicunata ama rimaichicchu, ashtahuan alli shimicunata rimaichic, huiñancapac yanapaccunata, uyaccunata alliman pushancapac.
49004030	Diospac Samaita ama llaquichichicchu, paihua jahuisca mari carcanquichic, Diospac cashcata allipacha quishpichishca pancha ricsi tucancapac.
49004031	Cancunamanta jichuichic tucui piñanacunata, piñarinacunata, caparinacunata, piñanata, tucui laya mana allicunata.
49004032	Alli shuncuyuc caichic caranlla shuc-huan, quishpichinacuichic cancunapura, Dios Cristopi cancunata quishpichishca shina.
49005001	Cancuna, Dios llaquishca churicuna cashpa, pai shina cana canquichic.
49005002	Cancunapura llaquinacushpa purma canquichic, Cristo ñucanchicta llaquishca shina, llaquishcaman-ta ñucanchicraicu huañuiman curirca, sumac ashnac camari shina Diospac ñaupacpi curishpa.
49005003	Cancuna Diospac runacuna cashpa, cancana ucupi mana ansallapash rimana canquichic yumashpa juchallinamanta, shuc ticllayachic juchacunamanta cullqui mitsanamantapash.
49005004	Chashnallata ama rimaichicchu mana alli shimicunata, yanca rimaicunata, yanca runa rimashca shimicunatapash, chashna rimana mana alli cashcaraicu; chaipac rantimanta Diosta chacchaichic.
49005005	Caita yachaichic: maicanpash yumash-cahuan juchallishpa, ticllayachicta rurashpa juchallishpa, cullqui mitsac cashpa (chaita rurashpa huacata chacchashca shinallata can), mana yaicuna ushancachu Cristopac pachapi Diospac pachapipash.
49005006	Ama pipash cancunata yanca shimicunahuan umachichun, caicunaraicu mari manchaipac ñacarina Diosmanta shamun paita mana uyaccunapacman.
49005007	Chashna runacunahuan ama imatapash charichicchu.
49005008	Ñaupac cancuna tutapi causacurcanquichic, ranti cunan, Apunchicman llutarishca cashpa, achicpi causanquichic. Achicpaccuna shina causaichic,
49005009	achicca caita mari cun: yapa alli shuncuyuc cana, cusca rurana, shutita rimana.
49005010	Diospac ñahuipi alli ricuricllata ruraichic.
49005011	Tuta ucupi causaccuna shina, mana imapacpash allicunata cancunaca ama ruraichic-chu; ashatahuan, chasna mana allicuna pacllaman surcushpa, mana alli cashcata ricsichichic.
49005012	Pacallapi paicuna rurashcata rimancapacllapash pincanayanmi;
49005013	ranti achic-huan pacllapi tucui rurashcacunata surcushpa ricuchicpi, tucui pasacta ricurin,
49005014	tucuita mari achic pacllapi surcushpa ricuchin. Chairaicu caita ninun: "Can puñucuc, causari; huañushca-cunamanta jatari, Cristo canta achic-huan ricuchincami".
49005015	Chairaicu, cancunapac causana layata alli ricuna canquichic.
49005016	Causaicama allicunata ruraichic, cai punchacuna mana allicuna mari canun.
49005017	Rurashcapi, ama jahuata yuyaihuan ruraichicchu, Apunchic munashcata mashcaichic.
49005018	Ama machaichicchu, machai ashtahuan juchallinamanmi aisan; chaipac rantimanta, Diospac Samaihuan juntarichic.
49005019	Tantarishcapi Dios-huan rimarichic, taquichic shuncumanta yuyarishcahuan. Taquishcahuan cancunapac shuncupi Apun-chicmanta cushiyaichic,
49005020	Dios Yayata, Apunchic Jesucristo-pac shutipi, tucui imacunamanta pacrachuichic.
49005021	Cristoraicu cancunapura yanaparishpa causaichic.
49005022	Cariyuc huarmicuna, cancunapac carita uyaichic Apunchicta shina.
49005023	Carica huarmipac uma mari can, Cristo iniccunapac uma casha shina. Cristoca iniccunata Quishpichic can, iniccana aicha canun;
49005024	iniccuna Cristota uyashca shina, cariyuc huarmicanapash tucuipi carita uyana canun.
49005025	Caricuna, cancunapac huarmita yapa llaquina canquichic, Cristo iniccunata llaquishca shina, llaquishcamanta mari pairaicu causaita curca.
49005026	Chashnami Diospacta chicanyachirca iniccunata pai rimashcahuan sumacyachishpa bautismo yacuhuanpsh maillashpa,
49005027	iniccunata shuti munarcami paipac ñaupallapita ricuchincapac, jatunyachishca-ta, mana ticllayuc, mana sipuyashcata, mana imapi huacllishcayuc, ranti chicanyachishcata, alli pacta tucushcata.
49005028	Huarmiyuc cari paipac quiquin aichata llaquishca shina, paipac huarmita llaquina can. Huarmita llaquic cari quiquin amupac aichallata llaquicun.
49005029	Manapi runa quiquinpac aichata chicninchu, ashtahuanpash paita caran, allita ricun, Cristo iniccunahuan rurashca shina,
49005030	paipac aicha cashcaraicu. Ñucanchicca chai aichamanta uchilla aichacuna canchic.
49005031	"Chairaicu cari runa paipac yayata mamata saquinca paipac huarmihuan llutarincapac, chashna ishcantincu-na shuclla runa shina canunca".
49005032	Cai jatun pacara shimimi can; ranti ñucaca Cristomanta iniccunamanta yuyarishpami rimacuni.
49005033	Chashna cashcaraicu cancunamanta caranlla quiquinta shina huarmitapash llaquina canquichic, ranti huarmica paipac carita yupaichachun.
49006001	Churicuna, Apunchicta llaquishcaraicu yaya mamata uyaichic, chai mari alli can.
49006002	Cai rurai nishca shuc cusha nishcata charin: "Yayata mamata yupaichanqui, chashna cushi causashpa, cai pachapi anaita causanqui".
49006004	Yayacuna, churicunata ama piñachichicchu, ashtahuan cuscata yachachishpa huiñachichic Apunchicta llaquinatapash yachachishpa.
49006005	IIuatara runacuna, cai pachapi tiyac cancunapac amucunata uyaichic. Cristota yanapacushca shina, yupaichash-cahuan, manchaihuan, uchillayashcahuan ruraichic.
49006006	Mana paicuna ricucushcallapi yanapana canquichic, paicunapacpi alli ricui tucushun nishpa; Cristota yanapac shinami rurana canquichic, tucui shuncuhuan Dios manashcata pactachishpa.
49006007	Apunchicta yanapacushca shina cancuna llancashcata ruraichic, mana runacunapacta ruracuc shina.
49006008	Ña cancana yachanquichic ima shina caran runa, huatashca cashpa, quishpira cashpa imapash, alli rurashcacunamantallami Apanchicmanta chasquinata charishun.
49006009	Cancuna amucuna, cancunata yanapaccunata ama piñashcahuan rimaichicchu. Yuyarina canquichic cancuna paicunantin jahua pachapi tiyac Apunchicpac cashcata, paica runacunata mana chicanyachishpachu ricun.
49006010	Cunan, huauquicuna, Apunchicpi sinchi tucuichic, paipac sinchi ushaihuan.
49006011	Supaita yallincapac Dios cushca jillaimanta churarinata churarichic.
49006012	Mana aichayuc runahuanchu macanacucunquichic, jahua pachamanta mana ricuric ushaicanahuanmi macanacucanquichic; paicuna cai yana tuta pachapi tucui ushaita charinun.
49006013	Chairaicu, cancunata, japichic, limani Dios cushca jillaimanta churarinata, mana alli pancha pactashcapi sinchicuna ushancapac, macanacui tiyash-capi mana shuc chaqui huashaman jaitarishpa yallincapac.
49006014	Sinchicushpa causaichic, shuti shimita churarishpa, cusca causai quishpichishca.
49006015	Ganas causana shimita shuccunaman ricsichicrincapac rinalla chapacuichic.
49006016	Can-cuna charishca inina supai janpihuan cachamushca biruticunamanta quishpichichun.
49006017	Cancunapac quishpina cancunapac umata quillpashpa quishpichic cachun, Diospac Samai cushca shimica cancunapac mircanu cachun.
49006018	Dios-huan rimarinata ama saquichicchu; Dios-huan rimarishcapi paipac Samai cancunahuan tiyachun. Ricuralla causaichic, mana sanpayashpa, Diosta mañaichic tucui paipac runacunaraicu.
49006019	Ñucaraicupash Diosta mañaichic runacuna-man ñuca rimashcapi, alli shimicuna tiyahuanuchun mana manchashpa quishpina shimita, mana atipaipac cashcata ricsichincapac.
49006020	Cai shimipac cachashca runata shina Dios cachahuarca, pairaicu piñashpa japi tucushpa cunan quillpara cani. Diosta mañaichic ama manchashpa chai shimita ñuca rimana ushancapac.
49006021	Ñucanchic llaquishca Apunchicpac llancanapipash mana sanpayashpa yanapac huauqui Tiquicomi, ñucamanta tucui ñuca racushcamantapash shimita cancunata rimacrinca.
49006022	Chairaicumi paita cancunapacman cachacuni, caipi ñucanchic imana tiyacushcamanta ricsichishpa, chashna cancanata cariyachichun.
49006023	Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesucristontin ganas causaita llaquinantin ininantin huauquicunaman cunuchun;
49006024	Apun-chic Jesucristota llaquiccunatapash paipac cuyaita mana pishiyashpa tallichichun.
50001001	Pablo Timoteontm Jesucristota yanapaccana, Pilipos llactapi tiyac Diospac runacuna cashpa, Cristo Jesusman llutarishcacunaman, rimacpi, tucui miccanaman obispocunan-tin yanapaccunantin cai pancata quillcacunchic.
50001002	Ñucan-chicpac Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesucristontin, paicunapac cuyaita ganas causaitapash cancunapi tallichinuchun.
50001003	Caran cancunamanta yuyarishcapi ñuca Diosta pacrachuni;
50001004	Dios-huan rimarishcapi cushiyashcahuan huiñai tucui cancunaraicu mañani;
50001005	callarishcamanta cunancama Diospac Cushi Shimita ricsichincapac yanapashcamanta mana cuncarinichu.
50001006	Ñuca yuyani, Dios cancunapi alli rurancapac callarishcata alli pactachinacama mana saquincachu Jesucristo ticramuna panchacama.
50001007	Ñuca cancanata yapa llaquiscamanta chashna yuyarishca allimi yachihuan; ñucaman tucui Dios cuyashcallatata cancanapash chasquicunquichic chunta curralpi ñuca quillpara tiyacushcapi, apucanapac naupacpi quishpichic shimimanta alli rimascapi, pai shuti cashcata ricsichicushcapi imapash.
50001008	Diosllami yachan ima shina cancunata ricunayash-cata, Cristopi yapa llaquishcaraicu.
50001009	Cancuna ashtahuan llaquinata charinuchun nishpami mañani ñuca Dios-huan rimarishcapi, tucui ashtahuan yuyayuc, yalli atipac tucanuchan;
50001010	chashna cancuna ashtahuan alli cashcata huiñai acllana ushanquichic. Chashanami cancuna chuya causaita causana ushanquichic, Cristo shamushcapi mana imamanta cautsayachi tucuncapac.
50001011	Jesucristo yanapashcahuan achca alli rurashcacunata ricuchinquichic Diosta jatunyachincapac.
50001012	Huauquicuna, tucui ñacapi tucushcacuna, shuti rimacpi, ashtahuan quishpichic shimita yachachincapacmi yanapanushca.
50001013	Apucuna tucui runacunapash Cristota catishcamanta ñuca quillpara tiyacushcata yachanun.
50001014	Ñuca quillpara tiyacushcata ricushpa, achca huauquicuna mana manchashpa, ashtahuan Apunchicpi yuyaita churashpa cushi shimita ricsichincapac callarinushca.
50001015	Shutimi maicancuna, ñucata chiquicushpa, piñashpa Cristomanta rimanun, shuccuna ranti alli yuyaihuanmi ruranun.
50001016	Maicancuna Cristota llaquishcaraicu paimanta rimanun, Dios ñucata caipi quishpichic shimiraicu alli rimancapac cachamushcata yachashpa;
50001017	rati shuccunaca paicunapac allita mashcashpa ruranan, chaicuna mana cusca shimiyuc canun, cunan ashtahuan ñuca quillpara tiyashcapi yalli ñucata llaquichinata munanun.
50001018	Chaica mana imananchu. Ima shina cashpapash, shutita rimashpa, umachishpa rimashpa, Cristomanta rimaranun; chai yapa cushiyachihuan. Chairapash ashtahuan cushiyashami
50001019	tucui caicuna ñuca quishpincapac cashcata yachashpa, cancana ñucamanta Diosta mañashcaraicu Jesucristopac Samaipash yanapashcaraicu.
50001020	Diosmanta allipachami chapani pai mana pincaipac saquihuancachu; ashtahuan mana ansapash manchashcahuanmi tucuicunapac ñaupacpi rimana ushasha, chaipi huiñai shina, Cristo jatun cashca ashtahuan ñucapi ricurinca, ñuca causacushcapi, ñuca huañushcapi imapash.
50001021	Cristo ñucapac causai can, huañushpaca achcata yapachini.
50001022	Ranti cai aichapi causanacama Apunchicta yanapacushpa, maicanta chari acllasha.
50001023	Cai ishcai acllanacunamanta shuccllata acllancapac sinchimi cahuan; huañunata munaiman Cristohuan causacrincapac, chaimi ñucapac yapa alli cahuanman;
50001024	cancunaraicu causac catina ashtahuan yapa alli can.
50001025	Chai ashtahuan alli cashcata yachashpa, chaira cancunahuan saquirishami, cancunata ñaupacman catmapi yanapancapac, cancanata cancunapac ininapi ashtahuan yalli cushi charincapac.
50001026	Chashnami ñuca cuti cancuna ucuman ticracpi, Cristo Jesuspi cushiyanata charinquichic.
50001027	Caillata rimani: Cancunapac causaipi Cristopac cushi shimita catishpa causaichic. Ñuca cancunata ricuncapac ricpi, mana ricpipash, cancana smchicushpa, huancurishpa, tucuipura quishpichic shimimanta shamuc mmaraicu llancashpa caticush-cata uyanayani,
50001028	cancunata piñaccunapacpi mana ansallapash manchachic tucushpa. Cai mana pantaipac ricuchicun paicuna huañuiman rirashcata, chaillapita cancuna quishpinatapash ricuchicun. Caica Diosmantami shamun.
50001029	Cristoraicu mana paipi inincapacllachu acllai tucushcanquichic, paimanta ñacarincapacpash acllai tucushcanquichicmi.
50001030	Cancuna ñucapash chai macanacuillapita canchic. Ñaupallata ña ricurcanquichic ñuca ima shina macanacushcata, cunanpash ñuca ima shina macanacushpa caticushcata yachanquichic.
50002001	Shina, Cristo cancunata sinchicuchicpi, paipac llaquina cancunata cushichicpi, Samai cancunahuan tiyacucpi, cuyaita, shucmanta llaquirinata cancuna ricsishpa,
50002002	cushihuan juntachihuaichic shuc shuncullahuan causashpa, shuc llaquinallapi tantarishpa, shuclla yuyaita charishpa, tucui shuclla ruranata yuyashpa.
50002003	Ama imatapash shucta piñashcaraicu yalli canayanaraicu ruraichicchu, ashtahuan uchillayashpa ruraichic, shuc runa yalli alli cashcata caran amu ricushun.
50002004	Ama pipash cancunamanta paipac allillata mashcachan, shuccunapac allita mashcana canquichic.
50002005	Cristo Jesus charishca yuyaicunallata charichic;
50002006	pai Dios cashpallata, mana atircachu Dios-huan pactarincapac,
50002007	ashtahuan pai cashcata mayanman saquishpa, rana shina pacarirca. Yanca runa shina ricurimushpa,
50002008	quiquin paillata uchillayarca, Diosta uyashpa huañuiman rirca, pincaipac cruspi huañanaman.
50002009	Chairaicu Dios tucuimanta yallita paita jatunyachirca, tucuicunamanta yalli sumac shutita cushpa,
50002010	"Jesus" rimashcata uyashpa, tucui jahuapachapi tiyaccuna, cai pachapi tiyaccuna huañuscacunapash cuncurincapac,
50002011	tucuicunapash ricsincapac Jesucristo Apunchic cashcata, Dios Yayata jatanyachincapac.
50002012	Chairaicu, llaquishca huauquicuna, ñuca cancana ucupi cashpa rimacpi uyahuashca shina, cunan ñuca carupi cashcaraicu ashtahuan uyana canquichic. Cancana quishpina-manta allipacha yuyarichic;
50002013	Diosmi cancunapi alli munaicunata tarpun, paillata chaicunata pactachincapac yanapan, pai chashna manashcaraicu.
50002014	Ama camishpa, ama piñanacushpa tucuita ruraichic,
50002015	cancunapi ama pipash juchallishcata, panta rurashcata tarichun. Mana ticllayuc Diospac churicuna shina causaichic cai mana alli, huacllishca runa ucupi. Paicuna ucupi cancuna cuillurcuna yana tuta ucupi llinpiyashca shinami canquichic,
50002016	causaita cuc shimita pactachishcaraicu. Chashna, Cristo shamucpi, cancunaraicu cushiyasha, mana yanca sanpayashca-manta, mana yanca llancashcamanta.
50002017	Diosman cancuna ininaraicu camarita ricuchishcapi, cai camari pacta tucuncapac ñuca causaita cana cashpapash, ñuca tucui cancunahuanmi cushiyani.
50002018	Cancunapash ñuca cushiyashcahuan cushi-yaichic.
50002019	Apunchic Jesus yanapashcahuan Timoteota utcalla cancunaman cachasha yuyani; ñuca cancanamanta shimita uyashpa cushiyasha nini.
50002020	Shuc runa mana tiyahuanchu ñuca shina yuyaric, cancunamantapash alli shutipacha yuyaric runa; chairaicu paita cachani;
50002021	tucui runa paicunapac allillata mashcanun, Jesucristo munashcata, mana.
50002022	Ranti cancuna ña yachanquichic Timoteo alli cashcata, pai Diospac shimita ricsichinapi ñucata yanapashcata, quiquin churi shina ñucata yanapashcahuan.
50002023	Shina ñuca ruranacunamanta alli yachashca huashami cachashca yuyani;
50002024	Apanchic yanapash-cahuan ñucallatami cancunapacman utca risha yuyani.
50002025	Epafroditopash cutillata cancanapacman ticracpi allimi canca yachihuan, pai ñucahuan llancashca, ñucahuan pacta macanacushcapash, paita cancana ñucaman cachamuhuarcan-quichic ñuca mutsuyashcapi yanapahuancapac.
50002026	Pai tucui cancunata ricunayan; yapa yuyarican cancuna pai uncuc cashcamanta yachascaraicu.
50002027	Shuti uncucmi carca ñallapash huañurca; ranti Dios paimanta yuyarirca, mana paimantalla, ñucamantapash, ñucamanta nicpi, ama chai tucur llaqui charishcamanta ashtahuan charincapac.
50002028	Chairaicu utcalla cancanapacman cachacuni, cancuna paita ricushpa cushiyanca-pac, ñucapash ama yapalla llaquirishpa tiyancapac.
50002029	Achca cushiyashcahuan paita chasquichic, Apunchicpi huauquita shina, pai shina caccunatapash achca llaquina canquichic,
50002030	pai huañui mayanpi carca Cristota yanapanaraicu. Paipac causaita ñalla chincachirca cancuna jinu mana yanapana ushashcata pai yanapacushpa.
50003001	Cunanca, huauquicuna, Apunchicpi cushiyaichic. Ñaupa rimashpa quillcashcata cutillata quillcancapac ñucata mana imanahuanchu, ranti cancanapacca yapa alli canca.
50003002	Millaipac runacunata, mana alli ruraccunata aichata culluccunatapash yuyanquichic;
50003003	quiquin pincai cara pituacuna ñucanchicmi canchic, Diosta chacchaccuna paipac Samai pushacpi; Cristo Jesuspaccuua cashpami cushiyanchic, mana ñucanchicllapi yuyaita churashpa.
50003004	Imashna cacpipash, chaicunapi ñucaca yuyaita churanimi. ¿Ñuca shina chaicunapi yuyaita churancapac maicanpash ushancachu ima chari?:
50003005	pacarishcamanta pusac panchayucta pincai carata pitihuanur-ca, israelita runa cani, Benjaminpac aillumanta cani, hebreo runa cani hebreo runacunapac churi cashpa. Camachic quillcamanta rimacpica, fariseo carcani;
50003006	chashna iniccanata piñashpa japishcahuan shuncuhuan curishca cashcara ricsichircani, camachic quillca pactachinapi mana pipash yallihuarcachu.
50003007	Tucui caicuna ñucapac yapa alli cahuanurca ñaupa, cunan ranti Cristoraicu tucuilla y anca cahuanun.
50003008	Ashtahuan rimacpi, tucui chaicuna mana imapacpash allichu canun Apunchic Cristo Jesusta ricsishcahuan yuyaricpi. Cristoraicu tucuita jichushcani, tucur ismami nini, paita jinu tarmata yuyaricpi,
50003009	paiman jinu llutarishca canata yuyaricpi. Camachic quillcata pactachsicamanta jucha illac saquirmata mana mashcanichu, ashtahuan Cristopi inina charishcaraicumi jucha illac saquirisha; rimacpi, juchamanta Dios quishpichihuachun ñuca inina charishcaraicu.
50003010	Cristota ricsina munani, pai huañushpa causarishcamanta ushaita charinata manani, pai ñacarishcata ñucapash ñacarinayani, pai shina paipac huañuipi cancapac,
50003011	huañushcamanta causarina-man pactanata chapashpa.
50003012	Ña tucuitami tarircani, ña tucuipimi pacta cani mana rimanichu; ranti ñaupacman caticunillami tarinacama, Cristo Jesus pai ñucapactañaupa tarishcaraicu.
50003013	Huauquicuna, mana ñucallami tarircani rimanichu; cunanca huashaman jichurishcamanta cancarinimi ñaupacman cashcata tarincapac,
50003014	pactanaman pactashpa Dios Cristoraicu ñucanchicman cancapac cuyaita japmcapac.
50003015	Tucui ña smchi inina chariccuna, cai yuyaillata charina canchic. Shuc imapipush chican yuyaita charicpi, Diosllatami cusca cashcata cancunaman ricuchinca.
50003016	Ranti, ñucanchic ña pactashcahuan causana canchic.
50003017	Huauquicuna, ñuca shina causaichic ricuichic ñucanchic cancunaman yachachishca shina causaccunata.
50003018	Ñuca cancunata achca cuti rimashcani, cunanpash cutillata cancunata huacashcahuan rimani: achcacunami Cristopac crusta piñac shina causaranacun,
50003019	tucuricpica chincarinca ranun paicuna. Paicunapac Dios paicunapac aicha mañashca can, chaicunamanta pincarma rantimanta paicuna ashtahuan jatunya-rinun. Cai pachallapi paicunapac yuyaita churashpa causanun.
50003020	Ranti ñucanchic jahua pachamanta runacuna canchic, Quishpichic Jesucristo shamunata chapacunchic;
50003021	paimi ñu-canchic ismuc aicha cashcamanta paipacta shina sumacyachin-ca. Pai chashna rurana ushanmi, tucuipac amu cashcaraicu.
50004001	Chairaicu, ñuca llaquishca huauquicuna, cancunatami ñuca llaquishcacuna, yapa ricunayani; cancunapi cushiyani, cancuna ñucapac cuyai canquichic; chashna, Apanchicpi sinchi tucushpa catichic.
50004002	Evodiata Sintiquetapash rimani, shuclla yuyaita japinuchun Apunchicpi ñañapura shina.
50004003	Cantaca, llancanapi mana sanpayashpa yanapahuac, cai panicanata yanapai rimam, paicuna ñucahuan mari quishpichic shimita ricsichinapi llancanushca Clementehuan, shuccuna ñucahuan llancaccuna-huanpash,paicunapac shuti quillcara mari tiyan causaccanapac quillca pancacanapi.
50004004	Apunchicpi huiñai cushiyana canquichic. Cutillata rimani: CushiyaiChiC.
50004005	Cancuna alli shuncuyuc cashcata tucuicuna ricsinuchun, Apunchic mayanllami tiyacun.
50004006	Ima tiyacpipash ama llaquirichicchu, ashtahuan Dios-huan rimarishcapi paiman tucuita cuichic; paipac cuyairaicu pacrachuichic, paita ashtahuanpash mañaichic.
50004007	Chashnami Dios paipac alli ganas causaita cunca, pai runa atipana ushashcamanta yalli jatunmi; cai ganas causai cancunapac shuncuta, cancanapac yuyaita ricunca ran, cancuna Cristoman llutarishca cashcaraicu.
50004008	Puchucaipi caicunata yuyarichic rimani. yuyarichic tucui shuti cashcapi, tucui yupaichana cashcapi, tucui cusca cashcapi, tucui chuya cashcapi, tucui manaipac cashcapi; tucui alli cashcata japina canquichic. Tucui alli cashcata yuyarichic.
50004009	Ñuca yachachishcata pactachichic; ñuca rimashcamanta uyashcata, ñuca rurashcamanta yachashcata pactachichic; chash-na ruracpimi ganas causaita cuc Dios cancunahuan tiyanca.
50004010	Apunchicpi yapa cushiyani cancuna cuti ñucamanta yuyarincapac callarishcaraicu. Mana cancarihuarcanquichicmi rimanichu, ñucata mana imana yanapaipac tucurcanquichic rimani.
50004011	Mana yanapaita chapashcaraicuchu rimani, chaimanta nicpica yachashcanimi ansashitu charishcallahuan cushiyanata.
50004012	Tsuntsu shina, achcayuc shina causanata ricsinimi. Ima shina causaipash pactamuhuacpi ushanillami, imapash illashcapi, achca charishcapi, yallicta charishcapi, mana imapash tiyahuashcapipash. Ima shina causaipash pactamuhuacpi ushanillami, Cristomi ñucata sinchicuchihuan.
50004014	Chashna cacpipash, alli carca cancana ñucahuan ñacarishca.
50004015	Ñuca Macedoniamanta rishcapi, quishpichic shimita ricsichincapac callarishcapi, cancuna, Filiposmanta iniccuna, cancanalla pacrachushcamanta camaricunata cachahuarcanqui-chic cancunapac causaipi yanapai tucushcamanta.
50004016	Ñuca Tesalonicapipash tiyacushcapi, cancunamanta mana shuc cutilla cachamushca camarita chasquircani.
50004017	Mana cuyai tucanallata chapashcaraicuchu rimani caita; cancuna cuyashca Diospac ñaupacpi ashtahuan yalli sumac ricurichun nishpami munani.
50004018	Ñuca ña tucuita chasquishcanimi, yallictapash charim. Cancuna Epafroditohuan cachamushcata chasquishca-manta yapactapash tiyahuanmi. Cancuna cachamushca camari shuc sumac ashnac shumiriu shinami carca, Diospac ñaupacpi sumac ricuric camari.
50004019	Chairaicu ñuca Dios tucui cancuna mana charishcatami cunca, pai munashca shina Cristo Jesuspi,
50004020	Yaya Dios huiñai jatunyachishca cachun. Chashna cachun.
50004021	Jesucristoraicu Diospc runacunata, tucui paicunata yuyarinimi. Ñucahuan tiyacuc huauquicunapash paicunata yuyarinunmi.
50004022	Tucui Diospac runacunapash cancunata yuyarinunmi, Romamanta jatun Aputa yanapaccunami cancunata ashtahuan yapa yuyarinun.
50004023	Apunchic Jesucristo paipac cuyaita tucui cancunapi tallichichun.
51001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Jesucristopac apostol Dios munash- caraicu, huauqui Timoteontm
51001002	cai pancata quillcani Colosaspi tiyac Cristopi ñucanchicpac huauquicuna cashpa Diospac runacunaman. Dios ñucachic Yaya paipac cuyaita ganas causaitapash cancanapi tallichichan.
51001003	Dios-huan rimarishcapi Apunchic Jesucristopac Yaya Diosta cancunaraicu huiñai pacrachanchic.
51001004	Yachashcan-chicmi cancuna Cristo Jesuspi imna charishcata cancuna tucui Diospac runacunata yapa llaquishcatapash,
51001005	jahua pachapi Dios cancunapacta huacaichishcata japinata chapashpami, cancuna cai llaquinata charmquichic. Cancuna cai chapanata ricsircanqmchic cancanaman cushi shimi pactashcapi, quiquin shimita uyashcapi.
51001006	Cai cancunaman yachachishca cushi shimi huiñashpa caticun, achca alli rurashcacunahuan tucui cai pachapi ricuchicun; Diospac llaquinamanta cancuna ucupi uyashpa tacushca shina, cancuna cai llaquina shuti cashcata yachashcaraicu.
51001007	Ñucanchic Cristota mana sanpayashpa yanapac runata paipi ricuna canquichic.
51001008	pai cancunamanta shimita apamnshpa ñucanchicman ricsichirca, Samai yanapashcahuan cancana llaquinapi caticushcatapash.
51001009	Chairaicu ñucanchic, chaita yachashca punchamanta Diosta cancunaraicu mañanata paita pacrachunata mana saquishcanchic, Dios pai munashcata allipacha cancunaman ricsichichun, tucui yachanata tucui atipanata cancunaman cuchun.
51001010	Chai shuti quiquin Apunchicpac shina causana mcununca paipac caccuna, pai munashcata huinai rurashpa, alli rurashcacunata ricuchishpa, Diostapash ashtahuan alli ricsishpa.
51001011	Paipac jatun ushaihuan cancunata sinchiyachichun nishpami mañanchic; chashnami cancuna siuchicush-pa, mana piñarishcahuan tucui llaquicunata yallinquichic;
51001012	Yayatapash cushiyashcahuanmi pacrachunquichic, achicpi pai cancunapac allichishca cancunapash japina ushancapac paipac runacunaman cuna cashcata.
51001013	Dios ñucachicra yana tuta ucumanta quishpichishpa, pai llaquishca Churipac pachaman pusharca,
51001014	pairaicu ñucauchicta quishpichishpa juchacunamanta picharca.
51001015	Cristomi mana ricuric Diospac ricuric ricchai can; tucui churimanta ñaupa, tucui rurashcamanta ñaupa tiyac.
51001016	Pairaicu, Dios cai pachapi jahua pachapi tiyaccunata rurarca: ricuriccunata mana ricuriccunatapash, chashnallata tucui ushai charic samaicunatapash rurarca. Tucuicunata pairaicu, paipacta rurarca.
51001017	Tucui imacunamanta ñaupa Cristo tiyan, tucui imapash pairaicu cuscata catiranun.
51001018	Chairapash, Cristo aichapac uma can, aichaca iniccuna canun. Pai tucuimanta ñaupa cashpa, pai huañushcamanta ñaupa causarirca, pai tucuipi ñaupa cancapac.
51001019	Dios Cristopi pacta causanata munashcaraicu,
51001020	Cristopi tucui pachata paihuan allichirca: cai pachapi tiyacta, jahua pachapi tiyactapash, Cristo cruspirallichishca yahuar-raicu.
51001021	Cancuna ñaupa chican runa carcanquichic, mana allicunata rurashcamanta shuncupi Diosta piñaccuna,
51001022	ranti cunan Dios paihuan cancunahuan allichishca, Cristo runa cashcamanta paipac aichapi huañuita uacarishcaraicu. Chashna rurarcami cancunata paipac ñaupacpi charincapac, paipacta chicanyachishcacanata, mana ticllayuccanata, mana juchayuc-cunata.
51001023	Rauti chaipac sinchi tucushpa causana canquichic ininapi, cancuna uyashca quishpichic shimimanta charishca chapanamanta mana chicanyashpa. Cai shimitami tucui pachapi huillarcanchic; ñuca, Pablopash rimashpa yanapani.
51001024	Cunan cancunaraicu ñacaricushpa cushiyanimi, chashna iniccanapacta Cristo ñacarina pishishcata ñuca aichapi pactachicuni; iniccuna paipac aicha canun.
51001025	Dios iniccunata yanapacrurahuarca,pai chaita mincahuarca cancanapac allipac, tucui pai rimashca shimita cancunaman pacta ricsichincapac;
51001026	allita rimacpi, huiñaimanta Dios pacashpa charishca yuyaita, cunan paipac runacunata ricsichishca.
51001027	Mana judio runacunapac chai pacashca shimi sumac cashcata ricsichinayar-ca. Chai pacashca yuyai Cristo can, pai cancunapi tiyan, pai cancuna jatunyachi tucuncapac chapashca can.
51001028	Ñucanchic Cristota huillanchic, tucui yachanapi tucuicunata camachishpa, yachachishpa, Cristopi cancuna pacta cashcata ricsichincapac.
51001029	Chaipacmi llancami, macanacuni tucui Cristo ñucaman cushca ushaihuan.
51002001	Cancunata yachaichic rimani ima shina cancunaraicu, Laodiceamantacunaraicu, tucui ñucata mana ricushca-manta mana ricsihuaccunaraicu llancashcata.
51002002	Paicunapac shuncupi sinchicurinuchun nishpami chashna llancani, llaquinapi huancurishpa tucuipura alli causashpa, atipanuchun Diospi pacara tiyashCata; chai pacara Cristomi can;
51002003	paipac ucupi tucui yachai, tucui atipana tiyan.
51002004	Cancunata caita rimanimi ama pipash cancunata umachichun nishpa sumac rimashca shimicunahuan.
51002005	Mana quiquin ñuca jinu Cancuna ucupi tiyacucpipash, ñuca samaica cancunahuanmi, cancuna alli caticushcata ricushpa cushiyanimi, cancuna Cristota ininapi sinchi catinquichic.
51002006	Chairaicu, cancuna Apunchic Jesucristota chasquishca shina, chashnallata paihuan llutarishca causana canquichic,
51002007	paipi sinchi sapiyashpa, paipi sinchita yuyarishpa inina charishcaraicu cancunata yachachishca shina, Diostapash huiñai pacrachushpa.
51002008	Yuyanquichic: ama umachi tucunquichicchu panta shimicanata rimai tucushpa, paicuna mana Cristota caticcuna mari canun; runacunapac yachaicunata, cai pachamanta ushaicunata catiranan.
51002009	Tucui Dios cashca Cristopi pactacta tiyan;
51002010	cancunaca Dios-huan juntarishca canquichic Cristohuan llutarishcacuna cashpa; pai tucui ushaita charic samaicunapac uma can.
51002011	Cancuna Cristohuan llutarishcacuna cashpa pincai cara pitishca canquichic, mana aichapi rurashca pincai cara pitina shinahuan, ranti juchasapa runacuna cashcamanta quishpichi tucushcacuna cashpa. Chaimi Cristomanta shamuc pincai cara pitirina can.
51002012	Bautisai tucushpa, cancuna Cristohuan panpai tucurcanquichic, paillahuata huañush-camanta causachi tucurcanquichic, cancuna Diospac ushaipi inishcaraicu; chai ushai paita huañushcamanta causachirca.
51002013	Ñaupa cancunapac juchacunaraicu mana pincai cara pitishcacuna cashpa, cancunapac samaipi huañushca carcan-quichic; ranti cunan Dios Cristopi cancunata causaita cushca, pairaicu tucui ñucanchic juchacunamanta quishpichirca.
51002014	Dios ñucanchicpac dibita tucuchirca, camachic quillcaraicu ñucanchic cautsayashcata. Cruspi llutashpa chai dibita tucuchirca.
51002015	Cristopi, Dios yallirca tucui ushaita charic samaicunata; tucuicunapac ñaupacpi paicanata uchillayachirca, pai yallishcapi piñashpa japishpa paicunata purichishpa.
51002016	Chashnamanta, ama pipash camichun cancuna micushcaraicu, cancuna upiashcaraicu, cancuna raimi punchacanata charishcaraicu, cancanapac mushu quilla puncha tiyashcaraicu, samana punchata charishcaraicu.
51002017	Tucui chai llantushca shiuallami can huasha shamunca racushcamanta yuyacpi, ranti quiquin jinuca Cristomi can.
51002018	Uchillayac shina ricuriccuna, angeicunata chacchaccuna, nuspaipi ricuccuna, rana yuyailtata charishcamanta jatunyariccuna cancunata ama cautsayachinuchuu.
51002019	Paicunaca umaman mana llutarishcachu canun, uma tucui aichata carashpa huiñachichin, tucui uchilla aichacanatapash Dios manashca shina llutarichin.
51002020	Cristohuan cancuna huañurcanquichic, ña cai pacha-manta ushaicunaman mana llutarishcachu canquichic. Shina cacpi, ¿allichu canca cai pachamantacuna shina, chaicunata pactachishpa causacucpi:
51002021	chaita ama llancaichu, chaishucta ama micuichu, ama canpac maquihuan japichu?
51002022	Tucui chai pactachinacuna, runacana cai pachapi charishcamantallami can, huasha chaicana tucurinunmi.
51002023	Alli shutipachami, chaicuna yapa alli yuyaihuan rimashca shinami ricurinun, amu munaimanta pactachinacuna cashcaraicu, uchillayachic, aichatapash ñacachic cashcaraicu; chashna cashpapash aicha mañashcata saquichincapac mana imapash allichu canun.
51003001	Chairaicu, cancuna Cristohuan huañushcamanta causa-chi tucuccuna cashpa, jahua pachamanta imacunata mashcana canquichic, Cristo Diospac yachac maquiman tiyacushcamanta.
51003002	Jahua pachamanta imacunapi yuyarichic, mana cai pachamantacunapi.
51003003	Cancunaca ña mari huañurcanquichic, cunanca cancunapac causai Cristohuan Diospi pacara can.
51003004	Quiquin Cristollata cancunapac causai can, pai shamucpi cancunapash paihuanmi shamunquichic; pai jatunyachi tucushcapi, cancanapash jatunyachi tucunquichicmi.
51003005	Cancuna aichapi tacui cai pachamanta ruraicunata huañuchichic: ama pipash yumashpa juchallichun, ticllayachiccanatapash ama ruraichichu, aicha munashcata, mana alli munaicunata ama catichicchu, ama mitsa caichu (chaica huacacunata chacchashca shinami can).
51003006	Tucui cai ruraicunaraicu Diospa ñacachinapactan paita mana uyaccuna-man;
51003007	cancunapash ñaupa causaipi chaita rurarcanquichic.
51003008	Cunan ranti tucui chaicunata jichuichic: piñarinata, aicha mañashcata, mana alli canata, piñanata mana alli shimicunata.
51003009	Cancunapura ama llullanacuichicchu, ña cancunapac ñaupa causaimanta, ñaupa rurashcacunamantapash llushpirishca mari canquichic,
51003010	mushu causaihuan churarishcaraicu: mushu runapac mushuyashpa caticun paita Rurac Diospac ricchai Cashpa, paita allipacha ricsinacama.
51003011	Griego cana, judio cana, pincai cara pitira cana, mana pitira cana, chicanmanta runa cana, aucacana, huatara cana, quishpishca cana mana ansapash imananchu; Cristo tucui cashpa tucuicunapi tiyashca chai shuti imananmi.
51003012	Dios cancunata llaquin, chairaicu cancunata acllashca paipac runacuna cancapac. Shina cashpa, shuccunata llaquishcahuan, alli shuncu cashcahuan, uchillayashcahuan, mana millai shuncuhuan, mana piñarishpa chapashcahuan churarishca causaichic.
51003013	Cancunapura alli causaichic; cancunapura llaqui tiyacpi quishpichinacuichic. Cancunata Apunchic quishpichishca shina, cancunapash shuccunata quishpichichic.
51003014	Llaquinahuan ashtahuan churarichic, paimi tucuipura allipacha huancuchic can.
51003015	Cristopac ganas causai cancunapac shuncuta pushachun, chaipacmi Dios cancunata cayarca shuclla aichata rurancapac. Chaimanta pacrachushpa causanacanquichic.
51003016	Cristopac shimi huiñai cancunapac shuncupi tiyachun. Tucui yachaihuan cancunapura camachinacuichic, yanapanchic. Diosman taquinacunahuan achca pacrachuichic;
51003017	tucui imatapash rurashpa, rimashpa imapash, Apunchic Jesuspac shutipi ruraichic, pairaicu Yaya Diosta pacrachushpa.
51003018	Huarmicuna, cancunapac caricunata uyaichic, chashna rurana canquichic Apunchicta iniccuna cashpa.
51003019	Yaricuna, huarmita llaquina canquichic, ama piñashcallahuan paicunata ricuichicchu.
51003020	Churicuna, tucuipi cancunapac yayata uyaichic, Apunchic chaita yapa alli ñahuihuan ricun.
51003021	Yayacuna, churicanata ama pmachichicchu, chashnami mana amirinunca.
51003022	Huataracuna, cai pahcapi cancuna charishca amucunata tucuipi uyaichic, mana paicunapac ñahuipilla, paicunahuan alli saquirinaraicu; ashtahuan shuncumanta llaquishpa uyana canquichic, Apanchicta manchashcaraicu.
51003023	Imatapash rurash-pa, alli yuyaihuan ruraichic, Apunchic jinuta yanapacushca shina, mana runacunata.
51003024	Caucuna ña yachanquichic pactachishcamanta japina cashcata cui tucunata. Cancuna, Apanchicta yanapacmi canquichic, pai cancanapac quiquin Apanchic cashcaraicu.
51003025	Ranti mana allita ruracca pai mana alli rurashcamanta chasquinca racun, Diosca runacunata mana chican chican ricunchu.
51004001	Cancuna, amucuna, cancunapac huatara runacunahuan cusca caichic. Cancunapash yuyarichic jahua pachapi tiyac Apunchicpacpi taripai tucuna cashcata.
51004002	Dios-huan rimarinata ama sanpayaichicchu; ricuralla causaichic, Diosta pacrachushpa.
51004003	Ñucanchiraicupash Diosta mañaichic Apunchic ñucanchicta ricsichichuu Cristomanta pacara yuyaita, chai pacara yuyairaicu ñuca quillpara tiyacuni.
51004004	Atipana shimihuan ñuca chaita ricsichina ushancapac mañaichic.
51004005	Diosta mana iniccanahuan yuyashpalla causaichic; ama yanca causaichichu.
51004006	Cancunapac rimai huiñai sumac cachan, ima cutipana tiyacpi sumacta cutipaichic.
51004007	Ñucachicpac llaquishca huauqui Tiquico, pai ñucata mana sanpayashpa yanapahuashca, ñucahuan pacta Apunchicta-pash yanapashca, paimi ñucamanta cancunaman rimanca.
51004008	Chairaicu cancunapacman cachani, cancunata ñucanchic imashna cashcamanta ricsichishpa sinchicuchichan.
51004009	Ñucan-chic llaquishca huauqui Onesimopash paihuan riran, pai cancunamanta can. Paicunami caipi imapash tiyashcamanta cancanata rimananca.
51004010	Ñucahuan quillpashca tiyacuc Aristarco cancanamanta yuyarin, Bernabepac huanqui Marcospash. Cancana ña yachan-quichic Marcos cancanata ricancapac ricpi, alli chasquina cash-cata.
51004011	Justo nishca Jesus shutiyuc runapash cancunamanta yuyarinmi. Cai judio runacunallami Diospac pacharaicu ñucahuan llancanacushca, paicunaraicu achcatami cushiyashca-ni.
51004012	Epafras cancunamanta yuyarinmi, pai Cristo Jesusta ya-napac can; pai cancanamanta can, Dios-huan rimarishcapi huiñai cancanamanta mañacun, cancuna sinchicushpa Dios munashcatarurashpa catincapac.
51004013	Epafras cancunaraicu, Lao-diceamantacanaraicu, Hierapolismantacanaraicu yapa yuyarish-camanta quiquin ñucami ricuyac cani.
51004014	Llaquishca yachac Lucas cancanamanta yuyarinmi, Demaspash yuyarinmi.
51004015	Laodiceamanta huauquicuna ñucanchic yuyarishcata chasquinuchan. Ninfapash tucui paipac huasipi tantariccunan-tin ñucanchic yuyarishcata chasquinuchun.
51004016	Cancuna cai quillcata ricushca huasha, Laodiceamanta iniccunaman ca-chaichic, chaipipash cai quillcata catishpa uyachinuchan; cancunapash paicunamanta chasquishca quillcata catishpa uyaichic.
51004017	Arquipota caita rimaichic: Apunchic mincashcata allita pactachi nishpa.
51004018	Ñuca, Pablo, cai puchucai pancata quiquin ñuca maquihuan quillcani. Ñuca quillpara tiyacushcata yuyaripai-chic. Dios cancanapi paipac cuyaita tallichichun.
52001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Silvanohuan Timoteontin, Tesalonicapi tiyac huauquicunaman cai pancata quillcani, paicuna Dios Yayaman Apunchic Jesucristoman llutarishca canun. Dios cancunapi paipac cuyaita paipac alli causaitapash tallichichun.
52001002	Huiñai cancunaraicu Diosta pacrachunchic ñucanchic Dios-huan rimarishcapipash cancunata yuyarinchic.
52001003	Caran cuti Dios Yayapac ñaupacpi cancuna chai tucui inina charishcahuan llancashcata yuyarmchic, chai tucui liaquinahuan cancuna yanapashcata, caucuna chai tucui ñacarinapi sinchicushpa, Apunchic Jesucristota chapashcaraicu ñacarish-canquichic.
52001004	Huauquicuna, Dios cancanata llaquiu, pai cancunata acllashcatapash yachanchic.
52001005	Cancunaman quish-pichic shimita ñucanchic yachachishcapi, mana shimillahuan-chu rurarcanchic, Diospac Samaihuanmi rurarcanchic, cai quishpichic shimi shuti cashcata yachashcaraicu. Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina, cancunapac allita mashcashpa, ñucanchic cancuna ucupi causashcata.
52001006	Cancanaca, ñucanchic rurashcata Apanchic rurashcata-pash catircanquichic, chashnamanta cushi shimita Diospac Samai cushca cushihuan chasquircanquichic, ñacarina achca tiyacpipash.
52001007	Chashnami Macedoniamanta, Acayamanta iniccunata alli rurashcahuan ricuchircanquichic.
52001008	Cancuna-manta callarishpa Apunchicpac shimi, mana Macedomallapi, mana Acayallapi mirarishca, ashtahuan tucui suyucunapipash yachai tucushcami; chairapash cancuna inina charishcamanta yachai tiyan mari; chashnamantañucanchic ña mana shuc shimillapash rimana tucunchic.
52001009	Chaipac rantimanta, ashtahuan paicunailata ñucanchic cancunata ricucrishcamanta rimanun, cancana ñucanchicta alli chasquishcamanta, cancuna causac quiquin Diosta catinaraicu huacacunata paita yanapancapac jichushcamanta.
52001010	Paicuna ñucanchicta rimana- cun cancuna ima shina Jesus, Diospac Churi, jahua pachamanta ticramunata chapacushcata, huañushcamanta Dios causachishcata Jesusmi jatun shamuncaracuc ñacarinamanta quishpichic can.
52002001	Cancunallata huauquicuna, yachanquichic, ñucanchic cancunata ricucrisha mana yanca ricucrishcalla saquirirca.
52002002	Ashtahuan rimacpi, cancuna ña yachanquichic, ima shina Filipospi piñai tucushpa macai tucurcanchic; shinapash Dios ñucanchicta yanaparca paipac quishpichic shimita cancunaman ricsichincapac, sinchi shayarishpa, achca macanacui tiyacpipash.
52002003	Ñucanchic yachachishca mana pantashca yacha-chishca carca, mana pantachina yuyaihuan, mana pitapash umachinaraicu rimarcanchic.
52002004	Chaipac rantimanra, Dios ñucanchicta allihuan ricushpa quishpichic shimita ñucan- chicman mincarca, chashnami ñucanchic rimana cashcata rimanchic. Diostami cushiyachinata munanchic, runacunata cushiyachincapac mana munanchicchu; paimi ñucanchipac shuncucunata raripac can.
52002005	Yachanquichic ima shina ñucanchic mana maipipash sumac shimicunahuan cancunata rimarcanchic, umachishcahuanpash cancunamanta cullquita mana japishcanchicchu; Dios chaita yachan.
52002006	Jatunyachi tacunata mana pimantapash mashcarcanchicchu.
52002007	Ñucanchic Cristopac apostol cashcamanta cancuna ñucanchicta uyana cashcata rimanchicman carca; chashna cacllapita cancunata cuyailla ricushcanchic, shuc mama paipac huahuata cuyailla huiñachishca shina.
52002008	Cancunata llaquishcaraicu, cancunaman tucui shuncuhuan cunchicman carca mana Diospac cushi shimillata, quiquin ñucanchic causaitapash cunchicmanmi carca. ¡Yapallami cancunata llaquishcanchic!
52002009	Huauquicuna, cancuna yuyarinquichicmi ima shina ñucanchic llaquipac llancashcata ñucanchic mutsushcata tarincapac. Tutantin puchantin ama pitapash quillachishun nishpa llancarcanchic, cancunata Diospac cushi shimita ricsichinacama.
52002010	Cancunallata Diospash ricuyac canquichic, cancuna iniccunahuan, chuya shuncuhuan, cusca, mana pipash shuc shimi rimaipac ñucanchic cashcata.
52002011	Pacta yachanquichic quiquin cancunata jinu, shuc yaya paipac churita shina
52002012	sumaclla, maicanpi sinchi camachishcahuan, Dios munashca shina causancapac mincashcanchic; paimi cancunata paipac pachaman pai jatanyarishcaman cancanata cayarca.
52002013	Chairaicu huiñai Diosta pacrachunchic, cancunata Diospac cushi shimita ñucanchic ricsichishcapi, quiquin Diospac shimi cashcata ricsircanquichic, mana runacuna rimashca shimi shinallata japircanquichicchu. Shuti Diospac shimimi can, chai cancunapi alli rurashcata ricsichicun.
52002014	Cancuna huauquicana, cancunapac aillucunapi piñashpa japi tucushpa ñacarishcapi, Judeapi tiyac iniccuna shina tucurcan-quichic; paicunapash Cristo Jesuspac canun, paicunapac aillu judiocunapi piñashpa japi tucunurca mari.
52002015	Cai judiocuna Apunchic Jesusta huañuchinurca, proletacunata ñaupa huañu-chishca shina, ñucanchitapash callpachinurca. Paicuna mana Dios munashcata pactachinun, tucui runacunahuanpash piña-rishca canan;
52002016	Diosta mana ricsiccunaman paicunapash quish-pinuchan nishpa ñucanchic rimancapac callaricpi, ñucanchic ri-mancapac mana saquinun. Chashna rurashpa juchahuan junta-rishpa paicana catiranun. Ranti cunan, chapaimanta amishcapi, paicunapac jahuapi Diospac jatan ñacarina urmashca.
52002017	Huauquicuna, cancunamanta unainayata anchurishpapash, cancunata mana ricushpapash, huiñai cancunata ñucanchic shuncupi charircanchic; mashnapash cancunata ricucrina yuyaita charircanchic.
52002018	Ña allipacha rishun yuyarircanchic; ñuca, Pablo, achca cuti rina munarcani, ranti supai saquichihuarca.
52002019	Alli yuyaricpi, ¿ñucanchic chapana, ñucanchic cushiyana, ñucanchic pacta cushiyarina tiyanchu? ¡Cancunallatami canquichic Apunchic Jesucristo ticramushca-pi!
52002020	Ari, shutipacha, cancunami ñucanchic jatunyana, ñucanchic cushiyana canquichic.
52003001	Ña rina munaimanta mana ushashpa, ñuca sapalla Atenaspi quiparincapac yuyarircani;
52003002	ñucanchic huauqui Timoteota cacharcani, pai Diosta yanapac can Cristomanta cushi shimita ricsichinapi. Cancunata ricucrishpa, cancuna inina charishcapi sinchicuchishpa, ñaupacman cancunata pushancapac paita cacharcani,
52003003	ama pipash chai llaquicuna tiyashcaraicu amirishpa chincarincapac. Cancunallata yachan-quichic cai ñacarinacunamanta ñacarina cashcata.
52003004	Ñucanchic chaira cancanahuan tiyacushcapi llaquicana charinca racushca-manta cancunata rimarcanchic; cancana ña yachanquichic, chashna tucurca.
52003005	Chairaicu, allipacha cancunamanta yachanayai tiyahuacpi, tapuchircani cancunapac inina allichu, manachu alli can imata; manchaimi shamuhuarca supai imapash mana alliman urmachishcanca yuyarircani; chaipi shuti ñucanchic cancunaraicu llancashca yancamanta rurashca saquirinman carca.
52003006	Ranti cunan Timoteo Tesalonicamanta ticramurca, cancunapac inina, cancuna llaquina charishcamanta sumac cushichic shimicunata apamushpa. Cuyashcahuanshi huiñai ñucanchicmanta yuyarinquichic rimarca, ñucanchic cancunata ricunayashca shinallatashi cancunapash ñucanchicta ricunayanquichic rimarca.
52003007	Chairaicu, huauquicuna, chai tucui ñucanchic huacai, ñacarina charishcapipash, cushiyash-canchicmi cancuna ininapi sinchi caticushcata yachashpa.
52003008	Cancuna Apunchicpi sinchi caticushcata yachashpa, ñucanchicpash cariyanchicmi.
52003009	¡Imashnata cancunaraicu Diosta pactacta pacrachuiman, chai tucui cushiyanata cancunaraicu paipac ñaupacpi charishcamanta!

52003013	Cancunapac shuncucunata sinchicuchi-chun; chuya mana juchayuc ñucanchicta Dios Yaya ñaupacpi rurachun Apunchic Jesus tucui paipaccunahuan ticramucpi. Chashna cachun.
52004001	Cunan huauquicuna, caita cancunaman mincanchic, caita mañanchic Apunchic Jesuspac shutipi: cancuna ñucanchicmanta ima shina Diospac ñaupacpi paita cushiyachincapac causana cashcata yachashcaraicu, ña chashna causacushpa, ashtahuan ñaupacman catichic.

52004010	Cancuna ña chashna ruracunquichic Macedoniapi causac tucui huauquicunahuan. Shina cacpipash, huauquicuna, cancunata mañanchic, cancunapac llaquina ashtahuan yalli tucuchun.

53001005	Caihuan Dios ricsichicun pai cusca taripashcata, pai cancunatapaipac pachaman yaicuchinca-pac chapacushcata, chairaicumi ñacaricunquichic.

53001012	Chashnami, Apanchic Jesuspac shuti can-cunaraicu jatunyachishca canca, ranti paica cancunata jatunya-chinca, ñucanchic Dios, Apanchic Jesus cuyashca tuputa.

53002002	ama chican yuyaita japichicchu, ama manchachi tucuichicchu quillca pancata japishcapi, camachishcata uyashcapi, Apunchic ticramuna puncha ña pactarcami, ñucanchic rimashcami nishca pactamucpipash.
53002003	Imata ruranucpipash ama umachi tucuichicchu. Chai puncha mana pactashcallapita, Diosta chicnishcata ricunca ranchic, supai rana pactamuna pachapi, chai runa chincachi tucuna can.

53002014	Chaipacmi Dios ñucanchic ricsichishca quishpina shimihuan cancunata cayarca: Apunchic Jesucristo jatunyachi tacushcapi cancanapash jatanyachi tucancapac.

53002017	pai ñucanchic shuncu-cunata cushiyachichun, smchiyachishpa cancunata charichun, cancana rurashca, cancuna rimashca tucui alli cancapac.
53003001	Puchucaipi, huauquicuna, ñucanchicraicu Diosta mañaichic, utcalla Apunchicpac shimi tucuicunaman pactachun, alli chasqui tucuchun cancunapi chasqui tucushca shina.
53003002	Diostapash mañaichic mana alli, huacllishca runacunamanta ñucanchic quishpichishca cancapac, mana mari tucuilla inina charinun.
53003003	Ranti Apanchicca cusca can, paimi cancunata sinchicuchispa mana allimanta quishpichinca.

53003006	IIuauquicuna, Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi cancunata rimanchic: chicanyaichic maican mana llancanayac huauqui-manta, ñucanchic yachachishca chapanapi mana causac huauquimantapash.
53003007	Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina causanami can ñucanchic yachachishcata catincapac: cancuna-huan causacushpa mana yanca, quillashpa tiyashcanchicchu;
53003008	pipac tantatapash maquipura rantishpami micushcanchic. Chaimanta rimacpi tutantin punchantinmi llancashcanchic, ñacarishcanchic cancunamanta ama pitapash quillachishun nishpa.
53003009	Allipacha rimacpica cancunamanta yanapaita mañana carcanchic, ranti cancunata yachachina munashcaraicu llancashcanchic, cancunapash chaita catincapac
53003010	Caita cancunahuan causacushcapi yachachircanchic: Maicanpash mana llancana munashpa ama pacha micuchun.
53003011	Shina cacllapita cancunamanta maicaucuna mana llancashpa causacushcata yachashcanchic, mana imatapash ruranallapi yapa yuyarishpa.
53003012	Chai runacunata rimanchic, mincanchic Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi, llancaichiclla cai causaipi mutsuscata charina ushancapac.
53003013	Huauquicuna, ama sanpayashpa alli ruranata ruraichiclla.
53003014	Cai pancapi rimashcata maicanpash mana uyacpi, paita allita ricuichic maicanta can chai runa, paihuan ama llutarichicchu, ansallapash pincarinman ima chari.
53003015	Shinapash chai runata ama piñac runata shina ricuichicchu, ashtahuan shuc huauquita shina camachichic.

54001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Jesucristopac apostol, ñuncanchicta Quishpichic Dios, ñucanchic chapana Apunchic Jesucris-tontin, paicuna munacpi cachamushca,
54001002	Timoteoman, ininapi quiquin ñucapac churi, cai pancata quillcani; Dios ñucanchicpac Yaya Apunchic Cristontin paicunapac cuyaita, paicunapac llaquinata, paicunapac ganas causaita canpac jahuapi tallichinuchun.
54001003	Efsopi saquiri canta rimarcani ñuca Macedonia suyu-man rirashpa, pantarishca yuyaicunata yachachiccunata ama yachachichicchu rimancapac,
54001004	ñucanchic rucunamanta mana tucurina rimaicunatapash ama uyaichicchu. Cai shimicuna piñanacuncapaclla alli canum, Dios munashcata inishcahuan chasquincapac mana yanapanacanchu.
