54001005	Chuya shuncumanta llucshishca, cusca samaihuan, allipacha inishcahuan cancunapura llaquinacunuchun nishpami cai pactachinata rimarcani.
54001006	Maicancuna caimanta chicanya-nushca, yanca rimarinacunapi chincarinushca.
54001007	Diospac camachic quillcamanta yachachiccuna tucanayanun, paicanalla-ta rimashcata paicunallata yachachishcatapash mana atipanum.
54001008	Camachic quillca, pai rimashcata jinu pactachicpi, alli cashcata yachanchic.
54001009	Yuyarina tucunchic ima shina alli ru-nacunaman shuc pactachina quillcata mana cuipac can. Mana uyaccunata ñacachincapacmi pactachina quillcata cuna tucun, mana allicunata, juchasapacanata, Diosta mana chacchaccunata, inina mana chariccunata, yaya mamata huañuchiccunata, runa huañuchiccanata,
54001010	yumashpa juchalliccunata, caripura yuma-riccunata, huatara runacunata, llullaccunata, Diospac shutita yancamanta rimaccanata; rimacpi, pactachina quillca alli yachachishcamanta mana alli yachaicunata yachachiccunata ñaca-chincapac can.
54001011	Chai alli yachachishca quishpina shimipimi tiyan, chaita bendisiashca Dios ñucaman mmcahuarca.
54001012	Apunchic Jesucristota pacrachuni, pai ushaita cuhuashca, pactachicta ñucata ricuhuashpa, paita yanapancapac churahuashca,
54001013	ñaupa ñuca paita piñashpa rimac cacpipash, paita piñashpa japic cacpipash, paita piñashpa caparic cacpipash. Ranti Dios ñucamanta llaquirihuarca, ñuca chaira mana inina charishcaraicu ñuca mana alli ruracushcata mana yacharcani.
54001014	Chashnami Apunchic paipac cuyaita achcata tallichirca ñuca jahuapi; inina, llaquina cuhuarca, chaicunata charmchic Cristohuan llutarishcacuna cashcaraicu.
54001015	Cai allipacha shutimi, tucuicuna caita inina canun: Cristo Jesus cai pachaman shamurcami juchasapacunata quishpichincapac, paicunamanta ñucami ñaupac cani.
54001016	Chairaicu Dios ñucamanta llaquirirca: Jesucristo yapa llaquishca ñucapi ricurincapac. Huasha ininacuna, ñucapi tucushcata yuyarishpa, yachanunca ima shina inina cashcata huiñai causanata chasquina ushancapac.
54001017	Huiñai tiyac Incata, mana huañuc, mana ricuric shuclla Diosta huiñai jatunyachi-shun. Chashna cachun.
54001018	Ñuca churi, Timoteo, alli llancanapi llancai canta rimani, canmanta profetacuna rimashca shimicunata pactachishpa.
54001019	Ininata, alli causaita cati, mana maicancuna shina chaicunata mayanman jichushpa; chashna rurashpa paicunapac ininata chincachinurca.
54001020	Chashna tucuccuna canunmi Himeneo Alejandrontm, paicunata supaipac amuman curcani ama Diosta piñac shimicunata rimana yachancapac.
54002001	Tucuimanta ñaupac caita mmcam: Tucui runacunaraicu Dios-huan rimarishcapi mañaichic, paita pacrachuichic.
54002002	Jatun apucunaraicu Diosta mañana can tucui uchilla apucunamantapash, ganas causaita charina ushancapac, Diosta chacchashpa, tucuita alli yuyaihuan rurashpa.
54002003	Chai alli can, ñucanchicta quishpichic Dios chaita cushiyashcahuan ricun,
54002004	pai tucuicuna quishpincapac, tucuicuna shuti cashcata ricsincapac munan mari.
54002005	Shuclla Dios mari tiyan; chashnallata, shuc runalla tucui runacunata Dios-huan llutachincapac pushana ushan: chai runa Jesucristo can.
54002006	Jesucristo tucuicunata quishpichinaraicu, paimanta pacha pactashcapi rimashca shina, huañuiman curirca.
54002007	Chairaicu, pai acllahuashca shimita apashpa rincapac, apostol tucancapac, mincai tucushcanipash inina shuti cashcamanta mana judio runacunata yachachincapac. Ñuca rimashca shutimi can, manapacha llullanichu.
54002008	Chashnamanta, tucui ranacuna tucui pachapi Dios-huan rimarincapac munani, mana piñarishpa, mana piñanacushpa, chuya shuncuhuan Diosman maquicunata jatachinuchun nini.
54002009	Huarmicunapash alli churarishca, mana yapalla sumacyashca-huan, yancashituta churarincapac munani; ari, sumacyanuchun, mana yapalla sumac ñaccharishcahuan, mana curi, mana sumac ricuric rumicunata aparishpa, mana yapalla cullquita jichuchic churanacunahuan, mana;
54002010	ashtahuan alli rurashcacunata ricuchishpa, Diosman chicanyachishca huarmicuna ruranata pactachispa.
54002011	IIuarmica yachachishcata upalla uyana can, allipacha uyashcahuan;
54002012	mana munanichu huarmi runa ucupi yachachishpa shayancapac, carita yallishpa: Upalla causancapac munani.
54002013	¿Dios Adanta manachu ñaupac rurarca, Evataca huasha?
54002014	Mana Adanchu umachi tucurca, huarmimi umachi tucurca; paimi umachi tucushca, juchapi urmarca.
54002015	Ranti huarmica quishpincami mamacuna ruranata pactachishpa; alli yuyaita japishpa, ininapi, llaquinapi, chuya shuncuhuan causashpa.
54003001	Cai yapa shuti can. pipash iniccunata pushaccama tucuna munashpa, alli llancanata mashcacun.
54003002	Chairaicu, pushaccamapac causai alli, cusca cana can. Shuclla huarmiyuc, yuyayuc, cusca, tucuipi yupaichaipac cana can. Paipac huasiman runa pactacpi, chasquina yuyaita charina can; sumacta yachachic cana can;
54003003	mana machaisiqui, mana macanacuisiqui, ashtahuan alli shuncuyuc, mana piñarishpa causac, imatapash mana cullquiraiculla rurac cana can.
54003004	Paipac huasita alli ricuc cana can, huahuacunata uyac cancapac, yupaichac cancapac yachachic;
54003005	maicancapash quiquinpac huasita mana alli ricuc cashpa, ¿iniccunata ricana ushancachu?
54003006	Chairaicu, shuc pushaccamata mana mushulla inincapac callaricta shayachinachu, yancamanta yapalla jatunyarishpa, supai cautsayachi tucushcallapita imapash urmancami.
54003007	Mana inic runacunapacpi yupaichashca cachun, ama pincachi tucushpa supaipac ticllapi urmachun.
54003008	Diaconocunapash chashnallata yupaichaipac cana canun, paicuna cushca shimita huiñai pactachinuchun; ama machaisiqui, cullquitapash ama umachishcahuan japinuchun.
54003009	Ñucanchic inishca shuti cashcata ricsichishcaman liutarishca cana canuu, Dios cushca samaitapash chuyata charina canun.
54003010	Ñaupacta camai tucushca canuchun; mana juchayuc canucpi, yanapancapac callarinuchun.
54003011	Huarmicunapash chashnallata, yupaichaipac cana canun, mana rimaisiqui, ashtahuan cusca, tucuita pactachic canami canun.
54003012	Shuc diacono shuclla huarmiyuc cachun, huahuacanata alli ricuc, paipac huasitapash alli ricuc.
54003013	Llancanata alli pactachic diaconocuna jatunyachishca canun, chasnami paicuna Cristo Jesuspi inishcata mana pincarishpa rimana ushanun.
54003014	Mana unaichu canta ricucrisha yuyani; ranti canta caita quillcani
54003015	ñuca imapash huashayacpi, Diospac aillumanta cashpa ima shina causana cashcata can yachancapac, causacuc Diospi miccuna chai aillu canun, paimi shuti cashcata riman, ricsichin.
54003016	Mana pipash rimana ushanchu ñucanchic inishca alli shutipacha jatan pacara cashcata: Cristo runa tucushca ricurimurca; pai samai cashcaraicu yallishcapi, angelcanapacpi ricui tucurca. Tucui llactacunapi ricsichi tucurca, cai pachapi paita ininurca, jahuapachapi jatunyachi tucurca.
54004001	Samai pasacta rimacun puchucai pachacunapi maican-cuna inina charishcamanta chicanyanuncami nishpa, umachic samaicanata supaicuna yachachishcatapash catishcarai-cu.
54004002	Ishcai shimiyuc, llullaisiqui runacunatami uyanunca, paicuna ucupi tiyac Dios cushca samai paicuna juchallishca jillai ninallahuata mircashca canun.
54004003	Cai runacana sahuarmca nicpi mana munanun; tucui iniccana, shuti cashcata ricsiccuna micuncapac Dios churashca micunacunata paita pacrachushpa micuncapac, mana micunachu rimanun.
54004004	Tucui Dios rurashca alli can; Diosta pacrachushpa chasquicpi mana imapash millai tucushcachu cana can.
54004005	Diospac shimiraicu ñucanchic Dios-huan rimarishcaraicupash micunacuna chicanyachishca tucunun.
54004006	Chaicunata huauquicanaman yachachishpa, inina shimicunahuan juntarishpa, alli yachaicunata catishpa, chai shuti Jesucristopac alli runami canqui.
54004007	Ranti, uparunacunapac rimaicunata ama uyaichu. Diosta llaquinapi yapa yuyanshpa Causai;
54004008	purina aichata ansa yanapanmi, ranti Diosta llaquinapi yuyarishpa causashca tucuipac yapa yanapan: cai causaipi alli causancapac, shamunca racuc causaipi causaita tarmcapac.
54004009	Chai shutimi can, tucuilla chaita inina canquichic.
54004010	Chairaicumi ñacarinchic, llancanchic, causacuc Diospi ñucanchic yuyaita churashcaraicu, pai tucuicunata quishpichic can, iniccunata ashtahuan yalli quishpichic can.
54004011	Chaicunatami pactachichina, yachachina canqui.
54004012	Maltacashcaraicu asi tucunata ama saquinquichu; ashtahuan can causashcahuan, can rimashcahuan iniccunata ricuchina canqui; canpac llaquinata, canpac ininata, canpac chuya causaita ricuchina canqui.
54004013	Ñuca pactanacama, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi Dios quillcashca shimita catishpa uyachi, huauquicunata cariyachi, paicunata yachachi.
54004014	Ama cuncarinquichu Dios canman cushca cuyaicunamanta, pai ricsichishcaraicu, iniccunamanta rucucuna canpac jahuapi maquicunata canta acllashpa churanurca.
54004015	Tucui chaicunapi yapa yuyarina canqui, tucuicunata can ñaupacman caticushcata ricuchincapac.
54004016	Quiquin canmanta yapa yuyarina canqui, can shuccunata yachachishca-mantapash yapa yuyarina canqui, tucuipi sinchicushpa cati. Chashna rurashpa, canllatami quishpinqui canta uyaccunata- pash quishpichinquimi.
54005001	Rucu runacunata ama piñaichu; chaipac rantimanta, canpac yayata shina camachi; maltacunata canpac huauquicuna cacpi shina ricui.
54005002	Rucu mamacunata canpac quiquin mamata shina ricui; malta huarmicunata, canpac panicuna cacpi shina ricui chuya shancuhuan.
54005003	Mana maimanta yanapaita charic huaccha huarmicunata yanapai.
54005004	Ranti shuc huaccha huarmi churiyuc, churipac huahuacanayuc cacpi, paicanami ñaupac aillucanata yanapanca-pac yachana canun; yaya mama llaquishcata cutichincapac yachana, chai yapa alli can, Dios cushiyashcahuan ricun.
54005005	Alli quiquin huaccha huarmi, sapalla saquiric, Diospi yuyaita churan, tutantin punchantin Dios-huan rimarishpa paita mañacan.
54005006	Ranti mana alli causac huaccha huarmica causaillapita huañushca can.
54005007	Chaicunatapash pactachichina canqui, ama pipash cancunamanta shuc shimi rimachun.
54005008	pi runa cashpapash quiquin paipac huasipi tiyaccunamanta mana yuyaricpi, inina iliacmi can, jichushca mari, mana iniccunamanta astahuan mana allichu can.
54005009	Sucta chunca huata yalli huacchallata huacchacana shuti japina quillcapi tiyana can, pai shuclla cariyuc.
54005010	Allita ru-rashcamanta ricsi tucuna can: huahuacunata allitachu huiñachirca, paipac huasipi pactaccanahuan allichu carca, inic-canata chaquita maillacchu carca, ñacariccanata yanapacchu car-ca; rimacpi, pai ushashcapi alli yanapaicanata rurashca cacpi.
54005011	Pishilla huatayuc huacchacunata quillcapi ama japin-quichu; paicanapac aicha nuspayacpi Cristomanta chicanyash-pa, cuti sahuarinata munanun;
54005012	chashnamanta cautsayashca tucunun paicuna ruranata mana pactachishpa.
54005013	Chairapash, huasi huasi purinun, quilla tucunun, mana quillaisiquillachu canun, ashtahuan rimaisiqui tucunun, tucuipi paicuna satiranun, mana rimanacunata rimashpa.
54005014	Chairaicu malta huacchacuna sahuarinuchunlla nini, huahuayanuchunlla; huasipi llancac huarmi cachun, chaimi piñaccuna paita mana camina ushanunca.
54005015	Maican huacchacunaca ña mari chicanyanushca, supai amuta cunan catiranan.
54005016	Inic huarmicunamanta maicanpash aillu ucupi huacchacunata charishpa, yanapana tucun, ama iniccunamanta yanapaita mañacuncapac; chashnami iniccuna mana maimanta yanapaita charic huacchacunata yanapana ushananca.
54005017	Iniccunata alli pushaccama rucucuna achca llaquishca cana canun, ashtahuan Diospac Shimita huillaccuna yachachic-cunantin yapa llaquishca cana canun.
54005018	Caita riman camachic quillca: "Trigota cutacuc huacrata ama shimita huataichu". Caitapash riman: "Shuc rana cullquita japina tucun pai llancashcamanta".
54005019	Shuc rucu runata cautsayachinucpi ama uyaichu ishcai, quimsa ricuyaccana mana tiyacpi.
54005020	Juchallishpa caticcunata tucuicunapac ñaupacpi sinchi shimihuan rimana canqui uyaccana mancharinuchun.
54005021	Diospac ñaupacpi, Jesucristopac ñaupacpi, acllashca angelcunapac ñaupacpi canta mincani: cai pactachinacunata catilla, mana pitapash yallicta, pishilla pactachichishpa.
54005022	Chaira mana allita yuyarishca cashpa, ama pitapash canpac maquicunata paipac jahuapi churanquichu; chashnami mana shuccuna juchallishcahuan canpash juchallinqui. Tucui mana allicunata ama ruraichu.
54005023	Huicsa nanaihuan uncushpa causani ninqui; yacuta ama upiaichu, ansa vinota upiai.
54005024	Maicancunapac juchacuna chaira mana taripanaman apashcallapita ña ricsi tucunun, ranti shuccunaca taripai tucushca huashalla yachai tucunun.
54005025	Chashnallata alli rurashcacunapash ricunalla canun; mana ricuriccunaca mana huiñai pacashca saquirinuncachu.
54006001	Huatara runacana, yapa yupaichashcahuan ricuna canun amucunata, ama Diospac shutimanta ñucanchic yachachishcamantapash mana alli rimashca shimicuna uyarincapac.
54006002	Inic amuta chariccuna ashtahuan yapa yupaichana canun ininapi huauquipura cashcaraicu. Chaipac rantimanta, ashtahuan yapa allita yanapana canquichic, cancuna amucuna inic, llaquishca huauquicuna cashcaraicu. Caita yachachi, canpash pactachina canqui:
54006003	Pipash chican yuyaicunata yachachishpa, Apunchic Jesucristo sumac yachachishcamanta chican yuyaita charishpa, ñucanchic inina-mantapash chican yuyaita charishpa,
54006004	yaca jatunyarishpa mana imatapash yachac runami can. Yanca shimicunamanta rimarina uncuitami charm chai rana; chaimantami tiyan chiqui-cui, piñanacuna, piñashpa caparina, shuccunapi yuyai churana illana,
54006005	yuyai illac runapura huiñai macanacuna, paicuna shuti cashcata mana ricsinun, ininata paicunaca catunami mari yu-yanacun.
54006006	Ininamanta shuti pachami achcata chasquinchic, shinapash amu charishcallahuan cushiyac runalla.
54006007	Cai pacha-man mana imahuan shamushcaraicu, mana imatapash caimanta apana ushanchic;
54006008	micuucapac charishpa, churarinata charish-pa, chaihuanmi pacta cushi tiyana canchic.
54006009	Ranti, achca cha-rina munaccuna camai tucushcapi mana ushanun, tucui laya munana tictapi urmanan; mana alli, huacllichic manaicanapi, chaicuna runata ilushtiyanapi, chicapac huañunapi urmanun.
54006010	Tucui mana allicuna cullquita yapa munashcamanta tiyan; maican ranacuna, cullquiraiculla, inina charishcamanta chican-yanushca, paicana quiquin causaitapash ñaca-rinallahuan junta-chishpa causaranan.
54006011	Ranti can Diospac runa canqui, tucui chaicunamanta anchuri. Cusca causaita causai, Diosta yapa yuyarishpa, inish-pa, llaquishpa, mana sanpayashcahuan catishpa, shuncumanta uchillayashpa.
54006012	Ininapi alli llancana canpac llancana cachun; huiñai causana chasquinamanta ama quishpmquichu, chaipacmi Dios canta cayarca; chairaicullata can inina charishcamanta achca ricuyac ñaupacpi ricsichircanqui.
54006013	Cunan, Diospac ñaupacpi —pai tucui imatapash causaita cun, Jesucristopac ñaupacpipash, paipash ricsichirca, Poncio Pilatopac ñaupacpi uyachirca— canta rimani:
54006014	cai ñuca rimashcata uyahuai, mana shuc layata rurashpa, ama canta imamantapash piñana tucancapac. Chashna rurai Apunchic Jesucristo shamunacama.
54006015	Rimashca pacha pactarishcapi, Dios caita ricsichincami, paillami shuclla, bendisiashca, Jatun Apu, incacunapac Inca.
54006016	Pai shucllami mana huañuc can, pai mana pipash mayanya-na ushaipac achicpi causan. Pi runapash paita mana ricushca-chu, pi runapash paita mana ricununcachu. Pailla jatunyachish-ca cachan, pailla ushaita charichun. Chashna cachun.
54006017	Cai pachapi achca chariccunata rimai ama chai achca charishcapi jatanyarishpa causanuchan, ama chai achca charish-capi paicunapac yuyaita churanuchun, tucui paicuna achca charishca chincarinalla cashcaraicu. Chaipac rantimanta, yuyaita Diospi churanuchun, paimi ñucanchicman tucui imatapash achcata cun, ñucanchic alli causancapac.
54006018	Rimai allicunallata ranuchun, paicuna alli rurashca achca charishca cachun, paicana charishcata shuccanamanpash canata munanu-chun.
54006019	Chaimi achca charishcahuan juntarinunca huasha causaipac, chai shuti quiquin causaita mari chasquinanca.
54006020	Timoteo, canman mincashcata allita ricui. Yanca shimicunata ama uyaichu, yanca rimashca shimicunatapash ama uyaichu;
54006021	maicancuna, chai "yapa yachashpa rimashca shimicunata" caticcuna, inina charishcamanta chicanyanushca mari. Apanchic paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichichun.
55001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Jesucristopac apostol Dios chashna munashcaraicu, pai ñucanchicman Cristo Jesuspi huiñai causaita cushami nirca.
55001002	Ñuca llaquishca churi Timoteoman cai pancata quillcani: Dios Yaya, Apunchic Jesucristontin paicunapac cuyaita, paicunapac llaquinata, ganas causaitapash canpac jahuapi tallichinuchun yuyashcahuan.
55001003	Canmanta huiñai Dios-huan rimarishcapi yuyarishpa, tutantin punchantin Diosta pacrachuni, ñuca paita chuya shuncuhuan mari yanapani, ñuca rucucuna yanapashca shinallata.
55001004	Can huacashcata yuyarishpa, canta ricunayai shamuhuan ñuca cushihuan juntarincapac.
55001005	Can alli pacha shuti inina charishcata yuyarinimi. Canmanta ñaupac-canpac aula Loida canpac mama Eunicepash charinurca; ñuca yachanimi canan canpash charishcata.
55001006	Chairaicu, ñuca canpac jahuapi ñuca maquicunata canta acllashpa churacpi can chasquishca Dios cuyashca ninata cariyachi.
55001007	Mana manchai samaitachu Dios ñucanchicman curca, ushai samaitami curca, llaquina samai, alli yuyarishpa causana samai.
55001008	Chashnamanta ama pincarichu Apunchicraicu rimanata; ñucamantapash ama pincarichu, ñuca pairaicu mari chunta curralpi quillpara tiyani. Chaipac rantimanta, Dios cushca ushaihuan canpash ñacari, quishpichic shimiraicu ñacarinacuna tiyacpi.
55001009	Dios ñucanchicta quishpichirca, paiman ñucanchic causaita chicanyachincapac cayarca, mana ñucanchic imapipash paita yanapashcaraicu, paimi chashnapac munarca, Cristo Jesuspi ñucanchicta llaquishcaraicu. Dios, ñucanchicta cai pacha chaira mana tiyashcamanta llaquishcata,
55001010	cunan pai llaquishcata ñucanchicman ricsichin, ñucanchicta Quishpichic Jesucristo shamushcahuan; pai yallirca huañuipac ushaita; mana tucuric causaitapash cushi shimita rimashpa ricsichirca.
55001011	Chai shimita ricsichincapac Dios ñucata mincahuash-ca, pai shuc apostol shina, shuc yachachicshina shayachishpa cachahuashca.
55001012	Chairaicullata tucui chaicunata ñacaricuni. Shinapash chaimanta mana pincarinichu, ñuca yuyaita piman churashcata allipacha yachashcaraicu; ñuca yachani pai ushai charishcaraicu puchucai punchacama ñucaman mincashcata huacaichishpacharinca.
55001013	Ñucamanta yachashca cusca causanata catilla; ñucanchic Cristo Jesusman llutarishcaraicu inina, llaquina charishcapi causailla.
55001014	Ñucanchicpi causacuc Diospac Samai yanapashcahuan, canman mincashca Diosta ininata allita ricui.
55001015	Can ña yachanqui, ima shina Asiamantacuna tucuilla jichuhuanushcata; chaicunamanta Pigelo, Hermogenes canun.
55001016	Onesiforopac aillucunamanta Apunchic llaquirichun; pai achca cuti cushichihuarca; ñuca chunta curralpi tiyacpipash pai mana pincarircachu.
55001017	Chaipac rantimanta, Romaman pactashca shina, mana sanpayashpa ñucata mashcancapac callarirca tupanacama.
55001018	Puchucai punchapi Apunchic tupachichun paimanta llaquirishcata. Can pacta yachanqui ima shina pai Efesopi achca yanapashcata.
55002001	Canca, ñuca huahualla, sinchicui Cristo Jesusmanta chasquishca cuyaicunahuan.
55002002	Can ñuca achca ricuyaccu-napac ñaupacpi rimacpi uyashcata, alli ricsishca runacunaman mincai, shuccunaman yachachina ushaccanaman.
55002003	Ñacarinacunapi Mesias Jesuspac alli soldado shina ñacari.
55002004	Manamaican soldadopash yanca runapac causaipi sati-rinchu, paipac aputa cushiyachinallatami yuyarin.
55002005	Chash-uallata, shuc pucllac runa cuyashcata mana chasquincachu, pucllaccuna pactachinata mana allita pactachishpa.
55002006	Chacrapi llancac runa tucuimanta ñaupac pai tarpushcamanta micuna can.
55002007	Cai ñuca rimashcata yuyari, chaimi Apunchicca tucuita atipachinca.
55002008	Huañushcamanta causarishca Jesucristopi yuyari, pai Jatun Curaca Davidpac aillu carca. chaimi quishpmamanta ñuca yachachishca shimi can.
55002009	Chai shimiraicu ñacarinacuna tiyacpipash mana imanahuanchu, runata huañuchic shina huatara causanapash mana imanahuanchu; ranti Diospac shimi mana huatashcachu can.
55002010	Chairaicumi tucui Dios acllashca-cunapac allipac ñacarini, paicunapash huiñai quishpmata Cristo Jesuspi chasquinuchan.
55002011	Cai yapa shutimi can: Paihuan huañushca cashpa, paihuanmi causashan;
55002012	sinchicushcahuan ñacarishpa, paipac pachapi yaicuna ushashanmi; ñucanchic paita piñacpi, paipash ñucanchicta piñancami;
55002013	ñucanchic cushca shimita mana pactachicpipash, paica pactachincallami, paillata llullarmcapac mana ushashcaraicu.
55002014	Chaita paicunata yuyachi, ama yanca shimicunamanta piñanacuncapac Diospac ñaupacpi mincai. Chashna pmanacuna yancami can, mana imapash alli; paita uyaccunata huacllichin-capacllami alli canun.
55002015	Alli yanapac runa shina, Diosta yanapanalla huiñai chapacui, mana imamanta pmcarmata charic llancac runa shina, shuti shimita mana pantashcanuan yachachishpa.
55002016	Yanca mana yuyarishpa rimashca shimicuna-ta ama rimaichu; chashna rimac runacunaca caran cuti ashta-huan mana allipi urmashpa catiranun;
55002017	chai yachachishcacu-na ismuchic uncui shina mirarishpa riranun. Himeneo Piletontin chashna tucuranun,
55002018	shuti shimimanta paicuna chicanyanushca mari huañushcamanta causarina ñucanchipi ña pactarishcami rimashcahuan; chashna, ininata maican runacu-napi huacllichishpa puriranun.
55002019	Ranti Dios mana cuyuric sapita shayachishca, chaipi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Apunchic paipac runacunata ricsin mari". Cuti shuc: "Tucui Diospac shutita ricsiccuna mana allicunamanta chicanyanuchun".
55002020	Shuc jatun huasipi mana curimantalla, mana cullqui-mantalla imacunachu tiyan; manca allpamanta caspimantapash tiyan mari; shuccanata raimi punchacunapi llucshichinun, shuccunaca caran puncha surcui tucunun.
55002021	Sumac ricurinca-pac —Raimi punchalla surcui tucuncapac— Apunchicman chicanyachishca cancapac, tucui mana allimanta pichashca cana canchic; chaimi shuti tucui imapacpash alli cashun.
55002022	Maltacuna manalli munanamanta chicanyai; canpac causai cusca cachun inina charishcahuan, llaquishcahuan, ganas causaihuan, tucui Apanchicta ricsic chuya shuncuyuccunahuan pacta.
55002023	Yancamanta rimarinacunata ama uyaichu, can pacta yachanqui ima shina chaicuna yancamanta canman piñarinata apamunca racushcata.
55002024	Apunchicta yanapac runa mana ma-canacushpa causanachu can; chaipac rantimanta, tucuicanahuan alli shuncu cana can. Yachachincapac yapa yachac; mana piña-risiqui;
55002025	piñarisiquicunatapash uchilla shuncuyashpa atipa-chic runa, Dios paicunata cuti paiman yuyaita ticrachichinca-mi, shuti cashcata ricsichincami chapashpa,
55002026	paicunapash yu-yaita japishpa supaipac tictamanta, huatara charishcamanta pai munashcata rurachincapac, chaimanta quishpinuchun nishpa.
55003001	Puchucai pachapi llaqui punchacuna tiyana cashcata yachana canqui.
55003002	Runacuna quiquinpacllatami yuyari-nunca, cullquillatami llaquinunca, paicunalla jatunyariccuna, yancashitucunahuanpash jatunyariccuna. Diosta piñaccuna, yaya mamata mana uyaccuna, pacrachunata mana yachaccuna, ininata mana caticcuna.
55003003	Llaquina illaccuna, shuccunamanta llaquirina illaccuna, rimaisiquicunami canunca, paicuna aicha mañashcata mana yallina ushaccuna, upata millaicuna, tucui allita piñaccuna.
55003004	Ishcai shimiyuccuna, pincai illaccuna, yalli canayaccuna, Diosta mashcana rantimanta ashtahuan paicunapac alli causaillatami mashcaccuna.
55003005	Jahua ricuriclla yapa alli shuncumi canunca, ranti paicuna rurashcapica ininapac quiquin ushai llullami can rimanunca. Canca chashna runacunamanta chicanyai.
55003006	Paicuna, huasicunapi yaicushpa, juchalla aparishca tiyac huarmicunata umachiccuna canan; chai huarmicana tucui laya aicha munash-cahuan ñacarishpa causanun;
55003007	huiñai yacharanlla causanun, ranti shuti cashcata mana maican puncha allipacha ricsinun.
55003008	Janes, Jambres sacracuna, Moises rimashcata mana munash-ca shinallata, cunanpash cai runacuna shuti cashcata mana pactachinata munanan. Cai runacuna paicanapac yuyaita huac-llishcata charinun, inina catinapi mana ushanushca.
55003009	Ranti mana ushanuncachu ashtahuan ñaupacman catincapac, paicana upa cashcata tucui runacuna ricsishcaraicu, chai ishcaicuna Moisesta mana uyashpa tucushca shinami tucunanca.
55003010	Canca, ranti, ñuca yachachishcata alli catishcanqui, ñuca causaita, ñuca munashcata, ñuca ininata, ñuca mana piñarishpa chapanata, ñuca llaquinata, ñuca sinchicana ushaita,
55003011	piñashpa japi tucunata ñacarinacunatapash. Tucui ñuca Antioquiapi, Iconiopi, Listrapi tucushcata can yachanqui, piñashpa japi tucushcapi ñuca ñacarishcacunatapash can yachanqui; ranti, Apunchicca tucui chaicunamanta quishpichi-huarcami.
55003012	Cristo Jesusman chicanyachishca causana munaccuna piñashpa japi tucushpa ñacarina cashca, shutimi can;
55003013	ranti mana alli runacana, umachisiquicuna astahuanmi huacllishpa catinunca, shuccunata umachishpa, paicunallata umachi tucushpa catinanca.
55003014	Canca tucui can yachashcapi sinchicushpa cati, can yachashcata allipacha ricsishcaraicu.
55003016	Dios quillcashca shimita can huahuamanta ricsishcata yuyari, chai quillca canta yachachina ushan, quishpichina ushan, can Cristo Jesuspi inicpi.
55003017	Tucui quillca Diosmanta shamun, yachachincapac, camachincapac alli can; huacllicucta cuscayachincapac cushca causanata yachachincapacpash alli can;
55003018	Diospac runa alli yachachishca cancapac, tucuipac allichishca, tucui allicanallata rurancapac, alli can.
55004001	Diospac ñaupacpi, huañushcacunata causaccunantin apu shina taripancapac shamuna Cristo Jesuspac ñaupacpi, mincani achcata
55004002	cushi shimita yachachi nishpa; chai shimita rimailla alli chasqui tucushcapi, mana alli chasqui tucushcapipash. Canta uyanuchun sinchi shimihuan camachi, sinchicuchi mana piñarishpa yachachishcahuan.
55004003	Alli yachachishcata runacuna mana uyanayashca pacha tiyancami ran; ashtahuan, paicuna quiquin munaimanta, paicuna uyana munashcallata rimac yachachiccunatami mashcanunca.
55004004	Sbuti shimita ñahuimi ricununca, ashtahuan yanca shimicunatami uyanunca.
55004005	Ranti canca huiñai alli yuyaihuan causai, ñacari-nacunata allihuan chasqui, quishpichic shimita shuccunaman yachachinallata yuyari, canpac llancanata allita pactachi.
55004006	Camari shina ñuca curina ña pactarishcami; ñuca huañuna pacha ña pactariranmi.
55004007	Alli ruranapi llancashcani, ñuca pactanaman pactashcanimi, ininallapi purishcani.
55004008	Cu-nan, Apunchic, cuscata taripac Apu, puchucai puncha ñucaman cuyana llaututami chapani. Mana ñucallatachu cuhuanca, pai ticramunata cushihuan chapaccunatapash cuncami.
55004009	Utcalla ricuc shamuhuai;
55004010	Demas, cai pachamanta tucui imacunata yapa llaquishcaraicu, ñucata jichushpa Tesalonicaman rishca. Crescenteca Galacia suyuman rishca, Titoca Dalmaciaman rishca.
55004011	Lucaslla ñucahuan tiyacun. Marcosta mashcashpa pushamui, llancanapi ñucata caipi yanapahuancami.
55004012	Tiquicotaca Efesoman cacharcani.
55004013	Can shamucushpa, Troaspi, Carpopac huasipi ñuca saquimushca jahua churanata apamupai; quillca pancacanatapash apamupan-qui, quillca caracunatapash.
55004014	Jillaita llancac Alejandro ñucahuan manapacha allichu cashca; Apunchic paita pai rurashca tuputa cunca chari.
55004015	Canca yuyanqui paita pai ñucanchic yachachishca cushi shimita yapa piñac cashcaraicu.
55004016	Ñucaraicullata apucunapac ñaupacpi rimancapac rishcapi, mana pipash yanapahuarcachu, tucuimi ñucamanta anchurinurca. Dios paicuna chashna rurashcamanta quishpi-chinca chari yuyani.
55004017	Ranti Apunchicca yanapahuarcami, ushaitapash cuhuarcami, chairaicu quishpichic shimita ricsichina usharcani; Diosta mana ricsiccunatapash tucui paicunaman uyachircani. Apunchic chashna puma shimimanta quishpichihuarca,
55004018	tucui mana allimantapash quishpichihuan-cami; chashnami paipac pachapac huacaichihuanca. ¡Huiñai pai jatunyachishca cachan! Chasna cachan.
55004019	Ñucamanta rimapaichic Priscata Aquilantin, paicunata yuyarinimi, Onesiforopac aillucunatapash.
55004020	Erastoca Corin-topimi saquirirca, Trofimotaca Miletopimi uncucta saquimur-cani.
55004021	Tamia pacha chaira mana pactashcallapita shamui. Eubulo, Pudente, Lino, Claudia tucui huauquicunapash canmanta yuyarinunmi.
55004022	Apunchic Jesucristo canhua tiyachun; Dios tucui cancunapi paipac cuyaita tallichichun.
56001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Diospac runa, Jesucristopac apostol cani, Dios acllashcacunata ininaman pushancapac pai cacha-mushca, ñucanchic inina shuti cashcatapash paicuna ricsincapac;
56001002	chai inina huiñai causanapi chapashcamanta tiyan. Chaira cai pacha mana tiyashcallapita, mana llulla Dios cushami nirca chai causaita;
56001003	cunanca, pacha pactarishcapi, paipac cushi shimita ricsichishca ñucanchicta quishpichic Dios yachachincapac ñucaman mincashcaraicu.
56001004	Cai pancata canta quillcani, Tito, can ñucapac quiquin churi cahuanqui ñucanchic charishca ininapi, Dios ñucanchic Yaya ñucanchicta quishpichic Jesucristontm paicunapac cuyaita ganas causaita-pash canpac jahuapi tallichinuchun yuyarishcahuan.
56001005	Ñuca canta Creta islapi saquishpa, callarishcata tucu-chincapacmi saquircani, caran llactapi pushaccamacanata shaya-chincapac, ñuca mincashca shina catishpa.
56001006	Shuc pushaccama mana imamantapash rimaipacmi causana tucun. Shuc huarmi-llata charina can, paipac churicanaca inic canuchun, mana piñai tucushcacuna, mana piñarisiquicuna.
56001007	Iniccanata pushaccama-ca tucui Diospac imacunamanta mincai tucushca can; chairai-cumi cusca causaita charina tucun. Mana pai yuyashcallata catic cana can, mana piñarisiqui, mana machaisiqui, mana macanacuisiqui, mana cullqui shuhua cana can.
56001008	Chaipac rantimanta, paipac huasipi runata chasquinalla chapacuna can, yanapac runa; alli yuyayuc, cusca runa, Diospac chicanyashca, ruranata pactachic.
56001009	Diosmanta yachachishcata catina can, chashnami alli shimita yachachina ushanca, yachachishcamanta chican shimita rimaccanatapash uyachina ushancami.
56001010	Upata piñarisiquicuna achca mari tiyanun, pincai carata pitirmami rimaccunami ashtahuan yapa tiyan, paicuna mana atipaipac shimita ninun, chashnami runacunata umachinun.
56001011	Chai runacunata shimita quillpacpi alli canca, maicanpi paicuna shuc aillu tantarishcata illacta mari huacllichinun, mana yachachina cashcata yachachishpa paicunamanta cullquita surcunaraiculla.
56001012	Creta allpamantallata shuc profeta paipac aillucuna-manta cashna nirca: "Cretamanta runacuna huiñai llullaisiqui, aucacuna, micuisiqui, quillaisiquicuna".
56001013	Shutita pai rimarca; chairaicu, sinchi shimihuan paicunata camachi, paicuna inina cusca cachun;
56001014	Judiocuna yanca rimashcata ama uyanuchun, shuti shimita mana uyana manaccana rimashcatapash ama uyanuchun.
56001015	Chuya yuyayuc runacuna tucui imacunatapash chuya ñahuihuan ricunun; ranti mana iniccuna, mana chuya yuyayuccuna, mana imatapash chuya ñahuihuan ricunun; paicunapac yuyai paicuna ucupi tiyac samaipash mapayashca cashcaraicu.
56001016	Diosta ricsinchicmi rimanun, ranti paicuna rurashcapica mana ricsishcatachu ricuchinun; chicnipaccuna, piñarisiqui canun, mana imatapash allita rurana ushaccana.
56002001	Can rimashcapi Diosmanta cusca yachachishcallata huiñai rimana canqui.
56002002	Rucucunata rimai ama pucllaisi-qui canuchun; yupachaipac, alli yuyayuc canuchun; paicunapac inina, llaquina cusca cachun ñacarina charishcapi paicuna sinchi canuchun.
56002003	Chashnallata, rucu mamacunapash Diosta yapa yuyarishpa causanuchan; ama rimaisiqui canuchun ama machanuchun. Alli rurashcata ricuchina canun;
56002004	malta huar-micunaman carita huahuacanata llaquincapac yachachinuchun,
56002005	yuyayuc cancapac, chuya shuncuyuc cancapac; huasita alli ricuc, alli shuncuyuccuna, carita uyaccuna; ama pi runapash Diospac cushi shimimanta mana allita rimana ushancapac.
56002006	Chashnallata huanpracunatapash yuyayuc cancapac camachi;
56002007	canllata tucuipi alli rurashcahuan paicunata ricuchina canqui. Paicunata yachachicushcapi, chuya shuncuhuan ama pucllashcahuan ruraichu,
56002008	cusca shimihuan rimashpa, ama pipash can rimashcamanta piñana ushachun. Chashnami maican mana alli rimacpash pincarinca, ñucanchic pantashcata mana ansapash tupana ushashpa.
56002009	Huatara runacunata amucunata tucuipi uyanuchun nish-pa camachi; alli shuncu canuchun, mana piñarisiquicuna.
56002010	Ama shuhuanuchun, chaipac rantimanta amupacta alli hua-caichinuchun; tucuicuna paicana causaipi ricanuchun yapa su-mac cashcata ñucanchic Quishpichic Diosmanta yacha-chishca.
56002011	Dios ñucachicman ricuchishca mari pai alli shuncu cashcata, chairaicu tucui runacunaman quishpina pactamushca.
56002012	Dios alli shuncu cashca ñucanchicta yachachin, mana alli ruraicunata, cai pachamanta munaicunata saquishpa, cai pachapi yuyayuc, cusca, Diosman yuyaralla causaita charincapac,
56002013	pai cusha nishca pactarinata chapashpa: ñucanchic jatun Quishpichic Dios Jesucristo ticramunata chapashpa.
56002014	Pai ñucanchicraicu huanuiman curirca, tucui mana allicunamanta quishpichincapac, tucui mana allimanta allipacha maillashca saquincapac, ñucanchic paipac cancapac, alli rurana munaillata ñucanchic charincapac.
56002015	Caitami yachachina canqui camachishpa piñashpa tucui can charishca ushaihuan. Ama pipash canta millachun.
56003001	Jatun aputa, uchilla apucunata uyana cashcata paicunata yuyachi, allicunata ruranalla chapacunuchunlla.
56003002	Ama pimantapash mana allita rimanuchun, shuccunamanta-pash yuyarmuchun, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi paicuna yapa alli shuncuyuc cashcata ricuchinuchun.
56003003	Ñucanchicpash ñaupa yuyai illac, Diosta mana uyac carcanchic; pantashpa puricurcanchic, tucui laya ñucanchic aicha munaicunapi, tucui laya ñucanchic aicha cushiyanacunapi huatai tucushca carcanchic. Juchapi, chiquicuipi causacurcan-chic, shuccunata miliashca, ñucanchicpurapash millanacushpa.
56003004	Ranti ñucanchicta Quishpichic Dios runacunahuan alli shuncu cashcata, pai llaquishcata ricuchiscapi,
56003005	ñucanchicta quishpichirca, mana ñucanchic shuc ima allitapash rurashcarai-cu, ashtahuan ñucanchicmanta llaquirishcaraicumi carca. Bautismo yacuraicu cutillata ñucanchicta pacarichishca; Diospac Samairaicu mushu causaita ñucanchicman cushca;
56003006	ñucanchicta Quishpichic Jesucristoraicuca Diospac Samaita ñucanchicman achcata cushca,
56003007	pai alli shuncuyucraicu juchamanta ñucanchicta quishpichishpa, ñucanchic chapacushca huiñai causaita chasquina ushancapac.
56003008	Chaica shutimi can, chaita can achca cuti rimancapac munani, Diosta iniccuna yanapanata yuyarinuchun. Tucui chaicuna alli canun, tucuicunata yanapac canun.
56003009	Ranti yancamanta rimanacunamanta chicanyai, callari rucucunapac rimaicunamantapash, Moisespac camachic quillcaraicu piña-nacunamanta macanacunamantapash. Chaicunaca yancami canan, mana yuyaihuan ruranacana.
56003010	Iniccuna ucupi chausichic runa tiyacpi, ishcai cuticama paita cayashpa rimai; chashnapash mana uyacpi, iniccuna ucumanta paita callpachi;
56003011	chai runa huacllishca mari can ña, paipac juchallata paita ña cautsayachicun.
56003012	Ñuca canpacman Artemasta, Tiquicota imapash cachac-pi, mana ushacushpapash Nicopolisman ricucrihuai, tamia pacha chaipi saquirincapac yuyarishcani.
56003013	Tucui can ushash-cahuan Zenasta Apolotapash yanapai, paicuna mutsushcata cui, ama imapash paicuna rirashcapi pishichun.
56003014	Ñucanchicpac-cunapash yanapancapac yachanuchun, yanapana tiyashcapi maquita cuncapac yachanuchun, ama causaimi tiyan nishpalla causancapac.
56003015	Tucui ñucahuan tiyaccuna canmanta yuyarinunmi. Inina charishcapi huauquicanata caimanta yuyarinchicmi rimai. Dios tucui cancunapi paipac cuyaita tallichichun.
57001001	Ñuca, Pablo, Cristo Jesusraicu quillpashca, ñucan-chicpac huauqui Timoteontin, can Filemonta, llancanapi ñucanchicpac mashita, cai pancata quillcani,
57001002	canpac huasipi tiyac iniccunata, ñucanchicpac pani Apiata, ñucanchic llancanapi huauqui Arquipotapash.
57001003	Ñucanchicpac Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesucristontm paicunapac ganas causaita cuyaitapash cancunapi tallichinuchun.
57001004	Huiñai ñuca Diosta pacrachuni canmanta yuyarishcapi,
57001005	Apunchic Jesucristota tucui Diospac runacunatapash can llaquishcata, can inina charishcata ñuca yachashcaraicu.
57001006	Diosta mañanimi can, ñucanchic-huan pacta inic cashcamanta, tucui ñucanchic alli charishcacuna Cristo Jesuspac cashcata allita atipana ushancapac.
57001007	Can imna charishcaraicu yapa cushi, yapa cariyashcami cani; canraicu, huauqui, iniccuna paicunapac shuncupi cushi saquirinushca.
57001008	Chashnamanta, Cristopac apostol cashcaraicu ñuca can pactachina cashcata rimanalla cashpallata,
57001009	llaquina charishcaraicu cuyailla canta mañani. Ñuca, Pablo, ña rucu apaya, cunan Cristo Jesusraicu quillpashca,
57001010	Onesimoraicu cuyailla canta mañani, pai shuc churi shina cahuashca caipi quillpara tiyacushcapi.
57001011	Callari pachapi, Onesimo yanca huatashca runalla canpacpi carca, ranti cunan ishcantin ñucanchicpac yapa yanapac tucushca.
57001012	Canpacman cuti cachani: quiquin ñuca cacpi shinallata paita ricui.
57001013	Caipi ñucahuan saquirincapac manaiman, ñuca caipi cushi shimiraicu quillpara tiyacushcapi canpac rantimanta ricuhuancapac.
57001014	Shina cacllapita, can munashcallata ruranayani, ama can ñucaraicu rurashca pactachinata rurashca tucuchun, ashtahuan canpac munai rurashcata cachun ninimi.
57001015	Ñaupa Onesimo canmanta ansa anainayata chicanyarca ima chari, ranti cunan chicapac canhuan tiyancaran,
57001016	ña mana huatara runa shina, huatara runamanta ashtahuan alli: shuc llaquishca huauqui shina. Ñuca paita yapa llaquini, canca yalli paita llaquina canqui, mana runa shinalla, ashtaunpash Apunchicpi huauqui shina.
57001017	Shina, inina charishcapi ñucahuan huauqui cashpa, ñucata shinallata paita chasquipai.
57001018	Pai canta manallita rurashcapi, pai canta dibicpi imapash, ñucata mañahuai, pairaicu ñuca cutichishami.
57001019	Ñuca, Pablo, ñuca quiquin maquihuanmi caita quillcani: Ñucami cutichisha. Dibimanta rimacpica, ashtahuan canca canpac quiquin causaita mari ñucata dibihuanqui.
57001020	Ari huauqui, caita canta mañanimi can Apunchicta inic cashcaraicu, Cristopi huauqui shina ñuca shancuta cushiyachipai.
57001021	Can uyahuanata yachashpami caita quillcani, ñuca mañashcamanta ashtahuan yallicta ruranca rashcata yachanimi.
57001022	Ñuca pactancapac huasita mashcapai; cancuna Diosta mañashcaraicu, pai ñucata cancunata ricuncapac cachahuancami nishpami rimani.
57001023	Cristo Jesusraicu quillpashcapi ñucapac mashi Epafras cancunata yuyarinmi;
57001024	Marcos, Aristarco, Demas, Lucas tucui paicuna cancunamanta yuyarinunmi, llancanapi yanapahuanan.
57001025	Apunchic Jesucristo paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichichun.
58001001	Dios callari pachapi profetacunapac shimihuan achca cuti caran layahuan rimarca.
58001002	Cunan cai puchucai pachacunapi, paipac Churipac shimihuan ñucanchicta rimashca, pairaicu pachacunata rurarca, tucui imacunata paita japina cac rurashca.
58001003	Paimi Dios llinpiyashcata ricuchin, Dios cashca ricchai jinumi can, paimi paipac ushaiyuc shimihuan tucui imacunatapash sinchicuchin. Pai ñucanchic juchacuna-manta quishpichishca huasha, Diospac tiyarina yachac maquiman jahua pachapi tiyarishca.
58001004	Diospac Churica angelcunamanta yalli tucushca, pai chasquishca shuti yalli jatun cashcaraicu.
58001005	Dios mana maican punchapash shuc angelmanta caita rimashcachu: "Can ñuca Churi canqui; cunan canta causaita cushcani". Mana maican angelmantapash caita rimashcachu: "Ñucaca paipac yayami casha, paica ñuca churimi canca".
58001006	Paipac tucuimanta ñaupa Churita runacunaman ricsichishpa, shucpi cashna riman: "Diospac angelcuna tucuilla paita chacchanuchun".
58001007	Angelcunamantaca Dios caita riman: "Huaira shina cancapac angelcunata rurashca, japirac nina shina cancapac paita yanapaccanaca".
58001008	Ranti paipac Churimanta cashna riman: "Dioslla, can huiñai Jatun Apu canqui, cuscatapash taripanqui canpac pachapi.
58001009	Alli cashcata llaquinqui, ranti mana allita chicninqui; chairaicu Dios, canpac Dios canta acllashca, canpac mashicunamanta yalli cushihuanpash canta juntachishca".
58001010	Caitapash nin: "Can, Apunchiclla, callarimanta allpata sapiyachircanqui; jahua pachapash canllata rurashca can.
58001011	Tucui chaicana tucurinuncami, ranti canca huiñai causanqui. Tucui chaicuna churana ismushca shinami tucurinunca;
58001012	shuc churanata patachishca shinami can chaita patachinqui, shuc churanata churarishca shinami ruranqui. Ranti canca Paillata canqui; canpac causaica mana tucurincachu".
58001013	Mana maican angeltapash Dios shuc cutillapash caita rimarcachu: "Ñuca yachac maquiman tiyari, canta chicniccunata ñuca canpac chaqui ucupi churanacama".
58001014	Tucui angelcuna Diosta yanapac samaicunami canun, quishpinata japinca racuccunata yanapancapac cachamushcacu-nami canun.
58002001	Chairaicu, cushi shimimanta uyashcata ashtahuan yapa yuyarina canchic, alli caticushcamanta yanca rashpa chicanyanchicman.
58002002	Unai pachapi Dios angelcunahuan cachamushca rurai nishcacana camachic shimi tucunurca, paita mana uyashpa juchalliccuna paipac tuputa ñacachi tucunurca.
58002003	¿Ñucanchicca quishpinata ushashunchu, cai jatun quishpinata mana uyashcamanta? Apunchicllatami tucuimanta ñaupa cai quishpinata ricsichirca, paita jinu uyaccuna huasha ñucan-chicman allipacha ricsichinurca.
58002004	Chai jahuapi, Dios, achca mancharicushiyanacanahuan, paipac Samaipac cuyaicunata pai munashca shina cushpa, chai quishpinata sinchicuchirca.
58002005	Cai ñucanchic rimacushca huasha shamunca racuc pachata mana angelcunapac maquipichu churarca.
58002006	Chaipac rantimanta, cai Dios quillcashca shimipi quillcashca tiyan: "¿Runa ima cashcata yachanquichu? ¿Ima cacpi shinachu paimanta yuyarinqui?, ¿paimantachu yapalla yuyarinqui?
58002007	Angelcunamanta ansashitu uranaya paita rurarcanqui, ranti paitaca jatunyachircanqui,
58002008	tucuicunata paipac maquipi churarcanqui". Chashna, tucui imacunata paipac maquipi churashpa, Dios mana imatapash paimanta chicanyashcata saquircachu, tucui paipac maquipi saquirca. Shina cacllapita, tucui paipac maquipi cashcata chaira mana ricunchicchu.
58002009	Ranti Jesusta ricunchic, paita Dios angelcunamanta uralla rurarca uchilla pachashitupac. Dios, pai llaquina charishcaman-ta, tucuicunaraicu pai huañuncapac munarca; cunan ranti pai, huañuita ñacarishcamicu, jatunyachishca, jahuayachishca tiyan.
58002010	Tucui imacunapash Diospacca causaranun, tucui pairaicu tiyan; Dios munan tucui paipac churicunapash pai jatunyashcapi, paicunapash jatunyachi tucuncapac. Chairaicu, Diosca Jesucristota ñacarinahuan pacta runata rurarca, pai paicunata Quishpichic can.
58002011	Tucuicuna chai Yayamantallata cashcaraicu: chicanyachishcacuna, chicanyachintin. Chashna-manta, Dicspac Churi mana pincarin paicunata huauquicuna rimanata,
58002012	cashna camachic quillcapi rimashpa: "Canmanta rimashami ñuca huauquicunata, canpac Shutitami runa ucupi chacchasha".
58002013	Caitapash nin: "Paipimi ñuca yuyaita churasha". Shuctapash nin: "Dios ñucaman cushca churicanahuanmi caipi cani".
58002014	Shuc aillupuramanta huahuacuna chai aichallata, chai yahuarllata charishca shina, chashnallata Jesuspash runa aichamanta, runa yahuarmanta carca; pai huañushcahuan huañuchina ushai charicta yallina ushancapac, cashna nishpaca supaitami ninchic.
58002015	Chashnami, huañuita manchashpa, tucui paicunapac causaita huatashca shina chariccanata quishpichirca.
58002016	Alli shutipacha rimacpica, mana angelcunata yana-pancapacchu shamurca, Abrahanpac miraimantacunata yanapan-capacmi shamurca.
58002017	Chaita rurancapac, tucuipi huauquicuna shinallata cana tucurca, Diospac ñaupacpi inic, llaquic Jatun Pacri Yaya cancapac, runacunata juchacunamanta quishpichincapac, camari shina curishcapi.
58002018	Paillata ñacarishcahuan camai tucushca cashpa, cunan pai ranti yanapanata ushan camai tucuc ranacanata.
58003001	Chairaicu, huauquicuna, cancuna Diospac runacuna cashpa, Diospacpi cayai tucushcanquichic paipac runacu-na tucuncapac; Cristo Jesusta allita ricuichic; apostol, jatun yayapacri pai can, inina pairaicu ñucanchicpi tiyan.
58003002	Diosta Jesus cusca catishca; pai chaita paiman mincarca, Moisespash Diosta yanapanapi tucuicunamanta yalli cusca cashca shinalla-ta.
58003003	Ranti Jesus Moisesmanta yalli jahuayachishcami cana can, huasita rurac runa rurashca huasimanta jinu yalli jahuaya-chishca shina.
58003004	Tucui huasi mana sapalla rurarinchu, runa ru-ran; ranti Dios tucui imacunatapash rurarca.
58003005	Chashnamanta, Moises, yanapac cashpa, paiman mincashcata cusca pactachir-ca, Dios rimanca racushcamanta ricuyac canami paipac llancana carca.
58003006	Ranti Cristo, Churi cashcaraicu, huasi amu can; ñucanchicca chai huasimanta runacuna canchic, cushiyashca-huan, shinchicush-cahuan ñucanchic chapacushcapi catishpa.
58003007	Uyashun Diospac Samai rimashcata: "Cunan Dios rimashca shimita uyashpa,
58003008	ama cancunapac shuncuta sinchiyachichicchu Dios-huan piña-rishpa, chunlla allpapi paita camaccuna shina.
58003009	Chaipi cancunapac rucucuna ñucata camahuanurca, ñuca rurashcacunata chuscu chunca huata tuputa ricushcae cashpapash.
58003010	Chairaicu, chai mirai runacunahuan piñarishpa, caita rimarcani: 'Paicuna shuncupi huiñai pantashpa purinun, ñuca ñanpicanata mana ricsina munanushcachu'.
58003011	Chairaicu ñuca piñarishcapi, samana allpapi mana yaicununcachu, sinchi shimihuan rimarcani".
58003012	Huauquicana, yuyaichic, ama pipash mana alli shuncuyuc-raicu causac Diosmanta chicanyachun, paita mana inishcaraicu.
58003013	Chaipac rantimanta, caran puncha cancuna-pura sinchicunacuichic, Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca "cunan" tiyashcacama, cancunamanta ama pipash juchapi umachi tucushpa, paipac shuncupash ama mana uyac tucuncapac.
58003014	Ñucanchic callarishcapi chapashca shinallata sinchi catishpami Cristohuan japinata chaupichishun.
58003015	Chashnamanta caita nin: "Cunan Dios rimashca shimita uyashpa, ama cancunapac shancuta sinchiyachichicchu chai piñaric runacuna shina".
58003016	Diospac shimita uyashca huashalla, ¿maicancuna piñarishcata yachanquichicchu? Egipto llactamanta tucui Moises surcushcacunami canurca.
58003017	¿Picunahuan Dios chuscu chunca huata piñarishca cashcata yachanquichicchu? Juchalhccunahuanmi piñarirca, paicunaca tucuimi chunlla allpapi huañunurca.
58003018	Pai samancapac cushca allpapi mana yaicunquichicchu, ¿maicancunata Dios chashna rimashcata yachanquichicchu? Paita mana uyaccunatami rimarca.
58003019	Shuti, chashnami, paicuna mana inishcaraicu mana yaicuna ushanurca.
58004001	Chairaicu, Dios cushca samanapi chaira yaicuna ushana shimita charishcamanta, yuyashpalla causana canchic, yanca rashpa cancunamanta maicanpash mana pactanman.
58004002	Ñucanchictapash quishpichic shimita ricsichi-nushca mari, paicunata ricsichishca shinallata; ranti paicunapacca chai shimi uyashca, mana uyashca shinachu carca, ininapi chai shimita uyaccunahuan mana shuclla tucushcaraicu.
58004003	Ranti ñucanchicca inishcaraicu chai samanapi yaicushunmi, chaimanta Dios cashna rimashca; "Chairaicu ñuca piñarishcapi, samana allpapi mana yaicununcachu, sinchi shimihuan rimarcani". Shina cacllapita, cai pacha rurashcapi, Dios ña tucuchishcarcami paipac llancanata;
58004004	Dios quillcashca shimipi canchis niqui puncha rimashca tiyan mari: "Canchis niqui punchapi, Dios tucui pai llancanamanta samarca".
58004005	Cutipash Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Ñuca cushca samanapi mana yaicununcachu".
58004006	Ranti chaira pishin maicancuna chai samanapi yaicuncapac, ñaupa cushi shimita chasquiccuna, paicuna mana uyashcamanta mana yaicuna ushanurca.
58004007	Chairaicu, Dios cutillata shuc punchata churarca, shuc mushu "cunan", huasha Davidpac shimihuan ña camachic quillcapi rimashcata: "Cunan Dios rimashcata uyashpa, ama cancunapac shuncuta sinchiyachichicchu".
58004008	Josue na Israel runacunata chai samanata cushcapi, Dios shuc punchamanta mana rimanmanchu carca.
58004009	Chashnamanta, Diospac runacunapac chaira shuc chicanyachishca samana tiyan;
58004010	maicanpash chai Dios cushca samanapi yaicushpa, paipac llancanamanta saman, Dios pai llancacushcamanta samashca shina.
58004011	Cariyana canchic chai samanapi yaicana ushancapac, ama pipash chai mana iniccuna rurashcata catincapac.
58004012	Diospac shimi causaita, ushaita charin. Ishcai manñayuc mircanumanta yalli piticmi can; samaihuan, causaihuan llutarashca sapicama yaicucmi can; shuc runapi mai ucupipash paita yaicuncami; paica taripanmi yuyaita shuncu munashcatapash.
58004013	Tucui Dios rurashcacuna paipac ñaupacpi ricuriranun; ñucanchic rurashcamanta taripac ñaupacpi mcuimi pasacta ricurin.
58004014	Jesus, Diospac Churi, jahua pachapi yaicushca ñucanchicpac Jatun Pacri Apu can. Chairaicu ñucanchic charishca ininapi sinchi catina canchic.
58004015	Ñucanchic Jatun Pacri Apu, ñucanchic sanpa cashcaraicu llaquirinata ushan, paipash ñucanchic camai tucushcallapita camai tucushcaraicu; shina cashpallata paica mana ansapash juchallircachu.
58004016	Chairaicu, ñucanchic alli shuncu Diospac tiyarinaman, tucui chapashcahuan mayanyashun, pai ñucanchicmanta llaquirichun; ñucanchic llaqui charishcapi pai alli shuncuyuc cashcaraicu ñucanchicta yanapachun.
58005001	Tucui Jatun Pacri Apu runa ucumanta acllashca can, paicunaraicu Diospac ñaupacpi shayarincapac.
58005002	Pacri-yayapash tucui runa shina juchasapa cashpa, pantashpa puriccanamanta mana yachaccunamantapash llaquirinata ushan;
58005003	paipash juchallic cashcaraicullata, paipac juchacunamanta runacunapac juchacunamantapash camarita ricuchina tucun.
58005004	Mana pipash amu munaimanta Pacriyaya tucushpa jahuayarina ushanchu, Diosmi cayashpa paita jahuayachin, Aaronta shina.
58005005	Chashnallata, Cristopash mana paipac munaichu Jatun Pacri Apu shayarirca, Diosmi paita jahuayachirca, paimi cashna rimarca: "Can ñuca churi canqui; cunan causaita ñuca cushcani".
58005006	Caitapash shucpi nin: "Canca huiñai Pacriyaya causanami canqui, Melquisedec cashca shina".
58005007	Cristo cai pachapi causacushpa, sinchi shimihuan huacashcahuanpash Diosta mañarca; pai huañuimanta quishpichinata ushaita charirca; pai uyashcaraicu paita Dios uyarca.
58005008	Shinacpi Cristoca, Churi cashpapash, ñacarishpami uyanata yacharca;
58005009	chashna pactachishca tucushpa, tucui paita uyaccuna paimanta huiñai quishpinata chasquina tucunurca;
58005010	Melquisedecta shina Diosca Jatun Pacri Apu paita rurarca.
58005011	Caimanta achca rimana tiyan, ranti atipachina sinchimi can, cancuna mana utca atipaccuna cashcaraicu.
58005012	Cancunata unai rimashpa catishcaraicu, ña yachachicmi cana canquichic-man; chaipac rantimanta, cancunata cuti Diosmanta callarishcapi yachachishcata rimana tucun. Cutillata yapa sanpa tucushcanquichic, sinchi micunata micuna rantimanta, chucu yacuta upiac tucushcanquichic.
58005013	Chucu yacuhuan causaccuna-ca llullu huahua shinami canun, mana yuyayuccuna.
58005014	Sinchi micuna rucucuna micancapac can, taripanata yachaccunapac; alli cashcata mana alli cashcata atipashpa ricuncapac yacharishca canun.
58006001	Shina cacpi, rucu tucunacama catishun, callaricushcapi Cristomanta yachachishcacunata manyanman saquishpa. Ama callaricushcapi yachachishcacunaman cutillata ticrashun, nicpi: shuncupi cuti Diosman ticracrina, huañuiman pushac mana allicuna ruranacunata saquina, Diospi inina,
58006002	bautismomanta yachachishcacuna, iniccuna uma jahuapi maquicuna churana, huañushcacuna causarinata, huiñai taripana imapash.
58006003	Chaitami rurashun Dios munacpi.
58006004	Achicta ña chasquishca huasha, Diospac Samaipi causashpa camaccuna,
58006005	Diospac cushi shimita camaccuna, shamunca racuc pachapac ushaita camaccuna,
58006006	cuti paicuna urmacpi, ña mana Diosman ticrachipaccunachu canun, paicunallata cuti Diospac Churita chacatacushcaraicu, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi asichincapac churacushcaraicu.
58006007	Tamia yacuta tsuncac allpa shina canun: llancaccunata chai allpa alli muyuta cucpi, Diospac bendisionta chasquin;
58006008	ranti chai allpa cashallata cucpi, mana imapash alli can; Dios maldisiashca saquirin, huasha rupachi tucuncapac.
58006009	Llaquishca huauquicuna, chashna rimashpapash, cancunaca quishpina ñanpimi caticunquichic yuyanchic.
58006010	Dios cuscata taripac cashcaraicu, cancuna rurashcata mana cuncarincachu, cancuna paita llaquishcaraicu huauquicunata ininapi yanapashcata, cunancama cancuna chashnallata ruracushcatapash.
58006011	Ranti chashnallata cushihuan tucurinaca-ma rurashpa catincapac munanchic, chashna cancuna chapashca allipacha pactarichun.
58006012	Ama cancuna quillaisiqui tucuncapac-mi munanchic; ashtahuan ininapi purishcamanta, mana sanpayashpa catishpa, Dios cusha nishcata chasquicuccunapac causaita cancana catincapacmi munanchic.
58006013	Dios Abrahanta cusha nishcapi, paipac quiquin causairaicullata sinchi shimita nirca, mana shuc paimanta yalli jatun tiyacpi;
58006014	cashna rimarca: "Ari, ñuca canta achcatami bendisiashca, canpac aillucunata achcatami mirachisha".
58006015	Abrahan mana piñarishpa chaparca, chairaicu Dios cusha niscata pai chasquirca.
58006016	Runacuna sinchi shimita nishpa, paicunamanta yalli ushaiyuc-raicu sinchi shimita ninun; imamantapash sinchi shimita nishpa, chaipi ña mana imamantapash astahuan rimaipac tucun.
58006017	Chairaicu Diospash, pai cusha nishcata sinchi shimihuan nirca; chashna, pai cunca rashcata chasquinca raccunata ricsichinayarca, pai rimashcamanta ña mana shucta ruranca rashcata.
58006018	Shina cacpi ishcai pactachinacuna tiyanun, caicunapi Dios ñucanchicta mana llullana ushan: Cusha nishca, sinchi shimita mshca. Yapa achcami chaica ñucanchic chapashcata tarincapac, tucui imacunata saquiccunata sinchicuchincapac.
58006019	Chai chapana ñucanchic almata sinchi mana cuyuchipac japicun, shuc jillai sillu shuc barcota ama rincapac japicushca shina. Chai chapana, Diospac jahua pachapi tiyac huasipi, mana pi yaicuipac huashamanmi yaicushca,
58006020	chaiman Jesus ñucanchicta ñanta ricuchincapac ñaupac pactarca; chashna pai huiñai causana Jatun Pacri Apu tucushca, Melquisedec cashca shinallata.
58007001	Cai Melquisedec Salemmanta rey, jatun Diospac pacriyaya carca. Abrahan reicunahuan macanacushpa, paicunata yallishca huasha ticramucushcapi, Melquisedec paihuan tuparicrishpa paita bendisiarca;
58007002	chaipi Abrahan pai macanacushcapi tucui japishcamanta ansata paiman curca (diezmo nishcata). Melquisedec shuti "cusca taripac rey" rimanayan; pai Salemmanta rey carca, Salemca "ganas causai" rimanayan, chairaicu "ganas causaita cuc rey" rimanayan.
58007003	Paipac yayamanta, mamamanta, aillucunamanta mana yachai tiyanchu; pai pacarishcamanta pai huañushcamantapash mana rimai tiyanchu; pai Diospac Churipac ricchai can, huiñai pacriyaya cashcapi.
58007004	Cunan yuyarichic ima shina jatunta Melquisedec carca, ñucanchic aulu Abrahan jinu pai reicunahuan macanacushcapi tucui pai quichushcamanta ansata paiman cuncapac.
58007005	Moisespac camachic quillcapi rimashca shina Levipac aillumanta pacriyayacunaman runacuna tucui imacunamanta chuncapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishcata cuna canurca (chai can diezmo), paicunapac aillucana cacllapita, paicuna shinallata Abrahanmanta huahuacuna cacllapita.
58007006	Ranti Melquisedec, mana Levipac aillumanta cashpapash diezmo nishcata Abrahanta mañarca, pai Dios cusha nishca shimita chasquishca cacpipash. Chashna Melquisedec Abrahanta bendisiarca;
58007007	bendisiac runa bendisiai tucucmanta yalli jatun cashcata ricunalla can.
58007008	Cai causaipi, diezmo nishcata mañaccuna huañuna runacuna canun; ranti Dios quillcashca shimipi Melquisedecmanta rimashpa, chaira causacucpi shina riman. Rimacpi, Levipac aillumanta pacriyayacuna, cunan paicuna diezmo nishcata mañac canun; ña paicunapash diezmo nishcata cunushca mari, Abrahan Melquisedecman diezmo nishcata cushcapi;
58007010	rimacpi, Melquisedec Abrahanhuan tupacrishcapi, ña paica aicha ucupi chaira mana pacarishca aillucunata aparayarca mari.
58007011	Levipac aillumanta pacriyayacunapac maquipi IsraeI runacuna camachic quillcata japinurca, paicunaca Aaronpac aillucuna canurca. Chai pacriyayacuna, camachic quillcata caticcunata, pacta runacuna rurana ushashcapi, mana shamuna tucunman carca shuc pacriyaya, ña mana Aaron shina, Melquisedec shina ashtahuan.
58007012	Shuc laya pacriyayacunata churashpa, camachic quillcatapash shuc laya rurana tucun;
58007013	Jesus, tucui chaipi paimanta rimacun, Israel shuc aillumantami can, chai aillumanta mana shuc pacriyaya tiyashcachu.
58007014	Ñucanchic pacta yachanchic Apunchic Juda aillumanta cashcata; chai aillumanta Moisesca mana imatapash rimarcachu, pacriyaya canamanta rimacushcapi.
58007015	Chai ashtahuan yapa pasacta ricuchicun, chai mushu ricurimuc pacriyaya, Melquisedec shina pai cacpi;
58007016	paica mana chai aillumanta yayapacri tucuna quillca rimashcaraicu-chu pacriyaya carca, mana huacllichipac causai ushairaicumi pacriyaya carca.
58007017	Caitami Dios paimanta riman: "Can huiñai pacriyaya causanami canqui, Melquisedec cashca sina".
58007018	Chashnamanta ñaupa rimashca tucurirca, sanpa, mana alli cashcaraicu,
58007019	Moisespac camachic quillca mana imatapash pacta rurarcachu; chai rantimanta shuc alli chapanata charinchic, pairaicu Diosman mayanyanchic.
58007020	Dios sinchi shimi nishcahuan caita curca. Shuc pacriyayacunaca mana sinchi shimi nishcahuanchu shayachish-ca canurca;
58007021	ranti Apunchicmanta rimacpica, shuc sinchi shimi nishcami tiyarca, cai Dios quillcashca shimipi tiyan: "Apunchic shuc sinchi shimita nirca, huashaman mana ticrancachu: Can huiñai pacriyaya canqui".
58007022	Chashnami Jesus, cai cunacushca shimi chaishucmanta ashtahuan alli cashcata ricuyac can.
58007023	Chaishuc pacriyayacuna achca canurca huañuiraicu mana chicapac causana ushashcamanta;
58007024	ranti Jesus mana huañuc cashcaraicu, pai pacriyaya cashcata manapi rana japina ushan pai rantimanta.
58007025	Chashnamanta pairaicu Diosman mayanyaccunata chicapac quishpichinata ushan, paicunaraicu Diosta mañancapac huiñaipac causac.
58007026	Shina, Jesus ñucanchic mutsushca jinu pacriyaya can. Pai chuya shuncuyuc, jucha illac, mana ticllayuc can, juchasapacunamanta chicanyachishca, jahua pachamanta ashtahuan yallipi churashca can.
58007027	Mana chaishuc jatun pacriyayacuna shina can; paicuna huacracunata huañuchina tucan, caran puncha camarita ricuchincapac, paipac juchacuna-raicu, chai huasha tucuicunapac juchacunaraicu. Chaipac rantimanta, shuc cutilla huiñai camarita ricuchirca, paillata camari tucushpa.
58007028	Moisespac camachic quillca mana pactachishca runacanata jatan pacriyayata shayachin; ranti Dios sinchi shimita nishca camachic quillca huasha rurashca cashpa, paipac Churita jatun pacriyayata shayachin, paita huiñai pactachishca cancapacmi rai tucushca.
58008001	Tucui rimacushcamanta ashtahuan jatunmi ñucanchic jatun pacriyaya jahua pachapi Diospac tiyarinamanta yachac maquiman pai tiyarishca;
58008002	chaipi pacriyaya ruranata Diospac quiquin huasipi ruracun, chai huasi Apunchic rurashca can, mana ruracuna rurashca.
58008003	Tucui jatun pacriyaya camarita ricuchincapac shaya-chishca can, chairaicu Jesucristopash charina tucun imallapash ricuchina ushancapac.
58008004	Cai allpapi pai causacushpa, mana pacriyayallapash canmanchu, caipi ña pacriyayacuna tiyanun, Moisespac camachic quillcapi rimashca camanta ricuchincapac.
58008005	Ranti chai pacriyayacana jahua pachapi tiyashca imacunata catichishca shina, llantushca shinallahuan Diosta chacchanun. Yachanchic catichishpa rurashca cashcata, Moises Diospac huasita runanca rashcapi, Dios paita cashna rimashcaraicu: "Allita yuyarishpa ñuca canta urcupi ricuchishcata shina catishpa rurai".
58008006	Ranti ñucanchic jatun pacriyaya, yalli alli Diosta chacchanapi llancashpa, Dios-huan runacunahuan ashtahuan alli cunacushca shimihuan llutachirca, yapa alli cushami nishcacunahuan.
58008007	Ñaupac cunacushca shimi alli cashcapi, mana cuti shuc cunacushca shimi tiyanmanchu carca.
58008008	Ranti Dios chai runacunata mana pactachishcacunata tarishcaraicu, nirca: "Apunchic riman: Israelhuan Judahuan mushu shimi curina punchacunapi pactamununca.
58008009	Cai cunacushca shimi mana paipac rucucunahuan rurashca shinachu canca, paicunata maquimanta japishpa Egipto allpamanta llucshichincapac racushcapi shina; cunacushca shimita paicuna mana pactachishcaraicu, ñuca paicanamanta chicanyarcani, Apanchic riman.
58008010	Chai punchacuna huasha Israelhuan cunacushca shimi caimi canca, Apanchic riman: Ñuca quillcacanata paipac umapimi churasha, paipac shuncupimi quillcasha. Ñucami paicunapac Dios casha, paicunaca ñuca runacunami canunca.
58008011	Apunchicta ricsincapac cancunapura, shuc llactamantapura, aillupura yachachinacancapac mana mutsurincachu, tucuicuna-mi ricsihuanunca, uchillashitumanta ashtahuan yalli jatanca-ma.
58008012	Paicuna mana alli rurashcamanta cuncarishami, mana cuti paicanapac juchacanata yuyarishachu".
58008013	Dios mushu shimi curinamanta rimashpa, ñaupa cunacushca shimi mauca cacpimi chashna riman; ña maucayashpa mana alli cac ansalla pishin chincarincapac.
58009001	Ñaupa cunacushca shimipi ima shimi Diospac huasipi paita chacchana cashcata yachachincapac tiyarca.
58009002	Huasica cashna shayachishcami carca: ñaupacman taber-naculo nishca, chaipi candelabro nishca, shuc mesa Diosman camari shina cushca tantacunantin tiyanurca.
58009003	Huashanipi huarcuchishca llachapa huashapi, chaipi Santisimo nishca carca;
58009004	chaipi shuc curimanta altar sumiriu rupachincapac tiyarca, cunacushca shimita ricuchic arca nishcapash chaillapita carca, tucui pai curilla armachishca. Chai arca ucupi, shuc curimanta uchilla puru tiyarca, chaipi "mana" huacaichishca tiyarca; chaillapita Aaronpac huiñarishca taana cunacushca shimita ricuchic rumi palacunapash canurca.
58009005	Arca jahuapi querubincuna chaipi churashca canurca, Dios chaipi cashcata ricuchincapac, chaicuna paicunapac ricracunahuan arcata quillpaccunata llanturanurca. Ranti tucui chaicunamanta canan ashtahuan rimancapac mana allichu.
58009006	Chashna tucui allichishcapi, tucui pachapi pacriyayacu-na yaicuranun huasi ñaupac panpaman, Diosta chacchanata rurancapac.
58009007	Ranti huashanipi jatun pacriyayalla yaicun, caran huatapi shuc cutilla; pai yaicushcapi huacra yahuarta apana tacun, pairaicullata ranacanapac juchacunaraicupash ricuchinca-pac.
58009008	Chaihuan ñucanchicta Diospac Samai caita atipachin: tanpu ñaupacpi tiyac panpapi Diosta chacchachincapac ruranata pactachicucpi Diospac quiquin huasiman rina ñan chaira mana pascara carca.
58009009	Tucui chaicuna cunan yachachincapac canun; chaipi Diosman ricuchishca camaricuna, Dios cushca ñucanchic ucupitiyac yuyaita mana pactata rurana ushan chashna chacchacunata.
58009010	Upianamanta, micunamanta, shuncu chuyacyachincapac rurashcacunallami canun; chaicunaca ima shina rurana cashcata yachachincapacllami canun; chaicunata pactachina tucun Dios shuc laya ruranacunata rurachinacama.
58009011	Ranti Cristo ña shamurca, cunanca paimi chicapac Dios cuyashcacunamanta jatun pacriyaya can. Pacriyaya shina pai tiyashca Diospac huasica yalli alli, yalli pactami can, chaica mana runacuna rurashcachu can; nicpica, mana cai pachamantachu.
58009012	Ña Cristo Diospac huasipi yaicushca mari, huacra yahuarta ña mana ricuchincachu, chaipica ashtahuan quiquin paipac yahuarta jinumi ricuchinca; shuc cutilla yaicushpapash chicapac yaicushca; chashna, huiñai quishpinata ñucanchipacta tarishca.
58009013	Shutimi cari huacra yahuar, chivo yahuar huarmi huacrata altarpi rupachishca ushpantin, jahuallata chicanyachincapac alli canurca, ticllayuccana jahuapi tallichicpi ushaita charirca paicunata pichancapac.
58009014	Chai chashna cacpi, ¡ima shina ushaita chari Cristopac yahuar charmca! Cristo, huiñai Samairaicu paillata Diosman curirca mana ticllayuc camari shina, paipac yahuarca ñucanchic ucupi tiyac Diospac yuyaita pichan mana alli rurashcaraicu huañuiman rirashcamanta, causac Diosta ñucanchic yanapana ushancapac.
58009015	Chairaicu, Jesucristo paipac huañuihuan, runacuna Dios—huan shuc mushu shimi cushcahuan llutachina usharca, ñaupa cunacushca shimipi juchallishcacuna pichai tucuna ushancapac, Dios cayashcacunapash huiñai paicuna japina cashcata pai rimashca shina chasquina ushancapac.
58009016	Cushca shimi pactachipac tucuncapac, ñaupacta allipacha yachana tucun chai shimita cuc runa huañurcachu imata.
58009017	Cushca shimi mana pactachipacchu tucun, chai shimi cuc runa chaira causacucpi; huañucpi, chai shuti.
58009018	Chairaicu, yahuarta tallichishpa ñaupa cunacushca shimi tiyarca.
58009019	Tucui rurai nishcacunata tucui runacunaman Moises ricsichirca; chai huasha puca huacra millmata, hisopo nishca pallcatapash japishpa, huacra yahuarhuan yacuhuan masachishcapi jucuchishpa, camachic quillca panca jahuapi, tucui runacuna jahuapipash chausichirca.
58009020	Chaipi paicunata nirca: "Cai yahuarmi Dios cancunahuan cunacushca shimita sinchicuchin".
58009021	Chai huasha Moises Dios rurachishca huasi jahuapi tucui imacuna jahuapi Diosta chacchanapi liancacushcacuna jahuapipash yahuarta chausichirca.
58009022	Camachic quillcapi, ñalla tucui imacunata yahuarhuan maillachincapac riman; yahuarta mana tallichicpi, juchamanta quishpma mana tiyan.
58009023	Jahua pachamanta catichishpa rurashcalla imacunata chuyayachincapac chai tucui camaricunata ricuchina tucurca; ranti jahua pachamanta imacunaca chaicunamanta ashtahuan alli camaricunata mutsunun.
58009024	Cristoca mana runacuna rurashca Diospac huasipichu yaicurca, chaica Diospac quiquin huasi cashcata ricuchicllami can; paica quiquin jahua pachapi jinumi yaicurca, chaipi cunan Diospac ñaupacpi tiyan ñucanchicraicu mañancapac.
58009025	Mana achca cuti camari shina curincapacchu yaicurca, jatun pacriyaya rurashca shina, paica Dios rurachishca huasipi yaicushpa chican yahuarta camaripi ricuchin.
58009026	Chashna cashcapi, Cai pacha callarishcamanta achca Cristo huañuna tucunman carca. Ranti cunan pacha tucuricushcapi, Cristo shuc cutilla huiñaipac ricurishca, juchata auchuchincapac paillata camari shina curishpa.
58009027	Tucuicuna shuc cutilla huañununca, chai huasha taripai tucununca;
58009028	chashnallata Cristopash shuc cutilla camari shina ricuchi tucurca achcacunapac juchata pichancapac. Chai huasha, cuti ricurimushpa, ña mana juchacunaraicuchu shamanca, paita chapacuccanata quishpichincapacmi canca.
58010001	Moisespac camachic quillca tucui alli shamunca rashcamanta llantushca shinallami carca, mana shamunca racuc jinu. Chairaicu camachic quillca imata rashpapash mana pactata rurana usharcachu chai camarillata caran huata Diosta ricuchincapac mayanyaccunata.
58010002	Camachic quillca alli shutipacha juchamanta quishpichic cacpi, ña jucha paicunapi mana tiyanmanchu, camari ricuchinata ña saquishcami canunman.
58010003	Ranti cai camaricunaca paicunapac juchamanta caran huata yuyachincapac alli canan;
58010004	huacra yahuar, chivo yahuar, juchacunamanta paicunata mana quishpichinata usharcachu.
58010005	Chairaicu Cristo cai pachaman pactashcapi Diosta rimarca: "Camarita mana munanqui, chaipac rantimanta shuc aichata, cuhuashcanqui.
58010006	Juchata pichancapac rupachishca aichata runa cuyashcacunata mana allihuan ricunqui.
58010007	Chashnapi rimarcani: Caipimi cam, quillcapi ñucamanta rimashca shinallata, can munashcata rurancapac, Dioslla".
58010008	Ñaupa riman: Dios mana munanchu, mana allihuanchu ricun camarita, huañushca huacrata, rupachishca aichatapash juchacanata pichancapac, camachic quillcapi ricuchina rimacpipash.
58010009	Chai huasha yapachin: "Caipi shamuni can munashcata pactachincapac". Nicpi cai can, callarr camaricunata anchuchishpami, chaipac rantimanta shuc mushuta churan.
58010010	Dios ñucanchicta chicanyachishca, Jesucristo paipac quiquin aichata camari shina shuc cutilla Dios munashca shina ricuchishcaraicu.
58010011	Judio pacriyayacuna tucui puncha paicana ruranata pactachin, achca cuti chai laya camarillata ricuchishpa catinan, chaicuna juchamanta mana llushpichina cacpipash.
58010012	Ranti Jesucristo shuc cuti juchacunaraicu shuclla camarita ricuchirca, chai huasha Diospac yachac maquiman tiyarirca.
58010013	Chaipi chapacun Dios paita chinicunata paipac chaqui samana ruranacama,
58010014	shuc camariraiculla huiñai pactata rurarca Diosman chicanyachishcacunata.
58010015	Diospac Samai cai shimita ashtahuan sinchicuchin, caita rimashpa:
58010016	"Chai punchacuna huasha ñuca paicunahuan cunacushca shimi, caimi canca, Apunchic riman: Paipac shuncupimi ñuca quillcacunata churashpa, paipac umapica quillcashami.
58010017	Paicunapac juchamanta, paicuna mana alli rurashcamanta mana cuti yuyarishachu".
58010018	Shina, juchacunamanta quishpichishca cashcaraicu, ña camari ricuchina mana tiyana can.
58010019	Chashnamanta, huauquicuna, Jesucristopac yahuar-raicu mana manchashpa cunan Diospac huasiman yaicuna ushanchic,
58010020	mushu ñanta catishpa, paillata jarcata rishpa pascashca causaita cuc ñanta, nicpi, paipac quiquin aichata rishpa.
58010021	Jesusmi ñucanchic jatan pacriyaya, Diospac huasipi ricuccama can;
58010022	chairaicu cusca shuncuhuan, inina sinchi charishccahuan Diosman mayanyana canchic, ñucanchic ucupi tiyac Diospac yuyai sumac chuya ñucanchic aichapash chuya yacuhuan sumacta maillarishca.
58010023	Inina chapana charishcapi, sinchi tucushpa, mana ishcai yuyariscahuan catishun, Dios pai chapana charishcapi, sinchi tucushpa, mana ishcai yuyarishcahuan catishun, Dios pai cusha nishcata pactachina cashcaraicu.
58010024	Llaquinata ashtahuan charincapac, allicunata rurancapac tucuipura yanaparishun.
58010025	Ñucanchic tantarinacunaman ama pishiyashun, maicancuna pishiyashca shina, ashtahuan tucuipura cariyashanchic; tucuipura ashtahuan cariyashca tiyachun Apunchipac puncha mayanyashcata ricushcaraicu.
58010026	Shuti cashcata ricsishca huasha, munashpa jucha Cashcata ruracpi, ashtahuan camari mana tiyanchu ña;
58010027	manchaipac taripanallata, Diosta piñaccunata ñacachishpa rupachic ninallatami chapana tucushun.
58010028	Maicanpash Moisespac camachic quillcata mana uyashpa juchallishcapi, ishcai quimsa ricuyac paita cautsayachincapac tiyacpi, mana ansallapash llaquishcahuan huañuchi tucun.
58010029	¿Diospac Chu-rita jaitashcaraicu, paipac yahuarta chicnishcaraicu, paicunata llaquic Diospac Samaita piñashcaraicu, ashtahuan pishilla ñacachinatami charinuncamichu yuyanquichic? Chai yahuarmi cunacushca shimita sinchicuchic can, chai yahuarhuan chican-yachishca paicuna tucunushca.
58010030	Apunchic caita rimashcata yachanchic: "Ñucami taripasha, ñucami canata cusha". Caita-pash rimashca: "Apunchicmi paipac runacunata taripanca".
58010031	¡Causac Diospac maquipi urmana manchaipacmi can!.
58010032	Ranti yuyarichic cancuna callari pachapi, cancuna achicta mushu chasquishcapi ñacarinacunata sinchi tucushpa yallircanquichic.
58010033	Cancunamanta maicancuna, runacuna ñahuipi piñai tucushpa macai tucurcanquichicpash; cuti shuc-cunaca, chashna rurai tucuccunahuan ñacarinapi llutarinurca.
58010034	Chunta curralpi quillparaccunamanta cancuna llaquirircan-quichic, cancuna charishcacunata cushiyashcahuanpash quichui tucurcanquichic, jahua pachapi tiyashca ashtahuan alli, mana tucuric cashcata yachashpa.
58010035	Cancuna chapashcata ama jichuichichu, paica alli cuyanatami cancunaman apamunca.
58010036	Smchicuna canquichic cancuna ñacarina tiyashcapi, Dios munashcata rurashpa, chashna pai cushami nishcata chasquincapac.
58010037	Camachic quillca caita mari nin: "Utca, cunanshitumi shamunca racuc pactamunca ran. Mana anayancachu.
58010038	Ñuca jucha illac runa ininaraicu causanca; ranti huashaman ticracpi, ña mana llaquishcahuan paita ricushachu".
58010039	Ñucanchicta, mana huashaman rishpa chinca-ricchu canchic, inina charishcaraicu quishpinaman pactaccuna-mi canchic.
58011001	Inina charina canmi, chapashcata allipacha japmca rashcata yachana; ñucanchic mana ricushca imacunata, alli shutipacha ricushca cacpi shinami charina.
58011002	Inina charishcaraicu Dios alli llaquirca ñucanchic aulucunata.
58011003	Yachanchic inina charishcaraicu Dios cai pachata paipac shimihuan rurashcata, tucui cunan ñucanchic ricucushca, mana ricurishcamanta rurai tucurca.
58011004	Inina charishcaraicu, Cainmanta ashtahuan alli camarita Abel Diosman ricuchirca, chairaicu Dios paita jucha illac shinata chasquirca, paipac camaricunatapash chasquirca. Shina, Abel huañushca cashpapash, pai inina charishcahuan cananpash ñucanchicta chaira yachachicun.
58011005	Inina charishcaraicu, Enoc causacushcallapita ama huañuncapac pushai tucurca; ña paita mana tarinurcachu, Dios pushashcaraicu. Dios quillcashca shimipi nin, chaira mana pushai tucushcapi, Enoc Diospac ñaupacpi alli cashcarca.
58011006	Ranti, inina mana charishpa Diosta mana cushiyachipacchu can, Diosman mayanyancapac pai causashcata paita mashcaccunata cuyac cashcatapash inina can.
58011007	Inina charishcaraicu Noe, Dios paita chaira mana ricuipaccuna shamunca rashcata rimacpi uyashpa, tucui paipac aillucunata quishpichincapac jatun canoata rurarca. Chai inina charishcaraicullata, cai pachamanta ranacanata cautsayachishpa, paica inina charishcamanta quishpinata tarirca.
58011008	Inina charishcaraicu, Abrahan Dios cayacpi uyashpa Dios paiman cunca rashca allpaman rirca. Paipac allpamanta llucshishpa maiman rirashcata mana yachashpapash rirca;
58011009	inina charishcaraicu Dios paita cushami nishca allpapi chican runa shina causarca. Chai cusha nishcata cui tucuc Isaac, Jacob shina, paipash tanpucunapi causarca,
58011010	Abrahan sinchi sapicunahuan shayachishca llactata chapashcaraicu; chai llactamanta amu, quiquin shayachic Diosllata can.
58011011	Inina charishcaraicullata, Sara huahuata mana charina ushashpapash, Abrahanpash yapa rucu cacpi, paica ushaita chasquirca yaya tucana ushancapac, Dios mana pishiyashpa pai cusha nishcata pactachinapi inishcaraicu.
58011012	Shina Abrahan, ña paipac punchacuna tucurina mayanlla cacpipash mana yupaipac achca aillucunata charirca, jahua pachapi ricuric cuillurcuna shina, ñucñu yacu patapi tiyac tiyu shina.
58011013	Tucui cai runacuna Dios cusha nishcata mana chasquishpa huañanurca; ranti inina charishcamanta, carumanta ricunurca, paicunata yapa yuyarinurca. Chaipi paicunallata atipanurca cai pachapi chican puricuc shinalla paicuna cashcata.
58011014	Chaita chashna rimaccunaca quiquin mama—allpata mashcashcata ricuchinun.
58011015	Paicuna llucshishca allpamanta chaira yuyaricushca cashpa, maillapash chaiman ticrana ushanunman carca;
58011016	ranti paicuna ashtahuan alli mama-allpata munanurca, nicpi, jahua pachata. Chairaicu Dios mana pincarin paicunapac Dios rimai tucuna, paica shuc llactata allichishcata mari paicunapacta charin.
58011017	Inina charishcaraicu, Abrahan, Dios paita camashcapi, Isaacta camaripi paita ricuchincapac japirca. Paipac shuclla churita Diosman camaripi mana mitsashpa ricuchina yuyaita charirca, Dios paita rimashca cacpipash:
58011018	"Isaac-raicumi canpac shutihuan catic aillucunata charinqui".
58011019	Abrahan alli pacha mari yacharca Dios huañushcacunatapash causachina ushai charishcata; chairaicu Abrahan churita causac cutichi tucurca; chashna pai shuc unancha shina tucurca.
58011020	Inina charishcaraicu, Isaac huasha pachapi bendisioncu-na tiyancami Jacobta Esauntin rimarca.
58011021	Inina charishcaraicu, Jacob, pai ña huañunca rashcapi, caran Josepac churicunata bendision tiyancami nishpa shimita curca, Diostapash chaccharca paipac taunahuan sinchicurishpa.
58011022	Imna charishcaraicu, Jose pai huañucushcapi, Israel runacuna Egipto allpamanta huasha llucshinuncami rimarca, paipac tullucunata ima rurana cashcata chaipi rimarca.
58011023	Inina charishcaraicu, Moises pacarishcapi, yaya mama paita quimsa quilla tuputa pacanurca; sumac huahua cashcata ricushcaraicu, mana manchanurcapash jatun curaca cari huahuacanata huañuchina rimashca tiyacpipash.
58011024	Inina charishcaraicu, Moises ña rucu cashcapi, Egipto-manta jatun curacapac ushushipac churi rimai tucuncapac mana munarca;
58011025	ashtahuan Diospac runacunahuan pacta macai tucushpa causanata munarca, mana unayana cushiyaita juchata rurashpa charina rantimanta.
58011026	Dios acllashca cashpa, ñacarina ashtahuan yapa alli cashcata ricurca Egiptomanta cullquihuan sumac causana rantimanta; Dios cuyaita paiman cuna cashcapi ñahuita churashpa causashcaraicu.
58011027	Inina charishcaraicu, Moises Egipto allpamanta llucshirca, rey piñarina cacpipash mana ansa manchashpa; pai yuyarishcallata rurashpa causarca, mana ricuric Diosta ricucuc shina.
58011028	Inina charishcaraicu, Moises Pascua raimita rurarca, chaipi huasi puncucunata yahuarhuan jahuichirca, huañuchic angel Israelmanta ñaupac pacaric huahuacunata ama shucllapash llancancapac.
58011029	Inina charishcaraicu, Israel runacuna Puca Ñucñu Yacuta chaquishca allpa cacpi shina chaquihuan catinurca; huasha, egipciocuna chashnallata rina munashpa, yacupi huañanurca.
58011030	Inina charishcaraicu Jerico llactamanta rumi quinchacuna tularinurca, Israel runacuna quincha mayanta canchis puncha purishcapi.
58011031	Inina charishcaraicullata, nuspa huarmi Rahab, mana uyaccunahuan mana huañurca, Israelmanta pacalla ricuccamacunata alli chasquishcaraicu.
58011032	¿Chaira rimana tiyanchu? Gedeonmanta, Baracmanta, Sansonmanta, Jeftemanta, Davidmanta, Samuelmanta, profetacunamanta rimancapac yapa achcami yachihuan.
58011033	lnina charishcaraicu llactacunata amuyanurca, cusca taripaita charinurca, Dios cushami nishcata chasquinurca, pumacunapac shimita quillpanurca;
58011034	sinchi ninacunata huañuchinurca, mircanuhuan cuchui tucushpa huañunamanta quishpinurca, sanpayashcamanta ushaita surcushpa macanacuipi sinchi tucunurca, paicunata piñaccunata achca cacpipash yallinurca.
58011035	Maican huarmicuna paicunapac huañushca aillucunata cuti causarimushcata tarinurca. Shuccunaca ñacachi tucushcamanta quishpichinca ninucpi, mana munashpa, ashtahuan chaipi huañunurca, ashtahuan alli causanaman causarinata munashpa.
58011036	Shuccunaca asi tucunata, llipachishcata, jillai huascahuan huatai tucushpa, quillpai tucushpa ñacarinurca.
58011037	Shuccunaca rumihuan huactachishca huañunurca, chaupica serruchuhuan aichata piti tucushpa, mircanuhuan cuchui tucushca imapash huañunurca; caiman chaiman purishcapi oveja carallahuan, chivo carallahuan churarishcacuna puric cachanurca; llushticuna, llaquirishca, tucuicuna macashca.
58011038	Cai runacuna, shuti pacha rimacpi, mana cai pachapi causanachu canurca, paicuna maiman rirashcata mana yachac purinurca chunlla allpata, urcucunata, allpa jutcucanata, mai allpa huasicanata.
58011039	Shina cacllapita, paicunamanta manapi Dios cusha nishcata chasquircachu, paicuna inina charishcaraicu alli llaquishcacuna cashpapash;
58011040	Dios ñucanchicta yuyarishca-raicu, ashtahuan allita ruranca rarca, ñucanchic-huan llutarishpalla pacta runacuna tucanuchan.
58012001	Chairaicu ñucanchic, chai tucui inina chariccuna ucupi tiyashpa, tucui ñucanchicta quillachicucmanta, ñucanchicpi llutarisiqui juchamantapash chausirishun, mana Sanpayashpa callpashun ñucanchicta chapacuc camai tucunapi.
58012002	Ñucanchic ñahuita Jesuspi churashan, paimantami ñucanchic inina shamun, paimi chai ininata pacta ruran. Jesus cruspi ñacarirca, chashna huañuna pincaipac cacpipash mana pincarishpa; pai yaCharca, ñacarishca huasha sumacyachina, cushiyana charina cashcata; chai huashaDiospac tiyarinamanta yachac maquiman tiyacun.
58012003	Chashnamanta, Jesus ricuchishcapi yuyarichic, jucha-sapacunamanta chai tucuita ñacarirca; chairaicu cancuna ama sanpayaichicchu.
58012004	Cancuna juchahuan macanacushcapi chaira huañunaman mana pactashcanquichicchu,
58012005	Dios cancuna paipac churicuna cacpi camachishcata cuncarishcanquichic mari. Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Huahua, Apunchic yachachishpa rimacpi, paita uyai, pai canta piñacpipash ama sanpayaichu.
58012006	Apunchic pai llaquishcatami yachachishpa camachin, churita shina chasquishpami ñacachin".
58012007	Ña-cachishcata cancuna allihuan chasquicpimi, Dios cancanata churita shina ricunca. ¿Maican churillaca yayapacpi mana piñai tucuc tiyanchu?
