58012008	Ranti Dios cancanata mana tucui paipac churicanata shina piñashpa camachicpi, cancuna mana quiquin paipac churicunachu canquichic, huaira huahuacunami canquichic.
58012009	Chairapash rimacpi, ñucanchic chaira huahua cashcapi, cai allpapi ñucanchic alliyancapac yayacuna piñanurca, ñucanchicca paicunata uyarcanchic. Cunan, ñucanchic jahua pachamanta Yayata causaita charmcapac uyana ashtahuan yapa alli mari can.
58012010	Ñucanchic yayacuna cai pachapi mana unayana causaita causacushcapi alliyancapac camachinurca, paicana munashca tuputa; ranti Dios ñucanchic quiquin allipac camachin, pai shina chuya shuncuyuc tucuchun nishpa.
58012011	Alli shuti pacha rimacpi, tucui ñacarina mana pacha allichu ñacaricushcapi jinu, nanac can; ranti allita yuyarishcapi, ñacachi tucushcaraicu ganas causaita tupashpa, pai jinu cuscayan.
58012012	Chashnamanta, cancuna sanpayashca maquicunata, chucchuricuc cuncuricunata sinchicuchichic,
58012013	cusca ñanta mashcaichic, jancayashca chaquita janpichun ama ashtahuan quihuirincapac.
58012014	Tucuicunahuan alli causaichic, chuya causaita charichic; mana chuya shuncuta charishpa, mana pipash Apunchicta ricuna ushancachu.
58012015	Allita ricuichic ama pitapash Diospac cuyai pishichun, ama pipash jayac sapiyuc yura shina, runata huacllichic, janpihuan huañuchic cancapac.
58012016	Cancunamanta ama pipash yumashpa juchallichun, Diosman chicanyachishcata ama chicnichun; chaita Esau rurarca, shuc micunaraiculla pai ñaupac pacaric churi cashcaraicu japinata caturca.
58012017	Cancuna yachanquichic huasha, yayamanta bendisionta pai chasquina munashcapi, millai tucurca; pai mashna huacacpipash, ña chashna tucushcamanta mana imatapash ruraipac tucurca.
58012018	Cancuna mana mayanyarcanquichic, israelitacuna shina, chai urcuman; llancaipac cashpallata, nina japirarca, chaipi tuta, yana tuta, sinchi huaira tiyarca;
58012019	trompeta uyarishcata, Diospac shimitapash cancuna mana uyarcanquichic. Chai shimita uyaccuna ama rimashpa catichun nishpa mañanurca,
58012020	cai pactachinata mana ashtahuan uyashpa catina ushashcaraicu: "Pipash urcupi chaquita churacpi, rumihuan huactachishpa, tucsinahuan imapash huañuchinami can, huacra cacpi imapash".
58012021	Ricuricuc yapa manchaipac cashcamanta, Moisesllata cashna nirca: "Mancharishpami chucchucuni".
58012022	Cancuna chaipac rantimanta, Sion urcuman mayanyashcanquichic, causac Diospac llactaman, jahua pachamanta Jerusalenman, Diosta chacchancapac huaranca huaranca angelcuna tantarishcaman,
58012023	jahua pachapi shuticanata quillcachishca chari Diosmanta ñaupac pacaric churicuna tantarishcaman. Cancuna Diosman mayanyashcan-quichic, tucuicunata Taripacman, alli runacunapac Dios pactachishcata rurashca samaicunapacman,
58012024	mushu shimi cunacushcata rurac Jesuspacman, pai jichushca yahuarman, chai yahuar Abelpac yahuarmanta ashtahuan allita ñucan-chicman yachachin.
58012025	Chairaicu Dios ñucanchicman rimacpi, ama pacha chicninata yuyarinquichicchu. Cai pachapi tiyashcapi Dios paicunata cayacpi mana uyashcamanta, mana pacha quishpi-nurcachu. Ashtahuan ñucanchic mana quishpina ushashunchu, pai jahua pachamanta cayacpi mana uyashpa.
58012026	Chai unai pachapi, Diospac shimi allpata chucchuchirca, ranti cunan nin: "Cutillata mana allpallatachu chucchuchisha, jahua pachata-pash chucchuchishami".
58012027	'Cutillata' rimashpa, caipi atipana canchic pai rurashca cuyuchipaccunata anchuchinca ran, mana cuyuchipacmi saquirinca.
58012028	Dios ñucanchicman cushca pacha mana cuyuchipac can. Pacrachushun chairaicu, Diosta chacchashun allipacha paita yuyarishcahuan, pai manashca shina.
58012029	Ñucanchic Dios tucuita rupachic nina shina cashcaraicu.
58013001	Huauquipura shina llaquinacunata ama saquinqui-chicchu.
58013002	Cancuna huasiman pactaccunata llaquishca-huan chasquichic; chashna rurashpa, mana yachashpallata maicanpi angelcunata maicancuna chasquinurca.
58013003	Chunta curralpi tiyaccunamanta yuyarichic, chunta curralpi cancunapash paicunahuan tiyacushca shina. Macai tucushpa ñacariccanamanta yuyarichic, cancanapash chashnallatami rurai tucana ushanquichic.
58013004	Sahuarinata tucuicunata yupaichaichic, sahuarishcapi cuscata causaichic; yumashpa juchalliccunata Dios taripanca, shucpac carihuan shucpac huarmihuan causaccunatapash.
58013005	Cullquita ama yapalla munaichichu; charishcallahuan cushi causaichic, Dios cashna rimashcaraicu: "Maican punchapash canta mana saquishachu, canta mana jichushachu"
58013006	Chairaicu cariyashcahuan caita rimana ushanchic: "Apunchic ñucata yanapac can; mana manchashachu. ¿Runa imallapash rurana ushahuancachu?"
58013007	Pushaccunamanta cancunata Diospac shimita yachachic-cunamantapash yuyarichic; causaipi paicuna cashcata yuyarichic, paicuna ima shina inina charinurca chaita cancunapash catichic.
58013008	Caina, cunan, huiñai Jesucristo chaillata can.
58013009	Ama chican, mana ricsishca yachaicunata catinquichicchu. Ñucanchic shuncucuna Diospac llaquinapi sinchicurishcami ashtahuan alli can micunacunata imana micuna cashcata yachashpa catina rantimanta; chai imana micuna cashcata catina manapi ranata yanaparcachu.
58013010	Chican laya camarita ñucanchic charinchic, chai camarunanta callaripi tiyac Diospac huasimanta pacriyayacuna mana micuna ushanun.
58013011	Jatun pacriyaya huacra yahuarta Diospac huasiman, juchacunata pichancapac camari shina apan, ranti chai huacracuna aichaca canchamau rupachi tucun.
58013012	Chashnallata, Jesuspash llactamanta canchaman huañuchi tucurca, runacunata paipac quiquiu yahuarhuan chicanyachinca-pac.
58013013	Shinacpi, Jesus-huan llactamanta canchaman llucshishun, chaipi pai shinallata pincachishca ñacarishun.
58013014	Cai pachapica huiñai causana llactata mana charmchicchu, ashtahuan huasha tiyanca racuc llactatami mashcacunchic.
58013015	Chairaicu Jesucristoraicu Diosta huiñai chacchana canchic. Cai chacchashca ñucanchic ricuchina camarimi can. Shinacpi, paita chacchashunchic ñucanchic shimicunahuan.
58013016	Yanapanata ama cuncarinquichicchu, tucui cancuna charishcata shuccunahuan chaupichinata ama cuncarinquichic-chu; chashna ricuchishca camaricunatami Dios alli ñahuihuan rican.
58013017	Pushaccamacunata uyaichic, paicanata catina canquich-ic, cancanata paicuna mana samashpa ricurashcaraicu, paicuna cancunaraicu Diospacpi taripai tucuna mari canun. Paicuna ru-ranata cushihuan pactachinuchun, mana llaquirishcahuan; pai-canata llaquichicpi, cancunapac mana imapapash allichu canca.
58013018	Ñucanchicraicu Diosta mañaichic, ucupi tiyac Diospac yuyaita cushitami charinchic, tucuipi alli cana munashcaraicu.
58013019	Cancuna Dios-huan rimarishcapi paita yapa mañancapac munanimi, ñuca cuti cancunahuan tiyacrincapac Dios utcalla manachun.
58013020	Ganas causaita cuc Dios Apunchic Jesusta huañushcamanta causachirca; ovejacunapac Jatun Michic can Jesus, huiñai cunacushca shimita yahuarhuan sinchicuchishca-manta
58013021	cancunata tucuipi pactachishca, allicunata rurachun, pai munashcata cancuna pactachincapac; Apunchic Jesucristo-raicu, pai munashcata ñucanchicmanta rurachun. Cristo huiñai jatanyachishca cachan. Chashna cachun.
58013022	Huauquicuna, cai cariyachic ñuca cancunaman quill-cashca shimicanata casilla shuncuhuan chasquipaichic rimani.
58013023	Uyaichic: ñucanchic huauqui Timoteo chunta curralmanta ña llushpirishcami; utcalla shamucpi, pushamushami cancuna-ta ricunca riscapi.
58013024	Cancunapac pushaccamacunata yuyarinimi rimapaich-ic, tucui Diospac runacunatapash. Italiamantacuna cancuna-manta yuyarinunmi.
58013025	Tucui cancuna jahuapi paipac cuyaita Dios tallichi-chun.
59001001	Ñuca, Santiago, Diospac Apunchic Jesucristopacpash runa, Israelmanta chunca ishcai miraicunata, tucui pachapi chausuishca causacuccanata yuyarini.
59001002	Ñuca huauquicuna, cancana yapa cushiyana canquichic tucui llaquicunahuan camai tucushcapi.
59001003	Cancuna ña pacta yachanquichic, ima shina inina charishcapi camai tucushpa, llaqui tiyashcapi sinchicushpa ñacarincapac yachacunquichic.
59001004	Shina cashpapash, chai sinchicushca cancunata pactachishca tucunacama pushachun, allipacha rucuyanaman, mana imapash cancuna pishishca.
59001005	Cancunamanta pitapash yachai pishicpi, Diosta mañachun, paica cuncami; Diosca tucuicunamanmi mana mitsashpa, mana ansapash piñashpa cun.
59001006	Ranti inina charishcahuan mañana tucan cui tucunata allipacha chapashcahuan; ishcaita yuyaric runa ñucñu yacumanta bacu shinami can, huairapi caiman chaiman tancai tucun.
59001007	Chai laya runa, Apunchicmanta japishami ama yuyachun;
59001008	cunan caita, caya chaishucta yuyarishcaraicu paipac causaipipash mana shucllata catin.
59001009	Tsuntsu huauqui Dios paita jahuayachicpi jatun yarichun;
59001010	tucuita charicpash jatunyarichun Dios paita uchillayachicpi. Tucuita charic runa quihua sisa shina mana unai huañuc cashcaraicu.
59001011	Inti llucshishpa sinchita rupachicpi, quihua chaquirin; paipac sisa urmacpi, pai sumac ricuriscushca tucurin. Chashnallatami tucuita charic runa pai charishcacana ucupi chincarinca.
59001012	Camai tucushcapi sinchicuc runa cushiyachan, camai tucunamanta yallishpa causaitami cuyai tucunca, chaimi Dios paita Ilaquiccunata cusha nishca llautu can.
59001013	Pipash mana allita rurancapac aisai tucushpa, ama Diosmi mana allita ruran-capac aisahuan yuyachun, Diosca mana ansallapash mana alli ruranata yuyarishcaraicu, mana pitapash mana allita rurancapac manapacha aisancachu.
59001014	Chaipac rantimanta, amupac mana alli munaicunata mana allita rurancapac aisanun, paicunami munachiranun, paicunami rurachinun.
59001015	Chai mana alli mu-naicunamanta juchatiyan; ranti jinu juchamanta huañui tiyan.
59001016	Ñuca llaquishca huauquicuna, ama umarinquichicchu:
59001017	tucui alli, tucui pacta cac ñucanchicman cushca, jahuamanta shamun, jahua pachapi ricuric tucui cuillurcunata rurac Diosmanta shamun. Dios huiñai paillata can: pai shuc laya tucucpi llantushca mana tiyanchu.
59001018	Pai, chashna munashcaraicu, shuti shimiraicu ñucanchicman causaita curca, tucui pai rurashcacanamanta ñucanchic ñaupaccana cancapac.
59001019	Caita yuyaripaichic, llaquishca huauquicuna: tucui cancana uyanalla chapacana canquichic, ranti allimanta rimana, allimanta piñarina canquichic.
59001020	Piñarishca runa mana mari Dios munashcatachu ruran.
59001021	Chashnamanta, tucui ticllayucta maitapash juntarac mana alli ruranata saquishpa, cancuna shuncupi tarpushca cushi shimita uchilla shuncuyashcahuan chasquichic; chai cushi shimi cancunata quishpichincapac ushaita charinmi.
59001022	Ranti chai cushi shimita uyanalla mana pactachu can; pactachinami can, mana chashna rurashpa cancunallatami umachiricunquichic.
59001023	Pipash cushi shimillata uyashpa mana pactachicpi, rirpupi ñahuita ricuric runa shinami can:
59001024	amullata ricurin, ranti huashaman tucushpa pai imana cashcata cuncarin.
59001025	Ranti uyashcata mana cuncarishpa, pacta cac camachic quillcata allita ricuc, chai camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishcamanta sinchicushpa causashpa, pai rurashcahuan cushimi causanca.
59001026	Pipash inina caticmi cani amullata yuyarishpa, ranti paipac calluta mana jarcana ushashpa, amullata umaricun, paipac inina yanca can, mana imapash alli.
59001027	Chuya inina, mana ticllayuc inina Dios Yayapac ñaupacpi caimi can: Huaccha huahuacunata, huaccha huarmicunata paicuna llaquirishcapi yanapana, cai pachamanta ticllahuan mana ticllayana.
59002001	Cancuna, ñuca huauquicuna, jatunyachishca Apunchic Jesucristopi iniccuna cashpa, runacunata mana chican chican ricana canquichic.
59002002	Cancuna tantarishcapishi shuc rana maquipi curimanta shihuiyuc yaicunman, sumac churanayuc, cuti shuc tsuntsu runapash mapayashca churanahuanshi yaicunman.
59002003	Cancunaca sumac churarishcata ricushpa rimanquichic: "Cai ñaupacpi tiyari". Ranti tsuntsutaca: "Canca chaiman shayari, mana cacpi, chai allpapi tiyari", rimanquichic;
59002004	ña chashna rurashpa cancunapurallata chicanyachicanquichic, mana alli yuyaihuan taripacanquichic.
59002005	Ñuca llaquishca huauquicuna, caita uyapaichic: cai pachamanta tsuntsucunatami Dios acllashca, ininapi tucuita chariccuna cancapac, paita llaquiccunata pai cusha nishca pachata shuc japina cashcata shina chasquincapac;
59002006	ranti cancuna paicunata millanquichic. ¿Manachu cullquisapacuna cancuna charishcata quichuccuna canun?, ¿paicunallata apucunapac ñaupacman manachu cancanata aisashpa pushanun?
59002007	Cancuna jahuapi rimashca Cristopac sumac shutita, ¿manachu paicuna piñac canun?
59002008	Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina, tucuicuna-manta yalli camachic quillcata pactachishpa, allita ranquichic: "Shuccunata can quiquinta llaquishca shinallata llaquinqui".
59002009	Ranti runacunata chican chican ricushpa, juchata ruranquichic, cautsayashca saquirinquichic Dios rurai nishca ñaupacpi.
59002010	Shuc runa tucui camachic quillcata uyashpallata, ranti shuclla pactachinata mana pactachishpa, cautsayashca tucun camachic quillcamanta tucui chaishuc pactachina ñaupacpi.
59002011	"Shucpac carihuan shucpac huarmihuan ama causanquichu" rimac Diosllata "Ama huañuchinquichu" rimarca. Shina, shucpac carihuan shucpac huarmihuan mana causashpallta, ranti huañuchishpaca, ña mana uyan camachic quillcata.
59002012	Quishpichina apamuc camachic quillcapi taripai tucunca racuccuna shina rimana canquichic, chashna causanapash canquichic.
59002013	Shuccunamanta llaquirinata mana chariccuna, paicunapash mana llaquirishcahuanchu taripai tucununca; ranti shuccunamanta llaquiricunaca taripai tucushcapi atishpami llucshinunca.
59002014	Huauquicunalla, ñucanchic rurashca mana alli cacpi, ¿inina charinimi rimaipacchu tucushun? ¿Chashna inina paita quishpichinata ushancachu?
59002015	Shuc huauquita shuc panita imapash chai puncha churarincapac, chai puncha micuncapac pishicpi
59002016	cancunamanta pipash: "Alli richic, rupaclla churarishpa rinquichic, tucui cancuna manashcata micunquich-ic" rimashpallata, tucui paicunapac aicha mutsushcata mana cucpi, ¿chashna rimana imapallash allichu canca?
59002017	Inina charishcapi chashnallata tucun: Pai sapalla, nicpi, rurashcahuan mana ricuchicpi, huañushca can.
59002018	Pipash rimanca imapash: "Can inina charinqui, ñucaca rurashcacanata charini". Mana rurashcacunahuan can inina charishcata ricuchihuai, ranti ñuca, rurashcacunahuan ñuca inina charishcata ricuchisha.
59002019	Can shuclla Dios tiyashcata ininqui, allita ruranqui; chashnallata supaicunapash ininunmi, manchaimantalla chucchunun.
59002020	Ama upa caichu, yuyarina canqui inina rurashcacuna illac yanca inina can.
59002021	Dios, ñucanchic aulu Abrahanta jucha illac shinata chasquirca, pai paipac churi Isaacta camaripi ricuchishcaraicu.
59002022	Abrahan tucushcapi ricuna ushanqui, pai inina charishcata rurashcacuna-huan ricuchirca, rurashcacunahuan ricuchishcaraicu paipac inina pactachishca tucurca.
59002023	Chashnami Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca pactarirca: "Abrahan Diosta inirca, chairaicu Dios jucha illac shinata paita chasquirca" Abrahan chashna Diospac mashi rimai tucurca.
59002024	Ña cancuna ricunquichic, Dios runata chasquin pai rurashcacunaraicu, mana pai inina charishcaraiculla.
59002025	Nuspa huarmi Rahabhuanpash chashnallata tucurca; pai rurashcacuna-raicu Dios jucha illac shinata paita chasquirca, shimita ricsichishpa puriccunata paipac huasipi chasquishcaraicu, shuc ñanta rmcapac yanapashcamanta.
59002026	Rimacpi: Aicha samai illac huañushca cashca shinallata, inina huañushca can rurashcacuna illacpi.
59003001	Huauquicunalla, cancuna ucupi ama yapalla achca yachachiccuna tiyanuchun, cancuna pacta yachanquichic ima shina yachachiccamacuna yalli sinchita taripai tucuna cashcata.
59003002	Tucuicuna achcapi pantanchic, maicanpash pai rimashcapi mana pantashpa, pactachishca runami can, paipac aichatapash cuscata charina ushac.
59003003	Caballo huacracunata ñucanchicta uyancapac paipac shimipi freno nishcata churashcapi, tucui paipac aicha ñucanchicta uyancapac chashna ruranchic.
59003004	Barcocunapipash ricuichic: Jatun cacllapita, paita tancac huairacanapash sinchicuna cacllapita, cuscachaccamacu-na, shuc uchilla timón nishcahuan, paicuna munashcata pushanan.
59003005	Calluhuanpash chashnallata tucun; tucui aicha-manta shuc uchilla aichashitu can, ranti chashna cashpallata achcata ushan pai. Ansalla ninashituhuan jatun sachata rupachipac mari.
59003006	Calluca shuc nina can. Ñucanchic aichapi churashca mana alli jinumi can, tucui ñucanchic aichata ticllayachin. Ucu pachamanta ninallahuanta japichishca can, pai ñucanchic causaitapash chai ninallahuanta rupachicun.
59003007	Runaca ima pumacunatapash, pishcucanata, machacuicunata, ñucñu yacumanta aichacunata, imacunatapash yallina ushashca-mi;
59003008	ranti pipash calluta yallincapac mana ushashcachu. Mana yallipac uncuimi can, huañuchic janpihuanpash juntachishcami can.
59003009	Calluhuan cunanshitu ñucanchic Yaya Diosta bendisian-chic, chashnallata cunanshitu maldisianchic Diospac ricchai shina paillata rurashca runata.
59003010	Chai shimimantallata bendisioncuna, maldisioncunapash llucshinun. Huauquicanalla, caica mana chashna canachu can.
59003011	Shuc yacu llucshirashca-mantallata mishqui yacu, jayac yacu llucshinata mana ushanchu.
59003012	Shuc higuerayura aceituna muyuta mana aparina ushashca shina, shuc uva sapi higo muyuta aparina mana ushashca shina, chashnallata huauquicunalla, cachi yacu llucshicushcamanta mishqui yacu mana llucshincachu.
59003013	Cancuna ucupi shuc yapa yachac, alli atipac tiyashpa, pai causashcahuan ricuchichun yapa yachashca cushca uchilla tucunahuan.
59003014	Ranti chiquicui cancuna shuncuta jayacyachin-capac saquicpi, imatapash shuccanata piñashcaraiculla rurash-pa, chaipi mana imamantapash jatunyarmata ushanquichicchu, chairapash cancunaca llullacunquichicmi.
59003015	Chai yachai mana Diosmanta shamuc mari can, cai pachamanta yachaimi can, runapac yuyaimanta, supaimanta jinu.
59003016	Chiquicuicuna tiyashcapi, piñanacuna tiyashcapi, tucui mana allicunapash tiyanun;
59003017	ranti Diosmanta shamuc yachaita chariccuna, chuya causaita charinun; casi shuncuyuc canun, alli shun-cuyuccuna, alli uyaccuna canun. Shuccunamanta llaquiriccuna canun, cuscata taripac, shutita rimac, allicunata ruraccuna.
59003018	Alli causaita mashcaccuna alli causaihuan tarpunun cusca taripanata pallancapac.
59004001	Cancunapura yapa piñanacana, macanacuna ¿imamanta tiyashcata yachanquichicchu? Aicha ucupi cancuna mana alli munaicunata charishcamantami canun.
59004002	Cancuna imatapash munashcapi, mana tarina ushashpa huañuchin-quichic, imamantapash chiquicuita charinquichic, mana tarina ushashcamanta macanacunquichic, cancanapura yapa piñanacui tiyan. Diosta mana mañashcaraicu cancuna munashcata mana tupana ushanquichic;
59004003	paita mañashpapash, mana cui tucunquichic mana allita mañashcaraicu, cancunaca munanqui-chicmi cancuna aicha munashcapi tucuchincapac.
59004004	¡Auca ranacuna! ¿Cai pachahuan mashiyashpa Dios-huan piñarishca tucunata manachu yachanquichic? Pipash cai pachahuan mashi tucushpa, Diosta piñac tucun.
59004005	Mana yancachu Dios quillcashca shimipi caita nin: "Dios ñucanchic ucupi churashca samaita tunpashcahuanmi llaquin".
59004006	Yanapanapi Diosta mana pipash yallinchu, Dios quillcashca shimipi caitapash yapachin: "Dios jatunyariccunata piñan, ranti uchillayaccunata paipac cuyaita cun".
59004007	Shinacpi Diosta uyaichic. Supaita ama uyai-chicchu, chaimi paica cancunamanta anchurinca.
59004008	Diosman mayanyaichic, chaimi paipash cancunaman mayanyanca. ¡Juchallishca cashpa cancuna maquita maillarichic. ¡Cancunapac shuncuta chuyayachichic, Diosta cai pachatapash llaquina munac canquichic!
59004009	¡Llaquirina canquichic, huacana canquichic! ¡Cancuna asishca huacai tucuchun! ¡Cancuna cushiyashca llaquirina tucuchun!
59004010	Apunchipac ñaupacpi uchilla tucucpimi, paica cancunata jatunyachinca.
59004011	Huauquicuna, cancunapuramanta mana alli shimita ama rimaichicchu. Paipac huauquimanta mana allita rimashpa, taripashpa imapash, camachic quillcamanta mana allita rimacun, paita taripacun. Camachic quillcata taripashpa, paita uyana rantimanta paita taripac tucunqui.
59004012	Camachic quillcata cuc shucllami tiyan, paillata Taripac can, quishpichinata ushan huañuchinatapash ushan; ranti canca, ¿shucta taripancapac imallapash canquichu?
59004013	Cunan caita uyaichic, cancuna caita rimaccana: "Cunan cashpa, caya cashpa imapash chai llactaman, chaishucman imapash rishun, chaipi achca cullquita catushpa japishun shuc huata chaipi unayashun",
59004014	¡caya paicuna causai ima tucunca rashcata ansallapash mana yachanun! Cancuna shuc puyu cunanshitu ricuri ashtanipi chincaric shina canquichic.
59004015	Cashna rimana mari: "Apunchic munacpi, causacushpa caita chaishuctapash rurashunmi".
59004016	Ranti jatunyarishpa rimashca-pi cancuna atinquichic, tucui chashna jatunyarina mana alli can.
59004017	Pi-pash allicunata rurana yachashpallata mana rurashpa, juchallin.
59005001	¡Cancuna cullquisapacuna, caita uyaichic! ¡Achca llaquicunata ñacarinca racushcaraicu huacaichic, capari-chic!
59005002	Cancuna achca charishca ishmushcami can; cancuna churana susu micushcallami can.
59005003	Cancunapac cullqui, cancunapac curi huacarishcami, chai huacarishcaca cancuna cashcata ricsichic canca, nina shina rupachishpami cancunata tucuchinca. Cai punchacunapi achca cullquita tantachinushca, caicuna puchucai punchacunami canun.
59005004	Cancunapac muyuta pallac runacunaman mana cushca cullqui, caparishpa cancunata cautsayachicun; tucui ushac Dios chai muyuta pallac runacuna caparishcata uyashcami.
59005005	Cai pachapi cancuna sumac cancuna aicha mañashcata rurashpa causashcanquichic, huacra shina huirayashpa; ¡ñami pactacun huañuchina puncha!
59005006	Mana juchayuccanata cautsayachishpa huañuchishcanquichic, quish-pmcapac paicuna mana imallapash ruracpipash.
59005007	Ranti cancuna, huauquicuna, casi shuncuhuan chapai-chic Apunchic shamunacama. Ricuichic ima shina allpata llan-caccana paicuna yapa chapashca muyuta, mana piñarishpa cha-pana tucunun tamia pacha tucushcapi.
59005008	Cancuna ama piñarichicchu, sinchicuichic, utcalla Apunchic ticramuna cashcaraicu.
59005009	Huauquicuna, cancanapura mana alli rurashcacunata ama rimaichicchu, ama taripai tucuncapac; Taripac Dios ñami pancupi can.
59005010	Ñuca huauquicana, Apanchicpac shutipi rimac profetacana ñacarishcata, paicuna mana piñarishcata catina canquichic.
59005011	Smchicushcahuan llaqui tiyacpi ñacariccunata cushimi canun ninchic. Cancuna uyashcanquichic ima shina Job llaqui tiyashcapi sinchicurca, cancuna yachanquichic ima shina Apunchic paita huasha ricurca, Apunchic yapa llaquinayuc, yapa llaquiric cashcaraicu.
59005012	Ama pacha sinchi shimita rimaichicchu, huauquicuna-lla: jahua pacharaicu, cai pacharaicu ama imaraicupash. Cancu-na "Ari" rimashcapi, ari cachun. Cancuna "Mana" rimashcapi, mana cachun, Dios cancunata ama cautsayachincapac.
59005013	Cancunamanta maicanpash llaqui charishpa, Dios-huan rimarichun. Pipash cancunamanta cushi cashpa, Diosta jatunyachincapac taquichun.
59005014	Maicanpash uncuc cashpa, inic rucucunata cayachan, pairaicu Diosta mañanuchun, Apunchic-pac shutipi huirata jahuinuchun.
59005015	Inina Dios-huan rimarish-capi tiyacpi, uncuc alliyancami, Apunchicca paita jatachinca; pai juchata charicpi, quishpichishcami saquirinca.
59005016	Chai-raicu, cancuna juchallishcata shucman rimaichic, cancunapura-manta Diosta mañaichic alliyachi tucancapac. Sinchi inishpa chuya shancuyuc runa Diosta mañashca yapa ushaita charin.
59005017	Profeta Elias ñucanchic shina runa carca, pai ama tamiachun nishpa sinchi inishpa Dios-huan rimaricpi, quimsa huata chaupi cai allpapi mana tamiarca.
59005018	Huasha, cuti Dios-huan rimarishcapi, cutillata tamiarca, allpaca muyuta curca.
59005019	Ñuca huauquicuna, pipash cancunamanta shuti cashcamanta chicanyacpi, shuc runa chaimanllata cuti ticrachicpi,
59005020	cancuna yachana canquichic, maicanpash juchasapa runata pai mana alli puricushcamanta alliman ticrachicpi, huañuimanta quishpichin, paica achca juchacuna-manta quishpichi tacun.
60001001	Ñuca, Pedro, Jesucristopac apostol, mama-llactamanta llucshishpa Pontopi, Galaciapi, Capadociapi, Asiapi, Bitiniapi chausirishca causaccunaman cai pancata quillcani,
60001002	Yaya Dios pai munashca shina paicunata acllashcarca. Diospac Samaraicu, paita uyancapac, Jesucristopac yahuarhuan maillashca cancapac cancunata chicanyachishca. Diospac cuyaita ganas causaita achcata chasquipaichic.
60001003	Apunchic Jesucristopac Dios Yayata chacchashun, pai ñucanchicmanta achca llaquirishpa Jesucristo huañushcamanta causarishcaraicu, ñucanchicta cuti pacarichishca. Chai ñucanchicta ashtahuan chapanapi sinchicuchiu.
60001004	Chairaicu-llatami Dios jahua pachapi japina cashcata huacaichishpa charishcata chasquinquichic; chai mana huacllina ushanchu, mana ticllayancachu, mana huañurincachu.
60001005	Cancuna Diospi inina charishcaraicu, paipac ushaihuan cancunata pai ricun pai allichishca quishpinata tupana ushancapac, chaitaca puchucai pachacunapimi ricsichinca.
60001006	Chairaicu cancuna cushihuan juntarishca tiyanquichic, shinapash allimi canca yachihuan cancana ansa camai tucanata charicpi.
60001007	Cancunapac inina curi shina cashcaraicu, pai alli cashcata ninahuan camai tucuna can. Camai tucushcapi sinchicuc inina curimanta ashtahuan yapa alli can, curica huacllichipac can. Chashna camai tucushca cancunapac inina, alli ricui tucushcami canca, jatunyachishca canca, jahuayachishca canca, Jesucristo shamucpi.
60001008	Jesucristota cancuna mana ricushca cashpapash, paita llaquinquichic; cunanpash, paita mana ricushpallata paipi inishpa, manarimaipac cushiyaita charinquichic cancana jatun, jahuayachishca cushiyaihuan cushiyanquichic, chaitaca shimihuan mana rimana ushanquichicchu,
60001009	cancunapac causaita quishpichishcaraicu; cancunapac inina chaiman pactancapacmi can.
60001010	Ña callari pachallapita profetacuna cai quishpinamanta mashcanurca, tapunurca, Dios pai yapa alli shuncuyucmanta cancunaman cunca rashcamantapash rimanurca.
60001011	Cristopac Samai profetacunata Cristo ñacarina cashcata ricsichic carca, chai huasha jatunyarina tiyana cashcatapash; paicunaca mashcaranurca chai runa maicanta can, ima pachapi pactarinatata paicanapi tiyac Samaica rimacurca.
60001012	Ranti Dios ima shina paicuna runacunaman yachachicushca mana paicunapaclla, ashtahuan cancunapac allipac cashcata ricsichirca. Cunan, quishpina shimita cancunaman apamuccuna jahua pachamanta cachamushca Samaipac ushairaicu cancana-man caicunata ricsichinushca. ¡Chaicunata angelcunallata ricana munanunman!
60001013	Chairaicu, allichishca cana canchic, tucui yuyaihuan causashpa. Jesucristo ricurimushcapi Dios yapa alli shuncumanta canca rashcata tucui cancuna chapaita churaichic.
60001014	Uyac churicuna cashpa, chaira Diosta mana ricsishcapi cancuna munashcata rurashpa causashca shina ama causaichicchu.
60001015	Chaipac rantimanta, allipacha chuya shuncyac tucusbpa causaichic, cancunata cayac Dios sumaimana cashcaraicu;
60001016	caita Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Ñuca sumaimana cashcaraicu, cancunapash sumaimana caichic".
60001017	Caran runata pai rurashcamanta, mana chican chican ricushpa taripac Diosta "Yaya" rimashpa, cancana cai pachapi causacunacama paita yupaichashcata ricuchina canquichic.
60001018	Cancuna aulucunamanta chasquishca yanca causanamanta Dios quishpichishca mari; cancuna pacta allita yachanquichic ima shina mana curitachu, mana cullquitachu cai quishpina-manta cuna tucurca, tucui chaicuna huacllic canun;
60001019	Cristopac sumac yahuartami cuna tucurca, pai mana huacllishca, mana ticllayuc cordero shina camaripi ricuchishca carca.
60001020	Cai pacha chaira mana rurai tucushcallapita Cristo chashna tucuncapac rimashca carca, ranti cai puchucai pachacunapi cancunapac allipac ricurimushca.
60001021	Cancuna Cristoraicu Diospi ininquichic, pai paita huañushcamanta causachirca, jatunyachirca; chashnamanta cancuna ininata, cancana chapanata Diospi churashcanquichic.
60001022	Cunan cancuna, shuti shimi rimashcata pactachishpa, cancunapac causaita chuyayachishcanquichic alli shuti pacha huauquicanata llaquincapac. Chashnamanta chuya shancuhuan, tucui ushaihuan cancunapura llaquinacuna canquichic.
60001023	Cuti mari cancuna pacarishcanquichic, cai cuti ña mana huañuc yayamanta, mana runa yayamanta, ashtahuan Diospac shimimanta, pai mana chincarishpa huiñai causan.
60001024	Cashna Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Tucui runa quihua shina can, pai jatun cashpapash quihua sisa shina can. Quihua chaquirin, sisaca urman.
60001025	Ranti Apunchicpac shimica chicapac causan". Cai shimi quishpichic shimimi cancanaman ricsichi tucushca.
60002001	Chashnamanta, tucui mana allicunata jichuichic, tucui laya umachinata, jahualla ricurishcata, chiquicuita tucui laya caminatapash.
60002002	Llullu huahua shina, mana masachishca Diosmanta shamuc chucu yacuta mashcaichic, cancuna pairaicu huiñana ushancapac, quishpmata charincapac,
60002003	alli shuti pacha Apunchic alli cashcata atipashca cashpa.
60002004	Shina, Apunchicman mayanyaichic, paica runacuna mana allichu nishca causac rumimi can; Diospacca ranti acllashca, yapa alli rumi can.
60002005	Cancunapash causac rumi shina Diospac nuasi shayachinapi canquiChic, pacriyayacuna tucushpa, Jesucristopi sumac camaricunata ricuchic, Diospac ñaupacpi alli caccuna.
60002006	Chairaicu Dios quillcashca shimipipash nin: "Sionpi ñuca shuc rumita churani, tucuimanta ashtahuan alli rumi, acllashca, sumac; paipi yuyaita churac mana umachishca saquirincachu".
60002007	Cancuna iniccunapac chai rumi alli can; ranti mana iniccunapacca, Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca pactarin: "Huasita shayachiccana jichushca rumi huasita sapiyachic rumi tucushca".
60002008	Caitapash shucpi nin: "Shuc rumi paicuna nictancapac". Cushi shimita mana uyashcamanta paicuna nictanun: chashnapac urmancapac rashca canurca.
60002009	Ranti cancunaca acllashca aillu canquichic, Diosta yanapac pacriyayacuna, chicanyachishca runacuna, Dios rantishca runacuna. Cai chashna can Dios sumac rurashcacunata cancuna ricsichincapac, pai tuta ucumanta paipac sumac achicman cancunata llucshichirca.
60002010	Cancuna ñaupa mana paipac runacuna carcanquichic, ranti cunan Diospac ranacuna canquichic; ñaupa Dios cancunamanta mana ansapash llaquirircachu, ranti cunan shuti llaquirinmi cancanamanta
60002011	Llaquishca huauquicuna, mana cai pachamanta cashpa riracllacuna cacpimi, cancunata mañani, samaihuan macanacuc mana alli munaicunata ama cancunapi chasquichicchu.
60002012	Diosta mana ricsiccunapac ñaupacpi cusca purichic. Chashnami paicuna, cunan millai runata shina piña-cushpapash, cancuna alli rurashcata ricushcamanta Diosta chacchanunca pai tucuicunata taripana pancha.
60002013	Apunchicraicu, tucui cai pachamanta apucunata uyaichic: incata tucuimanta yalli jatun apu cashcaraicu;
60002014	huainarucunataca, mana alli ruraccunata ñacachincapac, alli ruraccunata jahuayachincapac, Jatun Apu cachamushcacuna cashcaraicu.
60002015	Dios cancuna allicunata rurancapac munan upa runacuna yuyai illaccunantin cancunata imamantapash ama cautsayachincapac.
60002016	Quishpira runacuna shina causaichic, mana shuc runacuna shina quishpirami canchic rimashpapash juchata pacancapaclla quishpiramanta rimanun. Chaipac rantimanta Diospac runacana shina causaichic.
60002017	Tucuicunata paicana yupachai tucuna tuputa yupachaichic, huauquicunata llaquichic, Diosta manchaichic, mcata yupachaichic.
60002018	Huataracuna, tucui yupaichashcahuan cancuna amucu-nata uyaichic alli shancucunata, cancunata sumac chariccunata; chashnallata mana alli, millaicanatapash.
60002019	Mana juchallishca cashpapash ñacarina alli can Diosta llaquishcaraiculla.
60002020	Cancuna mana alli rurashcamanta ñacachi tucushcapi, casi shuncuhuan ñacarishpa, ¿imallapash cui tucuna tiyanchu? Ranti alli rurashcamanta ñacarina charishcapi, mana piñarishpa ñacarina, chai shuti alli can Diospac ñaupacpi.
60002021	Chaipac mari Dios cancunata cayarca, Cristopash cancunaraicu ñaca-rirca, pai rurashcata catishpa pai purishcata rincapac.
60002022	Cristo mana shuc cutillapash juchallircachu, maipipash mana pita umachircachu.
60002023	Piñai tucushcapi, mana piñashpa paipash cutiparcachu; pai ñacachi tucushcapi "huashami yachahuanquichic" mana rimacchu carca, ashtahuan quiquinraicu Diosta mañac carca, pai cusca taripac cacpi.
60002024	Cristollata crusman sicashpa ñucanchic juchacunata paipac aichapi aparirca; juchapac ñucanchic huañushpa, cusca causaita causancapac. Paipac chucrishcacunaraicu cancana alliyachishca saquirircanquichic.
60002025	Chincarishca ovejacuna shina ñaupa cancuna puricurcanquichic, ranti cunan Cristoman ticrashcanquichic; pai shuc michic shina cancunata ricun cancanapac causaitapash.
60003001	Cancana, cariyuc huarmicuna, caricunata uyaichic, mana miccuna cushi shimita uyac tucunuchun, mana rimashcata uyashcaraicu, ashtahuan cancunapac causaita ricushcamanta,
60003002	cancunapac chuya, sumac causaita paicuna ricushcamanta.
60003003	Cancuna sumacyashca ama jahua ricuriclla cachun, yapalla sumac ñaccharishca, curimanta huallcarinacu-nata huallcarishpa, sumac churanacunata churarishpa imapash.
60003004	Ashtahuan shuncu ucumanta llinpiyamuchun mana chincaric sumacyashca, nicpi, sumaclla, casi shancuhuan causaimanta. Cai sumacyashca Diospac ñaupacpi yapa alli can.
60003005	Cai sumacyashcallahuanmi callari pachapi chuyac shuncuyuc huarmicuna sumacyanurca; paicuna Diospi chapashcamanta paicunapac carita uyanurca.
60003006	Sara chashna carca, Abrahanta uyarca pai, paita "ñuca apu" rimarca. Cancunaca paipac ushushicunami canquichic, alli ruraicunata rurashpa, mana imatapash manchac cashpa.
60003007	Cancunamanta nicpi, huarmiyuc caricuna, huarmicunapac causaita atipashpa causana canquichic. Chashnallata paicunata llaquina canquichic, mana cuyailla paicunata charina cashcaraiculla, ashtahuanpash alli shuncuyuc Dios paicunamanpash cushami nishca cancunaman cuna causaillatata. Chashna ruraichic, chaimi cancuna mañacpi Dios mana unayashpa canca.
60003008	Tucuicuna shuclla yuyaihuan causaichic, shuc yuyaillapi huancurishpa, huauquipura shina llaquinacushpa. Alli shuncuyuc, uchilla tucushpa causaichic.
60003009	Mana alli rurai tucushcapi, canpash ama chaillahuata cutichinquichu; piñai tucushcapi ama piñashcahuan cutichinquichu. Chaipac rantimanta bendisionta cutichinqui, Dios cancunata bendisionta chasquincapac cayashcaraicu.
60003010	"Pipash alli shutipacha causaita llaquishpa, cushi causanayashpa, paipac calluta mana allicunata ama rimachichun, paipac shimita ama llulla shimita rimachichun;
60003011	mana allimanta anchurishpa allicunata rurachun, alli causaita mashcashpa paita catichun.
60003012	Apunchic chuya shuncuyuccunata ricun mari, pai mañashcacunatapash uyanmi; ranti millai runacunata piñacmi can".
60003013	¿Pipash cancunata huacllichina ushancachu cancuna allipacha munashpa jinu allillata ruracpi?
60003014	Ranti cuscata rurashca jahuallapita ñacarinata charishpa, achcata cancuna cushiyaichic. Ama mancharinquichicchu, ama pitapash manchaichicchu,
60003015	ashtahuan Cristota jatunyachichic Apunchicta shina cancuna shuncupi. Cancuna charishca chapanamanta maicanpash tapucpi, atipachina shimihuan cutipana ushancapac huiñai allichishca chapacuna canquichic,
60003016	shinapash uchillayashpa, yupaichashpa ruraichic. Alli causaichic, cancunapac ucupi tiyac Dios cushca yuyai chuya cachun, Cristota inishcaraicu cancuna alli causashcamanta piñaccuna, paicuna rimashcamantallata pincarinuchun.
60003017	Dios chashna munacpi, alli rurashcamanta ñacarishca ashtahuan alli can mana alli rurashcaraicu ñacarina rantimanta.
60003018	Shuc cutilla, huiñaipac, quiquin Cristollata ñucanchic jucharaicu huañuita ñacarirca. Pai allimi carca, ranti mana allicunaraicu ñacarirca Diospacman cancunata pushancapac. Runa cashpa, huañurca; ranti samaimanta cashcaraicu, causaiman cuti ticrarca.
60003019	Samaimanta cashcaraicullata, quillpashca tiyac samaicunapacman rishpa quishpinata huillarca.
60003020	Paicuna mana uyac runacuna canushcarca Noe causashca pachapi, Dios casi shuncuhuan barco tucuhinacama chapacushcapi; chaipi maican runacuna quishpinurca, tucuimanta nicpi pusac runa yacuraicu quishpichic tucunurca.
60003021	Chai yacu bautismo yacu ricchai carca, cunan pairaicu quishpirchishca canchic. Bautismoca mana aichata maillancapacchu, ucupi tiyac Diospac yuyai chuya tucuchun mshpa mañancapacmi can; pai ñucanchicta quishpichinmi Jesucristo huañushcamanta causarishcaraicu;
60003022	pai jahua pachaman sicashpa Diospac yachac maquiman tiyan, paipac maquipi angelcuna, tucui ushaita charic samaicunapash, uyancapac saquirinushca.
60004001	Chairaicu Jesucristo paipac aichapi ñacarishca shina, cancanapash ñacarinalla chapacuna canquichic. Pipash paipac quiquin aichapi ñacarishca cashpa pai ña juchamanta chicanyashca mari,
60004002	puchucai punchacuna Dios munashca shina causancapac, mana runa munashca shina.
60004003	Unaita cancunapash Diosta mana ricsiccuna rurashca shinallata rurarcanquichic, mana alli yachashcacunapi, mana alli munaicunapi, machanapi, cuinacta micushpa, yallicta upiashpa, jirus huacacunata chacchashpa causarcanquichic.
60004004	Canan, cancunapash ña mana paicunahuan mana alli ruranapi satiracpimi, chai paicunata mana alli yachicpimi, cancunata piñanun.
60004005	Shinapash Diospacpi paicuna taripai tucuna canun, pai yapa allichirishca chapacun causac runacunata huañushcacunantin taripancapac.
60004006	Ña huañushcacana cushi shimita ricsichi tucanurca mari, samaipi causaita charincapac Dios munashca shina, runacuna yachaipi cai pachapi paipac aicha taripai tucushca cashpapash.
60004007	Tucui imacuna tucurina ña mayanlla can. Chairaicu cancuna tucui yuyarishcahuan causana canquichic, alli shuti pacha Dios-huan rimarinapi catishpa.
60004008	Cancunapura llaquinacushca yapa tiyachun, llaquinacushca achca juchacunamanta quishpichic cashcaraicu.
60004009	Cancunapura huasipi chasquinacuichic, mana pimantapash camishpa.
60004010	Dios chai tucui cushca cuyaicunata alli ricuccuna cashpa, caranlla amu chasquishca cuyaihuan shuccunata yanapachun.
60004011	Pipash rimashcapi, paipac shimi Diospac shimi shina cachun. Pipash shuc yanapaita rurashcapi, Dios cushca ushaihuan yanapachun. Tucui imatapash rurashcapi, Dios Jesucristoraicu chacchai tucuncapac ruraichic, huiñai paipac cachan jatunyarishca, ushai. Chashna cachun.
60004012	Llaquishca huauquicuna, ama mancharinquichicchu yapalla manchaipac cacpi shina, camana ninapi camai tucushpa.
60004013	Chaipac rantimanta, cushiyaichic Cristohuan ñacaricushcaraicu, pai jatunyashca ñucanchicman ricurishcapi ñucanchicpash cushihuan juntarincapac.
60004014	Cushiyaichic pipash Cristoraicu cancunata piñacpi, jatunyachishca Diospac Samai huiñai cancunahuan cashcaraicu.
60004015	Cancunamanta maicanpash ñacaricushcapi, ama runata huañuchishcaraicu, ama shuhuashcaraicu, ama shuccunapac llaquipi satirishcaraicu cachun.
60004016	Ranti Cristota catishcaraicu ñacarishpa, mana pmcarmachu, chairaicu ashtahuan Diosta chacchachan.
60004017	Diospac aillumanta jinu taripai callarina pacha ña pactashcami. Ñucanchicmanta chashna taripana callaricpica, ¿ima chari rucunca ranun Diospac cushi shimita uyanata mana munaccuna?
60004018	Racuimanta chuya shuncuyuc runa quishpinata charicpi, ¿millai runa, juchasapa runa, paicuna chari ima tucununca?
60004019	Chairaicu, Dios munashca shina ñacariccuna allicunata rurashpa catina canun, paicunapac samaira paicanata huiñachic Diospac maquipi churana canun; paica shimita pactachicmi can.
60005001	Canan, cancunapac pushaccamacunata camachinayani, ñucapash pushaccama cani; Cristo ñacarishcamanta ricuyac cani paicuna shinallata; ñucapash chasquinca rani jatunyana ñucanchicman ricurimucpi.
60005002	Cancunaman mincash-ca Diospac ovejacunata ricuichic; munashpa jinu ruraichic Dios munashca shina; mana pactachina cashcaraicu, mana cullquiraicu. Tucui shuncuhuan cancuna llancanata ruraichic,
60005003	mana cancunaman mincashcacunapac amu shina, ashtahuan cancunapac causaihuan yachachina yuyaihuan.
60005004	Chashna shuti, michiccunapac Amu shamucpi, jatunyachic llaututa chasquinquichic, mana huañuric llautu.
60005005	Chashnallata, cancuna huanpracuna, rucucunata uyaichic. Tucuilla uchillayashpa shuccanata uyana canquichic, cairaicu: "Jatunyashcacunata mana allihuan Dios ricun, ranti uchillayaccunata Dios pai alli shuncu cashpa yanapan".
60005006	Tucuita ushac Diospac maquipi uchillayaichic, paipac jahuayachina pactashcapi cancuna jahuayachi tucuncapac.
60005007	Tucui llaquicunata Diospac maquipi churaichic, pai cancanata ricucun mari.
60005008	Yuyayuc caichic, ricuralla causaichic cancunata piñac supai, yaricaihuan puricuc puma shinami, tuparishcata micuncapac mashcashpa puricun.
60005009	Sinchi inina charishpa, sinchicuichic, tucui pachapi shuc huauquicuna chashnallata ñacarishcata yuyarishpa.
60005010	Shinapash unainayata cancuna ñacarishca huasha, cancunata pactata Dios ruranca, mana cuyuric, sinchi, ña quishpishcacuna canquichic. Yapa llaquishcamanta cancunatapash Crisropi pai huiñai jatunyashcata chasquincapac cayac Diosllatami can.
60005011	Ushai huiñai paipacmi can. Cashna cachun.
60005012	Silvanohuan, ñuca paita allita ricsishcaraicu, cai pancata cancunaman quillcani, cancunata camachincapac, cancuna chasquishca bendisioncuna Dios allipacha llaquishca-raicumi rimancapac. Chai llaquinapi ama sanpayashpa causaichic.
60005013	Babiloniapi tiyac miccunata Dios acllashca cancunata acllashca shina; paicuna cancunata yuyarinunmi, ñuca churi Marcospash yuyarinmi.
60005014	Huauquipura muchanacuichic. Cancuna Cristopac cashcaraicu, ganas causaita charichic.
61001001	Ñuca, Simon Pedro shutiyuc, Jesucristopac runa, paipac apostol, cancunaman cai pancata quillcani, cancunapash ñucanchicpac Dios Quishpichic Jesucristo cusca taripac cashcaraicu, ñucanchic sumac inina charishca shinallata charishcanquichic.
61001002	Achca Diospac cuyaita, achca alli causai-tapash chasquichic Apanchic Dios Jesustapash ricsishcamanta.
61001003	Dios paipac ushaihuan ñucanchic causancapac, paita yuyarishpa causancapac tucui mutsushcata ñucanchicman cushca; tucuimanta ñaupa ñucanchicta ricsichirca paipac quiquin ushaihuan, paipac jatunyaihuan cayac Cristota.
61001004	Caicunaraicu pai cusha ñishcacunata ñucanchicman curca, chaicuna yapa jatun, yapa alli canun; chaicunaraicu cancuna Diospac causaita ansata charina ushancapac, cai pachaman mana alli munaicuna apamushca huacllinamanta quishpinca-pac.
61001005	Chashnamanta cariyana canquichic ininata alli causaihuan yapachincapac; alli causaita, atipanahuan;
61001006	ati-panata, amu munashca shina quiquin aichata purichinahuan; amu munashca shina quiquin aichata purichinata, casi shuncu canahuan; casi shuncu canata, Diosta yuyarishpa causanahuan;
61001007	Diosta yuyarishpa causanata, huauquipura llaquinacunahuan; huauquipura llaquinacunata, llaquinahuan.
61001008	Caicunata cancuna charishpa ashtahuan huiñachicpi, cancuna causai Apunchic Jesucristota cancuna ricsishcapash mana yancachu canca.
61001009	Ranti caicunata mana charicca mana ricuc ñausa shinami can; paipac ñaupa juchacunamanta pichai tucushcata cuncarishca mari.
61001010	Chairaicu huauquicuna, Dios cancunata cayashpa acllashcaraicu, tucui caicunata cancunapi sapiyachichic; chashna rurashpami mana maican punchapash urmanquichic.
61001011	Chaipi shuti Apunchic Quishpichic Jesucristopac huiñai pachamanta puncucuna pascashca cancunapac saquirinunca.
61001012	Chairaicumi cancunata huiñai chaita yuyachishpa catina cani, cancuna alli yachashpa, shuti cashcata ñuca yachachishcapi cancuna sinchicushpa causacucpipash.
61001013	Ñuca causacushpa, cai camachinacunahuan cancunata yuyachishpa quillachicunami cani yachihuan.
61001014	Mana unai cai causaita ñuca saquina cashcata Apunchic Jesucristo ricsichihuashcami;
61001015	shinapash sinchi yuyaitami churasha yuyani cancuna ñuca huañushca huashapash caicunamanta yuyarincapac.
61001016	Chashnamanta, cancunaman ricsichishcanchic Apun-chic Jesucristopac ushaita pai ticramuna cashcatapash, mana umachincapac surcushca shimicunahuan, ñucanchic quiquin ñahuillahuanmi Apunchic jatunyashcata ricurcanchic.
61001017	Dios paipac Yaya paita jatunyachina, jahuayachina cushcapimi ricur-canchic, Diospac shimi chashna jatunyashcahuan paita rimash-capimi ricurcanchic: "Caimi ñuca llaquishca churi, paitami acllashcani".
61001018	Ñucanchicllata chai jahua pachamanta shamuc shimita uyarcanchic, Apunchic-huan mari urcupi carcanchic.
61001019	Chairaicu, profetacuna rimashcapi yalli sinchita inin-chic, alli cashcaraicu cancuna paicanata yuyarinquichic. Chai cushi shimi shuc chinpusu tutapi punchayachishca shinami can; punchayashcapi tutamanta cuillur llucshishpa cancuna shuncuta ricuchincapac shamunacama.
61001020	Tucui imamantapash yalli caita yuyarishpa causaichic: Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca mana pipash quiquin amu munashca shina chaipi rimashcata atipana ushanchu,
61001021	profetacuna maipipash mana paicuna munai rimashcaraicu; ashtahuan paicunaca Diospa-raicumi rimanurca, Diospac Samai ricsichicpi.
61002001	Israel llactapi llulla profetacunapash tiyanurca; chashnallatami llulla yachachiccunapash cancana ucupi tiyanca. Yanca rac shinami paicunapac huacllichic yuyaicunata yachachinunca, chashna rurashpa paicunata quishpichic Apunchicta "mana" rimaranan; chashna rurashcahuan chicapac huañuita utcalla paicunaman cayaranun.
61002002	Achca runami paicuna mana alli yachaipi caticushcata catinunca, paicunarai-cullatami shuti ñanmanta mana alli rimai tiyanca.
61002003	Paicuna yapalla cullqui manashcamanta, llulla yachachishcacunahuan-mi cancuna cullquita quichananca; shinapash mana quishpipac chicapac huañuna paicanata chapacun, unaimantami paicunaca ña cautsayachishca canan.
61002004	Juchallic angelcunata Dios mana quishpichircachu, ashtahuan ucu pachaman paicunata cacharca, tutapi paicunata saquirca, taripana pactanacama jillai huascahuan huatashpa huacaichiracuna.
61002005	Ñaupa runacunatapash Dios mana quishpi-chircachu, ashtanuan huanuna yacutami chai mana alli ranacana jahuapi cachamurca; Noe shuclla quishpichi tucurca, cusca causanamanta pai yachachirca, canchis runapash quishpircami.
61002006	Sodoma, Gomorra llactacunata Dios huacllichishpa chincachirca, ushpa tucunacama rupachishpa, huasha shamunca rac mana alli runacunata ricuchinaraicu.
61002007	Ranti Lotta quishpichirca, pai chuya shancuyuc runa carca; chairaicu llaquirishpa causacurca chai millai runacuna mana lli yachashcahuan causacpi.
61002008	Chuya shuncuyuc paicuna ucupi causacuc runa, paipac shuncupi ñacarirca tucui puncha mana alli rurashcacunata ricushpa, mana allicunata uyashpa.
61002009	Paiman curishpa causaccunata Apanchic quishpichinata yachanmi, taripana pancha pactanacama mana allicunatapash ñacachishpa charina yachanmi pai.
61002010	Ticllayachic munaicunata caticcunata, Apunchicta mana uyaccunata, Dios ashtahuan yapami ñacachinca. Jatunyarisiqui canun; yupaichana illac runacuna, ima aputapash piñanunlla;
61002011	ranti angelcanaca, yalli ushaita charishpapash, Apunchicpac ñaupacpi mana ansallapash piñaita yuyananchu.
61002012	Huihuacuna shina canun chai runacuna: yuyai illac canun, causai tiyashcaraiculla causanacun, maipi tupai tucushpa huañuchi tucuncapaclla pacarinun. Imamantapash mana atipashpa, mana alli shimita rimanun; shinapash huihuacuna shinallatami huañununca,
61002013	shuccunata ñacachish-camanta ñacarishpa. Mana unai tucuric cushiyaicunahuan cushiyashpa, cushimi causanchic yuyanun. Pincaipac, piñaripac canun, raimipi cancunahuan cashpa, paicuna yachai cushiyashpa.
61002014	Shuc huarmita huañupashpa ricushpallami paicuna cananca; jucha ruranapi mana sanpayanun. Mana sinchicushca runacunata juchallichinun; cullquiman yapa llutarishca canun; maldisiashca runacuna canun.
61002015	Cusca ñanmanta anchurishca-raicu, pantashpa puriranun. Beorpac churi profeta Balaampac causaita catinun, mana alli rurashcahuan cullquita pai japinayarca,
61002016	pai juchallishcamanta piñai tucurcami: paipac huihua runacuna shina rimancapac callarishpa, paipac nuspa yuyaipi mana ñaupacman catichirca.
61002017	Yacu illac allpapi allashca pucru shina canun chai yachachiccuna; huaira tancacushca puyu shina canun; yana ucupi huiñai causancapac cautsayachishca canun.
61002018	Yapa sumac uyaric, yuyai illac shimicunata rimanun, mana alli yachashcacunahuan, aicha mañashcacunahuan juchallichinun panta panta puricushcamanta llushpiricuccunata, chaimanllata cuti urmachinun.
61002019	Paicunallata huacllishcapi huatara causacushpallata, quishpina tiyancami rimanun; imapipash runa yallic tucushca cashpa, chai paita huatashcatami charin.
61002020	Apunchic quishpichic Jesucristota ricsishcaraicu, cai pacha ticllamanta quishpichishcacuna, cutillata chai mana alli yachashcacunaman ticrashpa, yalli tucushpa, ñaupa cashcamanta ashtahuan huacllishca saquirinun.
61002021	Paicunaman rurai nishcamanta ricsishca huasha chicanyana rantimanta, paicunapac ashtahuan alli canman carca shuc rai chai cusca ñanta mana ricsina.
61002022	Ranti paicunapi pactarinmi cai runa rimanaipi nishca: "Pai cuinashcallata allcu micucrin, cuchi mama cunanshitu armachi tucushpallata cuti turuyacrin".
61003001	Llaquishca huauquicuna, caihuan ña ishcai pancata cancanaman quillcani. Ishcantinpi ñuca camachishcacu-nahuan cuscata yuyachina munashcani.
61003002	Shuc pachacunapi profetacuna rimashcata yuyarichic; apostolcana cancunaman ricsichishca, Apunchic quishpichic rurai nishcata yuyarichic.
61003003	Caita ashtahuan yapa yuyarichic; puchucai punchacuna-pi, paicunapac quiquin mana alli munaicunapi causac runacunami shamununca, cancunata asishcahuanpash
61003004	ta-pununcami: "¿Cristo cuti shamuna nishca ña pactarishcachu? Ñucanchic yayacuna ña huañunurca, shinapash cai pacha callarishcamanta tucui chashnallata caticun".
61003005	Chai runacuna mana atipanata munanun mari callari pachallapita jahua pacha tiyashcata, allpapash Dios rimashcamanta yacuraicu yacumanta llucshishcata.
61003006	Callaripi tiyac pachapash huañuna yacuhuan chincachi tucurca.
61003007	Ranti cunan tiyac allpa jahua pachantm Dios rimashcaraicullata ninapac huacaichishca canun. Taripana punchapimi paicunata rupachinca, chaipimi millaicuna cautsayachishca cananca.
61003008	Chairapash, llaquishca huauquicuna, mana cuncarina canquichic Apunchicpac shuc puncha huaranca huata shina cashcata, chashnallata huaranca huata shuc puncha shina cashcata.
61003009	Apunchicca mana unayacunchu, maicancuna yuyana shina, pai cusha nishcata pactachincapac; ashtahuan cancunata chapacun, mana mari pipash huañuncapac munanchu, ashtahuan tucuicana paiman ticrancapacmi munan.
61003010	Ranti Apunchicpac punchaca shuc shuhua shinami shamunca. Chaipimi jahua pachacuna manchaipac uyarishpa pascarinanca; tucui imacunapash ninahuanmi nuyurinunca; allpaca tucui pai charishcantin taripai tucuncapac Diospac maquipimi churashca canca.
61003011	Tucui chashna huacllichishca tucurina cashcaraicu, yapa chuya causaita, Diosta yapa yuyarishpa causana canquichic.
61003012	Diospac puncha pactamana-ta chapaichic, utca shamuchun nishpa cancuna ushashcata ruraichic. Chai punchami jahua pacha ninahuan rupachishca tucurinca, tucui imacunapash nina ucupimi nuyurinunca;
61003013	ñucanchicca, shinapash, Dios cusha nishca mushu jahua pachata, mushu allpata chapanchic; chaipimi cusca taripana, tucui alli tiyanca.
61003014	Chairaicu llaquishca huauquicuna, tucui chaicunata chapacunacama, alli causaichic Diospacpi alli tupai tucunayashpa, mana ticllayuc, mana juchayuc.
61003015	Apunchic casi shuncuhuan ricushca ñucanchic quishpinata charincapac cashcata yuyarichic. Chaimanta nicpi ñucanchic llaquishca huauqui Pablo ña cancunaman quillcashcami, paita Dios yuyai cushca tuputa cancunaman rimashpa.
61003016	Caran pai quillcashcapi chaimanta cancanata rimashca, shutimi, maican shimicana atipancapac sinchi canan, chaita yuyai illaccuna, inina mana sinchi chariccuna huishtuyachinun, Dios quillcashca shuc shimicunata huishtuyachishca shina; chashna rurashca quiquinllata cautsayachi tucancapacllata can.
61003017	Chairaicu, llaquishca huauquicuna, chaicuna mana tucushcallapita yachashcaraicu, yuyapanquichic, ama millai runacuna umachishcapi urmanquichicman, ama cancuna sinchiyashpa causacushcamanta urmanquichicman.
61003018	Ranti Apunchic quishpichic Jesucristota allita ricsina canquichic paipac llaquinapipash huiñaichic. ¡Cunan huiñaipash jatunyana paipac cachun! Chashna cachun.
62001001	Callari pachapi ña tiyashcamanta cancunata quill-canchic, ñucanchic uyashcamanta, quiquin ñucanchic ñahuihuan ricushcamanta. Ñucanchic ricushcaraicu, maqui-huanpash llancashcaraicu. Causaita cuc Shimimanta rimanchic.
62001002	Cai causai ricurimurca, ñucanchic paita ricurcanchic, ñucanchic paimanta ricuyac cashcanchic; cai huiñai causaita cancunaman ricsichinchic, pai Yayahuan tiyacushcamanta ñucanchicman ricurimushca.
62001003	Shina, ñucanchic ricushcata ñucanchic uyashcatami cancanaman ricsichinchic, cancuna ñucanchicman llutarishca cancapac, ñucanchicpash Yaya Dios—huan paipac Churi Jesucristohuanpash llutarishca cashca shina.
62001004	Ñucanchic cushiyai pacta cachun nishpami tucui caicanata cancunaman quillcanchic.
62001005	Caimi Jesucristo ñucanchicman yachachishca shimi, ranti ñucanchicca cancunaman ricsichinchic: Dios achicmi, paipi mana ansapash tuta tiyanchu.
62001006	Paiman llutarishcami canchic rimashpallata tutapi causacushpa, shimihuan rurashcahuanpash llullacunchicmi.
62001007	Ranti achicpi causacushpa Dios achicpi causacushca shina, chaipi shuti ñucanchicpura llutarishca tiyan, paipac Churi Jesucristopac yahuarpash tucui juchamanta ñucanchicta pichan.
62001008	Jucha illacmi canchic rimashpa, ñucanchicllatami umaricunchic, shuti shimi ñucanchicpi mana tiyan;
62001009	ranti, ari, juchayucmi canchic amullata rimacpi, Dios mana llullac, alli taripac cashcaraicu ñucanchic juchacunamanta quishpichin-cami, tucui mana allimantapash pichancami.
62001010	Mana shuc cutillapash juchata rurashcanichu rimashcahuan Dios llullacmi can rimanchic, chairapash, paipac shimita mana ñucanchicpi charinchic.
62002001	Ñuca huahuashitucuna, tucui caicunata ama jucha-llichicchu nishpami cancunaman quillcani. Maican juchallicpi imapash, ñucanchicraicu Diospac ñaupacpi mañacta charinchic; pai Jesucristo can, cusca taripac can.
62002002	Ñucanchic juchacuna quishpichishca cancapac Jesucristo camaripi curirca, mana ñucanchic jucharaiculla, tucui pachamanta juchacanarai-cupash.
62002003	Dios rurai nishcacunata pactachishpa, chaipi shuti allipachami paita ricsishcanchic.
62002004	Ranti maicanpash: "Ñuca paita ricsinimi" nishpallata, pai rurai nishcacunata mana pactachishpa, llullaisiquimi can, mana shuti shimi rimac can.
62002005	Ranti, paipac shimita uyac, sumacta pacha paita llaquicun, chashna shuti paihuan ñucanchic llutarishca cashcata yachanchic.
62002006	Pipash Dios-huan llutarishcami cani rimashpa, Jesucristo causashca shina causana can.
62002007	Huauquicuna, mana mushuchu can cai cancunaman quillcashca rurai nishca: callarishcamanta cancana chasquishca-llatami can. Chai unai pachamanta rurai nishca cancuna uyashca shimi can ña.
62002008	Shina cacpipash, cai cancunaman quillcacushca mushu rurai nishcami can, pai Cristopi cancunapipash shuti can, tuta chincaricucpi quiquin achic llinpiyamucushcaraicu.
62002009	Maicanpash achicpimi cani rimashpallata, paipac huauquita chaira chicnishpa, chairami tutapi can.
62002010	Paipac huauquita llaquic runa achicpi causan, mana imapash paita juchapi urmachincachu.
62002011	Ranti paipac huauquita chicnic runa tutapi causan, tutapi puricun, maiman rirashcatapash mana yachan tuta paita ñausayachishcaraicu.
62002012	Churi huahuashitucuna, Dios paipac shutiraicu, cancunapac juchamanta quishpichishcaraicumi cancunaman quillcani.
62002013	Yayacuna, callarimanta tiyacta cancuna ricsishca-raicumi, canCunaman quillcani. Maltacuna, manaalli rurachicta cancana yallishcaraicumi, cancunaman quillcani.
62002014	Cancunaman quillcashcanimi, huahuashitucuna, Yaya-ta cancuna ricsishcaraicu. Cancunaman quillcashcanimi, yayacuna, ña callarimanta tiyacta cancuna ricsishcaraicu. Cancunamanpash maltacuna, quillcashcanimi, cancuna sinchi cashcaraicu, Diospac shimitapash cancuna shuncupi chas-quishcaraicu, mana alli rurachicta yallishcaraicupash.
62002015	Cai pachata tucui pai charishcacunantin ama llaquinquichicchu. Maicanpash cai pachata llaquishpa, Yayata mana llaquinchu;
62002016	tucui cai pacha ñucanchicman cuyashca mana Yayamanta shamun, pachamantallatami shamun. Caicunatami cai pacha ñucanchicman cuyan: runa juchata munashcacuna, mashnapash sumaccunata ricuna munai, cullquita charishcaraicu jatunyana.
62002017	Shinapash cai pacha ña tucuricun tucui paipac mana alli munaicunantin; ranti Dios manashcata pactachic huiñai causaita charin.
62002018	Huahuashitucuna, caimi puchucai pacha can. Shuc runa Cristota piñac shamuncami rimai tucurcanquichic; ranti achca Cristota piñaccuna ña shamunushcami. Chairaicu puchucai pacha cashcata yachanchic.
62002019	Paicuna ñucanchic ucumanta llucshinurca, ranti mana ñucanchicpacmantacanachu canurca; ñucanchipaccuna cashpa, ñucanchichuan saquirinun-man carca. Shiuapash cashna tucurca mana tucuicuna ñucanchicmanta cashca pasacta ricurincapac.
62002020	Cristo Diospac Samaita cancunaman cushca, ña tucui-lla yaChaita charinquichic.
62002021	Shuti cashcata cancuna ricsishca-raicumi quillcani, mana chaira ricsina pishishcaraicu; cancuna allita yachanquichic shuc llulla shimi mana shuti shimimanta shamushcata.
62002022	¿Pi Ilulla cashcata yachanquichicchu? Jesus mana Mesiaschu rimacmi llulla can. Chaimi Cristota piñac can, pai Yayata Churitapash mana chasquin.
62002023	Maicanpash Churita mana chasquishpa, Yayatapahs mana chasquin; ranti pi runapash Churita chasquishpa, Yayatapash chasquin.
62002024	Chairaicu, callarishcamanta uyashca shimita cancuna shuncupi huacaichina canquichic; callarishcamanta uyashca cancuna shuncupi saquiricpi shuti, cancunapash Yayahuan Churihuan llutarishcami canquichic.
62002025	Caita jinumi Jesucristo ñucanchicman cusha nishca: Huiñai causaita.
62002026	Cancunata umachina munaccunata yuyarishpami quillcashcani.
62002027	Shinapash, Jesucristo cancunaman cushca Diospac Samaita charinquichic; ¿imapacta shuc yachachic ashtahuan tiyanca? Samaillata tucui imacunata cancunaman pacta yachachin; pai yachachishcacuna shutimi canun, llullai mana tiyanchu. Samai yachachishca shina Cristoman llutarishca causaichic.
62002028	Cunan, huahuashitucuna, Cristoman llutarishca cau-saichic, pai ricurimushcapi paipi yuyaita churancapac, pai shamushcapi paipac ñaupacpi ama pincarincapac.
62002029	Jesucristo cusca taripac cashcata yachashcamanta, cancuna yachanapash canquichic, tucui cuscata ruraccana Diospac churicana cashcata.
62003001	Ñucanchicta Yaya Dios ima shina llaquishcata ricuichic, chairaicu Diospac churicuna rimai tucunchic; chashnami canchic, shuti. Chairaicu cai pachamantacuna ñucanchicta mana ricsinun, paicuna Diosta mana ricsinushca mari.
62003002	Llaquishca huauquicuna, ñami Diospac churicuna canchic. Huasha ima tucanca rashcata mana yachashpapash Jesucristo ricurimucpi pai shina cana cashcata yachanchic, paita jinu ricuna cashcaraicu.
62003003	Maicanpash cai chapanata charic, paillata chuyayan, Jesucristo chuya cashca shina.
62003004	Ranti maicanpash juchata rurashpa, mana allita ruran; juchallinaca mana alli rurashca mari can.
62003005	Cancuna ña yachanquichic Jesucristo cai pachaman juchacunata anchuchin-capac shamushcata; pai mana shuc juchallapash charishcata yachanquichic.
62003006	Shina, maicanpash paiman llutarishca causac, mana juchallin; ranti, tucui juchalliccuna paita mana ricunushcachu, mana ricsinushcachu.
62003007	Ñuca huahuashitucana, cancunata ama pipash umachichun: cuscata rurac runa cusca shuncuyuc can, pai cusca shuncuyuc cashca shina;
62003008	ranti juchata ruracca supaipac can, supai callarishcamanta juchallisiqui cashcaraicu. Caipac jinumi Diospac Churica shamushca: supai rurashcata huacllichincapac.
62003009	Diospac chiricuna mana maicanpash juchallinun, Dios cushca causaita charishcaraicu; Diospac churi cashcaraicu juchallina mana ushanchu.
62003010	Yachanalla can maican Diospac churi, maican supaipac churi cashca: maicanpash mana allita rurashpa, paipac huauquita mana llaquishpa, chai mana Diospac can.
62003011	Callarishcamanta cancuna uyashca shimi caimi: Ñucanchicpura llaquinacuna canchic.
62003012	Ama Cain shina tucushun, supaipac cashpa paipac huauquita huañuchirca. ¿Imaraicu huañuchishcata yachanquichicchu? Cain rurashcacana mana alli cashcaraicu, ranti paipac huauquipaccuna, alli.
62003013	Ñuca huauquicuna, ama mancharinquichicchu cai pachamanta caccuna cancunata chicnicpi.
62003014	Huañuimanta causaimanmi ñucanchic chinpashcanchic; ñucanchic huauquicu-nata llaquishcaraicu chaita yachanchic. Maicanpash mana llaquic cashpa, chaira huañushcami can.
62003015	Maicanpash paipac huauquita chicnic cashpa, runata huañuchicmi can; cancana ña yachanquichic ima shina runata huañuchiccunamanta mana maicanpash huiñai causanata quiquinpac ucupi charishcata.
62003016	Jesucristo ñucanchiraicu paipac causaita cushcamanta llaquinata ricsinchic; chashnallata ñucanchicpash ñucanchic huauquicunaraicu causaita cuna canchic.
62003017	Ñucanchic cullquiyuc cashpa, shuc huauquita imapash illac ricushpallata mana imatapash cushpa, ¿Diospac llaquinata shuncupi charishanchu?
62003018	Ñuca huahuashitucuna, ama shimillahuan llaquishun, rurashcahuan llaquishun.
62003019	Chaipimi allipacha yachashun ñucanchic shutimanta cashcata, Diospac ñaupacpipash cushimi cashun;
62003020	ñucanchic shuncu imamantapash cautsayachina charicpi, Dios ñucanchic shancumanta ashtahuan yalli jatun cashpa, tucuita pai yachan.
62003021	Llaquishca huauquicuna, ñucanchic shancu mana cautsaya-chicpi, Diospi yuyaita churashpa paiman mayanyashanchic;
62003022	pai tucui ñucanchic mañashcata cancami, ñucanchic pai ru-rai nishcacunata pactachishcaraicu, ñucanchic pai munashca-tapash rurashcaraicu.
62003023	Caimi pai rurai nishca: paipac Churi Jesucristopi inina canchic, pai rimashca shina ñucanchicpura llaquinacuna canchic.
62003024	Pai rurai nishcacunata uyaccuna paipi causanun, paica paicunapi causan. Pai ñucanchicpi causa-cushcata cairaicumi yachanchic: pai ñucanchicman cushca Sa-mairaicu.
62004001	Llaquishca huauquicana, ama tucui Dios ricsichishca-tami rimanchic niccanata uyanquichicchu; paicunapi tiyac samai Diospacchu can, yancachu can ricancapac, ñaupacta camana canquichic paicunata, Diospacraicumi rimanchic nic llullaccanalla cai pachapi juntarashcaraicu.
62004002	Cashna rurashpa-mi cancuna yachana ushanquichic maicancunallata Diospac Samaita charinacan: Jesucristo quiquin rana shina shamushcata inicmi Diospac Samaita charin.
62004003	Jesusmanta mana chashna inic Diospac Samaita mana charinchu; chaipac rantimanta, Cristota chicnicpac samaitami charin. Chai samai shamuna-manta cancuna uyashcanchic mari; cunan uyaichic, ñami cai pachapi can.
62004004	Churishitucuna, cancuna Diospac canquichic, llullaisi-quicanatapash yallishcanquichic, cancanapi tiyac cai pachaman-tacuna ucupi tiyacmanta yalli ushaita charishcaraicu.
62004005	Paicuna cai pachapac canun; chairaicu cai pacha imacanamanta rima-nun, pachamantacuna paicunata uyanun.
62004006	Ranti ñucanchic Diospac canchic. Diosta ricsic runa ñucanchicta uyan, ranti mana Diospac rana ñucanchicta mana uyan. Chaipi ricsina ushanchic, maican shuti shimi samaita charin, maican umachic samaita charin.
62004007	Llaquishca huauquicuna, ñucanchicpura llaquinacuna canchic, llaquina Diosmanta shamushcaraicu. Llaquic runa Diospac churi cashpa Diosta ricsin.
62004008	Mana llaquic runa Diosta mana ricsishcachu Dios llaquina cashcaraicu.
62004009	Ñucanchicman llaquina charishcata Dios ricsichirca paipac shuclla Churita cai pachaman cachamushcapi, ñucanchic pairaicu causaita charincapac.
62004010	Llaquina caimi can: mana ñucanchic Diosta llaquishcaraicu, ashtahuan pai ñucanchicta llaquishpami paipac Churita cachamurca, camaripi curishpa ñucanchic juchacunata pichancapac.
62004011	Llaquishca huauquicuna, ñucanchicta Dios chashna llaquishcaraicu, ñucanchicpurapash llaquinacuna canchic.
62004012	Diosta mana pipash ricushcachu, ranti ñucanchicpura llaquinacucpi, Dios ñucanchicpi causan, paipac llaquinapash ñucanchic ucupi sapiyan.
62004013	Paipac Samaita ñucanchicman cushcaraicumi, ñucanchic Diospi causacushcata paipash ñu-canchicpi cashcata yachanchic.
62004014	Ñucanchicllata ricushcan-chic, chairaicu Yayami Churita cai pachata quishpichincapac cachamurca rimanchic.
62004015	Maicanpash Jesus Diospac Churi cashcata inishpa, Diospi causan Diospash paipi causan.
62004016	Chashua yachashcanchic, iuinchicpash ñucanchicta Dios llaquishcata. Dios llaquina can; llaquinapi causac runa Diospi causan, Diosca paipi causan.
62004017	Chashnami llaquina ñucanchicpi shuti jinu tiyan, taripana puncha ñucanchic yuyaita Diospi churancapac; ñucanchic cai pachapi Jesucristo cashca shinallata mari canchic.
62004018	Llaquina tiyashcapi manchai mana tiyan mari. Ashtahuanpash, pacta llaquina manchaita callpachin, manchaica ñacarina samimi can. Chairaicu pipash manchaita charishpa, chaira mana allipacha llaquinata charin.
62004019	Pai ñaupac llaquishcaraicu ñucanchicpash llaquinchic.
62004020	Maicanpash: "Ñuca Diosta llaquinimi" nishpallara, huauquita chicnishpa, llullaisiqui can. Pipash ricuric huauquita mana llaquishpa, mana ricuric Diosta ashtahuan mana llaquina ushancachu.
62004021	Jesucristo cai rurai nishcata ñucanchicman cushca: Diosta llaquic runa paipac huauquitapash llaquichan.
62005001	Pipash Jesus Mesiaspi inina charic Diospac churi can; Yayata llaquic rana tucui chai Yayapac churicunatapash llaquin.
62005002	Diosta llaquishpa, pai rimashcata pactachishpa, yachanchic ñucanchic Diospac churicunatapash llaquishcata.
62005003	Pai rurai nishcacunata uyanami Diosta llaquina can; pai rurai nishcacuna mana llashacchu canun,
62005004	Diospac churicuna tucuilla cai pachata yalliccuna cashcaraicu. Ñucanchic inina charishcamanta cai pachata yallina ushashcanchic.
62005005	Jesus Diospac Churi cashcata inic pachata yallin.
62005006	Jesucristo shamushca, yacuhuan, yahuarhuan ricuchish-ca saquirirca; mana yacullahuan, ranti yacuhuan yahuarhuan. Samaillata chai chashna cashcamanta ricuyac can, chai Samaica shuti can.
62005007	Quimsa ricuyaccunami tiyanun:
62005008	Samai, Yacu, Yahuar; quimsantin chai yuyaillata charinun.
62005009	Runacuna ricuyashcata uyanchic, ranti Dios ricuyashca tucuimanta ashta-huan yalli can, Dios paipac Churimanta ricuyac cashcaraicu.
62005010	Maicanpash Diospac Churipi inic quiquin paipac shuncupi chai ricuyashcata apaicachan; Diosta mana inic Dios llullami can rimacun, Dios paipac Churimanta ricuyashcata mana inish-caraicu.
62005011	Dios ñucanchicman huiñai causaita cushcamanta ri-cuyacmi can, chai causai paipac Churipi tiyan.
62005012	Diospac Churita charic runa chai causaitapash charin; ranti Diospac Churita mana charic chai causaita mana charinchu.
62005013	Diospac Churipi inic cashcamantami cancunata caita quillcani, cancana huiñai causaita charishcata yachancapac.
62005014	Diospi ñucanchic yuyaita churashcanchic, imatapash pai manashca shina ñucanchic mañacpi, pai uyana cashcaraicu.
62005015	Yachanchic Dios paihuan rimarishcapi ñucanchicta uyashca-ta, paiman mañashcata ña cui tucushcatapash yachanchic.
62005016	Pipash shuc huauquita mana huañuiman pushac juchata ruracucta ricushpa, Dios-huan pairaicu rimarina can, huauquiman causaita Dios cuncami, mana huañuiman pushac jucha cacpi. Huañuiman pushac jucha tiyanmi, chai jucharaicu Dios—huan rimarinami chaita shuti mana rimanichu.
62005017	Tucui mana alli rurashca jucha can; shinapash, mana huañuiman pushac jucha tiyan.
62005018	Diosta Yayachishpa causac mana juchallm, Diospac Churi paita ricushcaraicu, supaica paita mana urmachina ushan.
62005019	Ñucanchic Diospac cashcata yachanchic, tucui pacha supaipac maquipi cashcatapash.
62005020	Diospac Churi shamush-catapash yachanchic, pai quiquin Diosta ricsincapac yuyaita ñucanchicman cushca. Quiquinman llutarishca causanchic, nic-pi, paipac Churi Jesucristoman. Caimi quiquin Dios huiñai causaipash can.
62005021	Huahuashitucuna, llulla dioscunamanta yuyapanquichic.
63001001	Ñuca, Rucu, cai quillcata Dios acllashca iniccunaman quillcani; paicunata shutipachami llaquini; mana ñucalla tucui shuti cashcata ricsiccanapash paicunata llaquinun.
63001002	Cancunata llaquini shuti cashcata ñucanchic shuncupi charishcaraicu, pai ñucanchicpi huiñaimi tiyanca.
63001003	Dios Yaya Yayapac Churi Jesucristopash, paicunapac cuyaita tallichinuchun llaquina charinatapash, ganas causaita, shuti cashcapi, llaquinapipash cancunaman cunuchun.
63001004	Achcatami cushiyahscani canpac churicunamanta mai-cancuna, Dios munashca shina shuti cashcapi causacushcarai-cu.
63001005	Cunan, llaquishca huauquicuna, ñucanchicpura llaquinacushun, cancunata nmi. Cai cancunaman quillcashca mana mushu rurai nishcachu can, callarishcapi cancuna chasquishcallatami can.
63001006	Dios rurai nishcata rurashpa causanami llaquinacana uyarin; cancuna callarishcamanta uyashca, Dios rurai nishcaca caimi: ñucanchicpura llaquina-cushpa causana canchic.
63001007	Cai pachapi achca umachiccuna tiyanun, paicuna Jesucristo cai pachaman quiquin rana shina shamushcata mana imnun. Chai laya runa umachisiqui runa can, Cristota chicnic can.
63001008	Yuyanquichic, cancuna ñaupac rurashca ama yanca tucucun, cancuna cuyai tucunata illacta japina munashpa.
63001009	Maicanpash Cristo yachachishcamanta ashtahuan yallinayashpa, chai runa Diosta mana charinchu; ranti yachachishcallapi catic runa, Yayata Churitapash charin.
63001010	Pipash cancunata ricunca rishcapi, cai yachachinata mana apacpi, cancuna huasipi ama chasquinquichicchu, paita ama saluranquichicchu;
63001011	maicanpash paita salurac runa, mana alli ruranapi paita yanapacun.
63001012	Cancunata achca rimanata charini, shinapash mana quillcapi rimanayanichu. Cancunata ricucrisha yuyani cancunahuan jinu rimarincapac, ñucanchic cushiyai pactarishca cancapac.
63001013	Canpac acllashca ñañapac churicuna cancunata yuyarinumi.
64001001	Ñuca, Rucu, alli shutipacha ñuca llaquishca mashi Gayota cai pancata quillcani.
64001002	Llaquishca huauqui, Diosta mañani, can Diosta catinapi alli rirashca shina, chashnallata tucuipi alli catichun nishpa, ama ansapash uncushpa.
64001003	Yapa cushiyarcani shuc huauquicuna shamushpa, can shuti cashcapi mana pantashpa caticushcata rimahuanucpi uyashpa.
64001004	Ñuca churicuna shuti cashcapi caticushcata yachashpa, tucui imamantapash yalli cushiyachihuan.
64001005	Llaquishca huauqui, can imatapash huauquicanaraicu rurashcapi mana pantashcahuan rurashpa caticunqui; paicuna chicanmanta runacuna cacpipash.
64001006	Can yanapashcamanta tucui iniccuna ñaupacpi rimai tiyashca. Diosmanta yanapai mañani; paicuna rirashcapi catina ushancapac paicuna mutsushcata cuilla, Dios munashca shina.
64001007	Jesucristota yanapanaraicu purincapac callarinushca, Diosta mana ricsiccunamanta mana shuc yanapaita chasquina munanushcachu.
64001008	Chairaicu ñucanchic paicunata ricuna tucunchic, shuti shimi yachachinapi paicanata yanapancapac.
64001009	Shuc pancata miccunaman quillcarcani, ranti Diótrefes ñucanchicta mana uyana munan, pailla amu causasha yuyashcaraicu.
64001010	Chairaicu, rishpa imaca, pai rurashcamanta rimanami cani, ñucanchicmanta llullashpa, camishpa purin. Chaihuan mana cushiyashpa, chaiman pactac huauquicunata mana chasquinchu, pipash paicunata chasquina manacpi, mana chasquichin, iniccuna ucumantapash paicanata callpachin.
64001011	Llaquishca huauqui, mana alli rurashcacunata ama catinquichu, ashtahuan alli rurashcacunata catinqui. Alli cashcata rurac Diospac runa can, ranti mana alli cashcata rurac Diosta mana ricushcachu.
64001012	Tucuicuna Demetriomanta alli rimanun; chai shuti can; ñucanchicpash pai allimi can ninchic, can ñucanchic shuti rimashcata yachanqui.
64001013	Canta achca rimana charircani, ranti quillcapi mana rimanayanichu;
64001014	utcallami canta ricusha yuyani canhuan jinu rimarincapac.
64001015	Ganas causai canpi tiyachun. Mashicuna canta yuyarinunmi. Caita mañani, ñucanchic yuyarishcata caran mashiman rimapai.
65001001	Ñuca, Judas, Jesucristopac runa, Santiagopac huauqui, Dios Yaya llaquishpa cayashcacunamanmi cai pancata quillcani, paicuna Jesucristo ricucushcacuna canun.
65001002	Achca Dios cancunamanta llaquirishcata, ganas causaita llaquinata-pash chasquichic.
65001003	Llaquishca huauquicuna, cancuna ñucapash charishca quishpinamantami achcata munashcani cancunata quillcanca-pac; ranti cunanca, Diospac runacanata shuc cutilla huiñaipac cushca ininapi sinchicuichic rimancapac quillcana tucuni.
65001004	Umachishcahuan maican runacuna cancuna ucupi yaicunushca, chai runacuna Dios quillcashca shimipi unaimanta huañuncapaC cautsayachishca canurca. Millai runacuna canan, chairaicu ñucanchic Diosmanta chasquishca cuyaihuan millaipac causanun, chairapash, shuclla Amu Apunchic Jesucristota mana chasquinun.
65001005	Cancuna ña yachacllapita, cancunata yuyachinayani Apunchic, Israel runacunata Egiptomanta llucshichishca huasha, ima shina mana iniccunata chincachirca.
65001006	Chash-nallata angelcunatapash, paicuna tiyanata jichushpa chican-yashcaraicu, puchucai pancha taripanapac huacaichishca charin yana, mana tucuric chunta curralpi.
65001007	Chai angelcuna shinallata Sodoma, Gomorra, mayanta tiyac llactacunantin, yumashpa yapa juchallinurca, manchaipac juchacunata rurashpa causanurca. Chairaicu mana tucuric ninahuan ñacachi tucunurca Tucuicana ricuncapac.
65001008	Chairapash, chai ranacuna nuspa causaipi catishpa, paicuna aichata ticllayachinun, Apunchicta mana uyana munanun, angelcunata millaipac shimicunahuan piñanan.
65001009	Arcangel Miguel jinu, Moisespac aichata mitsanacushpa supaihuan macanacushcapi, mana piñashcahuan paita cautsayachircachu, cashnalla paita nirca: "Apunchic canta rimachun".
65001010	Ranti chai runacuna mana alli ricsishca imacunamantapash mana alli shimita rimanun; ranti paicana huihuacuna shina yuyai illac ricsishcata, paicunallata huacllichincapac charinun.
65001011	¡Supaicuna! Cain rurashcata catinun. Balaan shina, cullquiraicu pantanushca; Coré shina, piñarishcamanta huañumm.
65001012	Cancuna huauquipura llaquinacushpa raimishca-pi, pincaipac canun, paicuna chaipi cushiyashcahuan micunun, upianan, mana ansa yupaichanata charishpa. Quiquinllata ricuc michic canan. Huaira maimanpash tancacushca yacu illac puyu canun. Pai aparinapi mana muyuyuc yura canun, ishcai cuti huañushca, sapintin surcushcacuna.
65001013	Sinchi jatarishca ñucñu yacu bacu canun, paicuna pincaipac rurashcata puscuta shina shitanun. Ñanmanta anchurishca cuillur canun, quiquin yana tutapi huiñai causancapac churashca canun.
65001014	Adan huasha canchis niqui Rucu yaya Enocpash cai shimicunata chai runacunamanta rimarca: "Apunchicta ricurcani, huaranca huaranca angelcanahuan shamucpi
65001015	tucui runata taripancapac, tucui millai runacunatapash cautsayachincapac, paicuna millaimanta mana allita rurashcaraicu, paicuna millai juchasapa ranacuna cashpa paita mana alli shimicunahuan piñashcaraicu".
65001016	Paicana causaihuan mana cushi canun, tucuimanta caminan, paicuna aicha munashcallata rurashpa cushiyaita charinun. Sumac shimita rimac canun, runacunata umachishpa paicanaraicu cullquiyancapac.
65001017	Ranti cancuna, llaquishca huauquicuna, yuyarichic Apunchic Jesucristopac apostolcuna
65001018	caita cancunaman rimashcata: "Puchucai pachacunapi asisiqui runacunami tiyanunca, mana alli munaicunallata rurashpami paicuna causanunca".
65001019	Chaicunami runacunata chausichic canun; paicuna aicha mañashcatallata catinan, mana charinan Diospac Samaita.
65001020	Ranti cancuna, llaquishca huauquicuna, sumac inina charishcapi sinchicushpa causaichic.
65001021	Diospac llaquinapi causaichic, Apanchic Jesucristo pai ñucanchiraicu llaquirishpa, huiñai causaita ñucanchicman cuna punchata chapashpa.
65001022	Mana shuclla yuyaipi sinchicushpa causaccunamanta llaquirina canquichic.
65001023	Ninamanta surcushpa shuccanata quishpichichic, chaishuccunamanta llaquirichic; ranti paicuna-manta yuyanquichic, paicana churanantin millaichic, mana alli causashcamanta ticllayachishca charishcaraicu.
65001024	Ñucanchita Quishpichic, shuclla Dios pailla ushaita charin ñucanchicta juchallinamanta quishpichincapac, pai quiquin jatunyashca ñaupacpi ñucanchicta cushi, mana ticllayuc ricuchinata ushan.
65001025	Shuclla Diosta, Cristo Jesus Apunchicraicu quishpichicta, jatunyana, jahuayana, ushai, apu cana paipac cachun, tucui pachamanta ñaupac cunan, huiñaipash. Chashna cachun.
66001001	i Caimi Dios Jesucrisrota ricsichishca, pai paita yanapaccunata tucunca rashcata ricsichincapac. Jesucristo paipac angelta cachamushpa paita yanapac Juanta ricsichishca,
66001002	pai tucui pai ricushcamanta shutita riman, ricuyacpash pai can Diospac shimimanta, Jesucristo sinchicuchishca shimimanta.
66001003	Cai quillcata ricuc cai Diosmanta chasquishca shimita Catishpa uyachishcata uyaccuna cushiyanuchan, caipi quillcash-cata uyaccanapash, ña paipac pacha pactacushcaraicu.
66001004	Ñuca Juan, Asia suyupi canchis iglesiacanaman quillcani. Cacmanta, cashcamanta, shamunca racmanta cuyaita, alli causaita chasquichic, pai tiyashca ñaupacpi tiyac canchis samaicunamantapash chasquichic,
66001005	Jesucristomantapash, pai shuti rimac ricuyac can, pai tucuicunamanta ñaupac huañushcamanta causarirca, cai pachamanta yallipash can. Cristo ñucanchicta llaquin, paipac yahuarta tallichishpa ñucanchic juchacunamanta quishpichishca;
66001006	chashna ñucan-chic paipac runacuna tucushcanchic; paipac Dios Yayata yanapac pacriyayacunata ñucanchicta rurashca. ¡Jatunyana, ushai huiñai paipac canuchun! Chashan cachan.
66001007	¡Cristo puyu ucupi shaman!, ¡ricuichic! Tucuicunami ricununca, paita tucsiccunapash, cai pachamanta tucui runacunami llaquirishpa pairaicu huacanunca. Ari. Chashnami canca.
66001008	"Ñucami Alfa Omegapash cam", Apanchic riman, pai tucuita ushac Dios, canan cac, ñaupa cac, shamanca racuc.
66001009	Ñuca, Juan, cancunapac huauqui cani, ñuca Jesus—huan llutarishca cashcaraicu cancunahuan Diospac pachapi causani, llaquicunapi, llaqui tiyashcapi sinchicuna ushaita charini. Patmos shutiyuc islapi carcani Jesus sinchicuchishca Diospac shimita huillashcaraicu.
66001010	Shuc domingo samai ñucamanta amuyarca; chashnapi shuc sinchi shimita ñuca huashaman uyarcani, trompeta uyarishca shina sinchi shimi,
66001011	pai rimahuacurca: "Can ricushcata shuc pancapi quillcai, Asia suyupi tiyac canchis iglesiacunaman chaicunata cachai: Efesoman, Esmimaman, Pergamoman, Tiatiraman, Sardisman, Filadelfiaman, Laodiceaman.
66001012	Chai uyaricuc shimi pipacta can nishpa ricuncapac huashaman ticrashpa ricurcani; ticrashpa ricushcapi canchis curimanta candelabro nishcacunata ricurcani,
66001013	chaupi candelabrocuna ucupi shuc runa shinata ricurcani, chaquicama churanahuan churarishca, pechopi shuc curimanta chunpihuan huatarishca.
66001014	Paipac accha millma shina yurac carca, alli nicpi, rasu shina yurac; paipac ñahuicanaca japirac nina shina canurca.
66001015	Paipac chaquicuna chiuclla llanpushca anta shina sinchi ninapi apiyachishca shina carca, pai rimashca shuc paccha shina sinchi uyaric carca.
66001016	Paipac yachac maquipi canchis cuillurcunata charirca; paipac shimimanta shuc ñañu ishcai manñayuc mircanu llucshicurca. Paipac ñahui inti sinchi rupachicushcapi ricurishca shina carca.
66001017	Paita ricushpa, paipac chaquipi huañushca shina urmarcani. Ranti pai, paipac yachac maquita ñucapi churashpa, rimahuarca: "Ama manchaichu; ñucami tucuimanta ñaupa, tucuimanta huasha cani,
66001018	cunan causacucmi cani. Huañushca carcani, ranti cunanca huiñaipac causani. Ñucami huañui pachamanta llavecanata charini.
66001019	Can ricushcata quillcai: cunan tiyashcata huasha tiyanca racushcatapash.
66001020	Caimi ñuca yachac maquipi can ricushca canchis cuillurcanapi pacashca tiyac can, curimanta canchis candelabrocunapipash: canchis cuillurcuna canchis iglesiacunapi tiyac angelcunata ricuchiranun, canchis candelabrocunaca canchis iglesiacunata ricuchiranun.
66002001	"Efesopi tiyac iglesiamanta angelta quillcai: 'Paipac yachac maquipi canchis cuillurcanata charic, curimanta canchis candelabro ucupi puric caitami riman:
