66002002	Tucui can rashcata yachanimi; canpac sinchi llancanata, can sinchicushpa catishcata yachanimi; yachani can millai runacunata mana ricuna ushashcata. Yachanimi can, mana apostol cashpallata apostolmi canchic rimaccunata camashpa, paicunata llullaipi tupashcata.
66002003	Sinchicushpa catishcanqui, ñucaraicu achcata ñacarishcanqui, mana sanpayashpa.
66002004	Ranti caipi pantacunqui; callaripi charishca llaquinata ña mana charinqui.
66002005	Chairaicu, ricui imapi pantacushcata, Diosman ticrai, can callaripi rurashcata cutillata rurai. Mana cacpi, mana can alliman ticracpi, canpac candelabrota pai shayashcamanta anchuchisha-mi.
66002006	Chashna cacllapita, canpac allipac nicolaitacunapac causaita chicninqui ñuca chicnishca shinallata.
66002007	Rinriyuc uyachun iglesiacunaman Diospac Samai rimashcata: Ñucami atic ranacunata Diospac jahua pachapi shayac causaita cuc yuramanta carasha'.
66002008	"Esmirnapi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Tu-cuimanta ñaupa, tacuimanta huasha, huanushca cac, cutillata causarishca, Caitami riman:
66002009	Ricsiuimi can ñacarishcata, can llushti cashcatapash; alli nicpi, tucuitami can charinqui. Judio-mi canchic rimaccuna canmanta mana alli rimashcata yachanimi, paicunaca mana imapash canunchu, supai tantachishcami canun.
66002010	Can ñacarmca racushcamanta ama manchaichu, can-canamanta maicancanata chunta curralpi churanca ranan, tucui cancuna camai tucushca cancapac; ansa punchacuna cancana ñacarina tucunca ranquichic. Huañunacama sinchicui, ranti ñuca shuc cuyaita shina canman causaita cusha.
66002011	¡Rinriyuc Samai iglesiacunaman rimashcata uyachun! AtiCcuna mana an-sapash ñacarinuncachu cuti huañui pactamushcapi'.
66002012	"Pergamomanta iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Caitami ñañu ishcai manñayuc mircanuta charic riman:
66002013	Ñuca yachani can supai amu paipac tiyarinata charishcapi causacushcata; shina cacllapita ñucahuan caticunqui. Ñucapi ininata mana saquishcanquichu, ñucapac cusca ricuyac Antipasta, Supai causana llactapi huañuchishcapipash, ininata mana saquircanquichu.
66002014	Ranti caicunapi can pantacunqui: Balaam yachachishcata catic maicancuna canpac ucupi tiyanun; pai Balacta israelitacunata juchallichincapac, huacacunaman camaripi ricuchishca aichata micushpa, camachirca, yumashpa juchallishcahuanpash.
66002015	Chashnallata, maicancanata nicolaita-cuna yachachishcamanta mana chincayana munaccunata charinqui.
66002016	Chairaicu, Diosman ticrai; mana cacpi, ñallami canpacman risha; chaipi ñuca shimimanta llucshic mircanu-huanmi paicunahuan macanacusha.
66002017	Rmriyuc uyachun Samai iglesiacunaman rimashcata:Aticcanata pacashca tiyac "mana" nishcamanta paicunata carashca; shuc yurac rumitapash paicunata cushami, chaipi shuc mushu shuti quillcashca tiyan; chasquicllami ricsin, shuccunaca mana'.
66002018	"Tiatirapi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Caitami Diospac Churi riman, ñahuita japirac nina shina charic, chaquicunata llanpushca anta shina charic:
66002019	Tucui can rurashcata yachani; can llaquishcata, canpac inina, canpac yanapai, can mana sanpayashpa caticushcata yachanimi; callarishcapi rurashcamanta canan ashtahuan yalli ruracushcata yachanimi.
66002020	Ranti caimanta canta rimana munani: canpacpi chasquinqui chai Jezabel shutiyuc huarmita, pai Diospacraicu-mi rimani rimashpallata, pai yachachishcahuanca ñucata yanapaccunata umachin, yumashpa juchallinapi urmachispa, huacacunaman camaripi ricuchishca micunacanata micuchish-pa.
66002021	Diosman ticrana tuputa chapani; ranti pai mana munashcachu, mana saquishcachu yumashpa juchallinata.
66002022	Chairaicu cunan paita sinchi uncuchinca rani, paihuan crusta paquiccunata sinchi ñacachinahuanmi camanca rani, paicuna mana alli rurashcamanta mana nanaricpi chaipash.
66002023	Pai charishca churicunata huañuchishami; chashnami tucui iglesiacuna mai shuncu cuchuta, mai yuyai cuchucunata ñuca ricsishcata yachanunca; cancunatapash caran amu rurashca tuputami cusha.
66002024	Rami cancunata, Tiatirapi causac cashpalla-ta mana chai yachaita caticcunata, mana ricsinushcapash paicuna Supaipac pacara jatun yachaicuna nishcatapash, paicunaman mana ima ñacarina tiyancachu;
66002025	ranti cancana charishcata mana chincachina canquichic ñuca shamunacama.
66002026	Aticcunaman, causaicama ñuca munashcata ruraccunaman, llactacunapac apu tucuna ushaitami cusha,
66002027	-
66002028	sinchi maquihuanmi paicunata pushananca, mancallpamanta rurashca mucahuata shinami paicunata paquinunca, ñuca rurashca shina, ñuca Yayamanta ushaita chasquishcaraicu. Tutamanta ricuric cuillurtapash paiman cushami.
66002029	Rmriyuc cai Samai iglesiacunaman cushca shimita uyachan'.
66003001	"Sardispi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Diospac canchis samaicunata, canchis cuillurcunata charicmi caita riman: Tucui can rascata yachanimi, ricurincapacca causac canqui, shina cashpallata huañushca canqui.
66003002	Ricchari, canpi chaira mana huañushcata causachi; ricushcanimi can rurashcacuna ñuca Diospac ñaupacpi chaira mana pacta cashcata.
66003003	Chashnamanta, canta yachachishcamanta yuyarish-pa, paita catishpa Diosman ticrai. Can mana ñahuita pascashpa causacpica, can cuncailla tiyashcapi, shuc shuhuac runa shinami canpacman pactasha.
66003004	Shinapash, Sardispi churana mana mapayachic runacuna ansashitu tiyan; paicuna ñucahuan yuraclla churarishca purinca ranun, chashna cuyai tucuna cashcaraicu.
66003005	Aticcana chashna yurac churanahuan churachish-cami canunca, paicunapac shutitapash mana anchuchishachu causaita cuc quillcamanta; ashtahuan ñuca Yayapac ñaupacpi paipac angelcunapac ñaupacpipash paipac shutita rimashami.
66003006	¡Rinrita charic Samai iglesiacunaman rimashcata uyachun!'.
66003007	"Piladelfiapi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Santo, shuti cac, Jatun Curaca Davidpac llaveta charic, pai pascacpi mana pipash huichcana ushacushca, pai huichcacpi mana pipash pascana ushacushca, caita riman:
66003008	Tucui can rashcata yachanimi; ricui, canpac ñaupacpi pascara pancuta churashcam; chaita mana pipash huichcana ushan; mana sinchi cashpapash, ñuca shimita uyashcanqui, ñucamanta mana chicanyashcanqui.
66003009	Ñucami, Supaipac ranacuna, llullaisiqui, judiomi canchic nishpallata mana caccuna, canpac chaquipi cuncurichisha, ñuca canta llaquishcata paicuna yachancapac.
66003010	Mana sanpayashpa can ñuca shimita huacaichishcaraicu, canta ñuca quishpichishami tucui cai pacha camai tucuna pactashcapi.
66003011	Ñami shamuni. Can charishcata huacaichi, can charishca cuyaita ama pipash quichancapac.
66003012	Aticcanata ñuca Diospac huasipi columna nishcata rurashpa shayachisha, huiñaimi chaipi causanunca; paicunapimi ñuca Diospac shutita, ñuca Diospac llactapac shutitapash quillcasha, ñuca Diospac jahua pachamanta shamuc mushu Jerusalen; ñuca mushu shutitapash paicunapi quincashami.
66003013	¡Rinrita charic Samai iglesiacanaman rimashcata uyachan!'.
66003014	"Laodiceapi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Caitami shuti cac riman, mana llullashpa rimac ricuyac, tucui Dios rurashcapac amu.
66003015	Tucui can rurashcata yachani. Mana rupac canqui mana chiri canqui. ¡Chiri, rupac cashpa chari ashtahuan alli canquiman!
66003016	Ranti ansa cunuclla, mana chiri mana rupac cashcaraicu, ñuca shimimanta cuinashcanquimi.
66003017	Can tucuita charicmi cani rimanqui, huacaichishca achcami tiyahuan, mana imapash pishihuanchu ninqui; mana atipanqui canllata llaquipac cashcata, pipash canta ricushpa llaquiripac, tsuntsu, ñausa, llushti canqui.
66003018	Cai ñuca shimita uyai: ninapi chuyayachishca curita rantihuai, alli shuti pacha canta ama imapash pishincapac; shuc yurac churanatapash churarishpa can pincaipac llushtiyashcata quillpancapac, ñahui janpitapash, ñahuipi jahuirishpa ricuna ushancapac.
66003019	Ñucaca piñanimi, camachinimi ñuca llaquishcacunata. Chairaicu sinchicushpa cuti Diosman ticrai.
66003020	Ricui, puncupi cayacuni; maicanpash ñuca shimita uyashpa pascapi, paipac huasipi yaicushpa ishcantinpurami micushun.
66003021	Aticcunata ñuca tiyarinapimi paicunatapash tiyachisha, ñuca tiyarishca shina, ñuca yallishcapi, ñucapash ñuca Yayapac tiyarinapi tiyarircani, paipac mayanpi.
66003022	¡Rinrita charic, Samai iglesiacunaman rimashcata uyachun.!".
66004001	Chai huasha, chaipi jahua pachapi shuc puncu pascara ricurirca; ñaupa trompeta shina uyaric shimi cuti rimahuarca: —Caiman sicamui, ricuchishcanqui huasha tucunca rashcata—.
66004002	Chaillapita Samai amuyahuarca, jahua pachapi shuc tiyarina churashcata ricurcani, chai tiyarinapi shuc runa tiyacurca.
66004003	Tiyarinapi tiyacuc jaspemanta shina, granatemanta shina ricuric carca; chai tiyarina luyucta shuc cuichi esmeralda shina llinpiyac tiyarca;
66004004	chai tiyarina luyuctapash ishcai chunca chuscu tiyarinacunata ricurcani, chaicunapi ishcai chunca chuscu rucucuna tiyaranurca: yurac churarishca canurca, umapica curimanta llaututa charinurca.
66004005	Tiyarinamanta llinpiyashca, sinchi uyarishcacuna, tulupushcacuna llucshira-nurca; tiyarina ñaupacpi canchis achiccuna japirayanun, paicuna Diospac canchis samaicuna canun.
66004006	Chai tiyarina ñaupacpi tiyarca shuc ñucñu yacu shina ricuric, cristal shina chuya. Chaupi panpapi, tiyarina cashcapi, paipac mayanta, chuscu huihuacuna ñaupacman huashaman ñahuiyuccuna tiyanurca.
66004007	Ñaupacpi ricuric huihua puma shina ricuric carca; shucca cari huacra shina ricuric carca; chaishucca rana ñahuita charirca, puchucaica huanpurac huamani shina ricuric carca.
66004008	Paicanamanta caranlla sucta ricrata charinurca, jahuamanta ucumanta ñahuiyuccuna. Tutantin punchantin caita rimanata mana saquinunchu: '¡Santo, santo, santomi tucuita ushac Apunchic can, cac, cashca, shamanca rac!".
66004009	Chai chuscu huihuacuna caran caparishcapi "jatunyana, jahuanyana, cuyai tiyarinapi tiyacucpac, huiñai causacpac cachun" nishpa,
66004010	ishcai chunca chuscu rucucuna tiyarinapi tiyacucpac ñaupacpi paita chacchashpa cuncurinun. Paicunpac llaututa tiyarina ñaupacpi shitashpa rimanun:
66004011	"Apunchic Dios. Canlla cuyai, jatunyachish, jahuayachish tucana canqui, ushaitapash charinqui; can tucui tiyashcacunata rurashcaraicu can munashcaricu tiyanun, can paicanata rurashcanqui".
66005001	Tiyarinapi tiyacucpac yachac maquipi shuc pillu-chishca pancapi ucumanta canchamantapash quillcarayuc- ta ricurcani, cnachis sellocunahuan quillpashca carca.
66005002	Shuc ushayuc angel sinchi shimihuan tapucucta ricurcani: —¿Maicanmi sellocunata lliquishpa pilluchishca pancata pascana ushac tiyancachu?—
66005003	Ranti jahua pachapi, cai allpapi allpa ucupipash mana pipash tiyarcachu pilluchishca pancata pascashpa ricuna ushac.
66005004	Ñucaca yapa huacacurcani, pilluchishca pancata pascashpa, ricuna ushac mana tiyascaraicu.
66005005	Ranti rucucunamanta shuc rimahuarca: —Ama ashtahuan huacaichu, Judapac aillumanta puma, Jatun Curaca Davidpc churi, atishcami, pai pilluchishca pancata pascana ushan, sellocunatapash lliquina ushanmi.
66005006	Chashnapi, tiyarinahuan huihuacuna chaupipi, rucucuna chaupipi, shuc Corderota ricurcani. Shayacurca, huañuchishca shina ricurishpallata. Canchis cachuyuc, canchis ñahuiyuc carca, paicuna tucui pachaman Dios cachashca canchis samaicuna canun.
66005007	Chai Cordero rishpa tiyarinapi tiyacucpac yachac maquimanta pilluchishca quillcata japirca;
66005008	pai chai pilluchishca quillcata japishca shina, chuscu huihuacuna, ishcai chunca rucucanantin Corderopac ñaupacpi cuncurmurca. Tucui paicuna arpata charinurca; charinurcapash curimanta mucahuacuna sumiriuhuan juntachishca; chaicuna Diospac runacana Dios—huan rimarishca canun.
66005009	Cai mushu taquinata taquirananca: "Canllami pilluchishca quillcata japina ushanqui, paipac sellocanatapash lliquina ushanqui, camaripi huañuchishca cashpa; canpac yahuarta tallichishpa Diospacta rantircanqui tucui laya rana, tucui laya shimiyuc maipi causac, tucui laya llactacunata.
66005010	Paicunata Diospac mnacunata rurarcanqui, ñucanchic Diospac pacriyayacanata rurarcanqui paicanaca cai pachapac amumi canunca".
66005011	Huasha ricucpi, achca angelcanapac shimita tiyarina mayanpi, huihuacunapac, mayanpi caccunata uyarcani. Junu junu paicana jantaranurca,
66005012	cashna sinchi rimaranurca: "Camaripi huañuchishca Cordero pailla chasquina ushan ushaita, tucui charinata yachai, jahuayachina, jatunyachina, chacchana".
66005013	Jahua pachapi tiyac, allpapi tiyac, allpa ucupi tiyac, ñucñu yacupi tiyac Dios rurashca tucui imacuna cashna rimaranurca: "Tiyarmapi tiyacucta Corderotapash, huiñai huiñai chacchana, jatanyana, jahuayana, ushai cushca cachan".
66005014	Chuscantin huihuacuna "Chashna cachun" cutipara-nurca. Chuscu chunca chuscu rucucunaca cuncurishpa chacchanurca.
66006001	Chai huasha ricurcani ima shina Cordero canchismanta sellocanata shucta lliquirca; chaipi uyarcani chai chuscu huihuacunamanta shuc caita rimarca tulupushca shina shimihuan: —Shamui.
66006002	Ricushpa ricurcani shuc yurac caballota, paipac jahuapi tiyacuc shuc ballestata maquipi charirca. Paita shuc llaututa cunurca, atishpa atincapac llucshirca.
66006003	Cordero ishcai niqui sellota lliquishcapi, ishcai niqui huihua rimashcata uyarcani: —ShamuL
66006004	Chaipi shuc caballo llucshirca. Chaica puca carca, paipac jahuapi cac cai pachamanta alli causaita anchuchincapac ushaita chasquirca, runacuna paicunapura huañuchinacuncapac; paita shuc shuc jatun mircanuta cunurca.
66006005	Cordero quimsa niqui sellota lliquishcapi, quimsa niqui huihua caita rimashcata uyarcani: —Shamui. Ricushcapi, shuc yana caballota ricurcani, paipac jahuapi tiyacuc shuc llashai camanata maquipi charirca.
66006006	Chuscu huihua ucumanta cai shimi rimashca uyarcani: "Shuc kilo trigolla shuc pancha llancashcamanta, chashnallata quimsa kilo cebadalla shuc pancha llancashcamanta; ranti yancamanta ama jichanquichicchu huirata vinotapash".
66006007	Cordero chuscu niqui sellota lliquishcapi, chuscu niqui huihua caita rimashcata uyarcani: —Shamui.
66006008	Ricushcapi ricurcani shuc quilluric caballota, paipac jahuapi tiyacucca Huañui shutiyuc carca. Paipac huashalla huañui pachamanta shamucta ricurcani, paicuna chaupi pachamanta chaupi pachapi ushaita cui tucunurca, macanacu-chishpa huañuchincapac, yaricaicunahuan, uncuicanahuan, cai allpapi tiyac pumacunahuan huañuchincapac.
66006009	Cordero pichca niqui sellota lliquishcapi, Diospac shimita yachachishcamanta huañushcacunata altar ucupi ricurcani.
66006010	Caparishparimaranurca: —Tucuimanta yalli santo, cusca, allpamanta runacanata taripana punchata chapaimanta aminchicmi; ñucanchicta hua-ñuchishcamanta ñacachinatapash chapaimantami aminchic.
66006011	Chaipi yurac churanacunata paicunaman cunurca, chai-ra ansata samaichic rimai tucunurca, Cristota yanapashcamanta huañuchi tucuccanapac huauquicunapac tuputa pactachinacama.
66006012	Cordero sucta niqui sellota lliquishcapi, ricurcani, shuc jatun allpa cuyurina tiyarca. Inti yana tucurca, llaquirishbcapi churarishca churana shina; quilla, puca yahuar shina tucurca,
66006013	cuillurcunaca jahua pachamanta allpaman urmanurca, llullu higo muyucunapaipac yuramanta sinchi huairahuan urmashca shina.
66006014	Quillca panca pilluchishca shina jahua pacha chincarirca, tucui urcucuna islacunapash paicuna shayashca-manta chicanman cuyuchi tucunurca.
66006015	Cai pachamanta apucuna allpa jutcucunapi, rumi ucucanapi miticanurca, jatun apucunantin soldado apucanantm achcata chariccunantin, ushai chariccunantin, tucui huataracunantin quishpiracunantinpash;
66006016	paicuna rimanurca rumicunata urcucanatapash: —Ñucanchic jahuapi urmashpa pacaichic ñucanchicta tiyarinapi tiyacucpac ñahuimanta, Cordcropac piñarimantapash.
66006017	Ñacarina puncha pactarishcaraicu, ¿maicanllaca ñacarinata aparina ushancachu?.
66007001	Chaita ricushca huasha, chuscu cuscacunapi chuscu shayac angelcunata ricurcani, paicuna chuscu huairacanata jarcaranurca ama allpapi huairancapac, ama ñucñu yacupi huairancapac, ama maican yurapipash huairancapac.
66007002	Ricurcanipash shuc angel inti llucshinamanta shamucta, causac Diospac sellota pai charirca. Chai angel sinchi shimihuan caparirca chaishuc chuscu cai allpata ñucñu yacantin huacllichina ushaita chasquiccanata:
66007003	—Allpata, ñucñu yacuta yuracunatapash ama huacllichichicchu, ñucanchic Diospac runacunata paicunapac Irentepi chaira mana churashca cashpa.
66007004	Mashna jahuishcacuna cashcata yacharcani: shuc patsac chuscu chunca chuscu huaranca tucui IsraeI aillucunamanta.
66007005	Judapac aillucunamanta chunca ishcai huaranca jahui tucunurca, chunca ishcai huaranca Rubenpac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Gadpac aillumanta,
66007006	chunca ishcai huaranca Aserpac aillumanta, chanca ishcai huaranca Neftalipac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Manasespac aillumanta,
66007007	chunca ishcai huaranca Simeonpac aillumanta, chuncaishcai huaranca Levipac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Isacarpac aillumanta,
66007008	chunca ishcai huaranca Zabulonpac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Josepac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Benjammpac aillumanta.
66007009	Chai huasha ricurcani, achca runa tucui mama-llactacunamanta, tucui laya runacuna, tucui laya shimi, tucui laya llactacunamanta. Tiyarina ñaupacpi, Cordero ñaupacpi shayaranurca, manapi yupaipac achca canurca. Yurac churarish-ca canurca, maquipi chanta pancata aparanurca.
66007010	Tucui sinchi shimihuan capariranurca: —Atina tiyarinapi tiyacuc ñucanchic Diospacmi Corderopacpashmi can.
66007011	Tucui angelcuna tiyarina luyucta, rucucuna, chuscu huihuacana luyucta shayaranurca; tiyarina ñaupacpi frentehuan allpapi tacarinacama patarinurca, Diosta chacchanurca
66007012	rimashpa: —¡Chashna cachun! Chacchana, jatunyana, yachai, pacrachuna, jahuayachina, ushai, sinchi cana ñucanchic Diosman cushca cachun huiñai huiñai. ¡Chashna cachun!.
66007013	Chashnapi rucucunamanta shuc tapuhuarca: —¿Cai yurac churanahuan churarishcacuna picunami canun?, ¿paicuna maicanta shamushcata yachanquichu?.
66007014	—Canca yachanquimi apulla, paita cutiparcani. Paica rimahuarca: —Caicunami jatun ñacarinamanta shamuccuna canun, paicunami churanata maillashpa Corderopac yahuarpi yuracyachiccuna canun.
66007015	—Chairaicumi Diospac tiyarina ñaupacpi canun, tutantin punchantinmi paipac huasipi paita yanapanun. Tiyarinapi tiyacuc paicunata ricunca.
66007016	Yaricai, upianai ña mana ñacarmuncachu, intipash paicunata mana rupachincachu, rupaipash paicanata mana quillachincachu;
66007017	tiyarina chaupipi cac Cordero, ovejacunata shina ricucushcaraicu paimi causaita cuc pacchacunaman purichinca, Diosca tucui ñahui yacumanta paicanata pichanca.
66008001	Cordero pilluchishca quillcamanta canchis niqui sellota lliquishcapi, jahua pachapi ansata chunlla saquirirca.
66008002	Chai huasha Diospac ñaupacpi canchis angelcuna shayacucta ricurcani, canchis trompetacunata paicunaman cunurca.
66008003	Chai huasha shuc angel shamurca, shuc curi sumiriu rupachinahuan altar ñaupacpi shayarirca; paiman achca sumiriuta cunurca tiyarma ñaupacpi tiyac curimanta altarpi rupachincapac, tucui Diospac runacuna paiman mañashcacunata ricuchincapac.
66008004	Angelpac maquimanta llucshic sumiriu cushni Diospac ñaupacman sicarca, Diospac runacuna mañashcacunahuan pacta.
66008005	Chashnapi sumiriu rupachinata angel japirca, altarmanta nina puchucunata japirca; chaipi juntachishpa, tucui allpapi shitarca; chaipi tulupuna, llinpiyana, uyarishcacuna, shuc allpa cuyurina tiyanurca.
66008006	Canchis trompetayuc angelcuna uyachincapac allichiri-nurca.
66008007	Shuc angel paipac trompetata uyachirca, chashnapi rasu muyucana ninahuan yahuarhuan chapuchishca allpaman shitai tucunurca. Quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca allpa ruparca, paipi tiyac yuracunantin, tucui huailla quihuacunan-tin.
66008008	Ishcai niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi jatun urcu shina ricuric ninalla japichishca ñucñu yacupi shitai tucurca; chashnapiquimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca ñucñu yacu yahuarlla tucurca.
66008009	Chashnapi ñucñu yacu quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishcapi tucui ima causacpash huañunurca; chashnallata barcocunapash shuc raquishca huacllichishca saquirmurca.
66008010	Quimsa niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi, shuc jatun cuillur shuc nina shina japichishca; yacucuna, pacchacuna, quimsapi raquishcamanta, shuc raquishcapi urmarca.
66008011	Chai cuillur Ajenjo shutiyuc carca; yacucuna quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca jayac tucurca, chashna yacucuna jayac tucushcamanta achca ranacuna huañanurca.
66008012	Chuscu niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi, mti quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca huacllichi tucurca; chashnallata quilla quimsapi raquishcamanta, cuillurcunapash quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca huacllichi rucunurca. Chashna paicanapash quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca yana saquirirca, puncha tuta quimsapi raquishcamanta paicunamanta shuc raquishca mana ricuchinurca.
66008013	Chai huasha ricurcani, chaipi shuc huamani chaupi jahua pachapi huanpurashpasinchi shimihuan rimacurca: —Ai, ai, ai allpamanta runacuna, chai shuc quimsa angelcana trompetata uyachicpi, ima chari tucanunca.
66009001	Pichca niqui angeI paipac trompetata uyachirca, chashnapi shuc cuillur jahua pachamanta allpaman urmashcata ricurcani; paita huaicupi tiyac jitapac llaveta cunurca.
66009002	Huaicupi tiyac jitata pascashcapi, chaimanta shuc jatan ninamanta shina cushni llucshirca; chai jitamanta cushni intita huairatapash puyuyachirca.
66009003	Chai cushnimanta jiquicuna llucshishpa tacui allpapi chausirinurca; uputinticuna shina cana ushaita cui tucunurca.
66009004	Paicuna rimai tucunurca ama shuc quihuata, ama huailla ricuricta, ama shuc yurata huacllichincapac, frentepi Diospac sellota mana chariccunallata huacllichincapac rimai tucanurca.
66009005	Ranti runa huañuchincapac mana rimai tucunurca; paicuna nanachishca uputinti tucsishca shina nanaimi carca.
66009006	Chai punchacunapi runacuna huañuita mashcashpapash mana tarmuncachu; paicuna huañuita mashcacpipash, huañuica paicanamantachicauyancami.
66009007	Chai jiquicuna macanacuncapac allichishca shina canurca; paicanapac umapi shuc curi llautu shinata charinurca, paicunapac ñahuica runa shina ricuric canurca.
66009008	Huarmi acchata shina charinurca, paicunapac quiruca puma quiru shina.
66009009	Paicunapac aichaca jillaimanta rurashca churanahuan shinata chararishca, paicunapac ricra uyarishca achca carrocuna caballocuna aisashca macanacuipi yaicushca shina uyariccuna canurca.
66009010	Paicunapac chupacuna tucsina apariclla, uputinti chupa shina ricuric canurca, chai chupacunapi ushaita charinurca pichca quilla tuputa runacunata ñacachincapac.
66009011	Jiquicanata pushaccama, pai huaicumantaangel can, hebreo shimipi Abadón shutiyuc can, ranti griego shimipica Apolión can.
66009012	Ñaupa ñacari ña tucurirca; ranti chaira ishcai pishin.
66009013	Sucta niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi, Diospac ñaupacpi tiyac curimanta rurashca altarpi tiyac chuscu cachucunamanta shuc shimita uyarcani.
66009014	Chai shimi suCta niqui trompetata charic angelta rimarca: —Jatun Eufrates yacu mayanpi huatashca tiyac chuscu angelcunata cachari.
66009015	Chashnapi chai chuscu angelcuna cachari tucunurca, runacuna quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishcata huañuchincapac; paicunaca chaipac chaparanurca, chai pachata, chai punchata, chai quillata, chai huatata.
66009016	Uyarcani caballopi cac soldadocuna ima tupu cashcata: ishcai patsacjanu canurca.
66009017	Chai nuspaipi chai caballocunata paicunapac jahuapi tiyaccunantin cashnami ricurcani: paicunapac jillaimanta churana mna shina ricuric, jacinto shina ancas, azufre shina quillu carca. Caballocanapac umaca puma uma shina canurca; shimimantaca nina, cushni, azufre shitaranurca.
66009018	Runacuna quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca cai quimsacanaraicu huañunurca, rimacpica, ninaraicu, cushniraicu, azufreraicu.
66009019	Caballocunaca huañuchina ushaita paicunapac shimipi charinan paicunapac chupapipash; paicanapac chupa machacui shinami canurca, umacanahuan huacllichic canurca.
66009020	Ranti puchuc runacuna, chai huañuicanahuan mana huañuccuna, paicana ñaupac mana alli rurashcata cunanpash ruranata mana saquinurcachu; curimanta, cullquimanta, antamanta, rumimanta, caspimanta, mana uyana ushac, mana ricuna ushac, mana purina ushac supaicunata huacacanatapash chacchanata mana saquinurcachu.
66009021	Huañuchinatapash mana saquinurcachu, sacracunatapash, yumashpa juchallinatapash, shuhuanatapash mana saquinurcachu.
66010001	Cuti shuc ushayuc angel jahua pachamanta puyupi uraicumucta ricurcani; umapi shuc cuichita charirca; paipac ñahui inti shina chiuclla carca; paipac chancacunaca nina jahuapi japirashca shina ricuric canurca.
66010002	Paipac maquipi shuc pascara quillcata charicurca; paipac yachac chaquita ñucñu yacu jahuapi churarca, lluquitaca allpa jahuapi.
66010003	Shuc puma piñarishpa caparishca shina caparirca; pai caparishcapi, canchis tuluncuna paicunapac quiquin shimita uyachinurca.
66010004	Canchis tuluncuna rimashca huasha, ñuca quillcanca rarcani; ranti chashnapi shuc jahua pachamanta shimi ñucaman rimashcata uyarcani: —Canchis tuluncuna rimashcata canlla huacaichi, ama quillcaichu.
66010005	Chashnapi ñuca ricushca ñucñu yacupi, allpapi shayacu angel, paipac yachac maquita jahua pachaman jatachishpa,
66010006	sinchi shimita rimarca huiñai causacraicu, jahua pacha, allpa, ñucñu yacu, tucui paicunapi tiyaccunata ruracraicu. Rimarca: —Ña chapana ashtahuan mana tiyancachu;
66010007	canchis niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachincapac callarishcapi, Dios pacashpa charishca yuyai ña pactarishcami canca, pai paita yanapac profetacanata rimashca shina.
66010008	Ñuca ñaupa uyashca shimi, jahua pachamanta uyaric shimi, cuti rimashpa, caita rimahuarca: —Rishpa japi pascara quillca pancashituta chai ñucñu yacupi, allpapi shayacuc angel paipac maquipi charicushcata.
66010009	Angelpacman rishpa chai quillca pancashituta cuhuai mshpa mañarcani, paica cutipahuarca: —Caica, micui. Canpac shimipica mishqui shina mishquimi canca, ranti canpac huicsapica jayacmi tucanca.
66010010	Quillca pancashituta angelpac maquimanta japishpa, micurcani; ñuca shimipica mishqui shina mishqui carca, ranti micushca huasha ñuca huicsapi jayac tucuhuarca.
66010011	Chashnapi rimahuanurca: —Cutillata Dios achca llactacunamanta, mama— llactacunamanta, shimicunamanta, reicunamanta tucunca rashcata rimashcata rimana canqui.
66011001	Shuc pintu shina ricuri tupuna caspita cuhuanurca, cashna rimashpa: —Jatarishpa tupui Diospac huasita altartapash, chaipi chacchaccunatapash yupai.
66011002	Ranti ama tupuichu Diospac huasi ñaupacpi tiyac chushac panpata, Diosta mana ricsiccunaman cushca cashcaraicu; paicuna santo llactata chuscu chunca ishcai quilla tupu jaitashpa shitanca ranun.
66011003	Ñucaca ishcai ricuyaccuna tsaca churana churarishcacunata cachanca rani, shuc huaranca ishcai patsac sucta chanca puncha ñucaraicu rimancapac.
66011004	Cai ishcai ricuyaccuna allpa amupac ñaupacpi shayac ishcai olivocuna, ishcai candelabrocuna canun.
66011005	Maicanpash paicanata huacllichinata manacpi, ninata shimimanta paicana shitanun, chai nina paita piñaccunata illacta rupachic can; chashnami maicanpash paicunata huacllichinata munac huañunca.
66011006	Cai ricuyaccana jahua pachata quillpana ushaita charinan, caicuna Diospac—raicu rimacushcapi tucui pacha ama tamiachan, paicuna ushaitapash charinan yacuta yahuarta rurancapac, tucui Jaya uncuicunahuan aIlpata ñacachin-capacpash, paicana manashcacama.
66011007	Ranti paicuna ruranata tucuchishcapi, manchaipac huaicumanta sicamuc huihua paicunahuan macanacushpa, atishpa, paicunata huañuchincami.
66011008	Paicunapac ayacuna shitashcami saquirinunca Apanchic chacatai tucushca jatun llacta callecunapi, chai llactata iniccuna Sodoma, mana cacpi Egipto ninun.
66011009	Quimsa punchya chaupi caran laya llactamanta runa, tucui laya yahuaryuc, ima shimiyuc, mai mama—llactamantacuna paicunapac ayacunata ricununca, panpancapac mana saquinancachu.
66011010	Cai allpapi causaccuna paicuna huañushcamanta cushiyanuncami. Cushiyaimantami tucuipura cuyaicunata curinacunca, chai ishcai profetacana causacushpa paicanata ñacachiccana cashcaraicu.
66011011	Ranti quimsa puncha chaupi tucurishcapi, Dios paicunata causachicpi cutillata jatarinurca, tucui paicunata ricuccuna mana ushaipac mancharinurca.
66011012	Chashnapi chai ishcai ricuyaccuna jahua pachamanta shuc sinchi shimi paicunaman cashna rimashcata uyanurca: "Caiman sica-muichic". Paicunaca shuc puyupi jahua pachaman sicanurca, paicunata chicniccunapipash ricui tucunurca.
66011013	Chaillapita shuc jatun allpa chausirina tiyarca, chai allpa chausirinaraicu llacta chuncapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca tularirca, chaipi canchis huaranca runacuna huañunurca. Chaira causac quipariccuna mancharimantalla jahua pachapi Diosta chacchanurca.
66011014	Ishcai niqui huañui tucurirca, shinapash mana unaichu quimsa mqui huañuica pactamunca ran.
66011015	Canchis niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi, sinchi shimihuan cashna rimashcacana uyarinurca: —Cunanca cai pacha ñucanchi Diospac, paipac Cristopac pachami tucushca, paica huiñai huiñaimi amu canca.
66011016	Diospac ñaupacpi paicunapac tiyarinapi tiyacuc ishcai chunca chuscu rucucuna, allpaman cumurishpa, Diosta cashna nishpa chacchanurca:
66011017	—Tucuita ushac Apunchic Dios, canta pacrachanchic, can canqui, can carcanqui, can canpac ushaita japishpa, apu tucuncapac callarishcaraicu.
66011018	Mama-llactacuna piñarinushca; ranti canpac piñarina pacha, huañushcacanata taripana pacha ña pactashca mari; paicunaman cunata canta yanapac profetacanaman cunquimi, canpac runacunaman canpac shutita yupaichaccuna- manpash, jatun cacpi uchilla cacpi imapash; allpata huacllichiccunata huacllichinquimi.
66011019	Chaipi jahua pachapi tiyac Diospac huasi pascarirca; chai huasi ucupi Dios—huan runacanahuan cunacushca shimita ricuchic Arca chaipi ricuricurca. Chaipi llinpiyashca, uyarish-cacuna, tuluncuna, allpa chausirishca, rasu muyu tallirishca tiyanurca.
66012001	Shuc jatun ricuna jahua pachapi ricurirca: shuc huarmi intihuan churanapi pillurishca shina, quillata paipac chaquipi charishpa, umapica chunca ishcai cuillurhuan rurashca llaututa charirca.
66012002	Chai huarmi chichu carca; huahua nanashcaraicu, huahuayana ñacarma tiyashcaraicu capancurca.
66012003	Chai huashalla cuti shuc jatun ricuna jahua pachapi ricurirca: shuc jatun puca, canchis umayuc, caran umapi llautuyuc dragón nishca ricurirca.
66012004	Paipac chupahuan cuillurcuna quimsapi raquishca-manta shuc raquita aisashpa, allpaman shitarca. Chai dragón huachacuc huarmipac ñaupacpi shayarirca, pai huachashca shina paipac churita micancapac.
66012005	Chai huarmica shuc cari huahuata huahuayarca, paimi tucui mama—llactacunata sinchi maquihuan pushanca. Ranti paipac churita quichushpa Diospac ñaupacman, paipac tiyarinaman apai tucurca;
66012006	chai huarmica chunlla allpaman miticushpa rirca, chaipi Dios paita pacancapac shuc huasita allichishcarca; chaipimi paita shuc huaranca ishcai patsac sucta chunca punchata carashpa charinanca.
66012007	Chai huasha jahua pachapi shuc macanacui tiyarca: Miguel paipac angelcunantin dragonhuan macanacunurca. Dragón paipac angelcunantin macarinurca,
66012008	ranti paicuna mana atinata ushanurca; chashnamanta jahua pachapi mana causana ushanurca.
66012009	Chashna callpachi tucurca chai jatan dragón, chai callarimanta machacui, pai Supai, Satanas shutiyuc can, pai tucuicanata umachic can. Pai, paipac tucui angelcunantin allpaman shitai tucanurca.
66012010	Chashnapi shuc sinchi shimi cashna rimacta uyarcani: —Diospac quishpina, paipac ushai, paipac pacha ña pactashcami, paipac Mesiasca apumi can; ñucanchic huauquicunata cautsayachicuc callpachic tucushcami, paimi tutantin punchantin Diospac ñaupacpi paicunata cautsayachi-curca.
66012011	Ñucanchic huauquicuna Cordero tallichishca yahuarhuan, paicuna ricsichishca shimihuan paita atmushcami; huañunata mana manchanurcachu, ashtahuan huañuna yuyaitami charinurca.
66012012	Shina cacpi, jahua pachacuna cancanapash chaipi causaccuna, cushiyaichic. Ranti allpapi, ñucñu yacupi causaccanamanta mana yachanicbu, supaimi piñarimanta chucchushpa cancunapacman uraicushca, pai yachan mari mana unai causanca rashcata.
66012013	Chai dragón allpaman jichui tucushcata ricushpa, chai cari huahuata charic huarmita japisha nishpa catirca.
66012014	Chai huarmita ishcai jatun huamani ricrata churanurca, pai causancapac chunlla allpapi huacaichishcaman huanpurishpa rma ushancapac, machacuimanta camman, paita quimsa huata chaupi paita carashpa charinca racushcapi.
66012015	Machacui yacuta shimimanta shitarca, huarmita jarcancapac;
66012016	ranti allpa chai huarmita yanaparca, paipac shimita pascashpa machacui paipac shimimanta shitashca yacuta illacta millpurca.
66012017	Chashna tucucpi, chai dragón huarmihuan piñarishpa, paipac aillucana-huan macanacucrirca, Dios rurai mshcacunata caticcunahuan, Jesucristo shuti cashcata yachachiscamanta mana chicanyashpa pmiccunahuan.
66013001	Chai dragón ñucñu yacu patapi shayarirca. Shuc manchaipac huihua canchis umayuc, chunca cachuyuc ñucñu yacumanta shamucta ricurcanL Caran cacnupi shuc llaututa charirca, umacunapica Diosta piñac shuticunata charirca.
66013002	Chai ñuca ricushca manchaipac huihua puma shina ricuric carca; paipac chaquicuna oso chaqui canurca, shimica león shimita charirca. Dragón paiman paipac ushai, paipac tiyarinata curca, yapa ushaita curca.
66013003	Chai mauchaipac huihuamanta shuc uma huañuncapac cuchushcata charirca; ranti chai cuchushcamanta janpi tucurca, tucui pacha mancharishpa chai manchaipac huihuata catinurca.
66013004	Dragonta chacchanurca chai manchaipac huihuaman ushaita cushcaraicu, chai manchaipac huihuatapashcashna nishpa chacchanurca: —¿Cai manchaipac huihua shina maicanlla tiyanchu, pillapash paihuan macanacuna ushancachu?.
66013005	Diosta millashpa, piñashpa chai manchaipac huihua rimancapac saquinurcalla, chuscu chunca quilla pai amu causancapac saquinurcalla.
66013006	Chashna pai causarca, Diosmanta mana alli rimarca, Diosta piñachic shimicunata paipac huasitapash piñaica; jahua pachapi tiyaccanamantapash mana alli rimarca.
66013007	Diospac runacunahuan macanacuncapacpash saquinurcalla atircapash; tucui runa, tucui llacta, tucui shimi, tucui mama—llacta paipac canurca.
66013008	Cai manchaipac huihuata cai allpamantarunacuna, cai pacha rurashcapi, camaripi huañuchishca Corderopac causaccunapac pancapi mana paicunapac shutita quillcachishpa chanccanami paita chaccha-nurca.
66013009	Maicanpashrinriyuc cashpa, uyachun:
66013010	—Chunta curralman rina cac, chaiman richan; mircanuhuan huañana cac mircanuhuanmi huañuchic tucanca. Chairaicu Diospac runamanta caccuna sinchicunata, ininata charina Canan.
66013011	Chai huasha shuc manchaipac huihua allpamanta shamucta ricurcani. Cordero cachu shina ricuriccanata charirca, ranti shuc dragón shina rimac carca.
66013012	Ñaupac ricuric manchaipac huihua shinallata ushaita charirca, paipac ñaupacpi, allpata tucui paipi causaccunantin, ñaupac ricuric manchaipac huihuata chacchachirca, chai huañuncapac cuchui tucushcamanchaipac huihuata.
66013013	Jatun mancharicushiyanacu-natapash rurashpa ricuchirca. Jahua pachamanta ninata allpamanpash urmachichirca, runacuna ricushcapi.
66013014	Ñaupac ricuric manchaipac huihuapac ñaupacpi paita rurachishcahuan, allpamanta runacunata umachirca; rimarca chai mircanuhuan cuchui tucushpapash chaira causacuc manchaipac huihuapac huacata rurancapac.
66013015	Huasha ricuric manchaipac huihuata, chaishuc manchaipac huihuapachuacata causaita cuna ushaita cunurca, chai huaca rimancapac callarishpa tucui paita mana chacchaccunata huañuchichincapac.
66013016	Tucuicanata, huahuacu-na, rucucuna, tucuita chariccuna, llushticuna, huataracuna, quishpiracunata yachac maquipi, lrentepi cashpa imapash, shuc mircata churachirca.
66013017	Chashna mana pipash rantincapac, catuncapac mana ushanurcachu, chai manchaipac huihuapac mircata, paipac shutita, paipac quillcata imapash mana charishpa.
66013018	Caipimi yuyayuc caccana yachanunca; maican atipac, Dragonpac pacashca cashca yupaita pacllapi churachan. Shuc runami can, paipac yupai canmi sucta patsac sucta chunca sucta.
66014001	Corderota Sion urcupi shayacucta ricurcani. Paihuan shuc patsac chuscu chunca chuscu huaranca runacuna frentepi Corderopac shutita paipac Yayapac shutita quillcara charinurca.
66014002	Chai huasha jahua pachamanta uyarishcata uyar-cani; shucpaccha uyarishca shina carca, sinchi tulun uyarishca allpaman taanacta tucushca shina; achca arpata uyachiccuna as-pishpa uyachicushca shina uyaric.
66014003	Shuc mushu taquinata tiyarina ñaupacpi, chuscu huihuacuna ñaupacpi, rucucuna ñaupacpi taquiranurca. Mana pipash chai taquinata yachana usharca, chai shuc patsac chuscu chanca chuscu huaranca allpa-pi causac runa ucumanta quishpichishcacunalla.
66014004	Caicuna huarmihuan mana tacarinurca, paicana huarmi mana camac ca-nun; Cordero maita ricpipash paita catinan. Tucui runa ucu-manta Diospac Corderopacpash ñaupac camari shina quishpichi tucanurca.
66014005	Mana shuc llulla rimashcahuan paicuna shimipi tupai tucunurca, mana juchayuc canan paicuna.
66014006	Shuc angel chaupi jahua pachapi huanpuracta ricurcani; mana tucuric shimita allpapi causaccunaman, tucui mama—llactacunaman, runacanaman, tucui shimicunama, tucui llactacunaman shuc mana tucuric huillashcata ricsichincapac apacurca.
66014007	Smchi shimihuan rimacurca: —Diosta manchaichic, paita chacchaichic, pai taripana pacha ñami pactashca. Jahua pachata, allpata, ñucñu yacuta, pacchacanata ruracta chacchaichic.
66014008	Ishcai niqui angel catishpa, caita rimacurca: —Urmarca, jatun Babilonia urmarcami, pai tucui runacunata paipac mana alli causai vinota upiachirca.
66014009	Chai huasha, quimsa niqui angel catirca, paica cashna sinchi shimihuan rimacurca: —Maicanpash manchaipac huihuata chacchashpa, paipac huacatapash paipac mircata frentepi maquipi imapash churachicpi, l
66014010	Diosmanta shamuc manchaipac ñacarinata vinotami upiana tucunca, Diosllata allichishca paipac piñari mucahuapi; nina ñacarina, azufre ñacarinami angelcunapac ñaupacpi, Corderopac ñaupacpi ñacachi tucunca.
66014011	Pai ñacarishca cushni huiñai huiñai sicacan; tuta puncha samana mana tiyanchu manchaipac huihuata, paipac ricchaintin chacchaccanapac, paipac shutipac mircata chasquiccanapac.
66014012	Chashnamanta, Diospac runa caccuna, pai rurai nishcacanata caticcuna, Jesustapash mana pantashpa caticcuna, achca sinchicanata charina canan.
66014013	Chashnapi jahua pachamanta shuc shimita uyarcani, cashna rimahuarca: —Caita quillcai: Cunanmanta Apunchic—huan llutarishca huañuccuna cushiyanuchun. —Ari —Diospac Samai riman—, samanuncami paicunapac llancanamanta, paicuna rurashca paicanahuan canun.
66014014	Nuspaipi shuc yurac puyu ricurirca, chai puyu jahuapica shuc runa shina ricuric tiyacurca. Curi llaututa umapi charirca, maquipica sumacta manñayachishca hozta charirca.
66014015	Diospac huasimanta cuti shuc angel llucshirca, puyupi tiyacucta sinchi shimihuan caparishpa: —Canpac hozta cuyuchishpa muyuta pallai; ña pacha pactashcaraicu, allpamanta muyupucushca can.
66014016	Puyupi tiyacuc paipac hozta allpapi pitishpa, muyuta pallarca.
66014017	Chai huasha cuti slmc angel jahua pachapi tiyac Diospac huasimanta llucshirca, paipash sumacta manñayachishca hozta charirca.
66014018	Altarmanta shuc angel lluchsirca, pai ninamanta mincai tucushca can. Paica sumacta manñayachishca hozta charicta caparirca: —Canpac manñayachishca hozta cuyuchishpa, allpapi tiyac uva sapicanamanta huancucunata piti, ña pucura cashcaraicu.
66014019	Chai angel paipac hozta allpapi picashpa, allpapi tiyac uva huancucunata pitirca; chai huasha jatun purupi shitarca chaipi chahuai tucuncapac. Chaimi Diosmanta manchaipac shamuc ñacarina.
66014020	Chai uyacuna chahuai tucanurca llacta canchaman; chai purumantaca yahuar liucshirca, chai yahuar caballocuna freuo nishcacamami juntarirca, quimsa pacha kilometro panpapi.
66015001	Cuti shuc jatun manchaipacta ricurcani: canchis angelcuna canchis puchucai huañuicanata charinacurca, chaicunahuan Diospac piñarina tucurirca.
66015002	Ricurcanipash shuc mama—cuchashina cristalhuan ninahuan chapuchishcata; Chai cristalmanta mama-cucha patapi shayaranurca, Dios paicanaman cushca arpacunahuan, manchai- pac huihuata, paipac ricchai, paipac shutipac quillcaintin atish- ca runacuna.
66015003	Diospac rana Moisespac taquinata taquiranurca, Cordeiopac taquinatapash. Cashna rimaranurca: —Tucui can rurashca jatun sumacmi can, Apunchic, tucuita ushac Dios; canpac ñancuna cusca, shuticunami canan, mama—llactacunapac Apulla.
66015004	¿Canta mana manchac tiyancachu, Apunchiclla? ¿Canta mana chacchac tiyancachu maicanllaca? Canllami santo canqui; tucui mama—llactacuna shamanancami, canta chacchanancami, can cusca taripashcacuna ricurishcaraicu.
66015005	Chai huasha, nuspaipi ricurcani jahua pachapi Diospac huasi pascarishcata, Dios—huan runacanahuan shimi cunacush-camanta tanpu.
66015006	Chai Diospac huasimanta chai canchis huañuicunata charic canchis angelcana llucshinurca. Chuya, chiuclla lino churarishca canurca, pechopi curi chanpicunahuan huatarishca canurca.
66015007	Chuscu huihuacunamanta shuc, chai canchis angelcunaman caranma shuc curi mucahuata curca, Diosmanta shamuc manchaipac ñacarmahuan jantachishcacuna; chai huiñai mana tucurin.
66015008	Chai Diospac huasi Diospac ushai jatan cashcamanta cushnihuan juntarirca; mana pipash yaicuna usharca chai ucuman canchis angelcuna charishca canchis huañuicana tucurinacama.
66016001	Shuc sinchi shimi Diospac huasimanta llucshishpa canchis angelcunata rimarca: —Rishpa allpapi tallicrichic chai Diosmanta shamuc manchaipac ñacarmata charic canchis mucahuacunata.
66016002	Shuc niqui angel rishpa allpapi tallicrirca paipac mucahua charishcata; manchaipac huihuapac mircata chariccunaman, paipac ricchaita chacchaccunaman millai nanachic caracha llucshirca.
66016003	Ishcai niqui angel ñucñu yacupi paipac mucahuapi charishcata tallichirca; tucui ñucñu yacu yahuar tucurca, huañuchishca runapac shina, tucui ñucñu yacupi tiyac huihuacuna huañunurca.
66016004	Quimsa niqui angel yacucunapi, pacchacunapi paipac mucahuapi charishcata tallichirca, tucuilla yahuar tucunurca.
66016005	Chai huasha yacumanta angel rimashcata uyarcani: —Can cusca canqui chashna taripashcaraicu, santo Dioslla; can canqui, carcanqui,
66016006	paicuna yahuarta tallichishcaraicu canpac runacunamanta profetacunamantapash cunanca can paicunaman yahuarta upiachircanqui. ¡Chaita paicuna mananmca!.
66016007	Altarmanta caita rimashcatapash uyarcani: —Ari, Apunchic, tucuita ushac Dioslla, canmi shuti cuscata tariparcanqui.
66016008	Chuscu mqui angel paipac mucahuapi charishcata intipi tallichirca; intitaca runacunata ninahuan rupachina ushaita canacurca.
66016009	Tucuilla manchaipac rupashca saquirinurca; ranti Diosman mana ticranurcachu, paita mana chacchanurcachu, ashtahuan paita, cai huañuicunapi ushaita charicta, piñac shimicanata rimanurca.
66016010	Pichca niqui angel manchaipac huihuapac tiyarinapi paipac mucahuapi charishcata tallichirca, chairaicu paipac apu cana pacha yana tuta saquirirca. Runacuna nanaimantalla calluta canirinurca;
66016011	chashnapash mana alli ruranata mana saquinurcachu; chaipac rantimanta nanaraicu, millai carachacunaraicu jahua pachamanta Diosta piñac shimicunata rimanurca.
66016012	Sucta niqui angel paipac mucahuapi charishcata Eufrates yacupi tallichirca, chai yacu chaquirirca inti llucshinamanta shamuc apucuna chinpana ushancapac.
66016013	Dragonpac shimimanta, manchaipac huihuapac shimimanta, umachic profetapac shimimanta, quimsa ticllayuc samaicuna, janpatu shina ricuriccana llucshishcata ricurcani.
66016014	Mancharicushiyanacunata rurac supaicunapac samai canurca, tucuita ushac Diospac jatun punchapi macanacuncapac tucui cai pachamanta apucanata tantachincapac llucshinurca.
66016015	"Yuyapanquichic, shuhua shina cuncaimantami shamuni. Mana puñushpa churanantin tiyac cushiyachun; chashnami mana llushti cara purina tucunca, paipac pincaicana mana ricui tucununcachu".
66016016	Hebreo shimipi Armagedón mshca panpapi apucunata tantachinurca.
66016017	Canchis niqui angel paipac mucahuapi charishcata huairapi tallichirca, jahua pachapi tiyac Diospac huasimanta shuc sinchi shimi tiyarinamanta llucshishpa, caita rimarca: —Ña rurashcami can.
66016018	Chashnapi llinpiyashca, uyarishca, tuluncuna tiyarca, allpapash chucchurirca, cai pachapi runacuna causanca callarishcamanta tucui allpa chucchuimanta yalli allpa chucchui tiyashcaraicu.
66016019	Jatun llacta quimsapi raquirirca, cai pachamanta llactacunapash tularinurca; Diosca jatun llacta Babiloniamanta yuyarirca, pai piñarishpa cachamushca ñacachic vinota upiachincapac.
66016020	Tucui islacana urcucanapash chincarinurca;
66016021	jahua pachamanta jatun rasu paquicuna, shuc quintal tupu llashaccuna, runa jahuapi urmanurca, runacanaca rasu huañuiraicu Diosta piñanurca; jatanmi carca chai ñacarina.
66017001	Canchis mucahuata chariccunamanta shuc angel, ñucaman shamushpa rimahuarca: —Ricuc shamui, yacu jahuapi tiyacuc nuspa huarmi ñacarinca rashcata.
66017002	Cai pachamanta apucuna yumashpa paihuan juchallinushca, cai allpamanta runacuna paita huañupashpa ricushpa paipac vinota upiashpa machanacurca.
66017003	Chai huasha, chunlla allpaman pushahuarca: chaica shuc mushu nuspai carca. Chaipi shuc huarmi shuc manchaipac puca huihua jahuapi tiyacurca, chai Diosta piñac shuticunallahuan quillpashca carca; canchis umayuc, chunca cachuyuc carca.
66017004	Chai huarmi puca ansa pucari churanahuan churarishca carca; curihuan, sumac ricuric rumicunahuan, perlacunahuan huallcarishca carca. Curi mucahuata maquipi charirca; millaipaccunahuan, ticllacunahuan, pai yumashpa juchallishcacanahuan juntachishca carca;
66017005	chairapash shuc mana yachaipac shutita paipac Irentepi quillcashcatacharirca: "Jatan Babilonia, nuspacunapac mama, tucui cai allpapi mana alli tiyashcamanta mama".
66017006	Chai huasha atiparcani chai huarmi machac cashcata Diospac runacunapac yahuarhuan, Jesuspac ricuyac cashcamanta huañuchi tucuccunapac yahuarhuan. Paitaricushpa yapa mancharircani.
66017007	Chashnapi chai angel ranahuarca: —¿Canpacca manCharipacchu? Chai huarmipac, paita apacuc manchaipac canchis umayuc, chunca cachuyuc huihuapac pacara yachaitami canta ricsichinca rani.
66017008	Chai can ricushca manchaipac huihua ñaupacausarcami, cunan ña mana causanchu; chashnapash, huaicumanta sicanca ran pai chaira mana allipacha huacllichi tucushcallapita. Allpamanta runacu-na, cai pacha rurai tucushcamanta causacanapac quillcapi paicunapac shuti mana quillcashca chariccuna, mancharinunca-mi chai manchaipac huihua ñaupa causac, cunan mana tiyac cuti ticramucpi.
66017009	"Caipi ansa tiyan atipaccunata yuyachincapac: Canchis umacuna, canchis urcucana canun, chai huarmi tiyacushcacuna; chashnallata chai canchis umacuna, canchis apucuna canun.
66017010	Chaicunamanta pichcacana ña chincarmushca; shucca chaipi can; shucca chaira mana shamushca; pai pactamushpa mana unaichu causanca.
66017011	Chai ñaupa causac, canan ña mana tiyac manchaipac huihua, pusac niqui apu cau; chashna cashpallata canchiscunamanta can, paica chicapac chincarinaman mayanyacun.
66017012	"Can ricushca chunca cachucuna chunca apucuna canun, paicuna chaira mana apu tucunacushca; shinapash ansashitu apu tucununcami, manchaipac huihuahuan pacta.
66017013	Cai chunca apucuna chai yuyaillata charinun, paicuna ushaita, paicuna apu cashcata manchaipaca huihuaman cununca.
66017014	Corderohuanmi macarinunca, ranti Corderoca paicunata atmcami, Dios cayashcacunata acllashcacanatapash paihuan charishpa; Corderoca apucanapac Apu, curacacunapac Curacami can".
66017015	Chai angel caitapash rimahuarca: —Can ricushca nuspa huarmi tiyacushca yacucuna, llactacuna, runacuna, shimicuna, mama—llactacunami canun.
66017016	Can manchaipac huihuapi ricushca chunca cachucuna nuspa huarmita chicnmuncami, jichushpa llushtitami saquinunca; paipac aichata micununca, ninahuanpashmi rupachinunca.
66017017	Dios paicunapac shuncupi pai manashcata rurana yuyaita churashca; shuclla yuyaita japishpa, manchaipac huihuaman paicuna apu cashcata cununca Dios rimashca pactarinacama.
66017018	Can ricushca huarmi cai pachamanta apucunata paipac maquipi charic jatan llactami can.
66018001	Chai huasha, shuc angel jahua pachamanta uraicunata ricurcani; yapa ushaita charirca, allpapash paipac llinpic—huan punchaclla saquirirca.
66018002	Smchi shimihuan caparirca: —Jatun Babilonia urmarca, urmarca. Supaicunapac huasi tucushca; tucui laya ticllayuc samaicunapac huasi; millaipac, ticllayuc pumacunapac huasi.
66018003	Tucui pai juchallichishca mama—llactacana vinota upiashpa machanurca; cai pachamanta apucana paihuan yumashpa juchallmurca, cai pachapi catushpa cullquiyuccuna pai yapalla cullqui jichushcahuan cullquisapa tucunurca.
66018004	Jahua pachamanta cuti shuc shimita, cashna uyarcani: —Cancuna ñuca runacuna, chai llactamanta llucshichi cama paicunahuan juchallincapac, paicunapac huañuicuna cancunatapash ama pactancapac;
66018005	paicunapacjuchacuna jahua pachacamami tantarishca; Diosca paicana mana alli rashcata mana cuncarishcachu.
66018006	Pai shuccunaman cushca shinallata cuichic; paicushcamanta ishcai cuti tupu yapachishpa ticra-cnicnic; ishcaicuti ashtanuan yalli sinchita pai shuccunapacta chapuchishcata paipacta chapuchichic;
66018007	paita nanaita cuichic, ñacachichic pai jatanyarishca tuputa, pai cullquita jichushca tu-puta. Paica paipac shuncupi rimanmi: 'Caipimi shuc apu shina tiyacuni. Mana huacchachu cani. mana ñacarishachu'.
66018008	Chairaicu shuc punchallapi paipac huañuicuna paiman pacta-nuncami: huanuna, llaquirina, yaricai; ninapi rupachishcami canca; paitacautsayachic Dios tucuita ushac cashcaraicu.
66018009	Paihuan yumashpa juchallic cai pachamanta apucuna, paihuan cullquita tucuchiccuna, pai mpashca cushnita ricushpa huacanuncami, llaquirinuncami pairaicu.
66018010	Carulla saquirinun-ca nacacnic tucunata machashpa; cashnami rimanunca: —¡Ai, ai jatun llacta, Babilonia, ushayuc llacta! Ñahui pin
66018011	Cai pachamanta catuccunapash huacanuncami, liaquirinuncami chai liactaraicu, paicana catunata mana piman catuna ushashcaraicu:
66018012	paicuna apamushca curi, cullqui, sumac ricuric rumicuna, perlacuna, linomanta sumac churanacuna, sedamanta churana, quiquin puca, ansa pucari churanacuna; sumac ashnac caspicuna; marfilmanta rurashca imacunapash, munaipac caspimanta rurashca imacunapash, antamanta, jillaimanta, marmol nishcamanta;
66018013	paicuna apamushca ishpincu, sumac ashnac muyucuna; sumirta, mirra nishca, ashnac yacucuna; vino, huira, harina, trigo; jatun huacracuna, uclulla huacracuna, caballocana, canocuna, huatara mnacuna, yanapac runacuna.
66018014	Paicuna rimanuncami: —Ña mana tiyanchu can yapa munashca mishqui muyucuna; ña chicapac can sumac tiyanata, can achca charishcata chincachircanquimi.
66018015	Tucui chaicunata catuccana, llactaraicu cullquiyuccuna, pai ñacachi tucushcata manchashpa carulla saquirinunca, huacashpa, llaquirishpa,
66018016	cashnapashmirimananca: —¡Ai, ai jatun llacta! Sumac linohuan churarishca shina ricurirca, puca, pucari churanahuan churarishca, curihuan, perlacanahuan, sumac ricuric rumicunahuan sumacyaChishca.
66018017	¡Ñahui pin rashcapi chai tacui achca tiyashca illacta tucurishca! BarcoCunamanta tucui apucuna, tucur allpa mayan shina yacuta puriccuna, marinero nishcacuna, tucui ñucñu yacupi purishpa cullquiyaccuna, caruyashca saquirinurca;
66018018	chashna, llacta rupashcamanta cushnita ricushpa, caparinurca: —¿Maican llactapash cai llacta shina tiyarcachu?.
66018019	Chashna rimashpa, umapi ushpata churarishpa, huacashpa llaquirishpa, cashnacaparinurca: —¡Ai, ai jatun llacta! Pai tucui charishcahuan ñucñu yacupi barcota chariccuna cullquiyanurca. ¡Ñahui pin rashcapi iIlacta huacllichi tucushcal.
66018020	Chai llactaraicu, can jahua paChalla, cushiyai; cancunapash cushiyaichic, Diospac runacuna caccuna, apostolcunapash, profetacanapash, Dios paita cautsayachishpa, cancunaraicumi taripashca.
66018021	Chaipi shuc ushayuc angel shuc rumita jatachirca; chai rumi jatun cutana rumi shina carca, paita ñucñu yacuman shitashpa rimarca: —Cashnami can tulachi tucunqui, Babilonia, can jatan llacta, mana cuti canta ricununcachu.
66018022	Mana cuti arpa aspishca, pincullucuna uyachishca, trompetacuna uyachishca musica mana uyarincachu, manapi llancac canpi tiyancachu, cutana rumi uyarishcapash canpi mana uyarincachu.
66018023	Mana cuti canpi shuc chinpusullapash linpiyancachu, sahuariccuna raimishpa tulupushcapash ña mana uyarincachu, canpi catuccuna cai pachamanta ushayuccuna, can sacrashcacunahuan tucui mama—llactacunata umachishca cacpipash.
66018024	Chai llactapimi profetacunapac, Diospac runacunapac, tucui cai pachapi huañuchishcacanapac yahuar tuparishca.
66019001	Chai huasha, jahua pachapi achca runa cashna rimashcata uyarcani: —Apancluc chacchashca cachun. Quishpichina, jatanyana, ushai ñucanchic Diospacmi can,
66019002	paica cusca, shutita taripac mari can; mana ushaipac nuspa huarmita cautsayachishca mari, paimi paipac mana alli causaihuan pachata huacllichirca; Diosmi paipac runacana huañushcamicu chai huarmita ñacachirca".
66019003	Chai huasha cuti rimanacurca: —¡Apunchic chacchashca cachun! Nuspa huarmita rupachishcamanta cushni huiñai huiñai sicarancallami.
66019004	Ishcai chuscu rucucuna, chuscu causac huihuacunantin, allpacama cummishpa Diosta chacchanurca, paipac tiyarinapi tiyacucta. Cashna rimanurca: —¡Chashna cachan! ¡Apunchic chacchashca cachun!.
66019005	Chashnapi tiyarinamanta cashna rimashca uyarirca: —¡Tucui cancuna ñucanchic Diosta chacchaichic, uchillacuna jatancanantm, tucui cancuna paita yanapaccuna, paita yupaichaccana!".
66019006	Achca runapac shimita shinapash uyarcani, shuc paccha uyarishca shina, sinchi tuluncana shina. Caita rimaranurca: —¡Apanchic chacchashca cachan! Pai apu tucunca callarishcaraicu, ñucanchic tucuita ushac Dios.
66019007	Cushiyashun, cushiyashcahuan juntarishpa paita jatunyachishun, Cordero sahuarina pacha pactashcaraicu. Paipac huarmi alhchirishcami:
66019008	paita cuyanushca sumac lmomanta churarmata, chuya, llinpicta; chai linoca Diospac ranacana cusca causashca ricuchicmi can.
66019009	Angel rimahuarca: —Quillcai: 'Cordero sahuarina raimiman cayashcacuna cushiyanuchun'. Caitapash rimarca: —Chaicunami Dios alli shutipacha rimashca shimicuna canun.
66019010	Angelpac chaquipi cancurircani, paita chacchancapac, ranti pai rimahuarca: —Chaita ama rurarchu, ñucaca can shina, canpac huauquicuna shina Diosta yanapacmi cani, paicuna Jesus ricsichishcata cuscata catiranun. Diosta chacchai. Profetacunami Jesus yachachishcata huacaichinan.
66019011	Jahua pacha pascarishcapi ricurcani; chaipi shuc yurac caballo ricurirca, paipac jahuapi tiyacucpac shuti Cusca, Shuti carca, pai cuscata apacushcaraicu cuscatapash macanacushcarai-cu.
66019012	Paipac ñahuicuna nina shina llinpiyac canurca, umapi achca llautucunata charirca, pailla ricsishca shutitapash quillcashcata charirca.
66019013	Paipac churana yahuarpi jucuchishca carca, paipac shutica "Diospac Shimi" carca.
66019014	Jahua pachamanta soldadocuna, sumac lino churarishcacuna, yurac, chuya, yurac caballo jahuapi canurca.
66019015	Paicuna shimimanta shuc alli manñayachishca mircanu llucshirarca, mama— llactacunata chaihuan cuchuncapac. Paicunata sinchi maquihuanmi pushanca. Uvata chahuashca shina, jaitashca shinami paicunata taripanca, tucuita ushac Diosmanta manchaipac shamuc ñacarina vinotami paicunata upiachinca.
66019016	Paipac maquipi chancapipash cashna quillcarata charirca: "Curacanapac Curaca, apucunapac Apu".
66019017	Shuc angel, intipi shayarishpa jahua pachata huanpurac ancacanata sinchi shimihuan caparirca: —Shamuichic, tantarichic Diospac jatun micunapi micuncapac,
66019018	reicunapac, soldado apucunapac, sinchi mnacunapac aichata, caballocanapac aichata, paicunapac jahua-pi puriccunapac aichantm, tacuicunapac aicha; quishpiracuna- pac aicha, jatuncanapac, uchillacunapacaichata micancapac.
66019019	Manchaipac huihuata ricurcani, pachamanta apucunan-tin paicanapac soldadounantin, paicuna tantarmushcarca yurac caballopi tiyacuc—huan, paipac soldadccanahuan macarincapac.
66019020	Chai manchaipac huihua japi tucurca, paipac ñaupacpi mancharicushiyanata rurac umachic profetantin. Chai umachic profeta pai rurashcacunahuan chai manchaipac huihuapac mir-cata churachi tucuc runacanata paipac ricchaita chacchacunata-pash umachishcarCa. Chaipi chai manchaipac huihua umachi profetantin azufre rupacushca cuchapi causaccuna shitai tucu-nurca.
66019021	Chai shuccunaca caballo jahuapi tiyacucpac shimi-manta llucshic mircanuhuan huañuchi tucunurca; chaipi tucui ancacuna paicuna aichahuan mana ushaipac sacsanurca.
66020001	Jahua pachamanta shuc angel uraicumucta ricurcani, huaicumanta llaveta apamucurca, shuc jatun jillai huascata maquipi charirca.
66020002	Chai angel dragonta huatarca, chai calIarimanta machacui, pai supai can Satanas nishca, shuc huaranca huatapac jillai huascahuan huatarca.
66020003	Huaicuman shitashpa, chaipi paita huichcarca, puncupi shuc sellota churarca ama mama-llactacunata umachincapac shuc huaranca huata pactarinacama; chai huatacuna pactarishcapi mana anaipac cachari tucuncami.
66020004	Tiyarinacunata ricurcani, taripanca raccuna chaicunapi tiyaranurca. Chai huasha, Jesuspac ricuyaccuna cashcaraicu, Diospac shimita yachachishcaraicu umata piti tucuccanapac almacunata ricurcani. Paicanaca manchaipac huihuata mana chacchanushcarcachu; paipac ricchaitapash, paipac mircatapash frentepi, maquipi imapash mana churachinushcarcachu. Ricurcani paicuna cuti causanca callarishcata, shuc huaranca huata apu tucunurca Cristohuan.
66020005	Ranti shuc huañushcacuna huaranca huata pactarishcacama mana causarmurcachu. Chai ñaupac huañushcamanta cansarina can.
66020006	Ñaupac causarmata chariccuna cushiyanuchun, paicuna Diospac ranacana mari canun. Ishcai niqui huañui paicunapi ushaita mana charinchu, paicuna ashtahuan Diospac Cristopac pacriyayacunami cananca, paihuanmi shuc huaranca huata causanunca.
66020007	Shuc huaranca huata pactarishcapi, huatara cashcamanta Satanas cachari tucuncami,
66020008	Tucui pachapi tiyac mama-llactacunamanta runacuanta umachincapacmi llucshinca; Gogta, Magogtapash umachincapacmi llucshinca, paipac soldadocanata, ñucñu yacu patapi tiyac tiyu shina achcacunata-mi macanacancapac tantachinca.
66020009	Allpa ricurishcata sicanuica, Diospac runacana causana huasicunata muyuchinurca, pai llaquishca llactatapash. Ranti jahua pachamanta nina urmamushpa illacta paicunata rupachirca.
66020010	Paicunata umachic supaica nina azufreyuc cuchaman shitai tucurca, manchaipac huihua, umachic profeta shitai tucushcamanllata. Chaipimi huiñai huiñai tutantin punchantm ñacachi tucanunca.
66020011	Shuc jatun yurac tiyarinata ricurcani chaipi tiya cuctapash ricurcani. Paipac ñaupacpi cai pacha jahua pachantm alli pacha chincarinurca, ña maipipash mana ricurinurcachu.
66020012	Huañushcacanata ricurcani, jatuncuna uchillacunapash tiyarina ñapacpi shayaranurca; pancacuna pascai tucunurca, shuc pancapash pascai tucurca, chaica causaccunapac panca can. Huañushcacuna taripai tucunurca paicuna rurashcata ricushpa, chai pancacunapi quillcara tiyashcata ricushpa.
66020013	Ñucñu yacu paipi huañuccanata cutichirca, huañui pachapash paipi tiyac huañushcacunata cutichirca; caranlla taripai tucunurca caran amu rurashcata ricushpa.
66020014	Chai huasha huañui pacha nina cuchaman shitai tucurca. Cai nina cucha ishcai niqui huañui can;
66020015	causaccunapac pancapi mana paicunapac shutita quillcashcata chariccana chaiman shitai tucunurca.
66021001	Chai huasha mushu jahua pachata, mushu allpata ricurcani; ñaupa tiyac jahua pacha allpapash chincari-nushcarca, ñucñu yacupash.
66021002	Santo llactata ricurcani, mushu Jerusalenta, jahua pachamanta, Diospac ñaupacmanta uraicu-curca. Sahuarinca racuc huarmi cusapac allichirishca shina carca.
66021003	Shuc sinchi shimita tiyarinamanta cashna rimacta uyarcani: —Cunan Dios runacunahuan causan. Paicunahuanmi cau-sanca, paicuna paipac runacunami canunca, Diosllatami paicu-nahuan paicunapac Dios shina tiyanca.
66021004	Tucui paicuna hua-cashcata paimi chaquichinca, huañui ña mana tiyanchu, huacai, llaquirina nanaipash; tucui ñaupa tiyac cunan tucurishcaraicu.
66021005	Tiyarinapi tiyacuc rimarca: —Ñucami tucui imacanata mushuyachini. Caitapash nirca: —Quillcai, cai shimicuna uyana canan, shutimi canun".
66021006	Chai huasha rimahuarca: —Ña rurashcami can. Ñucami alfa omegapash cani, callarina, tucurinapash. Pipash upianayacpi causac paccha yacumantami, yanca upiachisha.
66021007	Atic runa tucui chaicunata-mi japinca ran; ñucaca paipac Dios casha, paica ñuca churi.
66021008	Ranti sanpacuna, mana iniccuna, millaipaccuna, runa huañuchiccana, yumashpa juchalliccuna, sacrachishpa puriccu-na, huacacanata chacchaccuna, tucui llullaisiquicanapash rupac azufreyuc cuchamanmi rina tucununca; chaimi ishcai niqui huañui can.
66021009	Canchis angelcunamanta shuc, chai canchis mucahuata canchis huañuicunahuan juntachishcata charic ñucaman mayanyashpa rimahuarca: —Shamui, sahuarmca racuc huarmita ricuchishcanqui, Corderopac huarmita.
66021010	Samai ricuchishca nuspaipi, chai angel shuc jatun jahua urcuman pushahuarca; jatun santo Jerusalen llactata ricuchihuarca, jahua pachamanta Diospac ñaupacmanta uraicucurca.
66021011	Dios llinpiyashcahuan llacta achicyacurca; pai achicyashca shuc sumac rumi achicyashca shina carca, jaspemanta rumi shina, cristal shina chuyac.
66021012	Llacta luyucta shuc jatan, jahua quincha tiyarca, shunca ishcai puncucunata charirca, caran puncupi shuc angel tiyarca; chai puncucanapi chunca ishcai Israelmanta huancurishca aillucunapac shuticana quillcashca tiyarca.
66021013	Quimsa puncu inti llucshinaman ñahuichashca canurca, quimsa uraiman, quimsa huichaiman, quimsa inti chincarinaman.
66021014	Chai llacta quincha chunca ishcai rumimanta sapicunata charirca, chaicunapi Corderopac chunca ishcai apostolcanapac shuticuna quillcara tiyanurca.
66021015	Ñucahuan rimaricuc angel curi caspita charirca llactata tupuncapac, puncucunata quinchatapash.
66021016	Chai llactapac chuscu mayancana chaipuralla canurca. Angel paipac caspihuan llactata tupurca: ishcai huaranca ishcai patsac kilometrocuna charirca; paipac chuscu mayancuna jahuamanpash chashnallata.
66021017	Chai huasha quinchata tupurca: sucta chunca pichca metrocuna charirca, runa yachai tupunami yuyarishpa chai angeltupucpi.
66021018	Jaspe rumimanta rurashca carca chai quincha, llactaca curimantalla carca, chuya cristal shina ricuric
66021019	Quinchamanta rumi sapicuna, tucui laya sumac ricuric rumicunahuan sumacyachishca carca; shuc niqui sapi, jaspehuan; ishcai niquica, zafirohuan; quimsa niquica, agatahuan; chuscu niquica, esmeraldahuan;
66021020	pichca niquica, onicehuan; sucta niquica, cornalinahuan; canchis niquica, crisolitohuan; pusac niquica, berilohuan; iscun niquica, topaciohuan; chunca niquica, crisoprasahuan; chunca shuc niquica, jacintohuan; chunca ishcai niquica, amatistahuan.
66021021	Chunca ishcai puncucuna chunca ishcai perla canurca; caran puncu shuc perlamantalla rurashca carca. Llactamanta jatun ñan curimanta carca, cristal shina chuya curimanta.
66021022	Llactapi mana maipi Diospac huasita ricurcanichu, tucuita ushac Apunchic Dios Corderontin paipac huasi cashcaraicu.
66021023	Llacta intita quillatapash mana mutsanchu paita ricuchincapac, Dios llinpiyashca paita ricuchishcaraicu, paipac achic Cordero cashcaraicu.
66021024	Mama—llactacuna llacta ricuchishcahuanmi purinunca, pachamanta apucunaca tucui paicuna charishcata paimanmi cununca.
66021025	Paipac puncucuna tucui puncha mana huichcai tucununcachu, chai llactapi tuta mana tiyancachu.
66021026	Paicuna jatun cashcata, tucui paicuna charishcata paiman cununca;
66021027	shinapash, mana maican punchapash ticllayuc paiman yaicuncachu, millaipaccunata ruracpash umachicpash. Corderopac causai pancapi shutita chariccanallami chaiman yaicananca.
66022001	Angel chai huasha Causai Yacuta ricuchihuarca. Cristal shina chuya carca, chai yacu Diospac Corderopac tiyarinamanta llucshicurca.
66022002	Chaupi llactacunamanta jatun ñanpipi, chai yacu ishcantin patapi, causai yura shayan, caran quilla aparin, rimacpica, chunca ishcai cuti caran huata; paipac pancacunaca mama—llactacunata janpincapac alli canun.
66022003	Chaipi mana imapash maldisiashca tiyancachu. Diospac tiyarina Corderopantin llactapimi canca, paipac runacuna paita chacchanuncami.
66022004	Quiquin ñahuipurami paitaricanunca, paipac shutitapash Irentapimi apai cachanunca.
66022005	Tuta chaipi mana tiyancachu; chaipi causaccunapash chinpusu achicta inti achictapash mana mutsununcachu, Apunchic Dios paipac achicta paicunaman cushcaraicu; paicunami huiñai chaipi cansanunca.
66022006	Angel rimahuarca: —Cai shimicuna uyai tucunami canun, shutimi canun. Apanchic Dios, profetacunaman yuyaita cuc, paipac angel cachashca paipac runacunaman manapash unaipi tucunca rashcata ricsichincapac.
66022007	—Mana unayashachu. Tucunca rashcamanta cai pancapi rimashcata uyac cushiyachun.
66022008	Ñuca, Juan, ricurcani, uyarcani tucui chaicanata. Tucui ricushpa uyashca huasha, ricuchihuac angelpac chaquipi cuncurircani, paita chacchancapac.
66022009	Ranti pai cashna nihuarca: —Chaitaca ama ruraichu, ñucaca Diosta yanapac cani can shina, canpac huauquicuna, profetacuna, cai pancapi quillcashcata tucui pactachiccuna shina. Diosta chacchai.
66022010	Caitapash nihuarca: —Tucunca rashcamanta cai pancapi rimashcata ama canlla pacaichu, ña mayanllami chai pactarina.
66022011	Saquilla millai runa paipac ruraihuan catichun, ticllayuc runa paipac ticllapi catichun; ranti alli runa allicanata rurashpa catichun, Diosta catic runa ama pantashpa paita caticuchunll.
66022012	—Ari, utcallami pactamusha, cuyaitami apamusha caranman amu rurashca tuputa cuncapac.
66022013	Ñucami alfa omegapash cani, tucuimanta ñaupac, tucuimanta huasha, callarina, tucurma.
66022014	Churanata tacshaccuna cushiyanuchun; causai yura paicunapacmi canca, llactamanta pancucunapash paicunapacca pascarami canca.
66022015	Allcucuna, sacracuna, ticllayuccuna, runa huañuchiccuna, huacata chacchaccuna, tucui llullahuan causac ranacuna canchaman saquirinanca.
66022016	—Ñuca, Jesus, ñuca angelta cachashcanimi iniccunata chaimanta rimancapac. Ñucami cunan huiñaric Davidpac aillumanta cani. Ñucami tutamanta llinpic cuillur cani.
66022017	Diospac Samai, Corderopac huarmintin caita rimanun: —Shamui. Uyacpash rimachun: —Shamui. Upianaita charic mayanyachun, maicanpash munashpa. Causai yacuta cuyashcata chasquichun.
66022018	Tucunca rashcamanta cai pancapi quillcashcata uyaccunata caitami rimani: Pipash caipi quillcashcata yapachicpi, Diosmi caipi quillcashca huañuicunata paiman cachanca.
66022019	Pipash cai pancapi tucunca rashcamanta quillcashca shimita anchuchicpi, Diosmi pai causai yurata charina cashcamanta, santo llactamanta chicanyachinca; cai pancapi chaicana quillcashca tiyanun.
66022020	Chai shimicunamanta ricuyac tucuc rimanmi: —Ari, utcallami pactanca rani. Chashna cachun. ¡Apunchic Jesus shamui!
66022021	Apunchic Jesus tucui cancunapi paipac cuyaita tallichichun.
